title: Probably best Caribbean hotel!
review: The villa we stayed was totally breathtaking, incredibly spacious with surreal views! Food is good. Struggled a little bit with the baby food generally, but it’s a minor point. Great for snorkelling and trekking.

title: Beautiful Property and Great Service
review: The property and service is beautiful. If you are looking for a remote paradise this is it! The spa is a unique experience like a tree house in the jungle. The views are so beautiful and the rooms are awesome. Private pools and lounging decks make this a perfect place to relax and disconnect.

title: Beautiful setting but rip off prices in restaurants and services.
review: Good Day Annette R,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy! We are happy to read your glowing feedback and appreciate that you highlighted our wonderful team.  We are delighted that you enjoyed every aspect of your stay especially our unique Rain-forest Spa.  Once again, thank you for your wonderful feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: HONEYMOON IN PARADISE
review: This is indeed a stunning location and the grounds are very well kept BUT for the prices charged, you would expect everything to be top level. The wardrobe drawers were unstable and top one fell down if pulled too far out. Our ice bucket had no knob on the lid so for 7 days we had to praise open with a plastic fork . The ice was not replenished daily, nor were the t bags. Service at the restaurants was very slow and poor. Four times our order was mixed up, food delivered that we hadn’t ordered. But our main complaint was the price of the food. With a captive clientele, this place charges outrageously. $26US plus tax plus service charge for 2 prawn skewers that had two prawns each! Similar prices for all meals. We didn’t even bother trying the fancy restaurant with those sorts of prices. Plain water should be free with every meal and teas and coffee should be fee at breakfast. The tapas lounge was so poorly serviced that we didn’t go again. It took 30 mins for me to get my ordered drink. There were two other people there and three servers at the bar!  For a place charging around 500$ a night, this is not up to standard. The spa services were exorbitant as were gym sessions. The highlight was the butlers. Our two night time female butlers were fabulous. Very helpful and friendly…

title: It doesn’t come much better!
review: Good Day  lollyPerthAustralia,  Thank you for sharing your feedback of your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate you sharing your highlights as well as comments about the areas that concerned you.  We take pride in ensuring that every guest has a wonderful and memorable experience, sadly we were not able to exceed your expectations.  We are sorry for the highlighted service lapses that you experienced. Your feedback is being discussed with the team to gain insight on why there was a broken ice bucket and your mini bar was not replenished as this is protocol. I do wish your concerns were voiced to management while you were at the resort so we could have had the opportunity to turn your experience around. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced.  We hope that you decide to return to Sugar Beach in the not too distant future. We would welcome the opportunity to share the intuitive service that have become our trademark but were sadly lacking during your stay.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Spa Disaster
review: We were looking forward to a spa treatment on our last day of vacation on St. Lucia and booked a couples treatment directly with the Spa at Sugar Beach.  As we were staying a good distance from the spa, we arranged transition to get us to and from the the resort, and also - relying on the spa appointment - made a dinner reservation nearby.    We arrived at 2:35 for our 3:00 appointment and went to the check in desk, gave our name and appointment time.  The attendant then said “oh, you’re the non-resident people. We are overbooked and can’t accommodate you. Our Booker didn’t ask for your contact information so we had no way to contact you.  Sorry.”  There was no attempt to acknowledge the complete inconvenience this was, no attempt to help us in the situation we were in, no offer…

title: Great stop for pictures, snorkling,and swimming.
review: Good Day 143johnn,  Thank you for choosing the Rainforest Spa at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are sorry to hear of your experience and appreciate you sharing feedback.  We again extend a sincere apology for the inconvenience caused by the error at the time of booking. Our team at the spa did try to turn your experience around by extending lunch and bubbles at the beach until the next available slot at 4pm which you declined.   We take pride in ensuring that every guest (resort guest or day visitor) has a wonderful and memorable experience, sadly we lapsed on this occasion.We hope the experience you described has not left an indelible mark and that you will consider a return visit at some point in the future.  Should you decide to return to St Lucia, please reach out as we would be happy to host you.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: super resort
review: We stopped her on a tour we were on with Cosol Tours. The snorkling was good. you need good water shoes here because there are a lot of rocks so the walking in and out of the water is rough on your feet. Since we were here with a tour chairs were very limited because this beach is located a a hotel and you can only get here by boat. The beach is free to the public but chairs are very limited unless you are stayinf at the hotel. Fish are plentyfull for viewing and the water is clear.

title: Amazing Stay at Sugar Beach
review: Good Day Dusty27018,  Thank you for sharing feedback from your recent day visit. Our white sand beaches are the perfect places between the Pitons to snorkel. We are glad that you appreciated the marine reserve and took time to enjoy the beautiful underwater life.  We hope that you might consider a return visit at some point in the future, perhaps as a resident guest.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Honeymoon
review: We had a wonderful experience at Sugar Beach. Staff is very attentive and professional. All of the facilities are first class. The beach is beautiful with great views and service. St Lucia is beautiful place to visit.

title: THIS IS THE BEST!
review: This hotel is amazing... the location is beyond spectacular, the stuff are great, the rooms are stunning and the beach is WOW WOW OW.  The island itself is gorgeous, but this hotel is really the place to stay if you're looking for the best of the best.  I can't wait to go back for more, and more!

title: Amazing location and resort, but with one Big drawback.
review: We stayed in a bungalow on the sand and we couldn't be happier with the room and location.  We definitely felt that we got what we paid for.  We had heard that the prices for food and drink were going to be really high, but it was worse than we expected.  I tried to ignore the prices and just know that it was part of the "cost" of being there, but it really did start to bug me.  Plus the service was not worth the price.  With the exception of our Butler, everyone one else had to be flagged down and asked for beach towels, etc.  The service was slow and not very helpful.  I just expect more when I am paying more.

title: BEST BEACH VACATION EVER
review: Good Day jkillebrew,	  Thank you for sharing feedback regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is disappointing to read that we fell short of your expectations in service at the beach and the food and beverage costs. We work hard to ensure that our guests are always satisfied and feel they are getting value for money, but we appear to have let you down on this occasion.  We are happy to know that despite the disappointments mentioned, you enjoyed the time that you spent at Sugar Beach and the butler team contributed positively to your stay.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We welcome the opportunity to serve you again at our best.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Couldn't have been better!
review: BEST BEACH VACATION EVER.  We stayed at the Sugar Beach Resort the first week of November. This resort is the perfect marriage of luxury and nature.  It was absolutely spectacular in every way.  We stayed at the Ocean Grand Villa and it was magnificent. I loved the white furniture, dark hard wood floors and beachy feel.  It was spotless as well.  A special place that far exceeded our expectations. Our butlers, Ethan, Michael, Gary, and Sherman were terrific. The restaurant waiters and waitresses were delightful, particularly Zenith. The spa was very unique, tree houses for each treatment room and a beautiful entry way that made you feel you were entering another world. Maria and Leah at the spa were terrific.  The beach was so beautiful, White sand and calm waters that felt you…

title: 15th Anniversary
review: Good Day monicalX7093ME,   Thank you for your glowing review of your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that your time spent with us was everything you imagined.   I am glad you had the opportunity to experience our Rainforest Spa. It is truly a special place with amazing treatments to choose from.  Our setting is truly unique, and we appreciate you sharing your review with other travellers.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Paradise
review: Amazing people, stunning views. Great kids club, thanks alcee & the team. All of the team were great, Caroline by the pool, just everyone. Lovely food, great rum punches. Just lovely. We’ll be back....

title: The best is an understatement
review: Good Day Traveler628500,  Thank you for sharing your glowing comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am delighted that you enjoyed everything from the impeccable service to the one of a kind location and amenities.  Again, thank you for your review and for choosing to stay with us. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner  General Manager

title: “Welcome to Paradise”
review: During my weekend get away, I was marveled at the hospitality I received, words cannot describe how myself and my partner were treated,we left sad,not because we were treated badly,but because we didnt want to leave! This place is heaven on earth,and the staff ..the staff is what makes it even more heavenly.Annette from bayside restaurant,a beautiful smart young lady who definitely knows what she Is doing,GREAT PERSONALITY. Gilberti our shuttle driver( he is the best) and miguel from cane bar who made us a drink I can't pronounce but hands down the best I ever tasted.Thank you guys for making our stay the best.looking forward to seeing you in the future

title: Absolutely amazing
review: Good Day Resort68054229422,  Thank you for your glowing feedback about your get away trip to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   It is pleasing to read that our staff members provided impeccable service; Annetta, Gilberti and Miguel will be commended for a job well done.  Once again we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to paradise.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Favorite place in St. Lucia!
review: “Welcome to Paradise” was how we was greeted on arrival to Sugar Beach. I am writing this review on our last day here. We have been made to feel welcome from the staff from all aspects of the hotel.  This was our 1st time to the Caribbean and have been use to 5* Hotels across the globe, specifically Dubai. We was therefore a little worried as how this version of 5* will compare.  We had a beach bungalow room which was amazing, the views of the beach and pitons were outside the room and the staff here are amazing, whom have most definitely made our stay truly memorable. I wanted to specifically mention 2 members of staff 1st whom is Peter who was our butler, whom we felt above and beyond to ensure everything we needed was there. The 2nd one is Noah who was one of the beach staff…

title: Definitely a great experience
review: We will definitely be going again since it was an amazing experience. We loved the resort and all of the staff. They were really friendly and will to make our stay as amazing as they could. There are not to many places we were completely satisfied with and staying here was amazing. We were satisfied with everything

title: Sugar Beach is a MUST-do!
review: Good Day A M,  It is a wonderful to read your glowing review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy to hear that your experience met and exceeded your expectations.  It gives us great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members.   On behalf of the entire team, thank you for your feedback and business. We are all looking forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: The ultimate honeymoon
review: We have been to a lot of paces and hotels in the Caribbean. Overall, Sugar Beach was one of the best hotels we have ever stayed in. The staff is so pleasant, the food is great, and the rooms/views are to die for. Definitely do all-inclusive, as it is not cheap to dine every meal. But the experience was well worth it.

title: Paradise regained
review: Good Day Kaitlinandbrian,  Thank you for posting your glowing review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that you had a great time and your stay with us was nothing short of perfection.   It is a pleasure learning that our beautiful setting left a lasting impression, as did the special care and attention provided by the team members. They will be thrilled with your comments.    We look forward to the opportunity of serving you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Review
review: Our stay was carefree and very relaxing. The staff was very friendly and helpful. They catered to our every need. The food and drinks were delicious and plentiful. Highly recommend the all inclusive as it makes dining stress free. Plenty of activities to stay busy along with the relaxing beach front. We will be staying again!

title: Nice people, great setting and nice resort.
review: I would say the food is overpriced and not great quality. The people are very nice, but service can be slow due to being understaffed. The location and setting are absolutely stunning and the location is very safe and secluded.

title: Paradise
review: Good Day emilysS5328MW,  Thank you for providing feedback about your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We remain genuinely concerned about each guest experience and welcome feedback such as yours so that we can improve on areas highlighted and help to enhance the overall satisfaction of our guests.  On balance, I am pleased that despite your highlighted disappointments you enjoyed your stay. We hope to one day welcome you back so we can provide the intuitive service that has become our trademark but was sadly lacking during your stay.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Absolutely Amazing!!! Gorgeous, Great Food and Best Service Anywhere.  5 Stars Again
review: Sugar Beach is one of the few places we didn't want to leave.  The scenery, accommodations and the staff were all exceptional!  Everyone made us feel so special.  The private villas are unbelievable.  The beds were extremely comfortable and everything was spotless.  It truly felt like living in Paradise.

title: Woke up in paradise
review: Good Day Gary C,  Thank you for posting your glowing comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It gives us great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members.   We would love to welcome you back to paradise soon.   Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Incredible honeymoon!
review: This was our third trip to Sugar Beach and it continues to amaze us.   The facilities are top notch.  We've had three different Luzury Villas and they are all fantastic.  Large, clean, very nicely appointed and each with its own small pool.  Lots of privacy from the other units, and the butlers are very helpful.  The staff are amazing.  Very tenured, all extaordinarily friendly and helpful.  Many remembered us immediately from our prior visits.  The food in all three restaurants is excellent - beach front, sushi and formal.  Definitly go with the all-enclusive.  The beach is small and private with great food and beverage service.  Fabulous spa built into the rain forest.  If you are looking for an upscale, relaxing place to get pampered, this is it.

title: Absolute paradise
review: What can I say. Well firstly this place is paradise. The location between the two famous Pitons could not be better. You obviously pay for the location but the resort is stunning. The main house has been beautifully kept and decorated. The main pool is huge and sits just behind the beach. We did not go in the pool as all of the villas have their own. We stayed in room 508 which is a Luxury Villa. This villa itself was very big and had everything you could need. The plunge pool (more like a swimming pool) was lovely. The butlers were great and were always there when you needed them without being intrusive. As we were in the 500 grouped villas we were around halfway up the resort. Close enough to walk to the beach which we did quite often. If you are not in the mood to walk you…

title: Outstanding
review: Good Day markjF8002BO,  We appreciate you taking the time to share this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   It is a pleasure to know that the team,Sherman in particular, helped to enrich your stay. They will be commended for a job well done.  I am glad our accommodations and offerings more than met your expectations and that you had a truly flawless vacation. It is also great to see you appreciated our fantastic location and enjoyed the beautiful underwater life.  Once again, thank you for posting these wonderful comments. I am sure your review will help assist other travelers when planning their own holiday. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Indulgent and breaktaking
review: This place is a paradise, truly exceptional. The attention to detail and needs is second to none. I feel as if every member of staff went out of their way to make this trip idilic, nothing was too much trouble. The grounds and accommodation are stunning and very clean. Could not recommend it enough.

title: 10 Year Anniversary
review: Good Day Harpreet B,  We appreciate you taking the time to share your glowing feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort, and for your recommendation.  It gives us great pleasure to know that the special touches provided by our team helped to make your stay memorable for all the right reasons.  Your feedback has been greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Beautiful Views
review: This resort was probably the nicest place I have ever stayed in from top to bottom. I can't really think of anything more amazing. We were in a villa that was completely private with a private pool and a private deck. The beach was a public beach but salt very private. Also they have a second beach that is for adults only that can only be accessed if you knew where it was which was incredible. The Bay itself was extraordinarily clean and circling was fun and safe. The water was amazing the staff was incredible and you even get a private Butler to help you with anything you need. It's like a concierge for 4 rooms only at any time of the day or night. The food was expensive but of extremely high quality and each dining experience made you feel like you were in a 5 star restaurant…

title: our holiday in Sugar Beach
review: I and my husband Michael Anikst stayed in Sugar Beach from 30 September untill 8 October 2019. It was our third holiday in Sugar Beach& We think it was the best stay! Thank you very much! Elena Anikst

title: St Lucia Gem
review: Good Day Mr and Mrs Anikst,  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort a third time. We are delighted to learn that we were able to exceed your expectations yet again.   I will share your glowing comments with the team, they will be proud to read your feedback.  Once again, your loyalty, comments and business are greatly appreciated. We look forward to the opportunity of serving you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great location, TERRIBLE service/value
review: I’ve stayed at a lot of top Caribbean resorts, and Sugar Beach is right there with the best of them.  I’m not a big ‘all inclusive’ guy,  but it’s amazing here...not your typical all inclusive food and drink at all!   Staff was great and this place looks more like Hawaii or Thailand vs the desert islands of Cayam, Turks and Caicos, Anguilla, etc.  That said the beach isn’t powder soft like those, but the views more then make up for it.  Also..tours of the volcano (mud bath), local town of Soufriere, and snorkeling with Miny Dick tours which you can book right on the beach are totally worth it...ask for Dwight.

title: Wonderful Honeymoon
review: Good Day cmp1973,  Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort is truly the place of dreams.  We enjoyed reading your feedback, thank you for taking the time and making the effort to share.  We are delighted you had the opportunity to enjoy all of our services and amenities, and got out to explore all that this stunning island has to offer.  Once again, thank you for sharing. I am sure your review will help assist other travelers when planning their own holiday.   On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Wonderful!!!!
review: Let me just start by saying the setting and location are absolutely gorgeous. Sugar beach is named after the white sands that were imported (other beaches are black sand so very hot to walk on) and is situated right between the Piton Mountains.   Aside from the views and setting, everything else is a disaster.   My wife and I purchased an "all-inclusive" package after reading about how expensive meals/drinks were. Even with this package, we still had a $1200 bill at the end of our stay. On top of that, every single time you order anything (could be a water bottle), they make you wait around while they write up a 0$ bill. Of course this bill has a tip line on it and the employees clearly have not been trained to refrain from looking at your tip the second you hand the bill back.…

title: Beach Front Bungalow
review: We loved our beach front bungalow. We arrived and the staff upgraded us from a Superior room to the beach front bungalow for our 10 year anniversary. This was SUCH an amazing surprise and we we're SO grateful for this. The views here are unbelievable and its unique in that it is the only beachfront resort in between the two Piton volcanoes. All other resorts around it have great views, but NO beach. The food was AMAZING!! Definitely excellent quality. We had an amazing experience with some of the staff including, Mariline (dock bartender), Julia (Bayside Restaurant Waitress), Linus (The Terrace Restaurant Waiter), Ethan (our butler), and Leroy (the beach front bartender). We also had some uncourteous experiences with certain staff. There were 3 or 4 times the staff was…

title: Good, but room for improvement
review: Good Day Jennifer G,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort to celebrate such a wonderful milestone. We are happy to read your glowing feedback and appreciate your 5 star rating.  It is gratifying to hear that every aspect of your stay, from the upgrade you received to the Luxury Beach Bungalow to the service from Marylene, Julia, Linus, Ethan and Leroy, exceeded your expectations.   I am disappointed to learn of your experience with some of our other team members. We usually receive high praise for their hospitality and service and I am sorry that this was not the case for you. We have taken your comments on board to ensure that our team members are following protocol and ensuring every guest receives warm, seamless service.  Once again, thank you for your valuable feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back for your second visit.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Beautiful property
review: The location and amenities at this hotel are unrivalled and as a result we would return. However, we found the standard of service poor, particularly on the beach, which tainted the experience some what. Would also recommend not booking the basic room, it was dark and didn't provide any connection with the beautiful surroundings.

title: Just a food/Beach Review
review: Good Day Heidi R,  Thank you for sharing feedback regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry to learn of your less than ideal experience with us.  Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and it is disappointing that your concerns were not voiced to management during your stay.  I would like to apologize for the inconveniences you experienced. We hope the issues you have experienced will not deter you from considering a return visit at some point in the future.   Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Fantastic Honeymoon at an Amazing Resort
review: A beautiful location between two dormant volcanoes on the beach. Truly stunning view. The people are so friendly and non pretentious. The only down side was the food. Mostly it was greatly overpriced and average. Breakfast was awesome but dinners not so much. The grilled scallops appetizer was 1 scallop for $42. I swear I thought it was plural but it wasn’t. We had a good laugh about it!

title: PARADISE!
review: Our 30th anniversary trip was nothing short of perfect!  The Resort, Staff, location, accommodations were all absolutely incredible!  It truly felt like we were in paradise!  I don't think I would consider staying anywhere else other than Sugar Beach Resort!

title: Wonderful stay at Sugar Beach!
review: Good Day Trek30864666390,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your anniversary stay with us. It’s a pleasure knowing that your celebration was nothing short of perfection.  It gives us great pleasure to know that you were impressed by our offerings and world class accommodations. We are thankful that we had the opportunity to share this enjoyable and memorable experience with you  Thank you once more for sharing your feedback. We hope to welcome you back for many more anniversaries to come.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Paradise!
review: This is a beautiful, romantic resort for honeymooners, anniversary trips as well as families.  I loved everything about the resort and the fact that it abuts Le Petit Piton is a bonus! the rooms were beautiful, the food was delicious, the staff went out of their way to accommodate us. Will definitely recommend this resort to my clients in the future, as a matter of fact it will be my "go-to" resort of choice on St. Lucia!

title: 2nd honeymoon
review: Good Day Connector606801,  Thank you for posting this wonderful review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   It is always gratifying to read reviews such as yours and to know you fully enjoyed the accommodations, service and location of Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Thank you for taking the time to post your glowing comments and for recommending our resort to other travelers.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Unbelievable getaway
review: Stop looking! Unbelievable location with unrivaled natural beauty, and great attentive friendly service! The staff truly goes out of their way to insure comfort, convenience, etc. Great food (if always a little pricey in the islands) too!

title: Jordan and Savannah honey moon 9/2-9/8
review: Sugar Beach is the perfect resort location with beautiful nature melded with amazing rooms and property. The beach is quiet and the water is crystal clear. Food is excellent. This is a perfect location to go with your partner.

title: Beautiful, relaxing resort
review: Good Day jphill15,  Congratulations Jordan and Savannah! Thank you for this fabulous review of your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is such a pleasure to read about your experience and know that our resort remains memorable for all the right reasons.  We have a one of a kind setting and it’s always a pleasure when our guests appreciate these glorious surroundings as much as we do.  We hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort, perhaps for your first anniversary celebration.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: One of the most amazing properties in the world!!!
review: I had the pleasure of staying in half of a beautiful 4 bedroom residence at Sugar Beach. Our views were beautiful, the bathrooms were perfect and the location on the property made it easy to walk to the beach yet keep the beautiful unobstructed bay views from up high.   Our butler Tyson was always able to anticipate our needs, sometimes before we even knew we needed something (it was always right on time). He was definitely a gem for us on this trip. We also had wonderful shuttle service from Michael. He always showed us hidden treasures on the property and had the best personality.   The food at every restaurant was absolutely delicious. On Thursdays they have a dance party in the sushi lounge and a live Caribbean band with a bbq on the beach on Fridays.   This resort is…

title: Weekend Getaway at Sugar Beach
review: Good Day adwoa14,  We appreciate you taking the time to share this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   I am glad our accommodations, amenities and offerings more than met your expectations and that you had a truly flawless vacation.  It is a pleasure to know that Tyson and Michael helped to enrich your stay. They will be commended for a job well done.  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach. We hope to welcome you back to paradise.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: The #1 place to honeymoon!
review: Just got back from 4 nights at Sugar Beach with my wife celebrating our 20th anniversary and we could not have picked a more perfect spot!! This place is 10 stars, 5 circles all around!!! The accomodations are unreal, we had a villa way up in the mountain with a view of the Caribbean Sea. Everything was super clean and every guest has a butler at their service around the clock. The hotel shuttle took us everywhere we wanted to go and we never waited more than 45 seconds after we called, no joke!! The beach itself is the best beach in the world hands down, not even an argument!! The way that it is situated between the Pitons and the beauty of the white sand and clear blue water almost looks not real. The resort was not crowded, so getting a chair at the beach or pool or a table…

title: Better off going to Jade Mountain
review: My wife and I for our honeymoon went to both Jade Mountain and Sugar Beach.  While the hotels are vastly different the service is what they both pitch as one their best features.  This is where the issue lies with Sugar Beach.  Depending on the room you stay in the prices can be quite similar for both hotels, but the best "bang for your buck" isn't at Sugar Beach.  The hotel itself is beautiful, the rooms are clean, and the food is quite good. The service, shuttle service, and staff in general very much vary.  Where in Jade everyone was nice, friendly, and happy to accommodate, the staff at Sugar Beach I felt was very different.  The shuttle service is a real issue there.  For the majority of the rooms, suites, villa, and cottages(we had a superior luxury villa) you need to take…

title: Paradise
review: Good Day maverick0510,	  Congratulations newlyweds! Thank you for providing feedback about your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   I am truly sorry for the disappointments that you highlighted with our shuttle service. Your concerns have been shared with transportation team to gain insight on what occurred and to avoid a reoccurrence.  It is also disheartening to read your comments about our team. Our team members are almost always praised for the genuine care they take with our guests. We will be sharing your feedback with them, and will continue our refresher training and coaching to ensure consistent luxury service going forward.  We remain genuinely concerned about each guest experience and we have taken all of your comments on-board so we can improve in the areas you have highlighted.   We hope you will consider a return visit so we can share the first class Sugar Beach experience that we are known for but that sadly lapsed on this occasion.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: BEST BIRTHDAY GETAWAY!
review: Highlights: 1) The location: An absolute paradise, there's nothing quite like it. The views from the room, pool, beach, restaurants, etc. were straight out of a fairy tale. 2) Room upgrade: We had a secluded villa (701) with beautiful views of both pitons and the ocean--more beautiful than we ever imagined. The private pool was unreal. 3) The concierge Ella and our butler Dylan were gems--so responsive and always helpful. 4) The water sports were reasonably priced and free scuba rentals and in-room Pitons (a few per day) were appreciated.  The only downside, which a few reference here, is the significant cost of food and some of the excursions (e.g., $38 for a wrap and $168 for a 30-min hike). It's hard to really enjoy a meal--even if it's really good--when you feel like you've…

title: 5 Star Resort!!
review: Good Day W0lfpack06,  Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort is truly the place of dreams. Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your stay, I am certain other travellers will find your feedback helpful.  It gives us great pleasure to know that you were impressed by our beautiful setting and world class accommodations.  Your feedback regarding the pricing has been shared and discussed with the relevant department heads so we can improve in both areas. I am sorry we let you down in this regard.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Trip of my life
review: The people of St Lucia and Sugar Beach Viceroy truly makes this place amazing! Yes the views and resort will wow you but the attention to detail and quality service provided by the staff is what truly made this Birthday trip amazing! Also the food was so good! superb! Will be back for sure!

title: Fantastic stay and outstanding location
review: Beautiful stay in a wonderful secluded location among the local typical Pitons. Kindness and and clean rooms are the signature of this resort.  I will be back soon. Thank you to all People of the  Sugar Beach

title: Beautiful location with attentive staff
review: Good Day GCialone,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback regarding your stay. We are delighted that every aspect of your stay exceeded your expectations.  Our setting between the majestic pitons is truly unique, we are happy you were pleased with your experience and the amenities catered to your needs.  It is a pleasure to know that our team helped to enrich your stay.   On behalf of the entire team, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach. We hope to welcome you back to paradise.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Outstanding Vacation - Beautiful property - Service Exceptional
review: First, this is a beautiful property.  Our room was excellent' , spacious and well maintained with one exception- the shower heads were in need of cleaning or replacing.  The shower was big enough for 4 people but the water flow from the shower heads was weak and went in all kinds of directions.  Also, the wi-fi in the room was inconsistent.  Very poor in the AM! Constantly disappearing and then reappearing.  There was a system upgrade when we were there but no discernible difference after that. Those are the only minor negatives that was otherwise an excellent visit.  The staff was outstanding, friendly and accommodating.  The beach service was good.  There is a long walk involved from rooms to beach, pool or restaurants but shuttle service was excellent.  Never waited more than…

title: Travel to a magnificent place
review: Good Day,  Thank you for posting this detailed review of your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate you sharing your highlights as well as comments about the areas which concerned you.  We are sorry for the inconvenience you experienced. I am, however, pleased that the team was able to recover and ensure that overall you had a wonderful and relaxing time.  Once again, I would like to thank you for your comments and business. I will send Chef Andrew a reminder to send you that recipe. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Fabulous
review: Sugar Beach, simply one of our best vacations ever! The service  was exceptional. I have seen other write ups before we left that the Kids Club didn't cater too well to teenagers and we found it just the opposite, facilities were great and the staff better yet!  The beach is pristine, the water warm, great snorkeling and again beach service outstanding. No fighting for beds, plenty of room and the ability to go in and out of the shade. Same at the pool - never overcrowded. The dining was very good quality. Yes, it is more expensive than mainland but probably on par with Maui e.g. Cocktails around $15. However, the quality and portion more generous. The Great room is the fine dining, it was exceptional (tip do not order a starter or dessert as they bring samplers). The cane bar -…

title: Sugar Beach
review: My husband and I came here for part of our honeymoon. Best hotel / resort experience I've ever had hands down. Truly exceptional. From the food, to the facilities, to the service, everything was perfect. Staff is amazing and really make the place what it is. A dream!

title: Paradise Found
review: Good Day,  Congratulations! Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We try to cater to the needs of all of our guests and it is wonderful that you had the opportunity to enjoy many of our services and amenities.  We look forward to your return visit to celebrate many anniversaries to come!

title: Stunning beach location!
review: After a few days on another part of the Island we had a water taxi bring us to Sugar Beach.  It is one of the most spectacular beach settings we have ever seen and we are from Malibu,CA.  There are two volcanoes bookending the small valley and this beach is right in between.  The hotel has beach Palapa’s and it never was too busy.  The snorkeling here is the best on the island due to the preserve nearby.  There are a steady stream of small tour boats bringing snorkeled from other areas.   But they only stay for 30-45 minutes so if you are staying here there are lots of times you will be the only ones in the water.  The food was top notch and at the highest quality from the bayside restaurant, sushi at the beach to the Grand Room all restaurants had amazing staff and cuisine.  …

title: Worst food ever. First 5 star hotel we get that cannot even come close to getting the food right.
review: Good Day,  We are happy to read your glowing review about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Thank you for sharing your feedback.  Not only are we known for our stunning location between the Pitons, we also do our best to ensure that the services and amenities offered are equal to the views. It is pleasing to know that you had a great time and you fully enjoyed our offerings.  Once again, thank you for your wonderful feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back for a second visit.

title: Heaven, wonderful people
review: Hotel location between Gros Piton and Petite Piton is absolutely stunning.  Hotel facilities are beautiful with fantastic views form the rooms as they sit on hillside overlooking water.  Staff overall is very friendly, as are the St Lucian people generally.  Great access to activities--Gros Piton hiking, PADI dive shop on location, nearby coral, sailing etc.  While Great Room food was very good (had an excellent meal set up seaside just for us), the casual restaurants for lunch were average to mixed in food quality, average to poor in service, and comparatively high in price.  So, a casual average lunch for 4 with one drink each at total $250.  Most all of the hotel staff were incredibly friendly, but the restaurant servers were mixed.  The rooms overall were beautiful.  Not…

title: Perfect Paradise with Priceless Views
review: We stayed in one of the Oceanview Grand Luxury villas - we were lucky to be in villa 503, which many of the staff told us was the villa with the best view on the property - it overlooked the beach and resort, and had an unobstructed view of the pitons, and ocean, but was high enough up so that there was complete privacy from the beach and other villas. It was spacious and had an elegant Caribbean design, and had its own infinity pool.   The sunsets we saw from our villa were unparalleled.  The location is amazing as you are surrounded by majestic pitons, lush rainforest, gorgeous beach and sounds of birds.  The resort had a lot of things to do. Sugar Beach was more lively and had more activity going on. Great choice to go with a family if you want R&R. Teenage kids enjoyed…

title: An Amazing Hotel
review: Good Day,  Thank you for sharing this wonderful feedback about your family vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   I am delighted that you enjoyed everything from beautiful views and sunsets on your patio to the delicious dishes in our restaurants.   I am sorry that you did not receive our usually high level of service from your butler. Your feedback has been discussed with the team to investigate what went wrong and to continue our refresher training and coaching.  Once again, thank you for your feedback and business. We welcome the opportunity to serve you again.

title: Mortgage Adviser
review: This hotel is by far one of my favorite hotels I have ever gone to. The rooms are huge and super spacious with personal plunge pools. Although there was a lot of rain, the beach is absolutely beautiful and the staff there is so nice. The beach is big and right near the pool so staying there all day was super pleasant. Don’t even get me started on the breakfast. The breakfast was insanely delicious and enjoyable with a large menu and nice outdoor seating area. Lunch and dinner were also superb, with the beach restaurant having some of the tastiest lunch ever. All of the staff were so kind and although my daughter spilled a milkshake on our first night at dinner, the wait staff cleaned it up and replaced it for free all while being so polite and nice. We had an absolutely…

title: Feeling in Paradise
review: Good Day, Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your family vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   It gives great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members. They will all be happy with your comments.  Our food and beverage team will be happy to know that you enjoyed all of our restaurants, especially breakfast at the terrace.  Thank you once more for sharing your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

title: Disappointing
review: The hotel was amazing.  The location, staff and food was all superb.  The only thing negative I have to say is that the food and drink was off the chart expensive.  Im used to high prices at resorts but I felt that they were very high.  We still ate and drank and enjoyed.

title: Best Tropical Resort Experience
review: This resort is stunning. the beach is nestled between the 2 majestic Piton mountains and beautiful blue water is so picturesque, we felt like we were on a movie set. On site snorkeling is beautiful and convenient. We stayed in a Deluxe Villa in the 700's. Our villa was private, but we were the villa right next to the resort road that staff & transport vehicles frequented. When requesting a room, if you want privacy you might mention away from the main road. There are pros and cons to this location. It is near the pick up/drop off which was nice when I was wearing high heels for dinners. The farther down the path, however may have had less obstructed views of the water and Pitons. Our butler service was excellent, very attentive, although we didn't need them for much more than…

title: A Sweet Place to Land
review: Good Day 897CarmenR,  We are happy to read your glowing review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our setting is truly out of this world and it gives us pleasure to know that you appreciate the magic of this place as much as we do.  We appreciate you sharing both the pros and cons regarding the location of your accommodation with other travelers. We are always happy to know what our guests preferences are prior to arrival so we can ensure their expectations are met and even exceeded.  I am glad that you had the opportunity to experience the couple’s treatment at our Rainforest Spa. It is truly a special place with amazing treatments to choose from.   Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Perfection
review: Took my 80+ year old parents for their 60th wedding anniversary here. They stayed beachside in a bungalow and we lucked into an ocean view villa. Can't say enough great things about the consideration and professionalism of staff.

title: Beach day.
review: Good Day P7091YNelizabethm, 	 Thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort to celebrate your parent’s wonderful milestone. We are happy to read your glowing feedback and appreciate your 5 star rating.  It is heart-warming to read reviews such as yours and to know that my team went above and beyond to ensure your stay was memorable for all the right reasons. Our team members are truly gems and will be so proud to read your comments.  We all look forward to welcome all of you back soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Outstanding Family Vacation
review: Sugar Beach is a truly exquisite experience. The hotel boasts a prime spot on the island, however what really characterises the experience here is the level of service. It is rare to find a hotel or resort where every member of staff upholds the same level of exceptional service and attention to detail.   The water sports are a big draw to this hotel . With its own marine reserve, the scuba diving is brilliant as too the night and day snorkelling. Eddison, Joseph and Norman were all both helpful and very knowledgeable.   Finally, a big thank you to all the drivers, the butlers and serving staff who give 110% making sure that every day of our holiday here was totally special. Everything else aside, it is these guys who really make this place one of the friendliest I have ever had…

title: Romantic Getaway
review: Our honeymoon was absolutely amazing thanks to the beautiful atmosphere, outstanding accommodations, superb food and drinks, and the extraordinary staff.  We loved hanging out at the beach and enjoying drinks from the beach side bar.  The plunge pool at our room allowed us to relax in even more privacy, although the beach was nice and relaxed, as well.  The view is breathtaking and the service was unparalleled.  The all-inclusive meal package is a must and this allowed us to avoid stressing about meal choices.  The food options were expensive, but delicious-- making the meal package well worth it.  Overall our stay at Sugar Beach was exceptional and we would recommend this resort to anyone travelling to St. Lucia.

title: Anniversary Trip
review: Good Day m0dej3,  Congratulations! We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort, and for your glowing recommendation.  Sugar Beach has the most beautiful location and it is always gratifying when our guests appreciate the magic of the place as much as we do. Thank you for recognizing and acknowledging the incredible attention to detail that goes into creating a relaxing and comfortable atmosphere for our guests.  We are glad that the All Inclusive meal plan worked well for you and that you enjoyed our culinary offerings. Our food and beverage team will be really pleased with your feedback.  Again thank you for your review. We welcome the opportunity to serve you again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Second visit, as great as the first
review: My wife and I recently took our anniversary trip to St. Lucia and stayed at Sugar Beach-Viceroy. We arrived from the airport with a warm greeting and were surprised to find out our room had been upgraded to a larger one. The shuttle took us to the room where we were met by our Butler. The Butler told us about the amenities of the room and about the resort. (He was very helpful the whole week.) The room was large, clean and well maintained. Plunge pool and outside area were the same. View of ocean was not great but we enjoyed the privacy of the trees and plants. We had to use the shuttle service a lot because of our location.  The drivers were super nice and always there to pick us up in a matter of minutes. We spent a lot of time on beach. They have a lot of activities…

title: Paradise
review: Good Day Banker9,  Happy Anniversary! We are happy to read your glowing review and are pleased to know that your anniversary celebration was nothing short of perfection  I am happy that you appreciated the room upgrade and were happy with the privacy your accommodation offered. We try to cater to the needs of all of our guests and it is great that you enjoyed the activities and amenities we offer.   We look forward to your return visit to celebrate many anniversaries to come.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Stunning setting
review: This hotel is phenomenal.  We have stayed in many five star resorts, but this is absolutely the best! The people who work at this hotel are the nicest staff we have ever encountered.  We can;t wait to go back!

title: Disappointing
review: Poor service Rude staff Mediocre food Understaffed Overpriced    I expect to pay a premium for a premium resort and premium service.  The Viceroy at Sugar Beach fails at both.  I will definitely never stay at a Viceroy property again.  Very disappointing.

title: Paradise
review: Good Day DeJ072019,  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your time at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We welcome your feedback as a valuable tool in our efforts towards maintaining the high standards we pride ourselves on.  I am truly sorry for the disappointments that you highlighted and the fact that you did not get to experience our usual high level of service. Your feedback has been shared with the relevant department heads so that tangible improvements can be made.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope the issues you have experienced will not deter you from considering a return visit at some point in the future.   Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Amazing beauty!
review: This was the most romantic anniversary trip Of our 22 years of marriage!!   A true paradise with a staff that goes above and beyond to serve in every capacity.  This is a true 5 star resort that we will return to annually.

title: Breathe taking views of the entire property. Friendly staffs to such professional service.
review: Good Day Exploration742608,  Happy Anniversary from all of us at Sugar Beach! We enjoyed reading your feedback and we are happy to know that your time spent with us was everything you imagined.  It gives us great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members. They will all be happy with your comments.  Once again, thank you for your wonderful feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back for a second visit.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Surrounded by Beautiful piton mountains
review: We traveled here with our 14 and 11 year old. It was an amazing stay and the grounds are more beautiful than you can imagine. We stayed in a grand luxury villa ocean view which is up on the hillside. It's not a big deal to be up there, you just call for a shuttle and they are there within 3-5 minutes. The view is outstanding and private. The villa was more than enough room for the 4 of us, we had a king bed, a sofa bed and a they set up a twin size bed next to the sofa that fit perfectly. Two bathrooms and massive closet area. Our private pool was a great way to end each afternoon before getting ready for dinner. Everything is clean and well cared for.  I have seen some complaints about the food prices. I can't say much on that, we had the all inclusive plan so it did make it…

title: Heaven on Earth
review: If you want the best of the best, this is your destination!!  Upscale, elegant, exclusive. They don’t miss anything here from the service to the accommodations!!  Our family will be visiting Sugar Beach again.

title: Amazing Anniversary Getaway!
review: Good Day Brad M,  Thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort as your family vacation destination. We are happy to read your glowing feedback and are glad that your time spent with your family was memorable.  Our setting is truly unique, and we appreciate you sharing your review with other travellers.  We look forward to welcoming all of you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Sugar Beach is so sweet!
review: We celebrated our 10 year wedding anniversary at Sugar Beach and loved every moment! The team members were exceptional - best service I have ever received at a vacation resort! The grounds were breathtaking. Between our private villa (with AC!!), the gorgeous beach, the pool and the restaurants, we couldn't decide where we wanted to hang out because we loved them all! We had an amazing excursion at the Sulpher Springs with Leah from the spa, who was absolutely fantastic. She took amazing care of us and made sure we had a great time! The food was delicious - felt very authentic to St. Lucia. We traveling in July aka the "rainy" season and while we did have a few brief showers, the weather was pretty perfect. No rainy day blues for us!! We loved our stay and can't wait to go back!

title: The Best Getaway Ever!  so Special. Lots of attention.
review: Good Day lifeadventuresfromLA,  Congratulations on this wonderful milestone!  Thank you for choosing Sugar Beach to celebrate and for sharing your experience with other travelers.  Not only are we known for our stunning location between the Pitons, we also do our best to ensure that the services and amenities offered are equal to the views. It is pleasing to know that you had a great time and you fully enjoyed our offerings.  We are happy that you enjoyed your Sulphur Seduction experience; Leah will be commended for ensuring you thoroughly enjoyed your treatment.  Thank you once more for sharing your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again to celebrate many anniversaries to come.   Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: A marvellous experience.
review: For a luxury, pampered experience, stay at Sugar Beach! Butler Gus will make you feel so special, as does everyone on site. They  could not be more accommodating,  and the villas are divine!  The beach  is lovely, the  food excellent and  the service is  wonderful! and truly, the bed is  THE  most  comfortable I've ever slept in!!  I can't  wait to  go back!

title: Amazing relaxation spot!!
review: Place was amazing. Wi-fi could be faster and food prices are very high but overall the place is magical. Beach is beautiful and quiet. Best place to relax. If you are looking for night life this is not the place for you. Sunset is a must see!!!

title: Perfection (but skip the food!)
review: Good Day elilaflaca2005,  Thank you for posting this review of your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate you sharing your highlights as well as comments about the areas that concerned you.  Our setting is truly unique, and we appreciate you sharing your review with other travellers.  Once again, thank you for your feedback. We would love to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Insanely beautiful
review: Everything you have read and heard is true.   Sugar Beach is a 5-star experience with amazing grounds, a scenic beach and outstanding service.  We stayed in a Luxury Villas to celebrate our 4th anniversary. I communicated with the property prior to our arrival to ensure the room would be equipped to our liking.  Management did not disappoint.  From extra pillows to a complimentary bottle of champagne upon our arrival.  Sugar Beach was what we expected and more.  I considered not writing this review because how many different ways is there to say:  "This resort is absolutely gorgeous. The cottages are well appointed and private. The staff goes out of their way to make you feel comfortable.  When I die I hope heaven is like this."?  I'm giving them a 5 star rating because the…

title: Absolutely perfect
review: Good Day ElleMacChicago,  Happy Anniversary! Thank you for sharing your feedback of your anniversary celebration at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   I am happy your overall stay was good with the exception of the disappointment that you highlighted with our prices. We work hard to ensure that our guests are always satisfied and feel they are getting value for money, but appear to have sadly lapsed on this occasion. I apologise for the disappointment and the inconvenience.  On balance, I am pleased that despite your highlighted disappointment you loved our location and setting and enjoyed the provided amenities. We all are thankful for your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Our favorite destination!
review: As a part of a big milestone trip, my wife and I stayed in a beach bungalow as close to the water as possible. It. Was. Amazing! Private butler service and the most incredible landscape. No picture will do this place justice. The water is crystal clear and the room is breathtaking.

title: I'll be back!!!
review: I only spent two nights in a Grand Luxury Villa, but I wish I had more time at this resort.  The setting is spectacular, the beach is lovely, lots of food choices, and an amazing spa with great service all around.  The rooms are fresh and beachy.  Worth a visit.

title: Our week vacation to Sugar beach
review: Good Day Sailsurfgolf,  Thank you for your wonderful review of Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are glad your time at the resort was memorable for all the right reasons.  We have embraced our natural settings to create a beautiful and scenic atmosphere and we are happy you share the same sentiments.  Thank you again for sharing your experience and for choosing to stay with us. We hope to welcome you back for much longer stay next time.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: I wasn’t supposed to like this place!
review: Wonderful and memorable trip!! 5 star accommodations throughout!!! Some of the best food we have ever had in the islands  Exceptional service and accommodations.   The fitness center could use some new updated equipment, especially treadmills

title: Amazing beauty in a charming resort with a superb beach
review: Good Day alaynasmith31,  It is heart-warming to read this glowing review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. On behalf of the entire team thank you for choosing Sugar Beach and for sharing your experience.  Not only are we known for our stunning location between the Pitons, we also do our best to ensure that the services and amenities offered are equal to the views. It is pleasing to know that you had a great time and you fully enjoyed our offerings.  We hope to welcome you back to paradise soon!  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Complete Luxury
review: I approached our booking with a fair degree of trepidation!  We are not really resort people, normally off the beaten track explorer travellers    We managed to get air miles flights for a significant birthday weekend in St Lucia.   The sugar beach was the only  place that appealed when researching   It looked beautiful and the key was you could get a beach side villa   I then started reading the reviews and a common theme of unfriendly staff and rip-off prices came through many of the reviews   We arrived after that taxi ride which almost makes you travel sick and it really does! with 15 mins to spare to go straight on the sundowner cruise. The lovely lady on reception rightly encouraged us to go for it!   So we quickly said hello to our beach side villa and straight on board .…

title: Perfection
review: We celebrated a milestone birthday at Sugar Beach and couldn't have been more pleased with the entire experience. This was a splurge trip - we brought our three teenaged children - so were a bit concerned reading some of the not-so-positive reviews, but can report that our experience was nothing but positive.  Highlights included hiking Gros Piton, snorkeling in the cove, and a private dinner at our villa featuring local dishes. My husband was able to meet privately with sommelier Alessandro to discuss the wine and with Chef Hezemiah to plan the menu. Chef Kelvin prepared the delicious food right in our kitchen, and our butler Charles brought dish after dish of delicious food. Charles did an excellent job during the week, answering our questions, arranging our activities, and…

title: Another perfect  trip
review: Good Day MachaMom,  Happy Birthday and thank you for sharing your glowing comments about your family vacation in paradise. We are happy to hear that your experience met and exceeded your expectations.  Our setting is truly out of this world and it gives us pleasure to know that you appreciate the magic of this place as we do. Charles will be happy with your feedback and will be commended for a job well done.  We try to cater to the needs of all of our guests and it is great that you enjoyed both the on and off property activities we offer.   Our food and beverage team, Kelvin, Hezeniah and Alessandro in particular, will be proud to read your comments and know they did a wonderful job with providing a memorable private dinner experience.  Once again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are glad we were able to help you create great memories you’ll forever cherish and welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Exceptional Honeymoon Destination
review: Third trip travelling with our two children ages 5 and 8.  We enjoy sugar beach more on each visit so can’t wait for the next one. Beautiful villa with amazing views. Fabulous food and impeccable service.  Staff here are just wonderful throughout the resort.  All inclusive offerings remain badly set up but we’ve got used to it now and it’s only annoying for wine and cocktails. Please fix it!! We used the kids club less on this trip as the kids had outgrown it a touch and preferred to play with friends at the beach and pool but when they did go in they had a great time.  It remains our favourite beach holiday spot

title: Gorgeous resort but be prepared to feel ripped off!
review: Good Day Hculver,  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for posting your lovely review of your third stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is a pleasure to know we continue to meet and exceed your expectations.  We apologise that we were not able to meet your expectations with the meal plan inclusions. The culinary team is in the process of revamping our menu offerings, which is an area we hope to see more guest satisfaction.   Again thank you for your glowing feedback, recommendations and for your loyalty.  We look forward to welcoming you and your entire family back again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Special Honeymoon
review: Our luxury villa was perfect for our 7 night stay at Sugar Beach for our Honeymoon. The beaches and pool were never crowded. Our plunge pool made for perfect late afternoons to catch some last minute sun and sip on a beer or cocktail in the privacy of our own villa. Our meals were incredible. We never needed to leave the resort, but we did have dinner one evening at Ladera and dessert and a drink at Hotel Chocolát (both excellent). We were so well taken care of by the resort staff. They were willing to do just about anything to make our stay more enjoyable. Definitely recommend taking advantage of the spa. We hiked the Gros Piton and took a Sunset Sail. The memories we made here will last a lifetime... or until we can make another trip down to St. Lucia!

title: Above and beyond!
review: We booked Sugar Beach for its location and 5- star amenities. At check in we were notified of a N/C upgrade to a 3- bedroom ocean villa (from our booked 2- bedroom ocean villa) The villa was beautiful,  maintained and pristine.  Our villa had an amazing private infinity edge pool which we enjoyed every day! Our ocean villa included butler concierge service, Tyson went above and beyond everytime we called him, whether it was premium transportation services or emergency pina colada provisions from the store.  Our 7 day stay was superb.  We utilized the rainforest spa on 2 occasions,  1 for an off site volcanic mud treatment and massage back at the spa to a 100 minute deep tissue on another visit.  The spa itself is more natural than what we're used to in a typical 5- star resort…

title: Impeccible
review: Good Day Travel67113069836,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback regarding your stay. We are delighted that every aspect of your stay exceeded your expectations.  Our Residences offer wonderful views of the ocean and majestic pitons, we are happy you were pleased the upgrade and the amenities catered to your needs.  It is a pleasure to know that Tyson helped to enrich your stay. He will be commended for a job well done.  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach. We hope to welcome you back to paradise.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Wedding in paradise
review: After years of travel, I have yet to write a hotel review. But, after our stay at Sugar Beach I feel the least I can do is write a review to let others know how wonderful this place really is. It began the moment we arrived. We decided to come for our anniversary. We were greeted with a warm welcome and given a very nice and unexpected room upgrade. This was a very pleasant surprise that really kick started a very special week. All the staff were over the top pleasant from the wait staff to the butlers to the management down to even our drivers whom often remembered our names every day. They truly want you to have a good time and enjoy their home island and it shows. Every area is spotless and clean even in the wetter months where bugs could be an issue in the tropics. The food…

title: Easily Best Vacation Ever
review: Good Day CallistaM4,  Happy Anniversary from all of us at Sugar Beach! We enjoyed reading your feedback and we are happy to know that your time spent with us was everything you imagined.  We are glad that you appreciated the room upgrade and thoroughly enjoyed all of our offerings, especially, our one of a kind Rainforest Spa.  It is heart-warming to know that the team including Sherman went above and beyond to ensure your stay was memorable for all the right reasons, I will be sure to commend them for a job well done.  On behalf of the entire team, we are looking forward to welcoming you back to our oceanfront oasis to celebrate many more anniversaries to come.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: 5 night stay
review: Sugar Beach reminded me of an old TV series, Fantasy Island. Everyone really did go out of their way to make my daughter's dream of a wedding in paradise come true.  The location is truly idyllic.  The villas are clean and spacious, the food is delicious and the wedding team helped make it all come together.  Thoroughly recommend.

title: Great honeymoon destination
review: Really enjoyed our stay in st Lucia at sugar beach. The staff and butler services were top-notch. The food is amazing. We visited every restaurant and did the private dinner. Sushi was my favorite, but you can’t go wrong with any options. Service was great by the beach and pool - you can order food and beverages. This is not an all inclusive resort, but from what I hear, it blows the all inclusives (sandals) out of the water. Thanks for an incredible honeymoon. We will certainly be back!

title: Wonderful week at the Viceroy Sugar Beach
review: Good Day Jet23611739386,  Congratulations newlyweds! Thank you for sharing this glowing review of your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It gives great pleasure to learn that the special touches provided by our team helped to make your stay enjoyable. Our food and beverage team, in particular, will be proud to read your comments.   Once again, thank you for your feedback and business. We are glad we were able to help you create great memories you’ll forever cherish and welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Breathtaking
review: Our family spent a wonderful week at the Viceroy Sugar Beach.  The service was excellent - especially Noah at the pool/Beach, the food was exceptional and we would highly recommend this resort for a vacation as a couple or with a family (we have two boys, 10 and 8, and they were made to feel welcome.

title: Sugar Beach Resort is a must!
review: Good Day Stay16863032183,  Thank you for sharing your glowing feedback regarding your family vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is pleasing to read that our staff members provided impeccable service and Noah helped to enrich your stay. He will be commended for a job well done.  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach. We hope to welcome you and your family back to paradise!  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: TERRIBLE
review: Stayed here as part of our honeymoon...it is paradise. set between the pitons it has the most amazing location in St. Lucia. The butlers are so friendly and helpful but not intrusive. The food is amazing. The BBQ night is not to be missed. Dont forget to get dressed up and enjoy a fancy and incredibly delicious meal in the great room, stunning views of the pitons, the sea and the resort and a great romantic setting. The villas have to be experienced, they are huge and so romantic. The whole resort is beautiful. You wake to the sound of birds and will see hummingbirds outside your window. This place is paradise on earth. We will be back!

title: Absolutely beautiful
review: What a beautiful place to spend with someone you love. The view is incredible. The resort is beautiful. The staff is very attentive and I would have to say there customer service exceeds any expectations. The surrounding cities are a little scary if you go out and about however the resort is beautiful.

title: The Perfect Vacation
review: Good Day Dreamer54894449646,  Thank you for your 5 star rating for Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and for sharing your rave review. We have a one of a kind setting and it’s always a pleasure when our guests appreciate these glorious surroundings as much as we do.  It also gives great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Amazing
review: Sugar Beach was the perfect honeymoon vacation. My husband and I went with my sister and her new husband for a double honeymoon, and we could not have dreamed of a more perfect vacation. It was stress-free, luxurious, and the food was incredible. If we are able to do another trip, we would definitely return here.

title: The best Beach in Saint Lucia
review: Good Day Explore38887754692,  Congratulations to all of you! Thank you for making Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort your choice for this wonderful celebration. We appreciate you sharing this glowing review.  It is pleasing to read that every aspect of your stay exceeded your expectations and that our resort remains memorable for all the right reasons.  Once again we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you and your family back to celebrate many anniversaries to come in paradise!  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great but not good.
review: Stayed at Sugar Beach, visited all surrounding resorts including Jade M.  Sugar Beach is top without doubt.  Just an amazing place with an enormous, well trained staff.  St Lucians are incredibly friendly, joyous

title: Great resort! I can’t wait to go back.
review: We loved this resort so beautiful and relaxing.  We did daily hikes and lots of water activities.  We highly recommend it. My only problem was the vendors on the beach are aggressive.  I was tired of being harassed by them to buy their excursions.

title: Between the Pitons
review: Good Day Dbish48,  Thank you for your sharing your wonderful review of Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay and felt relaxed within our superb surroundings.  It is disappointing to note that the water taxi operators ruined what was otherwise a flawless stay. Your feedback has been shared with our security team so they are more vigilant on the beach area to avoid situations such as what you described. We as well will continue to lobby the local authorities in a bid to restrict the number of water taxi vessels that can operate within our National Marine Reserve at any one time.   Thank you for sharing your feedback. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Honeymoon
review: Had a most enjoyable week's holiday. Stayed in a Luxury Cottage, had a good size patio with an uninterrupted view to the Caribbean and the sunset, also a generous infinity plunge pool. The butler system worked well, with at least one visit a day, and one was always contactable to deal with anything, especially quickly arranging transport within the hotel grounds - those hills ARE steep. The butlers were very friendly and knowledgeable, as were the transport drivers.  The waiting staff in the Great Room restaurant also deserve a mention. The hotel will also arrange trips out for you, with a route agreed with the taxi driver and charged at an hourly rate. We went on two, on both occasions with Kimran - a pleasure to be with.  The location between the Pitons was wonderful.

title: Just Breathtaking
review: Good Day magbean,  We are happy to read your glowing review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am delighted that you enjoyed everything from the glorious views from your Luxury Cottage to the wonderful team on property including your driver Kimran. They all will be happy to read your wonderful comments.  Thank you for sharing your experience and for choosing to stay with us. On behalf of the entire team we look forward to welcoming you back to paradise.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Overrated
review: We stayed in sugar beach for our honeymoon ! The location is gorgeous , grounds are gorgeous , the rooms are very clean and nice ! We did have some hiccups along the way which were taken care of fairly quickly - for example / we were upgraded to a room but although it was an upgrade , the location wasn’t ideal for honeymooners ( too close to all the cars driving and the pool was visibile to all the cars as well ). We asked for our room to be changed and Petra took care of it fairly quickly- they put us back to our original room that we purchased and it was smaller but more private which was perfectly fine with us !! I did expect a little more of a honeymoon welcome - I had to mention it to Petra and she said she would take care of it ( they did send us a bottle of wine but it…

title: Beautiful scenery
review: What a beautiful setting for a resort. We've been all over the Caribbean and this report can not be topped for the lush floral and fauna throughout the resort and the majestic views of the Pitons. This more than makes up for an average Caribbean beach--which is pretty nice though.

title: Worth The Splurge!
review: Good Day Climber67087495887,  Thank you for sharing this lovely review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   Our setting is truly unique, and it’s gratifying when our guests appreciate the superb surroundings as much as we do.  Thank you for making us your choice and recommending us to others. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: We were intruders.
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach for 4 nights as part of an 8 night trip on the island. Wow, was it perfect.   Our Superior Sugar Mill Room with private terrace had an incredible view of the resort and the pitons, and was centrally located to everything. The bed was extremely comfortable. We spent most nights in our plunge pool, looking at the stars. Very romantic. Our butler, Micaela (sorry if I spelled her name wrong!) was fantastic and helped make our trip memorable - thank you!  Breakfast was included in our room rate and it was AMAZING. One of the best resort breakfasts we've had. We did not do the AI plan, which I was happy about. We don't eat fish or seafood and found the options a limited in that regard, but the Marg Pizza and Cheeseburger, while expensive, were excellent. Yes,…

title: Absolute paradise!!
review: Good Day KNSchwa,  We are delighted that your stay was nothing short of perfection. Thank you for your 5 star rating for Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and for sharing your positive comments.  Thank you for making us your choice and for sharing your feedback with others. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Very nice, but pricey
review: I see that this has been reflected in previous reviews, but I wanted to share on here for others visiting. We were there for snorkeling, not guests of the resort.
