However, we wanted to relax and take in the scenery, and had been told that we should try a restaurant, on site, from the staff at the entrance gate. Unfortunately, we were  treated like intruders/an inconvenience at the restaurant. The security and managers around the grounds were very friendly, but I wished that they warned us that we would not be welcomed at the restaurant. The hostess was clearly unhappy that we were there, and the wait staff was not very attentive. When they were, they were not friendly. It ended up being a stressful situation, just to get a drink and eat a light snack. This was around lunchtime…

title: A Mixed Experience
review: We stayed here for our 10 year wedding anniversary. We thoroughly enjoy travelling and were excited about our first trip to the island of St. Lucia. The resort location is beautiful and views are stunning but there were some opportunities and a few things that took away from our overall experience.   The Good:  -Location is amazing, right between the Pitons with spectacular views -Beaches are stunning. There are two offered. The main beach is centrally located and there is also a beautiful adults-only beach that was never crowded at all -Huge Villas! We stayed in a Grand Luxury Villa and we loved the huge shower, gigantic closet and comfy bed.The living room was large enough for a morning yoga session each day. We also really enjoyed the private plunge pool and large patio.  …

title: Simply Luxurious
review: Good Day Sperry1796,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort to celebrate such a wonderful milestone.   I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us with the exception of the disappointments that you highlighted. Your feedback has been discussed with the team and we will continue our refresher training and coaching to ensure consistent luxury service going forward. I apologise for the inconveniences you experienced.  Our second beach is certainly a haven for couples as it provides a much quieter and tranquil place for relaxation and sunbathing.   I am glad that despite the lapses from our team, you enjoyed our setting and location. We hope you will consider a return visit so we can share the first class Sugar Beach experience that we are known for but that sadly lapsed on this occasion.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Absolutely a amazing place to vacation!
review: My husband and I just returned from a week at this luxurious paradise and wish we never left. We had the most amazing experience here and the service could not be beat. The beds were so insanely comfortable as well, would love to know where we can get those comforters, pillows, sheets and featherbed!! 😆we would definitely return in the future. Yes, the food was pricey, but well worth it.

title: Lovely Resort in the 'Val des Pitons'
review: Good Day hazel521,  Thank you for your glowing review of your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We aim to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we are happy that we did not disappoint.  I am delighted that you enjoyed everything from the impeccable service to the amenities in your room and our beautiful surroundings. We are more than happy to share the details on where to purchase our bedding if you reach out to the resort directly.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Visit to Sugar Beach
review: We visited Sugar beach in May. First let me say I am not a beach person but this place changed me on that. I have never been anywhere and been taken such exceptional care of. We had Tyson as out Butler and there is no way anyone could be better than him! From the moment we arrived at our Villa #110 he was there to take care of all of our needs. He went above and beyond what I ever expected. We ask if there was some where we could go for lunch by boat. He booked us a water Taxi to go to Jungle Grill which was great food! When we arrived he had already called ahead and had them to prepare fresh made guacamole and banana chips that was not even on the menu but he knew we would like from our conversations with him. I don't have enough time to write about all the wonderful things he…

title: Great staff, Horrible Business for Locals
review: Food here was good, the staff was great, and the beach was ok. Most of the beach has the imported white sand that sticks to everything. There is a small portion of the beach that is has a marine life sanctuary and is excellent snorkeling! This is a difficult site to reach because the resort has taken over the entrance to the public beach. You reach a gate at the top of a very tall hill and you have to choose if you want to pay for $50 credit per person that you need to spend at the resort, then you can park halfway down the hill. Or you can stop at the local's house before you reach the gate and pay $10 for parking then walk all the way down the very tall hill.  This was not my favorite beach, but the people were nice, and the snorkeling was great!

title: Excellent Property with Room For Improvement
review: Good Day rainy22l,  Thank you for sharing feedback from your recent day visit. Our white sand beaches are the perfect places between the Pitons to snorkel. We are glad that you appreciated the marine reserve and took time to enjoy the beautiful underwater life.  I am sorry to read of your highlighted disappointments. All the beaches on island are public and Sugar Beach is one of the only resorts to have created an area specifically for non-resident guests to enjoy which includes beach lounges and other facilities for their complimentary use. The facility fee paid can be used as a credit towards our white canvas sun loungers or food and beverage. You are also entitled to complimentary parking at our guest parking lot and shuttle service which is one of the amenities we provide to our resident guests.  We look forward to seeing you again soon, perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Paradise on Earth
review: This is an excellent property, with absolutely gorgeous views, a nice and fairly secluded beach, and a great pool.  Our room, a superior luxury villa, was stunning.  The simplistic decor was beautiful and fit perfectly with the sitting.  I have very high standards of cleanliness and it met them.  The clawfoot tub, walk-in enormous rain shower and outdoor shower were all fantastic.  The plunge pool on the veranda was a big plus. It felt enough like we were in the outdoors without going all the way like a Jade Mountain or Ladera. I was very happy we made this choice after visiting Jade and Ladera. The only mosquito bite I got on the whole trip was when eating dinner at Ladera!  At Sugar Beach, we only ate at the Great Room, and had snacks from the beach bar, because I read too…

title: Travelers Beware!
review: Good Day SNB42,  Thank you for providing feedback about your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am truly sorry for the disappointment that you highlighted and the fact that you did not get to experience our usual high level of service in some areas. We remain genuinely concerned about each guest experience and welcome feedback such as yours so that we can improve on areas highlighted and help to enhance the overall satisfaction of our guests.  We are happy to know that despite the disappointments mentioned, you enjoyed the time that you spent at Sugar Beach with your friends. Cher is truly a remarkable butler, and will be commended for continuously going above and beyond in his duties.   We will be sharing your feedback with the team, and will continue our refresher training and coaching to ensure consistent luxury service going forward.  We hope you will consider a return visit so we can share the first class Sugar Beach experience that we are known for but that sadly lapsed on this occasion.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Planning to come back before we even leave.
review: Hands down, I'm very pleased to have chose Sugar Beach as our Honeymoon destination. It was literally paradise on earth and I would go back in a heart beat. Mix jungle with rainforest, volcanoes, beach, and privacy; you feel like you are in a whole other world! It was truly an exclusive, memorable experience. We reserved a sugar mill room but was upgraded to a villa on arrival. We had our own heated plunge pool, living room, full bath with soaking clawfoot tub, huge shower, king size bed with netting... THE WORKS! Truly exactly all that you could ask for, we got it. And every room comes with full service BUTLERS! They handled our every need. I think the ONLY downfall was the high priced restaurants. Breakfast came free with our package and we made best to eat breakfast each day.…

title: Sugar Beach is a must in St Lucia
review: My husband and I recently visited St. Lucia and stayed at Sugar Beach and absolutely fell in love. Right off the bat I will say we will return, as soon as possible.  We did a lot of research leading up to our trip and so it was interesting to also view and talk to others from other resorts. I feel like we made the perfect choice for us and our stay although some of the other resorts were beautiful. First of all the location of Sugar Beach was ideal! Right smack in between the Pitons, with close and easy access to one of the most beautiful beaches in St Lucia. While some of the resorts offer spectacular views, Sugar Beach is up close to the view. Also, all of the 96 rooms (the entire resort covers 130 acres) are individual bungalows with refrigerated air. If you prefer the open…

title: One of the best Caribbean Resorts!!!
review: Good Day adelinej648,  Thank you for your glowing, extensive review and 5 star rating for Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay and are already thinking of returning to St Lucia. It is wonderful that you had the opportunity to enjoy many of our services and amenities, and were able to explore all that this beautiful island has to offer.  We are glad that the All Inclusive meal plan worked well for you and that you enjoyed so many of our culinary offerings. Our food and beverage team will be really pleased with your feedback.  It’s even better to learn that our beautiful setting left a lasting impression, as did the special care and attention provided by the team members. They will be thrilled with your comments.    Once again, thank you for posting these wonderful comments. I am sure your review will help other travellers when planning their own holiday. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Everything we had hoped for.
review: We took our large family to celebrate our 25th wedding anniversary with us. The beach was just so beautiful- white soft sand, perfectly clear blue water, calm and not too crowded even over the Festive Holidays. We enjoyed a villa that had amazing views, pretty flowers, lovely decor and so comfortable. The staff really went above and beyond taking care of us, especially the Butter who brought us loads of delicious coconuts. The event staff did a tremendous job with our vow renewal. They had a lovely woman do the officiating and we still talk about her wise and kind words. The owner went all out for the holidays. The fireworks (went on for a long time and were the really fancy ones) and show for New Years Eve was better than we have seen at large cities in the US! We had fun…

title: Stunning hotel, some issues
review: Good Day OurFlatWorld,  Thank you for choosing Sugar Beach to celebrate your 25th anniversary with your family. It is a pleasure knowing that your stay and vow renewal ceremony was nothing short of perfection.  I am delighted that you enjoyed everything from the festive activities to your villa and the service from our team. They will be proud to read your comments.  Our white sand beaches are definitely the perfect place between the Pitons to snorkel in the marine reserve and take time to enjoy the beautiful underwater life.  Thank you for making us your choice and for sharing your feedback with others. We hope to welcome you and your family back.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Not quite paradise
review: As we first sighted the Pitons on the winding drive to Sugar Beach, it felt magical. It is a spectacular sight. As our time in the resort meandered on, we came to the conclusion  that the natural setting of this hotel could not be better. It feels like everything has been planned to enhance the beauty of the area. The hotel accommodation is gorgeous and beautifully maintained. Everything that could be needed for a relaxing vacation is easily provided and nothing is too much trouble. The service is unobtrusive but readily available in a friendly but engaging manner. Senior management are always around, chatty and interested in the guests. We felt valued and at home. The restaurant selection is fantastic and the food beautifully prepared, sourced locally and a good range to suit…

title: The best beach in St. Lucia!
review: We were not guests of Sugar Beach but came only to use the beach so this review just pertains to the beach experience. When arriving by car, the gate attendant will explain the two options for visiting the beach. We had already done our Tripadvisor homework so elected to pay the $50USD pp to drive down and get the shuttle to the beach. You get the full $50 back in restaurant credits (on the beach OR at the restaurant but not both) and the food and drinks are great. We also chose to pay the same $50USD pp to use their beach chairs. You can use the back row and they lay down two towels for you. We also felt, while not inexpensive, it was a nice little vacation treat. Keep in mind - you’re at Sugar Beach where rooms start at over a thousand dollars a night. You get to enjoy the…

title: Amazing service, scenery, and resort!
review: Good Day MarmaladeK,  Thank you for sharing your glowing review of your day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and that the courtesies and services extended to you by Natalie contributed to a wonderful time. Our white sand beaches are the perfect places between the Pitons to snorkel in the marine reserve and take time to enjoy the beautiful underwater life.  We look forward to seeing you again soon, perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Luxury in Paradise
review: couldn't ask for better service and a more beautiful resort that really captures nature. Thank you to all staff who took care of us and the food was outstanding, better than it was last year when i visited in October. Thank you!

title: Heaven on earth
review: Good Day Trek29987529612,  Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your return visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted that your second stay here was even better than your first.    Our setting is truly unique, and it’s gratifying when our guests appreciate the superb surroundings as much as we do.  Again thank you for your glowing feedback and for your loyalty. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Easter week 2019
review: Stayed here with family.  Truly one of our most memorable experiences.  Viceroy has managed to carve out a slice of heaven.  The ocean view 4bedroom residence was perfect for our party of nine (including 4 children, youngest age 3).  We were pampered like royalty and gluttony was a daily event.  The food was spectacular as was the service and the views!  Stay here...you will not regret, and you’ll never forget.

title: HEAVEN ON EARTH!
review: WOW. I am sitting on the plane right now...sadly on my way home from St. Lucia and I couldn't wait to write this review. My fiancé and I decided to get married at Sugar Beach purely based on photos and reviews online. We had never been there or to St. Lucia period. The wedding is coming up next month so I decided at the last minute to take a pre-wedding trip down with my mom just to sort out details, meet the staff, and make sure that everything was the way that I wanted for the big day. The hotel exceeded my expectations in every way. Photos don't do it justice! I left feeling so relieved and so happy that I will be getting married in such a beautiful place. From the moment we arrived, we were treated like royalty with lavender scented towels and fresh coconuts to revitalize us…

title: Angela Naxiadou
review: Good Day ashleygoldman,  Congratulations on your engagement! Thank you for your heart warming review and for trusting our team with executing your big day.   The entire team looks forward to welcoming you and your family back to celebrate this special occasion.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: A Wonderful Easter Weekend!
review: The most amazing resort I have ever stayed in my life ~ location, amenities, food, staff everything has been set to the highest standard. Absolutely perfect, highly recommend for anyone travelling regardless of the nature of the trip, the hotels caters for any type of traveller.

title: Spring Break 2019
review: Good Day Angela Naxiadou,  We appreciate you posting this fabulous review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Our setting is truly unique, and we appreciate you sharing your comments with other travellers. Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we are happy that you had a great stay.  Your comments and business are greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team we look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Beautiful Island, wonderful resort
review: The view at Sugar Beach is absolutely Breath-taking and it always relaxes me 🧘‍♀️.  The first time we ever went to Sugar Beach it was on a Day pass. My Family and I instantly fell in love and decided that we must include an overnight stay there in our next Family vacation. We did just that in August 2017, we stayed for 2 nights then after we went to Royalton for a week. 3rd time visiting is indeed the Charm!  We stayed for 3 days 2 nights.🏘  The first day of vacation we had a walk around the place, in the afternoon we had a pool bath then in the night I always finish up pending reports but somehow in this setting and taking in the view, it never feels like work.   Make sure you visit The Spa,,, Ohhh the Spa, 🤗🤗🤗🤗 Godly hands...   Everytime I visit with my family we create…

title: What a vacation!
review: A few days spent here makes you feel like a superstar, the Bayside Restaurant was such a treat because the view of the their famous "piton" mountain was amazing - Our room was very well appointed and such a treat!

title: Awesome people
review: Good Day WanderlustCarib,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy. We are happy to read your glowing feedback and appreciate your 5 star rating.  We are delighted that you enjoyed every aspect of your stay especially the great view of our twin peaks.  Once again, thank you for your wonderful feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back for a second visit.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Excellent luxury family resort
review: The resort was great, more than what we expected. What made our stay unforgettable were the people... shuttle drivers, butlers, room service, etc... made everything personable. Knew our names and always had a smile.

title: Just fantastic...will absolutely go back
review: Good Day 402keithr,  We appreciate you taking the time to share this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and that the courtesies and services extended to you contributed to a wonderful time at the resort.  Again, thank you for your feedback. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: A paradise experience
review: The hotel was stunning, the location incredible. The staff could not do more to help you and the ambience just amazing. The food was fantastic and the restaurants were all excellent. We had a special dinner on the beach which was just wonderful.  The only improvement that could be made was the kids club provision, the activities were not as planned, particularly the male gentleman was lazy and uninterested. He would sit around and not do anything. Such a shame when absolutely everything else was excellent!

title: Great location on beach sandwiched in between the two Pitons
review: Upmarket and exclusive resort hotel boasting plantation-style architecture, located on beautiful beach in secluded bay, bookended on either side by the two Pitons. Not the ideal place to go for a walk (other than on the beach) as it's all uphill and quite steep.

title: Excellence in every aspect
review: Good Day DominicDeBurca,  Thank you for providing feedback on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   I am happy that you enjoyed our wonderful setting and location of the resort. Because of the topography of the resort, we offer 24 hour shuttle service to go around the property which is very efficient.  Again thank you for sharing your feedback and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Beautiful resort
review: Sugar Beach by Viceroy will be one of those family trips that we will always remember with great fondness.  My husband and I travelled with our 18yo to St. Lucia to celebrate her impending HS graduation (and eventual flight from the family nest!).  We relied on said 18yo to select our vacation location. So Sugar Beach was her choice, down to the bungalows (20 and 21) we stayed in. Our rooms were right on the beach, but at the end of the curve of the bay and slightly elevated so they were a bit more private than some of the beach bungalows. Our rooms connected by a central enclosed courtyard with its own warm plunge pool.  They are airy and spacious, every amenity, including a rotating staff of butlers to take care of any whim that might occur to us. Dining at the resort is…

title: Five Star Plus
review: Good Day laurimcin2sh,  Thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort as your family vacation destination. We are happy to read your glowing feedback and are glad that your time spent with your daughter was memorable.  It is pleasing to read that every aspect of your stay, from the location of your bungalow to the excursions and activities we offer, exceeded your expectations.   Once again we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you and your family back to paradise!  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Beautiful location but some clear problems
review: The staff was great here, helping us to find unique places to visit and eat throughout our stay, They also arranged a private sail around the island which was a nice way to see the isalnd. As promised, the sand was amazing, although we were told afterwards that it is not from St. Lucia which was a bit disappointing...but we got over it quickly after enjoying the wonderful views from a lounge chair. Our room had amazing views, comfortable beds and a lovely separate sitting area. One note was that the private pool was beautiful to look at (infinity edge), it was WAY too cold to enjoy.   The food in the restaurant was good, tropical and pricey - much like what you would expect from a typical luxury hotel on a small island. Not any different than other Carribean destinations we have…

title: Paradise
review: Continues to exceed expectations. The wonderful staff make this a very special place. The fabulous location is matched by the hotel. Attention to detail in everything they do and unfailing personal contact throughout our stay.

title: Just WOW!
review: Good Day Jenny J,  Thank you for your glowing comments and five star rating. We feel proud that we were able to exceed your expectations once again.  Not only are we known for our stunning location between the Pitons, we also do our best to ensure that the services and amenities offered are equal to the views. It is pleasing to know that you had a great time and you fully enjoyed our offerings.  Thank you once more for sharing your experience. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Over priced and the beach is not private
review: We stayed in a Luxury Villa for our honeymoon. The resort is quite far from the airport but worth the drive! The location is just beautiful. The resort landscaped area is so well-kept. All areas are amazing - the pool, beach, ponds....Our villa was massive with separate living area, guest toilet, walk-in-closet, outdoor private pool.  Providing us with two mobile phones to keep during the trip was useful since the resort is large. You can use this to speak to your butler at any time. Although he was helpful we felt he was in our face most of the time without giving us space/privacy.  Breakfast was so good. Although we are not the fine-dining kind, we absolutely loved dinner at the Great Room. So good! The spa architecture is beautiful in the middle of the rain forest.   We would…

title: Sugar Beach
review: Good Day krisstephan,  Congratulations! Thank you for sharing this glowing review of your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It gives us great pleasure to know that you were impressed by our offerings and world class accommodations. Our Rainforest Spa is one of a kind and the ambiance of the Great Room is worth experiencing.  We are sorry to read about your comment regarding your butler. Your feedback will be shared with the butler team to ensure that the best possible discrete service is rendered to our guests at all times.  Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Gorgeous resort with great service
review: My wife and I just returned from a 7 day vacation at Sugar Beach, St Lucia.  The positives:  the scenery is beautiful.  The resort is nestled between the two famous Pitons.  The food is very good to excellent at the Great Room and the sushi is great at the Cane Bar.  The grounds are lunch with diverse plants and trees.  We booked a private, stand alone cottage with a plunge pool, which exceeded our expectations.  The staff is helpful, friendly and attentive.    The not so goods:  the drive from the airport is 45 minutes of hilly windy roads that can make the strong stomach car sick.  Our private driver told us most people get motion sickness.  Ours passed within the hour.  Once on the resort, the roads are steep and narrow.  We received cell phone upon check in with the butler…

title: Caribbean Gem
review: As we descended from the main road into the resort our expectations began to grow more and more. Weeks earlier a friend stayed at the property and raved about the experience so with expectations high we were greeted by our bellman who offered us a refreshing drink and a cold towel   The check in was care free and seamless. Since our room was not ready we were offered a temporary accommodation, changed into our beachwear and headed down  to Bayside which would be our staple for our dinning needs throughout the  stay.   Accommodations  At 5pm we were escorted up to our residence #115 by Charles who would be our butler for the entire week. Charles walked us through our 2 bedroom residence showcasing all of its amenities. Bedrooms were large and spacious with closets in each. Master…

title: Visitor pass
review: Good Day Louis M,  Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your family vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We have a one of a kind setting and it’s always a pleasure when our guests appreciate these glorious surroundings as much as we do.  It is also a pleasure to know that our staff members helped to enrich your stay. I feel proud to be working with such caring and hardworking individuals. They will all be commended for a job well done.  Your recommendations about our fitness centre will be taken on board and will be reviewed as required. Thank you for letting us know where we can improve.  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach. We hope to welcome you and your family back to paradise!  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: We loved it ALL - except the prices which were ridiculous
review: I decided to stop at Sugar Beach Resort on a visitor pass for the day before my flight.  I called ahead of time a few times to confirm, each time i spoke to someone (3 times in total) the rep said it will be $50usd to rent a lounger on the beach and this could be used as credit towards food and drink. I thought this was a pretty good deal and I heard the beach was the best in St. Lucia - so I went for it!  I reached Sugar Beach Resort and signed in at the gatehouse and paid my 50$usd. The lady at the gatehouse confirmed i could use the voucher to pay for my lounger or use as credit towards lunch.  The shuttle bus was there waiting for me to take me down to the beach.  But when i got to the beach, no-one showed me where the toilets / showers were to change in or showed me how to…

title: The real deal - and a few tips
review: Good Day curioustraveller104,  Thank you for sharing feedback from your recent day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your time with us. Your feedback has been shared with the team to ensure that all information is clearly communicated with all relevant team members so that we do not have another occurrence such as yours.  We are happy that the team was able to turn your experience around and you had a wonderful time.  We hope that you might consider a return visit at some point in the future, perhaps as a resident guest.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Vacation in st Lucia
review: It is a beautiful beautiful place, the food is fantastic, most of the staff is welcoming and friendly- the Butler was magnificent and are you ready to pay for it and I mean pay much more than anywhere else with no regard to higher standards etc. somewhere else - then you will also love it. We loved it! We really did - BUT and there is a big but.... we normally stay at 5star hotels and we are used to and willing to pay for the experiences - however Sugar beach exceeded them all in pricing. Unfortunately that leaves me thinking it is highly overpriced - that thought takes away from the good experience and that’s a shame. But still it is a magnificent place in all other aspects.

title: Wonderful Anniversary trip
review: It was a beautiful resort in an idyllic setting. The pictures on the website are beautiful but don't even do it justice.  I never got tired of looking out at the ocean and Pitons from our infinity pool. (Villa 304 had a partial view of the ocean in between the palm trees). The room was very spacious and nice. Huge bathroom and closet. The staff kept the room nice and clean. We did have some strange issues with housekeeping not leaving us towels one day, then no wash cloths the next day and no hand towels the next. Not sure what was going on there but they would bring them when we called.  It is expensive but we splurged for our 25th anniversary. The rate included continental breakfast which was a bit disappointing. For the cost I feel they could at least include some scrambled…

title: Honeymoon Disappointment
review: Good Day lark522,  Happy 25th Anniversary! Thank you for sharing your feedback of your anniversary celebration at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We appreciate you sharing your highlights as well as comments about the areas that concerned you. We will be addressing these short-comings as a matter of urgency with our housekeeping team so that future guests do not have the same unfortunate experience.   I am glad that despite the highlighted glitches, you had the opportunity to enjoy all of our services and amenities, and got out to explore all that this stunning island has to offer.  We are happy we helped you to create great memories you’ll forever cherish.  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach.  We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Can we stay forever!!!
review: All you really need to know is that the price is incommensurate with the experience at every turn. The entire stay it felt like we were paying some maddening luxury tax - which might have been understandable had the staff been extremely hospitable, well-trained, or sensible. In no way do I wish to write a review that disparages the individuals who are employed here - I felt some discomfort at seeing just how much many of them disliked their jobs so apparently, and I understood that this was likely rather a problem of total mismanagement.  We feel bad (very) about having spent so much money on this place. I found it to be idyllic in its setting and with clean rooms, but we were treated like second-class citizens when guests with some sort of precedence were in our presence. For…

title: Tip top in every way
review: Good Day Natalie B,  Congratulations and thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort to celebrate your honeymoon.   Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and it is disappointing to read your highlighted concerns. Our team members are almost always praised for their friendliness and the genuine care they take with our guests. I am sorry if you felt this was not the case for you.   Our Guest Relations manager met with you on departure, however I am disappointed that these issues were not voiced to management earlier in the stay as we did not get the opportunity to turn your experience around pre-departure.   We hope the experience you described has not left an indelible mark and that you will consider a return visit at some point in the future. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you at our best.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Trevor’s Review
review: I could not have imagined a more perfect honeymoon.  The Sugar Beach resort and the entire staff made us feel like royalty.  Amazing food, tasty drinks, perfect accommodations and the friendliest staff of any place I have ever visited.  From the top management right down to the restaurant staff everyone made it a point to know us personally.  We will definitely be back and will bring friends!!

title: Wonderful couples stay
review: Beautiful- but expensive - stay in a lovely, lovely resort. Our room was at the top with great views of the Pitons and the bay.  Enjoyed the water taxis to Jade Mountain for dinner and for a day trip up to Castries. Service at Sugar Beach was friendly and very accommodating! A Five star resort. (PS the breakfasts are amazing!)

title: Heavenly!
review: Good Day Leslye321,  Thank you for your wonderful review of Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am delighted that you enjoyed everything from the impeccable service to the one of a kind location and amenities.  Again, thank you for your review and for choosing to stay with us. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: First Class Resort
review: We were at Sugar Beach for a week to celebrate our 25th Anniversary and I literally cried when we left.   We were upgraded to a superior luxury villa and were left a bottle of champagne and local rum to celebrate our special day. The villa was beautiful as was the plunge pool (although a bit cold). The bathroom was huge with a shower for two and large tub. We had our own walk in closet! Unfortunately, I am a bug magnet and it was not possible for me to sit outside at the villa without getting bitten. My husband had no problem. The only criticism I would make of the villa was that the view was so beautiful but there are no screens on the doors. The bedroom had a glass door but the living area had doors that open to the outside without any screen. If you get bitten easily you…

title: Dreamy!
review: Good Day lovetravel,  Happy 25th Anniversary! Thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort to celebrate such a wonderful milestone.   Thank you for posting your experience and letting others know about the special touches we extend especially for persons celebrating special occasions such as yourself.  I am sorry to hear of your experience with the hobie cat, we appreciate that you made us aware and we were able to offer an apology and gesture for this inconvenience.   We are sorry that the mosquitoes were a challenge for you. We try our best to keep them at bay by fogging daily and providing mosquito netting in all rooms. Sadly, some of our guests still get bothered by these nuisance creatures. Your recommendations will be taken on board and will be reviewed as required. Thank you for letting us know where we can improve.  I am glad that the pros outweighed the cons and you had an amazing stay at the resort. We all are thankful for your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Amazing experience
review: We only went to the beach club for the day.  Every chair had a good view, the service was excellent, the food was delicious, the beach is one of the best and the water was spectacular -definitely get the snorkeling gear to view the reef at the base of the Petit Piton.

title: Fabulous Resort!
review: This property is WONDERFUL!    One of the nicest places in the Caribbean I have ever stayed with an outstanding and friendly staff.  Our beautiful residence was up on the hill with its own plunge pool with fantastic views of the Pitons and ocean.   The room was superbly furnished with nice extra touches like a stocked fridge and espresso machine and lovely bath amenities.    The service was impeccable from our wonderful butler Swamed to the service in the restaurants.    They will come to you within minutes to pick you up in a van or tuk tuk to take you to your destination within the hotel if you don’t want to walk the hilly   property.    Every driver we encountered was quite friendly and fun to talk to.     The beach and pool areas are lovely and have calm waters so it is was…

title: Wonderful Location. Lovely well run Hotel.
review: Good Day joanf706,  Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It gives us great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members.   I am thrilled that you enjoyed all of our offerings, especially, our one of a kind Rainforest Spa.  We would love to welcome you back soon.   Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: The Ultimate Caribben resort experience
review: The hotel was set in an amazing location and the accommodation was really good with a great butler service. We requested a lower villa but we were put in the block next to the top of the resort. saying that we had a wonderful view but had to constantly use the shuttle service as it was just too steep. The shuttle service was very good and very quick. However the shuttles they used were minibuses. There was one tut tut which was charming with a lovely driver, but the minibuses were the same they used to move the staff around in and not what you would expect of a 5 star resort. No golf carts or quirky shuttles here.   The food was really good but the menus did not change so a little bit repetitive if you are there for more than a week. The service in the restaurants was excellent,…

title: Simply the best
review: Good Day YorkhirePudding,  We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It gives us great pleasure to know that you were impressed by our offerings and world class accommodations.  Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and it is disappointing that we did not get the opportunity to turn these less than ideal experiences around. Had our culinary team been aware of your concerns regarding the food and beverage offerings, they would have been happy to prepare alternate dishes from the menu selections. Your feedback has also been shared with our beach team leader to ensure that the team members deliver consistent luxury service to our guests.   We remain genuinely concerned about each guest experience and have taken all of your comments on-board so we can improve in the areas you have highlighted. I am sorry we let you down in this regard.  Thank you again for your compliments and constructive feedback. We would love to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Sugar Beach
review: We are just back from the most magical Caribbean vacation on St. Lucia, staying at the Sugar Beach resort.  Everything was over the top beautiful, service impeccable from the butler, the phones, the food, the stunning beach.  We were there from March 2nd to the 7th.  We wish we had a longer time.  Next time we would plan to go on to another island, probably Martinique which is close by.  It takes 12 hours to fly from California so best to stay a while.   We would recommend this resort to anyone  looking for true luxury island resort experience.  There were people there from all over the world, families and all types of people.  Just magical.

title: Simply AWESOME!!!!
review: My partner and I have been to many islands throughout the Caribbean.  St Lucia is our favorite by far, and Sugar Beach is far and above our favorite hotel among the luxury hotels we have frequented.  It's expensive but worth every penny.  A location like this with facilities, staff and food to match warrants the price tag.  We will 100% be back!  Just can't say enough wonderful things!!

title: Lovely all round vacation experience
review: Good Day NickV2497,  Thank you for making Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort your choice. It is always a pleasure to read reviews such as your and to know we met and exceeded all of your expectations.    Our team members are passionate about surpassing guest expectations. They will be happy with your feedback.  Again, thank you for your comments and for choosing to stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Pure paradise
review: The Viceroy Sugar Beach is a welcoming, comforting, relaxing vacation spot. The food is quite good and the service is extremely friendly and excellent. I highly recommend this resort. I am sure to return again.

title: Really great service and attention.
review: Good Day richardcG4390DG,  I feel proud reading your review and knowing that your vacation at Sugar Beach was all that you wanted and more. Thank you for your wonderful review.  Our setting is truly out of this world and it gives us pleasure to know that you appreciate the magic of this place as we do.  Again thank you for posting your positive comments. We hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Heaven on Earth
review: My husband and I just returned from our stay at Sugar Beach. We can’t wait to go back. The place is beautiful, the beach is prestine and the service was incredible. Our butlers, Gus and Wylen, were exceptional. I have read poor reviews from other guests and truly didn’t experience anything of the sort. The staff throughout the resort was very kind and courteous. Truly a pleasure. The Pitons are a must to see. Incredible sight to experience. We were fortunate enough to meet the manager, Steve. He actually left his dinner party to come meet and converse with us for a good 20 minutes. That’s the kind of resort this is. You will be very happy with your stay.

title: Fantastic setting. The resort does not quite live up to its surroundings.
review: We had a perfectly lovely stay at Sugar Beach. The location is beauitful, the villas are spacious, the food is decent to good. You'll probably have a lovely stay too thought I'm not sure I'd give an effusive recommendation.  Having nowhere for guests arriving to change clothes, etc. if their room is not ready is not a great way to start a trip and not anything we've ever encountered at other high end Caribbean resorts. There is always a dedicated room available for changing, a place to go in the spa, etc. I'm not thrilled with 1) wearing winter clothes to the beach or 2) rifling through my underwear in my wide open suitcase in the lobby but it seems those are the only alternatives at Sugar Beach. And expressing any surprise or displeasure about that arrangement will just result…

title: Wow, What an awesome place!
review: Good Day nin0807,  Thank you for providing feedback on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate you sharing your highlights as well as comments about the areas that concerned you.  We are delighted that you enjoyed the location of the resort, but it is disheartening to read your comments about our team. Our team members are almost always praised for their friendliness and the genuine care they take with our guests. I am sorry if you felt this was not the case for you.   Our Luxury villa and Cottage categories are all located along the hillside and I am sorry if this was not clearly communicated to you prior to you booking your stay. Our Luxury Sugar Mill Guest Rooms, Luxury Beachfront Bungalows, and our Residence categories are the only accommodations that are walkable distances to the beach and main facilities. We offer a 24 hour shuttle service which is very efficient to take our guests around the resort. Again I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced.  We have taken on board your feedback regarding a courtesy changing area. The management team will brainstorm further ideas to improve in this area.  Our Spa is offered as an option to our early arrival guests when it is not fully booked. I would have hoped that your concerns were voiced to the team during your stay so we had the opportunity to turn these less than ideal experiences around.   We hope the experience you described has not left an indelible mark and that you will consider a return visit at some point in the future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Serendipitous Hotel nested between the Pitons
review: If you go to St Lucia I don't know where else one would stay.  It is centric to all of the best things to see on the island and is a beautiful beach resort nestled between the two Petons.  High end, high priced, but worth it.  Everything is done very well. All details.  Most importantly the staff are extremely well trained to be pleasant, focused people.  everyone had a great personality for this type of work.  I cannot stress how impressive the staff is.  The food is very good as well.  Excellent.  3 restaurants and 1 other food venue.  The rooms are individual cabins that are unbelievable, lush, and secluded.

title: Absolutely amazing
review: Good Day MikeFromPittsburgh,  Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort is truly the place of dreams. We enjoyed reading your feedback and I feel proud to see that so many of our team members contributed to making your stay memorable. Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to share your review.  It is wonderful that you had the opportunity to enjoy many of our services and amenities, and were able to explore all that this beautiful island has to offer.  Once again, thank you for your wonderful feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back for a second visit.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Stunning property!
review: My wife and I ended our time in Saint Lucia at Sugar Beach, and could not have had a better culmination in our trip. We actually first ventured here during our boat day from the northern part of the island and paid to use the facilities off the beach. The staff is warm and welcoming and really did try to cater to your every need. When we actually checked into the hotel, the same held true and the staff was accommodating for the duration of our stay. Would highly recommend for your trip to Saint Lucia.

title: 5 star looks and cost, not matched in service
review: First, I must say the property is gorgeous. I am including a review for Anse/Jade as well since we split our trip this time around. The beach beds are comfortable, there is ample shade and sun. Yes, the beach entry is rocky but the immediate access to pristine diving/snorkeling necessitates that! Richiana at breakfast and lunch made us feel welcomed back to the island and was the most knowledgeable employee about anything resort-related. Movie night on the beach was so fun. Menus were varied and the different dining ambiance really made each night unique. We had drinks and Japanese appetizers at Cane bar, dinner at the Great Room, and tapas at the beach. Because of Richiana, we became aware of a pop-up French restaurant they do a few times a month. We were able to make…

title: An interesting experience
review: Good Day Maryann A,  We appreciate you sharing feedback regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is disappointing to learn of your less than ideal experience with us.  Our Butler team normally receives rave reviews and I am sorry to hear of your experience. We will definitely be discussing your comments with the butler assigned to you to gain a better insight into what went wrong and to ensure there is not a repeat of what you have described.  Once we are aware of guest opportunities we ensure that these concerns are rectified immediately so our guests do not leave feeling unhappy. It is a shame we were not aware of your concerns before you departed.  Your feedback has also been discussed with the sharing your feedback with the relevant departments so improvements can be made to ensure our guests enjoy prompt and efficient service at all times.   We hope that you decide to return to Sugar Beach in the not too distant future. We would welcome the opportunity to share the intuitive service that have become our trademark but was sadly lacking during your stay.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Awesome resort
review: We were put up here for one night when our flight back to the UK was cancelled  at the last minute. I wouldn't blame the hotel at all for some confusion when we arrived at about 11pm. The night porter was doing his best but the names given by BA did not match the guests waiting for a room and it took a while to sort things out.  Eventually we got a room which was spectacular. Beautifully furnished, very large and comfortable.Set in the hills, in the morning we saw the beautiful view of the sea from our patio.   That's when the admin fell down. The night porter could not give us a key to the room. The only way to get from our room to the restaurants,beach or reception was via a shuttle bus ( we later found out we could have walked but at that time we didn't know where we were or…

title: Another great family break
review: Good Day Sussextravellers9,  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your time at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We welcome your feedback as a valuable tool in our efforts towards maintaining the high standards we pride ourselves on.  I am truly sorry for the disappointment that you highlighted and the fact that you did not get to experience our usual high level of service in some areas. Your concerns have been shared with our Front Desk team to gain insight on what occurred with the untimely delivery of your room keys.  I am glad that despite the hiccups you experienced, you enjoyed our setting and location.  We hope you will consider a return visit so we can share the first class Sugar Beach experience that we are known for but that sadly lapsed on this occasion.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Effortless  Luxury !
review: Loved our stay at Sugar Beach. The resort is beautiful, the views breath taking. The staff are wonderful, esp our Butler, Markenzie. Anything we needed he was right on it and so super friendly and nice. The food at all 3 restaurants was very good and the rooms are lovely. Our room had a view of both the Pitons and the water and we got to see the sunset every night from out porch. Every room also has a plunge pool and the private beach for resort guests is awesome. Will definitely go back.

title: Beautiful St Lucia Resort
review: This is the best resort in St Lucia. Stunning beach ideally located between the twin Piton Peaks. Food and service is top notch and facilities are beautiful.  If you are looking for a relaxing getaway this your spot.

title: Amazing Beach!
review: Good Day fmarks16,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your recent visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that your time spent with us was everything you imagined.   Not only are we known for our stunning location between the Pitons, we also do our best to ensure that the services and amenities offered are equal to the views. It is pleasing to know that you had a great time and you fully enjoyed our offerings.  We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great experience at Sugar Beach Viceroy Resort
review: Sugar beach is most likely the best beach I've been to in my life. The view is just amazing and you can see the pitons. They have the beach open for guests and visitors. They're burger was so good, I recommend it if you go there. They also had lots of water sports like scuba diving and snorkeling. The snorkeling area has so many different fish and sea creatures. The water is nice and clear and they put out little rafts to sit on if you just want to enjoy the sun. I recommend going here because its a once in a life time experience.

title: Beautiful secluded property with excellent service
review: Good Day Sarah K,  Thank you for sharing your glowing review about your day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am happy that you enjoyed our wonderful setting, especially our white sand beaches which are a perfect place to relax and bask in the sun.  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach. We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Slice of Heaven with Outstanding Service - And a Spa to die for :)
review: My husband and I decided to do a staycation at Sugar Beach as an option to driving back to the capital following a wine tasting dinner. The customer service of the employees was nothing short of excellence. Employees were an epitome of customer service excellence. We were greeted from the vehicle with minty hand towels, and refreshing coconut water in the coconut. That was epic. From check in to check out the service was excellent. The room was awesome, homely, with a great view of both pitons and the tranquil sea. The entire facility was well manicured and clean. Service was prompt , efficient and consistent. We were never treated as locals, we were treated as guest of the hotel that the employees were appreciative in hosting. For Peace, Tranquility, Great Customer Service and…

title: Paradise on Earth
review: Well worth the expense! The resort is stunning and your every need is attended to with personalized butler service. The spa is one of the best I’ve been to as well! The views, the beach, the restaurants are all insanely beautiful.

title: Perfect Vacation
review: Good Day slcfashion,  Thank you for your glowing review of your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that your time spent with us was everything you imagined.   I am glad you had the opportunity to experience our Rainforest Spa. It is truly a special place with amazing treatments to choose from.  Our setting is truly unique, and we appreciate you sharing your review with other travellers.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Sugar Beach Beauty
review: Everything was very special! The rooms and views were breathtaking. The food was healthy, tasty, and well prepared. The staff was gracious at accommodating specific dietary needs to the best of their ability. We enjoyed the various events and activities that were offered. Lots of fun and relaxation. The only thing I did not enjoy were the winding roads to get to the resort and back to the airport. Other than that, everything was awesome. Highly recommend!

title: HoneyMoon
review: Good Day Freedom35894022085,  We are happy to hear that you had an amazing time and memorable vacation. Thank you for sharing your review on Trip Advisor.  Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we are happy that we did not disappoint.  Our food and beverage team will be happy to know that you enjoyed the cuisine and they will be commended for ensuring your dietary requirements were taken care of.  Once again, thank you for sharing and recommending our resort. We look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Lovely holiday but doubt we would return
review: The hotel location is out of this world and staff are absolutely amazing. They are so welcoming, helpful, friendly. They can’t to enough for you and you will feel so relaxed and at home. The place is paradise. Only down side is food and beverage is very expensive so definitely worth going off resort tho taxi’s are expensive but still cheaper to eat and drink out

title: Disappointing
review: First babysitter was 90 minutes late so we missed dinner with family that night. Second babysitter was 45 minutes late even after reconfirming the same day. They clearly didn’t get the memo about all inclusive as half the menu is extra. How 1 run cocktail is included and another isn’t I don’t quite understand. Mini bar is limited to 4 drinks per day per room. The service on the beach is extraordinarily slow.   The food is excellent as is the spa. Rooms are very nice too but our butler never answered the phone so we walked everywhere and it’s a VERY steep walk.   If you order water they bring the water that isn’t included in all inclusive unless specified.   This hotel is supposed to be exceptional, my advice is go to Jumby Bay in Antigua instead!

title: Life is Sweet at Sugar Beach
review: Good Day Roz C,  Thank you for providing feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   I am truly sorry for the disappointments that you highlighted and the fact that you did not get to experience our usual high level of service in some areas. Your concerns have been shared with our management team to gain insight on what occurred and to ensure that there is never a repeat of what you have described.   We remain genuinely concerned about each guest experience and welcome feedback such as yours so that we can improve on areas highlighted and help to enhance the overall satisfaction of our guests.  On balance, I am pleased that despite your highlighted concerns, you enjoyed our unique spa as well as your accommodation.   We hope you will consider a return visit so we can share the first class Sugar Beach experience that we are known for but that sadly lapsed on this occasion.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Not worth the money for a Day Pass
review: We just returned from a week-long stay at this spectacularly situated resort.  The resort lies nestled between the two Pitons which rise dramatically on either side of Sugar Beach.  Everywhere you look is lush greenery with several lily ponds, palm trees, hibiscus and other flowering bushes, rolling grassy hills, azure sea and white sand beach.  It's realy a stunning setting.  All the buildings of the resort complement the setting with lots of thatched roofs and open air spaces.  Our superior Sugar Mill room was very spacious, duplex with an outdoor jacuzzi overlooking the beach (great for sunsets) and a huge semi-covered terrace with french doors.  Very comfortable bed, oversized bathroom, large windows, beautiufl views.  Housekeeping was great.  Lots of bottled water and other…

title: A delightful resort
review: Good Day goldab,  Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort is truly the place of dreams. We enjoyed reading your feedback and I feel proud to see that so many of our team members contributed to making your stay memorable. Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to share your review.  Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and it is gratifying that you thoroughly enjoyed what we had to offer.  I am sorry that the food and beverage costs were higher than you had anticipated. Because of our island location, many items are imported, which means shipping costs and relevant duties have to be factored into our pricing. We do offer a few meal plan options which our guests would usually add on to their reservation.   Once again, thank you for posting these wonderful comments. I am sure your review will help assist other travellers when planning their own holiday. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Outstanding stay at Sugar Beach
review: We decided to do the day passes for sugar beach- $50USD per person which is your voucher for food and drink. We have heard about how amazing this beach was so we had high expectations. I hate to say we felt it wasn’t worth the money spent for a day pass (go by water taxi if you have no interest in eating there and just want to snorkel).   Yes it was a nice beach, but it certainly isn’t anything special besides the great view of the Pitons. We will admit the snorkelling was good though! Rocky entrance, so put your fins on in the water rather than walk out (if your fins are plastic you’ll risk cracking them). Was nice to see the amount of sponges and coral along the drop off!  When it came to drinks at the restaurant we were offered still or sparkling water, I expressed still…

title: A beautiful picturesque place to visit.
review: Good food (a bit pricey) Very nice, helpful people  Pristine facilities Spectacular view Beautiful villa Great service Relaxing setting Romantic getaway Family friendly Privacy for adults on adult beach when desired

title: Paradise. I didn't want to leave
review: Good Day Trek58273016180,  Thank you for your glowing feedback about your get away trip to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We are known for our world class accommodation, facilities and the top-flight service that we deliver and it’s good to know you had a great time.  Our second beach offers privacy and an adult only area, and we are thankful that we had the opportunity to share this enjoyable and relaxing experience with you.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: An exceptionally beautiful site
review: We stayed a week in January 2019. It was my first time in Saint Lucia, and Sugar Beach was beyond anything I could have ever imagined. It is a tropical paradise, with two gorgeous white sand beaches, lush forest and gardens and individual chalets and residences.   The staff could not have been more helpful, the food was excellent without exception (lots of local produce and fresh fish alongside all the imports) and we never tired of things to do. Service is laid back. To me that's a good thing but I can see some other reviewers disagree.   You must go snorkelling in the marine reserve, as the coral reef is still intact and the fish are incredible.   Beware, we are all pretty able and fit: the topography is pretty challenging, and although you can call for a shuttle anytime you…

title: I want to go back every day, forever
review: Good Day patrickgaley,  Thank you for your wonderful review and five star rating. We are happy that you had a great time and your stay with us was nothing short of perfection.   It gives great pleasure to learn that not only our beautiful location and setting left a lasting impression on you, but also the special care provided by our team members.   We are delighted that you enjoyed the activities we offer, especially snorkelling in our marine reserve at the base of Petite Piton.  Once again we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to paradise.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: The most beautiful place you will never return to
review: A beautiful 5-star resort located between the iconic Pitons. Most villas are located in a jungle-like setting on the side of the mountain. The large sandy beach is uncrowded. There are in-the -water floating rings on which you can relax and enjoy the superb and unique scenery. The water in the bay is calm. Kayaks, catamarans and snorkeling equipment are available. Beach lounges are very comfortable and there are a good number of palapas for those who want to avoid direct sun. There is a very nice, large, uncrowded pool. We have been to many 5-star resorts but this is great resort in an unforgettably beautiful location. Expensive but worth going to at least once in a lifetime (we have stayed here three times).

title: Marvelous Resort with friendly and attnetivve staff and excellent cuisine
review: Incredible view, white sands, jungle and flowers surrounding the resort Privacy for those surching privacy, Cuisine of high standard and excellent wines available. For those who love some action, musik, bbq and excursions on land and ses

title: Amazing
review: Good Day Exploration179307,  On behalf of the team at Sugar Beach A Viceroy Resort, I would like to thank you for your wonderful comments. Our setting is truly out of this world and it gives us pleasure to know that you appreciate the magic of this place as we do.  I am happy to know that you enjoyed our resort and everything that we offered.  Once again, thank you for your feedback and business. We welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: A winter break in the sunshine
review: Great beach, and amazing service by Ivan at the beach bar. food and drinks arrived promptly after order and we were taken care greatly. Thank you Ivan and Viceroy resort, truly amazing experience. Saint Lucia at its best

title: A beautiful resort on St. Lucia
review: Good Day 189fatimal,  Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort is truly the place of dreams. Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  Our team members are passionate about surpassing guest expectations. Ivan will be happy with your comments and commended for providing excellent service.  We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Not as peaceful as you may think
review: This is a superb resort with accommodation spread over a wide (but steep) area. The resort provides plentiful (and much needed) transport with no more than a few minutes wait. The beach is excellent with plentiful shady cover. The resort staff are unfailingly courteous and welcoming and, on the beach provide towels, refreshments and the highly recommended lime daiquiris. Food is available in the main building and on the beach. The food and drink is priced in dollars, quite a lot of dollars actually but is well presented and well presented. Th regular Friday barbecue is a good example, the food Is varied, excellent and plentiful but maybe not great value at 95$ a head. Accommodation is managed but teams of 'butlers' and the service they provide is uniformly excellent. One comment…

title: Paradise between the Pitons
review: The Viceroy Sugar Beach was a well manicured, sprawling property that epitomes Caribbean elegance. The accommodations were spotless and well maintained, and the customer service by everyone on the property is unmatched. Everyday of our week vacation was made unique by the activities on and off the resort. My whole family was pampered and made to feel special.

title: What goes up, must come down
review: Good Day anu132015,  Thank you for posting your glowing comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It gives us great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members.   We would love to welcome you back soon.   Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: A Detailed Review
review: Absolutely beautiful location!!! The resort is perched with private villas on the hillside .. the biggest drawback is that you need to take a shuttle around the property to get anywhere..beach, restaurants, pool etc.. up & down, back & forth..suited for families.. expect to be in the middle of nowhere..no villages near resort..also, really took offense with food prices..I’m not a “cheap” person , but the rooms are very expensive & then they have the nerve to charge $30 for burger, $90/person BBQ..with nothing exotic..

title: Perfection at its best
review: Good Day mkg005,  Thank you for providing feedback on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate you sharing your highlights as well as comments about the areas that concerned you.  I am happy that you enjoyed our wonderful setting and location of the resort. Because of the topography of the resort, we offer 24 hour shuttle service to go around the property which is very efficient.  Our resort is 10 minutes away from the town of Soufriere and neighbouring resorts which our guests sometimes experience. There is an independent taxi service on property which is readily available to take you off property to visit the many sites that are all in close proximity to our resort. I am sorry if this information was not provided to you prior.  I am sorry that the prices at the restaurant were more than you had anticipated. We work hard to ensure that our guests are always satisfied and feel they are getting value for money, but we appear to have sadly lapsed on this occasion. Your feedback will be shared with our food and beverage director.  Again we all are thankful for your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: The People and the Place
review: Okay, to begin with, the short and sweet reason to choose the Viceroy resort at Sugar Beach completely revolves around the individual attention you will get, the location of the resort and the amenities offered at Viceroy. The resort: situated between the two Pitons, the villas and resort buildings gave me a 1930s British clubhouse in the West Indies feel. Everything is whitewashed wooden walls, dark wood floors and beautiful tile. There is amazing art work spread throughout and the landscaping is simply stunning. The bathroom in the villa was perhaps the best part with the large tub, double sinks with plenty of counter space and stand in large shower with bench. The meals were a little expensive, as others have noted, but the food was really good. The beach is absolutely…

title: Viceroy Sugar Beach Resort
review: Amazing location and resort property.Service levels, food quality and staff are outstanding.The view of the Pitons, combined with beach and wonderful low density development certainly made it one of the best resorts we have a the pleasure of visiting.

title: A bit of paradise
review: Good Day Culture00611749941,  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your time at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our setting is truly out of this world and it gives us pleasure to know that you appreciate the magic of this place as we do.  The team will be happy to read your comments.  Thank you for sharing your feedback. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: As close to perfection as it gets
review: In a beautiful location this was everything we could have hoped for.  The staff are friendly and the butler service is terrific.  It’s not cheap, but as the old adage goes, you get what you pay for.  We stayed in a Grand Luxury Villa which was spacious and the bed was very comfortable.  Sometimes marketing blurb can be off the mark, but this resort delivers what it says.  Highly recommended and we’ll be back at some point for another visit. Thank you to all the staff for making us feel so welcome.

title: Butler or no butler this place is amazing!
review: Good Day ianroberts67,  We are happy to read your glowing review and are thrilled that we were able to exceed your expectations.  It also gives great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members.  Once again we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to paradise.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Wonderful facility, location, service
review: Great staff, gorgeous private bungalows with private pools, pristine beach. Worth the expense. Wonderful location with striking views/not sure if it gets better than this place.  Strongly recommend hiking the Pitons while you are there - the guides are a blast.

title: Amazing in Every Way
review: My husband and I recently spent 6 days at the Sugar Beach resort in St Lucia.  We were looking for a romantic getaway and we were not disappointed.  We stayed in a luxury villa which was beautiful, comfortable and totally private.  The views of the Pitons, the water and sunsets were spectacular.  We had round the clock access to a butler who took care of most of our needs such as transportation and stocking the amenities.  The fitness center was large and comfortable and we took advantage of one of the personal trainers (Todd).   The beach area is beautiful with plenty of seating.  Food and beverage service is attentive and includes cooling towels, sunglass cleaning and refreshing free juices.  Many activities are available for free on the beach including sailing, snorkeling and…

title: great resort with outstanding beach,BUT will not return
review: Good Day DebraVB1,  We are delighted that your stay was nothing short of perfection. Thank you for your 5 star rating and for sharing your positive comments.  We always encourage our guests to venture on excursions to experience our scenic island and to participate in the activities available at the resort too. It is wonderful that you were able to indulge in both.  On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Perfect honeymoon spot!!
review: We travel to high end carribean resorts 3 times per winter. Some resorts we stay at are Nizuc,cap juluca, cuisinart & viceroy Anguilla. We have never experienced food and beverage prices like Sugar Beach,totally out of control. We will NOT return because of this issue. The staff and overall resortt is outstanding solid 5 star.

title: My first trip to St. Lucia staying at the Sugar Beach Resort
review: Good Day cheesecake92,  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us, with the exception of the disappointments with the price of f& B highlighted in above.   I am sorry that the food and beverage costs were higher than you had anticipated. Your comments have been shared with the food and beverage Director. We remain genuinely concerned about each guest experience and welcome feedback such as yours so that we can improve on areas highlighted and help to enhance the overall satisfaction of our guests.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Carefree and very pampered
review: Such an incredible honeymoon spot! Seeing the Pitons each morning was breathtaking. The staff was beyond courteous, and the accommodations were 5 star all the way. Our butlers made us feel like rockstars!! Only downside was the mattress was way too soft for me; but hey...my wife loved it :)

title: Overpriced but enjoyable!
review: This is a beautiful resort, and the service is stellar. They really go out of their way to make their guests comfortable, happy, and relaxed. The beach is top notch and the rooms, while a little dated, are clean and comfortable. There’s a very serene vibe. This rating is really more like 3.5 stars, and that’s only because we felt we overpaid. Even by Caribbean standards, the restaurants and excursions feel like a rip-off.

title: Service should be better for a $1500/night room
review: Good Day Ellen P,  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us with the exception of the disappointments that you highlighted.   I understand that you found the rates for the excursions pricier than you expected. The fees quoted include credit card fees, transfer costs as well as refreshments for some of the excursions and the ease to charge to your room instead of carrying cash with you all the time and having to hackle with each vendor. Of course you are welcome to book any and all excursions yourself if you do not wish to go through the concierge.   I am also sorry that the food and beverage costs were higher than you had anticipated. We try our best offer quality meals that are comparable to our competitors.  We remain genuinely concerned about each guest experience and welcome feedback such as yours so that we can improve on areas highlighted and help to enhance the overall satisfaction of our guests.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Spectacular
review: Beautiful views, great facilities.  Insane prices for food— spent 1200 in three days. Service subpar at best. Received undercooked pancakes, no refills for our water. Wasn’t checked in until 3:30pm despite being told me room would be ready any minute (starting at 2pm).

title: Romantic and worth every penny
review: Good Day carolinegF8263KU,  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your time at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am truly sorry for the disappointments in regards to your F&B experience. Your concerns have been shared with the respective team leaders to gain insight on what occurred and to avoid a reoccurrence of the experienced shortcomings.  Once again, thank you for your comments. We welcome your feedback as a valuable tool in our efforts towards maintaining the high standards we pride ourselves on. We look forward to serving you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Spa - Best massage ever!
review: Visited 10 years ago; could not wait to return and enjoy the beach and clear, warm water between the Pitons...hoped resort would be great. Instead it was FABULOUS in every way. Entire staff is incredible. It’s expensive but worth it. Put it on the bucket list.

title: Nice resort
review: We recommend this resort for few reasons quality of rooms services and quality of restaurants ! Nice place overall ! For a honey moon or any event in couple Sugar Beach is the Best Place to be highly recommendable

title: Best Resort
review: Good Day tgue2,  Thank you for posting this wonderful review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   It is always gratifying to read reviews such as yours and to know you fully enjoyed all of our offerings.
