Thank you for taking the time to post your glowing comments and for recommending our resort to other travellers.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Calm oasis
review: We have traveled to  many resorts, but this is something special, everything from the minute we arrived was outstanding, the service, the view, the beach,, would highly recommend this resort for anyone looking for a great vacation!

title: Beautiful Retreat!
review: Good Day Global28797374546,  Thank you for sharing your glowing comments about your stay. It is such a pleasure to read about your experience and know that Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort remains memorable for all the right reasons.  am delighted that you enjoyed everything from the impeccable service to the one of a kind location and amenities.  Again, thank you for your review and for choosing to stay with us. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Its a beautiful beach
review: We loved our 5 day break here. Staff were attentive, cheerful and welcoming. Not always perfect service but I thought they genuinely tried hard to provide a good experience for guests.  Breakfast was the best meal of the day, provided on a lovely terrace with stunning views. We didn’t use our butlers much.We stayed in the Sugar Mill rooms which were well located for breakfast, pool, spa and beach. We had a plunge pool and private small gardens front and rear where humming birds flew amongst the greenery. What could have been better? Food at the Bayside restaurant was hit and miss- I expected better from a 5 * hotel. To give you an idea of prices they charged 13 US dollars for a bottle of sparkling water. You can opt for a litre plastic bottle of water for 5 USD.  Pizzas were…

title: This is the best hotel on the Island !!!
review: We have stayed at Sugar Beach now 4 times both as a family and on this trip a couple . I cannot fault the place and I am hard to please !!! And we keep coming back from the uk as . 1 the staff are lovely  2 The  scenery is breathtaking  3  The rooms and Villas are simply lovely  And the personal butlers simply cannot do enough for you .  If there is one place in the world to go to it should be Sugar Beach !! Yes it is not cheap but you pay for the service and the standard . We will be back hopefully later this year and maybe even for New Year’s Eve if possible . Thank you Sugar beach for giving us such a lovely well earned rest . Going home Monday will be hard !!!

title: Luxury with the best service
review: Good Day oakhillsports,  Thank you for your glowing comments and five star rating. We feel proud that we were able to exceed your expectations once again.   It is heart-warming to know that the butler team went above and beyond to ensure your stay was memorable for all the right reasons.  Again thank you for your glowing feedback and loyalty. We look forward to welcoming you and your entire family back again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great staff and environment
review: This resort is where you get what you pay for. We were upgraded for free and it was amazing. The only thing that wasn’t really spectacular here was the food. The chocolate hotel blew the food at our hotel out of the water, but the beach, service, pool, and rooms were breath taking. We 100% recommend coming here if you’re able to afford it. You’ll be treated like royalty and the service is out of this world!

title: Beautiful location, relaxing resort
review: Good Day Passenger54548735885,  Thank you for your wonderful review of Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort  I am happy that you appreciated the room upgrade and thoroughly enjoyed the amenities and offerings.  Your feedback has also been shared with our culinary team to ensure improvements in with your highlighted concerns. Had we been aware of your concerns while you were at the resort our chef would have been delighted to prepare a wider variety of dishes to suit your palate.  On balance, I am pleased that you had a wonderful time. We hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Beautiful scenery and rooms
review: The staff overall went above and beyond.  The property was a vacationers delight.  Unfortunately, the food was only okay.  Service was great except for breakfast.  A couple of staff members didn't seem to want to be there. The snorkeling was the best I have ever experienced.  Once again overall your staff was amazing!

title: paradise st lucia style
review: Sugar Beach ticks every box for each member of our family. The staff are wonderful and nothing is too much bother. The location and design is breathtaking. We have just returned from our 4th trip and i am about to book again!

title: Vacation getaway after the holidays
review: Good Day Sfcyg,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your return visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   It gives great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members.  Once again we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to paradise.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Calm water and beautiful scenery
review: We needed a getaway after hosting tons of friend and family over Christmas and New Years and spent 4 days after New Years In St Lucia st Sugar beach. We thought the hotel was beautiful, your imagined vision of a  sugar plantation colonialist dream - if you can put aside the historic connotations for a moment. The interior was designed very well and had a through line that remained consistent. Also the rooms were perfect little all white mosquito netted cottages you would hope for. The private beach was by far our favorite, we took the sugar cube boat there and spent the day. It has its own bar and food service so you didn’t miss a beat. The rainforest walk shouldn’t be missed. It’s truly like you are experiencing a different world. We travel to the best resorts in the world -…

title: Sugar Beach Paradise
review: Good Day nadianj01,  Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort is truly the place of dreams. Thank you for sharing your glowing review of your get away trip with us.  It gives us great pleasure to know that you were impressed by our amenities and offerings, especially, our one of a kind Rainforest Spa. We are thankful that we had the opportunity to share this enjoyable and relaxing experience with you.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Sugar Sweet
review: One of the most scenic beaches on the island. Best part is that water is really calm for swimming. This is only white sand beach in Soufriere as rest of the places have volcanic dark gray sand. One can easily spend the day over here. Sugar Beach Restaurant and local fruit stalls provide enough eat and drink options.

title: Spoiled for life
review: I absolutely adored this hotel, the setting, the buildings, the food, the drinks, the service, the rooms. Everythng was wonderful. I was in a sugar mill deluxe room with a personal plunge pool and a fantastic bathroom. It was amazing to sit in the outdoor jacuzzi/plunge pool drinking champagne and watching the humminbirds at work. The service was impeccable (Although you haver to get over the embarrassment at having your own butler and his and hers matching butler phones. The food beyond compare (The sushi is amazing).  My top tips - eating out is expensive, contributed to by the 30-60 dollar return trip taxi fares (even over pretty short distances) so I would defiitely recommend paying up front for the all inclusive option (rather than face a large credit card bill like i…

title: Worth the 50$/ adult !!! At Viceroy Resort
review: Good day drlawrence2016,   Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and the courtesies and services extended to you contributed to a wonderful time.  It is also great to hear that our Luxury Sugar Mill Room was the perfect accommodation for you--they are really handy to all of the central facilities which make it really easy to get around.  Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Amazing family resort
review: We were at Sugar Beach at Viceroy Resort For the day ! 2 Adults and our 8 year old . At arrival whit our rental car  We were very well greeted.  They explained 50$/ Adult fee To park an enter by shuttle to resort - ( actually it becomes more a voucher of 100$ To spend at the beach side restaurant.) If you don’t use it they don’t refund .  We had the 3 of us a great lunch  Cost us 125$ - our 100$ voucher Final cost 25$!  For a great day of sun , snorkeling, On a magnificent beach between the Pitons   BTW on the right side on the small public beach Beach chairs are free  Loved our day

title: Simply Paradise- Breathtaking Setting with Top Notch Service and Food to Match
review: Good Day Passport313527,  Thank you for your wonderful review of your day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort  We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and that the courtesies and services extended to you contributed to a wonderful time. Our white sand beaches are the perfect places between the Pitons to snorkel in the marine reserve and take time to enjoy the beautiful underwater life.  Our culinary team will be proud to read your comments.  We look forward to seeing you again soon, perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Complete perfection!
review: If you are looking for an upscale resort that caters to adults and kids, this is it! Besides the amazing service and food, the resort takes extra special care of the kids in terms of programs offered.

title: Family holiday
review: Very noisy pool. Food and service good in most restaurants but not on every occasion.Lovely setting but probably wouldn't go again. Most staff were delightful but certainly felt like some had been there too long and not that interested.

title: From the Refrigerator to Paradies
review: Good Day Trek05613633991,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review about your family vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am sorry that you did not enjoy your time at the main pool. Your stay must have coincided with our busy season when our kid’s numbers are high.   We all are thankful for your feedback and hope one day you might consider coming out with the school holidays in the future. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly.   Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Excellent
review: A big compliment to the entire Hotel Complex,  a nice smile and a honest,from the heart good Morning is always standart to start a Day. You will recieve this here from all the employee. Start your Day with a good Breakfast and awesome Smothies. Food is very delicious and made with lot s of Love. I can t agree here with what some People complain About. It must have been the Management from 2 Years ago. They have since 2 Years a new Manager Mr. Mark Sterner from Germany. He is a very nice Person and Manager! He handels everything with a Passion and love to it! He Trains his Staff very profesional and with Respekt. Since this come with my Job i have noticed it Right away. Plus they all love him here. He will do everything in his Power to make your stay comfortable. You will get…

title: Sugar Beach - amazing resort
review: Good Day RenateStetson1,  We are happy to hear that you had an amazing time and already thinking of your return trip!  Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we are happy that we did not disappoint.  Thank you for making us your choice and recommending us to others. We hope to welcome you back.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great location but get ready to be robbed by the nicest people
review: Super stayZenith at breakfast made a point to make our shy daughter more comfortable dailyAnse at kids club amazing Winn as Butler perfectGreat warm staff Very accommodatingOnly worry is steep prices for food but to their credit they have amazing pizzas at lunch which are reasonable Manager at bayside was so kind and took pictures of family on beach Staff make this place superb and natural beauty is amazing Shuttle back and forth was tiresome at times but staff were always Keen and friendly with this Well done

title: Overpriced
review: This hotel does not command the pricing it charges. They are disorganized and staff isn’t trained well. The rooms are mediocre and everyone on property asks for a tip. You feel taken advantage of when they charge 500% mark ups on local tours.

title: Wonderful, luxurious and relaxing stay
review: Good Day Shecdog,   Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and it is disappointing that your concerns were not voiced to management during your stay so that we could have explained our side of the story.   Please know that the rates for the excursions usually covers transfers, taxes, hidden charges and the ease to just charge to your villa instead of carrying cash and having to negotiate every step of the way. We also ensure all vendors we work with are licensed and insured for the purpose. 500% markup is a bit of an exaggeration but hope the above clarifies why we charge slightly more. You are always more than welcome to go direct with various “vendors” some legit some not.   Best Regards,   Mark Sterner  General Manager

title: Paradise
review: Beautifully pristine hotel with lots of activities to choose from. Tours and hikes of the island were very easy to organise with the concierge and well planned out. The watersports offered were so much fun! The food was also very good, our favourite restaurant was Bayside. Make sure to check out their Friday night buffet. And the staff was mostly very friendly and helpful. The only drawback is the rooms located up the hill... The shuttle service to and from your suite is great but annoying to wait for if you've forgotten something in your room... you waste a good 30 minutes of your time just to get back to your room. A staircase up the hill might be something worth building (or make sure to stay in the beach bungalows close to the reception/main area). A truly tranquil and…

title: Viceroy Sugar Beach
review: Good Day edoolittle,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.    It is pleasing to know that you had a great time and you fully enjoyed our offerings.  Your comments and business are greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team we look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Shambolic
review: Everything about this trip was perfect. This is the place for honeymooners. We were pampered and enjoyed the food! The bed was so comfortable and there was plenty of activities to do! My husband was so sad to leave! We hope we can make it a trip down there for our 5 year anniversary. Sugar Beach has a special place in our hearts!

title: Unbelievable!!!
review: My husband and I stayed at Sugar Beach for our honeymoon in the middle of June and it was out of this world! Our villa was gorgeous and we loved having our own pool with a beautiful view! The staff was incredible, the food was amazing and everything we experienced was second to none! We never realized how incredible being in a remote place/hotel was until we went there. The private beach (and bar) was so nice to stay at!  We loved having dinner on the beach, doing the sunset cruise, deep sea fishing, going to the spa and relaxing at the beach!  Visit Blaze at the beach, he is usually on the far side of the beach and he brings a red canoe filled with fresh fruits almost everyday! We had smoothies and they were awesome. Also, grab some johnny bakes for breakfast, they’re a little…

title: AWESOME
review: Good Day Alicia G,  Congratulations! Thank you for this fabulous review of your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is such a pleasure to read about your experience and know that our resort remains memorable for all the right reasons.  I am thrilled that you enjoyed the offerings and activities offered at the resort and the fun excursions we offer. Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we are happy that you had a great stay.  Once again, thank you for posting these wonderful comments. I am sure your review will help other travellers when planning their own holiday. On behalf of the entire team, we hope to welcome you back, perhaps for your first anniversary celebration.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Heaven
review: A very special place.  The staff is phenomenal, the food is exquisite, our villa was over the top!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Truly a very special place. We are planning to return next year and are hoping to celebrate our 50th wedding anniversary  in 2020 there!

title: Best resort I've ever stayed at!
review: Good Day msmsterling,  We are happy to hear that you had an amazing time and already thinking of your return trip!  Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we are happy that we did not disappoint.  I will be sure to share your glowing comments with the rest of the team. We are all looking forward to welcoming you back to celebrate your wonderful milestone in 2020.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Annual Sugar Beach Vacation - Even Better Than Last Year
review: This is the best resort we have ever been to. St. Lucia overall is very impressive but this resort is like something out of a dream. Everything is new, clean, white, crisp & perfect. Mostly honeymooners, so the ambiance is very relax & rest & love. The beach is perfection as the service & every single staff members. The bed is something everyone needs to try at least once in a lifetime. The food, for the superb of this gorgeous  hotel, needs a little improvement, as our expectations were to be wowed at every meals. LOVED this place and we will be back!

title: Amazing stay
review: We stayed here to celebrate a milestone anniversary. It is an amazing resort, particularly in terms of location. We stayed in a beach bungalow and it was perfect. No need for cabanas as our bungalow was right there. The beach is nestled in between the two Pitons and makes for a majestic view. Even at night - and the star gazing is terrific. The butler service is helpful and the rooms are clean and modern. The Great Terrace has decent food as does the Bayside restaurant (which we preferred actually!). The facilities are great as is the gym. Only complaint is service (room service, requests) were sometimes slow and it took us almost two days to get an ipad for the room (which has information on the hotel and room service menus).

title: Beautiful location  and excellent service
review: Good Day cruzincutie,  Happy Anniversary! Thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort to celebrate such a wonderful milestone.   I am glad that you found our location, amenities and Luxury Beachfront Bungalow perfect for your stay.  I am sorry for the inconvenience you experienced with the Ipad not being functional. It is procedure that all rooms are checked prior to arrival to ensure all the amenities are in working condition and I am sorry that we lapsed on this occasion.  On balance, I am pleased that despite your highlighted disappointments you enjoyed your stay. We would welcome the opportunity to welcome you for many more anniversaries to come.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Secluded Paradise
review: We stayed three nights at Suger Beach and I have to say that this resort is beautiful.  Well manicured, clean and well appointed rooms, excellent service and an idyllic beach. The only downside is that this resort is fairly costly and isolated so you have to secure all of your meals onsite, unless you rented a car or cab to take you elsewhere.  Prices are pretty steep for meals and a personal pet leave of mine is that they charge you for soft drink refills and even their house water.  With the prices for meals, this should not be an additional charge. Additionally, you pay a standard service charge of 10% and a value added tax of 10% more so when you tip beyond that, you are spending 25-30% towards your total bill.  We were quite impressed with the level of service, especially…

title: Wedding/ Honeymoon Perfection
review: Good Day erichR7381JB,  We are happy you chose Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort for your vacation. On balance it appears that you had a wonderful stay with the exception of the highlighted concerns.  I am sorry if you found the prices in our restaurants more expensive than you had anticipated. Because of our island location, many items are imported to ensure we have a consistent, high quality supply of the produce and other ingredients we need. This means shipping costs and relevant duties have to be factored into our pricing. This is an area we are constantly looking for ways to improve to ensure all of our guests are kept happy and satisfied  I am glad that the pros outweighed the cons and you had an amazing stay at the resort. We all are thankful for your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Paradise found
review: The staff at this property really make the experience. The property is huge and you require shuttle service to most of the restaurants and beach area unless you happen to have a beachfront cottage. The rooms are very pretty with plunge pools yet not as luxurious as I would have expected for the price. Occasionally we did not have towels available for a second shower in the evening. The restaurants are excellent but very expensive. There is essentially no other option for dining even if you have your own car which we did. I would likely stay for for five days instead of a week at our next visit.

title: Excellent!!!
review: Amazing beach, location, and service! Very hospitable staff. Family friendly and an excellent selection at breakfast. Would highly recommend staying at Sugar Beach. A lot of water activities available for all ages.

title: Wow! Just Wow!
review: Good Day Venture14687505280,  Thank you for your wonderful review of Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us and that the courtesies and services extended to you positively contributed to a wonderful stay.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back.    Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Amazing Family Vacation!!!
review: After not being able to take a vacation for the past 5 years due to family issues and an 18 month battle with cancer (I won), we REALLY needed a place to relax and return our lives to their default settings.  Sugar Beach provided that and then some.    St Lucia is a truly beautiful island.  The landscape and vegetation is amazing. Even if you don't go to this resort you have to see the island.   Sugar Beach is wonderful.  Our room was up in the 800's so the view was spectacular. Our Luxury Villa was Clean, comfortable, spacious, private and quiet.    The Rainforest spa Ultimate Couples treatment was the best massage I ever had, it totally got us into relax mode.   Food in all restaurants was varied and delicious.  I'm not a foodie but this could change my mind.   We had a blast…

title: Sugar Beach Resort 2nd to none
review: Good Day ScottyGina,  Thank you for sharing your terrific comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are thrilled to hear that you defeated cancer and that you left the resort feeling relaxed and rejuvenated.  I am glad that you had the opportunity to enjoy all of our services and amenities, and got out to explore all that this stunning island has to offer.  We are happy we helped you to create great memories you’ll forever cherish. I am sure your review will help assist other travellers when planning their own holiday On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Expensive expensive expensive!
review: We just returned from an amazing week in St Lucia at Sugar Beach.  For this trip I decided to take full advantage of the Concierge and Butler services even before we arrived, having all of our dinner and car arrangements as well as tours arranged in advance by the hotel.  The country itself is beautiful and the views from the resort, the fitness center and our room were amazing.  From the moment we were arrived we were treated to top notch service along with friendly smiles and super helpful staff.  We watched sunset from our private patio and pool, simply called the butler to request a shuttle to the beach or breakfast or had private taxi service to and from our villa for dinner, land excursions, or a quick shopping trip to town.  The facilities here are equally impressive, the…

title: Paradise
review: From the moment we arrived to the moment we left our vacation was all about relaxation and fun. The concierge coordinated a great pick up Service at the airport and drove us right to our room, no reception check in. The three bedroom oceanfront villa with our own Infiniti pool was a masterpiece. The view incredible and the property spacious. Wi-Fi is good but the TV reception is poor ( but we hardly used it) We were only steps away from the beach which is nestled between the two pitons and the view was truly incredible. We ate at the great room, the Bayside Terrace and the cane and each meal was delicious. Our butler Alex was attentive and friendly. We took advantage of the spa which is a gorgeous rain Forest retreat as well as the snorkeling  and wake boarding on site.  The…

title: Honeymoon
review: Good Day cbarney2003,  Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We are located in the perfect position, nestled between the twin peaks and in close proximity to the island’s historic and natural tourist attractions. I am thrilled that you enjoyed all of our offerings, especially, our one of a kind Rainforest Spa.  Your recommendations will be taken on board and will be reviewed as required. Thank you for letting us know where we can improve.  Once again, thank you for your feedback and business. We look forward to serving you again soon!  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Anniversary in Paradise
review: Thank you for making our honeymoon special we appreciate everyone's willingness to provide for us and help us with anything everyone was very friendly.  Also it was very easy to set up transportation which saved us a lot of stress.

title: Perfect Honeymoon Destination!
review: Good Day Adventure32327480482,  Congratulations! Thank you for your glowing review of your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us and that the courtesies and services extended to you positively contributed to a wonderful stay.  The entire team looks forward to welcoming you back—perhaps for a first wedding anniversary celebration.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner

title: Place in heaven
review: We just returned from celebrating our 2 year wedding anniversary at Sugar Beach. This was a 5 star experience all the way. From the moment our driver picked us up to the check out process the customer service was phenomenal. My only con would be the variety of food at the resort. We had dinner at The Great Room on our actual anniversary, one of the best means I've ever had and although very pricey worth it but really only a one time option. The only option for lunch/dinner is the Beach Restaurant and the selection could be better. However, would absolutely recommend and go back!

title: Things you may want to know
review: TLDR - amazing stay, amazing hotel, I would recommend.  Things you may want to know and some tips if you plan on staying.  Hotel - First the location of the resort was like something out of a movie.  Nestled between the 2 pitons with a beautiful white beach and greenery everywhere you looked.  I was impressed that everything was maintained immaculately and there was nothing we saw that looked like it was worn or in need of repair.  All hotel areas and our villa were immaculately clean.  Room - We stayed in a Grand Luxury Villa. - If you've read other reviews you will know the villas are on a pretty steep hill above the beach and restaurants and reception. -  You will need to take shuttles to get back and forth from the beach to the villas.  Originally I thought this would be…

title: absolutely beautiful resort in a spectacular location
review: Good Day JJUNNYC,  Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort is truly the place of dreams. It gives us great pleasure to know that you were impressed by our offerings and world class accommodations. I am certain other travellers will find your feedback helpful.  I would like to apologize for the less than ideal experience that you have described with our servers. Your feedback has been discussed with the wait staff to ensure that they provide stellar service that is consistent each and every time.   Please know that we do not place irons in guest’s accommodations as your butler provides this service to you on request. I am sorry that this was not communicated to you at check in.   I am glad that the pros outweighed the cons and you had an amazing stay at the resort. We all are thankful for your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Luxury with Scenic Views
review: Sugar Beach is a spectacular resort located between a UNESCO World Heritage Site between the Gros and Petite Piton mountains. The grounds are immaculate and well-maintained, and the staff is friendly and discreet. Our room was perfect and had a wonderful view of the sunsets.

title: Luxury Getaway in St Lucia
review: Good Day motorolomd,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   Our setting is truly unique, and it’s gratifying when our guests appreciate the superb surroundings as much as we do.  Your comments and business are greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.   Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: “Best Resort I’ve Visited.... So Far”
review: The small touches make the stay at Viceroy Sugar Beach extra special. The crisp white villas with a private pool and the most friendliest and helpful butlers, from making reservations or giving suggestions to occupy your day. Time at the beach is more enjoyable with the small services that the resort provides, from cool towels and fruit jellos.  It’s unfortunate that we couldn’t stay longer. We will be back!

title: Perfect honeymoon
review: Gorgeous resort, very lush and green and beautiful! The rooms were perfect, very clean and upscale. The staff are very happy and friendly. Everything went smoothly from the taxi from the airport to our entire stay to the taxi back. Every request we made was met with precision and care. We were upgraded to the grand luxury villa for our honeymoon and were greeted at our room with a bottle of champagne, fruit plate, plantain chips and dip, and beautiful flowers around our room. I was a little disappointed that when we went out to see the rest of the resort after we arrived, the other half of the champagne I hadn’t finished yet was removed from the room. The mini bar was great, we had a complimentary bottle of rum as well as 4 local beers included per day and all waters and sodas…

title: great resort
review: Good Day Resort65659846515,  Congratulations and thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort to celebrate your honeymoon. We appreciate you sharing your highlights as well as comments about the areas that concerned you.  We are known for our world class accommodation, facilities and the top-flight service we deliver and it’s good to know you had a great time.  I am sorry to read about your experience at the Great Room Restaurant. We work hard to ensure that our guests are always satisfied and feel they are getting value for money, but we appear to have sadly lapsed on this occasion. Your feedback will be shared with our food and beverage director.  I am glad that the pros outweighed the cons and you had an enjoyable stay at the resort. We all are thankful for your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great visit to Sugar Beach
review: Only comment is that the water taxis are in the middle of the beach and are quite loud and a little intrusive...they should be moved to be a little more discreet. They were very nice but loud and a little inner space.

title: Spectacular vacation!
review: Good Day beachyoga74,  Thank you for providing feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   It is disappointing to note that the situation you described ruined what was otherwise a flawless stay. We are continuing to lobby the local authorities in a bid to restrict the number of water taxi vessels that can operate within our National Marine Reserve at any one time.   Once again, thank you for your comments and also thank you for your business. We hope that you will consider a return visit at some point in the future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Honeymoon in Heaven
review: With perhaps the most scenic and beautiful beach in the world, you might think the hotel didn't have to try so hard on service.  But, the service, the welcome, the rooms, the friendliness surpassed even the stunning beach and pool area.  Top resort!

title: Most INCREDIBLE Honeymoon!!
review: I have nothing but a glowing review to give all of sugar beach and its staff. This is a 5 star resort, I would easily give it 6.   From the moment we arrived, we were greeted by the kindest staff members and were given VIP treatment from then on.   Staff members Mikayla and Charles were incredible. We had Mikayla for most of the trip and she went above and beyond to make our trip as relaxing as possible. Charles was our first staff member we met and did an excellent job of giving us the best first impression.   The view at this resort is absolutely stunning no matter where you look. While many honeymooners come to st. Lucia, the best way to truly experience the island is right between the two piton mountains which is right where Sugar Beach is nestled. I know many people who…

title: Exceptional! I can’t wait to go again!
review: Good Day Ally B,  Congratulation newlyweds! We are happy to read your glowing feedback and are thrilled that your expectations were exceeded in every aspect of your stay.  It gives great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members. They will all be happy with your comments especially Michaela and Charles.  Our culinary team at the Great Room will be praised for ensuring you had a wonderful and memorable dining experience there.  Once again, thank you for sharing. I am sure your review will help assist other travellers when planning their own holiday. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Luxury in paradise!
review: There is so little one can fault about this resort. Short transfer from the airport - 45mins to 1hr. Location (tick!) nestled between the Pitons with a stunning beach albeit shipped in but I’m not complaining at all. Staff were divine! We particularly loved the butlers and their ‘bat phone’ used to get hold of them! Getting around the resort was so easy and you never had to wait more than 5mins to get to and from your cottage - excellent communication and great transfer team who were always engaging and fun. My only comment here is it would be nice to have had more eco friendly vehicles to tie in with the beautiful surroundings. Buses were a bit of an eyesore but appreciate those hills needed something that had the ability to get you up and down safely. The food was exceptional…

title: BEYOND EXCEPTIONAL RESORT & SPA
review: The resort was magical, but a bit expensive. Excellent service and beautiful facilities. I attended a wedding there, which was absolutely beautiful, but hot. Don't get married at 4pm! It took a little while to get used to island time, but once I did, it was perfect! Make sure that you take a sail, a mud bath and a trip to a waterfall.

title: Tried and Tested Family Friendly Location...
review: This place is a little slice of heaven. There is nothing bad I could possibly even come up with to say about Sugar Beach. It is the most beautiful, accomodating, exceptional and delicious resort we have ever stayed at. The privacy is unreal, the service is above and beyond, the food is some of the best we have ever had (we are huge foodies and love to travel), the views and resort overall exceeeeeeed any expectation you could ever imagine. This place has class, with a laid back homey type of feel, nowhere has ever been able to accomplish with such elegance, cleanliness, not to mention views you have never seen bfore and just overall perfection on all levels, all wrapped into one. It is truly a dream! It captured our hearts and we feel it is our forever place- we will be…

title: Unlimited breathtaking views
review: All in all it was a A-class stay and experience. check in, room, views, food, drinks, spa, transportation, departure - all hit a 9-10 on 10. Only thing that was below expectation was the comfort of the bed. They need new mattress. period.

title: Honeymoon
review: Good Day Odyssey22602505049,  Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is always a pleasure to read reviews such as your and to know we met and exceeded all of your expectations.  I am sorry for the inconvenience with your highlighted concern. It is rare to read comments such as yours about the comfort of our beds, as this is an area where we would normally receive rave reviews as well as requests for details on how to purchase. We will be addressing these short-comings as a matter of urgency with our housekeeping team so that future guests do not have the same unfortunate experience.   Your comments and business are greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Honeymoon
review: Was expecting something for our honeymoon was the only flaw I could remember. Overall a fun relaxing honeymoon. Weather could have been better but you can't control that. I thought the service and food was awesome.

title: Must visit the waterfall!
review: Good Day crawfordprez,  Congratulations and thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort as your honeymoon destination.  We aim to provide our guests with the best possible experience and I am sorry that we were not able to exceed your expectations. I will be discussing your feedback with the concierge team to ensure that all of our guests celebrating special occasions are provided with a VIP amenity upon arrival.      On balance, I am pleased that despite your highlighted disappointments you enjoyed your stay. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: If You Are Considering This Resort....
review: Overall it was an incredible resort and vacation. The rooms were top notch and clean and the service was impeccable. The location is absolutely the best on the island with beautiful views no matter where you are.  However, I would not recommend this resort to anyone who is not going as a couple. There are activities but this resort is designed more for the people who simply want to lounge, dine, go to the spa, and maybe go snorkeling or to the volcano. If you are a couple looking for an intimate and pampered vacation with beautiful views and warm people then I would recommend this resort. NOTE: Seriously considered the all inclusive package because we didn't eat a meal for under 180$.

title: Stunning Location but very pricey
review: Stayed with the family in two houses on the resort. Beautiful surroundings and weather, friendly and willing staff catering for us an making our stay as comfortable as possible. We did come away disappointed with a sense that our almost obligatory use of the resort catering was exploited in price. A day trip on a boat, picking up a curry from a local restaurant highlighted that there is great local food to enjoy without paying a fortune at the resort.

title: Chris
review: Good Day David W,  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your time at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our setting is truly out of this world and it gives us pleasure to know that you appreciate the magic of this place as we do.  I am sorry that the food and beverage costs were higher than you had anticipated. We try our best offer quality meals that are comparable to our competitors. Your comments have been shared with the food and beverage director as this is an area we are constantly looking for ways to improve to ensure all of our guests are kept happy and satisfied.  Once again we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Amazing Resort
review: Slice of heaven between the majestic Pitons! No set plans for the day, felt relaxed and chilled on the beach. Amazing service at bayside restaurant and did not want to leave so we decided to spend the night.

title: Dream Honeymoon in Beautiful ST Lucia
review: Good Day cosmocro,  Thank you for your wonderful review of Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Although you didn’t visit us for very long, we are glad your time at the resort was memorable for all the right reasons.  I am that you decided to spend the night with us; the team at the Bayside restaurant will be commended for providing special care and attention.  Once again, I would like to thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Excellent
review: I had a great time at sugar beach! My villa with plunge pool was absolutely amazing.GET THE VILLA ! It’s worth it.  Every Butler was awesome but wynell was our favorite. We decided to rent the sailboat for half a day. It turned out to be an excellent choice. If you’re looking for rest and relaxing this is the resort for you.

title: 5+ Star Experience and Resort
review: I am a somewhat critical reviewer when staying at a hotel/resort.  Every part of our experience at Viceroy, Sugar Beach was spectacular.  The check in process was the easiest check in ever, the driver took us straight to our villa where we checked in and were walked through the room to explain all the services.  This all while being told it's time to relax and enjoy and enjoy, we are here to make you happy.  We Spent a lot of time at the beach, great service and some tasty cocktails.  The beach staff is very attentive and ready to help in any way.  I forgot a few things in the room the second day.  I was ordering my drink and told the waiter to wait about 10 minutes to bring it because I forgot something in the room.  He asked me what I forgot and sent someone to get it...within…

title: Paradise Personified
review: Good Day Jason L,  Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort is truly the place of dreams. We enjoyed reading your feedback and I feel proud to see that so many of our team members went above and beyond to spoil you with “sugar”. They will be delighted to read your review and to know that the special care they extended was truly appreciated.  We have a one of a kind setting and it’s always a pleasure when our guests appreciate these glorious surroundings as much as we do.  Once again, thank you for your wonderful feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back for a second visit.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Family Holiday St Lucia with Teenage Boys
review: We have travelled to some of the most beautiful places on earth and this really is the best. If I had to have one last holiday in my lifetime it would be here. The staff are the most incredible people; nothing is any trouble and they go out of their way to help you.  The Bayside Restaurant is amazing and loads of choices to please every palate. If you’re lucky enough to come here then you truly are very blessed. You will not be disappointed.

title: Beautiful Property!
review: Good Day  lisaboard1,  Wow! Thank you for posting your overwhelmingly positive comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We are genuinely thrilled you had such an amazing time. Our culinary team will be proud to read your review.  Your comments and business are greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: 8th anniversary
review: Pretty much everything has already been said about the Sugar Beach - so it's hard to know what else to add. But yes - it is a truly magical place to stay. A combination of its  beautiful  unique setting and the incredible service levels. Every morning you wake up and you think - can this be true? 10 comments for people thinking of going... 1. The famous blue tuks tuks - just didn't exist. All the pick ups were in various mini buses - it didn't spoil anything. But looks like there must be some reason for that. 2. Beach - there are guys who wander along the water's edge offering boat trips. Friendly enough and they don't hassle you when you're sitting on a beach lounger - and no-one coming up to you trying to sell you bangles etc - which was great. On the far right as you look at…

title: Exceptional hotel- honeymoon memory to last a lifetime.  Will return as soon as possible
review: Stayed at Sugar Beach for the final part of our honeymoon and so glad we did because it was by far the best part of our stay after staying at the Windjammer and Sandals Grand.  Hotel facility and location are simple stunning.  You add years to your life gazing at the massive pistons and the ocean from your private deck in your bathrobe.  Amenities including but not limited to the restaurants, spa and gym were top notch. The staff truly goes above and beyond at every step to ensure your stay is enjoyable as possible.

title: Hard vacation to top
review: Good Day Mjrobinson29,  Congratulations! Thank you for your glowing review of your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We aim to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we are happy that we did not disappoint.  We have a one of a kind setting and it’s always a pleasure when our guests appreciate these glorious surroundings as much as we do.  We hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort, perhaps for your first anniversary celebration.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Perfect for a Honeymoon
review: Where to start...  We had the most fantastic stay at Sugar Beach. From the moment we arrived and were greeted by our 24hr butler with drinks until the last night of our stay where we had the pleasure of hanging out with the BEST bartenders in the king lounge (to Miguel and the Wild Wild West boys: I cant thank you enough for making our evening unforgettable. You’re song and dance was none short of an angel). Many thanks to Mark, the GM, for putting the icing on the cake and spending the evening chatting with us—its very evident that your heart is in St. Lucia and Sugar Beach. Viceroy is lucky to have you!   The rooms were extremely spacious, outfitted with everything you may need and more. They were extremely clean—which is a rough task when the floors are dark and everything…

title: Wonderful visit
review: Good Day Mr and Mrs Rusche  We appreciate you taking the time to share this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   It is always gratifying to read reviews such as yours that highlight the extra special care extended by our team members. I will share your glowing comments with the team and commend Miguel for ensuring you had a wonderful and memorable stay.  We are delighted that every aspect of your stay, from the location of your villa to our amenities and offerings, exceeded your expectations.   Kelly and I loved meeting you and we do hope that you will visit again in the not too distant future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Easiest five star review to write for St Lucia's best hotel
review: Everything about the resort was fantastic. We even experienced a tropical storm during our stay, and they made us feel incredibly safe. Everything continued to operate and looked back to normal 24 hours later! Top to bottom a fantastic stay

title: Beyond What I Imagined!
review: This property is a MUST. I work for the sister property in NY (Viceroy Central Park) and have also visited Viceroy Riviera Maya which was also amazing. I must say, the Luxury Villa was so spacious and beautiful but so are all of the rooms.The service, my my. The service was the best service I have every received in comparison to any resort i have stayed in. Thank you Viceroy for treating me like you very own. I look forward to visiting you again in a few months from now! #WeAreViceroy

title: Glorious slice of the universe
review: Good Day Kim C,  We are happy to hear that you had an amazing time and already thinking of your return trip! It brings us great satisfaction to know that we provided exceptional service and that you were equally impressed by our wonderful setting.  I will be sure to share your glowing comments with the rest of the team. We are all looking forward to welcoming you back to paradise. We are Viceroy!  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Best of St. Lucia - Sugar Beach Viceroy!
review: Beautiful sunsets, a rain forest spa with tree houses, and a steam room cave... nestled between the Pitons on Sugar Beach.  The butler service and accommodations will not disappoint.  The food options were also delightful.

title: Relaxation High
review: Good Day derrickvangrol,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy to read your glowing feedback and appreciate your 5 star rating.  I am glad our accommodations, amenities and offerings more than met your expectations and that you had a truly flawless vacation.  Once again, thank you for your feedback. We would love to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great experience!
review: Viceroy is a fantastic boutique chain with only a handful of properties worldwide.  But their properties are top notch!  I have stayed at the Viceroy NY and that was great but this is about Viceroy St. Lucia, Sugar Beach.  The resort is about an hour away from the airport, so a lot of small twisty and windy roads to get there.  Once you get on-site its an oasis!  They have your name ready for check in and its a very informal process with one of their hosts to check in.  They serve you a cocktail in the process along with a nice cold towel.  My wife and I went their for a business trip without our daughter.  We reserved a cottage suite which was really amazing.  After the formal check in process we were shuttled to our cottage.  The resort is quite large so a shuttle is required…

title: Luxury and such a treat!
review: Beautiful grounds, the most gorgeous cottages and villas with private plunge pools and amazing beds!  Food is wonderful, private beaches are fantastic.  The staff fall all over you!  Every single one!  They are caring and genuine and take the time to make sure you experience every element of St. Lucia.  Our shuttle driver even took us on a private tour of the grounds explaining all of the different fruits and vegetation...it was awesome!  We hope to return...this was simply the BEST!

title: I feel obligated to right this after an amazing stay
review: Good Day BCEventPlanner,  We are happy to read your glowing review. We have a one of a kind setting and it’s always a pleasure when our guests appreciate these glorious surroundings as much as we do.  It is gratifying to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members. They will all be happy with your comments.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: An amazing place!
review: My wife and I just got back from Sugar Beach after staying for 5 nights to celebrate our 1 year anniversary. I wish we could have stayed longer. The property was amazing. We stayed in a luxury cottage that has a  private patio with a plunge pool but still had amazing views (and a comfy bed). I don't think I would have changed anything about the room. I heard some complaints about the size of the property and having to take the shuttles around but this was not an inconvenience at all for my wife and I. Every time we called for a shuttle it was there within a matter of minutes and all the drivers were very friendly. I expected it to be more inconvenient but it really wasn't at all.   The next thing that really stood out to me was the level of service. Every single person from our…

title: ultimate in beauty and luxury
review: Good Day Dario B,  Happy Anniversary! Thank you for this fabulous and extensive review of your holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is such a pleasure to read about your experience and know that our resort remains memorable for all the right reasons.  I am thrilled that you enjoyed the offerings and activities offered at the resort and that you ventured out to explore and experience the culture of the island. Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we are happy that you thoroughly enjoyed what we had to offer.  Once again, thank you for posting these wonderful comments. I am sure your review will help other travellers when planning their own holiday.   On behalf of the entire team, we hope to welcome you back for many more anniversaries to come.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: The wedding and honeymoon of our dreams
review: We went here for our honeymoon & it was wonderful! From service to the beach view, it was a once in a lifetime place to visit. It IS very expensive, even down to bottle of water BUT if you want to go all out and be treated to five star service, then it’s worth it. A bungalow is truly the way to go. Sitting in the evenings listening to the sound of the ocean is just amazing.  Snorkelling is beautiful and it’s free to use if you stay on this resort.

title: Honeymoon
review: We spent 10 days here for our honeymoon, overall such a lovely and exquisite experience. We immediately were greeted by our butler in our beautiful villa with accompany plunge pool (piton and slight ocean view). So stunning! Yes, you have to shuttle to the beach, restaurants, etc. however they come so fast after a quick jingle to your butler. Shoutout to Sherman-- you are the man! Best butler.   We chose to do the all inclusive plan- definitely worth it if you are enjoying many cocktails, and plan on staying at the resort for most of the time. The food does get a little repetitive, however the bayside did have specials each night that were always good. Additionally, the food is delicious overall- we truly never had a bad meal. Even the french fries at the beach! HA! Also, the…

title: not all sweet at Sugar Beach Hotel
review: Good Day lindsey a,  Thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort as your honeymoon destination.  We enjoyed reading your feedback and I feel proud to see that so many of our team members contributed to making your honeymoon celebration memorable.They will be delighted to read your review and to know that the special care they extended was truly appreciated.  I am sorry that your check out experience was less than ideal. We will definitely be discussing your comments with the team member to you to gain a better insight into what went wrong and to ensure there is not a repeat of what you have described.  Our sincere apologies if you did not receive the note regarding the resort credit from your friend that was applied to your incidental billing. I have asked our front desk team to resend your final folio where you will see the credit was applied.    I am glad that the pros outweighed the cons and you had an amazing stay at the resort. We all are thankful for your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: AMAZING getaway!
review: This hotel is fundamentally let down by completely the wrong attitude by too many staff. On too many occasions, particularly in the restaurants and pool area, it was as though we were actually resented. This is not acceptable in an expensive resort where guests expect to feel welcome. I complained about this disinterested attitude to the front desk who also ignored me at which point I asked to see the manager. If this point has to be reached at a hotel the overall balance of view of the hotel swings to the negative. It is highly like we would warn our friends from staying there in future.

title: Paradise
review: Good Day jonathangreig,  Thank you for providing feedback on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.    We pride ourselves on providing the special touches and attention to detail that make for wonderful vacations, but we seem to have fallen short where you are concerned.  I am sorry we let you down in this regard.  Our duty manager did reach out to you during your stay regarding the glitches you encountered as the front desk team were not able to compensate you without approval from their superior. I am sorry that you felt you were being ignored.  Once again, I would like to apologize for the inconveniences you experienced.We welcome your feedback  as a valuable tool in our efforts towards maintaining the high standards we pride ourselves on. We look forward to serving you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Stunning!
review: If you want relaxation with some exploration options, Sugar Beach Resort in St. Lucia is  the place for you! Caribbean vibes, relaxing rainforest feel, with absolutely breathtaking views! PERFECT location! EXCELLENT service! BEST experience! I was surprised to see how many people brought children, I personally wouldn't because there isn't much to do for kids other than the Kid Club they offer, pool/beach, or if they're of age to do zip lining, etc. It was a getaway for 4 nights with my husband without our three children! I will also say, although the rooms further away have great views, you HAVE to take a shuttle to and from any area of the resort so I would HIGHLY recommend rooms closest to the lobby/breakfast restaurant or beach/poolside.

title: Perfect Honeymoon Resort...and has it's own beach!
review: Sugar Beach is simply the best resort in St. Lucia. Honestly, it's the best resort we've stayed at period. The main reason being the beach and pool. Not many resorts, including the extremely overrated (from what I hear) Jade Mountain, have a beach on premises. Sugar Beach does. It has it's own beach that people actually take day trips to, given how beautiful it is. We took a boat tour throughout the west coast of St. Lucia and didn't see one beach that even came close to how nice Sugar Beach's is. Even further, it's the only beach between the Pitons. The food, albeit pricey (which is expected at a 5 star resort), is very good. The drinks, again pricey but expected, were also great. We had an issue with some bugs in one of our rooms early in our stay, but the manager Philippe…

title: Family of 4 vacay
review: Good Day Chris L,  Congratulations! We enjoyed reading your feedback and I feel proud to know that Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort remains memorable for all the right reasons.  It gives us great pleasure to know that you were impressed by our offerings and world class accommodations. We are thankful that we had the opportunity to share this enjoyable and memorable experience with you.  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach.  We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Somewhat dated facilities, but excellent location and service!
review: Our stay was fantastic.  Located at the prettiest beach, Sugar Beach, on the island.  It sits between the Pitons.  Amazing rooms and VERY clean.  Beds were super comfy.  Loved the terrace and pools at our rooms.   Great furniture to relax on in the morning.  Nespresso machine was awesome.  They constantly make sure you have enough water.  And every night you get a little treat which were all so good!  My kids looked forward to that every night.  Butler and shuttle service was great.  I thought the shuttle service was going to be a pain, but they run 24 hours and we never had to wait more than a couple minutes.   Breakfast was delicious but at times very slow.  I recommend getting a breakfast package.  We ate at Bayside.  It was good but very pricey.  Actually all the restaurants…

title: Lovely lunch, nice pool, excellent location
review: Good Day Tammy D,  Thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort as your family vacation destination.  It gives us great pleasure to know that you were impressed by our offerings and world class accommodations. I am also happy you enjoyed the small treats left at turn down.  I would like to apologize for the poor service you received from our team member. We are continuing to evaluate the performance of our staff and to provide additional training and guidance where required. I truly hope there are never any grounds for us to receive such comments in the future.  I am very disappointed to learn of your experience with the beach peddler. We have discussed your feedback with our security team and they will continue investigation. As you stated we are not able to prevent persons from coming to the beach as it is public, however we will be reinforcing our security measures to ensure our guests receive high quality and professional service.  We do hope that the issues you encountered have not left an indelible mark and that you will consider a return visit to Sugar Beach at some point in the future. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Honeymoon stay
review: We visited the Viceroy Sugar Beach for a week in December 2017, and had an excellent time.   The hotel is fairly dated at this point, and the rooms do exhibit some wear and tear. There was even a day when the hotel was without running water for approximately 7 hours. However, the service more than made up for the inconveniences surrounding the facilities. We were even gifted a free bottle of champagne for the hassle.   The employees at the Viceroy Sugar Beach are what make the place so special; they are incredibly friendly and do their very best to accommodate hotel guests in any way possible. Additionally, the view of the Pitons cannot be beat, and the food is better than similar resorts throughout the Caribbean.  We strongly recommend that couples looking for a romantic…

title: 30th Anniversary
review: Sugar Beach has the best location on all of St. Lucia!  Waking up to a view of the pitons was amazing. We stayed in 904 and loved our villa. Don’t Miss the rainbows after a shower!  Yes the price of food is eye popping. We did not do an all inclusive and spent between $200 and $300 per day including drinks. We did not dine in the Great Room but the food was great everywhere else.  The best thing we did by far was a water taxi to Jade Mountain for dinner. Our butler, Maneski, arranged everything. We felt like James Bond boating over and dinner was delicious. We left around 5:30 to have drinks on the rooftop, take pictures and enjoy the sunset before dinner. The Explore Soufrière excursion was fun also.  I did a walk one morning with Canice from the fitness center. I was the only…

title: Nearly perfect resort
review: Good Day frugalmamma,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort to celebrate such a wonderful milestone. It was a pleasure to read about your experience and to know that our resort remains memorable for all the right reasons.   I am thrilled that you enjoyed the activities offered at the resort and that you had the opportunity to visit our Rainforest Spa. Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we are happy that you thoroughly enjoyed what we had to offer.  Once again, thank you for posting these wonderful comments. I am certain other travellers will find your feedback helpful. On behalf of the entire team; we look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Heaven in Saint Lucia
review: One of the best resorts we stayed in. Location is hard to beat: protected bay between two mountains, flat water for waterskiing, wind for sailing, water sports not afraid to let you sail when windy, coral reef on side of beach, snorkelling and diving good and easy. Food is excellent ,service friendly but slow, wine expensive (tax and import issue it seems), local beer cheap. Water sport team friendly and efficient, good equipment . Nice sailing yacht too, we had a great day on board with a nice captain. On the negative side, we did not get the rooms we booked, were put up the mountains, reception was unfriendly, but after management got involved we got perfect rooms near the beach and had a wonderful stay. Prices are shown before tax and service, so misrepresentation really . A…

title: Excellent resort
review: Good Day Alain M,  Thank you for sharing your feedback of your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate you sharing your highlights as well as comments about the areas that concerned you.  Although you clearly loved the resort, it is shocking to read that you were provided with the wrong accommodation. All of our villa and cottage categories are located along the hillside and I am sorry if this was not clearly communicated to you prior to you booking your stay. Our Sugar Mill Guest Rooms and Luxury Beachfront Bungalow categories are the only resort accommodations that are walkable distances to the main beach and facilities. We offer a 24 hour shuttle service which is very efficient to take our guests around the resort. Again I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced and I am happy that this issue was resolved to your satisfaction.  Your comments and business are greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.   Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: A night we enjoyed
review: One of best private properties in world with 5-star food, service and accommodations. Villas with private pool, 24/7 welcoming butler team with DVD library & popcorn, allowed you to do whatever whenever. Best meals at The Great Room with romantic chic ambiance and to-die-for food. Delicious breakfast buffets with fresh fish, local fruits and nuts. Heavenly pool with flowing cocktails and snacks, alongside beach huts for guests. Watersports and water taxis around island. Perfect for quiet and relaxing honeymoon, anniversary or getaway!

title: It is not a 5 stars...it is a 7 stars!
review: My husband and I we had the chance, during the years, to visit the best Caribbean islands and resorts. Sugar beach is definitevly the best. We booked the “ basic room “, Sugar Mill 6. The Room is a deliciouse cottage with a private garden and a private terrace..just on the top, with beds and umbrella. Inside, the room was large, minimalist total white and had the most fantastic bed where we have slept.  The great surprise were the Butler service: we had a baby mobile and, and with two click, Michaela or Peter were at our disposal for anything we needed: book restaurant, change money, organise a tour, book a taxi , have informations, get a doctor and medicines. Yes, my husband had a seriouse disease and we really needed the support of our angels-butler. They really make the…

title: Sugar Beach is a sweet delight
review: Good Day giovi642014,  Thank you for sharing your extensive feedback regarding your time at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is such a pleasure to read about your experience and know that our resort remains memorable for all the right reasons.  Our Luxury Sugar Mill rooms are indeed the perfect choice for persons who want to be in the heart of the resort. All of our rooms boast the same basic amenities and we are glad that it perfectly suited your needs.  Once again, thank you for posting these wonderful comments. I am sure your review will help other travellers when planning their own holiday. On behalf of the entire team, we look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Lovely hotel / Superb location
review: The resort is fabulous and exceeded our expectations. They upgraded us to a wonderful villa which was private, and luxurious.  The bed was so comfortable and the bathrooms delux. The housekeeping service was discreet and impeccable.The butler service met our every need and Dilon was exceptionally attentive. Loved the little treats each night.The beach has to be one of the best in the world and the water was pristine. I thought that the shuttles would be a pain but actually the service was really prompt and all the drivers super polite and informative. The tasting menu at the Cane Bar was innovative and delicious. My only complaint was the price of the food. If you are not all inclusive it adds up very quickly so be prepared. Overall this was a trip that was even better than I…

title: Nothing compares, simply the best!
review: Good Day Lisa S,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We are delighted that every aspect of your stay, from the villa upgrade to our amenities and offerings, exceeded your expectations.   It’s even better to learn that our beautiful setting left a lasting impression, as did the special care and attention provided by your butler Dillon. He will be thrilled with your comments.    Once again, thank you for posting this overwhelmingly positive review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Outstanding Hotel
review: Spent two nights at this hotel, love it, everything 5 stars. The beach is to die for, Rooms re comfortable and tastefully decorated, I will definitely return with the whole family. Only downside are the tourists that arrive by boat , most of them very noisy, a bit annoying if you want same quiet time relaxing at the beach.

title: PARADISE FOUND!
review: We could not have been more impressed with our stay. Top notch location and resort. We cannot wait to go back. Highly recommend. Gus our butler and Moses our driver were so exceptional. They really made us feel welcome and went above and beyond.

title: Paradise on Earth
review: Good Day 458ashton,  Thank you for this lovely review of your holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It gives great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful setting leave a lasting impression, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members. Gus and Moses will be happy with your feedback and will be commended for a job well done.  Once again, we appreciate your review and would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Sugar (not so sweet) Beach....
review: I was looking for a destination that was different and luxurious at the same time; I found it at Sugar Beach. Awesome location for couples. Tons of activities to participate in. The Spa is wonderful. I definitely would come back.   One draw back is the mosquitoes; they can be a little pesky. The roads are narrow and very winding. I would not advise anyone to rent a car. My overall experience was great!

title: A great property with an exceptional setting
review: Good Day Shanhicks27,  Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our setting is truly unique, and we appreciate you sharing your review with other travellers.  I am thrilled that you enjoyed the activities and that you had the opportunity to visit and enjoy our Rainforest Spa. Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and it is gratifying that you thoroughly enjoyed what we had to offer.  Your comments and business are greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.   Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Beautiful St. Lucia
review: I have written over 207 reviews and am apparently a level 11 Luxury Hotel reviewer in over 63 Cities around the world and I can say I have never heard so many people moaning about a Hotel from service to food varieties . From a hotel

title: Beautiful resort
review: We loved the staff. Friendly and attentive. Breakfast was Fabulous, the best way to start the morning. Fella, who works in the buffet area, was outstanding always made us feel welcome and strove  to keep everything well stocked in the buffet and always offered to help and greeted us with a big smile every morning.  We loved our luxury cottage and plunge pool. It gave us privacy and served as our St Lucia home.  It is a huge beautiful property, but shuttle buses are provided to take you where you want to go.  Friday night BBQ at the Bayside restaurant is a must. Nightly meals at Bayside are a bit redundant, we ate at other restaurants in the area, not on resort, which made it fun. Mango Tree, Boucan, and Dasheen. Lunches at the resort were pretty pricey but tasty.

title: Perfect Honeymoon
review: Good Day bethws2017,  Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is heart-warming to read reviews such as yours and to know that my team went above and beyond to ensure your stay was memorable for all the right reasons. Felia is truly a gem and will be so proud to read your comments and know that her special touches made all the difference.  Your review has been greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Breathtaking experience
review: I did so much research to find the perfect spot for our honeymoon, and sugar beach a viceroy resort did not disappoint! We stayed in  luxury cottage 305, we were taken straight to the cottage bypassing reception as our private butler Felicia took care of all our checking in needs and welcomed us with champagne and other delicious goodies. As we walked in I was overwhelmed by how perfect everything really was, the place was beautiful, extremely clean and very well air conditioned. Then we walked outside on to our private terrace with large plunge pool over looking the pitons and sea, it was paradise!  Our whole time here, we felt like royalty, staff were all super friendly and nothing was a hassle to them. It was only a short shuttle ride to the beautiful white sandy beach, I was…

title: Great Vacation
review: Good Day hrickaby88,  Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort is truly the place of dreams. It gives us great pleasure to know that you were impressed by our offerings and world class accommodations.  We enjoyed reading your feedback and I feel proud to see that our team members contributed to making your honeymoon celebration memorable.  They will be delighted to read your review and to know that the special care they extended was truly appreciated.  We are happy that your time spent with us was everything you hoped it would be. The entire team is looking forward to welcoming you back, perhaps to celebrate your first anniversary.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great Anniverssry Stay
review: Sugar Beach was in a fabulous location, very peaceful and the view was scenic. Amenities was every thing you can imagine on your vacation away from home the staff was fabulous at your every need pleasant and very accommodating My experience there is mind blowing. Len & Abegail

title: Two Bedroom Villa
review: The two bedroom villas was great -- very large, clean, nice pools, beds, baths, veranda, and lounge.  The butler service is phenomenal!  Your every need is addressed.    The beach is very private and clean.  They have a water sports department to rent gear and provide tours.  The beach did not have any solicitors outside of the water department and boats.  No vendors pushing to sell things to you.  Hotel staff regularly checks in on you to see if you need anything and provides occasional complimentary tea, water, cool towels.  The restaurants serve a variety of food and cocktails.  The breakfast buffet (hot and cold) is very good.  I would recommend that you take the breakfast included option if you always eat breakfast.  The villa sits high above the property, and you are…

title: One of the most beautiful beaches in the world
review: Good Day gjxx,  Thank you for sharing your overwhelmingly positive comments about your family vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted that our accommodations, amenities and offerings more than met your expectations and that you had a truly flawless vacation.   On behalf of the entire team, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: 25th Anniversary
review: We took a day trip by water taxi to Sugar Beach, and the experience was magical!    The resort was charging for beach chairs ($50 for each chair I believe), but we were fine using our beach towels. It was in August, which is out of season, so there was ample space for our party of 11.  Other than that, there was no charge to use the gorgeous white sand beach.   The snorkeling was among the best we experienced in St Lucia. The diving area is pretty narrow because of how deep the water gets just off the beach. (It steeply drops to a few hundred feet about 100 yards from the beach, and as deep as 1000 feet at the mouth of the bay!)  We saw sargeant majors, parrotfish cuddlefish, yellowfin tuna, yellowtail snapper, blue tangs, trumpetfish, needlefish, and many other species.   We…

title: Beautiful but very expensive
review: Good Day JostVonDyke,  Thank you for your wonderful review of your day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort  We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and that the courtesies and services extended to you contributed to a wonderful time.
