Our white sand beaches are the perfect places between the Pitons to snorkel in the marine reserve and take time to enjoy the beautiful underwater life.  Our culinary team will be proud to read your comments.  We look forward to seeing you again soon, perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Sugar Coated Paradise
review: Beautiful place. Highly recommend staying here. Best location on Saint Lucia. The beach & views of the Pitons were amazing. Great snorkeling & beach toys.The only drawback is it is expensive especially the food & drinks.

title: Family Stay at Sugar Beach
review: We absolutely adore this resort. This is our second visit; this time we brought our children. We stayed in room 307 and the views were stunning. Our butlers were extremely helpful. My kids loved the mix of relaxation and activities. The snorkeling was great (we saw an octopus and a huge group of squid) and the whole family loved the tubing ride on the Great Big Mable. The food was wonderful - we were impressed with pretty much every dish from the Bayside's Butchers Corner. We also had lovely meals at the Great Room and Cane Bar. We were glad that we did the AI Meal Plan so that we didn't have to worry about costs while we were there. I understand that sometimes paying a large amount for a vacation tempts people to focus on the small things that aren't perfect. Twice during our…

title: Excellent Destination for a Girls Weekend
review: Good Day Beth B,  We are happy that you and your family enjoyed your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our setting is truly out of this world and it gives us pleasure to know that you appreciate the magic of this place as we do.  It is a pleasure to know that you had an enjoyable experience and enjoyed all of the activities we offer. Our white sand beaches are the perfect places between the Pitons to snorkel in the marine reserve.   Thank you once more for sharing your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you and your entire family back again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Picture Perfect
review: I spent four nights at Sugar Beach with mom, adult sister, and another family friend. We had an absolute blast and appreciated the seclusion and general calm of the property. I was consistently impressed by the hotel's ability to accommodate families with children and adult groups without disruption to either set of travelers. The beach is exquisite and the spa is outstanding - truly a magical experience.  My one complaint about the hotel is that the food and beverage prices are very high, even for someone accustomed to fine dining in Washington DC.

title: Paradise, but service and maintenance needs some work.
review: Good Day CincySkier,  Your feedback about your girl’s trip to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort is truly appreciated.   We are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us and that the courtesies and services extended to you positively contributed to a wonderful stay.  I am sorry that the food and beverage costs were higher than you had anticipated. We try our best offer quality meals that are comparable to our competitors.   Once again we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Beautiful hotel— but bugs abound.
review: Amazing property. Grounds are spectacular, out luxury cottage was beautiful, the staff is amazing, food was excellent. Due to weather our arriving flight was canceled and we arrived a day late The hotel rearranged our stay so we could spend an extra day. They were extremely accommodating  We will return to this lovely place again

title: Amazing anniversary
review: If you’re traveling to St Lucia, do not stay anywhere else.  The resort is exclusive and private.  The accommodations are top notch and we can’t say enough about the staff. They are so friendly and professional they really put the experience in another level.  This resort exceeded our wildest expectations and I can honestly say I would consider this our best vacation ever.

title: Wow, What a Beautiful Location and Resort.
review: Good Day 621racheld2015,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your anniversary stay with us. It is heart-warming to read how much this stay meant to you and to know it was nothing short of perfection.   We are happy we helped you to create great memories you’ll forever cherish.  Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome you back for many more anniversaries to come.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Incredible Resort
review: We just got back from a weeks vacation at Sugar Beach.  The place is in an unbelievable location (between the Pitons).  It has an amazing staff that helped us with whatever we asked for.  I burned my hand very bad in the airport on our way to Sugar Beach, and the staff went out of their way to get me the items i needed to take care of my wound, including actual peeled aloe plants from their nursery.  The restaurants are very good but pricey.  The breakfast at the Terrace was our favorite, but the Great Room was also very good.  Our room was very spacious and clean and one of the most comfortable beds I have ever slept in.  The grounds near the rooms are not for walking as they are on a steep hillside, but once in the area near the beach and restaurants you can walk freely.  The…

title: OMG!!!! No other place compares
review: Good Day kevinhobbs4527,  Thank you for sharing your glowing comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   It gives great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members.  We are delighted that you enjoyed every aspect of your stay especially snorkelling in our marine reserve at the base of Petite Piton.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Perfect Vacation
review: My fiancé and I just returned from a 5 night/6 day stay at the Viceroy Resort, Sugar Beach, in St. Lucia.  We have had plenty of wonderful experiences at various resorts in the Caribbean, but Sugar Beach surpassed them all.    The villa we stayed in, number 811, had an amazing view of Petit Piton and a partial view of the sea and Gros Piton (the view of the sea and Gros Piton was small and mostly obstructed).  It was the most impressive view we could have hoped for.  The villa was very spacious - 2 bathrooms, a living room, bedroom, and large closet area - very clean and well maintained.  The patio/deck area was also very large and had a private plunge pool and outdoor furniture.    The entire property was very well maintained and tidy, and the beach is among the best we have…

title: Exceptional resort
review: One of the best places we've ever stayed.  Beautiful rooms, exquisite food, incredible views, and exceptional service.  Some of the best snorkeling on the island is right off the beach at Sugar Beach. A must on any traveler's passport.

title: Beautiful Beach
review: Good Day  Rorry67,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy. We are happy to read your glowing feedback and appreciate your 5 star rating.  We are delighted that you enjoyed every aspect of your stay especially snorkelling in our marine reserve at the base of Petite Piton.  Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great getaway
review: Had a wonderful lunch at the Bayside Restaurant at this property. The food was wonderful, only to be outshined by the view. The sommelier did a fantastic job guiding us thru the wine list as we ate . Well worth a visit

title: Best room ever!
review: Good Day Michael M,  Thank you for your wonderful review of your day visit to the Bayside Restaurant at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and that the courtesies and services extended to you contributed to a wonderful time. Our culinary team will be proud to read your comments.  Again, thank you for your feedback. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Naturally perfect
review: Great place to getaway and relax. No other resorts around, it feels like you have the place to yourself. The location at the famous Pitons was spectacular and enjoyed snorkeling at a marine reserve off the beach. We preferred eating at the Bayside restaurant or the Cane bar/sushi. Beautiful, clean pool and friendly staff.

title: Terrific week at Sugar Beach
review: Just returned from a wonderful week at Sugar Beach.  The place is amazing and the service is world class.  Like other reviews for Sugar Beach, the food and the drinks are expensive, but both are top-notch.  The service is so great, that a resort worker walked to me on the beach and ask if she could clean my sunglasses!  The butler service is terrific.  While you certainly don't have any reason to leave the resort, it was difficult to leave the property to get your own snacks and drinks anywhere.  I don't recommend Soufriere as it doesn't appear to be a tourist town.  Great resort and great service.  We stayed in villa 707 which has a wonderful private pool.  Highly recommended.

title: I guess the charge per bug.
review: Good Day mark c,  Thank you for posting this review of your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate you sharing your highlights as well as comments about the areas that concerned you.  We are known for our world class accommodation, facilities and the top-flight service we deliver and it’s good to know you had a great time.  Once again, thank you for your feedback. We would love to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great 1-Night Stay
review: Disappointed completely by the hotel’s complete infestation by ants, mosquitos and other bugs. Or room was infested. The butler agreed. But couldn’t do anything because he said the property was infested.

title: Sugar Beach July 2018
review: Good Day bhindin,  Thank you for providing feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am disappointed about the experience you have described.  Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and it is disappointing that your concerns were not voiced to management during your stay. We would have definitely provided you with a different accommodation and have our pest control team strip and treat the room. We do undertake extensive property-wide fogging in an effort to control these pests, but unfortunately, our tropical climate and rainforest surroundings make it difficult to eradicate them completely. I am sorry for the discomfort caused.  Once again, I would like to apologize for the inconveniences you experienced. We hope the issues you have experienced will not deter you from considering a return visit at some point in the future.   Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Review
review: Although our stay was brief, I enjoyed the property.  The location, between the Pitons, is exquisite.  I suggest walking from your villa to the beach or restaurants to immerse yourself with the beauty of the property.  I felt very safe and like a V.I.P.   Request Eugustus as your Butler, you will not be disappointed.  He listens carefully to your words, actions, and non-verbal queues to make your stay memorable and surprising.

title: Beautiful
review: Wonderful room, couldn’t have been more beautiful and comfortable. Staff were so/so. The spa was stunning and there beach was one of the most beautiful and clean I have ever been too. Food and beverage were pretty good. Loved our stay

title: Just Perfect!
review: Good Day Sally S,  Thank you for sharing your glowing comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is a pleasure to read that our resort and accommodations left a lasting and positive impression for all the right reasons.  I am happy that you enjoyed our wonderful setting, especially our white sand beaches which are a perfect place to relax and bask in the sun.  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach. We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner, General Manager

title: Wonderful Anniversary Experience
review: We had a fantastic week at Sugar Beach in early June.  The setting is absolutely gorgeous and nothing was too much trouble.  We loved breakfast - plenty of choice and lots of fresh fruit.  We also very much enjoyed the Bayside and Cane Bar restaurants.   Special mention must go to our butlers, Michaela and Peter who looked after us very well indeed.  Cysline and Tavarie were also great - always a pleasure to bump into and really helpful. We are hoping to come back next year!

title: TERRIBLE SERVICE - FELT GHETTO
review: Good Day ADJJT,  Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   It gives great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members. They will all be happy with your comments.  Our food and beverage team will be happy to know that you enjoyed all of our restaurants, especially breakfast at the terrace.  Thank you once more for sharing your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Paradise in every way!
review: We were upgraded to one of the larger villas upon checking into the property.  The room and pool were wonderful.  Our butler was fantastic.  The entire Sugar Beach staff is excellent and had great attitudes.

title: The best beach in the world
review: "I think this might just be the best beach we have ever been to”, my wife said. I agree. In a magnificent location set between the Pitons the Viceroy Sugar Beach could consist of tents and still be special. But it is, in fact, a luxury resort that manages to be both relaxed and of the highest quality at the same time.  If you are considering a holiday there, the first thing to impart is the sheer scale of the resort. Whatever you are thinking, quadruple it. This means it never feels crowded. Each guest is in his or her own cottage or villa, and a fleet of tuk-tuks ferry you around, summonsed by a call to your butler. You can walk if you prefer.  The food is excellent with a menu you can eat happily every day at the Bayside Restaurant. Lunch can be taken there, or at your sun…

title: A beautiful resting spot during our boat trip
review: Good Day MrFredBrown,  Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our setting is truly out of this world and we are glad that you appreciated the magic of this place as we do.  It is pleasing to know that you had a great time and you fully enjoyed your accommodation, amenities and food offerings.  I feel proud that the attention to detail provided by the team helped to make your stay memorable for all the right reasons. I will be sure to share your glowing comments with them.  Once again, thank you for sharing. I am sure your review will help assist other travelers when planning their own holiday.   On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: JC309
review: We went on a boat trip and this was one of the places that we visited. We had a chance to sunbath and snorkel. A beautiful beach, though we could not use the hotel facilities. The pub lic part of the beach was not too glamorous, though it was completely functional and the little shops made it more interesting.

title: Fantastic 4th week at the Sugar Beach Viceroy
review: Good Day Ralph L,  Thank you for sharing feedback regarding your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Sugar Beach is one of the only resorts to have created an area specifically for non-resident guests to enjoy which includes beach lounges and other facilities for their complimentary use.   Our white sand beaches are the perfect places between the Pitons to snorkel in the marine reserve and take time to enjoy the beautiful underwater life.  We look forward to seeing you again soon, perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Honeymoon of my Dreams!
review: Sugar beach is absolutely beautiful. My wife and I had never been to St. Lucia, and sugar beach left an absolutely beautiful first impression. All team members of this resort were nothing but courteous and went the extra mile to assure that we were taken care of! The only improvement I may suggest would be the vendors on the beach. residents of sugar beach are there for a secluded lifestyle with an occasional check in from the staff at sugar beach, regarding drinks, food, towels, etc. while I understand these vendors are there to earn a living, my wife and I felt as if we were border line harassed to the point we would take an alternative route on the beach to avoid having to

title: Pampered Luxury
review: An amazing destination with great staff and jaw dropping beautiful surroundings. Food is incredible but be prepared to pay for it. You will not be disappointed. The spa must be seen to be believed - you'll feel like you've entered an enchanted kingdom.

title: Lovely Sugar Beach
review: Good Day marylouhukezalie,  Thank you for sharing this glowing review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It gives us great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members. They will all be happy with your comments.  I am glad you had the opportunity to experience our one of a kind Rainforest Spa. It is truly a special place with amazing treatments to choose from.   Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: sugar beach
review: Beautiful hotel and setting. Great Kids Club. Excellent Service. Rajen looked after our rooms perfectly. The food was good with a huge variety of dishes. Very friendly and helpful staff. Will definitely return.

title: BEAUTIFUL ISLAND OF FRIENDLY PEOPLE
review: Good Day Philippa C,  We are happy to read your glowing review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It gives great pleasure to learn that not only our beautiful setting left a lasting impression on you and your family, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members. They will all be happy with your feedback and will be looking forward to your family’s return.  Once again we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: A Dream
review: Resort was spectacular and service was fantastic.  The food and drink prices were outrageous - way too high.  This resort experience only works if you are on the All Inclusive Plan.  Overall this is a beautiful place with a great beach and superior snorkeling and scuba.   There is not much to do beyond the resort.

title: Modern Day Casablanca
review: Picture an elegant restaurant patio between the Pitons, overlooking the beach, while a man plays Ed Sheehan on a violin as the sun is setting.  Everything about this place says once in a lifetime romance with impeccable service.  Thanks again! Mike and Brittney

title: Honeymoon dream
review: Good Day Mike and Brittney,  Thank you for sharing your glowing review about your stay. It is such a pleasure to read about your experience and know that Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort remains memorable for all the right reasons.  We have a one of a kind setting and it’s always a pleasure when our guests appreciate these glorious surroundings as much as we do.  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach.  We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great stay in Sugar Bay but room form improvement
review: For our honeymoon we stayed at sandals grand, Sugar Beach and ladera. Sugar Beach was our favorite resort we EVER stayed at! What a dream. We were upgraded upon arrival to a villa 611which I actually had to double check with conceriage to make sure I wasn’t dreaming. The people, the system, the food, the ambiance and Beach. Everything was perfect, trendy and romantic. The all white rooms are like sleeping on cloud 9. The villa was secluded, in the lush rainforest, and had a stunning view of the piton and ocean. The beach was fantastic and something about being at the base of the two giant pitons made life seem surreal. The snorkeling which you can access right at the edge of Beach was amazing. we will be back over and over again. Thank you!!!

title: Dramatic views of the beautiful Caribbean framed by the Pitons
review: Good Day Lacee L  Thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort to celebrate your honeymoon. We are happy to read your glowing feedback and appreciate your 5 star rating.  It is gratifying to hear that every aspect of your stay, from the upgrade you received to our superb surroundings, exceeded your expectations.   Our team members are passionate about the services they provide to all of our guests. They will be happy with your comments and commended for ensuring a wonderful stay.  The entire team looks forward to welcoming you back—perhaps for your first wedding anniversary.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Trip of  a lifetime
review: Had a fabulous stay in Sugar Beach. The villa was stunning and probably the best facilities we have had on holiday. Great attention to detail, very high quality and wonderful location. The beach and the setting is stunning and facilities are very good. Lack of variety in restaurants to eat at in the evening. Cane bar is great couples but not so good for families. Leaving only the Bayside for families to eat at in the evening. Bayside is good but wouldn't want to eat there every night. Breakfast was good but would have preferred more flexibility through a larger buffet rather than having to order which was slow. Most of staff very friendly and helpful but the butler, which is a great idea, could have been better. Would highly recommend though, wonderful location and very special

title: Inattentive staff, slow restaurant service.
review: This is for the Oceanside restaurant only. We came by boat, anchored in the bay and to shore by dingy.  Our server was missing in action most of the time from the initial drink order to receiving the bill. We would have all had more cocktails and dessert,  but no one was around to take our order. With 6 of us, they missed out on at least $100 US. Food tasted great but in small portions. One of our group had the asparagus risotto scallops which was delicious, but only 2 baby scallops in the dish. No one was around to ask for resolution.  They charge for water too. Our server appeared and looked intently at the bills to see if we added more than the mandatory tip. Probably a training issue but for the price and the ambiance, we expected more.

title: It's the little things that destroy a vacation
review: Good day  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your dining experience at the Bayside Restaurant. Rest assured, your feedback will be shared with the restaurant service team and refresher training implemented where required.  We are disappointed that your evening fell short of your expectations. We hope that you will make a return visit so we can serve you at our best.  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Best Stay!
review: And that little thing is a scald protector. About three days into my visit, I left the beach and headed to the outdoor shower to rinse the sand off my feet. The shower (by the pool) included what I would describe as tub faucet. The water was running, and I presumed the person exiting in front of me had just finished using the facility. I stuck my foot under the running water and immediately suffered a first degree burn across the top of the foot. The resulting blister made wearing sandals or flip-flops difficult. And I subsequently came to realize, as I was limping somewhat, that most of the stairs at the resort -- and there are a lot -- lack handrails. So for all the natural beauty of the resort and the friendliness of the staff, it's the little technical things this property…

title: relaxing time
review: Good day,  we appreciate you sharing your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is disappointing to note that the situation you described ruined what was otherwise a flawless stay.  We are sorry for the discomfort you suffered rinsing your feet in the shower by the main pool. We investigated the issue as soon as your experience was reported and found that the thermostat for the main hot water tank had malfunctioned.  When the water temperature was checked, it was found to be 110 degrees Fahrenheit--certainly hotter than normal, but not generally hot enough to cause a blister to form.  We have noted your comments about handrails around the property. This is something we will look into and add where we can.   Once again, thank you for your review. We hope this one negative will not prevent you from considering a return visit in the not too distant future.  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Wow! What a fantastic Experience!
review: We stayed for our honeymoon. and everything was great! They arranged everything and were there with whatever we needed. We had an amazing time and we would reccomend Sugar Beach to other people. Also Cane Bar has the best sushi!

title: Dream honeymoon location
review: Had the most incredible honeymoon. Location perfect. Hotel staff all go beyond the call of duty. Fry fish Friday was a highlight with amazing food and music. Enjoyed some trips out with the local tour boats - would highly recommend the climb up the Piton.   Loved every moment.

title: Clearly the best spot on the island
review: Good Day,  We are thrilled to read your glowing comments about your honeymoon. We are happy to read that Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort was the perfect destination for you.  Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and it is gratifying that you thoroughly enjoyed what we had to offer.   Thank you once more for sharing your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon and for many anniversaries to come.  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Perfect location
review: Understated historical themed elegance everywhere at this facility. A well oiled, yet highly unique, resort machine that does not feel overly crowded/noisy like many resorts.. It is expensive so was pleased that there was no added on daily

title: Very special location in St. Lucia!
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our setting is truly out of this world and we are glad that you appreciated the magic of this place as much as we do.  We are delighted that our accommodations, amenities and offerings more than met your expectations and that you had a truly flawless vacation.  Your review has been greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again soon.  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Best Honeymoon becase the Best people work at Sugar Beach!
review: The location is wonderful, the service some of the friendliest I have ever experienced on my travels, great food, beautiful pool and beach, a wonderful setting for a fantastic holiday. I am just home and am already looking forward to my next visit - this is a slice of paradise on earth!

title: Exceeded Expectations!
review: Just got back from a 6 day, 10 year anniversary trip at Sugar Beach and can honestly say the resort was even better in person than any of the amazing pictures and info you will find online.  We have traveled to numerous luxury resorts in both Mexico and the Caribbean and the setting between the 2 Pitons creates an atmosphere like no other place in the world.    Our room was a Beach Bungalow and I highly recommend spending the extra money staying in one of these as it literally puts you steps away from the beach, water and direct access to everything at the resort.  You back patio is in the sand and is well appointed with a private table, lounges as well as a hammock.  The interiors are plush and it has everything you would imagine at a luxury beach resort.  I also feel we had no…

title: Fourth trip there/ perfect except for food...
review: Good Day BretteParrish8,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort to celebrate such a wonderful milestone. We are happy to read your glowing feedback and appreciate your 5 star rating.  We are delighted that every aspect of your stay, from the location of your bungalow to our amenities and offerings, exceeded your expectations.   It’s even better to learn that our beautiful setting left a lasting impression, as did the special care and attention provided by your butler Karen. She will be thrilled with your comments.    Once again, thank you for posting this overwhelmingly positive review. I am sure it will help assist other travellers when planning their own holiday. On behalf of the entire team, we look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: OUR NEW YEARLY PARADISE
review: We have returned to sugar beach every year. We even went to Riveria Maya location as well! The rooms that are beachfront are amazing!! Outside shower & plunge pool are beautiful! All the bungalows are on the sand and you couldn’t ask for a better, more private location! The only thing that’s changed is the food. We are sad to say we are not returning this year as the food was twice the price (all a la carte) and not very good. We ended up taking a taxi to a grocery & other outside restaurants. We only hope they step up their game and!

title: Truly amazing!
review: Good Day lisam3218,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your return visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that the Beachfront Bungalow was perfect for your stay.  I am sorry to learn of your disappointments with the prices in our restaurants this time around. We work hard to ensure that our guests are always satisfied and feel they are getting value for money, but we appear to have sadly lapsed on this occasion. Your feedback will be shared with our food and beverage director.   Once again we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to paradise.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: The best resort in the Caribbean
review: This place is amazing.. from the staff to the view.. this place can't be beat! We didn't want to leave and are excited to make this an annual trip! THE ROOM- The view was perfect... pitons and beach!! FOOD - AI is a MUST have... its worth not having to think about.. breakfast on the Terrace was our favorite! PRIVATE DINNER - The private dinner on the beach was special and highly recommended for a special occasion. SNORKELING - Perfect and clear! STAFF - I want to give a special shout out to Sherman... the BEST BUTLER EVER! Thank you for making our stay with you so memorable and easy.  As my husband said.. we would follow you anywhere! Thank you Sugar Beach... We can't wait until we see you again!

title: Could not be better
review: I can not think of a way that Sugar Beach can be improved.  The property is extraordinary and the scenery is unparalleled.  I could not take my eyes of the Pitons that surrounded the resort for my entire one week stay.  The main beach area was equally sublime -- a calm bay where the sun set each night.   Accommodations are exquisite (we had a two bedroom villa) and the service was superb (competent, friendly staff) in all areas.  Food at the restaurants is top notch -- whether it be the less formal Bayside restaurant or the more upscale Great Room.   I can not imagine anyone feeling disappointed at this resort.

title: Honeymoon of a lifetime
review: Good Day William S,  Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our setting is truly unique, and we appreciate you sharing your review with other travellers.  Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and it is gratifying that you thoroughly enjoyed what we had to offer.   Thank you once more for sharing your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Beautiful Resort!
review: We came here on our honeymoon and could not have hand-crafted a better trip out of our imaginations. Everything was perfect, from the views to the rooms to the food to the beach. The sunset cruise was the highlight of our trip.

title: We had a wonderful vacation at Sugar Beach.  The location is magnificent, the beach and resort facilities are excellent.
review: Good Day dlflinn15,  Congratulations! Thank you for sharing feedback about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy we helped you to create great memories you’ll forever cherish.  I am delighted to read that you enjoyed all of our offerings, especially the sunset cruise.  We are happy that your time spent with us was everything you hope it would be. We look forward to your return visit to celebrate many anniversaries to come.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Excellent staff, wonderfully kept gardens and grounds, unique setting
review: I just recently came back from Sugar Beach for a week, and the resort exceeded my expectations. We stayed in room 812, and we were given 3 butlers, Gus, Dilen, & Wynel who we could call any time of the day to make us dinner reservations or to get us taxis to other areas of the island. The room was beautiful, with our own plunge pool / patio area, large bathroom (HUGE shower), large bedroom,  & living space, with complimentary Piton's in the fridge!  The resort itself is truly gorgeous, with views of both Pitons. The beach and pool were both so relaxing, and the attendants were helpful and were quick to fulfill any requests.   Be prepared that the restaurants are expensive. We stayed as a couple so we spent about $60-70 on breakfast, $80 on lunch, and $130 on dinner. We did not…

title: Fantastic trip
review: Sugar beach was great! Staff was friendly and catered to our every need. The concierge was great and they did a fantastic job getting reservations and getting us to our destinations. Food was amazing as well. The zarzuela is some of the best seafood I’ve ever had.

title: Memorable Luxury Getaway
review: Good Day mcopeskey,  We are delighted that your stay was nothing short of perfection. Thank you for your 5 star rating and for sharing your positive comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It gives us great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members. They will all be happy with your feedback.  Your review has been greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Honeymooner's Paradise
review: We have come to Sugar Beach twice, staying in the beachfront bungalows. That experience, of stepping out of your little villa right on to the intimate beach is very special. Its true, as observed in other reviews that the beachfront bungalows are not as private as the hidden cottages that are situated up the hill, and that the bungalows are not new. But they are unique, with a serene, all white 12-foot tall interior, and private when you want them to be with closed window treatments. Nothing beats stepping onto the beach at any hour.  The food is outstanding, and especially impressive given where you are, in a near rainforest, perched on a steep slope, in a spread out resort with a beautiful, preserved colonial feel.  During our stay in June, there were a lot of small children.…

title: Excellent birthday experience
review: Good Day Adam W,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your return visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that the Beachfront Bungalow was perfect for your stay.  I am sorry to learn of your disappointments this time around. We usually have a higher number of children in house during school breaks. We try our best to  encourage families to book the earlier seatings in our restaurants so other guests can enjoy a more peaceful and relaxing experience later in the evenings. I am sorry this did not appear to be the case during your stay.   Once again we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to paradise. Our reservations team would be happy to guide you in identifying dates when there are fewer families with children booked.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Beautiful property and terrific beach
review: We recently stayed at the Sugar Beach, Viceroy Resort for our Honeymoon. The property is unbelievably beautiful, nestled right in between the two Piton Mountains. It was a quick 45-minute ride from the airport and the local drivers are happy to tell you about the island's history and to point out all of the different fruit trees along the way. The resort staff is top notch. Everyone speaks English and $USD is accepted everywhere you go. The food was amazing with multiple different options both on-site and at the nearby neighboring resorts (We ventured out two of the nights). Most anything you would want is already accounted for but should you need something else, the Butlers are just a quick phone call away on the personal two-way cell phone left in each room. The rooms require…

title: The had me at “butler phone”
review: Any resort that hands you a butler phone to use 24hrs a day has luxury all figured out. I did no prior research and tagged along on a work trip with my husband. I had hoped for a few days of relaxation but instead was blown away by a top notch experience. We had a beautiful cottage on the beach, with our king sized bed positioned perfectly overlooking the sea. The personal service from our butler was unbelievable- they did everything from set up excursions to bring us contact solution late at night when we realized we’d forgotten to pack it. The rooms were extremely clean (cleaned every time we left the room in fact) and the food was delicious. The service in the restaurant was a little slow but I didn’t mind the relaxed pace. From tennis to diving it was a true first class…

title: Relaxing family getaway
review: Good Day BetsyAK,  Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our setting is truly out of this world and we are glad that you appreciated the magic of this place as we do.  It gives us great pleasure to know that the special touches and attention to detail provided by our team helped to make your stay memorable for all the right reasons. I will be sure to share your comments with them.   Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Amazing
review: We enjoyed the beauty and hospitality at this luxurious resort. The beachfront Beachfront bungalows were a perfect location and provided privacy when we wanted it. Setting of beach between Pitons was idyllic. Resort staff is top notch and all the food was delicious. Perfect spot to unwind and enjoy family.

title: A beautiful place if you are in search of complete relaxation
review: Good Day mahans1234,  Thank you for sharing your overwhelmingly positive comments about your family vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am glad our accommodations, amenities and offerings more than met your expectations and that you had a truly flawless vacation.  On behalf of the entire team, we look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: A perfect honeymoon
review: Completely exceeded my expectations. This property is so beautiful and the service was superb. Drinks and beach were great too. So sad to be leaving but looking forward to returning soon! An amazing experience all around.

title: Honeymoon
review: The resort was AMAZING! The views were perfect. Our butlers Michael and Sherman were great. Michael worked relentlessly always hustling around trying to make everything perfect for us. Sherman had a contagious smile and immediately made us feel special upon our arrival.  Our room 603 was secluded but still had great views of the Pitons. The beach had everything... snorkeling near the reserve is a MUST!

title: Great Resort
review: Good Day tbould,  We are thrilled to read your glowing comments about your honeymoon. Thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort to create lasting memories as you embark on your new life together.  Our team members are passionate about surpassing guest expectations and I am excited to read that we were able to make your honeymoon extra special.  The entire team looks forward to welcoming you back—perhaps for your first wedding anniversary.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: A taste of paradise!
review: Resort is perfect for couples.  We went on our honeymoon. Plenty of bars but also quiet and secluded.  The service is great.  The happiest and nicest staff we have ever had at a resort.  Sherman is a GREAT butler.

title: Luxurious Relaxation
review: Good Day 86nickt87,  Congratulations! Thank you for taking the time to share feedback about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are happy to read your glowing comments and know that we exceeded your expectations. Our team members will be delighted to read your review, especially Sherman.  We hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Not what we expected
review: Absolute luxury!!! Rooms are fantastic, views are amazing, the beach is immaculate! The staff are so friendly, helpful and so welcoming. Great selection of things to do on resort and all facilities are top notch!  Not cheap, but definitely worth the money!

title: Paradise Found at Sugar Beach
review: Sugar Beach was simply amazing. The staff was incredible. We were very lucky to have Ethan and Maneski as our butlers. They were so nice and very attentive and checked in on us every day. They made all our dinner arrangements on and off the resort and made sure we were enjoying ourselves, which for us, was easy to do at Sugar Beach. The views from the resort are breathtaking and surreal. Being situated between the Gros and Petit Piton’s is amazing. We were in Villa 901 which is nestled up in the hill. The sights and sounds of nature all around you is incredible. We took a boat ride up to Marigot bay for the day to have lunch at Doolittle’s. The cruise to the bay was awesome. After lunch, we cruised a little farther north. From the water we could see many other resorts, and at…

title: Love in Sugar Beach
review: Good Day Mr and Mrs Player,  Thank you for your glowing feedback about your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We’re delighted that not only did our beautiful setting leave a lasting impression, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members. They will be thrilled with your comments and will be commended for a job well done.  Again, thank you for your review and for choosing to stay with us. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Best Resort in the Carribean
review: So romantic, so quiet, sweet days and nights. After 43 years of marriage, Sugar Beach Resort allowed us to breathe, take walks, hold hands, kiss, and enjoy our time together as a couple.  Thank you! Hope to see you soon!

title: Not what we expected for our first stay in St. Lucia.  Not worth the fortune it takes to stay here
review: Good Day peggy563,  Thank you for sharing your feedback about anniversary stay with us. It is heart-warming to read how much this stay meant to you and to know it was nothing short of perfection.   We are thankful that we had the opportunity to create an enjoyable and relaxing experience for you.  Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Extreme Relaxation
review: I have been to many islands and many fancy resorts. I have a few favorites, but Sugar Beach is by far my favorite now.  The venue and the staff just make the stay fantastic.  I will be returning and I have only said that about one other place ever.

title: Charles and Sibyl's Honeymoon
review: Couldn't have imagined a better honeymoon experience. The setting, the room, the amenities, and the service were incredible. Our satisfaction is a testament to the great work of the chefs, the management team, and all of the wonderful service people.

title: Most amazing honeymoon!
review: Good Day lapeyrecc,  Congratulations Charles and Sibyl!  Thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort to celebrate your honeymoon.   We are delighted that you had a wonderful time. The rest of the team are all happy to know that the special care they extended was truly appreciated.  The entire team is looking forward to welcoming you back, perhaps to celebrate your first anniversary.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Birthday Getaway
review: Sugar Beach has to be one of the best resorts we have ever been to! Went for our honeymoon. We stayed in a luxury cottage that had a private pool- the cottage was spectacular with the most comfortable bed ever. We were greeted by our butler Michael with drinks and a tour of our room once we arrived. Didn't even need to stop by reception to check-in- it's all done in your room. You get an iPad for hotel information, room service, etc. and also a cellphone to call your butler. Moved around the resort in shuttles and tuk-tuks called upon request (you can call your butler or anybody working at the resort can call you a shuttle). The resort is absolutely beautiful- built between the Pitons on a (semi) private beach. The views are beautiful anywhere you are. The Rainforest Spa is so…

title: WOW!!!!!
review: Good Day sugarbeachfanforlife,  Congratulations and thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort to celebrate your honeymoon. It is heart-warming to read reviews such as yours and to know that my team went above and beyond to spoil you with “sugar”.  I am delighted that you enjoyed everything from the impeccable service to the location of your room and the delicious dishes in our restaurants.  We are happy we helped you to create great memories you’ll forever cherish.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Absolutely beautiful hotel
review: My wife made all the arrangements to celebrate my 50th. It was a wonderful trip in every aspect. We both agree having stayed at other resorts all over the world, the food at the restaurants on site was by far the best we have ever had. The entire staff was very helpful and went above and beyond to assist you with any request or need. Our villa was on the 700 level (quite a distance from the beach) but the shuttle service was extremely prompt when called and the drivers were all very friendly and able to answer any questions we had. I would recommend Sugar Beach to all my friends and family and my wife and I hope to visit again.  Scott Holroyd

title: Beauty and luxury at a price
review: After a great week in Barbados including a wedding we came to relax.After 1.5 hours from the domestic terminal we were unprepared for this spectacular place . We stayed in a luxury cottage which is among the less expensive options .It is lovely with everything we could need including a small pool and a sea view. The beach must be amongst the most beautiful in the world between the Pitons . Breakfast offered every option we could think of and lunch by the sea was great too. There are two restaurants and while the food is very good , the expense is eye watering . One can’t help feeling that they are aware that it’s very hard to get out of the resort because of the terrain . There are meal plans but unless you drink a lot ,you would probably break even.   We found it a bit odd that…

title: St Lucia's best beach
review: Good Day Joy K,  Thank you for providing feedback on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate you sharing your highlights as well as comments about the areas that concerned you.  I am happy that you enjoyed our wonderful setting and location of the resort, especially our white sand beaches which are a perfect place to relax and bask in the sun.  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for your feedback and business and we all are looking forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Sugar Beach Splendor
review: This is easily the best beach on the island and the best snorkeling. Just be warned if your no staying there the rules for you are different. Wish we had been told. If your just looking to go to the beach, you have 2 options 1) Park above the top gate and take the ridiculously long and steep down hill walk to the beach at which time you will be told the visitors area is way over to the right on the other side of the pier. this is a small area way over crowded. 2) Pay $50 per head for a food and alcohol voucher, drive down to the guest parking area and take the shuttle to the beach. You will then find out that the beach chairs rent for $50 each or you are welcome to sit in the sand. You can also opt to cross over into the free area ( see option 1.) The $50 voucher is your best…

title: Once in a lifetime experience!
review: Good Day Mark W,  Thank you for posting your review of your recent day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy to see that you had a wonderful time and appreciated the facilities provided.  We look forward to seeing you again soon, perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: It sounds like paradise...
review: My wife and I debated over the Beachfront Bungalow vs. Grand Luxury Villa which are the same price (US$1-1,500 depending on season) and ended up experiencing both. We started with the Beachfront unit (#19) and while we love the proximity to the surf, this unit type at this property lacked privacy and showed it's age. Most of the space was dominated by the bathroom; the private lounges and hammock outside did not have direct sunlight (though about half did, those units had even less privacy). The Grand Luxury Villa, best amongst the terraced, colonial-style units at One Bedroom, turned out to be the much better option for us. Very large with massive patio and plunge pool (#403), which my wife preferred to the outdoor Jacuzzi of the Bungalow. Twice the room to spread out and…

title: Perfect Vacation!
review: Lets start with location...this place should be on your bucket list. It is that beautiful!!! The topography is so different than most Caribbean beaches that its amazing, Take a boat tour to Castries for a wonderful view of the island coastline. The location is prime to all the tours like sulfur springs, botanical gardens, hiking the Pitons etc. The people who stay in Castries have to come almost 40 min by boat to these same attractions that are 15-20 min by car for Sugar beach guests. The resort itself is top notch. The staff is so friendly and accommodating that its easy to relax and enjoy yourself. The best restaurant was for sure the Sushi spot (I can't think of the name) it even had a DJ for Thursday  nights. NOTE: ALL the restaurants are overpriced.  If you can get a deal…

title: Feeling like a cheapskate on your Honeymoon
review: Good Day J J,   Thank you for your 5 star rating for Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and for sharing your positive comments. We have to agree that our location between the Pitons is unbeatable.  I am glad that you had the opportunity to enjoy all of our services and amenities, and got out to explore all that this stunning island has to offer.  Your comments and business are greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team we look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Trip of a lifetime!
review: After spending five absolutely splendid days at Jade Mountain, it is a devastating dissapointment to transition to Sugar Beach resort. First of all, after signing up for the all inclusive package at Jade Mountain, the all inclusive meal plans were very comparable to Sugar Beach. The main differences include not having WATER included in our lunch and dinner meal plan (bottled still water is 7.50 dollars per bottle), being limited to ordering a few items on the menu, being charged $18 extra for ANYTHING delivered to the room, and having surcharges written all over the menu for main course meals (so basically you end up paying anywhere from $20-150 extra for every meal if you order any drinks and quality dishes. My main frustration comes from  being on our honeymoon and signing up…

title: Couples Only
review: Good Day Katherine S,  Congratulations and thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort to celebrate your honeymoon.  I am sorry that the food and beverage costs were higher than you had anticipated. We work hard to ensure that our guests are always satisfied and feel they are getting value for money, but appear to have sadly lapsed on this occasion. Your comments have been shared with our food and beverage director to ensure improvements in our menu offerings and meal plan inclusions.  We remain genuinely concerned about each guest experience and welcome feedback such as yours so that we can improve on areas highlighted and help to enhance the overall satisfaction of our guests.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Paradise
review: My husband and I stayed at Sugar Beach in April 2018 and we fell in love with St. Lucia! Our private grand villa with butler service and personal pool overlooking Sugar Beach was amazing! The food was top notch and the staff took excellent care of us! There are so many things to do and we enjoyed the mix of activities and relaxation that the island offers! We will definitely be back!

title: Beautiful memories in St.Lucia
review: We chose this hotel for the location, situated between the Pitons and right on a marine preservation area. We wanted to be able to just walk off of our beach and into the water for snorkeling, which was beautiful.  We chose not to rent a car and we were glad we didn't; we didn't want the extra stress - the roads are so windy.   Since we figured we be staying primarily on the property, we chose a meal plan to include breakfast and dinner. Another good decision as the prices are crazy expensive! Be sure to make reservations for the Friday night BBQ at the Bayside! We loved breakfast.  We stayed in a luxury villa way up in the hills behind the main lodge. There are shuttles running all the time or you can call for one. Most of the time we took the hike which was a fun challenge!…

title: Paradise beach resort
review: Good Day Amy P,  Thank you for your glowing review of your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that your time spent with us was everything you imagined.   Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we are happy that you thoroughly enjoyed what we had to offer.  Your feedback has been greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Paradise Setting with the Most Friendly and Genuine Staff
review: Gorgeous setting with exceptional service. The food was very good, the beach and pool areas are stunning. Transportation to and from resort, as well as around town, is very expensive. Overall, a terrific but pricey experience.

title: Spectacular
review: Good Day 3potato,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   Our setting is truly out of this world and it gives us pleasure to know that you appreciate the magic of this place as much as we do.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Loved, loved, loved this place!
review: Its hard to imagine a more idyllic and iconic setting. Sugar Beach sits framed by the glorious Piton mountains, each standing with majesty and drama on each end of two beautiful paradise beaches. The sand is indeed sugar like and  both beaches are lined with soft swaying palms and then gently  lapped by the turquoise waters of the Caribbean sea.   There isn't much needed after that perhaps but this truly beautiful setting is combined with excellent hospitality and service and the most genuine & professional staff. Nothing was too much trouble at all and all done with pure charm and genuine friendliness.  Not overbearing , just perfect.  The snorkelling is a must ! situated right by the foot of larger the Piton mountain - direct and free access just along the beach -  it is a…

title: Stunning but not what we expected
review: This is a stunning property and the service is wonderful. Our only complaint is we came for the beach and to relax, but a loud large group of over 50 was staying at the resort. They dominated the beach service and took up chairs that were never used.  Smoking without regard for others around and playing music on speakers. I thought Sugar Beach was going to be more low key and more of emphasis on serenity and relaxation. The resort became more like one would expect when the group went on an excursion one day. We did love every other aspect from our room to the spa.  Our driver John and Big Charles were a lot of fun! If you’re expecting a quiet beach vacation just be aware they host large company groups.

title: Unique and special
review: Good Day nlp105,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It appears that you had a wonderful stay with the exception of the disappointments shared.   We take pride in ensuring that every guest has a wonderful and memorable experience, sadly we lapsed on this occasion. I sincerely apologise for the less than perfect experience you had with the group in house during your stay. Your comments will be discussed with the events team so they can ensure group guests are always behaving in accordance with resort standards.  We hope you will consider a return visit so we can share the first class Sugar Beach experience that we are known for.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Hands down, absolute BEST resort in St. Lucia!
review: fantastic honeymoon experience! villa was totally private and luxurious. restaurants were delicious. highly recommend doing the all inclusive package as meals were pricey but with the package you get your moneys worth!

title: If You're Looking for 5 Star, Go Elsewhere...
review: Good Day aatkins1188,  Congratulations! Thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort as your honeymoon destination. We are happy to read your glowing feedback and know that your expectations were exceeded in every aspect of your stay.  The entire team looks forward to welcoming you back—perhaps for your first wedding anniversary.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: We haven’t arrived and they have exceeded excellence!
review: Phenomenal! No other way to describe this experience. From beginning to end and every where in between the staff of Sugar Beach made our trip like no other and has set a high standard for other resorts. I highly recommend this resort to anyone considering to vacation in St. Lucia, you will not be disappointed.

title: 11/10 Best hotel in the world.
review: I am proud to say that this was a very successful event due to the hands of the staff at sugar beach! The staff of the hotel was effieicnt in ever possible way, they were fast efficient and extremely nice and well mannered, this hotel is a 11/10. Beyond words how beautiful the property is.

title: Exceptional Experience
review: Good Day 315cole,  Thank you for taking the time to post this terrific review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   It gives great pleasure to learn that not only did our beautiful location and setting leave a lasting impression on you, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members. They will all be happy with your comments.  On behalf of the entire team, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach.  We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Don't Waste Your Money -- This Place is Nothing to Write Home About
review: We have just had an amazing week at Sugar Beach in room 403. Everything was perfect from the moment we arrived and the staff could not have been more attentive or efficient. Special thanks to the butler team who looked after us. The views from our room were incredible and the cottage was very luxurious. All the restaurants were fabulous and the Great Room was quite an experience. The beach was lovely and we enjoyed the water sports. Our only recommendation would be to have electric buggies as shuttles which would be more environmentally friendly and quieter!

title: Exceeded All Expectations
review: Good Day ForestDweller68,  Thank you for sharing this glowing review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is heart-warming to read reviews such as yours and to know that the butler team went above and beyond to ensure your stay was memorable for all the right reasons.   We thank you for your recommendations about the electric buggies. We have tested these vehicles on our roads, but sadly, they are simply not powerful enough to navigate our mountainous terrain. With that being said, we are continuing to look for ways to enhance our transportation system and to make it more environmentally friendly.  Once again, thank you for your feedback and business. We welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Always exceeds expectations.
review: I was at Sugar Beach for 2-weeks. The place was packed my first week there, as it was a school vacation week. There were loud, unsupervised children all over the place including on the beach and in the restaurants (I like children, but not when they're loud and allowed to run amok, disturbing everyone in their wake). It took at least 3 or 4 tries to get hold of our butler (the arbiter of all shuttles and restaurant reservations), there were long wait times for the shuttles, restaurant reservations were impossible to get between the hours of 6-8pm, and most outrageous of all, there weren't enough chaises on the beach to accommodate all the guests! When I'm paying over $1,300 per day (not including meals), I expect there to be a chaise waiting for me on the beach, period,…

title: Amazing Experience and an Unforgettable Vacation
review: I am an avid traveler. I have ben many places and experienced wonderful resorts and hotels and this place is amazing! I read many reviews that were great on the hotel and then I read some reviews that frightened me. Let me tell you now that this hotel is AMAZING. Yes it is expensive, but you can choose to stay at a less expensive hotel on the island if money is an issues. Also if you are paying $1300 a night for a hotel it is normal for a burger and an alcoholic beverage to be $60. The service was amazing. I do not care what any of these other reviews tell you. Our butlers were Peter and Dwight and they were on top of everything, every request, every reservation, extra pillows or simply having a pleasant conversation- they were the best. Phenomenal Peter and Dwight!!  Speaking…

title: Exceptional food but service not good enough.
review: Dear Ariana I,  Thank you for posting this glowing review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I will be sharing your feedback with the rest of the team and commending them for a job well done.  Peter and Dwight will be singled out for special recognition. It is great to know they provided the care and attention to detail that made your vacation extra special.  We look forward to serving you again soon!  Best regards Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great location, but needs better service
review: We had a lovely 11 nights with my in-laws celebrating their 70th birthdays and the staff were very generous in making their final night a lovely celebration.    The food quality throughout the resort is exceptional as is the accommodation.   We would have loved to give 5 stars as there are some lovely staff who really care and the location is stunning but as many have stated on previous reviews the quality and consistency of the service just isn’t at the level of a top hotel. Plus Sugar Beach charges more than most (I am fortunate to travel all over the world and stay at leading hotels). It just seems that training and management aren’t at the required levels to ensure consistency and good communication. We had issues everyday with drinks orders not arriving or part orders…

title: Wonderful family vacation
review: Dear GlobalTraveller36,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post this review about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am sorry I did not get the chance to meet you personally during your stay. I would have welcomed the opportunity to have discussed your concerns while you were still at the resort.  Your feedback has been shared with the relevant department heads so that tangible improvements can be made in the speed and consistency of service delivery.  We certainly share your concerns about the heavy traffic on the beach during peak times. I trust that you were informed about the Glenconner Beach at the southern end of the property. This area offers a much more relaxing and tranquil beach experience for our resident guests on busy days as it is not frequented by day trippers wishing to snorkel.   We are continuing to lobby the local authorities in a bid to restrict the number of boats and passengers that can visit National Marine Reserve at any one time.  Once again, thank you for your comments and also thank you for your business. We hope that you will consider a return visit at some point in the future.  Best regards Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Perfection!!
review: Beautiful location and well maintained and great property.  The service levels are not in line with the pricing - for this type of property and pricing, I would have expected the service levels, friendliness of staff, and overall customer orientation to be MUCH higher

title: Exorbitant!
review: This was our first time to stay at a Viceroy property. Never again! Much prefer the reliable and consistent standards of the Four Seasons. This is not even close to being a 5 star resort- and for the prices charged, its like highway robbery. We spent a small fortune every day on meals and drinks! And the reviews are spot on, the food isn’t even that good. Breakfast was over $100/ day just for the 2 of us. One night we had a bowl of Edamame and ONE cocktail and a glass of sparkling water, and the bill was $40! Cocktails were about $14.  The soaking pool at the room was completely useless since the water was freezing cold. It could have been so wonderful if it was a hot tub. Our butler was great and the tuk tuk drivers pleasant but overall, the staff seems elitist or drained or…

title: Awsome Place
review: Dear SoraciSauce,  It is disappointing to read your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry that the prices in our restaurants were higher than you had anticipated and that you were generally unhappy with the consistency in our service.  On a cheerful note, it’s good to hear that your butler and our shuttle drivers added to your stay in a positive way. It is extremely rare to get comments such as yours about the rest of our team, and I am somewhat surprised by what you have written.  We appreciate your comments and your business. It is a shame we were unable to provide the vacation experience you had expected.   We hope that you might consider a return visit at some point in the future.  Best regards Mark Sterner General Manager

title: nature
review: What a great vacation!  OK, it is not inexpensive, and still, we all really had a wonderful time.  The drive in takes a little time from the airport, up and down hills, around curves, etc.  Our shuttle took us directly to our "house".  We had a good one - our own sizable infinity pool, 3 bedrooms, great outdoor dining area, plenty of places to sit outside (or get away from each other), full kitchen, nice bathrooms (once we learned how to work the hot water in the upstairs shower), and more.  As several recommendations, if you think ahead, bring some food if you intend to use your kitchen (as we did) - cereal, pasta, etc. to save money.  Food is not cheap (but it is good at the restaurants!), and it's not exactly cheap if they buy for your room (watch alcohol prices) and know…

title: Beach & Snorkeling Does to Warrant Cost
review: Dear GlobeRunR  Thank you for posting this helpful review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We are delighted that you enjoyed your three bedroom Residence and made the most of all of the fantastic activities the resort and the island as a whole has to offer.  We hope to welcome you back soon for another wonderful family vacation.  Best regards Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Amazing resort!
review: liocated between the Pitons beautiful location   one of the most photographed surroundings in the Caribbean a must stay at nights to see the glistering moon light come straight to your cottage. Also perfect for divers and scuba boating   good location for weddings for the rich and famous.

title: Expensive but paradise personified
review: We paid $50 US to enter this pace and have a cheeseburger. The security informed us that we could use the facilities such as the beach and loungers. When we finished our meal we went to the loungers and were immediately ejected from them unless we paid another $100 US. There is a free public beach under some trees at the side so we went there. Next time we paid $20 US to get a taxi boat from Soufriere town to the public beach. Same venue, same views but free

title: Wonderful Experience and Amazing Service
review: Good Day haggy2015,  Thank you for sharing feedback from your recent day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am sorry if you were not correctly informed about the facility fee and what is included. This fee allows you access to our guest parking lot and shuttle service to and from the beach. 100% of this fee can be used as a credit for your food and beverage and is non-refundable. The beach lounges are reserved for our resident guests and are rented out for $50 per lounge based on our availability.  Your comments have been shared with our team to ensure that accurate information is shared so we don’t have a repeat of what you have described.  Again my sincere apologies for the inconvenience and we hope to welcome you back, perhaps as resident guests.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Amazing
review: It's been some time since we stayed here - honeymooned here in September 2014. However, I can honestly say that each time I go on a trip I compare the hotels we're staying in to our stay at Sugar beach. I have not found another that comes close.  During our stay we found the service to be attentive (without being overwhelming/overbearing). They were able to accommodate our requests quickly and were genuinely pleasant. I felt that the hotel's employees were truly invested in us having a great experience at the resort.  Our room was gorgeous and had great views - it was exactly what we'd hoped for. Although it was a bit farther to all the restaurants than we'd originally realized, it was no problem because the butler service was literally never more than 5 min away to take us…

title: Honeymooner Heaven!
review: Good Day,  It is gratifying to read that you had a great time and enjoyed everything we had to offer. We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback.  It gives us great pleasure to know that the special touches and attention to detail provided by our team helped to make your stay memorable for all the right reasons. I will be sure to share your comments with them.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Christmas at Sugarbeach
review: We were in St Lucia last year for spring break. Did not like the resort( The Landings) we stayed in, but loved the people of this island and the weather. We decided to come back this year and try Viceroy.  It was an amazing experience! The villas are so clean and the concierge service is great. The kids loved Alcee at the kid's club. They have lots of games at the kid's club and even a stage for the kids to perform. The staff at the resort is very nice and very accommodating to your needs.  The grounds are manicured and a great view of the Pitons. The breakfast has a great selection and is very healthy. We did not do the all inclusive option but anytime we ate at the resort the food was good.  Highly recommend this resort.

title: WOW WOW AND MORE WOW
review: My husband and I just returned from a week in St. Lucia.  We were fortunate to spend 3 nights at Jade Mountain then four nights at Sugar Beach.  Jade Mountain is without  a doubt a unique experience.  It was hot at night when drying your hair because there is a three wall open concept room.  No air conditioning.  So I felt sweaty a lot.  However, we loved Sugar Beach in a different way. We did love that it was air conditioned.  We had a beach cottage #18 which we loved walking out of our room right onto the beach. Butler service (Karen) was great.  They make your dinner reservations and restock your mini bar,  some things are included in your stay and some not so be sure to understand before grabbing something.  The room was beautiful and spotless.  Big shower, awesome closet…

title: Picture Perfect
review: Good Day 01ritz,  We are happy to hear that you had an amazing and memorable vacation, and we had a large part to play in it. Thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and for sharing your wonderful review.  Our food and beverage team will be happy to know that you enjoyed all of our restaurants and that they were able to exceed your expectations on every occasion.  Our Luxury Beachfront Bungalows are definitely in the perfect location and I am glad you were happy with your choice of accommodation.  Again, thank you for sharing your feedback and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Will not return!
review: Amazing resort with above and beyond service.  The staff was incredible, from our butler to the driver and everyone in between.  We had the perfect vacation and will definitely return.  We were surprised how many activities they offered and the options for children.  Our next trip will be with the family.

title: A 4 star hotel, at 5 star prices
review: Good Day crabtreeae ,  Thank you for your wonderful review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that you had a great time and your stay with us was nothing short of perfection.   It gives us great pleasure that the special touches and attention to detail provided by our team helped to make your stay memorable for all the right reasons.  It’s also great to hear that you were impressed by our amenities and offerings. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Fantastic return visit
review: We spent a day at Sugar Beach - a few hours at their Rainforest Spa and an afternoon at the beach. With the exception of Mario (waiter), Shelton (waiter),   Dwayne (massusue) and their IT manager (we can't remember his name) we received average and at times almost hostile service.   We were booked in for a couple's scrub and massage at the Rainforest Spa. We corresponded with Sue, Tabitha and Boudin over email. My husband was looked after Dwayne and i was looked after by Leah. We had the couple's room with the outdoor pool.   Since our treatment was not on the menu, i requested for details of the treatment on email. We had been informed that we would have a 30 min scrub and a 80 min massage which "further ends with a 10 minute foot pressure point massage" (exact words from their…

title: The Perfect Getaway (Again)
review: This was our second visit to Sugar Beach, and it certainly won't be our last.  I just returned from a 10 day stay at Sugar Beach, my second visit to the resort in as many years, and every time I leave I remain impressed with the beauty of the facilities, the genuine enthusiasm and attitude of the staff, and am left with memories of a great vacation and experience in Saint Lucia.  We've stayed both years in an ocean view villa up on the mountain and the experience has been great.  The rooms are spacious and very well kept.  We got plenty of use out of the plunge pool and the private feel to having your own space can't really be beat.  Sunsets on the deck with great views of the ocean and the Pitons make for some great photos.  There are definitely issues with bugs, but you're in…

title: Paradise
review: Good Day michaelvamarante,  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort a second time. It is a pleasure to know we continue to meet and exceed your expectations.  We are delighted that the special touches and attention to detail provided by our team helped to make your stay relaxing and enjoyable. I will share your glowing comments with the individuals mentioned and commend them for a job well done.  Our food and beverage team, in particular, will be proud to read your comments and know they did a wonderful job with providing a memorable private dinner experience on the beach.  Once again, your loyalty, comments and business are greatly appreciated. We look forward to the opportunity of serving you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Treated like royalty
review: Sugar Beach is situated right between the Piton Mountains.  The scenery was the most beautiful I've ever seen.  The resort was very nice and the food was excellent.  Highly recommend eating at The Great Room and visiting the Rainforest Spa.

title: Obscenely Overpriced
review: Good Day JSB1508,  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your time at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our setting is truly out of this world and it gives us pleasure to know that you appreciate the magic of this place as much as we do.
