I am thrilled that you enjoyed all of our offerings, especially, our one of a kind Rainforest Spa and Great Room restaurant. Our Rainforest Spa is one of a kind and the ambiance of the Great Room is worth experiencing.  Your comments and business are greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Absolute Paradise
review: Our stay here exceeded our expectations.  We were treated like royalty, always asked how things were, if we needed anything and everything was always taken care for us.  we couldn't have asked for a better resort or staff for our vacation.

title: Preview left a bad impression.
review: I have lived in the Caribbean and have visited multiple islands over the last 30 years. This was our first visit to St Lucia, and while we were satisfied with our villa in Soufriere, we wanted to check out Sugar Beach.   Overall I was appalled at the prices for a mediocre lunch, and the way the “non resident” guests tended to be herded off to one side of the beach like cattle was really not very impressive.  The beach itself was quite nice, but actually I’ve been on several nicer beaches.  The awesome sight of the piton made it somewhat unique, in terms of picturesque beauty.  They had average looking beach chairs available for rent for $100 for the two of us, and that did not include an umbrella.  Beach chairs with shade was only available to guests.  The whole affair had an…

title: We felt like intruders.
review: Good Day Dr Harris,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is disappointing to read that our food and beverage offerings did not match your expectations. We work hard to ensure that our guests are always satisfied and feel they are getting value for money, but we appear to have let you down on this occasion.  Sugar Beach is one of the only resorts to have created an area specifically for non-resident guests with complimentary beach lounges and other facilities for their  use. The white canvas sun lounges on our beach are reserved for the exclusive use of our resident guests but we rent them out when we are not at full occupancy. Allocation of these lounges is based on what is available at the time.   I am sorry for your disappointment and the inconvenience of not having a shade over your beach lounges and if you felt our prices were higher than you anticipated  We trust that the issues have not left an indelible mark and hope you might consider a return visit at some point in the future, perhaps as a resident guest next time.   Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Cat's for Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner
review: This is our first visit to St. Lucia.  We did not stay at Sugar Beach Resort, but at a neighboring villa.  We were exploring other places, the beaches, etc., and were told that all the beaches on St. Lucia are public.  We like to travel the caribbean and my husband lived on the island of Saba for a couple of years when he taught at the medical school there.  Most places in the caribbean are very inviting, they appreciate your business.  We did not feel this way when visiting Sugar Beach as "outsiders" meaning anyone other than resort guests.  We drove in, expecting to be able to drive close to the beach.  You cannot. Instead, there is a guard shack and they inform you that you have to park 1/4 mile before the entrance or pay them $50 per person for a voucher towards lunch in…

title: A 5-star location..stunning..5 star staff....but unfortunatley a 3 star room.
review: Good Day rodeofool,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry to learn of your disappointments and concerns.  All the beaches on island are public and Sugar Beach is one of the only resorts to have created an area specifically for non-resident guests to enjoy which includes beach lounges and other facilities for their complimentary use. The white canvas sun lounges on our beach are reserved for the exclusive use of our resident guests but we rent them out when we are not at full occupancy.  Our security team usually earns high praise for their hospitality and I am sorry you felt intimidated by them. As you can imagine, we have to work hard to balance the expectations of our high-paying resident guests with those of day visitors who also come to experience the beauty of Sugar Beach. It’s not an easy task and sadly, unlike you and your husband, we sometimes get day visitors who are not always respectful of hotel property and boundaries which make it difficult for our team.   On a positive note, I am happy that our team members provided attentive service and made you feel appreciated and welcome at the restaurant and while using the shuttle service.  Once again, I am disappointed about the experience you have described. We hope that you might consider a return visit at some point in the future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Just lovely
review: I am always looking at the positives relating to travel.  I'm giving the Viceroy and average rating but this is being very kind because of the workers who were very nice and did an excellent job of providing us great service.    Next are the reason's I would never come back to this resort.  Our room was a thousand per night...clean but extremely small.  The food and drinks are outrageously expensive everywhere on the resort grounds.  On the beach, half the chairs were broken.  I could go on but I feel I've said enough with one last nasty element...CAT's.  Every meal we had at the resort included cats walking and rubbing against our legs...people were feeding them while we ate at the table next and round us.  We complained numerous times but the management did nothing to get rid…

title: Stunning resort and location, Service goes from great to really bad
review: The room, the view, the beach were absolutely incredible.  The shocking part was the service.  This place is extremely expensive and you expect service to be top notch. Our butler was great.   The dining service on any day went from average to extremely poor.  Many times we had to flag people and down and more often than not there was a lot of attitude and unfriendliness.  Same thing went for the beach servers.  I was beyond shocked.  I went on my daugthers spring break to a not as high end resort in Mexico and the service there blew Sugar Beach away.  I agree with what others said.  They need to figure the service out and focus on that.  Get ride of anyone with a bad attitude.  It was bad enough that we won't be returning and won't recommend it to anyone.  There are a lot of…

title: IF YOU DONT CARE ABOUT FOOD OR SERVICE.....
review: Good Day Angela M,  We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am sorry that the service you received from some of our team members was inconsistent. Our management team will be discussing your concerns to ensure our team members provide stellar service that is consistent each and every time. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. Apart from the disappointments mentioned, we are happy that you enjoyed our one of a kind location.   Once again, thank you for your business and your comments. We welcome your comments as a valuable tool in our efforts towards maintaining the high standards we pride ourselves on. We look forward to serving you again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Anniversary with Friends
review: Very difficult to get to.  AND airport is a disaster. You are a captive audience because of the location of the hotel. . The beach is magnificent.  Food is inedible. The service is worse than the food. Rooms nice. Should be for over $1000 USD per day. It is a 4th world nation.

title: Five Star Beauty,  but needs service uograe
review: Good Day Ivychazen,  Thank you for providing feedback on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   I would like to apologise for the challenges you encountered during your stay. I am disappointed that management was not aware and we did not have the opportunity to turn your experience around while you were still at the resort.  From your other comments, it may be that St Lucia as a whole was simply not the right choice for you as a vacation destination. This is a small island nation with great infrastructure. However, the roads and airport may not be up to the standards you are accustomed to back home.  Once again, thank you for taking the time to share your comments. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Sugar Beach in February
review: Overall this was a stunning resort located in a gorgeous and secluded spot.  The rooms were Carribean traditional which I think is quite beautiful, this is not your modern resort.  There were some staff that really stuck out, Cher (our friends butler, AMAZING), Dwayne (must for a massage), Leroy and Noah at the residents beach bar and Kevin our driver that picked us up.  That said we were quite disappointed in the perceived disdain from the staff.  A lot of this probably could have been negated by an amazing butler but he was nowhere to be found, stark contrast to Cher.  Upon arrival he informed us he had made us dinner reservations.  We thanked him and said we were meeting friends (this was noted on our pre arrival forms) and could he add them, we didn’t care which restaurant. …

title: Just awesome resort; just don’t think about the cost
review: We stayed at sugar beach for two nights and took advantage of all the resort had to offer.   Our villa (in the 800 series) was high on the hillside with wonderful views of the Pitons.  The room was very large and Comfy... big bathroom and large deck with a plunge pool.  The shuttle service is fantastic and we never waited more that a few minutes for a quick jitney or van ride down to the beach and main resort.  It is a very steep grade so you would not want to walk but the shuttle service is great.  The snorkeling on site was excellent and easy to use with a large roped off reef area with lots of variety of fish.  Use of snorkeling gear, paddle boards and hobie  cats were readily available and free. They also offer waterskiing, tubing, scuba and snuba for a fee. Both the beach…

title: Tropical Paradise
review: Good Day FrequentTravel24,  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your time at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our setting is truly out of this world and it gives us pleasure to know that you appreciate the magic of this place as we do.  I am thrilled that you enjoyed the activities offered at the resort and that you had the opportunity to visit and enjoy our Rainforest Spa. Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we are happy that you thoroughly enjoyed what we had to offer.  Your comments and business are greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.   Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: 5 Star Service on a 5 Start Property
review: First visit to Caribbean, and not disappointed! The first thing to say is that there's clearly a big difference in reviews of SB during busy and quiet times. We were here in late January, away from school holidays and I would say the resort was about half full as a guess. Which means that all the concerns about sunbeds on the beach, dinner reservations and waits for resort shuttles just didn't apply. Keep that in mind when booking! In no particular order: (1) we were upgraded to a Grand Villa from standard one and it was spacious, comfortable, cool in the heat and kept very clean each day. We were up the hill in the 800s, and so you HAVE to use the TukTuk shuttles - but no delays getting one on demand and we enjoyed the contrast of hilltop privacy vs beach activity when we…

title: Wonderful Resort!
review: Good Day Andrew W,  Thank you for sharing this fabulous review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is a pleasure to read that our resort and accommodations left a lasting and positive impression for all the right reasons.  We are delighted you enjoyed so many of our services and amenities, and you were able to explore all that this beautiful island has to offer. Our culinary team at the Cane Bar will be praised for ensuring you had a wonderful and memorable dining experience there.  Thank you once more for sharing your experience. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Beautiful but poor food experience
review: The Pros:   It is an absolutely perfect property with romantic rooms and 5 star luxury all around!  -The room was PERFECT, it was very clean, spacious and the bed was unbelievably comfortable and soft. We had 2 bathrooms, a great shower with great products, great turn down service and the pool was perfect. It was very romantic and secluded, you don't feel on top of each other  -It is one of the closest hotels to the airport so it is a short ride compared to going up north   -it is one of the only hotels with a beach on the island and an absolutely stunning beach positioned between the 2 pitons.  -The chairs on the beach are super comfortable and relaxing, but make sure you go to the beach early!! they fill up especially if you want to be close to the water. people can purchase…

title: Day visit to this resort: an awful experience.
review: We were staying in another part of the island and wanted to visit this location.  The two Pitons frame this crescent beach and are designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site.  All beaches are public in St. Lucia, but this resort limits your access by having you pay $100 to drive into the resort.  If you choose not to park, you have to leave your car at the top of the hill, and walk in for several miles down a very steep road.   We paid and parked in the visitors lot.  There was supposed to be a shuttle to the resort, but none came, so we walked the remaining mile and a half in, after being hassled by the guard for bringing photo gear. At the beach, we were told that beach chairs were an additional $100 for 2.  Not covered by the original $100 entrance fee.  A staff person also…

title: Wonderful Resort
review: Good Day TimR_LICSW,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry to learn of your disappointments.  I would like to apologize if you were not correctly informed about the parking service and what the process is for non-resident guests visiting the beach. The fee of US$50 per person is to make use of our shuttle service and car park. 100% of this fee can be used as a credit for your food and beverage and is non-refundable.   It is shocking to read that after you paid the shuttle fee you were not provided with the service and had to walk down. Our security team usually earns high praise for their hospitality and service and it is disappointing that this was not the case for you. We have taken your comments on board to ensure that our team members are following protocol and ensuring every guest receives seamless service.  All the beaches on island are public and Sugar Beach is one of the only resorts to have created an area specifically for non-resident guests with lounges and other facilities for their complimentary use. The white canvas sun lounges on our beach are reserved for the exclusive use of our resident guests.   I am sorry that the information was not communicated to you efficiently. Your comments have been discussed with the various department heads to ensure that every visiting guest is satisfied with the services that we offer.   Once again, I am disappointed about the experience you have described. We hope that you might consider a return visit at some point in the future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Sweet Stay at Sugar Beach
review: This is one of the most beautiful Caribbean resorts we're ever stayed at. It has something for everyone. Hiking, water activities, tennis, beaches, children center. Though the food was average (good breakfast and lunches, below average for dinners) for such a high end resort. With that said we will certainly return again with our family

title: A Spectacular Setting for our 35th!!
review: Good Day ericsA5874TT,  We are happy that you had a great time and your stay with us was nothing short of perfection.   It gives us great pleasure to know that you were impressed by our amenities and offerings. We are thankful that we had the opportunity to share this enjoyable and relaxing experience with you.  Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: F&B is this resort’s Achilles Heel
review: From start to finish,the service at this beautiful resort was exceptional. If not for the trip from the airport which is full of scary hairpin turns, this would quickly become my most favorite vacation destination.  Not for a budget conscious traveler.

title: Never sure what to expect
review: After 10 years of being in St Lucia over Christmas & New Years, this year was the most confusing at Sugar Beach.  We do not stay at the resort and will often go down for a snorkel and lunch at the beach bar or restaurant.  We were down a few times with different guests this year.    The first time we went, we were told that we needed a reservation at the restaurant.  Without a reservation, we would have to walk down and walk back up.  No more shuttle service.  So we called while at the gate and made a reservation.  Security was not pleased with us, and delayed letting us through the gate.    The next time we went, we were a group of 5.  Tried to make a reservation prior to arriving and were told no reservations were needed.  This time the story was that a $50 USD per person to…

title: The perfect saty
review: Good Day Sabsong,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I would like to apologize if you were not correctly informed about the process for shuttle and parking for non-resident guests visiting the resort. We will continue to review our service standards in that area to ensure that correct protocol is always followed.  All the beaches on island are public and Sugar Beach is one of the only resorts to have created an area specifically for non-resident guests with lounges and other facilities for their complimentary use. We do not restrict visitors from enjoying the stretch of beach; however the white canvas sun lounges are reserved for the exclusive use of our resident guests.   Once again, I am disappointed about the experience you have described. We hope that you might consider a return visit at some point in the future, perhaps as a resident guest next time.   Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Best Resort for all your dreams
review: The staff was very friendly and helpful at all times there was always someone around to help or answer any questions. Had a wonderful stay the rooms was perfect and kept clean my whole stay, the property is very special and unique with the Pitons on both sides of the property. The view was amazing no matter where you were on the property.

title: Beautiful, elegant resort but pricey !
review: Good Day Mark W,  We are happy that you had a great time and your stay with us was nothing short of perfection. Thank you for your wonderful review and five star rating.  Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we are happy that you thoroughly enjoyed what we had to offer.  Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we hope to welcome you back again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Best resort EVER! We will100% be back!
review: We visited Sugar Beach in November 2017. The weather was postcard perfect as was our entire visit from the beach side elegance and luxury to the grounds, restuarants and amenities.  We were treated like royalty and every small detail was provided so that we felt extremely special guests. While on the gorgeous white sand beach we were pampered and looked after. Drinks were amazing. Best mojito on island and exquisite food items to choose from. If we wanted an excursion it was made available. All the staff were friendly and helpful. We visited other luxury  resorts on the island but were disappointed as they did not compare in any way to Sugar Beach. We would not stay anywhere else again. Mark Sterner the GM was amazing and very available and accessible and made sure all our needs…

title: Best Experience Ever
review: This is our second stay at Sugar Beach within 6 months and we absolutely love the resort, love the food, but most of all love the staff -- they are truly the definition of St Lucia -- One Love.   We have had the pleasure of spending our days with Lisa, Naika, Laferra, Mackenzie, Sherman, Keifa, Swamed, Miguel, Melton, Simeon, Danny, Michael -- just to name a few.  From the shuttle drivers, to the butlers, to the wait staff, to the beach staff -- wherever we explored we didn't find a staff member that didn't treat us like their family.  Chef Toe is an amazing chef -- he made the best dishes using the local foods and seafood we have experienced.  We also had Kiuran, the wine specialist at the Bayside, suggest an amazing bottle of wine each nite -- he was so knowledgeable and…

title: Amazing property! Best beach in St. Lucia
review: Good Day Christopher,  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort a second time. We are delighted to learn that your return visit was as memorable as the first for all the right reasons.  We are delighted that the special touches and attention to detail provided by our team helped to make your stay relaxing and enjoyable. . I will share your glowing comments with the individuals mentioned and commend them for a job well done.They clearly provided those extra special touches that enhanced your stay.   Once again, your loyalty, comments and business are greatly appreciated. We look forward to the opportunity of serving you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great location but the butlers seem to have an agenda
review: Sugar Beach is just a dream! The property is heaven, you're staying in a botanical garden. The villas are ultra lux, homey, and very tasteful. The attention to detail of the staff is at a 6-star level. The butler service is super helpful and friendly.

title: Incredible luxury hotel, food options could be improved
review: Good Day,  We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and thank you for recognizing and acknowledging the incredible attention to detail that goes into creating a relaxing and comfortable atmosphere for our guests. I will be sure to share your feedback with the team.  Thank you once again for your glowing comments and for choosing Sugar Beach.  We hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Belated Honeymoon that was worth the wait!!!
review: The most picturesque location and great views and villas. The butlers set a lot of the excursions up for you through the hotel.. I was told one price by the butler and the price to hike the pitons was more than double what she quoted me on my bill at end of trip. The front desk did reduce  the price when I Complained and So going forward i ordered my taxis through st lucia Taxi and tours instead of the butler for the remainder of trip. Ask for Charles he is wonderful. There were also a few other charges that I did not  have that I caught.  For example the hotel will charge you 103 Dollars to bring you the airport and st lucia Taxi and tours was 65..  You can’t beat the location and Merton at crane bar is fantastic and that is why we went twice to that restaurant. Great sashimi…

title: Sugar Beach St Lucia
review: Fantastic spot with the finest beach in St Lucia. Beautiful place to stay with great amenities and staff. Lots to do, or not do if you just want a relaxing beach vacation. For the adventure seeker you can hike Gros Piton which is very challenging but rewarding.  A true 5 star experience!!

title: Amazing
review: Good Day FMarks16,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It brings us great satisfaction to know that we provided exceptional service and that you were equally impressed by our wonderful white sandy beaches and our location.  Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and we are happy that you thoroughly enjoyed what we had to offer.  Your feedback has been greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Indifference to stolen umbrellas
review: Stayed here in December in a 1 bedroom suite  Beautiful room with the comfiest bed. Huge tv that came out of the unit at the end of the bed. I loved the Buddha iPod docking station  The walk in closet was a fabulous edition and I loved the roll top bath in the bathroom The patio with plunge pool was just amazing with a fantastic view of the piton. My favourite hotel ever.

title: Very nice place, plan to wait, ALOT!
review: Good Day Lucy C,  Thank you for your glowing comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is gratifying to learn that your overall expectations were exceeded. We are committed to providing a high level of service to all of our guests and we are delighted that you enjoyed your time at the resort.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Wonderful place sums it up
review: We arrived around 5 pm this past Sunday night.  We were given a tour of our room by our personal butler and a phone to call a butler 24/7.  Our villa was magical - with a view of the Pitons, private pool and lounge chairs.  We unpacked our bags (including our 2 travel umbrellas that I put in the bedside nightstand) and headed to dinner at the Bayside restaurant (7 pm).  We were in paradise!  Our room keys were delivered at dinner and passport (needed for registration) was laying on the bed (next to the night stand) when we returned from dinner.  We were exhausted from a day of travel and went to bed.   When we woke the next morning I packed a bag to take on our day of exploring the island in a rented car.  That is when I noticed our umbrellas were missing!!  We searched the room…

title: Island Paradise, Best option on the island, favorite spot in Caribbean
review: If you are traveling to St. Lucia you need to do some research regarding property types and location on island.  If the cost of Sugar Beach is in your budget, then this is the spot for you (over the other top 10 properties that are in a similar price range).  Sugar Beach is located about 45 minutes from the airport on the calm west side of the island near Soufriere (means sulphur in French).  The room offerings consist of sugar mill rooms, a few luxury beach front bungalows, and 7 clusters of hillside luxury villas. ROOM: We stayed in villa 502 which was midway up the hillside and offered stunning views of the sea, the Pitons, a private deck and plunge pool.  The villa had a sitting room with refrigerator (stocked daily with water), Nespresso coffee machine and minibar.  The…

title: Amazing, but interesting and expensive
review: Good Day Kpenning,  On behalf of the Sugar Beach A Viceroy Resort team, I would like to thank you for taking the time to post this glowing review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is always gratifying when our guests find our resort as magical as we do.  Not only are we known for our stunning location between the Pitons, we also do our best to ensure that the services and amenities offered are equal to the views. It is pleasing to know that you had a great time and you fully enjoyed our offerings. Our culinary team will be happy with your comments. We will be sure to share your feedback and applaud them for a job well done.  With reference to your comment regarding the zika virus, please know that there have been very few reported cases of Zika in St Lucia. Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort continues to implement our usual daily mosquito and pest control regimen.  Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we hope to welcome you back again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Doesn't get any better!
review: We came here on our honeymoon, and it was really incredible.  Pros:   First class luxury and service. Breakfast was one of the best we'd ever had. Amenities were fantastic. Food was great as well. Nothing spectacular, but better than at other resorts we'd been to on the island.   Cons: - So expensive. Rooms might be justified but food is just too much by 25-50%. Drinks are expensive but at least you only need two or three.  - Oligarchs and New Englanders. We're pretty average yuppies that grew up in rural Canada. The place is overrun with Russian oligarchs coming in on their yachts and loud, complaining, New Hampshirites, so we found the atmosphere to be interesting for sure. Creates sort of a cold vibe between staff and guests since we found most guests to be really rude.…

title: Ideal for a Winter Break
review: Good Day Sam G,  Congratulations newlyweds! Thank you for taking the time to share feedback on your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am delighted that you enjoyed everything from the impeccable service to the delicious breakfast and amenities.  I am sorry for the glitches you encountered and I have taken all of your comments on-board so we can improve in the areas you have highlighted. I am sorry we let you down in this regard.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope the issues you have experienced will not deter you from considering a return visit at some point in the future.   Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Partly 4 - partly 5- Star
review: The setting between the Pitons is spectacular.  The property has a quaint feel, as if you are the only people there.  The rooms are clean and over the top with great appointments.  I can't say enough about the staff throughout the resort!  They make you feel at home and will do anything for you with hesitation.  They are so polite and take great pride in what they do and LOVE their island.  The food is on the highest of scales.

title: Anniversary of a lifetime
review: Sugar Beach is a most impressive destination!!   It’s an expensive option, but our villa was like something out of a fantasy.   Private plunge pool and gorgeous white room with netted bed.   The bed itself was beyond any I’ve ever slept in.   Private butler plans your every need ( if this is your wish).   Every whim is accommodated!    I can’t describe in words the beauty and elegance of Sugar Beach.

title: Heaven on Earth
review: Good Day Dallgirl1948,  Thank you for sharing your glowing feedback about your anniversary stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It gives us great pleasure to know that you were impressed by our offerings and world class accommodations. We are thankful that we had the opportunity to share this enjoyable and relaxing experience with you  Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: The first vacation we were sad to leave!!
review: Sugar Bay Resort is by far one of the best vacation destinations that we have ever been on.  This place is not inexpensive but you get what you pay for as people say.   We stayed in a Superior Luxury Cottage up the hill from the resorts outstanding beach with a view of one of the Pitons from our deck, which included our very own private swimming pool and outdoor table and chairs.   Staff at Sugar Bay are beyond gracious and helpful and never and I do mean never have a hand out for a personal tip.  The Bayside casual restaurant where shorts and casual wear are acceptable offers fine casual dining and the Great Room with a Resort elegant dress code also has very fine dining.   Basically wherever you dine it's gourmet quality.   Beachside offers plenty to do from kayaking,…

title: St. Lucia visit
review: Good Day,  Thank you for sharing your review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort. I am sure other travellers will find it helpful.  We are happy that the Luxury Cottage was perfect for you and the views of the majestic Pitons created a wonderful backdrop for you to create lasting memories.  I am sorry for your disappointment with the location of the resort in terms of walking around the ground or to nearby attractions. Our taxi service is readily available to take you to areas such as the Sulphur Springs or botanical gardens within ten minutes.   I am happy that you did get to enjoy the volcano and the sunset cruise.  The mud bath and sulphur springs are actually at the volcano. Hopefully you will get to experience it on a return trip to Sugar Beach.  Again, thank you for your five star rating. We all look forward to welcoming you back to our beautiful island and resort.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Sugar Beach  - St Lucia
review: The place is magical, such an incredible facility. We were amazed at the grounds and how attentive the staff was. We will definitely be back and recommend this property to all of our family and friends.

title: Lovely resort
review: Sugar Beach resort is a lovely resort. The facilities, especially the accommodations, were quite nice. The whole setting is beautiful. The butler service by our main butler Sherman was fantastic. Only negatives were the need to reserve beach chairs early in the day in order to get chairs under the cover of a thatched umbrella, and the price of the food, in the restaurants, which I thought was exorbitant. $13 to get a bottle of still water in the Bayside Restaurant for dinner was ridiculous.  The cost of the appetizers and entrees in all of the restaurants was way too high.

title: Fabulous Resort
review: Good Day,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Sherman is indeed a remarkable butler and will be commended for a job well done.  Your comments have been taken on board and will be discussed to ensure guests are receiving value for money.  We all look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach to serve you at our best.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Stunning location and facilities, but not quite 5 star service and value
review: The location is spectacular and the service was impeccable.  The beach was lovely and it was great fun to snorkel.  My children had a wonderful time and my elderly mother was completely pampered.  Everyone really enjoyed it.

title: Paradise
review: Good Day Sharon V,  Thank you for your glowing feedback about your family holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We feel proud to know that everyone had an amazing time and got to indulge in all of our offerings.  We hope we can host you and your family again in the near future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: New Year at Sugar Beach
review: We travel to a different island every year and this was our second trip to St. Lucia. The location of this resort is perfection and the views are stunning.  For that, I would highly recommend staying here.  Our itinerary was 3 nights Sugar Beach and 3 nights Jade Mountain- perfect combination.  The facilities, grounds, and rooms are all 5 star.  Love the clean modern, yet traditional decor.  The food was generally very good, probably 4 star as we have had better at other resorts.  The biggest frustration is the exclusions when you pay for the All Inclusive food and drink plan.  I expect certain premium items to be extra (high end wine or lobster).  But here, the majority of the menu was off limits or you pay an up charge.  For cocktails, there were 3-4 options and the rest were…

title: Closed Eyes, Full Wallets, Can't Lose
review: A nice place to stay for 3-4 days expecting you'll end up overspending on fun/ luxury. It feels a little like Las Vegas- you don't care in the moment but the bill is like the movie the "Hangover" without a great story to tell when you leave. The variable pricing on rooms / villas / bungalows, confusing meal plans, additional fees,etc. seems like quite a racket.   It's a very nice place- but come anticipating to keep your wallet open the entire time and not GAF.

title: Best vacation ever!
review: Good Day,  Thank you for your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am sorry that found the resort pricier than you anticipated and that you did not have a clear understanding on our accommodation pricing and associated fees. We hope that if you choose to return to our beautiful resort that you reach out to us directly for guidance. We would be happy to assist you with options that will work better for you.  We hope to serve you again in the not too distant future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: This place is beautiful!
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach St.Lucia this past Christmas break and all I can say is “wow”!  The entire experience was so incredible.  We had a pool villa at the highest point and Karen and Scwarmed who were our butlers for the week, took care of us like we were royalty. They arranged everything for us. They even set up a s’mores night for our children. The scenery is breathtaking.  It is tropical, lush right out of a movie.   Felt completely cut off from the rest of the world. You need to check out the spa no matter what. We will be going back for sure!

title: Lovely property in a unreal location; small fixes would make a big difference
review: Good Day,  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to thank you for sharing feedback about your family Christmas visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am so proud to see that the team members went above and beyond to spoil you with “sugar” and created lasting memories for you and the family. Karen and Swammed will be applauded for a job well done.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Vacation of a lifetime
review: This resort is situated in one of the most beautiful places I have been.  Pictures do not do it justice, you just have to be there to experience it.  Overall, we thought the resort was amazing.  The views from the rooms are incredible and we thought the rooms themselves were really nice as well.  We spend a number of ''happy hours'' on the deck enjoying a glass of wine while the sun set.  We only had a couple a negative instances which were due to some inattentive staff at the restaurants.  Generally the service was really good but you do come across the odd staff member that really seems to not enjoy there job and this can affect the dinner experience.    The rain forest spa was superb and definitely had the best hot stone massage I've ever had (Michelle was the masseuse).   …

title: Honeymoon Part 2 - beautiful setting
review: We stayed 5 nights at Sugar Beach Resort for the 2nd part of our honeymoon (the first 5 nights at Ladera Resort). The difference was big, but we are still glad we did it! It was nice to go from being up high in the rainforest with stunning views, to down by the relaxing beach.  Our room was lovely, a little on the small side perhaps, but nicely decorated and we had an indoor bathtub, and a patio out the back with jacuzzi. When we first arrived we tried to get the jacuzzi working, but it didn't ever get hot, just sort of luke warm, and attracted a vast amount of mosquitoes! So we didn't venture back into the jacuzzi.  Breakfast was amazing - the choice!! I had blueberry french toast with sauteed bananas most mornings because it was SO yum! The views were wonderful overlooking the…

title: Exquisite and Tranquil
review: Good Day Betty Boo,  Congratulations! Thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort as your honeymoon destination.  I am glad you found the options at breakfast delicious particularly the blueberry French toast. The team will be proud to know you enjoyed these meals.  Our rainforest spa is truly out of this world and we are always happy to know that our guests appreciate the magic and beauty of the resort’s surroundings as much as we do.  I am sorry to hear that you had a less than ideal dining experience at the Cane Bar and that you spent two days feeling ill. There are a number of other non-food related factors that could have caused this illness such as a virus or too much sun. It is also surprising that we received no other reports from other guests who also dined at the Cane Bar.   I am sorry about your experience at check out. Had management been aware of your concerns we would have ensured the charge for your meal was taken off and you would not have to ask for it to be removed at check out. I apologise for the inconvenience.  Once again, thank you for taking the time to share your comments. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner, General Manager

title: Location, location, location
review: If you're going to St. Lucia, this resort has the best location, views, and beach.  We were so very pleased with our choice to stay at this resort on our first trip to St. Lucia.  Be ready to relax and enjoy the incredible beauty.  The cottages are numbered, with the higher numbers heading up the hill.  We booked a cottage in the 600's, which turned out to be a perfect location with a great view.  The staff was amazing!  Nylah gave us a fantastic tour of the resort and great tips on our first day, which we would highly recommend.  Restaurants on this property are quite good with nice options.  Food is pricey, so consider a meal plan.  We hope to return to St. Lucia in the future and would definitely select Sugat Beach again!

title: Agree with most of the reviews, both good and bad
review: Good Day AudreyKate,  Thank you for your wonderful review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are glad that we did not disappoint.  Our Luxury Cottages are beautifully tucked into  the mountainside  and provide views of either the Pitons or the sea. I am happy that your expectations were not only met but exceeded. Our team members are truly stars and I will be sure to commend them for ensuring you had a lovely time.  Again thank you for sharing your comments. We hope to welcome you back to paradise soon.  Regards,  Mark Sterner, General Manager

title: August Honeymoon! Billy & Rachel
review: Yes, Sugar Beach has a more than prime location in St. Lucia, Beautiful eye candy all day in between the Pitons. Calm swimming area, and snorkeling also in a Marine Protected Area.  This is a beautiful hotel in an ideal location.  Honestly we only stayed here because of the location- it is absolutely stunning.The bay the hotel is in it's nice and calm with very clear water and some pretty snorkeling along the north side of the beach. The water sports centre has a really nice selection of kayaks and paddle boards and hobby cats for guest use.  The chairs at the beach are lovely and the staff there rush over the bring towels. We did notice though, this visit (we've been here once before) that there definitely were not enough beach chairs/loungers for the number of guests at the…

title: Super relaxing with awsome scenery
review: If you don’t have the time or don’t want to deal with the jet-lag by going all the way to Polynesia or the Maldives than this might be the hidden gem for you. There’s plenty of room for activities, all kinds of water sports, hiking, zip-lining, etc. but you totally don’t have to leave the beach at all. Super friendly staff, service everywhere and they drive you all over the property in the convenient golf carts. Multiple restaurants on-site, great food. Sure, a bit pricey but you’ll love it. Great scenery, great privacy, very romantic. I recommend.

title: Top quality and price for Caribbean luxury - stunning location
review: Good Day,  Thank you for your glowing review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We feel proud you enjoyed your stay and your expectations were met and, in most instances, exceeded. We offer a wide range of activities both at the resort and around the island and it is great to know you enjoyed it all.  We appreciate you sharing your feedback and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best Regards  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Viceroy Sugar Beach - a piece of Paradise!
review: We wanted two weeks in the sun (from UK) in December, picked St Lucia and despite the price chose Sugar Beach.  We got what we wanted and more, absolutely beautiful villa on the hillside overlooking Sugar Beach between the Pitons, with butlers, plunge pool, wildlife and sun.  OK it did rain briefly most days but that helped clear the air and was rarely inconvenient, it usually stops raining about January I understand.    The hotel buildings and restaurants were excellent, the food particularly breakfast was worth having, we didn't do lunch but ate at one of the two restaurants each evening on the half board option (MAP) but paying for all drinks.  This suited us quite well as neither of us drink too much but be warned unless you pay out for the all inclusive option (which still…

title: Beautiful setting nestled between the Pitons
review: My husband and I celebrated our 30th anniversary at Sugar Beach in March (I am late getting this posted).  It was one of the best resorts we have ever experienced.  The location between the Pitons is spectacular - and the property is one beautiful setting after another, pristinely clean and well maintained.  Make sure to take advantage of all the things to do - the short Rainforest walk, the spa (had a couples massage that was great), the beach, the snorkeling (go before 10am to beat the crowds that come in), the fine dining restaurant (wonderful souffles), the pool, the beach restaurant (we ate there 2 or 3 times - fantastic fresh fish), the fitness center (take a tuk tuk up to it to see the view from there), the breakfasts on the veranda, and more.  We stayed 5 nights and did…

title: VERY NICE SPOT
review: Good Day,  Thank you for your glowing review of your anniversary celebration at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.    The resort is truly a magical destination and I am happy that you share the same sentiment. It looks like you thoroughly enjoyed all of the amenities and activities and made the most of the time you spent with us.  Again, we appreciate your feedback and we will be sharing your review with our team so we can improve in the areas you highlighted for attention.   We look forward to welcoming you back to paradise.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Gorgeous beach, good snorkeling, beautiful resort
review: We visited this beach twice during our stay at Hotel Boucan Chocolat which offers a taxi-to boat ride twice daily from the resort.  The setting is spectacular - a soft white sandy beach set between the Pitons.  The non-resort section is small but offers a restroom, lounge chairs, plenty of options for either full sun or shade as well as a couple of local vendors selling drinks and food.  You can also have a bite at the Viceroy’s beachside restaurant which is lovely.  This is definitely a walking beach as well.  Just follow the waters edge along the beach to a stepping stone path which turns a corner and let’s you onto another section of the resort even more beautiful than the first!  The water is shallow and warm for swimming and the snorkeling is quite good as well.  We visited…

title: RACIST AND UNSATISFACTORY EXPERIENCE .
review: Good Day Kim5164,  Thank you for posting your lovely review of your recent day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy to see that you had a wonderful time and appreciated the facilities provided.  We look forward to seeing you again soon, perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: No words to describe Sugar Beach!
review: If you are a black person wanting to experience the beach here for a day, don't even bother. I had the most humiliating and racist experience!   From the trip advisor reviews we were expecting to be able to take the hotel shuttle down to the beach if we bought food at the restaurant, which we were planning to do as we were spending the day. As we park, the guy at the entrance says that all the shuttles are booked and that we needed to walk down. I said that we were planning to have food at the restaurant and he was still rude abd dismissive. I didn't understand how a shuttle that was running back and forth could ever be fully booked. There were about 6 other cars parked by the entrance. We had to walk down that very steep incline for about 20mins to get to the beach. At the same…

title: A gem!
review: Good Day Kimberly B,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I would like to apologize if you were not correctly informed about the shuttle process for non-resident guest.  It is shocking to read your review as our security team usually earns high praise for their hospitality and service. We have taken your comments on board to ensure that our team members are following protocol and ensuring every guest receives seamless service.  All the beaches on island are public and Sugar Beach is one of the only resorts to have created an area specifically for non-resident guests with lounges and other facilities for their complimentary use.   We now have a shuttle and parking fee in place which allows non-resident guests use of our guest parking lot and access to the shuttles. The fee US$50 per person fee paid is fully redeemable at the restaurant.  This new procedure has helped to streamline the experience for non-resident guests who are now given a receipt at the time of arrival to the property to save any confusion about who can and cannot make use of the shuttle service.  We hope that you might consider a return visit at some point in the future to experience first hand the improvements made.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Wonderful Family vacation
review: We went to Sugar Beach, a Viceroy resort in December 2017 for our first visit to the Caribbean. It was absolutely amazingly fantastically magical! From the moment we arrived to our room, the magic started. The room. The view. The butler service. The beach. The management. The food. Everything was perfect. We loved it so much, we rebooked for December 2018! Nothing is too much hassles for the staff. They are friendly, warm, helpful. Just the perfect holiday. Thank you!!

title: Amazing Experience & Location
review: 1. Had a suite in 300s, which was amazing.  All you could see were trees, the pitons and the ocean.  The infinity pool and patio overall was huge and well maintained.  Room itself was very large, well equipped and clean.  Although patio is all yours, it is not 100% private, as it is in front of suite, where butlers and others would need to walk by to get to your front door.  Not a big deal.  2. Butlers were very upbeat, professional and accommodating.  We had Gus and Sherman - again, both very wonderful.  They arranged for excursions, dinners, etc.  3. View is incredible.  4. Direct beach access is very nice.  Other resorts only have a sliver of the sugar beach.  5. Food: Cane bar was awesome!  Sushi was great.  The formal dinning room is also very nice and an elegant setting. …

title: Great location, great beach, let down by second rate service
review: Good Day Hashimmian,  We are happy that you had a great time and your stay with us was nothing short of perfection. Thank you for your wonderful review and five star rating.  Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience with special touches and it is gratifying that you thoroughly enjoyed what we had to offer. Gus and Sherman are truly remarkable butlers, and will be commended for a job well done.   Again, thank you for sharing your feedback. We look forward to serving you again soon.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Outstanding
review: Nothing to add to what others have written about the location and the facilities - we had a wonderful villa at the top of the resort.  Two things let the place down. First, the butler system means that every request goes through an additional layer, to no real purpose, but if you want a dinner reservation You have to ask the butler and they have to make it and call back. If you’ve gone out in the meantime you won’t know until the evening when you are dining. One evening we had the choice of 6pm or 9pm.  Second, the food is OK but twice ours was below par. Once the main was served close to cold -either it hadn’t been reheated for long enough in the microwave, or it was left to stand before being served. The beef kebab I had at the $118 per head BBQ was so sinewy that I couldn’t…

title: Just - paradise. Residence 101, the ultimate honeymoon experience.
review: Good Day Mark T,  Thank you for providing feedback on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are glad that in spite of the glitches that you encountered, you appreciated the wonderful setting and location of the resort.  I am sorry to learn of your disappointments, especially with our butler service. Our team members are generally known for the high level of service they provide. I am sorry if this was not the case during your stay. We will be sharing your feedback with the team, and will continue our refresher training and coaching to ensure consistent luxury service.  It is disappointing that our food and beverage offerings did not match your expectations. It’s a shame your concern was not highlighted during your stay, as I am confident that our executive chef would have prepared dishes to your satisfaction.  Once again we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great location but needs better maintenance and service.
review: I had reservations about visiting St Lucia and Sugar Beach - it seemed so expensive and remote and I don’t usually like beach holidays. The choice of location and hotel was my daughter’s and we agreed to come as it was a special trip for her. All I can say is - how wrong was I?! We stayed in Beach Bungalows 12/13 from 6 - 15 December, which is a 2 bed bungalow though, in reality, it is 2 bungalows joined by a courtyard. Our butlers were Gary and Ethan and they were both lovely - Gary very outgoing and proactive and Ethan had a very calm and relaxing manner. They were a perfect mix and we enjoyed their company. Nothing was too much trouble for them and they provided everything we asked for straight away, as did housekeeping. The accommodation was fantastic and was kept…

title: St Lucia
review: The hotel had great beach access and some of the best beaches on the island, if not the best beach. We were able to try the cottages with plunge pool and the beach units. We were initially placed next to a construction site but, once we complained, management (Lisa Jones) was quick to find us a better alternative beachside. We enjoyed the beach cottages better as they were within walking distance of the beach (no shuttle required) and the restaurants most frequented on property.

title: Near But Not Quite Perfection
review: Good Day Martin A,  Thank you for sharing feedback regarding your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are sorry for the inconvenience you experienced with your first accommodation. I am, however, pleased that Lisa was able to iron out the issue and move you to a Beachfront Bungalow which proved more convenient and in a perfect location for you.  Again, thank you for your comments and for choosing to stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Outstanding experience
review: This is a difficult review to write properly. My wife loved absolutely everything about this resort. For the most part, I share her view. There were some things about the situation of the resort which was less perfect. The "perfects" are 1] the staff which is best anywhere 2] the rooms and plunge pools(though as usual the bed was too soft producing a sleep ditch) 3] the beach and large pool on the property 4] the children's program (we might return with grand kids) 5]concierge services including butlers 6] rapid response to transit requests (the resort is super hilly and you can't really walk anywhere without a ride to get you there).  The biggest so-so for me was the range of food choices. Multiple restaurants choices but not all that interesting. The most upscale restaurant…

title: Location Location Location!! This Place is Paradise Found
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I would like to apologize for the disappointments and glitches that you have described. We pride ourselves on providing the special touches and attention to detail that make for wonderful vacations, but we seem to have fallen short where you are concerned.  I am sorry we let you down in this regard.  We are disappointed to hear of your dining experience at the Great Room. What you have described is not acceptable and will be discussed with the food and beverage team leaders to find out what went wrong so we can improve in this area. Had the chef been made aware of your concerns, I am confident he would have been able to offer an alternate dish from the menu offerings that included fresh local fish. Your comments have been taken onboard so that going forward the menus can be reviewed to offer more variety of fresh fish. I apologise for the inconvenience caused.  I am sorry that the prices of the transfers to and from the resort were more than you anticipated. The taxi rates are set by the respective associations and Government and the hotel has little control over the costs. We do have regular discussions about rates and have been working with the taxi associations to encourage them to set more affordable rates, especially for shorter journeys.  We are sorry that the mosquitoes were a challenge for you. We try our best to keep them at bay by fogging daily and providing mosquito netting in all rooms. Sadly, some of our guests still get bothered by these nuisance creatures.   I am glad that the pros outweighed the cons and you had an amazing stay at the resort. We all are thankful for your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Dinner by the beach
review: We couldn't get to Anguilla due to hurricane damage so we fortunately found this wonderful resort.  Our bungalow was right on the beach so the location couldn't have been better.  the beach itself doesn't compare to the beaches of Anguilla but (despite the rocks) the water was warm and clear.  Lot's of noise and hustle from the water taxi trying to attract customers but it was a small annoyance.  The service was exceptional and the folks who work at the resort were absolutely terrific (Big shout out to Zenith)!! the butler service was spotty at times and the hot tub in the courtyard didn't work and there were a number of lights also not functioning.  Meal plan is VERY expensive and perhaps not worth it.

title: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL SPOT ON EARTH
review: Beautiful beach.  Stunning views.  Lush Mountains.  Fabulous Snorkeling.  Amazing hotel rooms. My husband likes to snorkel off the beach and the Sugar Beach Hotel provides that with a protected marine reserve.  He was able to snorkel several times a day and see several species of fish.  Love the tiki huts on the beach for shade.  On the beach  you are engulfed within the beautiful pitons.  The water is calm and clear.

title: What an Incredible Place!
review: Good Day Joan Y ,  Thank you for sharing your fabulous review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We have embraced our natural setting to create a beautiful and scenic atmosphere for our guests. We are happy you enjoyed everything we have on offer.  Our white sand beaches are the perfect places between the Pitons to snorkel in the marine reserve and take time to enjoy the beautiful under water life. We are happy that your husband had a great time doing just that.  Thank you once more for sharing your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Lives up to expectations
review: W had the most amazing stay at Sugar Beach Resort! Everything was absolutely breathtaking! Stay at least 7 days! anything less it will be hard to leave.  The service received from the get go was outstanding.  Swameed took amazing care of us the whole time! We stayed in the Luxury Grand Villa and it was amazing! We could have stayed here for a year! It was so private and luxurious from the massive patio and infinity pool all the way to the amazing shower and bathroom.  The view of the Piton was visible from our canopy bed in the mornings as we woke.  The view of the ocean was also visible from our pool.  There were many tropical birds that came to visit during the day, and many pretty little tree frogs that came to hang out on the patio with us at night (be careful where u walk…

title: Magbificence
review: Good Day Calegranton,  We are happy to read your glowing review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Thank you for sharing your feedback.  I am thrilled that we were able to exceed your expectations and that you left the resort feeling relaxed and rejuvenated. Our setting is truly out of this world and it gives us pleasure to know that you appreciate the magic of this place as we do.  Our team members are passionate about surpassing guest expectations. Swammed will be happy with your comments and commended for ensuring a wonderful stay.  Again thank you for posting your positive comments. We hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Family holiday with memories to last a lifetime.
review: My wife and I stayed for six nights during the first week of December. The bottom line is that it was an outstanding experience. I have been fortunate to stay in many great places around the world and in the Caribbean, Sugar Beach rates fairly high for me. I would seriously recommend it to anyone looking for a serene, special Caribbean location with a very resort-centered vacation.   Lots to do at the beach, like standup paddle boards, water bike, small catamarans, snorkeling. All free. They had a spa which is an incredible array of tree-houses. While we did not get a treatment, the steam room is available at no charge and is worth giving a go due to its fascinating structure and location.   The service was almost always exceptional - and there is a ton of staff, all…

title: Serene and beautiful
review: I'm actually not a beach lover, in fact back where I reside I stray away from beach visits because it is usually chaotic and dirty. But coming here gave me a new perspective on how lovely beaches can be - this beach was extremely clean, quiet, intimate, and beautiful. A friendly atmosphere, surrounded by mountains and welcoming staff. We stayed and watched the sunset which was absolutely perfect. Very highly recommended.

title: Best Place on The Island
review: Good Day April,  Thank you for sharing your glowing comments about your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We are happy we were able to change your perspective on beach getaways and are glad that you enjoyed the natural surroundings and the sunsets.   We hope to welcome you back to our beautiful resort and beach again soon.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Very nice but not a luxury resort
review: We had a lovely anniversary trip to Sugar Beach recently and I would absolutely say this is the best beach front resort on the island. The service and accommodations are top notch and the location is amazing. The only complaint would be that the food was not what I would expect for the money. The food is about a 3.5-4 out of five stars. The breakfast was a bit bland except for the creole eggs which was basically two poached eggs floating in a bath of tobasco. The dinner that we had at Bayside was not bad but not good enough for the price tag. Our dinner at The Great Room had excellent service and ambiance but the flavor was lacking a little. Again, I am being critical but if there is one area that could be improved here, it would be the food. We loved our dinner at…

title: Beautiful Resort Great Staff
review: Good Day Land Lady,  Thank you for posting these lovely comments about your anniversary stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We have embraced our natural settings to create a beautiful and scenic atmosphere and we are happy you share the same sentiments.  I am sorry that the food costs were more than you anticipated. We try our best offer quality meals that are comparable to our competitors. We have taken your feedback on board and will be sharing your comments with our culinary team so that improvements are made going forward.  Once again we appreciate your review. We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: The kids club is a rare find and made our trip
review: First of all, we had a wonderful time in St Lucia and we think the island and the people are lovely!   Sugar Beach is definitely a nice resort. We had the ocean view grand luxury villa and we were very pleased with our view right next to the piton. Our room was beautifully designed and had all mod cons.   However, we have frequented many luxurious resorts in the past (including the beautiful Four Seasons in the Seychelles last year) and I am afraid that this hotel is just not the same standard.  Although staff were pleasant and hard-working (except for Federica who gave us the second worst check-out experience of our lives!!), they weren't as professionally trained as one would expect. Our butler was lovely and tried hard but the service is just not a professional butler service…

title: It's like paradise
review: We visited the beach three times for a few hours while staying in private house nearby. The staff of the house called in advance and they had chairs ready for us when we arrived at the beach.  When you arrive, the last mile down to the beach is done in a minibus by very friendly drivers.  We enjoyed the great views from the $50 chairs (actually quite a good offer when you want to feel like you're in paradise and have a very relaxing experience). Staff is everywhere to serve you a great cocktail or mocktail -an alcohol free delicious drink. And we could happily leave our belongings at the chair when we went for a swim or go snorkeling  Talking about snorkeling: it's beautiful to go snorkeling near the Petit Piton and see the colored fishes, squids abd coral. You will easily spend…

title: Best place I’ve ever visited!
review: Good Day Robert,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your day visits to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is a pleasure to know that you enjoyed the time spent at our beach and that you and the children enjoyed and appreciated our offerings.   Once again, thank you for your comments and your business. We hope to welcome you back in the near future, perhaps as resident guests next time.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Special birthday trip
review: Sugar beach is by far the most spectacular spot we have visited. It is not only awe-inspiring with its location between the Pitons, but the staff are second to none. We have visited the St. Regis in bora bora and had butler service with our room, but the butler service here is tops. Not only that, but the staff is incredibly well trained and they do not know the word “no”. From the shuttle (Tuk Tuk) drivers to the manager, they are all knowledgeable about everything the hotel has to offer. The sommelier Pascal is fabulous, and, also now a friend. He went above and beyond to care of us at our dinners by offering private tastings, and even delivering spectacular Champagne to us on the beach. Denver, our waiter at the Great Room is beyond amazing and the food is superior. He is now…

title: Simply Amazing
review: Good Day Karl,  I am proud to read that your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort was nothing short of perfection. It is even more pleasing to see that you will be returning in the New Year with your family. We are excited to welcome them to paradise. We are confident they will enjoy the activities at our Sugar Club.  It is gratify to read that you enjoyed everything from our food and beverage offerings to the impeccable service delivered by our team, particularly Denver and Pascal. They will be commended for a job well done.  Once again your comments and business are greatly appreciated. We are looking forward to your return visit.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: WHAT THE HELL !!!!
review: This was our first trip to St Lucia, we spent 4 nights here as we could not stay all week as the owner had his birthday here that weekend( happy birthday Roger!) We loved our time here, we ate in all three restaurants- excellent! Great beach service. Lovely bungalow accommodation, and fantastic yoga tuition( thank you Anson). We were only sorry we couldn't spend my birthday night here- next time !

title: Visiting friends
review: Sugar Beach stands out for the attention to detail and consistently friendly and helpful staff. Food is superb, with good range of choice. The setting is out of this world, nestled between 2 dramatic volcanic mini mountains, the Pitons. Service is excellent: instant availability of free transport around the resort, often in pink tuktuks, butler service for each room extremely helpful and all staff are friendly and attentive. Beachfront is lovely and excellent beachfront bars and restaurants. Decent sized fresh water pool for exercise or lounging.  We stayed in a bungalow which was elegant, well laid out and cleverly designed to be completely private. Views from our terrace were superb. The air conditioning works well.  All in all a top class and brilliant place to relax and…

title: Absolute Paradise
review: Good Day Janet,  We are happy to read your glowing review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Thank you for sharing your feedback.  I am glad that you found our location, amenities and Luxury Beachfront Bungalow perfect for your stay We are delighted you had a great time.  Our team members are passionate about surpassing guest expectations. They will be happy with your comments and commended for ensuring a wonderful stay.  Once again, thank you for your review. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Too high of expectations will translate to disappointment
review: I can't even begin to describe the beauty of Sugar Beach. My husband and I came for 5 days to relax and get away and didn't want to leave. We have never been at a property with such service. Everything is taken care of and everyone is so nice and warm and welcoming. We greatly enjoyed our bungalow and our private pool. Then rain forest sounds and rain showers at night were so wonderful. The beach is on the best spot of the whole island right between the Pitons. We enjoyed breakfast each day and ate at Bayside and Cane Bar both were very good. We want to thank Barnabas at Cane for the amazing drinks and for making me a chicken and rice dish in a primarily seafood / sushi oriented restaurant. He also gave us great music suggestions. Dona and Anitha at the beach each day were…

title: Overrated and overpriced
review: Good Day Islandlife,  Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort is truly the place of dreams.  We enjoyed reading your feedback and I feel proud to see that so many of our team members contributed to making your stay memorable.  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to share your comments.  Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience and it is gratifying that you thoroughly enjoyed what we had to offer. Our team members will be delighted to read your review and to know that the special care they extended was truly appreciated.  Thank you once more for sharing your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Our Honeymoon
review: We rented a 4 bedroom villa. The view was incredibly beautiful! One of the best Ive seen. Having a butler is of coarse amazing but what was missing was over and beyond service that is expected when you spend 40k or so on a 5 day trip. But most underwhelming was the culinary experience. I was expecting it to be at high level but unfortunately it was good but not great!! Tough to say if I’d recommend it or not, but I know I’m glad I went but I won’t be going back! Just too expensive for what you are getting!!

title: The best beach holiday ever
review: After you have stayed at this resort you will never want to go anywhere else! We booked a two bedroom beach front bungalow for ourselves and our teenage daughter. The holiday was a 50th birthday treat for myself. We took a lot of time researching where we wanted to stay in St Lucia and then spoke to the UK Sugar Beach rep to get more information on the various types of accommodation. I would strongly recommend doing this so you get exactly what you want. The resort is located in the bay between the two pitons. Our accommodation was on the beach but some is quite a way up the hillside. There are however little buggies which will ferry you around the resort. Our 2 bed bungalow turned out to be two separate bungalows next to each other with a courtyard in between with small plunge…

title: Paradise- but at a price
review: Good Day Anne,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort to celebrate such a wonderful milestone. We are happy to read your glowing feedback and appreciate your 5 star rating. It is pleasing to read that every aspect of your stay, from the location of your bungalow to the entertainment we offer at the resort, exceeded your expectations.   It gives great pleasure to learn that not only our beautiful setting left a lasting impression on you and your family, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members. They will all be happy with your feedback and will be looking forward to your family’s return.  Once again, thank you for posting these overwhelmingly positive comments. I am sure your review will help assist other travellers when planning their own holiday. On behalf of the entire team, we look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Gorgeous. Private. Expensive
review: We stayed in the sugar mill rooms at Sugar Beach and were lucky enough to be upgraded to a superior room which gave us a large terrace with plunge pool- a very nice area for morning coffee and sitting to relax at the end of the day. On arrival, we were asked if we wanted the plunge pool heated or not (no additional cost by the way).  We requested heated and by the next day- heated it was- however so super heated you could have used the water to make a cup of tea with. It was so hot it was impossible to get in and took 2 further days of daily requests to sort it out before we could safely use it again. This was an annoyance and disappointment for us but would have been a major health and safety issue if we had had children with us. I don't really think our concerns about the risk…

title: Fab Stay again
review: Good Day,  Thank you for sharing your feedback of your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate you sharing your highlights as well as comments about the areas that concerned you.  We take pride in ensuring that every guest has a wonderful and memorable experience, sadly we lapsed on this occasion. I sincerely apologise for the less than perfect service you experienced at the beginning of your stay.   Rest assured that we have discussed your comments with our engineering team to ensure that pool heaters (where we have them) are set at a swimmable temperature. This certainly should have been the case for your plunge pool.  Again I am sorry for the inconvenience this caused and for the fact that you felt your concerns were not taken seriously enough.   I am happy that you appreciated the room upgrade to the Superior Luxury Sugar Mill Room and thoroughly enjoyed the amenities and offerings.   Again I am glad that the pros outweighed the cons and you had an enjoyable stay at the resort. We all are thankful for your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon.    Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Amazing. Would go back any day.
review: The property is stunning. Our villa was beautiful and lovely with its own small pool, a terrace, fabulous outdoor shower, and super comfy bed. Our butler team was very helpful and friendly.   Charming details include the vintage TukTuks that transport guests around the resort and the mini cell phones they give you to call your butler whenever needed. We loved the morning fitness classes overlooking the ocean. Anson and Christopher were great instructors. The staff throughout the resort were all very friendly and helpful.   The maid service was inconsistent and got steadily worse each day of our stay -- not replenishing basics like Q-tips, shampoo or wash clothes. Leaving dirty glasses. Most nights they left water on each bedside table, but not always. When we returned from a…

title: Awesome location
review: Stayed here with my wife for a couple of nights in October. We had a superior villa in section 500's. The villa was beautiful and the views of the Pitons were amazing from all over the room.  The plunge pool was very relaxing and was a great place to spend the day if feeling lazy. The butlers were all very pleasant and definitely were looking out for us.  We had an a/c leak on our last night there but it didn't affect our stay as we were on our way out the next morning and the a/c still worked.  The bayside restaurant was very good and the cane bar was a cool, trendy hangout within the resort. Snorkeling and kayaking were free. The snorkeling was good and we saw plenty of fish with cool colors. Kayaking provided an opportunity to take some pictures of the Pitons from a unique…

title: A Paradise between the Pitons
review: Good Day,  We are happy to hear that your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort was wonderful. Thank you for sharing your feedback about your experience. The pools in our villas offer you true privacy and the option of being laid back in the comfort of your accommodation. We are happy that you were able to relax and enjoy all of the amenities.
