I apologise for any inconvenience caused by the leak in your air conditioning unit and hope that this did not cause a major disturbance to you. I am sorry it was not noted by our team amd repaired before you were allocated the room.  Once again we appreciate you sharing your wonderful feedback. We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Sugar Beach v Jade Mountain
review: After a great time at Sandals Halcyon Beach, we took a winding ride through the mountains to Sugar Beach Resort.  Upon arrival at Sugar Beach, we were in awe of the luxury of the resort. Never in my life have I spent time at a resort quite like this one. The superior luxury villa with infinity pool, butler service(Charles was awesome), excellent food, the general lay of then land(beach, mountain, rain forest), and the feel of being hidden from the world between the Pitons was just breathtaking. In fact, we liked the view of the Pitons so much, that I signed us up to hike up Gros Piton and somehow we both made it up and down the mountain(not for the faint of heart). The level of service given by all of the staff is something I have never seen.  We were at the resort for only 3…

title: The perfect spot for a honeymoon
review: Good Day Aaron R,  Thank you for sharing your glowing feedback about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that Maryann recommended our resort and that we did not disappoint.  It is wonderful that you were able to bask in the beauty and ambience of this beautiful haven. Kudos on climbing the Gros Piton. It’s definitely very challenging and we are delighted that you made it to the top. You surely left with wonderful memories to cherish for a life time.  Thank you once more for sharing your wonderful review. We look forward to serving you again soon.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Still Amazing Second Time Around
review: We were incredibly lucky to have stayed at Sugar Beach and at Jade Mountain on our recent holiday in St Lucia. Both are very different so to help anyone wondering which is the best for you I thought I'd compare them both:  The beauty of Sugar Beach is its location nestling between the twin pitons. The beach is gorgeous, with imported white sand and comfy sun loungers. Service is good and friendly.   The food at Sugar Beach is excellent. Far in away better than JM. Waiter service is probably better too.   We had just a cosy Sugar Mill room at SB, the plunge pool was the size of a jacuzzi. The level of cleaning said room was terrific.   As not a rum lover I found the cocktail list very restricted...as in I stuck to wine and an ok French fizz. (We were all inclusive at both resorts…

title: Second visit even better than the first
review: We visited in Oct with two children 4 and 6.  We were a little concerned that our expectations would be too high after habing a great trip here two years ago. We Shouldn't have worried it was amazing.  One of our favourite things about this resort is the kids club which is right by where you have breakfast. This means you are not trekking half way across the resort to drop kids off. The kids absolutely loved it as the team work so hard to come up with a good schedule and adapt it to suit who they have. It's very much drop in so kids can do an hour or so after breakfast spend most of the day with you if they want and then dip.in again later to get out of the sun.  Staff across the resort are super friendly and helpful with the tuktuk drivers giving extra information on anything…

title: the definition of honeymoon
review: Good Day,  Thank you for posting your lovely review of your second stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted that your second stay here was even better than your first.  The team works hard to provide consistent luxury service and it is always pleasing to read reviews such as yours.  Our kid’s club team are very flexible and they tailor activities to suit the children’s preferences and ages, but always the emphasis is on fun. They will be thrilled with your comments  Again thank you for your glowing feedback, recommendations and for your loyalty. We look forward to welcoming you and your entire family back again soon.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Out of this world
review: My husband and I were staying in St Lucia for 7 nights.  We reserved a house on one of the pitons that looked breathtaking in photos and had great reviews to go along with it.  However, upon arrival at the house we realized that you cannot plan a 7 day trip based on beautiful photos and this house was not all that we thought it would be. There were more than a few unforeseen circumstances that took place and we decided it would be best to move to a resort.  After checking in to Sugar Beach we realized that this is what a honeymoon was supposed to feel like at wished we could get back the 5 days we had lost!  My only complaint about our stay here is that it was not long enough.  This resort thinks of everything.  We felt like we were at home on a beautiful, romantic island.  And…

title: Honeymoon Perfection
review: Good Day,  We are happy that you were able to have a perfect honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort after the hiccups you experienced beforehand. The resort is truly a magical destination and I am glad it all worked out for you in the end.  Thank you for posting your experience and letting others know about the special touches we extend especially for persons celebrating special occasions such as yourself.  We hope to welcome you back for much longer stay next time, perhaps to celebrate your first anniversary.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Perfect Honeymoon!
review: We've travelled to many different destinations but nothing comes close to Sugar Beach. Amazing property, villas, service, beach. This is the most romantic place ever!  Perfect for special occasions. Every little detail is through through--butlers, cell phones, wifi, shuttle, wine cellar. Can't wait to go back.

title: Must love cats & bring lots of money if you plan to eat on the property
review: My mother and I spent a long weekend (four days) of excursions and spa treatments. It was superb!  The property is exquisite, very clean, and well maintained. They spray for mosquitoes regularly, so there were no issues in that area. The villa was beautiful and also well maintained (looked new). Upon arrival the butler (Charles) greeted us and was an excellent resort ambassador. Charles really set the bar as far as being helpful, friendly courteous and genuine. We found almost all staff to be exceptionally friendly and efficient--but not to the level of Charles.  We felt safe and secure at all times on the property and did not have to wait longer than a few minutes for rides around the property.   The main problem with SB was the price of food. It was extraordinarily over…

title: Beautiful location
review: Good Day Cheryl L,  Thank you for sharing feedback regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy you and your mother had a wonderful time and found the staff caring and welcoming, especially Charles.  It is also pleasing to read that Peter reached out to you and ensured that the relevant team members were aware of the issues you were facing. I am proud to be working with such a service oriented team.  We take pride in ensuring that every guest has a memorable experience, had we been aware of your concerns about the cats; we would have ensured that they were kept away from your villa. We do have measures in place to keep our furry friends away from guest areas; however we do have a few cat lovers who tend to feed them at their villas or at their table in the restaurants. I am sorry that this put a dampener on what could have been a flawless stay.  Had we known of your mother’s mobility issues we would have recommended our Luxury Sugar Mill Rooms or Luxury Beachfront Bungalows for your stay. Theses accommodations which have few to no stairs and are in close proximity to most of the resort facilities.  Again I am glad that the pros outweighed the cons and you had an amazing stay at the resort. We all are thankful for your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon.  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Amazing get away from it all experience
review: My husband and I spent a few days at Sugar Beach for a short vacation. First of all the hotel and grounds are beautiful, I don’t know where you would find a lovelier setting. The staff are attentive, from the restaurant to the gardeners. The reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because the prices in the restaurants are unreasonable.  Our first night we got in late and ordered a pizza to be delivered to our room, $24 pizza cost $18 to be delivered. The pizza was just ok, the crust tasted like it came premade, like cardboard. I have to say every other meal was much better. The first breakfast my husband got a juice, we weren’t charged so assumed it was complimentary, so the the next morning I had juice too, we were charged $12 per glass of juice.  Wine with dinner was, I think,…

title: Anniversary In Paradise
review: Good Day Nancy D,  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your time at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our setting is truly out of this world and it gives us pleasure to know that you appreciate the magic of this place as we do.  I am sorry that the food and beverage costs were higher than you had anticipated. We try our best offer quality meals that are comparable to our competitors.   Once again we appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to paradise!  Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Amazing Honeymoon
review: We stayed the week before Christmas and had an amazing time.  The location is truly superb. The two pitons are dramatic, and the bay is sheltered from waves making it lovely to swim in (or float about!). The snorkelling right off the beach is fantastic (including whole shoals of squid).   Our room was lovely and comfortable. We had a separate living area, huge plush bed, walking wardrobe and palatial bathroom with a separate shower.   The service was perfect, attentive and friendly. It was very nice to see that most of the staff, including management, were locals.   The amenities were great, nice large gym, beautiful pool (empty most the day), spotless beach with cabanas. Plenty of activities to do (kayak, sailboat, snorkelling etc). The spa is lovely, a mandatory stop!   The…

title: Best spa ever!
review: We stayed nearby the Sugar Beach resort in a home and visited the resort several times. I wanted to write this review about the Spa. The setting for this spa is extraordinary - huts tucked into trees. You feel like you are in the Swiss Family Robinson with the best therapists ever. We sat in a bubbling pool of warm volcano water afterward and sipped bubbly and enjoyed local St Lucian chocolate truffles afterward. Pure bliss...

title: Amazing get away
review: Dear Marrieddownunder Thank you for your fantastic feedback about our Rainforest Spa. We agree, there are few experiences to match the special couple’s treatments we offer in our couple’s cabana.  I will share your comments with the staff at the spa who I know will be thrilled.  Thank you once again for your review and we look forward to seeing you again soon. Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Blissful holiday at Sugar Beach
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach for a five day getaway from the UK.   Although it was the rainy season the weather was very hot and mostly sunny, with a few torrential showers, but nothing that got in the way of a relaxing holiday.  We had a beach bungalow, great room and would recommend being on the beach. Great butler service, everyone extremely happy to help and very polite.   Hotel is well appointed. Great beach, huge pool (which is almost always empty). Good selection of DVD's to relax to in the evening.   Staff extremely attentive and nothing seemed too much trouble.  Spa is in the rainforest, good selection of treatments.  Gym is well appointed and quiet. Good tennis courts with floodlights.  For a luxury chill out this is spot on.   Things they need to work on:  1. You get…

title: Overpriced for St Lucia
review: Dear Farmerted, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to share your comments about you get away to Sugar Beach, AViceroy Resort. It is always a pleasure to share reivews such as your with the rest of the team. I have noted your recommendations and want to let you know we are already working on the issue with the watertaxis, and I will speak to the spa about dimming the lights in the treatment rooms to make them more conducive to relaxation. Your comments about the price of food are also well-received. We do a lot of market research and analysis involving our competitive set elsewhere in the Caribbean and I can tell you our prices are either the same or lower than other 5 star properties. We also focus a lot on food quality to deliver an offering I am particularly proud of. I am delighted you enjoyed the pre-departure laundry service that we offer to guests booking a Grand Luxury Villa or higher room category. There’s nothing worse than having to return home to stacks of washing. We would rather your return home with a lovely reminder of our sugar Beach hospitality!  Thank you once again for your feedback. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again. Best regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Superb!!
review: Thank you to all the amazing staff at Sugar Beach for making our holiday and my birthday celebration so special.  The staff at this hotel work ceaselessly to ensure their guests are happy. It is also very pleasing to see that they are happy also, genuinely so, unlike some other hotels we have stayed at where good service can be delivered with a fake smile. We stayed in "sugar mill 7", private & secluded, with no need to get transport because you're close to restaurants, pool & beach. The space in these accommodations is perfect for couples, with the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in! The beginning of our stay met with a little brush from Hurricane Maria. This did not spoil our holiday at all, & the hotel management & staff worked hard at ensuring as normal a service as…

title: Most beautiful trip of my life
review: I recently stayed at this resort this summer for a summer get-away and loved it.  When arriving the staff is very welcoming.  The view was absolutely stunning, and the beach was a paradise dream come true. I stayed for about 2 weeks and wished I stayed for much longer.  The food was amazing and super fresh.  I would give this resort 6 stars if I could.  The staff works from early in the morning to very late at night to ensure that you are very relaxed and are having the best stay possible.  The two beautiful Piton mountains in between the resort and the lush rain forest was an amazing view.  Everything in this resort is perfect, I recommend the gorgeous snorkeling right off the beach, the fish and corals was a sight you can’t miss. I would totally recommend staying at this…

title: Romantic First Class Experience
review: Good Day Renee,  We are happy that your get away trip to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort exceeded your expectations.  Thank you for posting this great review and for your 6 star rating!  We are always pleased when our team members' passion and warmth creates wonderful and lasting memories for our guests. It is also delightful that our surroundings and location added to the magic you experienced.  We hope to see you again soon.       Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Amazing stay, can't wait to return
review: Tropical, lush, private, non commercial , Service driven and location, location,location! We've traveled the world & been to most Caribbean islands but fell in love w Sugar Beach & St Lucia!  Our trip to Anguilla was cancelled due to hurricane Irma damage & our travel agent suggested Sugar Beach. The resort is mostly villas (we stayed in 607) and I loved this layout which makes your stay private /quiet. No long hallways or main hotel feel. The beach is perhaps the best I've been to. Note: you will take a tuk tuk to get anywhere on property. Not really walkable but butlers will call for a ride . Calm waters on that side of island and temp was perfect. No shortage of tiki umbrellas and lounges on the beach .  Full sun all day long even though weather forecast called for rain each…

title: Our honeymoon of our dreams
review: Good Day Kona,    We are happy that you have found your new home away from home at Sugar Beach.   Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience celebrating your 25th anniversary with us. Your glowing feedback is particularly gratifying bearing in mind we were not your first choice when planning this important occasion. We are happy we could play our part in making up for the disruption to your original travel plans as a result of Hurricane Irma.   I am happy to see that almost every aspect of your stay was perfect and you were able to relax and soak in the sun.   Again thank you for sharing and we all look forward to your return.      Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Absolutely Sublime
review: This is the most stunning resort I have ever stayed in. We were warmly greeted at reception and offered a cocktail and cold towel. One of our butlers, Sher, met us there and took great care of us the next 5 days. Our other butler, Michaela, also went out of her way to make sure our stay was perfect. Both worked so hard and made us feel so at home and comfortable, I can't say enough good things.   We stayed in Sugar Mill 2 (an upgrade from our original booking, thank you Sugar Beach!) Our room had an amazing terrace with a great view of the ocean and the Pitons. We also used our courtyard plunge pool everyday.   All the staff are friendly and greet you as you wander the property. My boyfriend and I were a little lost in the dark (it's very dark for us city folk -ha), and one of…

title: Wow wow Wow
review: What an amazing place. Where shall we start. The staff are just fabulous and so inviting, they make you feel at home immediately. The tuk-tuks are a really individual and excellent idea what a unique way to travel around a world class hotel. The villas are simply perfection, they are immaculate the beds are the comfiest I've ever slept in. The food is absolutely to die for; you must try the piton battered fish burger. The Cane Bar sushi is delicious as well. If you've got time book a table at the Great Hall, a la carte dining at it finest, a taste of Saint Lucia in every mouthful. The location is lush you couldn't get a more beautiful place on earth. A brilliant day out would be climbing Gros Piton, yes it's hard work but the view is rewarding when you reach the top. Again I…

title: A Tropical Caribbean dream.
review: Good Day Cammy G,  Thank you for your fantastic review of your stay at Sugar Beach A Viceroy Resort and thank you for giving us a 5 star rating.  I am glad to read that every aspect of your stay was great and that you are recommending our wonderful resort to others.  Our Food and Beverage team were very proud to read your comments and are happy that you enjoyed your dining experiences.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach to have yet another amazing stay.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: EXTREMELY DISSAPOINTED!!!!!!!
review: A sea full of rainbow fish, vivid gardens of paradise, lush tropical rainforests, tiny hummingbirds, almonds & mangos plopping from the trees.  Coconut, rum, cola & ice, ice baby. Demerara Sugar beach, raked & perfect. Lounging lizards pampered & preened. ....everyone should be treated to this place at least once in their lives... I was lucky enough to visit...I hope that you will be too,

title: Amazing hotel - location, service, accommodation
review: Good Day Katie,  Thank you for appreciating the magic of this place as we do. It is heart-warming to read your review and to know that your visit to Sugar Beach has left a wonderful and lasting impression.  We hope that you will return to our beautiful resort again so you will be able to enjoy a full experience of all that we have to offer.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Honeymoon in paradise
review: We went to Sugar Beach with another couple on their recommendation for our Fifth Anniversary.  We stayed at Jade Mountain last year (see my review) and fell in love with St Lucia and were very excited to return.  We booked a deluxe ocean view villa at the cost of around $1,200 a night.  The couple we were traveling with booked the same type of room.  While the physical room was nice in no way was the view an "ocean View".  At best it was a partial ocean view from one corner of the deck.  The room our traveling companions in had an amazing view.  We asked to be moved and we were moved after 3 nights to a room with a better view but no adjustment to the cost was given to us.    The rooms were nice but all three rooms had big ant issues on the outside.  Big swarms of ants could be…

title: Exquisite location, Immaculate accommodation and Dedicated, friendly team
review: I travelled to Sugar Beach with my daughter, aged 9 (We got back last week) and it really was a delightful place. I would have no hesitation in recommending it.   The location is unbeatable, I've been to the Caribbean many times, and St Lucia a couple of times, and this is by far the most picturesque location I have seen there. Stunning beach, right between the pitons, with crystal clear water and a glorious swimming pool. Idyllic!!  The Villa's were beautiful. We stayed up in the 700s, in a Grand Luxury Villa, and it was really very nice. Loads of space, immaculately clean, with a spectacular view, really couldn't fault anything at all about the location, again - up amongst the best i've seen in the Caribbean.   The service, for us, was really wonderful. I'm never going to be…

title: Beautiful week-end away
review: Good Day,  Thank you for this fabulous and extensive review of your holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It gives great pleasure to learn that not only our beautiful location and setting left a lasting impression on you and your daughter, but also the special care and attention provided by our team members. They will all be happy with your feedback and will be looking forward to you and your daughter’s return.  Your recommendations will be taken on board and will be reviewed as required. Thank you for letting us know where we can improve.  Our Grand Luxury Villas are indeed the perfect choice for families as they include a spacious master bedroom, a separate living room with a pull out sofa bed and tasteful unpretentious furnishings. We are glad that it perfectly suited your needs.  Thank you once more for your wonderful comments. We all look forward to welcoming both of you back soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Engagement trip
review: Gorgeous island,friendly helpful people. They welcome tourists. Sugar beach villa out of this world( private plunge pool). I looked at all other high end choices and was very happy I chose Sugar Beach. Butler always available( Sherman and Gus couldn't have been better). Whole resort top of line. Best beach location on island. Roads steep and curvy. I normally rent a car and drive wherever we go, hired a car and driver for the day and it was worth it. Would definitely go back, but must know resort is very laid back, quiet, and romantic. No place to "kick it". Just went in august(off season) but Sunday nite it was my wife and I and one other couple in the beach bar.  Not complaining though, as this was what we were looking for. Super Dave a must for car/cab driver.

title: Amazing
review: Good Day Dee and Heather,    Thank you for your glowing feedback about your get away trip to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are known for our world class accommodation, facilities and the top-flight service that we deliver and it’s good to know you had a great time.  I am glad you were happy you chose Sugar Beach. Our team members will be delighted to read your review.  We hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Excellence in paradise
review: We spend almost 2 weeks in Saint Lucia 1/2 of the time in jade Mountain wich is an amazing hotel up in the mountains I post some pictures of our amazing room then we move down to sugar Beach this 2 places are just amazing and you can compare them with sugar you get the best of the Beach with amazing service and view you have you're personal phone so you have you're butler at you're service directly and you have an amazing view of the pitons

title: Charming Quick Get Away
review: Visited Sugar Beach for a long weekend in July. Stunning property and friendly staff. Charming rooms/ decor. Only down fall was the food was very expensive and not that vast of a selection for the price. Most disappointed in the beach BBQ dinner that was over $300 for chicken squires... wish that we ventured out to a local restaurant to experience the local cuisine at a reasonable price. We did pre book sugar boat charters half day excursion that was amazing! Captain Mario was knowledgeable and very accommodating.   Picked us up right at Sugar Beach pier. Visited Jade Mountain for lunch (highly recommend). Wonderful weekend getaway!

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: Good Day,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your weekend getaway at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate you sharing the highlights of your stay as well as the areas that concerned you.  I am happy your overall stay was good with the exception of the disappointment that you highlighted with our food prices. . We are continuously looking for ways to improve in this area to ensure that all our guests are always happy and satisfied and that the dishes served offer true value for money. I apologise for the disappointment and the inconvenience.  We are pleased that you had a great experience on the half day excursion and that the boat captain helped create wonderful memories.  Thank you once again for your comments and your business.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: What an amazing Hideaway in Paradise!
review: Loved the hotel, the service was perfect. Food and beverages are very expensive and restaurant service is a week point of the experience. We had to ask for utensils, napkins, wasabi and soy after they brought us our sushi.

title: bliss
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am glad that you had a wonderful time at our beautiful resort and that our amenities and surroundings met your expectations.  We usually receive high praise for the exceptional service provided at the Cane Bar restaurant, I am sorry that this was not the case for you. Your feedback will be shared with our Food and Beverage Director to ensure we always deliver consistent service that goes beyond guests expectations.  Once again, thank you for your business and your comments. We appreciate your feedback as a valuable tool in our efforts towards maintaining the high standards we pride ourselves on. We look forward to serving you again soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Beautiful hotel run by dedicated staff
review: I would give 6-stars if I could! Imagine the perfection union of rain forest and pristine beach all cloaked in luxury at level 10! Private Pool rooms and Butler service are only other backdrop to this wonderful resort. We met great people from all over the world but also felt totally detached and private when we wanted to. Here are a few tips for your visit:  Spa for couples - If you are going as a couple please please please get the Romantic Renaissance  package. You will NOT be disappointed!  We had a Private Dinner (meeting with head chef and sommelier Alessandro to set the menu)  - wine selection impeccable - Vegan accommodations for my wife were outstanding - Linus our server was priceless!  Beach and water - crystal clear - Super warm - Calm cove/lagoon between 2 gorgeous …

title: Trying too hard
review: I get that when you have a 5 star rating you need to be special. But in a good way.  This hotel tries to be special by being extremely expensive for the sake of it and then let's you down on silly little things.  It's also so pompous at times.    We stayed here 2 weeks for a very special occasion and really wished we'd gone somewhere cheaper and spent the saving on better flights.  Firstly you pay a lot and then a lot more for a meal plan then even more for a service charge added to that before you even arrive. The big shock is that when you get here there is really limited choice for eating, and that food plan you just paid an arm and both legs for - really it's several thousand for 2 weeks - is not all inclusive after all. If I want a steak I have to pay extra.  I can choose…

title: Amazing hotel
review: Good Day,  Thank you for providing feedback on your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It would appear from your comments that you did not receive the best and most reliable luxury service and for that, I am truly sorry.  I would like to apologize for the dissatisfaction you highlighted with the price of the all-inclusive meal plan and the supplemental charges for some items.  Your feedback is well received and will be discussed with our Food and Beverage Director to see whether we are able reduce the number of dishes with supplemental charges.    Had we been aware of your concerns, our executive chef would have met with you to discuss preparing other food options. We are continuing to review our menu options to ensure that our guests are provided with the best possible service and value for money.  Our aim is to ensure that we offer intuitive service without being invasive. I am sorry that the manner in which you were served felt intrusive and overwhelming. Your feedback will be discussed with the relevant heads of departments so we can implement refresher training where needed.  Thank you once again for your review and we hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: The non all inclusive all inclusive package
review: We have just returned from Sugar Beach. It was the perfect holiday for us, with Sugar Beach a faultless operation.   Room: We stayed in a luxury villa which was beautiful, spacious, and elegant in its decor, we especially liked our personal outdoor hammock.   Staff: Nothing was too much trouble, they are warm and welcoming from the cleaners to the chefs. The butleres (Gus and Sherman) were both excellent and joy to be around. The staff here do not only meet your every need but anticpate it e.g. I mentioned to my husband I couldn't read the dinner menue and within seconds, a waiter appeared with a selection of reading glasses in a variety of strentgths - astonishing service adn attention to detail.    Food: Breakfast was great, cooked on demand, plus a good buffet. I loved the…

title: Anniversary Celebration
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your glowing feedback about your family vacation at Sugar Beach.  We are happy to read your comments and know that our services and amenities exceeded you and your family’s expectations. We know how important it is for our younger guests to be comfortable and relaxed in our environment and it is wonderful that she was able to experience the kids club.  I am proud to be working with such a warm, caring and service-focused team. They will be happy with your comments and commended for ensuring a wonderful stay. Once again, thank you for your review. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Let Down by Poor Restaurant Choice
review: Great location, absolutely stunning, friendly staff, good accommodation but why does an all inclusive package only cover 1% of the wine list and not sparking water. Just a shame that the management have spoilt things by being so greedy

title: Honeymoon trip to St.Lucia
review: Our honeymoon was nothing short of a dream. From arriving at the airport meeting your driver and arriving at the resort. The roads in are not bad, little curvy but nothing you can't handle. Our Butler Wynel was amazing, we didn't have to lift a finger most of the trip. Our food was excellent, we were glad to be on the all inclusive plan so we didn't have to worry about the food prices which could be a little high. Cane bar is awesome, the carribbean bbq was amazing! The movie on the beach was a really great touch, there's a little something for everyone. The raining day agenda was great, we felt like we didn't miss anything even though it rained. All the excursions were fabulous, the sunset cruise was memorable we saw dolphins and a rainbow! Sulphur springs was amazing ended…

title: Serenity at it's Best!!!
review: Good Day,  Thank you for posting your glowing comments about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   It gives us great pleasure to know that the special touches and attention to detail provided by our team helped to make your stay memorable for all the right reasons. I will share your comments with the team and commend them for a job well done (Wynel in particular).  It is also gratifying to read that even on the day we had inclement weather you were able to enjoy the rainy day schedule of activities.   Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back in the not too distant future, perhaps even for a first anniversary celebration.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Wow!!! Service, Views, and Amenities
review: We traveled to St. Lucia and stayed for 8 days @ Sugar Beach in August, 2017.  My husband and I were married in St. Lucia @ Sandals La Toc 11 years ago.  So this time we returned to the island with 2 kids.  So I searched for a luxury family resort and Sugar Beach was it.  My kids wanted the rainforest and the beach and Sugar Beach provided both.  The beach is well maintained and service is superb...Noah was our beach butler and very friendly and attentive.  The burgers and coconut shrimp were delicious!  The room and patio...OMG was gorgeous and spacious for a family of 4...room 804.  Our butlers, Sherman and Gus, pampered us to where I cannot put it into words.  Our girls were celebrating the swim championship from the US and Sherman surprised the girls with balloons, cookies,…

title: Absolute Paradise - behind words
review: Good Day,  We are happy you chose Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort for your return trip to St Lucia. Thank you for sharing your glowing feedback.  We pride ourselves on delivering the highest level of customer service in every aspect and are delighted when we read balanced reviews such as yours. It is gratifying to read  that you had a great time and enjoyed everything we had to offer—from our stunning rainforest setting and white sand beach  to the delicious dishes in our restaurants.  I am pleased that you were well taken care of by our team members. I will be sure to share your review with them and commend them for a job well done.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business, and for considering a return visit in the not too distant future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great Service Comes With a Smile
review: Just got back from a ten day honeymoon at Sugar Beach and so glad we were able to experience this property.   Spent our trip in a Grand Luxury Villa which was more than you could ever ask for...room(s) were gorgeous.   Private plunge pool, patio and absolute gorgeous view of Pitons.  Private butler Charles took care of everything - restaurant reservations both on and off site, taxis, food etc...you must visit Ladera resort for dinner as well as Boucan...both exceptional.  The beach seems to be best on the island and never too busy.   Always have a spot to spend the day.  Did every tour possible including a private day on a catamaran....made for a memorable honeymoon.  Oh and the couples massage with private pool is a must...we did it twice!  Make no mistake, this property…

title: Utopia in St. Lucia
review: Where do I start? Arriving to Sugar Beach Viceroy resort we were greeted with cool towels & an Island cocktail. We were taken to our room and greeted by our butler Swamed and given an orientation. Yes I said our butler, he was hands on from everything from calling transportation, bringing me lemon & honey for my sore throat and making sure we were stocked with H20. Ok now the room, picture walking in to one room with a living area with "welcome" spelled out with leaves. The bathroom very roomy, huge tub. The bedroom was gorgeous with the view to our private pool and you guessed it a view of the Pitons. Picturesque!!! The service 5 star, the restaurants 5 star, the employees 5 star!! The beach gorgeous your actually swimming between the Pitons. Oh yeah the sunsets are amazing! It…

title: A day at the beach
review: Good Day,  Thank you for posting your glowing comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Our resort is truly unique in its settings and I am glad that you had the opportunity to experience it firsthand.  I am delighted that Swammed went above and beyond to provide exceptional service to you especially when you were not well. Our team members will be commended for a job well done, particularly the individuals mentioned.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Paradise between the Pitons
review: A friend and I were staying nearby outside Soufriere and decided to treat ourselves to a little beach luxury for the day.  We took a water taxi from a different beach (Anse Chastenet, also a delightful spot) to this incredibly beautiful beach between the Pitons.  There is a public portion of the beach, but the area kept up by the resort is immaculate and comfortable, with lots of beach beds, palapas, and service from the bar.  Renting the beach chairs was about 50$ a chair for the day, and the prices on the menu were what you'd expect from a resort like this, but my friend and I were happy with 5$ local Piton beer and the gorgeous views.  The restrooms were available to use near the pool and clean, air conditioned, and well-appointed.  The staff were excellent, accommodating,…

title: Beautiful Resort....need to be more detailed
review: Good Day,  Thank you for sharing your feedback about your day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted that you chose to visit our resort for the day and we are happy that you enjoyed our beach and the facilities we offer.  Once again, thank you for your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon, perhaps as a resident guest next time  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Great resort, and THANK YOU to the staff!
review: After a winding road trip from the airport we arrived at paradise!  We had a rocky start as our iPad (which is your link to the resort and its activities) was not operating and it did take 24 hours to get it fixed but once that problem was behind us we had an unforgettable 5 day stay. We opted not to do the all inclusive plan and this worked for us as we are not big eaters and drinkers. Having said that I never really  understood if the water at the beach was free to all inclusive or free to all .  We just brought water from the room.  The beach was small but picturesque and even though considered a public beach it was very private.  A shout out to the coconut man as he is the charm of the beach! Hilltop yoga and pilates were amazing! Rainforest spa was relaxing and very well…

title: Beautiful escape
review: service is top notch, food is excellent and rooms are beautiful , spacious and comfortable. Celebrated my anniversary and the staff made it extra special. good water activities and relaxing beach front.

title: Best beach we went to
review: Good Day,  We appreciate you sharing your feedback about your anniversary stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We pride ourselves on delivering the highest level of customer service in every aspect and are delighted when we read reviews such as yours.   Once again, thank you for your comments and business, and for considering a return visit in the not too distant future.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Best Resort Staff
review: Luckily for us we were informed early on our holiday that every beach in St Lucia is a public beach so even if you are not a guest of the hotel you can use it for free. Unlike other beaches on the island, they have beds here you can also use for free which was great. There is a shuttle that takes you down as the hill is a bit steep, which I discovered walking back up when the other half couldn't be bothered to wait for a shuttle at the bottom (it takes 2 mins). The beach is stunning- in between the two pitons it is truly beautiful. There is a great snorkelling area where the free beds are also. We decided to get a water taxi tour where they took us to made chastanet, the bat cave at soufriere and snorkelling beneath the Piton. We did have to pay for this but was worth it. Loved…

title: Good outweighs bad
review: Good Day,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your recent day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is a pleasure to know that you enjoyed the time spent at our beach and that you appreciated the facilities provided.   We look forward to seeing you again soon, perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: An amazing resort!
review: We stayed here for two nights in a Luxury Villa at the end of July. This resort is beyond beautiful. The room exceeded all expectations. Private butler and plunge pool didn't hurt either. The food was amazing. What made this hotel my #1 of all time was the staff. Every single person was professional and genuinely friendly. Met the sweetest old man from the island who sold coconuts along with his dog Lucy at the beach . If you stay at the resort, buy a coconut from him! Love that the staff allows him to be there. Things people take for granted every day mean so much. Love this resort for so many reasons!

title: Wonderful resort!
review: We've just returned from 10 days & wish we'd stayed longer.  This resort is luxurious but not pretentious.  Our 2 bed villa was ideal & extremely spacious with beautiful views.  Every single member of staff went out of their way to genuinely make our stay relaxing & special whether it was in the restaurants, bar, water sports centre or the spa (which is wonderful by the way).  Having our own butler was such a treat!    We were predominantly at the resort for diving and we were extremely impressed by the dive centre as well as the other water sports available.    Highly recommend the All Inclusive package as prices in the resort are high.

title: A form of escape
review: Good Day,  We appreciate you sharing your feedback about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is a real pleasure to learn that your stay was memorable for all the right reasons. Our facilities, amenities, accommodation and the activities we offer are world-class and we we are happy that you thoroughly enjoyed what we had to offer.  Our team members are naturally warm and friendly people. I am delighted to hear that they positively contributed to your stay. They will be commended for a job well done.  On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best Regards,  Mark Sterner General Manager

title: Love this property
review: Visited St Lucia for the 5th time and decided to stay at the sugar beach. Incredible!  Points to note: 1)The hotel itself is situated about 2hours from the airport 2) sits between the pitons and absolutely scenic 3) own personal butler and bungalow with private pool area 4) shuttles at request to breakfast room and beach 5) no rush for loungers as plenty available 6) Food is phenomenal 7) boat trips available. We booked privately as it worked out way too expensive with the hotel and got one for much cheaper ourselves. Went out for the day in a catamaran! RECOMMEND 8) went with brothers but more seems to be a honeymoon spot. Would spend max a week here

title: Amazing time at a beautiful place
review: Good Day,   Thank you for taking the time to share your Sugar Beach experience on this forum. We are happy you chose to stay with us this time around and are pleased that you and your brothers enjoyed our one of a kind location.  Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort caters for all kinds of travellers, from honeymooners to families as well as persons travelling for business.  I wish to clarify your point regarding the distance from the airport. Our resort is 45 minutes away from the international airport and about an hour and a half from the regional airport.   We are delighted our location, service and amenities exceeded your expectations. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming all of you back at some point in the future.  Best regards, Philippe Larrieu Resort Manager (On behalf of the General Manager)

title: Sugar Beach is sweet enough..
review: Love this hotel. Visited with my fiancé last year around April. We booked one of the bungalows with private pools. The best thing about tbis property is the butler service they give you walkie talkies to page them anytime during your resort it was the epitome of service. I love beef tartare and they didn't have it on the menu and hey made it especially for me and til this day one of the most amazing Tartares ever! Chef amazing!

title: Heaven on Earth! The Perfect Vacation!!
review: My wife and I celebrated our 25th wedding anniversary with a 10-day stay at this outstanding resort. We've traveled many places around the world but very few have provided the perfect vacation. The location, nestled between the Petite and Gros Pitons, was magical. We had the best food, incredible scenery, outstanding weather...I could go on and on but you have to see it for yourself.  We began our stay being greeted in the open air lobby with tropical drinks and St. Lucia hospitality. Once the transport to our villa arrived, a small propane-powered 6-person carriage that scoots you up and down the formidable hills of the resort our  acation egan. We quickly reached out villa, room 710, and the real feel of luxury and relaxation settled in. The room had a king size bed with very…

title: Amazing and beautiful resort - enjoyed every day
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post this extensive review of your 25th anniversary stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   It gives us great pleasure to know that the special touches and attention to detail provided by our team helped to make your stay memorable for all the right reasons. I will share your comments with the individuals mentioned and commend them for a job well done.  We do have one of the most unique settings in the world, and it’s gratifying when our guests appreciate the superb surroundings and gorgeous rainforest location as much as we do.  Congratulations on making the Piton summit. Climbing Gros Piton is a tough hike and it must have made you smile when you returned to Sugar Beach and looked up knowing you had conquered the mountain.  We are truly looking forward to welcoming you back for many more anniversary celebrations to come.  Thank you once again for your comments and your business. Best regards  Philippe Larrieu Resort Manager (On behalf of the General Manager)

title: Amazing honeymoon resort!
review: Taxi ride from airport was arranged by resort. The ride from airport was a bit long with many ups/downs and curves. We were taken directly to Villa which was nice and greeted by the butler ‘sherman’. Villa was very clean and it had a great pool with view of ocean and piton. We were unexpectedly upgrade by the resort – a nice surprise. We enjoyed our beach time. Beach Staff came by daily with free fruit water, sunglass cleaning and fresh fruit to snack on – a nice treat. Beach chairs and grass hut for shade were excellent. Enjoyed dining in the Great Room! They had excellent food and service. Breakfast was included in our plan (booking via Sugar Beach web site) which helped with the cost. We either walk to beach (we were in 300) or were picked up by Tuk-Tuks or shuttle vans. We…

title: Snorkelling at Sugar Beach
review: Good day,  Thank you for posting your glowing comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  On behalf of the entire team, we are delighted you enjoyed your week-long vacation and that you appreciated the upgrade we were able to extend to you.  Once again, thank you for sharing your feedback and for choosing Sugar Beach. We look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best regards  Philippe Larrieu Resort Manager (On behalf of the General Manager)

title: Sugar Beach Elopement
review: I couldn't have imagined a more perfect honeymoon resort thanks to sugar beach! The location is incredible! We stayed in one of the villas - the private pool was amazing! The staff are extremely helpful and friendly! Only downside was price for food - quite expensive!

title: Paradise in the mountains!!!
review: Sugar beach a victory resort is stunning. It's tucked into the mountains and is pure bliss!! The rooms are beautiful. We stayed in the grand luxury villa and it exceeded all my expectations!!! The cleanliness, the comfort (beds and pillows were amazing) the views, the service. Everything was amazing and I couldn't be happier! I will be returning and telling everyone I know!

title: 4.5 out of 5 stars.  Gorgeous resort to relax...
review: Good day  It is always gratifying to read reviews such as yours and to know you fully enjoyed the accommodations, service and location of Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort during your recent stay. Thank you for taking the time to post your glowing comments and for recommending our resort to other travellers. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best regards  Philippe Larrieu Resort Manager  (On behalf of the General Manager)

title: Amazing 10 year anniversary trip
review: This resort is absolutely beautiful! Upon our arrival, our room was upgraded to a luxury grand villa for our 30th wedding anniversary. Apparently, June begins the rainy season there; and it rained during much of our 6-day stay (June 29 - Jul 4), but we still had a great time! The view of the ocean, and the piton mountains is breath-taking. The room was clean, very comfortable, with a simple yet sophisticated design.  Nice deck with private pool and siting and lounging area.  The resort staff including our personal butler, resort drivers, restaurant staff, reception desk staff were all friendly, and accommodating. My husband and I had a Rain Forest spa, went snorkeling, kayaking and a few off-resort activities/tours to visit nearby cities, Sulphur springs, waterfalls, and…

title: Beautiful hotel!
review: Good day, We are delighted you chose Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort to celebrate your 30th anniversary and thank you for sharing this review. Our team members are noted for their friendly and intuitive service and I am pleased that you felt truly cared for throughout the resort. It is disappointing that the cost of food and drinks in our restaurants was higher than you anticipated. Unfortunately, many of the items we serve have to be shipped to the island and we have to factor this cost into our overall pricing. In addition, we also have to charge compulsory, government-imposed 10% service charge and 10% VAT. Having said this, our food and beverage team works hard to ensure there are dishes on our menus to suit a wider variety of palates and budgets. Thank you for your glowing comments about the Rainforest Spa. The spa is such a unique and special place and it is always gratifying when our guests find it as magical as we do. It sounds like we may even have found another spa convert in your husband! Once again, we appreciate your feedback and your business and look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future. Best regards,  Philippe Larrieu Resort Manager (On behalf of the General Manager)

title: Magical stay
review: We stayed in a cottage and oversaw both Pitons and the ocean. All the cottages have their own plunge pools and butlers.  Our butlers were great! Keitha helped me save a pair of pants from near certain red-wine spill death, and assisted us with a very late check-in due to a political protest happening near the airport where we landed.  The diving was far better than expected and so easy - our dive crew was great and knowledgeable.  The resort is pricey, which didn't come as a surprise.  Our only regret was not pre-booking the all-inclusive food option, which includes good wine and most cocktails and most food.  With that said, it is not a resort you are nickle and dimed (except the spa).  They provide free sodas and beers in your minibar, along with other things that are not…

title: the beautiful retreat
review: enjoyed 1 week relax holiday in Sugar beach, but the memories was beyond luxury and romantic..... almost like  a dream hide away from busy life. .. overview the blue ocean , enjoyed reading on the  deck, practice yoga class with the breath taking view... champagne sunset cruise, helpful and friendly bartler..... relax the hot stone massage and we enjoyed hot spring dip....

title: Delicious Food, Beautiful Setting
review: Good Day, Thank you for taking the time and effort to comment about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are committed to making every holiday experience fulfilling and memorable by providing first class services and amenities.  I am happy that we met and exceeded your expectations. I am also glad that you had the opportunity to engage in many enjoyable activities. A visit to the sulphur springs is a must when you are on the island. Your feedback has been greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again soon. Best regards Philippe Larrieu Resort Manager (On behalf of the General Manager)

title: 3rd visit, 3rd wedding anniversary...perfect
review: We had lunch at the beach under the shade trees; it was one of the most pleasant meals I've ever had. You can sit just steps away from the water and enjoy the view of both Pitons. The service was top-notch and the food was great. You can spend a lot of money, or you can get more modest food for about $15 US.

title: One of the best
review: Good Day, Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback about your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy resort. We are delighted you had an enjoyable visit and that our location, service and food served at the Beach Bar met your expectations.   We hope to welcome you back in the near future perhaps as resident guests. Best regards Philippe Larrieu Resort Manager (on behalf of the General Manager)

title: Stunning
review: We choose to come here for the 3rd time to celebrate our 3rd wedding anniversary after getting married here in 2014. As usual they sent a private air conditioned taxi to collect us from the airport which took us straight to our villa. Sugar Beach management thank you so much for room 505 the views were simply breathtaking and our holiday was fantastic thanks to that beautifully located villa, we spent hours just looking at the piton from our pool. The villas are simply stunning, so clean & fresh.....I could live there forever. The resort is quiet and best suited to couples especially those looking for a romantic getaway, ideal for honeymooners and as we got married there I would 100% recommend this place as a wedding destination. The grand luxury villas are so private and we…

title: Wonderful Honeymoon
review: My husband and I just returned from a 7-day stay Sugar Beach for our honeymoon and loved it! We were between St. Lucia and Antigua, but after talking to friends who had been to Sugar Beach, we booked our trip. Everyone had such positive things to say. These are our opinions/suggestions from our weeklong visit:  Room: We originally had a Luxury Sugar Mill Room (not originally what we planned). All rooms are beautiful, but this one lacked the privacy we wanted given it was our honeymoon, as it is directly across from the Terrace restaurant and Great Room restaurant. We voiced our concern to the concierge and were upgraded to a Luxury Villa, which was absolutely perfect. It was tucked away in the mountain and was exactly what we were looking for. The staff was very kind and…

title: SUGAR BEACH
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to share this wonderful review of your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am glad that you were happy with your decision to make St Lucia your vacation destination.  We are particularly pleased to hear that we provided a top notch luxury experience for you and the Luxury Villa you were upgraded to was perfectly located and you were satisfied with the level of privacy it provided.  I am also pleased that you enjoyed our food and beverage offerings and that the all-inclusive package worked well for you.  We offer a wide range of excursions for our guests to enjoy and it is gratifying that the Sunset Cruise exceeded your expectations. We are delighted that you had the opportunity to experience our one of a kind Rainforest Spa. It is truly unique as it is nestled at the base of the UNESCO world heritage listed Petit Piton with treehouse style treatment rooms.  Once again, thank you for your positive and encouraging feedback. We look forward to your return visit in the not too distant future.  Best Regards,  Philippe Larrieu Resort Manager

title: Paradise
review: This was one of the best vacations that my wife and I have had. We finally chose to stay at sugar beach after long research at multiple islands and resorts. We decided to go back to st. lucia once again due to the beauty of the island and multiple activities available. We flew direct from Newark to UVF in less than 5 hours and it was an easy 40 minute ride to the resort, which was arranged by the resort for our convenience for $77 US each way for the both of us. We were upgraded to our amazing grand luxury villa as we preferred to be hillside for privacy. Such an amazing room, 813, large LR, Large king size master, large walk in closet, 2 full baths with Bear claw tub and steam showers, plus the added outdoor shower. Large deck and patio sititng area with a private plunge pool…

title: Didn't Want to Leave the Resort
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to write this extensive review about your experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We pride ourselves on delivering the highest level of customer service in every aspect and are delighted when we read balanced reviews such as yours.   Our facilities, amenities, accommodation and the activities we offer are world-class and we are we are happy to know that overall you enjoyed your stay.   I am sorry that the coconut man continued to approach you even after you asked him not to come back. We have tried in many ways to discourage him from coming to sell on the beach and to encourage him to respect the privacy of our guests, some of whom love the interaction. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience. We will continue our efforts in this regard.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: A Perfect Honeymoon
review: Our best holiday so far... we couldn't fault anything!!! We have througouhly enjoyed our 8 nights at sugar beach. The staff are the most welcoming we have ever come across and will do absolutely anything to enhance your stay - Micheal won't be forgotten! We enjoyed exploring the island with the help of the hotel organising trips we won't forget. We will most definitely try and visit before the end of the year. A destination we will always come back to. Thank you for everything. Peter and Nancy (room 109)

title: Stopped in for lunch and view
review: This is a beautiful stop in St Lucia.  The resort pool is stunning. Beach also stunning. I ordered the Niçoise salad and passion fruit mojito.  Both fabulous.  Looks like a place for a very romantic vacation.

title: beautiful,magical, great food, incrediable srvice.
review: Good Day,  Thank you for your comments about your day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are really delighted that you had an enjoyable visit and that our amenities and food met your expectations.   Once again, thank you for your wonderful comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit, perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Fabulous Hotel in a lush tropical paradise
review: celebrated our honeymoon on this incrediable place! Could not have picked a better place! great foood! great location! amazing service!  I wish there were more activities in the evening.. live band appeared only once. Breakfast is not as good.

title: Ok Place - If you Never been in a real 5 Stars Resort this can look great, but is not!
review: We loved this hotel, set on the beach between the 2 pitons of St Lucia. The villa rooms are dotted around the resort and set into the sprawling steep hill-side. They are nice and private. It's possible to walk around the resort, although tuc-tucs and small vans come quickly to wiz you around. You can call them using butler phones from anywhere.  The room was large with all mod cons: iPad, music system, AC, ceiling fan, coffee machine and mini bar with free local drinks. There were spectacular views from the terrace which included a private heated plunge pool, table, chairs, sun beds etc. Mosquito nets around the bed prevented bites.  The beach area is amazing, with great facilities including waiting water taxis to take you up the coast, and good bar/food service.  Overall, the…

title: Stellar Service
review: Good Day,  Thank you for posting your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are pleased to hear that you were satisfied and enjoyed everything that we offered. Our staff will be happy to hear your comments, particularly the individuals mentioned.  I am sorry that you found prices in our restaurants higher than anticipated. This is an area we constantly review to ensure that our prices match the service standards and quality of dishes we serve.  Once again, thank you for taking the time to share your comments. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Best beach, views and service!
review: Sugar Beach is a fantastic hotel choice in St Lucia. You have access to the best beach in all of St Lucia, nestled in between the two Pitons. The hotel is very relaxing and you will surely enjoy your stay!

title: A Perfect Place!
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach.  I am delighted to know that you had a great time and that you enjoyed our atmosphere and the time spent on the beach.  Once again, thank you for your wonderful feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back for a second visit.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Small Rooms
review: Nestled in-between the Pitons is the most perfect resort for a wonderful holiday.  We have been very spoiled with all it has to offer, our beach bungalow was beautiful, very spacious and luxurious and opened right onto the glorious beach. The resort is set within steep hills which are perfectly walkable but there are tuktuks to transport you to wherever you want to be.  A brisk walk to the highest point of the resort where the fabulous gym and tennis courts were, set us up for the day! The Rainforest Spa was delightful, set in beautiful lush grounds, we had a couples room with a plunge pool and it really did feel like you were in the middle of the rainforest. The restaurants offer fabulous food and wines, the service was excellent and the quality of food was very very good. The…

title: Honeymoon crashers II
review: Good Day,  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and would like to thank you for providing your feedback.  It is gratifying to know that you were amazed with our stunning location and enjoyed everything that we offered.  I am glad that you had the opportunity to visit and enjoy our Rainforest Spa. We are known for our top notch spa and quality treatments in a truly unique tree house setting.   Once again, thank you for posting these overwhelmingly positive comments. I am sure your review will assist other travellers when planning their own holiday.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Wonderful time
review: We are currently staying at Sugar Beach and thought to write this review for anyone considering staying here.  First off, the location is spectacular and staff are absolutely wonderful. Nothing is too much trouble and everyone is friendly and attentive.  The resort itself is beautiful, clean and with great facilities. Diving is great and the spa has been lovely.   The reason for 3/5 stars and the main problem is that the Sugar Mill rooms are fundamentally too small for a resort of this calibre and price. There is essentially no seating area or table to sit at, only a bed/bedside tables and small desk with DVD player/speaker. We have stayed at many other 5 star hotels and resorts and in all even the most basic rooms, they have had tables/chairs.  This is particularly awkward as…

title: Fabulous Resort
review: Beautiful property in a great location.  Very friendly and helpful staff, particularly Cysline.  Great amenities and clean, beautiful rooms.  Great in-resort dining opportunities and easy access to off-site restaurants.

title: SpaTastic
review: Good Day,  Thank you for sharing this wonderful feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It will give me great pleasure to share your comments with the team and praise them for a job well done, Cysline in particular.   Again, thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: World class luxury...no comparison
review: The Rainforest Spa at the resort is first class all the way. As soon as you step into the spa area it's so relaxing you immediately know you're in for a treat.  The staff are well trained and very professional and accommodating . The products which were used a very high end. I had the Diamond Facial and I am extremely pleased with the results .  Thanks to the wonderful staff especially Tabitha, Dwayne and Maria for the exceptional service. I will definitely return.

title: A must stay
review: Good Day,  Thank you for sharing your comments about your visit to the Rainforest Spa at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We are passionate about creating experiences that are both relaxing and enjoyable for all of our guests, both resident and non-resident.   The Rainforest Spa is definitely a world-class facility and I am pleased you had the opportunity to experience the wide range of relaxing and rejuvenating treatments we offer.   Our spa staff works hard to provide professional services that add to the peaceful ambience of the spa setting. We will pass on your compliments and let them know that their extra care and attention really enhanced your overall spa experience.   Please know that we appreciate your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful location, service needs improving
review: Where to start....I researched where to stay on St Lucia for months and I settled on Sugar Beach. After staying there for a week, I know we made the right decision. Flat out....this was the best vacation I've ever had and so much of it is due to the staff at the resort. Every need is taken care of.  The food....I found that there was sufficient variety and the food was just superb. The quality and just the visual presentation....so much so that my wife and I started taking pictures of the plates before we ate. Service was fantastic....so attentitive. Highly highly recommend the Great Room....we ate there most nights. Worth dressing up for. We did the meal plan and trust me, you will not go hungry!  The room....perfect. Classy. Although we didn't spend a lot of time there because…

title: Paradise found. Period.
review: My husband and I wanted to spend a week relaxing away from it all in a beautiful setting, and we found it here.   Though we had booked a deluxe sugar mill room, we were upgraded to a deluxe villa, which had beautiful views of the pitons and the Caribbean Sea.  The fleet of minibuses and tuk tuks were easily accessible and meant that we didn't have to worry about the hike back up to our villa.  We booked half-board, and found it more than adequate for our needs. Yes, drinks are not the cheapest, but what do you expect when the hotel has to ship them in from far away? The menus were varied, and were sourced from fresh local ingredients - grilled octopus and conch, anyone? Food was well presented, and arrived in good time. The range of restaurants were great, too: all had views of…

title: Nice enough stay
review: Good Day,  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to say how happy we are that you enjoyed your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback with us.  I am delighted that your experience was exceptional and that the services, accommodations and amenities we delivered contributed to a wonderful stay. I will share your feedback with the team and congratulate them for a job well done.  Once again, thank you for your glowing comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit in the not too distant future, perhaps for a third honeymoon celebration.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Planning our return already!
review: My husband and I spent a nice 4 night getaway at Viceroy Sugar Beach Resort.  It was a beautiful location which we loved; nestled in between the Pitons.  The beach was peaceful and beautiful and the facilities were nice enough.  The resort is located on steep terrain and be prepared to either wait for a shuttle to transfer you from location to location while on property or to walk down and all the way back up.    The breakfast buffet was great and we enjoyed the fresh omelets and fruit each morning.  Besides that, we found the food at both Bayside and room service expensive and good but not great. The food is very expensive.  We stayed in a Grand Villa and were disappointed in the view which we were told would be either a water view or a view of the Pitons.  We had to strain to…

title: An exceptional hotel in a fantastic location
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us with the exception of the disappointments that you highlighted.  I am sorry that the room you were allocated did not meet your expectations. We do not guarantee specific views however had we known of your disappointment, I am sure we would have found another villa to move you to with the views you desired.   We fully respect your comments about our food prices. I am sorry that we failed to meet your expectations in that regard. We are continuing to work on this issue with our culinary team so that we can provide our guests with high quality dishes that also represent great value for money.  We pride ourselves on providing the special touches and attention to detail that make for wonderful vacations, but we seem to have fallen short where you are concerned. I am truly sorry.   Your comments have been shared with the relevant departments as we continuously look for ways to improve our guest experiences, services and product.   Thank you for your feedback and we hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Outstanding, world class 5 star
review: My wife, youngest daughter and I recently had the opportunity to visit St Lucia and were overwhelmed with the geographical beauty of the island. To have an opportunity to stay at Sugar Beach and between the Pitons was an opportunity not to be missed, certainly one we would not forget and definitely one we will return to! From the moment we arrived, we knew we were somewhere special and throughout the stay appreciated the unique location. The rooms, the food, the service, the spa, were all first class and to be transported around the resort in a Tuk Tuk never fails to bring a smile to your face! Our stay, was in part an opportunity to spend time with our youngest, however she was far more interested in the activities laid on for children....and who wants to argue with a 5 year…

title: Exceptional stay at one of the most beautiful resorts I've ever been to
review: Hands down one of the best experiences I've ever had. To start, I got upgraded to a beach bungalow which was amazing. From then on, it only got better. All three of my butlers were so friendly and professional and went above and beyond with everything they did. The food and service was outstanding, and I loved all of the extra things they brought to you on the beach. I was worried it was going to be too romantic with too many couples around but to my surprise, there were other solo travelers, and everyone was so friendly that I made friends quickly. As for activities, I highly recommend the Gros Piton hike - it was tough but totally worth it (ask for Chad - he was a fantastic tour guide). I'm already making plans to come back next year and I can't wait!

title: Beautiful
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your glowing comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It brings us great satisfaction to know that we provided exceptional service that exceeded your expectations in all areas. I will be sure to share your feedback with team, they will be happy to know they helped make your stay memorable for all the right reasons.  We are happy you appreciated your room upgrade and that this added touch contributed to a more enjoyable and relaxing stay.  Well done on climbing the Gros Piton! This hike is quite an adventure and I am sure you were satisfied that you reached the top.  Once again, thank you for your review.  We look forward to your return visit.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Great honeymoon or couple retreat
review: We have had a lovely 10 days here . Weather has been fantastic, service , food and amenities are all of a high level of what you would expect.  We used the spa and received some great treatments and care .  We stayed in sugar mill 2 and the only thing I would say as a negative is it's connected very closely to sugar mill 1 so if You have neighbours you can hear everything and can be quite disturbing .

title: Wonderful location and facilities
review: Good Day,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback about your recent stay at Sugar Beach A Viceroy Resort.  I am sorry that the layout of your accommodation did not afford you with the privacy you were hoping to have. Had you mentioned your concerns to us, we would have moved you to another room. The setup of these two rooms would work better for a family travelling with older children or friends who want to be in close proximity to each other. I am truly sorry for the inconvenience caused.  We are delighted to hear that despite the mentioned glitch, you enjoyed everything from the impeccable service to the delicious food and amenities.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Beach Visit Only from Ladera Guest
review: I recently went back for my 10 year wedding anniversary. I was originally there for my honeymoon when it was called Jalousie Plantation. Regardless of what name is used it's still a great place. It's nice to be staying in your own personal cottage/Villa rather than being in a traditional hotel room. It provides the privacy and feeling of home away from home. You are provided 24-7 butler service with your own personal cell phone to reach them. Staff are so friendly, helpful and attentive. The grounds are beautiful and you have a fantastic view nestled between the two Piton mountains. It's not cheap, but if you're willing to splurge on yourself then this is the place to go in St. Lucia.

title: Very special
review: This is a really wonderful beach resort destination. We spent five nights in a luxury villa. I was impressed with the very high standards of the finish, decoration and bathroom fittings. Everything was of high quality with no expense spared and well beyond what you normally find in five star hotels. The bedroom was spacious with a good sized bathroom while outside there was a large private sitting area with a plunge pool. Situated between the two Pitons, the location is spectacular. There are two beaches with immaculate imported white sand. The food is of a high standard beginning with an excellent and varied breakfast selection such that I never felt like lunch! In the evening we enjoyed formal dining at the Great Room with lovely views on the terrace of the sea. Informal but…

title: Loved Sugar Beach!
review: Good day, We appreciate you taking the time to share your glowing feedback about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is always a pleasure to read reviews such as yours and to know that our stunning location, services and amenities not only met, but exceeded your expectation.  Your comments about the price of wine on our menus are well received. This is an area we working hard to improve. Sadly, shipping cost and government imposed duties on wines are particularly high on St Lucia and quite often our hands are tied when it comes to pricing. We are working with our suppliers to source a wider range of lower priced, high quality wines for our guests to enjoy at prices that represent better value for money.  I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the issue you experienced with your key card. Your comments have been shared with our front office and butler teams to ensure such issues are resolved in a more expedient manner should they arrive in the future. I am truly sorry for the inconvenience caused.  Once again, thank you for your review. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: The Perfect Honeymoon
review: Fabulous resort. There is a sophisticated elegance here. This is a five star resort and it feels like a five star resort.  Even though families with children are welcomed there, I only saw a couple of kids and they were well behaved. Wonderful staff- very friendly and attentive.  Everyone here pays attention to detail.  Three employees stand out in my mind.  Karen and Sher, both butlers, and a massage therapist who also did our tour; I think her name was Michelle.  There were a lot of people who contributed to our stay and they were all amazing.  It was quite impressive.  My husband and I were there to celebrate our 25th anniversary.
