It is a very romantic place.  We met lots of honeymooners.  We did the bean to bar tour at boucan and arranged it through the resort as a package…

title: Mixed Bag for Us
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post this review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is interesting to note that you enjoyed a number of different experiences and two different resorts while you were on the island, each one with a completely different ambiance—this is one of the things that makes St Lucia such a great vacation destination. There is something for everyone. We are delighted that you loved Sugar Beach and that our team members provided the additional touches and attention to detail that made your stay memorable for all the right reasons. Your comments and your business are truly appreciated. We hope to see you again soon. Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Totally awesome
review: I could not have dreamed of a more perfect honeymoon destination than Sugar Beach (and trust me, I dreamt of honeymooning often enough to envision what I thought was the perfect place). From our airy, pristine villa with a private pool, stunning view, private butler, and even the romantic canopy (part of the honeymoon dream), to the unbelievable beach, experiences like hiking Gros Piton, incredible food and wonderful people, our stay at Sugar Beach is my favorite vacation to date, and we're already planning our anniversary trip back. Thank you, Viceroy & Sugar Beach! The Butlers love you.

title: Visit to the beach
review: We didn't stay at Sugar Beach so can't review the hotel what I can review is the beach and service. As we were staying in the mountain we didn't have direct access to a hotel beach but instead the hotel were able to offer transport (by car and boat) to Sugar Beach. We were told that we would have to pay $50 (US) per bed, yes you read that correctly 50 US dollars per bed, which was steep but we wanted a day on the beach, what we didn't expect tho was after choosing our beds getting settled, a member of staff coming over with towels for us (nice), then asking us to move to the back row as front rows were reserved for hotel guests😳. Yes indeed, for $50 per bed we were treated like 2nd class citizens, and if that's not bad enough the hotel wasn't even full!! So hubs (getting very…

title: Ultimate care and consideration
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your comments about your day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is always disappointing to read reviews such as yours and I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the experience you have described.  Our beach team members are generally praised for their hospitality and the extra special care they take of all of our guests, resident and non-resident. You should not have been asked to move when clearly there were lounges available for you to enjoy.  Your comments have been discussed with the relevant department head and will also be shared with the beach team members as an example of how NOT to do things.  Once again, thank you for your feedback. We hope that you will consider a return visit despite the glitch you have described.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Perfection
review: You will read in lots of reviews of Sugar Beach about the stunning location, the majestic beauty of the Pitons and the myriad of exotic plants that abound throughout the hotel. I would like to focus my review on the impeccable customer service my wife and I received on our recent two week visit. The background to our visit is that for medical reasons my wife has a restricted diet and because of the medication she has to take, a much reduced taste profile, minimal appetite and constant thirst. I alerted the hotel prior to our visit about her problems and the necessary information was communicated to the food and beverage staff.  When we first arrived at the hotel, all the senior F&B took time to seek my wife out to see how they could help her. The chefs also came to see her…

title: Magical 20th anniversary - the view, the sea
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team I would like to thank you for your kind and thoughtful review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am truly honored and thankful to work with such an incredible group of individuals and when I read reviews such as yours, it warms my heart to know they have gone above and beyond to ensure the happiness, health and comfort of guests such as you and your wife. We trust that your wife is on the road to recovery and that we will be seeing you both again really soon. Thank you once more for your kind words. I will be sharing this review with the rest of the team.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Short but Sugary Sweet...
review: We've stayed in some incredible locations around the World in leading hotels, but this hotel and location beats them all. It has a magic and charm of its own that I can't really explain. We celebrated our 20th anniversary with our 5 year old in tow and I'm so pleased to say that we had the best holiday ever. When you pay a lot of money for something you always worry it might not be worth it, but it certainly is! Breathtaking location, resort, snorkelling....I could go on! - tree house spa, humming birds and fireflies...just stunning. We will be back!

title: a little piece of paradise
review: Sugar Beach is everything you think it will be. Sherman our butler and Denver our server at the Great Room totally made our experience extremely memorable. Everything about the resort is absolutely 5 stars. I should mention that their welcome drink is especially delicious

title: Paradise for a week
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are a team of passionate individuals, committed to guest’s satisfaction and well-being. I am delighted that your overall expectations were exceeded and that Sherman and Denver showed great care and concern. I will pass on your lovely comments to them. I am happy that you enjoyed the Horchata drink upon arrival. Many of our guests share the same sentiment. We are delighted that our amenities and service exceeded your expectations. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming back to Sugar Beach. Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise and Perfection between the Pitons - Don't think twice about anywhere else!
review: We have just returned from a week at this beautiful resort.  We were upgraded to a bungalow but the first one we were shown did not have a view of the sea which we particularly wanted.  However, my husband spoke to the butler who managed to find us another one, and while we had already unpacked we were told everything would be moved for us.  The second property was so beautiful I almost cried when we were shown it.  Sure enough all our belongings were transferred without problem while we were at dinner.  As this was a birthday/Christmas present to my husband I really wanted something a bit special and this was certainly the case.We had an enormous veranda with a plunge pool and outside area where we could sit and watch the sunset.  Once you get the hang of calling the butler for…

title: wonderful week..
review: Good Day, Thank you for your glowing comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort to celebrate your husband’s birthday. We endeavor to make all our guests feel comfortable by ensuring that their expectations are met and wherever possible exceeded. I am delighted that the team was helpful in providing you with an alternate room with the privacy and ocean view you had hoped for.  We are glad that your overall experience was great and that you had the opportunity to enjoy the reggae band as well as our sun down social cocktail reception.  We try our best to provide wine selections to suit every palate and budget. Unfortunately, we also have to factor in the cost of shipping these wines to St Lucia and the taxes and duties required to bring them to the hotel. We continually review our list to ensure there is a broad range of wines and more affordable selections. Once again your comments and business are greatly appreciated. We are looking forward to your return visit.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Overall better than most
review: I stayed at the Sugar Beach Viceroy for 5 days, traveling with my boyfriend for a last-minute getaway. Both of us had never been to St. Lucia before so we didn't know what to expect. Spectacular and breathtaking are understatements for the natural beauty of Sugar Beach and the surrounding views. The Viceroy staff members were consistently accommodating and courteous. I have attached pictures from the resort that I took from my phone – yes, it is the real deal! We were pampered beyond during our stay and I couldn't imagine staying anywhere else! We arrived around 3PM on Wednesday and had arranged a driver to pick us up from UVF, about 1 hr from the hotel. Plan accordingly as the distance is not too far, but the windy roads make it a longer drive. We planned excursions each day…

title: Be Prepared to ENJOY!
review: Five days in actual Paradise.  When you think about the quintessential Caribbean vacation…you know, the one that you see in all those funny romantic comedies about honeymooners, well the Viceroy at Sugar Beach in St. Lucia is really that kind of place.  Palm trees, beautiful views of the clear blue water, white sand beach, little tiki bar.  Everything you dream of when you think Caribbean.  But what really makes this place shine is the incredible attention to detail and over the top service. The resort is built into the side of a mountain that cascades to the ocean, and situated right in the middle of the famous Pitons, which is what St. Lucia is so known for - so no matter where you look you have nature literally hugging you at every turn.   Sure the food and drinks are way…

title: Honeymoon Heaven
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to write and post this review of your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Your feedback is encouraging, positive, and supportive of the very high standards that we have set and continue to instill at our resort.   I am happy your overall stay was good with the exception of the disappointment that you highlighted with our food prices. We continually review our pricing to ensure it is competitive with other hotels on the island and regionally throughout the Caribbean.  Many of the items we need have to be imported which automatically puts us on the back foot when it comes to costs especially when import duties and shipment costs are factored in. I am sorry if you found some of the items too expensive.  Although the location of the resort is somewhat secluded, there are plenty of off-resort options for both excursions and dining within a very short drive. We are happy to make bookings at neighbouring restaurants and to advise on activities such as zip-lining, horseback riding or even a visit to the volcano just  10 minutes away.    Had you shared your concerns I am certain we could have come up with an interesting itinerary of activities highlighting the best the island has to offer.  I am glad you had the opportunity to visit and enjoy our Rainforest Spa. It is a special place with amazing treatments to choose from.   Once again, thank you for your business and your comments. We appreciate your feedback as a valuable tool in our efforts towards maintaining the high standards we pride ourselves on. We look forward to serving you again soon.  Best regards  André Boersma General Manager

title: perfect luxury relax
review: Stayed here in 2015 for our honeymoon and we loved it. To be fair we had a couple of small issues at the start and nothing was too much trouble to the staff. We were upgraded to an amazing room which was more like a mini cottage hanging over the edge of a cliff....stunning!!! The beachside restaurant was unbelievable and we often still talk about it 2 years on. The place is total relax and after a crazy wedding it was just what we needed. Don't be put off by the long winding roads down to the beach because the little mini golf cart taxis are great fun and are there within a minute of being requested. A truly amazing place and we will one day return!!!

title: St. Lucia Rocks
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am delighted to know that our location, services and staff positively impacted your stay. It is wonderful to read that you returned home with such wonderful memories despite the few issues you encountered at the start.  We are thrilled to hear you are already planning a return visit  On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards  André Boersma General Manager

title: Should be rated as 5 DIAMONDS!
review: we absolutely loved this resort, the colours, the room, the food, everything. we would just go back again and again. the interior design is particularly outstanding. dont miss outside activities when you will be coming here. we truly recommend it for a relaxing vacation.

title: Perfect luxury relaxation
review: We have stayed here three times now, and loved it each and every time. The villas are very comfortable and sufficiently sited so that you felt not too close to other guests. The staff were excellent, the beach beautiful. Children were well looked after and entertained. Our only request - please refresh the food menus, they have been the same for each of our visits and it would be great to have something different!

title: I can't imagine anything better
review: Good Day,	  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to thank you for sharing feedback about your third visit to Sugar Beach A Viceroy Resort.  We are grateful for your loyalty and the trust that you have in our resort, and are glad that every one of your visits has proven to be just as wonderful as the one before. It is a pleasure to know we continue to meet and exceed your expectations.  Your comment about our restaurant menus will be shared with our food and beverage director. Had we been aware of your concerns I am confident we would have been able to offer alternative dishes to avoid the repetition. You may wish to be aware that our culinary team is in the process of reviewing all of our menus so we can offer a wider selection of dishes which will be changed on a regular basis.  Once again, your loyalty, comments and business are greatly appreciated. We look forward to the opportunity of serving you again.  Best regards  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise on Earth
review: If you can do it, stay here. Don't look anywhere else. We split our time between Viceroy and Ladera, and wish we hadn't - they didn't even compare. I am already looking at how quickly we can get back.   The staff is INCREDIBLE. From the moment you arrive, there are numerous staff attending to your every need, offering to help, asking if you needed anything, how your day is, etc. They are genuinely happy to be there and help you without being overbearing the the least bit.  The sugar mill room was beautiful. The bathtub and bath salt and toiletries were spectacular - it was used every single day.  They left you a different treat at turndown every night - rum cake, fruit cake, rum, truffles, etc. They left us a fruit plate and bottle of champagne to celebrate our birthday, too. …

title: Fantastic stay and fantastic people
review: Good Day,  We appreciate your valuable feedback about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. On behalf of the entire team I would like to express how happy we are that you enjoyed your visit with us, and to thank you for taking the time to share this review.  It is gratifying to know that we are not only gaining a reputation for our beautiful location and villas, but also for the services we provide.   Thank you for your positive feedback and recommending us to others. We look forward to welcoming you again soon.  Best regards  André Boersma General Manager

title: St. Lucia
review: On of the most enchanting places we've been. The resort is situated between the iconic landmark of Saint Lucia, on a former sugar plantation. The hotel is modern colonial style with a fetish for detail. The staff is outstandingly courteous and friendly, and you can tell that the management is excellent. In fact one has to mention the signatures of the French Managers throughout the resort that make this place more than the sum of its parts.

title: Simply magical
review: I came here with my boyfriend and what can I say... the service is fantastic (Thanks Julien for being so welcoming, thanks Anneta Henry for being so wonderful, and thanks Paul and Hilroy for taking such good care of us on the beach!). Food is amazing, everyone is so nice, the beach is gorgeous. Honestly one of my top vacations! Cheers!

title: Amazing resort, great people, flawless accommodations and excellent food!
review: Good Day,  Thank you for sharing this wonderful feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach A Viceroy Resort.  It is a pleasure to read that the service was fantastic and that you were well taken care of by our team members. I will be sure to share your review with them and commend them for a job well done.  Again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Best regards André Boersma General Manager

title: Spectacular
review: I took my family here for 10 days and rented a two bedroom villa with a pair of plunge pools. The accommodations were meticulously clean and comfortable. The resort is very quiet and personal with nothing but the sounds of birds all day and toads throughout the evening. The beach is clean and the water a very comfortable temperature. We rented a catamaran for a day, went deep see fishing for a day, zip lined, and hung out at the resort and snorkelled. Overall it was an amazing trip and my family love it very much!

title: Top Caribbean Destination and Resort
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your glowing feedback about your family vacation at Sugar Beach.  We are happy to read your comments and know that our services and amenities exceeded you and your family’s expectations.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We trust you will consider a return trip at some point in the future.  Best regards  André Boersma General Manager

title: Fantastic, friendly, committed staff
review: Beautiful resort. Villas amazing... spacious and Very well appointed for all your stuff. Food top notch... everything was delicious and so well thought out ... just extremely expensive. Service excellent. Location is great just 45 minutes from airport and the beach is sugar and you have both pitons as your backdrop. Bit of a pain to get from villas to beach if you don't want to walk up and down.

title: This place is very special
review: I'm very particular about service and I must state that this is one of my favorite places in the world.  So many places to sit and relax, with plenty of genuinely wonderful staff, in a setting that is incomparable.  The rooms are clean and beautiful, and while some walking might be involved, the shuttles are a plenty and very easy to catch.  It was fun to have some variation in restaurants, with cool vibe differences in each.  Island time is in effect, but welcome to the neighborhood.  Bottom line, I loved the views, our room and the staff.

title: Honeymoon spoiled
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post your glowing comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We could not agree with you more about our stunning location right between the Pitons and nestled into our lush grounds. It is truly special.  We are happy we had the opportunity to share this experience with you and to provide services and amenities that were equal to the view.   Your feedback has been greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again soon.  Best regards  André Boersma General Manager

title: A light lunch and a swim
review: My husband and I went here on our honeymoon after having to travel our other plans last minute. We debated over what property to select and where we preferred to stay but after a lot of review reading and island geography lessons, we selected Sugar Beach. Could not be happier with that decision!  I cannot wait to get a tut-tut if my own to cruise around in. Our beach concierge was perfect! And we only had one hiccup where a night trip was oranges incorrectly. Instead of the staff throwing their hands in the air and saying there was nothing to be done, they went and found the private charter boat's captain (who was at another bay at this time), had the chef whip up an appetizer-picnic, had speciality cocktails put together and got us on the private charter we thought we'd booked…

title: Beautiful location
review: Good Day,  We are happy you chose Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort for your honeymoon. Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback on this forum.  I am really pleased that you had a wonderful time and everything was perfect and to your satisfaction. We are happy that we created wonderful memories for you that will last a lifetime.  I would like to apologise for our failure in properly executing your boat trip, but I am pleased to hear that our team members responded immediately to rectify this lapse. We are passionate and concerned about our guest experiences and therefore strive to ensure the highest level of service is always provided. We will pass on your comments to the team and commend them for a job well done.  Your advice regarding better notifications of our entertainment schedule has been well received.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back in the not too distant future, perhaps even for a first anniversary celebration.  Best regards André Boersma General Manager

title: Very special location
review: We had hired a taxi for a day-tour around southern St.Lucia and told our driver that we felt like having a light lunch and a swim at the Sugar Beach, although we were staying elsewhere. He drove us to a parking lot quite a bit above the resort, from where we walked down.  The location between the two Pitons is phantastic. Sitting down at the Beach Bar restaurant we were taken care of by a very friendly waiter from Sardinia, who also happened to have worked once in Switzerland, telling us about his several participations at Zurich's Street Parade in summer.  We really had just light lunches, a plate of Steamed Clams and an Octopus Anticucho, with the octopus being a bit on the tough side. With it we drank a big bottle of San Pellegrino mineral water for USD 13.   In the part of…

title: A first class hotel with excellent food
review: We spent five night in The Sugar Beach hotel and it was an excellent experience, although most of the staff are cheerful but some were hard work to get a smile out of, the luxury beach front bungalow was amazing and in our opinion the only place to stay at the resort. If you forget something and you were up the hill , it's a Tuk Tuk up,the bumpy hill, and some villas were very far from the beach. The Spa area is stunning and a massage is a must. Food was excellent but  be prepared to be stung with the drink prices, glass of rose £20.00 !!

title: Not perfect but when it wasn't, THEY more than made up for it. Sign of a great place
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on your stay at Sugar Beach A Viceroy Resort. I am glad that you had the opportunity to experience our unique amenities.  Sugar Beach has the most beautiful location and it is always gratifying when our guests appreciate the magic of the place as much as we do.  Based on what you have highlighted, your stay was perfect and you enjoyed all the special touches and attention to detail that we offered.The spa is truly amazing and word-class and I am delighted that you had the opportunity to experience it.   We are also reviewing our menus and pricing so we can continue to offer true value for money in this area too.  Once again, thank you for your valuable feedback. We hope to see you again soon.   Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing and Wonderful Resort
review: I don't review much because i don't typically have much to say b/c of my laid back nature. My fiance and I traveled here for a few nights after spending a few nights up north. We were celebrating our engagement. You can just tell that it is a different vibe here than any place up north. From the beginning, you would get pampered, BUT we had an issue during check in. We arrived a bit early around 215pm and check in was 3pm. We were told initially that we didn't have to wait too long and were offered a complimentary drink. we arrived the same time as another couple who complained quite vigorously about their room not being ready. My fiance and I decided to keep quiet.   Normally, we just aren't complainers.. Let me prerequisite by saying, my fiance and I are a interracial couple,…

title: The perfect hotel for a relaxing honeymoon
review: Good Day,  Thank you for posting this extensive review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am sorry to hear of glitches experienced during the check in process at the front desk. We normally have all our rooms ready at 3pm and even earlier once we are made aware that our guests are arriving earlier so they can experience our normal in room check in, I am sorry this was not the case for you. Your feedback regarding discrimination by the staff is, I believe, completely unfounded. We do everything we can to ensure that our guests are always treated in the right manner and to their satisfaction irrespective of their ethnicity.   I am happy to hear that Philippe reached out to you and provided assistance in getting you to your room. Rest assured, the delay had nothing to do with you or your fiancée but had to do with your allocated room simply not being ready in a timely fashion. We actually sent additional staff to your room to speed up the process after the guests who were in the room before you departed late. We wanted you to have the cottage allocated because it is one of our newest, most private and romantic accommodations.    We are happy to hear that once this initial glitch was ironed out, you and your fiancée got the opportunity to experience our world-class accommodation, facilities and top-notch service. Our Rainforest Spa is indeed special. We are glad that you enjoyed this most among all of the other activities you embarked on.   Congratulations on your engagement and we are glad that your stay with us will be remembered for all the right reasons. Once again, your feedback and business have been greatly appreciated. We look forward to serving you again soon.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: This is theee place to stay
review: I recently went to Sugar Beach with my husband and his family. It was so beautiful, the staff was excellent and the food was delicious. We stayed in the residences and our butler, Mosiah, was especially wonderful. He took such great care of us and made sure we knew of all the adventurous and also relaxing activities. The beauty of Sugar Beach is so much to take in, it's truly paradise and the island has more to offer than some of the other Caribbean islands we have been to. The only complaint was the mosquitoes, however, the resort does its best to manage this.

title: Beautiful views, great room, and HAPPY employees to serve you
review: I had never been to St Lucia so i looked on Trip Advisor and decided on Sugar Beach Viceroy.  Now Sugar Beach is expensive and the food is not cheap so once you get past that you are good to go....I wanted a facility that i did not have to walk a long way to the beach.  The hotel arranged for a car to pick me up at the airport for the 40 minute ride to the hotel.  It was super easy as you just go to the Sugar Beach Booth and walk about 20 feet and get into the car..   We arrived at the hotel and drove  to within 50 feet of the room...The Butler Sher took care of the luggage and checked us in at the room....  Sher and the other butler Shawn took super good care of us and are truly nice people...it was our 40 wedding anniversary and Sher came into our room and had a nice surprise…

title: Wonderful resort
review: Good Day,  Thank you for your comments and for taking the time to post your review of Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort on TripAdvisor.   On behalf of the entire team, I would like say how happy we are that you enjoyed your 40th anniversary stay with us.  We are happy to hear that our team members contributed to a trip of a life time that will remain memorable for all the right reasons. The staff will be very pleased with your comments.   I would like to apologize for the dissatisfaction you highlighted with the price of the all-inclusive meal plan and the supplemental charges for some items.  Your feedback is well received and will be discussed with our food and beverage team to see if we can reduce the number of dishes on our menus that carry a supplemental charge. Your idea of charging slightly more but then removing the supplemental charges is one we have been reviewing closely and may well implement going forward.  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Your comments and business are truly appreciated.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: 5-star luxury, honeymoon experience
review: My husband and I honeymooned here almost 6 years ago and have returned once since. Our return visit brought back so many sweet memories and the resort was just as we had remembered it. We love the setting of this resort, nestled in between the Pitons. The beach is lovely and you just cannot beat the feeling of having mountains on either side of you! The restaurants are excellent and the staff quite attentive. We also loved the activities we were able to do including climbing the Pitons, scuba diving and exploring the island via water taxi. We would love to return one day!

title: Paradise location
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful comments about your second stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted to learn that your return visit was as memorable as the first for all the right reasons. I am very happy that we exceeded your expectations.   Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your third visit soon.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Fabulous location, ambiance, food and service!
review: There are not enough good things I can say about the Sugar Beach Resort in St. Lucia. My husband and I looked at every hotel on the island including Jade Mountain and Ladera for our honeymoon before ultimately deciding on 9-nights at Sugar Beach and were thrilled with the decision from the minute we set foot on the property.  The staff were attentive and approachable and made us feel like we were at home. A special shout out to our butlers Karen, Michaela and Kelan who made every dinner reservation, car rental reservation, spa booking and overall experience a 10/10. We also want to thank Ingrid who served us at breakfast and lunch. She was spectacular and even knew our drink order and would have it ready when we sat down each morning at breakfast.  We were in villa 314 which was…

title: Sugar Beach, Unimaginable Perfection
review: Stayed at Sugar Beach for 3 nights in Cottage 304.  The cottage was perfect!  The view of both Pitons was amazing and the sun set over the infinity plunge pool each night.  Augustus ("Gus") our butler was wonderful and made us feel completely pampered.  Navigating the resort is easy with the Tuk Tuk's and when they say they will be there in 3 minutes, they mean 3 minutes!. Makala at Concierge was wonderful and arranged all our transfers and dinners out.  ASK FOR PETER D!  He is such a nice driver. Few Tips: 1.  The sticker price for the rooms and food is shocking ... but oh so worth it.  The cottage we stayed at was luxurious so the thought of even better rooms was unbelievable. 2.  The food, yes very expensive, is worth it.  We have been around the Carib and food is mostly…

title: Stunning Location
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to post your review about your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sure many other travelers will find it useful.  It warms our hearts to know that your overall expectations were met and, in many instances, exceeded.  We are happy that our resort was able to create this once in a lifetime experience and great memories you’ll forever cherish.  Based on what you have described, it appears that your stay was amazing with the exception of the disappointments with the beach peddlers. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience and disappointment. Thankfully we also have our second beach, Glenconner Beach, which is far more private and not frequented by the beach peddlers. Our guests find this beach a more tranquil area to sunbathe and relax with cold drinks from the Pier Bar.  Once again, thank you for your valuable feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back for your second visit.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: A Paradise Place
review: Wonderful location between the Pitons with truly stunning views.  The property is pristine, well kept and with gorgeous grounds.  Our villa was attractive and nicely appointed.  The food is overall very good at the restaurants.  The service is mixed.  The service was excellent at the upscale restaurant, The Great Room, and inconsistent at the beach restaurant and at breakfast.  The pool is very large, clean and appealing for a swim. The beach is clean and the water is clear and bright blue.   The property is located on the calm, Caribbean side of the island.  Overall, the property has a glamorous, luxe appeal.  We had a wonderful time and would recommend it.  What you need to know:  1.  Almost all of the rooms and villas are on a hill and are accessed by shuttle or colorful Tuk…

title: It is a wonderful place.
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on your stay at Sugar Beach A Viceroy Resort.   I am happy to hear that on balance you had a fabulous vacation and that your expectations were exceeded in almost every area. Thank you also for pointing out the areas you feel we need to improve on.    I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the level of service which you received at our restaurants. We will definitely bring your comments to the attention of the restaurant supervisors so they can ensure our guests always receive the best possible service.   Unfortunately, as you rightly point out, all beaches in St Lucia are public and we  do not have much control over the influx of non-resident guests to the beach and the National Marine Reserve at the base of Petit Piton. We have set aside complimentary sun lounges and shade palapas at the northern end of the beach in a bid to encourage non-resident guests to utilise this area. This has been fairly successful in helping us maintain the exclusivity of the beach for our resident guests.  Thankfully we also have our second beach, Glenconner Beach, which is far more private and not frequented by day visitors .   Again, we thank you for your valuable feedback and business. We hope to welcome you back to, Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the not too distant future.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Winter Break
review: This hotel is absolutely brilliant. Best part of it is that it is located between the 2 Pitons, right on the beach. Words can not describe the feeling of just chilling a lounge chair at that private beach and having a look around seeing one Piton to the left and one Piton to the right. Also, the rooms are great. The bed was extremely comfy. Service was excellent - you have a phone that you can use to call for service, book events etc. Great idea and it works smoothly. The food was good, over-priced, but something that you would expect from a hotel of this caliber. All in all the hotel is fantastic and if you can afford it then def go for it!

title: Stunning And Well Managed
review: The property is stunning - pictures don't do it justice. The rooms are lovely and the facilities and activities are great. There is just enough evening entertainment if you want it, plenty of things for kids to do, and the beach and pool areas are beautiful and well cared for. Yes, the food and drinks are pricey but the prices were in line with what I expected.  The food is very good to great. I would have loved to see a few more basics on the menu like grilled cheese for kids or a basic club sandwich.   What impressed me the most, however, was the immediate course correct by the management team after a few small stumbles with the service.  We let them know of a few issues and in 12 hours any issues were more than rectified. That's the way to run a resort. Impressive.   Special…

title: Just landed in paradise
review: Good Day,  Thank you for sharing this wonderful feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach A Viceroy Resort. It is a pleasure to read that our resort and accommodations left  a lasting impression for all the right reasons and that you and your family enjoyed everything we have to offer. I will be sure to share your menu recommendations with our Food and Beverage team so we can ensure  the expectations of our guests are always exceeded. I am delighted that so many staff members went above and beyond to ensure you had an incredible vacation and that our management team was able to resolve the glitches you experienced. They will be happy with your comments. Once again thank you for your valuable feedback and we do hope to welcome you back in the not too distant future.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Exceeded expectations!
review: Just landed late last night WOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Will review when I leave but so far WOW!!!! Was greeted by Mackenzie our butler great guy already spoiling us cant wait to spend the week in paradise looks amazing

title: Honeymoon trip of a lifetime
review: Good Day,  On behalf of the entire team I would like to say how delighted we are to hear that our location, services and staff have already made a positive impact on your experience at our beautiful resort.  I am very happy that you were impressed with the genuine care and attention that our professional staff bestowed on you. It will give me great pleasure to share your feedback with Mckenzie and to praise him for a job well done.  Once again, we appreciate your glowing review and look forward to hearing more after you depart.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Overpriced meal, nice beach, poor snorkeling
review: Our family of four stayed 7 nights in a Grand Luxury Villa for President's Day week.  We were awestruck by the amazing scenery and the beauty of the property!  The landscaping is spectacular and very well maintained.  The villa was spacious, well appointed, and not lacking in any comfort.  Our butler staff was excellent (thanks Cher!). We typically stay at Four Seasons properties so we were concerned about the level of attention or professionalism we would receive from the staff.  We found the service level to be very high, but you need to arrive with island time in mind.  Nothing happens fast at the property, especially meal service.  If you have an excursion planned, tell your wait staff and you will be accommodated.  The food was excellent.  I'm not sure that the meal plan…

title: Gorgeous
review: This is a spectacular property starting with the location and views--on the bay between the Pitons. The beach is perfect with great loungers and hard fixed thatched umbrellas. Our villa (506) was large and beautiful with three distinct outdoor seating areas and a plunge pool with views of the bay and the mountains. Food and drinks pricey for sure but high quality. We did not really get the personal butler program as there were at least 4 people who identified themselves as such over 6 days and the handoffs between them were non-existent (i.e. One would ask if we need dinner reservations after the one before had made them two days earlier) but someone always answered the mini phone with the butler's pre-programmed number. If there is one area for major improvement it would be…

title: Luxurious upmarket resort
review: Good day,  Thank you for your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. While we are delighted you enjoyed your overall stay, I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the lapses you have described. Your comments about our butler service and inconsistencies with housekeeping are particularly concerning and will be shared with the respective heads of department to identify what went wrong and how we can improve going forward. I am sorry these issues marred what would otherwise have been a wonderful stay. We all hope that you will consider a return visit soon so we can serve you at our Sugar Beach best. Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: If you want to be treated like hot garbage by the resort, this gorgeous, jewel of a beach is for you.
review: This was a romantic trip away for 2.  Location: down a steep hill to a white sandy beach between the Pitons. 45 minutes from the airport. $75 cost to the resort. Beach side location the highlight!  Room: we were upgraded by 4 categories to a luxurious cottage with a private plunge pool and spacious patio. This was stunning. Simple white design with a separate dining room and 4 poster bed with a hidden t.v. at the foot of the bed. Complimentary soft drinks, rum and a coconut! Turn down service with treats.  A 15 min walk to the beach down a steep hill but plenty of transport (tuk tuk; shuttle buses).  Staff: they were the highlight! Peter our butler was lovely; he gave an enthusiastic introduction to the resort. All drivers and waiting staff were helpful and a real asset to the…

title: JUST AMAZING!
review: Good day,  We appreciate you sharing your comments about your recent romantic stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It would appear from your review that you had a wonderful time and enjoyed all of the services and special amenities we have to offer.  We hope to see you again soon. Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Probably the most restful place
review: Let me start off by saying that all beaches in St. Lucia are public. As such, you can drive into this resort even if you are not staying there (or take one of the water taxis from Soufrerie), and the resort staff will even give you a ride down to the beach on their "free" shuttle.  More on that later.    My husband and visited Sugar Beach during an anniversary trip to St. Lucia because this public landmark was highly recommended by a known and trusted local.  We sat under the trees with our feet in the sand, looking over the menu.  Let me save you the heart attack - it was about $100US for burgers, fries, and two alcoholic mixed drinks.  We decided to go for it anyway, letting this be one of our splurges on the trip - it really is a gorgeous, secluded spot on the island, and we…

title: Spectacular vacation
review: There is not one thing I can think of that I would change  - the setting and views and vibes are world class  - the staff actually wants to provide anything and everything in the most gracious ways - fabulous tours nearby are terrific  - the room was wonderful

title: The truth about families at the resort
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team, we are delighted you had a great time at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Thank you for sharing your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back at some point in the future.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Just.... fabulous!
review: Sugar Beach met all  - but one - of my expectations and we had an incredible time there! The service and people who work at the resort are some of the best I've seen in the industry. Our butler Gus was awesome. Every single individual we encountered was courteous, professional, and welcoming.   The resort is stunning! We stayed at the very top of the resort in the 807 and loved the views and seclusion. Shuttles were timely, fun, and easy to use. As two physically fit 30 year olds, we opted to walk to and from our room on more than one occasion. Definitely elevated our heart rates.   The food? Fabulous! The Friday night beach BBQ buffet at Bayside was the highlight of the entire trip for me. Breakfast was included but did not do all inclusive and came out ahead. If you want to…

title: One of the best
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to share your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. On balance it would appear you enjoyed your stay with us, with the exception of the large number of families who happened to be visiting at the same time.  Unfortunately, your vacation with us coincided with half term in the UK and President’s Day in the US, a time when we get more families at the resort. We do have times of the year when there are one a handful, if any, children on property and we always advise couples looking for a more adult only experience to book during these times (outside of major holidays and school vacations). Having said this, we do try to encourage families with young children to book the earliest possible dining times at all of our outlets, especially the Great Room. We also ensure the Cane Bar is an adult only space after 10pm. In addition, the jetty at the new Glenconner Beach is only open to guests 15 years and older in an effort to preserve some quiet beach space for guests who wish to have a more peaceful, relaxing, child-free experience. It is gratifying to note that the concerns you expressed will not deter you from visiting us again. Before booking, please speak with our reservations team about the best time to come—when we have fewer family reservations. May and June are wonderful months to stay! We hope to see you again soon. Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: paradise
review: We (sadly) only stayed here one night as we were en route to the Grenadines, but honestly could have spent the whole trip here; what a place!  We took the shuttle organized by the resort from the airport ($75USD) and the driver was there at the airport waiting for us with a sign with our names. We simply loved this resort. The room had its own plunge pool and the bathroom area was about the same size as the rest of the room! And the beach- just WOW!!, between the Pitons. The snorkelling was really good, lots to see, with other resorts coming over in the day to snorkel there on various charters. The lounge chairs on the beach are lovely and the staff is there to help with towels and drink orders.  Just a lovely spot and we will definitely return for longer next time! We had a…

title: Amazing
review: It's Paradise!  The beach is amazing with the view of Gros Piton. The rooms are lovely and friendly staff It's a man-nature collision and I loved it. There are lots of hidden beautiful places there so make sure you asked about everything to get the most of your stay

title: Awesome but pricey
review: Good day,  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted you enjoyed your time at the resort and hope to see you again soon!  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Relaxing, Carefree St Lucia Vacation
review: Sugar beach provides a luxurious tropical experience. Our family of four stayed here in January after the holiday rush, so the hotel was not crowded. The rooms were fantastic and the staff delightful. Drinks and snacks were provided in the rooms as well as a small private pool and lounging area. The hotel had many great activities, but for us the best was snorkeling right off of the beach. The corals and tropical fish were awesome. The food was quite good, but also very expensive. We would suggest getting a package that includes breakfast, but not the other meals. Cocktails can run about $15. Note that if you opt to take a taxi outside the hotel, these too can be expensive. A short ride to the Chocolate restaurant at the nearby Boucan hotel was $58.

title: Paradise found!
review: Good day Thank you for sharing your comments about your January stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is great to hear you and your family had a wonderful time and that you were able to relax and enjoy all of the activities and amenities we have to offer—especially after the busy holiday period.  As you point out, our location is truly special. It is nice to be able to snorkel right off the beach in the National Marine Reserve and to enjoy so many activities right here on property or just a short drive away.  Once again, we appreciate your feedback and hope that we will see you for another family vacation soon.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: summarize visit
review: My husband and I spent seven nights at Sugar Beach and had a wonderful time. We had booked a Superior Sugar Mill room and were pleasantly surprised when our taxi driver proceeded to drive us directly to block 700 where we were taken to a Villa instead. We had a wonderful view of the ocean and both pitons, (photos included in my review). Our butlers  were Sherman, Shawn and Nysan,  who were  usually on a rotation of two. We stayed here 20 years ago when it was simply Jalousie Plantation and included a black natural sand beach. I was concerned that with joining the Viceroy group and with all the expansion, it would have become impersonal  and stuffy, but I was pleasantly surprised. The staff could not be warmer and more engaging. They went out of their way to address you by name,…

title: Daytrip - Beach and Drinks (Only)
review: Let's just say, St. Lucia is FULL of priceless views.  We wanted to experience multiple beaches (by road) and got a shuttle ride from the visitor's parking down to the beach (however, you need a purchase receipt to get a ride back up the steep hill).  We had a couple drinks ($12 USD each - all prices in USD).  However, the setting on the beachfront was beautiful, comfy and peaceful.  We waited a little while for service as staff were more focused on attending tables rather than the lounge chairs located within the dining tables (although they continuously stared the entire time).  Do NOT miss the stunning views climbing up past the tennis courts to get awesome pics of the Piton mountains.

title: Day Trip
review: Good day Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our spectacular setting and the comforts offered by the Bayside Bar.  We hope you will consider a return visit soon.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Absolutely Perfect!!
review: Our first visit to Sugar Beach was via boat.  Our local guide took us there for snorkling. There are plenty of fish, not that much coral. Chairs at Sugar Beach are free to sit on but the local guy hussles you to buy a $7 US smoothie.  If you go by road, which we did later in the week, because our son wanted to snorkle again, beware....there is one sign on the highway.  Take the road down a steep hill but then you have no idea where to go...no more signs!  Take a left at the bottom of the hill and drive to the parking lot.  You must walk from there to the beach, a fair distance, unless a bus driver stops to pick you up - they aren't supposed to. Now the part you need to know...to get back up the hill to your car you have to buy a drink at the bar (pop or water), keep the receipt…

title: Food and service restaurant
review: Good day Thank you for posting this useful review of your visit to Sugar Beach. I am sure other visitors to this forum will find the driving instructions useful. We are happy you enjoyed your visit. Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Absolutely stunning!
review: Perfect getaway resort. Amazing villa, great food. The prefect place to relax. Walking distance (if you like to hike) to the Sulfur Springs. Boat trip away to the local town called Soufrière. Ask for Randolph (a local) he will take you on his boat around the Island.

title: Very special place
review: My wife and I spent 6 nights at the resort.  We were upgraded to a villa which has all the amenities and more one would require.  The beach, restaurants and outside excursions were great.  Gus and Karen took great care of us as our butlers.  Verdley, our transportation guru for off resort excursions is a special person and made the entire St Lucia experience exceptional

title: Soectacular
review: Good day We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Your comments will be shared with the individuals mentioned and they will be commended for helping to make your time with us memorable for all the right reasons.  We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: A piece of paradise
review: We spent an amazing week at Sugar Beach. The resort is spectacularly located located between the UNESCO World Heritage site The Pitons, but the best thing about this resort is the genuine warmth of the staff, (I think a trait of all St Lucians tbh). By day two they practically all know you by name. They predict what you want when you want it without ever being intrusive! I cannot wait to return :-)

title: Beautiful Beach and Friendly Staff
review: Good day Thank you so much for taking the time to post this overwhelmingly positive review of your week at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  On behalf of the entire team, we are delighted you had such a wonderful time and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: A perfect quiet getaway
review: My husband and I just came back from a week at this beautiful, lush, superior resort. Upon our arrival we were introduced to one of three butlers who graciously attended to our every need. Each of them - Nyson, Sherman, and Sean - could not have done a better job of helping to make this one of the best vacation weeks ever. From their smiles upon greeting us each morning, to responding to each and every request as though it was easy and only a pleasure to fulfill, to sincere inquiries as to our comfort and other wishes we may have to make our stay even better, we never felt that their presence was in the least way overbearing or gratuitous. Just beautiful people doing their jobs with extra doses of heart felt kindness and care. As someone who has consulted in the customer service…

title: Beautiful setting, wonderful villas and spoilt rotten
review: The villas are stunning, spacious and feel like a home from home (just with a butler and pool!). Great variety of food and the tuk tuk drivers were hard working and good humoured. The service on the beach, by the pool and in your rooms was at the top level and we would love to return.

title: not friendly!
review: Good day  Thank you for sharing your glowing comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted you enjoyed everything we had to offer.  We can’t wait to welcome you back.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Poor experience
review: We are renting beach chairs here for the 5th day. Staff told us on the first two days we can rent chairs any row we want, on the 3rd  day they told us it has to be any row except of first row and other days they told us we can rent only last row since we are non guests of the hotel. the rest of the beach remain almost empty every day. I don't mind to rent chairs any row but its just weird that staff says different information every day to non-guests of the hotel. on the last day of our visit sugar beach lady collected money from us for chairs rent right away like we are  going to run away or something, while the cashier was not even open in gazebo to provide us a receipt!  Security Joanna was watching and observing us each time we got up from our chairs, each time asking us…

title: Wow! Paradise!
review: Good day,  It is always disappointing to read reviews such as yours. Clearly we need to do some refresher training when it comes to how we manage and approach non-resident guests who choose to spend times at Sugar Beach—not to mention those who choose to spend consecutive days patronizing our bars and restaurants.  Comments such as yours are extremely rare and I would like to apologise for the inconsistencies in communications your received from our staff members. Rest assured this will be addressed with the department head responsible so that our team communicates one clear message irrespective of who happens to be on duty. I am truly sorry for any inconvenience caused.  On the flip side, I am delighted our Bayside servers made you feel welcome each day and that your experience at the Rainforest Spa was great. This is our normal Sugar Beach standard and I am at a loss to explain why you did not receive this same service across the board.  We value your comments and your business and hope that you will consider a return visit at some point in the future—perhaps as a resident guest next time.   Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Stunningly beautiful location
review: Booked here for 10 nights and was rewarded with a building site view (see below - despite hotel being well below occupancy), mosquitoes in daily and nightly abundance despite complaints, a shuttle service that frequently took 10 minutes and once took 25 minutes, limited dining options (10 days was way too long), a "round the clock" butler service that is truthfully 7am to 11pm with butlers often impossible to contact, VERY noisy with vehicles constantly labouring up and down hill and a private pool on public view. A move was offered but declined for inconvenience. This joins only one other hotel in the 'never again' list for us.

title: Eye wateringly expensive but worth every penny!
review: We stayed for 10 days in a Luxury Cottage. This was our third trip to Sugar Beach, and the best yet.  The service from the St Lucian staff was absolutely first class. A perfect combination of  friendliness and professionalism. The Cottage was beautiful with a lovely view. The facilities are first rate.  The food is always good and occasionally great.

title: So close to Heaven
review: Good day, First and foremost, thank you for once again choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort as your vacation destination. We truly appreciate your loyalty and business!  We are all delighted that your third visit did not disappoint and that your third visit did not disappoint and that you once again enjoyed our superlative location, accommodations and the service provided by our friendly and attentive staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards, André Boersma

title: The best trip of my life!
review: From the very start of this holiday experience I knew it would be something different something to cherish & remember.  In fact our visit was July 2016!!  I didn't want to leave go of these memories & give them to someone else.  At the resort we were greeted by our Butler who carried out his work so unobtrusively & in such a manner that it never intruded or made us feel uncomfortable. We chose our room so well in the old sugar mill, which was so close to everything. For me that was a bonus as I have fatigue problems.  The staff were amazing & Chef was SO helpful to any requests we had.  The setting for Sugar Beach is amazing just breathtaking between the Pitons. The rooms very well appointed with all you could need & what you don't have your Butler will soon source for you.  All…

title: Sugar Beach for visitors
review: Good day,  Thank you for sharing your glowing feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We are delighted that you enjoyed your holiday and that our team members went the extra mile to ensure you had the most relaxing and memorable stay possible.  I am sorry that the unacceptable behavior of a few other guests and a less than inspiring afternoon tea marred what would otherwise have been a perfect stay.  Both issues have been discussed with the relevant department heads to ensure  there are improvements made in how we sensitively tackle guests behaving inappropriately. We have also made some changes to our afternoon tea offering.  Once again, thank you for your comments. We would love to welcome you back soon.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Most beautiful place in the world.
review: I know nothing is perfect, but my honeymoon was more than perfect! The whole experience at Sugar Beach Resort was outstanding!  I love everything St. Lucia has to offer and I like to stay at places that are not main stream.  I found Sugar Beach and fell in love.  It was a little on the higher end of our price range, but I thought it would be well worth it.  We booked our stay from October 13-21 in the smallest little room they offered. If you book through them, you may get a special. We got one night free after 5 days and free breakfast daily.  The all inclusive was pricey so with this deal we did not get it. I did not use a travel agent and this was my first time leaving the country. I was a little weary of  who would pick us up from the airport to bring us to the hotel.  When…

title: The measure of a fine hotel is how they deal with a problem
review: We had a Residence to take all the family away for a Big Birthday, and it was fabulous. The whole resort is lovely, although you are a captive audience and food and drink is very pricey. We did have a problem with the air conditioning in two of our four bedrooms that could not be fixed, but the hotel management bent over backwards to try and sort out the issue and compensate us for our inconvenience.  Best of all was Linus, our butler. He was amazing, and we would have loved to smuggle him home as life is not the same without him!

title: Vacation at Sugar Beach Resort
review: Good day, Thank you for posting this review of your birthday stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am truly sorry you had an issue with the air-conditioning in your Residence. While the problem should not have happened in the first place, I am happy to read that our team members worked tirelessly to get the problem resolved and to compensate you for the inconvenience. It appears that apart from this issue, you had a wonderful celebration. I will be sure to share your glowing comments with Linus. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Hiccups in paradise
review: Disappointing is my best response. Very Overpriced. Not 5 star by any means. Location is beautiful, beach is very nice white sand and water is clear and clean. Nice beach chairs though first come first serve and other resorts share the beach. It was not crowded during our stay.Not provided room with 2nd bath that we requested at booking or in area where we booked. They just ignored our complaint even though our travel agent also called. They claim there is Butler service but we could not even say who was our butler. We made all our own dinner reservations with conceirge. Also inconvenient to take shuttle up/down mountain to get to resort or beach. Water in villa pool was so cold could not use once. Many of villas have no view. Breakfast only very good meal, others overpriced.…

title: Elegant resort in an amazing setting
review: Good day,  We appreciate you sharing your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the issues and concerns that you have raised in your review. We pride ourselves on providing a consistent luxury experience to all of our guests, yet it would appear we fell short on this occasion. While I am unsure of the room category you initially booked, not all of our Grand Luxury Villas have a second bathroom and even though this might be requested at the time of booking, villa allocations are never guaranteed, especially at times when occupancies are high. We do try our very best, but I am sorry we were unable to honour your requests. All of our villas have views of either the sea or the Pitons (or both). We always advise guests to book either a Luxury Beachfront Bungalow or a Grand Luxury Villa Ocean View if they want a guaranteed, uninterrupted view of the Caribbean sea.  Your other comments will be shared with the relevant department heads to see if there is room for improvement in the areas that were of concern to you. Once again, your feedback is appreciated.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: If you just want beach, this is sugar
review: We are currently staying in a Luxury Beachfront Bungalow having arrived on the  26th of December and will be leaving on the 8th of January . The three butlers Mosiah, Maneske and Mchaille,are an absolute pleasure and are taking great care of us!  We came across a few hiccups whilst staying here;our main concern was our dining experience at the Great Room restaurant. This was advertised as one of the most esteemed dining destinations but, nevertheless,we were faced with two bad encounters. We were advised to dine at the restaurant for our New Year's Eve dinner and made a reservation so it came to our surprise that we were forced to wait in one of the bars for over an hour.We were repeatedly going back and forth to and from the restaurant to remind them of our presence and the…

title: Expensive & Slow service
review: Was a day visitor at The Sugar Beach Viceroy Resort here last week. The parking for visitors is up near the tennis courts where you pick up a shuttle down to the beach area. The beach area is nice with a pretty setting. You need to plan on buying a drink or some food in order to use the resort. That was fine but the service at their beach bar was incredibly slow. We sat and sat while the wait staff walked around us. The place wasn't that busy (2:30pm) but everyone seem uninterested in working. Eventually, we ordered two Sugar Beach rum punches and one shared desert of hot chocolate mousse topped with coconut sorbet. Everything tasted great but.... for the price, the serving sizes should have been much more generous. My husband had to chase down our check at the end. It was $41.…

title: A Dream Destination
review: Good day,  We appreciate your feedback about your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the incident you described. This is not reflective of our usually very high standards and for that I am truly sorry. We pride ourselves on exemplary service and attention to detail and it would appear we failed on both counts this time. I hope these concerns have not left an indelible mark and that you will consider a return visit to Sugar Beach at some point in the future. We would welcome the chance to serve you at our best. Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: A Must Stop if You are on St. Lucia - Save your pennies if you want to eat or drink, it is very pricey.
review: My husband and I stayed at Sugar Beach Resort in St. Lucia from Dec. 10-16, 2016. We were there to celebrate my 50th birthday as well as our upcoming 18th anniversary. After much research and reading the reviews from Trip Advisor, we were hopeful that Sugar Beach would be the ideal destination. It far exceeded our expectations. The resort is ideally located between the Pitons. From the beach, to the pool, to the Terrace Restaurant where we enjoyed our breakfast every morning, the views were magnificent. We had requested to be located in a villa that allowed us some quiet and privacy. Our villa (#710), was nestled in the lush, tropical landscape partway up the mountain. The view from our patio and private plunge pool was truly breathtaking. Though we needed a tuk tuk to take us…

title: "All Inclusive" with Too Many Asterisks
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing comments and this delightful and informative review of your double celebration stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It certainly sounds like you returned home with memories to cherish for all the right reasons. We hope you truly enjoyed your birthday and your anniversary between the Pitons. It will give me great pleasure to share your feedback with all of the individuals you have mentioned and to praise them for a job well done. We must agree, that our team members are truly what make this resort so very special. Thank you once again and we hope to welcome you back for many more birthday and anniversary celebrations to come. Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Lunch
review: This property is a must see from the beautiful lobby decor to the crystal clear water below.  Just sitting at the pool bar enjoying a cocktail and watching the yachts sway back and forth between the Pitons is worth the crazy prices of food and drink.  You should know that the service is just so-so.  They are very friendly, but it took almost thirty minutes to get our bottle of wine.  Also, our two ten year olds were kicked out of the pool when the staff realized we weren't staying at the hotel which I think is rude given that we spent $400 at the restaurant.  The beach shop had some beautiful pieces, bathing suits, bags, cover ups and jewelry (again, very pricey but one of a kind stuff).  I recommend reservations if you want to eat in the outdoor restaurant by the beach, it was…

title: Food, Service, Rooms, Staff are all amazing!
review: We had a Superior Luxury Villa in the 800s with a private plunge pool, couch and eating area outside along with a private bedroom, living room and kitchenette and 2 bathrooms.  The shower off the bedroom was a huge double shower.  The room was perfect and came with private butlers (Karen and Gus) who spent the entire time making sure our vacation was perfect.  The food is delicious but what amazed us the most was the staff.  They were always so happy and willing to help you.  Great beach, pool, water sports and the snorkeling right off the beach was awesome.  We will definitely be back.

title: Small Boutique Resort
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team I would like to say how delighted we are that you enjoyed your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is always a pleasure to read reviews such as yours and to see that you are already considering a return visit. Thank you for your comments and your business and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Not the hoped for experience
review: Me and my wife traveled here for our honeymoon in August of 2016. June - February is considered rainy season in the caribbean, so you should be aware. While it did show it was scheduled to rain almost every day, it would rain for <30 minutes and was not a huge factor. This did not play into my rating of the Hotel.  Pros: - Upgrade for our honeymoon. They upgraded us to a Luxury Cottage, which was more than enough. We had a fantastic view that overlooked the resort/water, but were secluded enough to that we were able to use the outdoor plunge pool and shower. The room itself was fantastic, very spacious. There was turn down service every night as well, so when we would come back from dinner, our bed was made, curtains around it drawn, and a small treat waiting.   - Butler service…

title: One word...amazing!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to post this extensive review of your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am happy that on the whole you had a great time and enjoyed all of the services and facilities we have to offer. We appreciate your comments about our restaurants and will share them with the Food and Beverage team to remind them of the importance of having plenty of variety on our menus—especially for guests have longer stays. Once again, thank you for your feedback and for choosing us for such a special celebration. We hope to welcome you back in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise Awaits - Perfect Honeymoon Destination
review: I would only ever recommend this hotel to someone if they were able to get a great rate on the room. Coming in the highest possible season meant the rooms came with a price tag that just didn't seem correlated to the quality of service or even quality of the room. Our roof had a big damp patch on the ceiling. Low and behold,  after 2 days of rain, the leaks began. Staff were not surprised by this and looking back at reviews I now know why. Rooms with leaking roofs should not be rented out at 1700 dollars a night. Simple. I spent the whole day asking various members of staff if I could see a manager and was constantly told someone would come to see me. Had I not gone out of my way at the end of the day (7 hours after I had first complained) to track down Effie, then we would not…

title: Beautiful setting
review: Our accommodation was amazing with a fabulous bathroom with rolltop bath and enormous shower, spacious bedroom dressing room and sitting room.The butler who attended our room couldn't have been more helpful and the resort was first class.

title: Incredible honeymoon spot
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team, we are delighted you enjoyed your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Thank you for sharing your comments. We hope to welcome you back in the not too distant future. Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Exceeded expectations
review: My husband and I spent our honeymoon at Sugar Beach and had the pleasure to experienced three different rooms. We had a very wonderful experienced and all of the staff was very polite and helpful. The staff appear happy to help at all times. We had several butlers and two especially stick out in our mind, Peter and Swamed.  The entire resort is quite large and tuk tuk service is provided to get you from place to place. Sometimes my husband and I opted to walk around, but the terrain is quite steep. We went in mid December and found that it wasn't overcrowded. Of course there were quite a bit of children running around, but overall we didn't find that they interrupted our ability to relax. There was an occasional crying toddler or two, but I imagine that would be more common if…

title: Luxury with 2 great  caveats
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post this extensive review about your honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. On behalf of the entire team, we are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and all of the services and amenities we offer. Rest assured, we will pass on your feedback to Peter, Swamed and the rest of the team and congratulate them on a job well done. I am particular pleased to read how your departure date mishap and the cancellation of the JetBlue flight were managed by our staff and the fact that we were able to accommodate you and keep you relaxed during what must have been a bit of a stressful time. It was indeed a pleasure to meet you both at our weekly Sundown Social and during one of my regular walks around the property.  We appreciate your comments and your business and hope to see you back at Sugar Beach for many anniversaries to come. Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise..Magnificent
review: We were thrilled with Sugar Beach, Viceroy.  We booked this as a trip to celebrate our anniversary.  We booked it with little notice and went in December.  We basically just wanted to get away, but what we got was a rocking vacation, largely due to the Sugar Beach resort.   We booked a very expensive villa and were not disappointed - it was spacious, clean, modern, had a great view, was private and quiet, stylish, well-designed and very pleasant.  The food was high quality, not boring and well executed in every restaurant they had.  We did not have the meal plan (except for bfast), but we pretty much ate at SB for all three meals, every day.  The days that we went out to other resort restaurants just served to validate our choice to stay at Sugar Beach.   The pool was…

title: Beach break
review: This place is just so amazing....Be sure to check out the fruit guy blaze for a variety of fruits,fruit drinks,smoothies...its worth it...great bargain!!!! Great staff...the land and sea tour is awesome...its worth it...you wont regret it

title: Snorkeling Tour
review: Good Day,  Thank you for posting your positive comments about your recent visit to Sugar Beach. We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and hope to see you again soon.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: SUGAR BEACH
review: My wife and I stayed at the Sandals Grande, but took a private boat tour down the coast to snorkel, and this was one of our stops.  The beach is beautiful white sand (imported, I believe), with some casual beach vendors available for fresh fruit, etc.  There is a rather large, roped off, snorkeling area on the right hand side of the beach (facing out), which runs along the base of one of the Pitons, and it is fantastic.  It tends to be a little crowded at times due to boat tours stopping here frequently, but there is still plenty of room.  We really enjoyed this snorkel, and went as far out as the ropes allowed.  The water gets pretty deep the further you wander away from the base of the Pitons, but visibility is still pretty amazing down to 20 feet or more. The shoreline is a…

title: Worst hotel I have stayed in St Lucia or anywhere
review: Good day, Thank you for posting your comments about your recent snorkeling trip to Sugar Beach. We are delighted you enjoyed your time on the beach and exploring the wonders of our Marine Reserve.  We hope to see you again soon.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: 5 star hotel, 2 star experience
review: We didn't stay at the Viceroy Resort but above at the Ladera Resort. They have a free shuttle down to the private Sugar Beach. It's very beautiful and feels like a secret paradise. I felt privileged to be part of this little slice of heaven nestled right between the Unesco PITONS!

title: Honeymoon
review: I struggled to decide how many stars to give this resort.  If I was rating on the staff alone, I would have absolutely given 5 stars.  The staff was amazing!   The location is nothing short of picturesque.  Perfectly situated between the pitons,  I find it hard to believe that there's a better view on the island!   When we got there, we were welcomed with drinks and a beautiful honeymoon message made of flowers in our room.  The drink was delicious and we felt so taken care of.   We were at the highest point (the 900's block).  Our travel agent had told us otherwise when we booked it, so part of me is a little curious about if that is where we were supposed to be.   So the problem: It rained for the first two days we were there.  And by rain, I don't mean the short thunderstorms…

title: St. Lucian mountain paradise...
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your comments about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. First of all I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the experience you have described. We are committed to providing a consistent luxury service to all of our guests and in all weather. I am truly sorry this was not the case for you.
