I am at a loss to explain why you were not offered a move to another room. That should have been the first thing done when we realized the leaks could not have been rectified. We would like to better understand what happened in your case. It would be helpful if you could email our Director of PR/Associate Director of Sales and Marketing at molly.mcdaniel@viceroyhotelsandresorts with the details of your stay so we can do appropriate follow-ups with the resort team. It is disappointing that the weather and the issue with your room marred what would otherwise have been a relaxing and lovely stay. We appreciate you sharing your feedback. We hope that you will consider a return visit—perhaps for an anniversary celebration.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Spectacular
review: Took my wife here for a special birthday/anniversary trip without kids.  Our private cottage villa was nestled on the mountainside with butler service, personal pool, outdoor shower, full indoor bathroom/bath/shower accomodations, very comfortable bed with mosquito netting, and fully stocked butler pantry including nespresso machine (one of my favorite things!).  Service is clearly top notch, on par with some of the best resorts we've ever stayed in.  Food on site is exceptional but expensive.  We played tennis nearly every day on quality courts.  Gym is a bit dated but didn't use it much.  Shuttle service is very quick and responsive using tuk tuks which we loved to drive in up and down the very steep hillsides.  The best part is the views, nestled between Gros Piton and Petit…

title: LOVED this place - best Caribbean experience yet!
review: Good day, We truly appreciate you taking the time and making the effort to share your glowing comments about your anniversary stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted that you thoroughly enjoyed our location and made the most of the plethora of activities we have both on the property and nearby. I am sure you returned with memories to cherish—both for your anniversary and your wife’s birthday. Your comments about our gym have been noted and we are hoping to update our cardio machines and other work-out equipment in the coming year. Thank you once again for your feedback. We hope we will see you again for many celebrations to come.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: At least 4.5 out of 5
review: We stayed in a new 1 bed cottage about half way up the hill - number 308 I think - and it was stunning.  The decor is very classy with a colonial feel and the private outside space and pool with the views of the pitons and the sea were idyllic.  We travelled as a family of four so had the sofa bed made up for the children every evening which was done while we were at dinner so no inconvenience at all. We ate in all the restaurants during our stay and the food in each of them was very high quality, well presented and served by knowledgable and welcoming staff.  It was actually the staff that really made the week for us but I will come back to that later. Breakfast was our favourite meal of the day as the menu offered was beyond anything I have seen in any other hotel anywhere -…

title: Rock Star Quality with Super Tropical Vibe
review: This place is spectacular and by far the best overall resort on the island.  Without sounding pretentious, but trying to provide some perspective, we've stayed in 5 star resorts and hotels all over the Caribbean and Sugar Beach can hold its own to all of them.  We read through a bunch of reviews before traveling, and while we normally do not write reviews felt the strong need to point out a handful of clarifications that we hope are useful for those trying to determine whether to stay here and make your trip more enjoyable:   The island -as other reviewers have commented, the island is a rainforest and extremely tropical, the "Tahiti of the Caribbean".  The local soil is volcanic and excellent for growing so lots of fresh mango, passionfruit, grapefruit and vegetables.  Many…

title: Visited the beach, restaurant, and spa - Awesome!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write this extensive review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A viceroy Resort.  I am sure other visitors to this forum will find it both informative and useful.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Once again, thank you for your feedback. Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: WE GOT MARRIED - Like the Gatsby!
review: We didn't stay here at the hotel (super pricey), but we did come to enjoy everything else the place offers for several days. The snorkeling on the right side of the beach is absolutely fabulous. We spent a whole day dazzling our eyes. The fish here are protected from hunting, so they aren't shy, they come right up to your face.   There's a crowded plastic lounge chair area that you can use for free. One day we splurged though and spent $50 each to use the fancy Viceroy cabanas. It was honestly worth it... so comfy, and we were covered from the light rain. We stayed all day. Don't try to sit there without paying, they will ask you to pay or move.   The restaurant has delicious food. We loved the salad with anchovies. It was more pricey than we expected even at a place like that.…

title: Chic Stay
review: Good day, Thank you for posting your comments about your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  From the sounds of things, you thoroughly enjoyed your day, especially the time spent snorkeling and at the Rainforest Spa—it is a really special place.  I am sure other visitors to TripAdvisor will find your advice about renting a Kabe Privee useful. This really does enhance the Sugar Beach experience for day visitors such as yourself.  Once again, we appreciate your feedback and hope that you will consider a return visit—perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Most Relaxing Time Ever!
review: Magic. inspiration, love and more at the Sugar Beach in St Lucia.  We stayed in a one bedroom residence, and besides the 4 bedroom residence next door, it's the only one of the residences that's at the beach level.  10 steps off your infinity pool is the sandy beach (with a small beach bar). It's located between the Pitons and has a great energy.  The resort has so many great accommodations, but the residence comes with a private butler, and we arranged a private chef for our Valentine's Day dinner.  We also had a small reggae band play that night.  It was magic.  We were so touched that we decided to get married 5 days later.

title: Wished I lived there!!!!
review: Simply stunning. A few issues with our room... they said they will reimburse for the inconveniences, though that hasn't happened as of yet. Overall, amazing!!!! Hope to return to a Viceroy soon, dreaming of Anguilla next. :)

title: Sheer Luxury
review: Good day,  I am truly sorry to hear that you have had some issues with your room. From the sounds of your review you are still in-house and if this is the case, rest assured we will be working hard to rectify the concerns you have encountered.  Please be sure to fully communicate with your butler team or our front office so that we can take action to fix any issues.  On the flip-side, I am delighted that your overall experience has still been amazing.  You may also wish to be aware that Viceroy no longer manages the property in Anguilla. It just recently became a Four Seasons.   Thank you once again for your feedback. We hope to see you again soon.   Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Relaxation central at a price
review: Stunning simply doing nothing break in luxury. Relaxing with good food, excellent spa treatments and doing nothing while hubby enjoys his scuba diving. No whale sharks to dive with this year but clear and good visibility. Had quite a few very, very wet days but that doesn't bother you as you are here to do nothing but relax and watching the pitons fill with waterfalls is breath-taking as well.

title: Great Honeymoon
review: Good day, We appreciate your feedback about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  From the sounds of your review, you enjoyed an idyllic stay relaxing between the Pitons. We agree these twin volcanic cones are spectacular on dry days, but when it rains the waterfalls that drop down the sides of Petit Piton are simply awe-inspiring.  Thank you once again for your comments. We hope you will consider a return visit soon.  Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: breath taking
review: Located between the Pitons Sugar Beech Hotel and Residences is in an idyllic location with a small beach onto the Caribbean sea. No expense has been spared on creating a self contained paradise and the facilities are shared with some high end residences. These are still under development but have a limited impact on the hotel Three main restaurants and top quality spa  Pardise but on the expensive end of value for money

title: "Welcome to Paradise!"
review: Direct quote from several cab drivers and staff! Excellent welcome for our Honeymoon destination! Beautiful location right in the middle of the two Piton mountains (best location according to most of the local drivers!). The cottages and villas are located all the way down the mountain towards the beach (where you can find the restaurants and public pool as well), and there's a complimentary shuttle service (cute little Tuk Tuk to drive you around!). Definitely the nicest and most polite staff I've ever seen at a hotel or resort; everyone gets their own personal Butler (and dedicated little mobile to contact them for all your needs!). Only downside would be the 'Caribbean' attitude, which is extremely laidback, so you may end up waiting a little while for things like drink…

title: Amazing stay
review: Good day, We appreciate you posting your feedback about your recent honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. On behalf of the entire team, we are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us and all of the activities we have to offer. I am sorry you found the service slow at times—this is an area we are continually striving to improve.  Once again, thank you for your comments. We hope to welcome you back soon, perhaps for an anniversary celebration. Best regards, André Boersma

title: Excellent Trip
review: We had an incredible time. We visited for a wedding and decided to stay for 4 days to make the most of the beautiful resort. We stayed in bungalow 18 which surpassed expectations enormously. Amazing space with fantastic amenities. Beautiful and right on the beach. The private pool and lounge space was perfect as we had our 10 month old with us. Staff simply went above and beyond. Our butler Sherman was wonderful and fantastic in his role. He did absolutely everything he could to make our stay the best possible. Everyone from the restaurant chefs, to the wait staff make you feel special. We will definitely be returning and hoping Sherman is still there, doing a fantastic job!

title: St Lucia-Our Girls Trip!
review: Good day, We truly appreciate your glowing review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is always gratifying to receive comments such as yours, but even more so when you were at the resort to help celebrate a wedding with friends and family. I will be sure to share your feedback with Sherman and the rest of the team and commend them for making all of you feel so very special. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Best regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: 5* but won't be going back
review: Spent a week at resort that was an excellent experience overall.  Stayed in quiet, ocean view villa with nice view of Pitons, resort and water.  Villa had a large bedroom and bathroom with a living room with another full bathroom.  Large plunge pool to have a Piton beer free from the refrigerator.  Went to all the restaurants and found the food good to very good.  Especially liked the sushi served at the Cane Bar.  Spent most of time at beach where service was efficient...however wished they would have come by more often.  Nice snorkeling right off beach and great scuba diving a short distance from resort.  Went off  site with help from a personal butler coordinating water taxi to Jade Mountain for dinner (good but pricey with great views) and taxi to Boucan (good but less…

title: Fantastic resort, can't wait to come back.
review: The property was great - best in Soufriere. The food was fantastic, beach was awesome, service and butlers were top-notch. Our room was excellently appointed with a living room, outdoor shower, and private plunge pool. We relaxed on the beach almost every day, tried every restaurant on property (there are 4) and ate room service one night.   we also went to dinner at Jade Mountain and left feeling even better about our selection of Sugar Beach. I could not recommend this property more.

title: Excellent hotel. great location
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write this wonderful review about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are really happy to hear that you got to experience our resort and that you appreciated the high level of service that you received from our team.  Once again, thank you for your feedback,recommendation and business. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Excellent holiday
review: Stayed for one night and this hotel is a little gem.  amazing food, fresh and top ingredients used.  One of the best Tuna salads I have had anywhere.   the beach area is relaxing despite lots of kids, and snorkelling is some of the best in St Lucia.  Service is excellent, staff are friendly and genuine.

title: Nice beach, nice rooms GREAT FOOD !!!!!
review: Good day Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback about your brief stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It’s great to hear that you had a wonderful time and that you were well taken care of by our team members.  Our culinary team will be delighted with your comments.Once again, we appreciate your comments and business. We look forward to seeing you again soon, hopefully for a longer stay next time. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Sugar beach
review: My wife and I went in February 2016 for a week and stayed in a villa with pool - quite high up; sheltered with dappled shade from trees and private. We enjoyed every minute of our week. The accommodation was excellent - the only complaint was that bed was too soft; the duvet too thick. But I say that about everywhere I go. The food was also excellent although I would have been shocked if we had not gone 'all inclusive'. Staff good too - all friendly and helpful. I usually moan about spas as it's a wifey thing, but this one was superb. Beach was good too with only a few locals. The beach guards were present but didn't need to do much in any case. I am looking to travel to the caribbean again and I am trying to find something that ticks all the boxes as Sugar Beach did so would…

title: October Honeymoon
review: First off, the resort is incredibly beautiful. My husband surprised me with this trip for our honeymoon. The views are absolutely breath taking and I'm not sure you can find a better spot. We came here on our honeymoon in October of 2016. Mostly everything was wonderful, but the things that weren't so great were really big deals to us. We did just about everything there was to do so I'll do an outline...  Rooms: we stayed in a grand luxury villa that was absolutely incredible. 2 bathrooms, a sitting room, a beautiful bedroom, a patio, and an infinity pool. Butler included. There's not a thing I would change, we loved this villa and the privacy of it.   Food: luckily, we did all inclusive! I'm warning you, do all inclusive! Most of the negative reviews are about food prices, but…

title: Comprehensive Review!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback about  your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am happy to hear that on balance you had a fabulous vacation and that your expectations were exceeded in almost every area.  Thank you also for pointing out the areas  you feel we need to improve on.  Unfortunately, as you rightly point out, all beaches in St Lucia are public and we are continally fighting the battle with tour providers and the Soufriere Marine Management Area to control the influx of non-resident guests to the beach and the National Marine Reserve at the base of Petit Piton. This is a discussion we are continuing to have.For our part, we have set aside complimentary sun lounges and shade palapas at the northern end of the beach in a bid to encourage non-resident guests to utilise this area. This has been fairly successful in helping us maintain the exclusivity of the beach for our resident guests. It is also unfortunate that our second beach, Glenconner Beach, was closed at the time of your stay—it is certainly far more private and not frequented by day visitors when open. Also, it would appear your honeymoon may have coincided with half term break in the UK which meant there would have been more children at the resort than at other times in the autumn months. We usually have just a handful of  guests in  September to mid-December. It is unfortunate that these issues took away from what should have been a trip of a lifetime and for that, I am truly sorry. We hope that your experience has not deterred you from considering a return visit at some point in the future. Certainly our reservations team could guide you on dates when we have few or no children in house. Thank you once again for your review. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful resort... wish I could give it 5 stars!
review: Resort - immaculate grounds.  Staff ratio to guests was unbelievable.  Southern hospitality at its finest.   Accommodations were fabulous.  We enjoyed having our pool to relax at when it got too hot or even cloudy. Food - amazing. We enjoyed the Great Room cuisine a touch more than Bayside, but both were amazing.  We enjoyed the AI plan and found it to be worth it; food is very pricey.  I found plenty of options at all dining meals within the AI plan.  Water is always available and your butler will always get you more if needed.  House wines were great; I'd suggest one more red wine option to the AI plan.  I found this food to be the best in the Caribbean and just as superior as those fine dining options we would have in any big city.   Staff - amazing.  The staff really does…

title: Something for Everyone at this Gorgeous Resort!
review: Good day,  Thank you for your wonderful comments and for taking the time to post this review.  We are very pleased that you had a perfect holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and that our setting and everything that we offered was first class in every way .  Once again your comments and business are greatly appreciated. We are looking forward to your return visit.  Regard,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Lived up to all my expectations!
review: We decided on a last minute trip to Sugar Beach in June, it was always on my bucket list of places to go!   The Good: It is an absolutely beautiful resort and every detail of the design and amenities are 5 star! Upon arrival we were greeted by our butler with drinks and snacks. We were also given phones to call the butler. We stayed in Sugar Villa #8. Sugar Villa's are the cheapest rooms, but are still very nice and spacious. They have a very small plunge pool on the first floor, a big balcony, with great views of the pitons. I loved the all white rooms, they were very clean and tranquil. The rooms are stocked with free water, free soft drinks, and free Piton Beer. They also bring fruit and night time treats everyday which was also a nice unexpected touch. The Sugar Villas are a…

title: Honeymoon + Trip Planner Review
review: Mindy Sly at Beach Bum Vacations helped us with every little detail of planning this trip and took all of the stress of planning a trip off our plate allowing us to focus on our wedding planning. Everything went so smoothly thanks to her and we could not have been happy with her services and we highly recommend using her. The resort and trip itself was amazing. The excursions we participated were amazing. We were able to visit a volcano, botanical gardens, swim in a waterfall, did rainforest zip lining, a couples massage, and sunset cruise up the coastline of St Lucia. The staff was incredible and the food was the best we have eaten (every meal). It was secluded and private and very relaxing. It was a fantastic trip we will never forget and we can't wait to go back!

title: Incredibly Serene and Indulgent...
review: Good day: Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that your expectations were exceeded in all areas and that you are already thinking of a return trip. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again. Once again, your comments and business are greatly appreciated. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect anniversary getaway
review: We honeymooned at Sugar Beach in late September, and it was absolutely stunning. We arrived in the pouring rain and it was still breathtaking. Being tucked in between two mountains, in a rainforest AND beach setting makes you feel like you are in the most secluded, exclusive part of the island, especially when everyone from the touristy resorts in the north comes down to visit and snorkel in the Sugar Beach reefs. Snorkeling was amazing! Also staying here you are so close to the mud baths and many different waterfalls, so it's not difficult to venture out. You can do the excursion all in one day, and then never leave again. It's definitely the perfect location. The beach is stunning - you don't want to get up from the lounge beds, they are so comfortable and service there is top…

title: Absolutely stunning and unique
review: Good day, Thank you for talking the time to share your comments about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A viceroy Resort. Based on what you have described, it appears that every aspect of your stay was amazing. We work hard to ensure each and every one of our guests returns home with memories to treasure—especially those who have chose to celebrate such a special occasion with us.  Many thanks for your feedback and we hope to see you back for many anniversaries to come. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Highly recommend for your honeymoon or any special trip
review: This resort was perfect for our 15th anniversary getaway.  Great food and service, and a beautiful location.  We were in the 300s and it was perfect.  Shuttles always prompt.  However, if you are looking for lots of acuSt Lucia is not touristy like other Caribbean islands.  It is more uninhabited.

title: Free access to a public beach, perfect location, wonderful dining
review: My wife and I visited from another hotel.  First of all free access to public beaches are not universal on St. Lucia.  The staff were more than accommodating in arranging a shuttle to take us down to the beach.  We snorkeled in the shadows of the Pitons for a couple hours on two separate occasions.  Both times we ended up at the beach bar for a couple of drinks afterwards as well as a bit to eat.  The service was excellent, but the food.... the food was incredible. Seriously try the octopus tostadas...   The views from being nestled in between the Pitons are just awe-inspiring. I just can not imagine a more perfect place to spend your time on the island.

title: Spectacular but pricey
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your recent day visit to Sugar Beach. We are delighted that you had a wonderful time and that you enjoyed our facilities and offerings during your time on the beach and at the Bayside restaurant. . Our culinary team will be pleased with your comments about the food. Thank you for visiting and for this review. We hope to welcome you back in the near future—perhaps as resident guests. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Caribbean Paradise
review: We had the pleasure of celebrating our wedding and honeymoon at Sugarbeach Viceroy Resort in St. Lucia. The hotel location is truly spectacular, between two pitons, on lush grounds with access to amazing beach. Our room was one of the luxury villas in the 800 range (highly recommended) which was very private with a beautiful view of the pitons. The room was much bigger than we expected, which was a nice surprise with separate bedroom and living room, large walking closet/pantry and two full bathrooms. It would easily fit 4 people so with just the two of us we had more than enough space. The outside deck was enormous, with two sets of lounge chairs, table, hammock and a plunge pool. While our room was nicely maintained the outside deck left some signs of neglect … chipped paint…

title: This place is unreal...
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your wedding and honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is a real pleasure to learn you had a memorable stay and that our wedding coordinator Anisha ensured all the small details and special requirements were covered to make your special day one to remember for all the right reasons. I will be sure to pass on your glowing comments to her, Peter and to all of the other staff members who contributed to making your wedding all that you dreamed it would be.  We thank you for sharing both your positive feedback and your comments about the areas that concerned you during your stay.  We are continuously reviewing our service standards to ensure that the best possible service is always rendered to our guests.  Your comments about the deck of your villa have already been taken on board and we will shortly be embarking on a special maintenance programme for villas in the area you stayed.  We want to ensure both the interiors and exteriors are in pristine condition.  We are also reviewing our menus and pricing so we can continue to offer true value for money in this area too.  Once again thank you for your comments and we look forward to your return visit in the not too distant future, perhaps for a first anniversary celebration.   Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Honeymoon to end all honeymoons
review: We have just returned from Sugar Beach in St Lucia. This was an excellent holiday, enhanced by the high quality of the staff at Sugar Beach. Viceroy Hotels certainly inject the 5 star feeling to your stay having retained and developed the old sugar plantation into a beautiful hotel.  Once you adjust to the rainforest setting and mountainous situation, you quickly become accustomed to the shuttle transport back and forwards to your villa, unless you are located in a beach villa. Part of the shuttle service includes the Tuk Tuk transport which gives the resort a character that is different, but I must say, very efficient.  As a world heritage site, Pitons Bay is truly an unique location for the hotel. It is the ideal resort for total rest and relaxation with good service and…

title: Feel like a protected species in a unique habitat
review: Around Soufriere, you can choose A) proximity to those incredible Pitons with A1 - directly on the beach/low level or A2 - up in the hills behind, Ladera or Chocolate, B) in/near Soufriere town, with some views of the Pitons, like Hummingbird, or C) the opposite hill, with the most spectacular whole view of both Pitons, like Jade Mountain and Anse Chastenet. We picked A1, to stay, enjoy, and visited the others during the stay (market visit in town, lunch at Jade), and think this was the best option. The place has a mystic ambiance, service is fabulous, and great options of food, drinks and activities. The best snorkel area is a short swim from the beach.

title: Would have been great....
review: Good day, Thank you for your review of Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  On behalf of the entire team, we are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. We agree with you that it’s hard to find a more magical location! We appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: The perfect vacation!
review: Beautiful resort with lovely staff however, service is spotty at best.  Left frustrated that no one informed us breakfast was included.  Paid for early lunches to avoid three big meals. Would have been nice to be more informed about amenities from the start. Looking back through reservation it did say breakfast included after scrolling down in confirmation, but we booked months ago.  I travel a ton for business/pleasure and at check in the staff always reminds me of the amenities at my disposal.  Not here.   Worst of all.  After notifying the manager she did nothing.  Simply told us that it was in the fine print on our reservation confirmation.   Save your money (thousands) and book somewhere else on this beautiful island.

title: Incredible experience in St. Lucia!!
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your visit to Sugar Beach. I am sorry to hear of your disappointment. While it is true that you overlooked the information contained in your confirmation letter, you are right.  We could have and should have handled your concerns in a more empathetic way. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused.  In future, we will ensure guests are fully aware of any meal plan or entitlements they have booked to save a repeat of what you experienced. Once again, we appreciate your comments and hope to welcome you back soon.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Expensive couples retreat
review: Last week we celebrated our 25th Wedding Anniversary and happy to say that Sugar Beach made for a perfect vacation. In planning a trip doing your homework, reading reviews, and looking at the pictures still can make your decision a leap of faith. Some reviews are great, some okay, and others miserable, it has a lot to do with what you make out of your trip, and some people just want to complain. After visiting many resorts throughout the Caribbean and being disappointed we were extremely pleased and pleasantly surprised at how good Sugar Beach was.  Upon arrival in the pouring rain the first person we met was our butler Mosiah, standing in the rain and escorted my wife to the cottage. A great first impression that is representative of the staff as a whole. Mosiah checked us in…

title: Wonderful high end resort but they nickel and dime you more like a budget resort
review: First off, this resort is BEAUTFIUL! Everything from the stunning location (right between the pitons), to the pristine beach and romantic rooms! Upon arrival we were really impressed with everything especially the service; however, by day two we started to feel like really taken advance of by the resort. With the closest local town, Soufrites, not being exactly tourist friendly, it's easy to see how most guests would chose to stay on resort. Because of this we opted for the all inclusive meal plan which was $210 per person per day - not cheap but we were confident it was the correct choice. This is where the issues begin. On the beach drink menu, only 12 of the 26 options are even included in the meal plan, less than half, so if you don't want the basics they up charge you every…

title: Almost perfect....
review: Good day: Thank you for your comments. I am glad that your stay at Sugar Beach was wonderful with the exception of the disappointment that you highlighted with the price of the all-inclusive meal plan and the supplemental charges for some items. I would like to apologize for this dissatisfaction.  We are constantly reviewing our offerings to ensure that the best possible service and prices are offered to our guests at all times. In most instances, our All-inclusive plans are well-received. I am sorry this was not the case for you. We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Second Time back and blown away once again
review: Pros: -Amazing location   -The rooms are very nice  -The food is great -The staff at check in was great -The pool is beautiful The beach is great -The welcome drink was the best  Cons: -The service overall was just not where it should be for the price of this resort. Upon check in our butler showed us our room and we never heard from him again. We don't know who out butler really was. Half the time we called the butler cell phone no one answered. The guys on the busses were kind but sometimes acted as if they were aggravated. The people who came to clean the rooms were not so kind and it made it feel weird. Compared to other 5 star hotels/resorts at this price point it was night and day difference. I guess when you have a certain level of special service from someone who loved…

title: Day trip visit
review: Good day: Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Although you clearly loved the resort and our facilities, it is disappointing that the level of service you received did not meet your expectations. It is even more upsetting that and it appeared to you that our staff were not passionate in what they were doing. This kind of feedback is extremely rare.   Our team members usually enjoy rave reviews and high praise for exceptional service. I am sorry that you did not get to experience our usual high level of service and the attention to detail we have become noted for.  We continually review our service standards to ensure that the best possible service is delivered at all times. Once again, we apologize for the experience that you have described. We hope to welcome you back in the near future to share our true Sugar Beach experience with you. Your comments, recommendations and business are greatly appreciated. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Superlative St Lucian Resort
review: How do you describe paradise two words Sugar Beach.  This is my second time coming back and it gets better and better.  This time we had a one room villa 605 and did the All Inclusive Plan which I would recommend,  What a  great villa. The bedroom was huge and the sitting room was just as great.  Bathroom was huge and every women's dream bathroom.  Best part is the pool we went in it every day .  The bed is so amazing I get the best night sleep in those beds.  The view of the Pitons blows me away every day.  .  We ended up having two of our previous butlers Shawn and Nysan.  We were so excited to have them again.  Both men are very professional, friendly, and willing to get you anything you need.  We totally lucked out.  Then we get to the beach and we see Noah, Ivan and Shana. …

title: Crying when I had to leave
review: Thank you, Sugar Beach, for the most relaxing and beautiful vacation.  Every detail was perfect and this trip was exactly what I needed.  Beautiful design everywhere:  rooms, restaurants, spa. Great for the eye as well as comfortable.   Exquisite details such as the leather and wood handmade spa furniture and hanging lounges.  The natural setting was off the hook with the pitons and bay, and all the flowers and planting were the dose of nature I was craving.  Service was extremely lovely...friendly and professional, but respectful of privacy.  Rooms were quiet and luxurious.  The food was heaven at all the restaurants.   Surprisingly, the Cane Bar, a sushi restaurant, is as good as anywhere in the world including Tokyo, New York, and Los Angeles...Ingredients are super fresh and…

title: Anniversary Paradise
review: Good day: Thank you for sharing your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort on TripAdvisor. We work hard to make every guest stay enjoyable. I am delighted that your vacation was amazing and memorable for all the right reasons. Our staff will be very happy and appreciative of your comments and recognizing their efforts for ensuring a flawless and relaxing stay. Thank you for your feedback.  We hope to welcome you back soon! Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Stunning Beach
review: Just completed a 6 night stay at Sugar Beach for our 30th anniversary.  We stayed in the Beachfront Bungalows which are located directly on the beach which was the highlight of the trip. A few descriptors of our stay: Beautiful room, georgeous beach with beachfront access, air conditioned, excellent butler service, convenient to all activities, great food, wonderful and helpful staff, and an amazing spa making for a super relaxing trip.  Shout out to our butlers, Gary, Dwight and especially Sherman. You are outstanding people!!! When you get to this property just plan to relax and never leave. One note: there is a small gift shop not operated by the resort located near the water sports area. This shop is called Bernice Shop and is operated by a mother/daughter (Bernice/Bernita).…

title: Perfection
review: Good day: Thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort for your 30th anniversary celebration. We are always striving to deliver outstanding service. We are elated that your stay was nothing short of outstanding.  I know your butlers will be especially pleased with your feedback and I will be sure to share your review with them. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing rooms and the best staff!!!
review: Simply stunning beach with great snorkelling and beautiful surroundings. Unfortunately, there weren't any locker facilities for non-residents so we just left our belongings on the beach which seemed to be fine with the number of other people around. Cocktails and bar snacks were a lovely way to round off a great afternoon spent here!

title: Amazing views
review: Best beach on the whole island! Free even for non-resort guests. A definite must see. Nestled between the base of both pitons, a rare treat. Drinks are a bit expensive so pack your own cooler. Watch the resort guests charter tours around the island and buy a coconut from the locals on the beach for a sweet treat.

title: Beautiful room - secluded hotel - pricey food
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to comment on your visit to Sugar Beach.  I am delighted to know that you had a great time and that you enjoyed our atmosphere and the time spent on the beach.  Thank you once again for sharing your comments with us and we look forward to seeing you again, perhaps as a resident guest so you can experience all of our luxuries.  Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfection
review: Overall Words cannot describe how beautiful this hotel was.  From the moment you drive into the property,  it's engulfed in lucious mature trees with low hanging vines.  As soon as we entered reception,  we were greeted with a very quick check in process and cool towels.  Take note,  the property is open and airy,  therefore,  no ac throughout the property,  only in your room.  Also,  beware of stray cats that libfee around.    Food They assign a butler to your room,  which was a very nice and luxurious treat being that the price of the stay is very high.  My husband and i,  opted out of the all inclusive plan for price reasons and we generally like to eat locally to get the feel of the island.  With that said,  we do like to have a meal or two in the hotel if we're tired that…

title: Perfect Wedding Setting
review: Good day,  Thank you for your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are committed to providing our guests with the highest level of service to ensure that all our guests are satisfied.    I am happy that your overall stay was good with the exception of the disappointment that you highlighted with our food prices. I would like to apologize for this dissatisfaction. We try our best to ensure each menu has items to match every palate and budget.  Once again, thank you for your very valuable feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon for your second visit.  Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: Heaven on earth
review: Sugar Beach is the perfect place to get away and relax. The resort is wonderful and the views are breathtaking and the villas are beautiful! There are quite a few choices when it comes to dining, but the best food experience we had was the beach BBQ. Lunch on the beach is also great though service is a little slow.  One of the best experiences we had was the movie on the beach which the hotel do once a week, it was really magical! You feel like you never even need to leave the resort. I also highly recommend the Spa too.  The staff are really friendly and the butlers are superb. We were lucky enough to meet Yasa who is the Vibe Manager. He made a huge effort in making us feel at home and showed us around. He also kept us up to date on all the cool events he'd organised, so we…

title: Wonderful holiday
review: We stayed back in February in this resort and had a great time. We opted for the all-inclusive, and yes, it is expensive, but it meant we could relax while we were out there. The accommodation, food and service were very good, and the setting is second to none. Definitely worth a trip.

title: Our second stay at Sugar Beach
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing comments about your holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay and that the courtesies and services you experienced positively contributed to a relaxing break. Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated.  On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise
review: My girlfriend and I went to Sugar Beach in 2012, it was our first trip together as a couple so we were very nervous to say the least on many levels. Would the resort be what we expected? How would we get along in a romantic place such as this? Whats the local area like? Whats the food like? How private will our villa be? Many issues plagued us but we went for it anyway. We arrived and all went magnificently. We discovered a lot of things about each other and were inspired in many ways by the beauty and serenity of the resort. It was truly life changing for us. After several years passed of visiting other resort locations across the Caribbean and Mexico we decided to return to Sugar Beach ( now a Viceroy Resorts) but now as a married couple. Again we were concerned but this time…

title: Sugar Beach
review: Good day, We are happy that you chose Sugar Beach for your destination holiday a second time around.  It is a real pleasure to learn that your return visit was as memorable as the first for all the right reasons. I will be sure to pass on your glowing comments to the staff members who contributed to making your vacation remarkable. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Your comments, loyalty and business are truly appreciated. Best Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Return visit surpassed our initial visit last year
review: If you are looking for a friendly, relaxed yet exclusive resort then Sugar Beach is it.  We arrived by taxi and were driven straight to our Villa - a superior luxury cottage, upgraded from a Sugar Mill room - and greeted with a drink from our butler who showed us around the villa and had booked us dinner at the Bayside restaurant for that evening.  He even offered to unpack for us!  Our cottage was beautifully decorated and absolutely pristine with everything we could have wanted including our own plunge pool, a lounge, a kitchen area, two bathrooms, a dressing room and separate shower and WC. Because the villas are set deep into the tropical forest you do need plenty of bug spray when you venture outside.   The food here is very good (so are the cocktails and the wine!) We did…

title: Honeymoon in August 2016
review: Overall: We stayed at Sugar Beach for our Honeymoon for 10 days in August, 2016. It was a great spot and 98% of the time we had zero complaints. The location of the resort is incredible. The magnitude of the pitons and the water serve as one of the most beautiful resort locations we’ve ever been to.   Service: Service for the most part was excellent. The one thing we can say without question is that every single staff member was always happy and pleasant to talk to. We enjoyed lunches at the beach, dinners at The Great Room, and at The Cane Bar. Some staff members we would like to acknowledge for making our stay extra special: Michaela & Ingrid (The Terrace) Miguel and Merton (Cane Bar) Caroline (at the pool), and Denver (The Great Room). They all were incredibly nice, took the…

title: Beautiful facilities, but a little isolated
review: Good day, Thank you for posting this review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We completely agree that there isn't a better setting than Sugar Beach. It appears that you had a wonderful stay with the exception of the disappointments shared.  I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the disappointments you highlighted with our service.   We are constantly reviewing our standards to ensure we deliver on our promises to all of our guests to keep them happy and satisfied Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Honeymoon of dreams
review: Overall the location is jaw dropping, and I think it is the most beautiful and functional cove I've ever visited. The reef and scuba right off the beach are fantastic, which is rare, and the pool and accommodations felt more like Southeast Asia than the Caribbean. I think for honeymooners it would be ideal because of the privacy and activities around the hotel. You can hike the Petons in the morning and scuba in the afternoon. The spa is also fantastic, and the therapists really take the time to design a program personalized for your needs. The butler service is helpful, but not overly intrusive.   However, after a couple of days I wanted to explore the island and that's when things became more challengingly. The north side of the island has more restaurants and activities. The…

title: Beautiful views and crystal Caribbean waters
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments.  It’s great to hear that you enjoyed Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort!  We understand your comments about the cost of transportation and the challenges of travelling around the island easily.  The volcanic terrain makes most journeys longer than you would anticipate and unfortunately, we have little control over water taxi and land taxi fares.   Once again, thank you for your comments and business.  We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise
review: There are not enough adjectives to describe how wonderful Sugar Beach was for our honeymoon!  We were spoiled from the moment we arrived!  The staff is so helpful and friendly. We loved every minute of our trip!

title: Honeymoon Trip
review: Sugar Beach Resort truly made my honeymoon! I cannot rave about the resort more. Upon arrival, my husband and I (newly married) were welcomed by our butler, Alex, with fresh drinks and a smile! Alex was such a warm, friendly individual who attended to every request (big or small) we had! Anis (spelling) assisted Alex from time to time with requests. I mentioned one day how much I enjoyed the drinks we were welcome with, and Anis surprised my husband and I with this cocktail one afternoon! It's the details like this that make the difference. We were given cell phones to contact our butler and each other at any time. There was also a very neat iPad in the room to use for room service, as well as learn more about the resorts offerings, whether that was activities or restaurants,…

title: Guests to the beach
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team, I would like to express how elated we are that you enjoyed your honeymoon with us, and to thank you for taking the time to share this review. We are committed to providing a high level of service to all of our guests and we are pleased we met and exceeded your expectations. I am happy to know you enjoyed the warm and friendly service from the staff especially the individuals mentioned. We hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach in the not too distant future. Once again, thank you for your review.  Best Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: Your Own Private Pitons
review: We had accomodations elsewhere but were recommended by many locals to go as a guest for the fantastic snorkeling. Amazed by the variety of sea life so close to shore.  The water was crystal clear also.  Will definitely look into staying at the resort on our next visit....if guests to the property are treated this well, we can only imagine of staying here and the service provide... Wondeful place

title: Piton Paradise
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent day visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased that you had the opportunity to snorkel in our bay and experience our services as a non-resident guest. Our aim is to deliver great quality service to every guest that we encounter. I am happy that our exceptional service has encouraged you to consider staying as a resident guest in the near future. We look forward to your return. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: When you think of paradise, this is what you're thinking of!!
review: Magnificent place located right amid one of the natural wonders of the world on the Sugar Beach and the crystal waters of Anse des Pitons. And a true heaven for divers from beginners to advanced. Ideal for any type of visit : couples, families, friends. This hideaway oasis is anything but boring!

title: Amazing location
review: My family and I have travelled many places and so far this has been the best vacation spot. The resort is sitting on a beautiful beach, between two Pitons, and lush rain forest. close to Rainfalls and Sulphur mud bath. We took water taxi to Castries while the younger members of the family climbed the Gros Piton. they hired a local for to be their guide. The resort is not like traditional hotel and resort style. The villas( room/Apt )are built sporadically on the hillside, with the resort's restaurants and activity rooms and the pool toward the bottom of the hill close to the beach.The villas all have spectacular view of the ocean and the sunset with nicely decorated air conditioned spacious rooms.  Every villa has it's own butler to help you with anything you would need, from…

title: Between the Pitons
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are thrilled that your overall expectations were exceeded and that you enjoyed all of our amenities, facilities and accommodation. I am also glad that you enjoyed our food offerings and were pleased and satisfied with this service.  The people of St. Lucia are indeed amazing and genuine.   Once again, thank you for your valuable feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: OMG
review: I wish Trip Advisor did like a 4.5 rating because really thats where the rating should be. Its a bit of a drive, down windy roads, to get to the hotel but you will be pleased once you arrive. Great rooms, comfortable beds, spacious bathrooms, plunge pool to go with a great view of the ocean and pitons. The beach is nice, water is clear, and the drinks are cold. They offer a great variety of activities as well which help if you aren't the sit on the beach all day type or your significant other gets tired of you. The hotel has a variety of restaurant options for dinner so you don't feel like you're eating the same thing over and over. A little strange waiting for the check at the end of the meal when you're on the all inclusive plan, which was more like a medium inclusive plan but…

title: Good with dramatic views
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience of Sugar Beach on TripAdvisor. We are pleased to hear that your overall stay was great. We understand your point of view about the all-inclusive meal plan and the shuttle. We are examining ways in which we can change the requirements for signing a check when you are on the meal plan. This remains a work in progress.   Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to see you again. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Unimpressed!
review: Just go! As quickly as you can. I'm the travel planner in my family and was up late one night poring through reviews and websites. I picked Sugar Beach for one main reason - it is AT and ON the beach. We knew people, once removed, that had been there and raved but when you look at the ratings it is #3 behind Ladera and Jade Mountain. I'm not here to bash either as they are spectacularly beautiful places high atop the ridge but I had two concerns. Both hotels have "3-walled rooms" which sounds really fabulous but not if you like AC when you sleep. We visited in late July/August and it was much too hot at night to sleep without AC. We met people who stayed at Jade Mountain at airport. They raved at the beauty of the place but said No AC was a killer for them.   We ate at Ladera…

title: Spectacular location but the shuttle journeys can be a bit of a pain
review: Had a very enjoyable if expensive stay at sugar beach. The staff were very helpful and friendly other than on reception who always seemed a bit disinterested. If you are staying in any of the medium to higher numbered villas you will get very used to and then slightly bored with having to get a shuttle to everywhere form your room as the road is very steep and narrow. We had all inclusive and as long as you read the menu you can get very good food and plenty of alcohol included in the price. One thing to remember is you are in a rainforest so there are plenty of insects around which may stray into your room and take mosquito repellent.

title: "1000000 STARS"
review: Good day, We appreciate your feedback about your recent stay at Sugar Beach. A Viceroy Resort.  While on balance you seem to have had a lovely stay, I am sorry you found the shuttles tiresome after a few days. Most of our guests really enjoy the shuttle service and the interactions they have with our drivers.   Especially in the summer months, we always advise guests to carry insect repellent to combat flying and biting pests which tend to be more numerous at this time of the year.  Once again, thank you for your comments.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Best regards André Boersma

title: Excellent result but KUONI VERY VERY POOR
review: I literally had to beg my friends to pick sugar beach over la Dera because I mean the beach the pools everything was just laid out right there, and they didnt regret.Sugar beach is amazing like almost perfect buggy service with Michael  would feel like an insode excursion he knows so much about everything, Nasha what a lovely lady at the bar always has the best smile to go with remembering my dad's tea and always giving us great shopping and lounging advise about the island she's the forst to ask about our daily excursions and always reminds us not to forget our cameras for excursions:) the bayside restaurant was amazing at night and so lovely when it didn't rain during the day its almost unrealistic the view we got of those lazy sunsets at the point sipping on one of those…

title: Amazing Honeymoon from start to finish!!
review: Excellent resort and staff but Kuoni VERY VERY POOR , Idyllic location and the resort staff can not do enough for you , Food is excellent and the cocktails are amazing .The hotel is extremely pricey  but worth every penny . Definitely well worth a visit but do your self a favour and book with someone other than KUONI

title: Pure Relaxation
review: Good day,  Thank you for posting your feedback about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted that you enjoyed our resort and all of the amenities we have to offer.   It is disappointing to read that you were unhappy with your tour operator Kuoni. We work closely with them and have always found them to be excellent travel partners.  We trust you can iron out any outstanding issues you may have had.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Best regards André Boersma

title: Amazing from start to finish, the perfect retreat
review: Stayed here on holiday in 2014, possibly the most perfect hotel I have ever stayed in.5 star food, service and accommodation. The attention to detail was perfect. 100% recommended for a special treat !!

title: Hide away  beauty
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing comments about your 2014 holiday at Sugar Beach. We have made some wonderful additions since you last stayed with us. You should come and see us again.  We would love to welcome you back!  Best regards André Boersma

title: What an amazing location, stunning!!...and even our 1 year old loved it!!
review: Great food great drinks wonderful staff great security and wonderful views and sunset beach front  very nice pool with breath taking views not too far from the sulphur springs and zipline attractions also minutes from soufrere town

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: Good day, Thank you for your short and sweet review of your time at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and the village of Soufriere.  We are delighted you enjoyed everything we had to offer.  We look forward to serving you again soon.  Best regards André Boersma General Manager

title: Nice bday vaca
review: Our stay was stunning from arrival to departure during our 7 nights in May 2016.  We were a little worried about staying here with our 1 year old girl but we should have never been concerned...Evie absolutely loved everything, and the resort staff were amazing with her, with a particular shout out to the people working during the breakfast serving where she was carried away for most of breakfast and passed among many welcoming arms...obviously we took this chance to relax and enjoy a lovely breakfast :) I mention our baby as knowing she was happy was what truly made our holiday as it allowed us to relax in the amazing surroundings...our room was a great place to relax, and the roof terrace was a great place to sit and drink while Evie slept, the pool and beach were just amazing…

title: WOW
review: Where to start with this place. It is amazing in every way. We stayed for our honeymoon, as many other people were, and it could not have been more perfect. Upon arrival, everyone is so friendly, but not in a creepy way. Everyone is just so nice. They placed Coconut Rum Punches in our hands as soon as we stepped out of the taxi, and whisked our luggage away to be placed in our rooms. When we sat down to check in, they let us know that they upgraded our room to a Beach Bungalow and congratulated us on our honeymoon. I've never been upgraded in my life and it was so magical I just wanted to cry.   We showed up at about noon, so our room wasn't ready yet, but they told us that they would take our luggage and have it in the room once it was ready. Then a super friendly gentleman…

title: Caribbean indulgence - July 2016
review: Good day,  Congratulations once again on your marriage! It is really gratifying to know that we provided the attention to detail and additional touches that made your honeymoon a truly special occasion.  I am happy that we were able to upgrade your room and that you enjoyed your Luxury Beachfront Bungalow—they are perfectly located right on the sand and particularly well suited for couples such as you.  Your comments will be shared with your butler team and the ladies at the Terrace  breakfast restaurant. I know they will be delighted that your stay was memorable for all the right reasons.  Your glowing feedback is greatly appreciated and we hope to see you again soon—perhaps for a longer second honeymoon!  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Fantastic resort for a honeymoon
review: We just arrived from a perfect vacation and for those of you needing some help to decide whether or not to go there...here we go!  The hotel arranged airport pickup for us (just email them, they are very helpful) and it worked out smoothly. We had the choice of a standard transfer or luxury like SUV etc. The standard was USD 75 oneway and totally sufficient (Lexus + refreshments + already some info on the island provided by the driver + cheaper as offered by tour operators). I would recommend that since there is no 'real' taxi service provided on this island like in the US and the hotel does not offer a complimentary transfer/shuttle like the Sandals for example (this would probably be an idea of improvement as a first nice impression - but this is not a real dealbreaker…

title: May 2014 - still dreaming of it
review: Good day Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post this extensive and informative review of your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am confident that other travelers will find it particularly useful.  We are happy to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay and all of the services and amenities we provide.  Once again, thank you for your feedback. We look forward to serving you again soon.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: stunning property throughout
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach for the second half of our honeymoon.  The resort is very big, but incredible. The service is fantastic and the choice of restaurants and activities means you will never get bored or hungry.  We stayed fully inclusive and we do feel that it was good value for money. There are some limitations, but you do have the option to pay additional money for premium brands when it comes to spirits etc.  The sushi restaurant complete with a pool table and full sized snooker table was a particular favourite of ours.  I'd definitely recommend this hotel to couples on their honeymoon and they are more than happy to upgrade your room if they are able to, and is what they did for us.

title: Day Visitors to the Beach
review: For $100 we rented two lovely chaise lounge chairs under a palapa umbrella. They told us wait staff would check on us for drinks (and they did) but they didn't tell us we'd also get the welcome drink (nonalcoholic), lavender scented cool cloths, and freshly made churros...at no extra charge!  The drinks and lunch were very nice and the service was very attentive. CJ was great!  You absolutely can not beat this view either. Amazing!  Just remember not to have a heart attack when they present you with the bill in ECD!  I nearly fainted...and then they have it to me in USD. Haha!  Much, much better!  Next time we're thinking of staying here!!

title: Amazing location but could be even better
review: Good day,  We are delighted that you enjoyed your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and that your day on the beach has you considering a return visit—perhaps as a resident guest next time.  We pride ourselves on providing unique touches that make our guests feel special and it’s gratifying to know that you enjoyed the amenities and services extended by our beach team.  Thank you for your comments and your business. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Gracious service, idyllic grounds
review: We just returned from a 2 week stay in St. Lucia.  We stayed at Sugar Beach for the first few nights of our trip, as our journey was quite long and I wanted a few days of relaxation before the adventure part of our trip began.    Driving down the long winding road (think Lombard street in San Francisco meets the jungle), we were squealing with delight.  After we parked our car (yes, we are that adventurous that we got our own transportation--it's doable and don't let anyone tell you the roads are that bad--they aren't as bad as some parts of Africa) we were picked up by a tuk-tuk and driven down to our butler, who was standing on the side of the road with drinks in hand.  Upon exiting the tuk-tuk, he asked our names.  I thought that was strange.  You would have thought they…

title: Disappointed
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post this review about your family vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is only through such feedback that we are able to continually improve our product and services.  We are committed to providing a consistent luxury service to all of our guests, however, from the catalogues of lapses you have described, this was not the case for you and for this I am truly sorry.  I have already alerted our management team to your review and have asked each department head to fully investigate your comments and to come back with an action plan to ensure such lapses do not occur again.  The manner in which your reported issues were handled, in particular the failure of our team to come to your assistance when you called for help a second time, is completely contrary to our usually high standards. I am at a loss to explain how many of these issues were allowed to happen in the first place.  Once again, we appreciate your feedback. I hope the concerns you have outlined have not left an indelible mark and that you will consider a return visit to Sugar Beach. We would like to share firsthand the high level of service and attention to detail that have become our signature, but that sadly lapsed on this occasion.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: WOW!  Pampering and luxury at every turn!  Outstanding honeymoon!
review: We stayed in a two-bedroom cottage.  Each bedroom had a plunge pool and stunning views of the petit Piton.  Each room was comfortably and stylishly furnished with white sofas and chairs and ultra-comfy beds.  The bathrooms had separate showers, stand-alone tubs and marble/granite counters.  The AC was effective and very much appreciated on warm afternoons. My best memory is of the people who went out of their way to be sure we enjoyed our stay.  They were gracious, welcoming and super-efficient.  Our butler took us on a leisurely stroll to identify plants.  Charlie, one of our drivers, was cheerful and sweet.  The fitness center and spa personnel were great, as were the restaurant and beach cabana people.

title: Stunning vistas and exceptional service
review: My husband and I celebrated our 37th wedding anniversary at the resort late June 2016. The pitons and beach are stunning but the staff are top notch professionals. Every staff person we encountered represented their home island and Viceroy exceptionally well.  We have traveled extensively and has the pleasure of vacationing at lovely resorts but we have never had the pleasure of experiencing the level of genuine hospitality that the staff of the Viceroy provided.  We took a morning walk with the fitness instructor and worked out at the center and recommend both. We enjoyed the highly trained masseuses couples romantic Renaissance spa treatment and would suggest everyone enjoy a massage at the innovative and beautiful spa. The spa lunch of mahi mahi with champagne and fresh juice…

title: Sheer luxury from start to finish
review: Good Day,  Thank you for posting your comments about your son’s experience as a day visitor at Sugar Beach. Feedback such as yours is extremely rare and I am sorry if they felt they were being treated unfairly by our team members.  We are acutely aware and respectful that all beaches, including our own, are public. Our security team is instructed to treat day visitors with the same care and attention afforded to our resident guests while at the same time ensuring the comfort and safely of all beach goers. Generally we receive terrific reviews from both our resident and non-resident guests so your comments are particularly worrisome.  I will be sure to share this review with the relevant department head and ensure refresher training is implemented where required to ensure there is not a repeat of what you have described.  Once again, thank you for your comments.  Best regards  André Boersma General Manager

title: Why do they treat visitors so badly?
review: Sugar beach is the pinnacle of luxury, like something out of a film. Our villa was perfect, beuatifully furnished, with its own plunge pool, far more than expected though our expectations were high. Wish we could have stayed here forever, it's like a different planet. Food service was a little slow and must admit very expensive but worth it. Anyway, no need to rush when you are on holiday. Everything clean and staff friendly. We will be back!

title: Not long enough
review: Good day, Thank you for posting your glowing feedback about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is always gratifying to read reviews such as your and to know our location, accommodations and service not only meet but exceed the high expectations of our guests.  We look forward to serving you again.  André Boersma General Manager

title: Excellent
review: For people who stay at Sugar Beach, my sister and her husband being some of those earlier this year, this resort is faultless.  However, for visitors who are not staying at the resort but who want to experience the great food and service and beautiful surroundings they are not so fortunate. My son and some friends, all professionals from London who are staying with us, went to Sugar Beach to spend a precious day of their holiday in St Lucia. They were aware that there are NO private beaches on the island, this beach being no exception.  When they had chosen their spot to sit down, which was at the far end of the beach, a member of the security team approached them and was very unpleasant to them insisting that they moved to the other end of the beach where people who are not…

title: Overall, excellent!
review: We had a wonderful honeymoon at Sugar Beach! It was recommended to us by two couples we know and we couldn't have been more satisfied. However, there were a few things to make note of, but first I'll start with the pros.   PROS:  1. Accommodations. Our villa was so clean and picturesque. We had originally booked a Luxury Villa but got upgraded to a Grand Luxury Villa due to availability. FYI I assume you have a good chance of an upgrade if you go in the summer. Our villa also had a private infinity pool that overlooked the ocean. It was great. The closets were spacious and so was the bathroom. We also enjoyed having our own iPad and bluetooth speaker in our room because we could stream and jam out to some international radio stations.  2. Food. The food has a large french/creole…

title: Extraordinary property, so-so food
review: Good day,  Thank you for posting this extensive review of your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted that you enjoyed your time with us and that you already plan to come back for a future anniversary stay. I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the slow service you experienced on the beach and at the Bayside Restaurant. Your comments will be shared with the tams in those areas and refresher training implemented where required. Once again, many thanks for your review. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Heaven on earth
review: I spent a couple of nights at Sugar Beach with my 14 year old daughter for her birthday and Jr  High graduation. The property is breathtaking, the setting is truly remarkable. I've stayed in Hawaii and other islands but the location of Sugar Beach is over the top. Sitting on the beach in between the 2 Pitons is extraordinary. The staff at the hotel and our butlers were fantastic, we got upgraded to a villa with an amazing view of Petit Piton. It seemed like we were so close we could reach out and touch it! The crickets were crazy loud as one other reviewer mentioned, even with the windows closed and the ac going. I highly recommend earplugs. We ate at the Terrace Room for breakfast which was good and not astronomically expensive. I can't say the same about the Bayside…

title: Incredible experience, but not cheap!
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post your feedback about your mum and daughter vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. While on balance it appears you enjoyed your time at the resort, in particular your upgraded villa and the stunning location, I am sorry that our food and beverage offerings failed to meet your expectations. Your comments will be shared with our food and beverage team so we can make improvements where required and ensure there are dishes on our menus to accommodate a wide variety of tastes and budgets. We do hope that you will consider a return visit at some point in the future. It would be our pleasure to serve you. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Exceptional in every single way!
review: Excellent grounds, food, service, beach, rooms.... It is worth every penny. We really enjoyed our butlers and riding around the grounds in the tuk tuks. I couldn't believe all the beautiful plants and flowers, the place is truly lush. A perfect honeymoon spot.

title: a "must visit" destination
review: Describing this place as "amazing" doesn't quite do it justice.  It is hard to convey in words the magical feeling of a perfect white sand beach cradled between the two majestic Pitons (the famous two peaks of St Lucia.)  Very secluded, very private, peaceful, and relaxing.  We stayed for 5 nights and felt we were at least 2 nights short.   More details on everything are below, but the BOTTOM LINE: outstanding resort, best on the island in our opinion, and despite our travel rule of not going anywhere twice, we are certain we will definitely return.    This resort allows kids and as our family grows, we feel it will become a regular family retreat.   (By the way- for the honeymooners – do not worry about being overwhelmed by the kids and family atmosphere- the experience at the…

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to post your extensive review on TripAdvisor. We strongly believe that offering high quality service to our guests is paramount. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed all of our services, especially the genuine and professional hospitality of our staff. They will be commended for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Sugar Beach heaven
review: Beautiful hotel, great rooms. The view is absolutely amazing. Loved the Butler. It does not get better than this...the landscaping and the beach are very well kept. The best part about Sugar beach is you are on the worlds most perfect beach...the waves are not crashing on the beach, they are gently rolling on the shore, perfect for little kids. Snorkeling is less than a 100 yards... beautiful clear water. On the third day we took a fishing trip and the captain let us bring our catch back to the chef. Chef did an amazing job.    I would say this was almost the perfect trip but there is no such thing as perfect.....  Two days into our trip I noticed that I was missing a blouse, I thought I probably left it at home. But then the next day I had another blouse missing and I told my…

title: Dream Honeymoon!
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments.  I am sorry to hear of what you have described. We are fully investigating what you have claimed. This is a very rare and unusual case and we are doing all we can to get to the bottom of it.        Once again, I would like to apologize for this serious reported blemish on your stay. We will keep you informed as our investigation continues. We hope this has not left an indelible mark and that you will consider a return visit soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect honeymoon
review: No words can explain to the visitor how beautiful this resort rates. We stayed in the lowest priced room and it still was the best room I have ever stayed in. The people that worked there were very very nice. No other resort on this island compares to the location of Sugar Beach. The food was great BUT the portions were very small...and the price is extremely high. We had free breakfast included in our price so that was some relief. I thought I needed a car so I rented one but it was not worth the hassle of driving there...blew a tire five minutes from the airport. Don't rent a car. Everything about Sugar Beach is magical except the small and expensive portions of food.

title: Started rough, ended amazing
review: We arrived at the Sugar Beach Viceroy after leaving Ladera where we started our 10 yr wedding anniversary trip.  The trek down the road isn't easy (roads are not great in the southern part of the island) but the resort is beautiful.  We actually arrived when the resort lost power so it wasn't ideal!  We got upgraded to a villa in the 800's (still had power) and were not sure how to feel since a lot of people warned about villas needing tuk tuks to get around.  Our room wasn't ready either so we were given a tour of the property, booked a massage and then went to the manager's reception which were all lovely.  The spa is built into the rainforest and was really beautifully done (not so enjoyable with no lights/power though).  The villa was UNREAL.  It was beautiful - everything…

title: Honeymoon
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your Sugar Beach experience on TripAdvisor. I am glad that we exceeded your expectations in spite of the power situation that you highlighted. Although we were left at the mercy of the service provider, we did all that we could to ensure the comfort of our guests. I am pleased that everything worked out well and that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We would be delighted to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Regards,  André Boersma	 General Manager

title: Wedding
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach for an extended 12 stay and it lived up to all the best reviews. Personally, when planning an important trip, reviews can make you second guess yourself a lot as there is always a fair amount of people that love to find things to complain about, even in paradise. We would be hard pressed to find anything to complain about during our stay and better yet have so many things to say positively about the resort and the team.  The food in all three main restaurants (Bayside, Cane, Great Room) is terrific. Lots of options and yes pricey, but entirely comparable to any other local spot (Caribbean trends to have pricey food, if that's a deal breaker, I'd rethink your trip). As a couple we don't eat a ton or swig drinks at each meal, so we were fine to share…

title: Wonderful Stay!!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your glowing review on TripAdvisor. We are very happy to know that you had a fun time and that your experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort remains memorable for the right reasons.  The staff will be very pleased with your comments. We will commend them for contributing to your stay in the most positive manner.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return. Regards, André Boersma General Manager
