title: Wonderful Honeymoon!! Only one issue...
review: I had the pleasure of staying here aswell as the venue hosting my mothers wedding. Would recommend to all. Beautiful beach. Amazing food. Amazing staff. Would definitely stay here again.  A little bit pricey. A short distance from thr vibrant town centre (Soufriere)

title: Pleasant 2 hours!
review: We arrived on a cruise ship and had a private taxi driver take us here for lunch.  It was a very beautiful, serene setting on the beach.  Lunch and service was very good.  There is a small "public" area on the right side of the resort beach that rented chairs, etc. but we didn't stay.  If we did, we would have hung out on the resort beach since all beaches are public and there was only two of us.  It was very comical when all 5 boat tours from the ship came around the corner at once and they all scrambled for the chairs in the little beach area.  Once that was full the overflow went to the resort side in which all the security guards would try and limit them from going too far.  Since we ate there, we were able to walk around more freely (we were stopped once by a friendly man)…

title: 5 star Resort and Service
review: Good Day, On behalf of the entire team, I would like say how happy we are that you enjoyed your short visit with us, and thank you for providing us with your feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our resort and everything that we offered. I will pass on your glowing comments to team and let them know how much you appreciated your short visit. Once again, thank you for your wonderful comments and we look forward to welcoming you back soon, perhaps as resident guests. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: 10 year anniversary trip
review: This resort is absolutely beautiful. The location is perfect between the 2 Pitons. We stayed in Villa 705 which was both secluded and had view of beach, Pitons and ocean. The landscaping is thick and beautiful. The Villa was huge, large everything, closet, bathroom, shower, bedroom. The outdoor shower and levitating TV were cool bonuses. Service was impeccable, everything was quickly delivered and everyone seemed happy, warm, attentive, kind and  friendly. The grounds, rooms and service could not be better.  All our meals were  very tasty and beautifully presented. Our mini bar was stocked twice a day or more if you requested, free beer, water and pop. 2 welcoming Pina Coladas and a bottle of rum were nice bonuses. The food is pretty pricey, but very good.   We dived 3 times and…

title: Enjoying a piece of paradise
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to provide your feedback about your recent stay at Sugar Beach.  We are genuinely concerned with every guest experience and do all we can to ensure that the services and amenities that we offer provide great satisfaction to our guests needs. I am pleased that you enjoyed our high standards and our offerings.  I will communicate your feedback to the entire team.   Once again, thank you for your feedback and business. We welcome the opportunity to serve you again. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Sugar Beach St. Lucia
review: This is was technically our 2nd visit to this resort as we honeymooned here when it was the Jalousie Plantation in 2006.   Viceroy Sugar Beach has taken this resort to an entirely new level.   We are avid travelers and can say with confidence that this is truly a "premium" resort in every sense of the word.  This place is as perfect as a beach resort can possibly be.   We stayed in a luxury villa with butler service and cannot thank Gregg and Cody enough for how they took care of us.  The food may be expensive, but it is of high quality and never disappointed in the 7 days.  Hope to return sooner than another 10 years!

title: Had wedding, cousin got mugged by bar tender
review: Got scammed multiple times ever since day one when we checked in and they pretended we did not prepay for our rooms despite all the evidence that was provided. The butlers and doormen are great, every one else is so rude. Our air conditioner did not work for 2 days (including night of wedding) in a $1800 room, no one cared. There was no compensation or sincere appology. Kept trying to meet manager for 3 months, we kept getting blown off until the last day when we told them we were not going to pay for incidentals and going to the cops unless we mee someone in charge. We finally met the manager and told him our issues including how our guest got mugged by the Cane bar bartender, he blamed it on the guest wanting to buy marijuana like that justifies getting mugged by their…

title: Outstanding facilities and service
review: Good day, I am shocked and surprised to read your disparaging and inaccurate comments on this forum. I am truly saddened to see this posted, considering the time we spent together discussing your experience before your departure. Not only are your accusations unjustified and an untrue reflection of the level of service that we offer at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort; but they in no way illustrate the care and attention that was rendered to you in the run up to your wedding and during your time at the resort even when the unfortunate and upsetting family circumstances and last minute changes threatened to spoil your plans. Please allow me to remind you that you booked and paid for one room at the resort and this reservation was never changed or cancelled at any time. You were the only members of the wedding party staying at Sugar Beach and this was the case from the outset when you first started discussing your ceremony with our wedding planners. When you brought the reported situation concerning your cousin to our attention, we advised you to report the matter to the police so they could take appropriate action. I believe you and your cousin decided not to do so. As we agreed in our conversation, we at the resort cannot control all factors that take place off our property; and if your cousin was mugged while trying to purchase marijuana in the street, as he alleges, the police should have been informed as per your statement, the station was only half a block away. I do not appreciate when people try to create issues that do or did not exist and use this forum to perpetuate their false accusations especially when the issue involves someone that was a guest staying at another hotel. Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort has a reputation built on integrity and we take ownership of our business. When we slip up, we admit our lapses; we apologize for them and offer solutions.  I am truly appreciative that we were able to speak to one another in person before you left. It has definitely facilitated me to address your comments and put them into perspective.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Very good.......
review: If I could dream up the perfect caribbean resort, this would be it.  It is absolutely beautiful.  The location is perfect.  The views are amazing.  The landscaping is lush and never predictable.  Our cottage was one of the most beautiful accommodations I've ever seen.  Service was impeccable:  attentive, kind, friendly.   The grounds, rooms and service could not be better. My one complaint is the food and beverages.  I will review the restaurants separately, but the food is pretty pricey, and not very good.  That's not a huge problem, but the wine is.  The wine is outrageously over-priced.  We drink nice wines and don't blink at spending $100-200 on a nice bottle of wine in a nice restaurant.  But that's what you will spend on very marginal, cheap wines.  It makes dining a bit…

title: Why stay at Sugar Beach Resort
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your Sugar Beach experience. I would like to take the opportunity to apologize for your disappointments with our Food and Beverage offerings and prices. We are continually looking for ways to improve our culinary offerings and to ensure that we provide value for money and dishes that satisfy the myriad tastes and requirements of our guests. Our wine list is reviewed regularly and again, we try to include bottles that meet a variety of tastes and budgets. I am sorry we let you down in this regard. Once again, thank you for visit and your comments. Your review has been well-received and shared with the food and beverage team for their information and attention. We hope to see you again soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise
review: We had 7 nights here. Overall it was very good.The room was good with comfortable sitting room area, good bathroom amd decent bedroom. We were booked a Superior Luxury Cottage that doesn't seem to exist. I think we were in a Superior Luxury Cottage. It's a shuttle ride to the beach, pool and restaurants which is a bit of a pain, however there is a nice view.  You're allowed complimentary soft drinks and a couple of beers from mini bar. We did half board which I think I'd advise. The guests who were on full board seemed to be drinking their fair share but local beer and poor wine I imagine. Of the 3 restaurants our favourite was the Beachside one. Lovely atmosphere and good food. The Great Room was good but quite stiff. Didn't like the Cane Bar as it was like being in London, or…

title: Honeymoon Week in an Amazing Location
review: After getting married in the north of St Lucia, we went to Sugar Beach for our honeymoon week to see what life was like towards the south after hearing very good things about this hotel. The location really is amazing and well worth a visit to be sitting between the pitons. We stayed in a beachfront bungalow which was super, really spacious and lovely to sit outside our room right by the sound of the waves. Our first night involved a power cut to the hotel, whereby the following day we were offered to move to one of the Residences until the power was restored. What a treat this was, those places really are stunning with an infinity pool looking out to sea, we couldn't fault it and were so pleased to be offered this upgrade even if it was just for a night. We liked the idea of…

title: Beautiful, family friendly and amazing staff
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  First and foremost I would like to apologise for the power cut you experienced during your time on the resort. This was caused by circumstances beyond our control and we did our utmost to ensure our guests still had an incredible time.   In addition, it is disappointing to read about the service inconsistencies you have highlighted and experienced.  This is an area we have identified for renewed training efforts. We regularly review our service standards to ensure our guests enjoy prompt and efficient service at all times.   Your comments about our food and beverage offerings are also noted. I am also sorry that our menu selections and prices did not match your expectations.   We are pleased to read that apart from the disappointments that you highlighted, you had a wonderful and relaxing honeymoon.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: British Aristocrat and Elephant long gone but stunning location.
review: Today is my last day at sugar beach and I am so sad to be leaving.   The staff have been fantastic, particularly with my 1 year old who they seem to adore (they're great with all the other children too). We asked for a sponge and some washing up liquid for her bottles and they brought it for us within the hour, along with a steriliser for her!   The rooms are spacious, clean and classy.  The staff are always happy to help, our butler Dwight was particularly helpful and really made a difference to our holiday.  The food is great, although fairly expensive if you haven't opted for all inclusive. The sushi bar is modern and delicious, it serves things other the sushi if you're not a fan, I had chicken salad and it was the best salad I've ever tasted.   The location in between the…

title: A true piece of paradise
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to post your comments on TripAdvisor about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted to hear that your time with us was amazing in every way, especially for your daughter.   Your comments will be communicated to the staff and we will commend them for a job well done.  We hope to see you again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Wonderful Location and Accomodations
review: Possibly the best location in St Lucia a true plantation feel on spectacular beach between postcard Pitons and a lush tropical view to die for in paradise. It is a shame personally it has lost a little shabby chic ambiance but the odd worn out linen jacket is adorned. These days more bought for the trip look attire and new but you get an impression of a by gone age with all the luxury of modern amenities. Probably one of the most beautiful location I've experienced in the Islands after Cuba. You could never be disappointed with the rooms and service.

title: Stunning luxury hotel
review: We stayed here in Jan 2015.  I wasn't sure if a beach babe holiday was for me, but I absolutely loved this hotel.  An amazing setting in between the Pitons, with great views.  The rooms were a vision in white, with a lovely lounge area, comfy bed and a little outdoor pool.  The service and staff were 1st class, can't fault them, particularly the friendly and helpful butlers who make the stay extra special.  I was a little disappointed with the view initially, as it didn't have a sea view (although this felt very picky given how lovely it all was) but, as soon as we mentioned it, they moved us to a sea view room.  The food and drink were all fantastic.  The beach was pristine.  The pool was lovely.  The whole place is faultless.  We had an incredible week there.  Would def…

title: Paradise found
review: Good day,  Thank you for your feedback about your recent Sugar Beach vacation. We are happy to hear that you were impressed with all our services and amenities. Our aim is to deliver the best possible service to our guests and we are glad that everything worked out well for you.  Once again, thank you for your business, and comments. We look forward to serving you again.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful setting
review: After visiting over a dozen Caribbean islands in my travels, St. Lucia has stolen my heart. I'm guessing this resort had a lot to do with the theft. Sugar Beach is absolutely stunning, the location, the accommodations, the people... everything couldn't have been more perfect. Here's an overview of what to expect when staying there.  TRANSPORTATION I noticed some of the other reviewers said you might want to upgrade from a standard taxi when booking through the resort to go to and from the airport (due to the winding/uneven roads). We didn't have a problem with our taxi at all. I think they've been instructed to go slower now as ours were extremely cautious on the 45 minute drive to the resort.   Water taxis! Take them. We always had a water taxi sitting on the beach at the ready…

title: Monday afternoon visit for swimming & dinner
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to share your extensive review of your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are known for the world-class accommodation, facilities and top-flight service that we deliver to our guests. We are thankful that we had the opportunity to share this enjoying, relaxing and fulfilled experience with you.  The staff will be commended for a job well done. Your feedback and business are greatly appreciated. We welcome the opportunity to serve you again. We hope to see you soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Fantastic Stay!
review: This holiday was a family treat and we chose a sugar mill cottage which was a wonderful and delightful surprise.  The complex is immaculate and maintained to an extremely high standard, the staff cannot be more helpful and are courteous at all times.  Food and menus are well chosen and varied to accommodate all tastes.  A truly wonderful holiday location.

title: Stunning
review: Absolutely stunning location and property. Can't speak for all the villas but we were in 904 (Grand Luxury Suite) and felt like we had the best view at the resort... overlooking the jungle, the Petite Piton and the ocean beyond. The plunge pool was deep and large enough to enjoy. The furnishings and decor strike a prefect combination of modern and casual, with crisp white walls and linens and rich black woods. The staff was extremely friendly, hard working, and accommodating. Lots to do at the resort and the nearby area. I'd say it's the ideal location for experiencing St. Lucia. Only drawback is that the food, while high quality, is extraordinarily expensive.

title: Overall - no rooms seen
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Our accommodations are top of the line and many of our guests share the same sentiments that you have. I am glad to hear that everything worked out really well for you and that our team contributed in the most positive way. Once again, your comments are greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: It couldn't have been better
review: We sailed to the Pitons for the day and had lunch here at the beach restaurant.  The feel of the place was lovely; the pool (infinity) area was vast, but quiet and calm (maybe time of year) with trendy, cool sun beds.  Everything was v elegant; similar to some other resorts in the Windward Islands where it feels more like an area of private villas and some larger buildings rather than a hotel block.  Eating on the beach under the shade of the trees, with cocktails, friends and good food in elegant surroundings made me think of returning.  It isn't as 'aloof' as, say, the Cotton House, Mustique - again, only a visit there gave me that feeling - but it's certainly upmarket and chic!

title: Dream Vacation in Paradise
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to visit Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Based on what you described, we see that you were impressed with our services and offerings. We are happy to hear that your expectations were exceeded and that you will consider a stay in the near future. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We welcome the opportunity to serve you as a resident guest next time. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Great Resort in a Stunning Setting
review: This is an incredibly beautiful and luxurious resort where one can totally relax. We stayed in a three bedroom luxury villa with stunning views and elegant furnishings both inside and on our very spacious deck. We found the service to be superb and the food was excellent. The professional staff was gracious, warm and attentive to our every need. Indeed, we have never felt such a welcome in any other resort. Our butlers were superb, anticipating our every need and always available to meet any request we had. Every employee we encountered exuded the a warmth and authenticity that was common to every incur of the property. Even the  other guests whom we met were special and I have never seen children so well behaved which somehow rubbed off on our three kids.   The pool and the…

title: The pros and cons
review: My now husband and I went to Sugar Beach to get married and have got to say that I don't think there is a more beautiful place in the world to do so.  The wedding co-ordinator was brilliant and we had a most wonderful day in all respects.    However, even with such an upmarket resort there were pros but there were also cons.  Firstly the pros:  The resort is stunning and our apartment was incredible - every luxury, complete privacy, an outside rainforest shower, spectacular views, impeccable butler service and amazing sunsets.  This part of the holiday was faultless.  We were on level 9 and our walk down to breakfast in the mornings was absolutely beautiful. The setting for Sugar Beach is picture perfect, set between two pitons, the situation was idyllic.  However there were a…

title: Opulent luxury in the perfect climate
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your destination wedding at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We hope that your wedding day was everything that you dreamed it would be and that this moment will remain memorable for all the right reasons. Thank you for highlighting what worked well for you as well your disappointments. I would like to apologize for the inconveniences that you have outlined.  Your comments have been shared with the relevant departments as we are continuously looking for ways to improve our guest experiences, service and product. Again, I am sorry that all our offerings and service did not impress you. Thank you for your feedback and thank you once again for choosing Sugar Beach to celebrate such a special occasion.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Family Spring Break
review: It's 5:30am. I'm still a little jet lagged; my wife is sleeping in the adjoining bedroom. It's slowly getting light, and the air is full of the noises of crickets and other animals. I've made coffee, and will go for a quick dip in our little private pool in a moment. The we'll call our butler, and ask him to call us a shuttle to go for breakfast and the beach. We're talking luxury here. Sheer opulent luxury on a scale I've never experienced before. Everything is first class; everything works; this must be what heaven is about. I can't fault it.

title: Perfect Wedding
review: Good day,  Thank you for your wonderful comments and for taking the time to post this review while enjoying your vacation.  We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and that our setting and everything that we offered was first class in every way.  Once again, thank you for your review. We are looking forward to your return visit.  Regard,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Pricey  Heaven
review: We have always wanted to visit St Lucia and stay at Sugar Beach. We chose to go for spring break mainly because of the direct flight that is now available from Chicago O'Hare to St Lucia. I feel that I do have to preface the review by saying that we do generally stay in very nice resorts and thus have high expectations, especially given spending a lot of money to stay in a 4-bedroom residence.  For background, my husband and I traveled with two 17 year olds and a 12 year old (all boys). We booked a residence through our travel agent who had been there before, and we were assured that we would be on the beach or as close as possible (I guess they don't book exact residences or make guarantees as to which you will get.)  Upon arrival, the Sugar Beach gate attendant did not have…

title: Beautiful Quiet Resort
review: We stayed in an oceanview Villa #709.  The Villa was perfect, spacious, plenty of living space, closet space, large bathrooms, etc.  decor is great, technology is excellent (raising TV for the master bed, etc).  The outdoor space is huge, our veranda had a large covered outdoor space, with dining seating, lounge chairs, etc.  Then a step down to the sundeck with two lounge chairs and an umbrella.  finally a third level included a large plunge pool at the perfect temperature overlooking the beach and views of the pitons.    The butler service is excellent, and we were both given mobile phones with our butler on speed dial to call from anywhere or anytime with any requests.  Rides to the beach or the restaurants down the mountain are prompt and tut tut's provide guests an fun 2-3…

title: One of the most beautiful places on earth
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are elated to hear that you had a fabulous stay. We work hard to ensure that each and every guest we encounter receives the best possible service.  Once again, I would like to thank you for your comments and business. We hope to see you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: beautiful night time view - visitor from down the road
review: Where do I begin.  We stayed in a beach bungalow.  We were blown away at how beautiful it was.  The room is all white.  The room was amazing the bed was comfortable and the out door shower was great. The whole resort is breath taking. You are snuggled between the two Piton Mts every morning we would wake up and enjoy that view.  Butler, beach staff all staff were amazing.  They were all polite, accommodating and professional.  We are many meals at the Cane Bar enjoyed the sushi.  One day I got a massage and the Spa is great nestled in the woods.  The massage was great wish I would of went back for another one. It rained this day and the waterfalls that came down the Piton was amazing.   I even loved the art work in our room and one in the plantation house where we had breakfast.…

title: An amazing place, but ...
review: Good day,  We are delighted that you enjoyed your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We try our best to create remarkable experiences for everyone who stays.  It is such a pleasure to know that our resort provided you with the highest level of service and that our team provided all the special touches to ensure you returned home with memories to cherish.  It is also nice to read that you have a piece of paradise at home now too. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Review of the beach from a guest not staying at the resort
review: We had taken a taxi to Sugar Beach to watch the sunset, and then grab dinner. We had change of clothes in our backpack. When we got dropped off at the front entrance they advised us that we were under dressed for the dining experience and they were full just the same. We asked if we could head down to the beach and eat there. They said we could eat at the beach bar. We were happy with this. The beach bar wasn't sure if we could get food. After some discussion with manager we were offered a food menu, that didn't have many things listed. Our server. Mishka was outstanding and very friendly. We had 3 options for $54 along with wine & beer. In the end we were glad that we went down to try Sugar Beach but the experience wasn't that great.

title: Fantastic staff, beautiful resort
review: We have just returned from a two week family trip to Sugar Beach, and, having mined so many reviews myself I thought to ought to add my own thoughts.   I've just read the last review with interest as we were there with our children. I sympathise with their issues (sorry if our kids annoyed anyone!) I would say that it is the Easter holidays - I would suggest that honeymooning anywhere billed as family friendly during a major holiday is perhaps the problem...  The resort is wonderful for all ages - we actually remarked that we could easily imagine that other resorts would make the second beach adult-only and the great room an adult-only restaurant - but how wonderful that Sugar Beach is so laid-back and welcoming.   This brings me to the main point of my leaving a review - the…

title: Beautiful, but certainly not a good honeymoon destination
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your family stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We delighted with your comments. Most importantly, we are happy that your stay remains memorable for all the right reasons. We know how important it is for our younger guests to be comfortable and relaxed in our environment therefore, we always go the extra mile to ensure that they enjoy the time spent with us. Alcee, Mackensie and Manaskie will be commended for the exceptional service they provided. Once again, thank you for your comments, recommendations and business. We hope to welcome you and your family back in the near future Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Wow!  Could not be more Perfect!
review: I must say first, the location and views are breathtaking. The resort itself and rooms are beautiful and clean . Everything else sort of fell flat for us. We spent the first half of our honeymoon at a resort on the north side of the island, and thought we saved the best for last in coming to Sugar Beach for the second half. This was certainly not the case. I'm not a big reviewer, but this was something I felt pretty strongly about.   The food and drinks though very expensive, were good. I expected everything to be expensive as per the reviews, and that was accurate. However I have no problem with things that are worth it being expensive. I will gladly pay for something of high quality. Many things food wise justified the prices, and some things did not. If the service…

title: Regional Manager
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry to hear that there were so many disappointing experiences during your stay. I understand that you did not anticipate the influx of children during the time you visited. The Easter holidays are always a very busy time with families and it is a shame your honeymoon fell at the same time. Our team members are generally known for the high level of service they provide. I am disappointed to hear of the experience you have highlighted–especially the poor service you have reported in our restaurants. Your feedback has been shared with the food and beverage team and refresher training and coaching will be undertaken where required. We want to  ensure that our guests are always treated in the best possible way. I am sorry if this was not the case during your stay. We hope you will consider a return visit so we can share the first class Sugar Beach experience that we are known for but that sadly lapsed on this occasion. Thank you once again for your feedback. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful Resort
review: Beautiful.  Beach and resort are located in a valley between the Pitons, essentially the most perfect location on the entire island.  Good food, good drinks.  Recommend the burger at the Bayside restaurant and getting a massage at the beautiful spa. Unless you want to hike to the top of the Piton, which we did and enjoyed, I would not recommend ever leaving the resort.  Also, do not even think about renting a car while you are there.  The roads are very narrow and winding and they drive on the left side of the road.

title: Wedding venue
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted to hear that you had a fabulous stay. We always aim to ensure that each and every guest we encounter experiences the best possible service.  Once again, I would like to thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to welcoming you back. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Visiting The Sugar Beach Resort And The Public Portion Of Sugar Beach
review: My husband and I got married here in 2010 and had the most amazing time ever. Our accommodation was a gorgeous self contained villa, colonial style property with a four poster bed, our own pool with outdoor shower and stunning views of the Pitons from our property. The whole resort was beautiful, filled with flowers, mango & banana trees. There was a beachside bar & restaurant which served delicious local foods and you were safe drinking the water as filtered on site. It has a restaurant in the main room which served fine dining, this was were we had our wedding evening meal, on the balcony, with flowers sprinkled on the table, a real special touch. The staff couldn't do enough for us, all so friendly and helpful, lovely people. I have posted some photos for all to see. As we…

title: Great time for 25th Anniversary
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing comments about your 2010 wedding at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It brings us a great deal of satisfaction to hear that your wedding was amazing and that even then our services exceeded your expectations. I will share your comments with our team for providing the little touches and attention to detail that made your special day memorable for all the right reasons. Once again, thank you for your comments, recommendations and business. We hope to welcome you back, perhaps for a special anniversary celebration. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Very disappointing
review: We visited Sugar Beach by taxi from Soufriere.  I would definitely not recommend trying to walk in from the road and it is a long way and the road very hilly and steep. On the way out it was raining and two vans were parked by the side of the road, as they could not make it up one of the hills due to their tires slipping.  Our car taxi just barely made it.  Based on the negative comments I read in other reviews about the Sugar Beach Resort, I was expecting a bit of a hard time, however, that was not the case at all. The hotel has two gates. The taxi went through the first gate and there is a visitor parking lot at the second gate.  The guard called for a resort shuttle and we rode down to the beach for free. On the way the driver had to deliver a package to one of the cottages…

title: Nice - at a price!
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach for 3 nights of luxury at the end of a 2 week holiday in the Caribbean, starting at Ti Kaye in St Lucia, from here we headed on for a week on Palm Island in the Grenadines before finishing back on St Lucia at this hotel. We had Sugar Mill room 11, which was just across the lane from the main plantation style building, where breakfast is served. This was a good spot as easy access down to the beach and other facilities, and not too hard a walk up to reception and the spa opposite that.  The appearance and location of the hotel is absolutely stunning with its lovely beach between the Pitons and high quality accommodation. Our room was beautifully presented with a sumptuous 4 poster bed.  The mattress was covered by a topper which in turn was covered by an…

title: Awesome vacation spot with fabulous service
review: Good day Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your Sugar Beach experience.  We are always pleased to hear great comments and to know that you were really pleased with the high level of service that we provided. We provide top-notch amenities, facilities and accommodation that we know will enhance our guests’ overall experience. I am particularly pleased that you valued the upgrade that was offered to you.  Regarding the food, I am glad that you enjoyed the food offerings with the exception of the concerns that you mentioned about the price. I would like to apologize for this disappointment.   Once again, thank you for your comments and we would be delighted to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort for a future stay.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Absolutely beautiful!
review: Perfect vacation in awesome location, surrounded by Pitons, excellent beach+pool experience.  We enjoyed some of the restaurants on the premises, especially the sushi bar. Every day there were optional activities, we hiked the Pitons, but essentially were able to relax entirely on the premises. The Villa was fantastic, large with plunge pool, outside porch and deck, inside was large with big plush bed, bathroom with bath, very large shower and also outdoor shower.  The property, itself is large, built into the hillside and absolutely beautiful. Huge kudos to Markenzie and Maneka, the butlers, and John Wayne taxi is highly recommended 17584603974, I would recommend a call in advance. In short the SERVICE is above excellent!!!

title: Absolute paradise
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments.  I am pleased that you were happy with your decision to choose Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort as your holiday destination. I am also pleased that we exceeded your expectations in all areas.  Once again, thank you for your glowing comments and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: A beautiful, peaceful escape
review: My husband and I were recently in Sugar Beach resort, St. Lucia and will absolutely return next year!   Our villa was stunning and so comfortable.  Wish I could find out which make the mattress and pillows are - never slept better in my life.  The staff, each and every single person were terrific all so  very warm and friendly always ready with helpful suggestions or anything you could possibly need or want.  It was  also fun to take "Tuk Tuks" everywhere and certainly did not have to wait very long for  one.   The fitness centre was very good as well and the on staff trainers were so helpful!! Particularly to me as I have pulled a muscle in my back and they fixed my right up. I have to say too that each and every meal was top notch.  Enjoyed everything from the  informal dining…

title: great property, great staff, but,,,,
review: this is an incredibly beautiful property,,,secluded, villas nestled on the side of a hill. The rooms/suites are extraordinary, all well equipped with wonderful views. The staff is uniformly friendly and competent. The views are wonderful. Getting around the hotel is easy, with ubiquitous shuttles.  There are, however, a few things to keep in mind. The hotel is very popular with honeymooners and young couples with infants and toddlers. Its cute etc, but not for everyone. The restaurants, while attractive, are just ok. This is not an issue when there are convenient alternatives, but given the geography, dining at other restaurants (mostly located in scenic hotels) requires a lengthy taxi ride.

title: This is paradise!
review: Good day, Thank you for your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and that the courtesies and services extended to you positively contributed to a relaxing vacation. I am also pleased that you were satisfied with everything that we offered.  Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated.   On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Wedding
review: If you're planning a trip to St. Lucia, the best place to stay is definitely Sugar Beach! I had wanted to visit St. Lucia for some time, but getting there is a bit cumbersome. Determined to make it work for our anniversary trip, I bought the air and started researching properties. I was two clicks away from staying at Hotel Chocolat, and I'm so glad I didn't! Not because HC is a bad hotel, which I wouldn't know since I didn't stay there, but because you're really held captive anywhere on St. Lucia, so it might as well be the best place!  My husband and I are seasoned travelers and we like to explore wherever we are visiting. While in St. Lucia, that was nearly impossible, unless we wanted to pay a ridiculous amount to money going to and from. Transportation is just tough. The…

title: Quite fabulous but...
review: Good day,   Thank you for sharing your feedback about your holiday experience at Sugar Beach.  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to say how delighted we are that we met and exceeded your expectations.  We are committed to making holiday experiences fulfilling and memorable by providing first class services and amenities.  Once again, thank you for your very valuable feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Awful lunch
review: It was perfect! Residence homes are gorgeous, infinity pool was a dream! Everything was outstanding. Loved my beach wedding!! Loved my taxi driver DAve Charles taxi. He picked us up from airport and brought us to sugar beach. Also took care of us during our 10 day stay and showed us the entire island. Magic!

title: Disappointing lunch
review: Disappointing lunch in that service was poor and food unexceptional yet pricey. Also, because the dining area by the outdoor grill was close to the public dock, there was little exclusiveness in that section of the beach. Ladera, the resort immediately above it, which has beach privileges at Sugar Beach, is a much better choice. Better yet, rent your own lavish villa at colibricottage.net and enjoy a truly unique memory.

title: Fantastic Property
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your visit to Sugar Beach. I am sorry to hear that you were disappointed with lunch and the prices charged. Based on what you have described, Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort was not the place for you.  Thank you for your comments. Perhaps a return visit in the future might help to change your point of view. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful, iconic location & a VERY high quality resort
review: Overall we had an amazing experience.  I have been to a few Caribbean islands and St Lucia is definitely one of my favorite islands now. The hotel was great- I would definitely consider it the top resort on the island. This is the third Viceroy property that I've stayed in and it was worth every penny. The villa was stunning, literally no complaints.   The beach: beautiful beach, yes it is a public beach, but do keep in mind that some of the other high end resorts on the island don't have an easy beach access at all. Beach staff was very attentive and perhaps better than the restaurant staff. Little things like cleaning sunglasses and offering fresh face towels were a nice touch.   Service: it can be a hit or miss but do keep in mind that everyone is on the island time. For…

title: AMAZING!
review: Good day,  Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  As a Viceroy Hotel Group traveller, your feedback is especially important to us.  I am pleased that overall you had a wonderful stay. Once again, thank you for your comments, recommendations and loyalty. We hope to welcome you back soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise not quite fulfilled
review: The views are stunning & the beach is gorgeous nestled between the 2 beautiful pitons.  Fantastic villa accommodation dotted around the hillside, but camouflaged in such a way as not to detract from the fantastic views.  Loved the way your "butler" welcomes you, makes all your restaurant reservations & generally looks after you throughout your stay.  The resort's internal transportation system - mainly via brightly coloured Tuk Tuks - is extremely well managed, as well as necessary to get to/from the restaurants, rooms & beach.  The walk down in the morning from our villa at the top was lovely (approx 10 mins) but the walk back up (which I did once daily) was a REAL workout!  Food was generally high quality but could do with some more variety.  We ate on the resort the entire…

title: fantastic friendly hotel with lovely views
review: we have just returned from sugar beach, after a glorious 2 weeks, the standard is very high, food excellent and personal dining fully recommended. Our suite at the sugar mill was lovely, and all of the staff ensured that our trip was perfect and everything was catered for.  fully recommend this resort to anyone looking for that special holiday.

title: Fabulous throughout
review: Good Day,  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us, and would like to thank you for providing your feedback.  It is gratifying to know that you enjoyed everything we offered.  Thank you once again for your review and we hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Stunning day trip to their beach
review: Spent a week at Viceroy SB and although a long time in one spot, the people and rooms made it a fabulous experience start to finish. Others have commented on the food which is undeniably expensive (we opted last minute for their meal plan which was probably no cheaper but at least established the costs up front for meals), but meals were beautifully prepared, served and interesting.  We generally dined at the Great Room which has a gorgeous room feel and gracious staff. Biggest nuisance is the US$18 charge for room service delivery. Yes, the resort is rambling but for the somewhat erratic room service delivery, another charge to just deliver the food? Annoying.   Stayed in 705 which although high up the hill was private and afforded unbelievable views.    Tip: Take the Gros…

title: Sugar Beach Viceroy is Sugar Sweet
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to post your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am glad that you had a wonderful time and that you enjoyed our resort and all of the activities you can try nearby—like climbing Gros Piton.  We try to ensure that all of our guests leave with fantastic memories.   Once again, thank you for your comments and your business. We are look forward to serving you again.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Almost paradise in the Carribean
review: We went there for the day to go snorkeling and enjoy their beach.  Beautiful beach and hotel. Nice pool. Drinks and food were amazing and the service was exceptional too.  So happy we spent a day there. Highly recommend to take a water taxi there even if you're not staying at the resort.  Pictures were taken on the beach and pool.

title: A Spoonful of Sugar Makes It All Good
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach in January.  This was our second trip to St Lucia and the First at Sugar Beach.  We had a room in the 900 section.  At first we thought that this was a long ways from the beach.  After getting into the rhythm of Sugar Beach, we loved every moment.  The staff is great and extremely friendly.  It is a hill side resort and the hill is steep.  They have shuttles that pick you up and take you to the beach and restaurants.  Really enjoyed riding in the Tuk Tuks.  The fitness area is a large and has great equipment.  The spa is a collection of tree houses in the rain forest.  The food is delicious.  The French Toast is a must try.  The Cane bar offers Sushi and a modern vibe.  We got in a routine of Bayside for dinner which is on the beach. You can walk the…

title: Amazing Place
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to post your review about your second “sweet” experience at Sugar Beach. Your feedback and loyalty are very important to us.  Once again, we are proud that we exceeded your expectations in every aspect the second time around.  We look forward to your third visit. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Overall Best Luxury Resort in St. Lucia
review: I got married here in 2007. It has changed hands and has gone considerably (more) upscale, but the location cannot be surpassed. We also went to Sandals, which was nice, but nothing like here. The private beach is fabulous, and there are a number of interesting excursions nearby. It is fairly isolated and pretty much self contained, but it is a fabulous place to relax.

title: Sugar, Sugar. Second stay at Sugar Beach is just as sweet.
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your return visit to Anse des Pitons and stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted that you decided to revisit the place where you tied the knot and to see all of the changes that have taken place since the transformation of the resort from its Jalousie Plantation days. I am happy that you appreciate all of the changes and enhancements and that Sugar Beach remains your favorite spot.  Once again, your loyalty, comments and business are greatly appreciated.  We are looking forward to serving you again in the not too distant future. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Stole my heart!
review: Let me start off by saying that I spent weeks vetting the island's many hotels and resorts in planning a relaxing and romantic honeymoon.  I spoke to many travel agents, read tons of travel blogs, and practically lived on TripAdvisor for authentic input.  Sugar Beach was the last stop to round out our two week honeymoon.  We previously spent 4 days at Sandals La Toc and 4 days at Cap Maison (both of which I've provided reviews for), and it's safe to say that we saved the best for last with a four day stay at Sugar Beach.  For those looking to explore the diverse landscape of St. Lucia by bouncing around the island like we did, our picks pretty much cover it.  If we could do it all over again, we'd skip Sandals for reasons mentioned in my other review.  In fact, we'd recommend…

title: Top setting, top prices
review: We had just two capucino's on the beach. Setting is great, capucino's were good and we paied an astonishing US$ 16 for the coffee. But we enjoyed. Good service, inclusive a pendel service from the parking lot.

title: The best ever......(so far, it is)
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that you had the opportunity to use our facilities. We apologise if our prices were steeper than you had anticipated. We hope this will not deter you from considering a return visit perhaps a resident guest in the near future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: The Perfect Honeymoon!
review: Secret. I'm not yet finished my time here but I'm compelled to write this one up. First off, land in the South of the island (if you can) and come via windy charming roads. If you arrive in rain (seen a bit) you might be a little (oh oh) but don't. The rain passes. It's ok. And when it shines, it's hot enough. This resort has high standards. Breakfast on the terrace is a must do. The beach is lovely. Just busy enough but not too busy. Lovely chairs under straw umbrellas.  There is a history here ( read up). It's a unique place. Squashed between the Pitons. It's just a spectacular backdrop. Dinner. Lots of choices. Hardly got beyond Bayside. The Friday night buffet BBQ is great. I'm not a fan of trousers and collars on vacation so we didn't eat at the Great room but it looked…

title: Great place
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted with your feedback and the Sugar Beach holiday that you have described. Our aim is to offer our guests memorable experiences that last a lifetime. I know our team members will be thrilled with your review. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise Found at Sugar Beach
review: My wife and I were lucky enough to stay here over Christmas '15 for our honeymoon. The resort is just absolutely amazing. The resort is something 200 acres with small collections of detached bungalows scattered across the resort. Our villa was absolutely perfect, greats views, a private pool and a beautiful terrace where we often had breakfast delivered. The beach is simply stunning, the beach restaurant has a great food and the staff simply cannot do enough for you. The butler service is second to none and no ask is too big for them. We would highly recommend this hotel for couples and families. Thank you for making our honeymoon so special!

title: What a room - what a price!
review: I will give the upgraded room given us an EXCELLENT rating.  It was spacious, stylish, crazy beautiful view, plunge pool, comfortable bed...I mean top drawer.  There is a 'Butler; assigned to each room which/ where the guys are pretty attentive and try hard but the classic Downton Abbey Experience you will not have....because between the technology and logistics in moving around that resort, it just doesn't come off well and are handcuffed by the infrastructure at Sugar Beach.  I learned to hate the 'Tuk Tuks' to get around the resort which some may love because they are cute and colorful, but they're are not enough of them - they are noisy - and difficult for older (or taller) folks to get in and out.  The beach was fantastic and the set up with the bars and restaurants (and…

title: Amazing resort
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your Sugar Beach experience with on TripAdvisor. We are glad that you appreciated the room upgrade and that the villa you were assigned was beautiful.  We are always looking for ways to enhance our butler service for a remarkable guest experience. We know this is an important part of our service offering. Thank you for recognizing our efforts to perfect this service.  I understand your discomfort with the tuk tuks. In addition to the tuk tuks, we also offer larger vans to shuttle guests around. I am sorry if you were not aware of this option.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope you will change your mind and consider a return visit at some point in the future. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Very Expensive
review: We had a fantastic stay at Viceroy for 7 days.  Our luxury villa was perfect and can't imagine there is a better view anywhere on property, although I don't think you can really go wrong with any room here.  Traveling in and out of St. Lucia was very easy.  We arranged transport to and from the airport through the hotel which was great.  Upon arrival to the resort we were taken straight to our villa on the small winding paths that run throughout the property.  Out butler was waiting for us and check in was quick and easy.  The villas were amazing, all white, classy.  Our room had the wonderful indoor bathroom and shower as well as an outdoor shower that offered privacy with a view straight down to the ocean.    Main pool was really great.  We alternated time between the the…

title: Great Relaxation food and service
review: Good day, We really appreciate you taking the time and making the effort to comment on your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our aim is to ensure that every guest has the best holiday possible. Our high quality service and our remarkable setting provide the perfect combination for a memorable stay.  We are happy that you appreciated our all our services and that you would recommend our resort to others. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing Getaway
review: We stopped here on the 5th February '16 for some diving in the bay. Unfortunately the wind was up and the Hotel rep on the pontoon advised us against it but invited us to use the bar. We took him up on his offer and our party of 4 had a small rum each. While we were enjoying our drink unknown to us the rep told our boats captain that he was not allowed to use their pontoon so he had to wait at sea. We finished our drinks at a cost of £12 each which was a nasty suprise only to find our captain and mate having to assist one of the hotels boats in mooring as their team were unable to do so... All in all a bit of a joke, very glad we stayed at the excellent Landings and not here.

title: Ten days of bliss.
review: Our villa was spacious and had a plunge pool.  We were up in the rainforest and had to call for a TukTuk to go to the beach or to return 'home' or back down to a restaurant. All four restaurants were superb.  Great staff worked very hard to make it the perfect vacation.

title: Very relaxing
review: Good day,  On behalf of the Sugar Beach team, I would like to thank you for your wonderful comments.  It is a real pleasure to learn you had a memorable stay for all the right reasons. I will be sure to pass on your glowing feedback to the staff members who contributed to making your vacation remarkable.  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Your comments and business are truly appreciated.  Best Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect honeymoon destination!
review: First time to St.Lucia. The resort is lovely and the beach is beautiful. The gym does the job but there is no bathroom / change room so be sure you can wait as it is a 10 min walk back to the resort.  There are little taxi-trucks that transport you back and forth between the main resort and your room / beach etc.. The employees were especially lovely and kind! The formal dining restaurant is gorgeous but the service was not the best. Very slow.

title: Fantastic hotel in the most idyllic location possible
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am pleased to hear that your stay was relaxing and everything was perfect for you. I am sorry that you were not aware and could not locate the nearby bathroom serving the gym area. We have changing rooms, showers and toilets right next door. We will look into placing a sign near the gym directing guests to these facilities. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. Your comments have been appreciated. We hope you will consider a return visit soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: I shall return!
review: I spent a year post-wedding researching the "perfect" honeymoon spot for us. We wanted a blend of relaxation (drinks by the beach, massages at a spa) and outdoor exploring (hiking, visiting local attractions, scuba diving, sunset cruises)...and Sugar Beach delivered!  They accommodated our request for a secluded, romantic villa, which came with it's own sun deck, dip pool and attentive butler. Our butler took care of meal & activity reservations, suggestions of places to visit (and avoid), and any requests that we had. The restaurants and beach were a short 5 minute walk- or you could call for a hotel rickshaw. The spa was an absolute treat- the ambiance, the personalized attention, the services offered...definitely worth checking out.  Activities that the hotel helped arrange:…

title: Paradise
review: Beautiful, great service, lovely accommodations, good food. You are in the jungle- lush vegetation, gorgeous surroundings and friendly staff. A perfect location! Worth getting off property for tours, and dining at nearby boucan and ladera. Spa is just wonderful- fab massage by Leah. Cane club has beautiful art and delicious sushi. Tennis could be strengthened. Ask fitness center to make appt with davis cup winner Vernon Lewis. Fitness instructors are sweet and energetic. Sunset sail was fun!

title: Amazing holiday
review: Good day, I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your feedback. We are always happy to read positive comments about an enjoyable stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Based on what you have described, your stay was memorable for all the right reasons. You may be happy to know that we have a new, young, energetic, well known tennis pro on our team. Our guests love him.  Once again, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise!
review: I recently spent 5 nights over NYE with my partner at Thr Viceroy Sugar Beach in St Lucia, and it was fabulous.  As we booked quite last-minute we had to book into one of the 2-bed residences which was effectively a private house with ball on the resort.  The house itself was gorgeous, with a large master bed and bath, a large open plan lounge and kitchen and a small second bath and shower room. The lounge and bedrooms open up onto a large outdoor dining table space with lounge area and small pool. To be honest the room and pool were so nice we barely left the room!  The restaurants were very good, they have just hired a Michelin star head chef from France and are re-vamping all the restaurants to his high quality. The only part left to improve is the room service menu which…

title: Snuba at Sugar beach!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort on TripAdvisor. It brings us great satisfaction to know that your accommodation, and our amenities, food and beverage offerings and service contributed to an amazing stay.  I am surprised to read your comments about inadequate sun lounges. I am sorry if you encountered challenges in that area. We definitely had sufficient sun lounges for the number of resident guests we had at this busy period.  Unfortunately, we have a limited number of shade cabanas and not all lounges could be placed under one of these on peak days.  Your comments and business are appreciated. We hope to see you again soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfection!
review: We had a wonderful stay at Sugar Beach! We stayed for 6 nights. The staff are so sweet and kind. Every time me needed something, someone was there to make it happen. The only thing we had problems was with the prices. If I knew how much every lunch or dinner would cost, we would have ordered the all inclusive service, which must be better in the end. We had free beer and water in our room, but when we asked for water in the beach it costs $6 plus tax. Other from that, our experience was wonderful! The white beach, the spa, gym, courts, staff and every little details made the difference.

title: Relaxing second part of honeymoon
review: We visited Sugar beach as the second part of our honeymoon in the Caribbean. The hotel is beautiful and impeccably maintained. The surroundings are serene and romantic.  Our bungalow was beautiful and very convenient as we were able to come and go all day without having to call for the mini taxis.  We visited all three restaurants and we found the one on the beach the more easy going . The one with the sushi was very good but we were not too fond of being inside and also we thought the modern decor was cold. Breakfast was good and service attentive. We also enjoyed our daily lunch either by the pool or at the beach. The service there was very good but sometimes it's tiresome of being asked if everything is ok 15 time per day...One day I was heading to my room in order to charge…

title: Highly recomend
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your Sugar Beach honeymoon experience. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with the exception of the little annoyances and disappointments that you mentioned. I am sorry. Everyone enjoys our scenic location and we continuously strive to ensure that we provide services and amenities to match our setting.  I am pleased breakfast was to your satisfaction. Our culinary team will be happy with your comments.  Our aim is to ensure that we offer prompt and attentive service in all of our restaurants. I am sorry that the manner in which it was done was intrusive and overwhelming. Your feedback will be discussed with the restaurant team and refresher training implemented where required. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: They are paying attention
review: It's clear from the pictures what a stunning location the hotel is set in so thought I would focus this review on the service which is every bit as wonderful. We made a couple of specific requests which were very kindly accommodated and helped to make our break extra special. Would say the hotel is more focused on romance and relaxation rather than kids but that's not to say there isn't things for children to do and eat. Followed the advice of some previous reviews that mentioned PHV car company for a transfer to and from the airport.

title: Authentic and friendly as well as a high end treat
review: Good day,  Thank you for your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am happy to read that your stay was flawless and all of your requests and expectations were met. The team will be commended for a job well done.  We try our best to be family friendly by offering quality facilities and amenities to ensure the comfort of our younger guests. Families love it here and we see a lot of return visits—especially around the holidays.  We appreciate both your comments and your business. We hope to see you again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Honeymoon perfection
review: Sugar Beach is a stunning property, and the level of care and cleanliness is truly outstanding.  There has been a remarkable amount already said of the location and views, and I would echo the accolades.   We stayed in the "900s", and if the rooms and views get any better than what we experienced, I would be shocked.  It's also quite clear that the hotel is paying attention to the numerous complaints about service, and trying to get service inline with the quality of the facility.  During our stay we were asked on a number of occasions (bordering on the absurd) if "everything was ok" by staff (a welcome query) to the more bizarre daily episode where beach attendants would offer to clean your sunglasses, then ask for comments about the hotel and facilities (as they checked your…

title: Most Relaxing and Luxurious Vacation
review: My husband and I went here for our honeymoon and can't stop talking about how dreamy it was. The views (from the beach, the pool, the breakfast terrace, and best of all- our very own villa) were incredible. No photo could capture it. The best part was our butler, Nissan, made the experience one we will never forget. He went above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of and had everything we needed in a timely manner (from pizza, to a ride to the beach, to booking dinners, etc.) He was so pleasant. Everyone on the staff was SO NICE. I can't wait to come back, whenever that may be :)

title: Paradise
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team I would like say how happy we are that you enjoyed your honeymoon at Sugar Beach.  We are committed to providing our guests with the highest level of service and it is satisfying to know that you enjoyed our hotel facilities and accommodations. I will communicate your feedback to the entire team and commend them for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your very valuable feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: Honeymoon Dream Come True!!
review: We will shortly be making our fourth trip to Sugar Beach and felt it was time to write a review.  Firstly, I have to take issue with some of the negative comments.  Nowhere is "perfect" and sometimes things go wrong, I do think some people are overly picky when they write reviews.  I was most surprised to read that somebody spent at least an hour a day waiting for pick ups - this has never been our experience.  The longest we have ever had to wait is ten minutes, but hey, this is the Caribbean and you are there to relax, there should be no rush to get anywhere!  We usually stay in villas 701/702 which have the best views of the Pitons, lovely outdoor space, and are very private.  We have also stayed in a residence which was beautiful  and had the advantage of being close enough…

title: Slice of Heaven��
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to post your review on TripAdvisor prior to your fourth stay with us. We would also like to thank you for your loyalty and the trust that you have in our product.  Most important, we are glad every one of your visits has proven to be even better than the one before. It is gratifying to know we continue to exceed your expectations. The individuals mentioned will be very happy with your comments and will be commended for a job well done. See you soon! Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Really Really Close to Perfection.
review: I can't say enough about how much this resort blew us away. We had read so many reviews about how amazing it was and everything was even more than what we expected. I was a little nervous when I heard that it was family friendly, but there ended up being very few children there and they did not bother our stay at all. We were upgraded to an even more extravagant room than what we thought we were getting once we got there because we were told it was the slow season (hurricane season- Sept.). There were a few short rain storms that came through, but did not ruin our stay at all considering the place is gorgeous even when it rains.   The all-inclusive was soo worth it for us because we are foodies and loved trying all their drinks. It is totally the way to go if you want a bucket…

title: Simply Stunning - one of the Caribbean's most exotic resorts .
review: I did not stay this year , just went down for day visit . Wonderful , probably 4th time I have seen the resort and it just keeps getting better . Fantastic between the Pitons setting , super Gingerbread style typically Caribbean luxurious accommodation , superb soft sand beach  ( enhanced each year with  imported  ) and great water quality . Highly original rainforest spa . Tuk Tuks imported from Thailand to shuttle you around the extensive  resort estate . Maybe it is not for everyone . You have to like the natural totally tropical hillside setting , you a quite remote from anything else - Ladera and Hotel Chocolate are a few minutes drive away as is the ramshackle village of Soufriere - but that apart your activities will probably be resort based .  Great for romance - silver…

title: great place, great service but very expensive and pretty basic
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team I would like to express how happy we are that you enjoyed your visit with us, and to thank you for taking the time to share this review. We are committed to providing a high level of service to all of our guests (resident and non-resident alike) and we are pleased we met and exceeded your expectations. We hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach in the not too distant future—once again as a resident guest.  Best Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: Truly a 5-Star Resort
review: Just that. great location, great service but very basic in many areas and extorionately expensive for some very average food. maybe book early for a cheaper rate however once there its very hard to travel around the island and you will be locked into eyewatering expenses and mediocre facilities.

title: Stunning Location with superb bungalows
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry you had issues with the quality and pricing of our food. This is an area that we are continuously looking for ways to improve to ensure that all our guests are always happy and satisfied and that the dishes served offer true value for money. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Set in Paradise
review: While I'm not one to frequently review, I find myself compelled to let everyone know that Sugar Beach is most definitely a special place and deserves a 5-star rating.  Everything from check in (which means taking my wife & I directly to our Villa with no reception nonsense), spectacular scenery & location at Sugar Beach & Valley of the Pitons, incredible service, whether be by our Butler service, friendliness of the staff, food at all restaurants...the Best overall resort we have visited.  And btw - the shuttle service that is needed because most villas are situated on the side of the hill is something we really enjoyed; not sure why some people complained.  Tuk-Tuk (little buggies used to escort guests to restaurants, beach/pool) is now part of our vocabulary.  Trying to…

title: Wow what a difficult review
review: I don't know how to rate this property. If you rate it on beauty and location it's clearly a 5 star resort. One of the most beautiful places and beaches I have ever been to. We stayed in a grand luxury villa with an ocean view. It was massive and just beautiful. 2 huge bathrooms and a patio that had 3 separate seating areas in addition to in infinity plunge pool. You are way up on this green lush mountain with a view of all.  We had a family of 4 stay there  with more than enough room. The beach is so very beautiful but has a major fly problem which staff said they are working on.  The cons are unfortunately significant.  I would have mad it a 3 star but since it was holiday season and All places are way too busy then I gave them a break. In addition they were generous with me…

title: Beautiful location and amazing staff
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate your comments and are sorry that you did not fully enjoy your time at the resort, despite loving the accommodations and the resort location between the Pitons. Your  feedback on the service issues that were of concern to you have been well received and will be discussed with the relevant department heads, as will your comments about pricing in our food and beverage outlets. To respond to your comments about the shuttle service, we always make full preparations to ensure that our shuttle service is quick and efficient. Rest assured we have adequate shuttles to provide this service in a timely manner. I am surprised by your comments as we rarely receive such criticism. Thank you also for your comments about the boutique. I will be sure to communicate your feedback to the boutique manager to ensure that the expectations of our guests are met in this area. We currently lease the space to an outside company.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope you will consider a return visit soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing honeymoon
review: We had a wonderful family holiday here, the beach and waters are stunning , all the suites are beautiful ( although very shaded ) and the staff offer fantastic service. The food is great but could benefit from more variety .

title: Snorkeling
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are pleased that your stay was nothing short of amazing. The staff will be very pleased with your feedback.  Thank you for your review. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: They set high standards and failed to meet them
review: Absolutely amazing time at Sugar Beach! A picture perfect vacation in paradise. We took advantage of the volcano tour/mud treatment/massage and loved every minute of it. Wish we would have talked to the other guests sooner as the majority had been there before and were very knowledgeable about place to, things to do and good snorkeling spots. We will definitely be back.

title: 60th Birthday Surprise in Paradise!
review: I have never written a review before on Trip Advisor, but I felt compelled to do so after visiting this property.  I have often read reviews here and been the beneficiary of others' advice, so I wanted to repay the favor.    St. Lucia was a bucket list vacation for my boyfriend.  So, I surprised him with the trip for his 60th birthday.  Since it was his birthday, I wanted the vacation to be as luxurious and stress free as possible.  Sugar Beach did not disappoint!  When researching properties to stay at, I looked at several, including Jade Mountain, Ladera, and Sugar Beach.  In the end, the open wall concept was not for us, so I opted to go with Sugar Beach, as all villas were entirely enclosed and air conditioned.  We stayed in December, but even at that time of year, it was…

title: Perfect December Getaway
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Sugar Beach is indeed a first class resort—not only for its location but for the high level of service and the professional staff who make our resort worthy of its reputation as one of the leading resorts in the Caribbean.  I am proud to work with such a well-rounded team. I am glad that you enjoyed one of the best vacations ever  and that you enjoyed your partner’s 60th birthday celebration and everything we did to make it extra special for you both. We appreciate your review and hope that we will see you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Spa and Beach experience a Must in Soufriere
review: My boyfriend and I decided to hop down to St. Lucia following a wedding in NYC (We're from London). We treated ourselves to Sugar Beach after falling love with the location between the two Pitons and we weren't disappointed! We opted for a basic Sugar Mill room and, although it seems to be the least expensive room in the place, we were delighted! The Sugar Mill rooms are right near the main house, pool and beach so no shuttles were needed. It came with a spacious room, one of the most delicious beds we've slept in and a lovely little Jacuzzi in our backyard. So don't feel bad if you don't stay in a villa! We also absolutely loved the staff who were some of the smiliest people we've had the pleasure of spending a week with. Tavarie in the beach bar is a true gentleman and always…

title: Loved it, loved it, loved it!
review: Good day,  Thank you for your positive comments.  I am glad that you were happy with your decision to vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are pleased to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your accommodation and all our other amenities and services. The staff will be commended for providing exceptional care.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to see you again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: 5 star location, mixed service experience and high prices
review: Went to Sugar Beach spa with my wife for a session, absolutely worth every penny.  Then just catch a ride to the beach make a whole day out of it.  Resort is very well maintained with alot of options for food and relaxation

title: Stunning location, beautiful property and great service!
review: Sugar beach is located at the most beautiful part of the island, directly on the beach between the two pitons. The property is well maintained and stunning. The owner has decorated the property with beautiful eclectic artwork which was a pleasure to discover. Check in was a breeze directly in the room which was a welcome surprise after a long, windy drive down. The restaurant choices are great the food was absolutely delicious though very expensive (even for a property of this nature. Breakfast cost over $100 for 2 ppl if you included hot food!). The beach is lovely and though public, it wasn't very busy during our stay. The pool wasn't too crowded either and a good fun size for the kids to play in. The butler service was a little patchy - they usually were not available by…

title: Perfection in Paradise
review: Good day, Thank you for your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort! On balance, it appears that you had a wonderful stay with the exception of the little disappointments that you mentioned. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience. I am glad that we were able to accommodate you for the late checkout. We know how challenging it can be with a toddler. We acknowledge your appreciation. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to welcoming you back again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Honeymoon: Beautiful Resort - But the Negatives Can't Be Overlooked for What You Pay
review: I don't usually write reviews until after arriving back home, but this experience has been both tremendous and unique.  We arrived on Sunday, December 20, about 5:30PM in time to see the sun go down.
