We had previously visited for a day in early 2011 when this property was still the Jalousie Plantation and for 5 years had wanted to return to stay, because of the majestic beauty of the Pitons between which this incredible resort is located.   The first person we met was Eugustus (Gus) one of 3 butlers caring for us during our 4 day stay (Alex and Wynell being the others), a kindly gentleman who immediately made us welcome in our beach bungalow and exuded a sense of the incredible service we'd come to realize this week.   Since the moment of arrival each experience has been…

title: Everyday was breathtaking.
review: Good day, We truly appreciate your comments and feedback about your partner’s special birthday stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am delighted that our team members provided the special touches and attention to detail that made your time at Sugar Beach memorable for all the right reasons. They will be commended for a job well done. Thank you once again for your comments and business. We hope to see you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Sugar Beach: The sweet spot between the Pitons.
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach for 7 nights in November on our honeymoon. While we had a wonderful experience in St Lucia and we thought the hotel's location, architecture, and general aesthetics were all lovely.   However, it is very important to note that for the amount of money that you pay for accommodations, food, excursions, and the spa, the quality is NOT as good as it should be, in every possible way.   Pros: - beautiful location, beautiful hotel - great snorkeling - good food and a few options  Cons: - sub-par service - overpriced  We specifically had two issues that we couldn't overlook,  considering the amount we paid and the level of service that was expected for this type of hotel:  - We stayed at a sugar mill room, and we were on our honeymoon. The room itself was…

title: Underwhelming service – and a mouse in our room
review: We were to St.Lucia 2 years ago and stayed at Hotel Chocolat. During a cruise, we had seen the Viceroy and thought it looked beautiful. So here we are, 2 years later, at the Viceroy for 8 nights with our baby.  We stayed in villa 312. Overall, we enjoyed our stay, but there were things that bugged us every day.   Essentially, we liked :  - The location between Gros and Petit Piton: it’s the number one reason we chose this resort. It is beautiful.  - Breakfast : The food was good and the setting was very nice.  - Pool area : Stunning view of the Piton from the pool. Very nice and cosy pool – was never crowded during our stay.  - Head to toe treatment at the spa : for $200, you get a 2-hour treatment (massage, body scrub and facial) that is a better deal than say, a 60-minute…

title: Very nice place,beach and staff
review: Thank you for your comments and for taking the time to post your review of Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to know that overall you enjoyed your stay and that you enjoyed most of our services, amenities, facilities and accommodation.  We endeavor to make all our guests feel comfortable by ensuring that their expectations are met and wherever possible exceeded by providing the highest level of service. I am delighted that the individuals mentioned were helpful and welcoming and positively impacted your stay.  I would like to apologize for the issues and concerns you have highlighted. Please know that we have taken your comments on-board and we are continuing to evaluate our service standards to ensure that we provide the best possible service to our guests.  I am sorry for us double billing you at reservation time and for the time you spent having this rectified; as I am for us charging you for “almonds” that you did not eat. This too will be credited back.  It also was surprising to read that some of our colleagues did not appear motivated and happy and that you found our butlers to be useless . Our staff usually earn high praise for their genuine hospitality and professional interaction. I am sorry that you did not get to experience this high level of service from all of them.  As for the mouse; We do our utmost to ensure unwanted wildlife is kept at bay. Having said this, the surrounding environment sometimes makes it difficult to completely control these uninvited guests. We very rarely get concerns such as the one you have raised. I am sorry  We try our very best to accommodate late departure requests. In your case, our hands were tied. We were at full occupancy at the time of your stay and your room was slated for an arriving guest.  I would like to apologise for the back and forth as a result however, I am glad that we were able to accommodate you in the end.  Once again, I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused and thank you for your comments and business. We hope the issues you have experienced will not deter you from considering a return visit at some point in the future.   Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Unparalleled Beauty and Service!
review: We like this place very much.There is one of the most beautiful beach on the island.Eventhough we werent the guests they have been very nice to us.Nice food,drinks and staff.Very smart shuttle service from parking place.

title: A little piece of paradise
review: Good day,  On behalf of the entire team, I would like say how happy we are that you enjoyed your visit with us, and thank you for providing us with your feedback.  We are gratified that your visit was extra special and that you were pleased with the services provided by our team members. We will praise them for a job well done.  Once again, Thank you for your comments, recommendations and business. We hope to see you again soon as resident guests.  André Boersma General Manager

title: Worry-Free, Romantic Luxury
review: Sugar Beach was by far one of the most luxurious resorts we have visited, and the views from the Villas are surreal!  No photos can possibly convey the beauty here.  The service is over the top in all respects, from having the three butlers per room (with a dedicated "butler cell phone" at all times) to incredible service on the beach, in the spa and in the restaurants.  Everyone is happy, friendly and truly thankful for the guests, and the accommodations are to die for!!

title: We have already booked for 2016!
review: We loved Sugar Beach Resort.  So much so, that we are typically not repeat travelers to anywhere and we have booked Sugar Beach for 2016!   The accommodations are beautiful, the spa is not to be missed and the staff is excellent.

title: Extremely disapointing
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your holiday experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are pleased that you enjoyed our facilities, accommodation, amenities and high level of service and that you felt relaxed throughout your stay. I will share your comments with our staff, especially the culinary team.  Once again, thank you for your review and we look forward to seeing you next year!.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Wonderful  family friendly hotel
review: It's taken me almost a year to write this review. Not because i didn't want to, but because I was soooo disappointed that I felt it was prudent to wait a while till my anger subsided.  I've traveled all over the world and I know what good service is and what is not. I also am not unreasonable and one of those types that is never satisfied.  This was by far the most expensive vacation ever. Not that i can't afford it, but you expect a high level of execution when the prices are so high. Unfortunately that was not the case here.  Thankfully I have forgotten a lot of the failures at this resort and that is a blessing.   I booked a car to pick us up from the airport as I thought that would be a nice touch for our 30th anniversary. At $300 it was steep but what everyone should know…

title: DAY PASS TOUR
review: Good day, Thank you for your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   I am sorry to learn of the disappointments and catalogue of lapses that you have highlighted. Reviews such as yours are highly unusual and extremely rare for us and we take each of your comments very seriously.  Based on some of your feedback, however,  it appears from the outset that our resort was not a suitable choice for you—especially its hillside location and need for shuttle transportation from some villas. Having said this, we continuously review our service standards to ensure that all of our guests are happy and try our utmost to provide exceptional service and special touches that are memorable for all the right reasons.  Once again, I would like to apologize for the experience you have described.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Wonderful!
review: We had a truly tremendous 10 day stay at the Sugar Beach with our 9 months old baby. The resort prides itself on being a family friendly hotel and it really delivered on that and everything else.  Hotel is located in a gorgeous spot between the two pitons. The setting really takes your breath away when you first arrive. The resort in general is beautifully appointed with well maintained gardens, ponds with waterlillies, sun decks etc.  We stayed in one of the villas, which was stunning and tastefully decorated. It was big with a beautiful terrace. It was perfect travelling with a small baby as we could spend time in the living room or on the terrace whilst our daughter was sleeping. Also the hotel provide babysitting services, which are very easy to arrange and are quite…

title: Anse Piton Marine Reserve
review: This is the name of the protected snorkelling area at the base of petite piton. We have snorkelled and/or scubadived at many places, including the Great Belize Reef at both Belize and Roatan, Honduras, so we have seen a few fish. This reef was healthy looking and there were quite a few new fish that we had not seen before. We visited on Dec 4 and it appeared to be "mating season" for many of the fish so there was a lot of action below us!   We had caught a bus to Soufriere and then "Captain Bob" arranged a dinghy ride for us (2) to the Anse Piton Marine Reserve where he "knew someone" and we could use the beach chairs for free. These particular chairs were in terrible repair and were squeezed onto the very end of Sugar Beach where there was really no sand.  His son, Garfiel,…

title: Best of the Caribbean and a View Straight Out of the Movies
review: Good Day,  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to say how happy we are that you enjoyed your visit to Sugar Beach and thank you for providing us with your feedback.  At Sugar Beach we are passionate about the service we provide and concerned about each and every guest experience.   I am happy that you enjoyed snorkeling in our bay.  Thank you once again for your review and we hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach as resident guests next time.   Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Elagant Luxury and Service
review: We are avid Caribbean travelers and decided to try Sugar Beach.  It turned out to be a gorgeous, isolated property that I highly recommend.  It is expensive -- but worth every penny.  The location between the Pitons will take your breath away.  Some tips:  Get there luxury sedan service from the airport. It's a 40 minute drive so worth riding in a nice vehicle.  Our driver served us cold drinks and narrated the whole trip.  Stay at a room numbered 700 or above. We were in 705 and had a generally unobstructed view of both Pitons and the Sugar Beach.  This also helps you avoid the construction that is closer to the beach villas.  The shuttle from the villas rarely takes more than five minutes and the novelty of the Tut Tut never wore off.  Plan on spending most of your time on the…

title: Impressive location but overpriced for value....
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team I would like to express how elated we are that you enjoyed your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.    We are committed to providing a high level of service to all of our guests and it is truly satisfying that you enjoyed everything we had to offer. Again we thank you for your comments and business.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Absolutely beautiful but service is lacking
review: Rented a one bedroom villa with an infinity pool .... Beautifully appointed with dark wood floors and all (Delano Miami style) white throughout. Views of the Pitons, the beach & ocean facing west (sunsets etc.) are sublime.  Though there is considerable construction ongoing on the property it was totally unobtrusive unless you were walking by it.   The butler (Tyrone) we were fortunate enough to have literally took care of Everything ! Outstanding ! Resort is very expensive but I found it to be worth the cost !  Food options on site are varied and very good though we ate off site half the time & were pleased with the varied options. Highly recommend the Zip Lining tour and If you're in excellent shape the climb to the top of the Gros Piton.  Takes roughly 4 hours but the view…

title: First class in every way, plan for food costs
review: Spectacular views, terrific staff, beautiful property with rainforest spa, butler for each villa, and terrific dining. The experience is first-class and I've never been so pampered. For couples, I'd recommend not doing the all-inclusive unless you're going to drink a TON... And especially if you plan to eat anywhere else. We ate once off-site at Martha's (rental car was handy). We drink plenty, every day and night in fact, and still saved hundreds over 5 days by not doing the meal plan. The food is expensive so be sure to factor that in... The all-inclusive rate is $500/day per couple so you'll want to budget for about that on food with a little more for experiences. Breakfast around $50 per couple, $75-100 for lunch and $200+ for dinners (except sushi which was $100 or so for…

title: St. Lucia's best, by far...
review: Good Day,  On behalf of the entire team, I would like say how happy we are that you enjoyed your honeymoon with us.  We are committed to providing our guests with the highest level of service and it is satisfying to know that you enjoyed our hotel facilities, accommodations, and everything else that we offered.  We will be sure to share your comments with the team. They work hard to create special experiences that not only meet but exceed the expectations of our guests.  Thank you once again for your review and we hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach at some point in the future, perhaps for a first anniversary celebration. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect Spot for your babymoon!
review: We considered quite a few hotels in the vicinity of St. Lucia's famous "Piton" peaks, and we're glad we went with Sugar Beach.    The other hotels are a great choice for dinner or drinks, but not an extended stay:  -Jade Mountain has must-see views, but the hotel is an embodiment of its owner's idiosyncratic vision (which is a nice way of saying it's a bit weird).  The rooms are all open air, which would be a problem given the amount of mosquitoes we encountered on St. Lucia. There were a few odd design choices, like terrible lighting in the restaurant.  Plus a few up-keep details like peeling varnish on deck railings.  Worst of all, the 15-minute drive up the mountain is over one of the roughest, sketchiest "roads" we've ever encountered.  Go for a drink, but skip the…

title: When do we go back?
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are pleased to hear that you had a wonderful holiday and that you were content with everything that we had to offer. Our staff will be delighted that you thoroughly enjoyed the time you spent with us.  We have worked hard to create an environment where our guests can relax and enjoy the best quality service, accommodation, facilities and amenities.   You may wish to be aware that all of our accommodations come with a plunge pool and butler service—even the lead-in rooms.  In addition, our boutiques stock stronger, DEET based insect repellents for guests who tend to be more attractive to biting pests.  Once again, thank you for your comments, recommendations and business. We look forward to seeing you again at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the not too distant future.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful even with rain!
review: We couldn't have picked a better spot to spend our babymoon. Not only was St Lucia amazingly beautiful, but sugar beach viceroy hotel was the best resort to relax and enjoy yourself during your pregnancy.   Some of the reasons why we were so happy with the hotel  - super friendly and welcoming staff. Everyone and I mean everyone at the hotel is so nice and friendly. They go above and beyond and are always around to help you.  - amazing beach with all the amenities. The beach is gorgeous with soft white sand, breathtaking views of Pitons and sunsets, really comfy lounge chairs with solid shade from the umbrellas. There are attendants around all the time getting you drinks, cleaning your sunglasses, getting you towels. It never got super crowded even though hotel was sold out.…

title: An Oasis..
review: Came to this resort for a wedding and checked out of another resort to spend the rest of my holiday here. This is how a resort hotel should be, relaxed, exquisite facility, great food, great drinks and lots of sun and sea.  My words cannot do this place justice, so just go and experience the place to understand.

title: Half Term holiday
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am glad that you were impressed and satisfied with everything that we offered. We aim to ensure a relaxed environment and strive to provide exceptional services to our guests. Once again, thank you for your feedback. We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing!!
review: What a good resort: the location in St Lucia is outstanding - the resort is situated in an idylic position and in quite fabulous grounds; more like a botanical garden.  The atmosphere is a mix of colonial architecture, adventure centre and really great restaurants.  Some of the accomodation is outstanding.  The food is truly excellent and as we were All Inclusive, we had no worries about eating and drinking as much as we wished.  We were looked after by some excellent staff and our 12 year old's birthday party was memorable.  We expected exceptional...and got very, very good.  We will return...

title: Picture Perfect Honeymoon
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We could not agree with you more about our stunning location right between the Pitons and nestled into our lush grounds. It is truly special. We are happy we had the opportunity to share this experience with you and to provide services and amenities that were equal to the view.  It is gratifying to read that our team members made your 12-year-old’s birthday celebration extra special. They will be commended for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your review. We hope see you again soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Nirvana on Earth
review: Incredible settings. in fact mind blowing!! Hotel is fantastic, just incredible..Food Service accommodation everything has been thought through, through and through. You will not be disappointed. If you're looking to propose there she'll say yes. Highly recommend you go!!!

title: My
review: My wife and I took a delayed honeymoon to Sugar Beach and our experience was nothing short of spectacular. The butlers and all the staff take meticulous care of its guests, going as far as setting up surprises and knowing your personal preferences. As an example, our butler, Manaske, set up a romantic atmosphere in our villa with Rose petals and a running bath that we returned to after an already amazing day on the resort. There is truly no detail or request they won't handle for you. We were very sad to end our stay with this beautiful resort and are already planning our next trip out!

title: Amazing location and beach worth the trip
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your recent honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort We are committed to making every holiday experience fulfilling and memorable by providing first class services and amenities. I am also delighted that we matched and surpassed your expectations, especially as this was such an important stay. I am also glad that the staff positively contributed to your time at the resort, especially Manaske. I will congratulate the team for exceeding your expectations. Once again, thank you for posting these wonderful comments. I am sure they will assist other travelers when planning their own honeymoon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: wonderfully white!
review: This was our first time to St Lucia and we read the reviews on trip adviser on the Vice Roy Sugar Beach and decided to book our 5 year anniversary trip there. It was absolutely incredible. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a Caribbean getaway. When we first arrived we found out we had been upgraded to a beachfront bungalow and our taxi dropped us off at the door to our bungalow where our butler met us to take our luggage and show us around the bungalow. I would recommend the bungalow as the convenience of being able to walk to everything was amazing and we had our own private beach. When we were there the hotel was sold out but it never felt that way as nothing was ever crowded. The food at the hotels multiple restaurants were all very good. Our favorite…

title: Great place for lunch with gorgeous view...friendly staff
review: Good day,  Thank you for your wonderful feedback and compliments.  We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful anniversary celebration at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I will be sure to share your glowing comments with the team. They will be very happy to know that you appreciated their efforts in ensuring that your stay with us was memorable for all the right reasons.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Wedding & Honeymoon
review: A second time surprise visit sugar beach! - we had a lovely private villa with it's own plunge pool. As a lover of white decor the villas tick every box. Sandwiched between the magnificent pitons - you are also rewarded with fantastic views! A great place to actually relax!

title: Amazing Dinner
review: We visited Sugar Beach as an overnight mooring spot while on a 7 day sailing vacation. Jalousie Bay is stunning, in between the Pitons and has fabulous snorkeling in a protected area. We were able to make a dinner reservation for the 7 of us at 8 pm which was later than hoped for but better than 6 pm. After cocktails aboard the boat we took our dinghy in a bit early with the hopes of being seated. We were immediately impressed with the beauty of the restaurant and resort. Very elegant and comfortable. Our group was happily seated early at a beautiful, large wooden table with a large bench covered by colorful pillows on one side and seats on the other. The service was excellent and our meal the best of our trip; the lobster risotto mouth watering, the shrimp pelau delicious and…

title: Perfect honeymoon! Highly recommend for a romantic trip
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful comments. I am glad that you had the opportunity to experience our services and offerings at the Bayside restaurant. Our culinary team and restaurant staff will be happy with your comments and will be commended for a job well done.  Once again, I would like to thank you for your feedback and business. We hope to welcome you back in the near future as resident guests. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: A few days in Paradise
review: We absolutely loved our honeymoon trip to Sugar Beach Viceroy. We stayed in a luxury cottage and loved our experience - the cottage was nestled in the rainforest with amazing views of the pitons but a short 2 min ride (on really cute shuttles from Thailand!) to the beach. The bed was one of the most comfortable I've slept on and we already ordered the pillows online to have when we get home. They were amazing :) Cordy and Mc Hail were our butlers and went way above and beyond to make our honeymoon stay there special. We keep saying that we wish we could have them come stay at our house - they were amazing!!  I would definitely recommend the resort to friends and family -  it was a beautiful resort (pristine, gorgeous location and very nicely appointed).  The location was ideal -…

title: Return to Paradise
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Based on what you have described, it appears that you had a wonderful stay.  I am sorry that you grew tired of the menu. Had we been aware of this concern, our executive chef would have ensured that more dishes were prepared to your satisfaction. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. Thank you once again for your review. We are looking forward to your return visit, perhaps for a first anniversary celebration. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: An experience to be compare all others....
review: A friend and I took a short trip to St.Lucia to get away. We stayed part of the time at Sugar Beach and it was absolutely perfect. We were in a villa so we had a view no words can describe as well as the privacy and quiet to relax. The people of St.Lucia are so kind and friendly! We did not experience one person who wasn't smiling and helpful. The service at this resort is top notch.

title: Amazing resort, beautiful location!
review: We recently returned from what can only be described as paradise. We knew that we wanted a small destination wedding but weren’t sure where we wanted to go. After a quick internet search I found BeachBum Vacations,  a service that specializes in destination weddings and was quickly paired with Lisa. Lisa was great in listening to what we  wanted and suggested St. Lucia which ended up being perfect for us!   We loved Sugar Beach it is pricy but worth every penny. The service is beyond excellent and  the staff went out of their way to accommodate our requests.   Upon arrival we were upgraded from our luxury cottage to a villa which was nice.  Anisha was our  wedding coordinator and she did an excellent job communicating with us prior to our arrival and after to ensure that…

title: An idyllic hotel in the most stunning location
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing comments about your recent wedding at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It brings us a great deal of satisfaction to hear that your wedding was amazing and that our services exceeded your expectations. I will share your comments with all of the individuals you have mentioned and thank them for providing the little touches and attention to detail that made your special day memorable for all the right reasons. Thank you for your comments and recommendations about the all inclusive meal plan. I will be discussing this with the food and beverage team to ensure we have consistency across all of our restaurants and bars. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back, perhaps for your first anniversary. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing. We will be back.
review: Our family has just enjoyed a wonderful holiday at the Sugar Beach in St Lucia and would strongly recommend it to couples and families. The hotel is nestled between the most breathtaking Piton mountains and no picture can do this hotel's natural beauty justice. Hidden in the lush hillside, the rooms (or villas) are very well appointed indeed and beautifully decorated. The bathrooms are a complete joy and straight out of the pages of a magazine. The butlers are the linchpin to this whole hotel and are so helpful, friendly and made our stay very special and smooth indeed. The pool is just beautiful and sits below two Piton mountains and the beach is lovely. The toys in the sea are great fun too and an original touch. The food is excellent in all three restaurants and the cute…

title: Brilliant Resort Put it in your Bucket List
review: Good day, We are happy you chose Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort as the location for your family vacation. It is a real pleasure to learn you had a memorable stay for all the right reasons. I will be sure to pass on your glowing comments to the staff members who contributed to making your time at Sugar Beach remarkable. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Your comments and business are truly appreciated. Best Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Nothing is what it seems, Don't go!
review: We chose Sugar Beach because of the range of rooms you can stay in and also the facilities. We stayed in a 2 bedroom residence. The decor, styling and facilities in these residences is second to none. We switched residence after 2 nights into our holiday but only because the terrace we had in the first one was quite small and lost the sunny after lunch time. We had a 4 year old who had a sleep each day after lunch so wanted to make the most of the terrace. You have a butler with each rooms/villa or residence. They are there to help you with everything you need. Our butlers Linus and Tyson (when Linus wasn't on duty) were amazing. Always on hand and nothing was too much trouble. If the children wanted freshly baked cookies then they sorted it! The restaurants were all fabulous.…

title: Honeymooners' Paradise
review: Quick and easy:  Everywhere we visited on the island, when we were asked about where we were staying and responded, "Sugar Beach," the response was collectively the same..."Oh wow, you picked the best spot."  We did!  I can't say enough about the kindness, hospitality, and friendliness of ALL staff. We never opened a door nor lifted a finger. This isn't my nature, but the staff make you feel like it's their honor...not an easy task!  As a woman, I felt safe at all times and was made to feel like a true queen. You get what you pay for here!  I would never consider staying elsewhere after this experience. Great wifi range, an iPad provided, tv, personal pool, beach access, community pool access, rainforest spa (a must), variety of restaurants and food selections, butler service,…

title: Honeymoon
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your glowing comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am happy to hear that you felt spoilt and impressed with the high level of service that you received. The staff will be commended for ensuring your stay was memorable for all the right reasons.  Once again, thank you for your comments, recommendations and business. We hope to see you again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Gorgeous property right in the middle of one of nature's paradise spots
review: We spent a week at Sugar Beach for our honeymoon in June.  The resort was pure luxury all around.  We got upgraded to a luxury villa upon arrival, and it was absolutely incredible - a tv/couch room, bedroom, bathroom, outdoor shower, and deck with a plunge pool that was all very private.  It also had a refrigerator and they brought a few local Piton beers each day for free as well as a snack of the day.  The service at the island was also impeccable.  We stayed up the mountain which was a solid 15 minute walk, but you can get a ride for free on a shuttle or toc toc.  At first i didn't know whether or not to tip, but realized that you save tips and do it all at the end.  The people take tremendous pride in making sure that their guests on the island enjoy their stay and come back…

title: Nestled between the Pitons -- Best location on the island!
review: Good day, We are glad that you chose to honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our focus is to ensure that we provide the best possible service and offerings to our guests. We are delighted to know that your stay was fabulous with the exception of the disappointment that you have highlighted with the food prices. I am sorry that we failed to meet your expectations in that area. Also, I have noted your comment about free scuba on the beach. Unfortunately, scuba diving is an activity that must be paid for. However, we do offer our guests complimentary use of snorkeling equipment and of course snorkeling itself is free of charge off our beach. Once again, thank you for your comments and business.  We hope to see you back for a first anniversary celebration. Regard, André Boersma General Manger

title: Beautiful Property/Setting- Food $$$
review: What a lovely concept - replace the villas that have been here for years with replicas but in modern, high tech materials.  The rooms here are lovely - all cool whites with gorgeous wooden floors and every amenity you could want.  We were almost to the top of the hill so moved around the resort on the tuk tuks which came almost immediately every time.  The day starts with breakfast on the beautiful plantation-like terrace with anything you could want and, because our room was quite a distance away, we just flopped from there to the stunning beach.  You know a beach is stunning when it's so good that no one is at the pool even though at any normal hotel the pool would rate an 11 out of 10??  The food was lovely from every outlet right down to the room service and the Friday night…

title: Great anniversary trip
review: Sugar Beach Resort made this a memorable anniversary. The place is gorgeous and the service is excellent...at least in the deluxe villas. We were greeted with a cold towel and drink, much needed after the very winding ride there.  We were upgraded to the deluxe villa and had a full breakfast package.  The butler service was great!  Dwight and Swamed were awesome.  We used the plunge pool everyday. The view from there was better than at the resort pool.  We opted not to do the full meal package since we wanted to try other restaurants.   I recommend the full breakfast. The package is likely worth it if you drink what is included and do not want to go offsite. We enjoyed the restaurants there but liked trying Jade Mountain ( by far our best meal) and Boucan at hotel chocolat. We…

title: Full Detailed Review (2nd try)
review: Good day, Thank you for selecting our resort to celebrate your anniversary. Based on what you have described, we are happy to know that this trip remains memorable for all the right reasons. The staff will be delighted with your comments. I am pleased that the issue you experienced with the spa charge was resolved to your satisfaction. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. Once again, I would like to thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to serving you again. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Heaven!  Total relaxation
review: Second revision:  My wife and I visited Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort last week. Here is my full review.   The Viceroy is located roughly 45 minutes from UVF. It is a long windy drive which could make someone a little nauseous. The good news, the location is spectacular! Nestled between the Pitons, which are St. Lucia's 2 iconic dormant volcanic peaks, one could not ask for a more perfect setting for romance. It feels very similar to being in the South Pacific. The resort beach uses imported sand from Trinidad-Tobago, so it's perfectly white. We had an opportunity to take a boat to one of the Viceroy's competitors (which I won't name), and we looked around for about 5 minutes and jumped back on the boat to return. Also, there are all inclusive resorts located on the far north…

title: Heaven on earth...
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to post your glowing comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am confident that other travelers will find your expansive review incredibly helpful in making their own vacation decisions. We are very pleased to hear that your stay was memorable for all the right reasons and that you are already considering an uncharacteristic return visit.  We welcome the opportunity to serve you again. I must also thank you for standing up for us on the reviews where we are wrongly and inaccurately talked about—especially as it pertains to non-resident guests and the use of resort facilities. Thank you for your understanding in that regard. Once again, thank you for your review.  We are looking forward to seeing you again soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Honeymoon in paradise!
review: I loved staying at Sugar Beach.  It was the most amazing time of my life.  We had our wedding here and it was so easy to book.  Everyone was easy to work with and the photos turned out amazing.  Rooms were to die for and the spa was great as well.  I cannot wait to go back.

title: Summer in Paradise
review: I had the opportunity to spend a few summer days at this resort with my girls and the experience was beyond what I ever imagined. I enjoy hotel hopping with the girls and we chose this one due to the fact that we had not try hotels in the Soufriere as yet. We had 3 rooms with our own private butler. The rooms were immaculately clean and the service we received exceeded our expectations.   The cane bar is a must for the delicious sushi and the bayside restaurant for Friday night buffet.  Can't wait to return. I will recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to have a fantastic yet peaceful and relaxing time.

title: Paradise on earth.....
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your family vacation at Sugar Beach on TripAdvisor. We are happy to read your comments and know that our services and amenities made for a thoroughly enjoyable time for you. We continuously strive to deliver exceptional customer service and I am pleased that you were delighted with your stay. Once again, thank you for your comments, recommendations and business. We look forward to your return. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise
review: Since the moment we arrived everything was beyond our expectations. We travel a lot but the experience in this hotel was unique. This is a real 5 star service. Everything is made with the highest standards of the world, even it is a beach resort every detail make you feel pampered. All the restaurants were remarkable, the staff was always willing to help. I want to congratulate the manager because there is no reason to complain in a place that takes care of EVERYTHING. Thank you for such a beautiful experience, we definitely will go back

title: Fantastic .. if expensive
review: Good day,  Thank you for your feedback about your Sugar Beach vacation experience. On behalf of the entire team, we are delighted you enjoyed your stay and that you are planning a return visit.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Wonderfully luxurious
review: Went here for my husbands 60th birthday and was pleased beyond anything I could have imagined. Those lovely coconut creme drinks on arrival,chilled bottle of champage on said birthday,Stephen and Peter our butlers,superb,all the staff,extremely attentive uber friendly,Leanna at breakfast (we adored) Breakfast the best,so many delicious fruit juices,Chairmans reserve rum (a must!!!) hummingbirds and lovely birds on our flowering sugar mill villa daily,the tree frog symphony at night,the sunsets,the fantastic pool,the ocean ,the entir layout of this resort with landscaping beyond anything I've seen. Would love to stay here often even if a bit pricey. Only suggestion would be to have an ATM on the resort and perhaps a shop to purchase food items,juices etc. as the prices for every…

title: Nice area
review: If I were to return to St. Lucia, I might consider a stay at this resort. We came here on an excursion/tour from our cruise. The area is beautifully situated between the Pitons. My only complaint is that the lounge chairs with umbrella are $50 to rent. That being said, we had use of 'free' lounge chairs. I know they were free, but many of them were unsuitable for lying on as the straps were missing and just looked really haggard. Perhaps if the resort were to put some money into decent 'free' chairs for those of us on excursions, we might come back and stay for the week.

title: Perfection Perfected
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback about your recent day trip to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We do have a stunning location and try our best to balance the needs of our resident guests with the desires of day visitors as best we can.  We are one of the only resorts on the island that have complimentary sun lounges for non-resident guests and we try our best to make them feel welcome when they visit the beach.  I will certainly share your comments with our beach team to ensure the lounges in this area are kept up to standard and not allowed to fall into disrepair.  As you point out, non-resident guests do have the option of renting one of the more comfortable lounges further along the beach.  Once again, thank you for your review. We hope you will consider a return visit—hopefully as a resident guest next time.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Above 5 Star Experience - Honeymoon Heaven!
review: I stayed here for a couple of nights with my two brothers while touring the island, and i just didn't want to leave. Upon entry we were greeted by two very friendly ladies, they got us some refreshments and had us checked in within 20 minutes. From then on we entered into paradise and  I genuinely could have stayed here forever. The location (right beside the mud baths and Pitons) , the beach (Crystal blue waters, and white sands), the food (Delicious and Sashimi is a must), the sun; it's all just so beautiful.  Everything this hotel had to offer is perfection perfected. Best hotel on the island. Blew me away

title: Exceeded all expectations!
review: Good day,  It is always gratifying to receive reviews such as yours. Thank you for your overwhelmingly positive comments about your short stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We hope to see you back again soon, perhaps for a longer stay next time.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Incredible Honeymoon!!
review: If you're not sure whether you should take this or not, just pull out your card and do it right now. This place is worth every penny. The service is exceptional, the staff is polite, recommendations are on point, a ton of fun. We took most of the tours: sulphur seduction (AWESOME), ride and fly (AMAZING), snuba (really fun), gros piton hike, and we went on a boat. Also we would like to say a special thank you to one person - Mr. Clever - who went above and beyond to make our experience SUPREME.   It was really one of the best decisions we've made because it was relaxing, there was tons to do, and we didn't have a single dull moment during our entire stay. The food (specifically in the sushi room) was REALLY good. We really enjoyed the breakfasts... a lot. I highly recommend…

title: Amazing
review: Simply one of the best resorts or islands i have ever visited.  End of story.  I think any stay on an island is gunna have a high standard to meet after this. Been to many islands and have to say the fact english is the main language and all prices are given in dollars and ec dollars is nice because of the echange rates

title: Extraordinary, Five Star Resort with Exemplary Service - Luxury & Relaxation
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to share your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Aaah!  Happiness
review: Everything about this resort is amazing.  Pampered, relaxing luxury.  We were met at our Luxury Villa by our butler who provided us with arrival drinks and registered us in our room.  She had also taken the liberty of making our dinner reservation for the evening at the Bayside - their beach front restaurant.  This was a harbinger of the excellent proactive service we encountered for the remainder of our 8 days.  From top to bottom, the staff Sugar Beach live and breath uncompromising personal service.   Some quick examples: our butlers were there to meet our every need from ironing to local advice; the breakfast, lunch and dinner staffs were always so friendly, took care of special requests and remembered our names and food choices by the second day; they hotel managers stopped…

title: Paradise....Spa & Snorkling nothing compares!
review: Good day,  Thank you for sharing your glowing comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is always a pleasure to read reviews such as yours and to know our team members went the extra to make your stay relaxing and enjoyable.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Picture Perfect Honeymoon!
review: Stayed in a villa in the hill overlooking beach, a white heaven, private & not over looked.  Restaurants & food excellent, staff amazing and so friendly.  Totally relaxed first class holiday.  Booked all inclusive and it really was - no big bill at the end, not like many other places where you are charged for daring to have anything other than local brands,  thanks a million to all.  Can't wait to go back.   Anime &  J Khan

title: Surpassing expectations ...
review: Sensational location. Exquisite accommodations. Superb dining. Excellent staff ... this list could go on! The only negative to The Sugar Beach experience is having to leave! If you get the chance to stay here ... take it without hesitation!

title: Top notch accommodation, location & amenities - but F&B needs to catch up
review: Good day,  We are delighted that you enjoyed your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Your comments and business have been truly appreciated.  See you again soon.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Romance, Elegance, Pampering and so much more
review: We are currently nearing the end of our 10 day stay at Sugar beach and I echo the previous reviews that this really is a stunning property and extremely well maintained which is commendable given the sheer size. Our stay was split between a villa and beachfront bungalow and it would be difficult to pick a favourite - rooms are extremely comfortable, villas have a luxurious old world charm and the bungalow is very modern, and right on the beach - they are well maintained and if anything, better than that in the pictures!  The beach is beautiful white complimented by calm Caribbean water, and the rainforest backdrop is just something else ! If you want superlative accommodation & surroundings is St Lucia - your search stops here , this is the only hotel that i felt matched Sandy…

title: Amazing place beach stunning. Staff little snobby
review: Good day,  Thank you for your glowing comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We have to agree that our location and accommodations are extremely special and I am delighted that our team members provided services that truly enhanced your stay.   I am sorry about the glitches you described in when it came to communication between members of our food and beverage team. I will be sure to share these with the managers responsible to ensure what you have described does not happen again.  Once again, thank you for your review and your business. We hope you will consider a return visit soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful but not perfect
review: My husband and I recently vacationed at the Sugar Beach, a Viceroy Resort, on St. Lucia.  As usual, we engaged in extensive research and preparation before committing to a resort, there being so many highly publicized resorts and some claim  higher rankings. I felt fairly comfortable that we had chosen the right resort for us based on available pictures, reviews and endorsement by others familiar with the property but was still completely unprepared for how truly beautiful I would find the resort, the villas, the views, the beaches and resort facilities.  Our one bedroom villa had a magnificent view of the ocean and the beach below.  We were flanked on either side by the Petit and the Gross Pitons.  The infinity pool in front of our bedroom window was the perfect perch from…

title: Beautiful resort
review: Luxury villa with the most comfortable bed ever! Walk in shower in the very large bathroom. Walk in wardrobe with Nespresso coffee machine, and free soft drinks,water and beer. Plunge pool and loungers outside. Breakfast very good and food in beach bar also very good. Staff friendly and helpful. Shuttle to take you down the winding hillside, sometimes quite a wait! The resort is very secluded and taxis extremely expensive (approx 5times higher than London). The swimming pool is very large with plenty of loungers. The beach is white sand, calm sea with shake/pebble at shoreline. Boats and water taxis come right on the beach. Sunset cruise a must! Volcano/mud bath/waterfall disappointing.Marigot Bay is beautiful and the Rainforest Hideaway a great restaurant right on the sea.

title: Extraordinary service, beautiful resort!
review: Good day,  Thank you for your feedback about Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are happy that you enjoyed your stay and hope you will consider a return visit soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Stopped for Drinks, Food, & the View!
review: Absolutely amazing service!!! The butlers do a magnificent job and really make your vacation feel personal. We only stayed for the long weekend but loved every minute, especially the diving with Vitus and full day sailing trip with Mystery Man Company (organised through the hotel as their wooden boat Manatee was unavailable). The views are stunning and the resort offers a fantastic range of activities, dining options, and spa treatments.   I had booked a sugar mill room but was upgraded to villa 304. We were very happy with the villa (distant view of the sea and piton) however, if I had paid for the villa, I may not have been so pleased as it it sat on a hill directly looking over a road with a white fence to the side. Other than this, the villa was fantastic - beautifully…

title: Very romantic and stunning views, but a few things
review: Good day,  On behalf of the Sugar Beach team, we are delighted that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. It is especially gratifying to read that this was largely due to the attention to detail and high service standards of our staff.  Your comments about food pricing are well-received and this is something that we are in the process of reviewing.  As you quite rightly point out, it is not always necessary to book dining times and spa treatments in advance when we are not running at full capacity. However, we always recommend that our guests do so to avoid disappointment should their preferred times be booked by another guest. When the hotel occupancy is higher, pre-booking is essential.  We appreciate your comments and your business and we hope to see you back again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful location ... but overpriced for the quality
review: What a welcoming staff and experience! Went to Sugar Beach for the beach and view of the Pitons from the bottom and while there we had drinks and had a yummy lunch at their beach restaurant and bar! The views were outstanding!! The sand was nice and the waters blue and calm!

title: Viceroy sugar beach st Lucia
review: It should be named rocky beach!  The rocks are so bad you can't walk into the water at the beach! The food is mediocre and Overpriced! Beautiful property, they add a service charge of 10%  To the room cost and then add service charge 20% to everything you book thru butler tours etc.

title: Absolutely Amazing!!!!
review: Good day,  Thank you for posting your comments about your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am sorry you did not enjoy our beach and that you found the restaurants pricey.  In St Lucia, it is compulsory for hotels to charge 10% value added tax and a 10% service charge on all bills (rooms and restaurants). I’m afraid our hands are tied on this particular issue as they are government implemented charges and we are bound by legislation to post them.  I hope this sheds some light on your concern.  Once again, thank you for taking the time to share your review.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Nice; yet over priced
review: This place is absolutely amazing! We booked it for our honeymoon and did an all inclusive package which was well worth it because the food and drinks were expensive. Our accomodations were a luxury villa with our own private plunge pool and patio. The pool was so big and the room was beautiful. Fresh flowers adorned the villa upon our arrival and the butler service was just that...at our service. We did not have to lift a finger during the entire trip! Whatever we needed...our butler was on it! The staff throughout the resort pride themselves with paying close attention to detail. We always felt so important the whole time there, especially because we were always greeted by name. It was so quiet and private and never seemed crowded any where we were on the resort...didn't matter…

title: One of the World's Most Beautiful Beach Setting.
review: Good day,  Thank you for sharing your feedback about your Sugar Beach honeymoon. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and returned home with glowing memories from this very important event. I will share your review with the team and commend them for a job well done. We hope to see you again soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: BRITISH GUESTS BEWARE!!
review: St. Lucia was beautiful... Very hilly... The viceroy was a nice hotel. Butler service(Cody was wonderful). The sugar mill rooms are close to everything where a shuttle was not needed.   The food was not amazing and the people were not the friendliest. One thing I did not like about the resort was that there was a disconnect between employees. They did not necessarily work in unison.   Some people that made the stay enjoyable were: Angelique migne.... Very professional and friendly... Julien Jaumard... Professional as well.   Coco puff at the water resorts. Rhea Adjodha was helpful in the boutique.. An English woman named Jade was not friendly to say the least.   I would recommend Randolph for the water taxi.   If you want to travel St. Lucia to touch all the islands... Go for…

title: Seriously the most beautiful place I Have ever been.
review: We stayed in Villa 318 and from start to finish the service, ambiance and decor was impeccable, I mean forget the fact that you are on one of the most beautiful beaches on planet earth the thing that really made the stay exceptional was the staff. Everyone was gracious, kind and attentive and our four year old son expressed all of our feelings when he announced that he was refusing to go home because he was "staying here forever."  We went fishing one day and as we headed out the chef told us to bring our fish back so he could cook it for us, he did and it was one of the best meals I have ever eaten.  We never bothered to leave the property, honestly there was no reason to.

title: Beautiful Scenery, Poor Service and Food
review: Good Day, It is always a pleasure to read reviews such as yours and to know you had a fantastic family holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I will share your comment with the rest of the team and commend them on providing the special touches which made your stay truly memorable. We look forward to welcoming you back soon! Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Great Honeymoon Destination
review: My friend and I recently flew from NYC to St Lucia to spend 5 days at Viceroy Sugar Beach. The island is breathtaking and the resort itself is beautiful but we have very mixed feelings about whether or not the experience we had was worth the price we paid.  THE HIGH POINTS: The private beach area, the pool and the villas were clean, well maintained and comfortable. The butlers were very personable and helpful and the Rainforest Spa is tranquil and transportive.   THE LOW POINTS:  1. SERVICE - Having had the good fortune of vacationing at other 5 star resorts and even at other Viceroy Properties, we were expecting attentive, well staffed pool, beach and restaurant areas. While there are many staff members present and running around Sugar Beach, nobody was at the pool area to help…

title: Complete Luxury
review: Good day, Thank you for posting your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are committed to delivering a consistent luxury experience to all of our guests yet it would appear from the catalogue of glitches that you described that we failed on this occasion and for that I am truly sorry. I do recall responding to your customer satisfaction survey and apologizing for the problem with your swim suits. As you are no longer at the resort it is difficult now for us to make amends. I would please ask that you email our Director of PR, Molly McDaniel (molly.mcdaniel@viceroyhotelsandresorts.com) and let her know how we may be able to make this up to you. As I explained in my letter, we are also looking very closely at menu pricing and food quality so there is not a repeat of what you described. I am disappointed that one of our food and beverage team members did not offer some form of compensation at the time you experienced the issue with your pizza and the long wait time. Again, this is a lapse in our usually impeccable service standards. I do hope that the positive experiences at Sugar Beach outweighed the negative and that you will consider a return visit. We would like to share a more consistent and luxurious Viceroy experience. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful resort, spectacular reefs
review: Wonderful Staff, beautiful island, top food, and private beach. I dont know what else someone may want for their honeymoon, but Sugar Beach met and exceeded our expectations. Would highly recommend checking it out for couples.

title: A wonderful resort in between the Pitons
review: We stayed at the Sugar Beach Resort for our honeymoon in a luxury villa.  The room was superb - a great size with a huge bed, a very luxurious shower, a second outside shower, a huge tub and two sinks with vanity area, and two outside areas:  a poolside veranda and a front porch.  The room was finished to a very high standard and kept well throughout the treat with maid service, outside area cleaning and turn-down daily (including a special treat each day).  The facilities are also great - food/drink service at the pool and on the beach, three restaurants with great food, lots of tours to book.  The restaurants are a little pricy but we knew that going in and spent an average of around $230 per day for both of us.  The spa is probably the best spa either of us have been to. …

title: Honeymoon paradise
review: Good day, We are pleased that you chose Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort for your honeymoon and that you were satisfied and happy with your decision. We remain committed to providing exceptional service to our guests and trust that our topnotch accommodation, facilities, amenities, services and highly professional staff enhanced every aspect of your stay. It brings us a great deal of pleasure knowing you were delighted with your stay. Once again, thank you for your comments, recommendations and business. We are looking forward to serving you again. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Incredible trip in a beautiful place
review: WOW. My husband and I couldn't have asked for a better honeymoon thanks to Sugar Beach. We were in room 21 in a beach bungalow and Kimberly was our butler. She was incredibly helpful and such a sweetheart! We were welcomed by the hotel with the works:flowers on the bed, champagne, chocolates, fresh tropical fruit, etc decorating our beautiful room. The room we were in was AMAZING! it had two full glass walls looking out to the piton and the bay with a four post canopy bed facing the view. Our outdoor shower was the only shower we chose to use and every night we had a cocktail at sunset in our hammock and a nightcap listening to the water lap on the beach.   You really don't want to or even try to leave the property. The terrain in the local area is incredibly hilly and its kind…

title: amazing family holiday
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team, I would like say how happy we are that you enjoyed your honeymoon with us, and thank you for providing us with this feedback. We try out best to make every holiday experience fulfilling and memorable by providing first class services and amenities and I am delighted that we matched and exceeded your expectations. I am also happy that Kim contributed to making your stay even more enjoyable. She will be pleased to know that you felt she did an excellent job. I will pass on your comments and applaud her for a job well done. Thank you once again for your review and we hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach soon.   Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing stay
review: My husband and I stayed at Sugar Beach for a week in the middle of July. We were celebrating our 10 year anniversary. When we arrived, we were driven straight to our villa in the 800's. We were greeted by Udel with a tray of some yummy drinks. As we walked up to our villa, we were told that we were upgraded from a Cottage to a Grand Luxury Villa. It was amazing. There was champagne, fresh fruit & plantain chips. (If you are celebrating a anniversary, honeymoon, etc, be sure to contact the concierge before you arrive so that they know).  Udel was very kind and unpacked for us, as we sat in awe on our private patio. We did not see him anymore after that day because he went on vacation, but we were soon greeted by our other two butlers Gus & Sherman.  The Butler service is such a…

title: Incredible, just Incredible!
review: We've been to several Caribbean islands, but St. Lucia is a stand out because at first sight, it's incredibly beautiful. Backed up with wonderful Island culture and warm and friendly people, you'll be very glad you chose this as your vacation destination. If there is any complaint, it is that it is expensive, but you knew that when you booked it.  The airport is 45 minutes from the hotel. I recommend asking your driver to stop at a supermarket on the way. We picked up wine and beer(you won't need water--they provide plenty in the room plus 2 beverages/day from the mini fridge), bug spray, cortaid(yes there are bugs, but you can handle this with a little prep), and sun screen. I'd also add snacks to that list).  Upon arrival, there is NO CHECK IN!! Incredible. You'll be driven…

title: Super (Dave) Experience!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to post your glowing comments about Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sure others visiting this site will find your extensive review extremely helpful. Based on your feedback, it appears you had an amazing stay. We will be sure to share your comments with Curt and the rest of the team and thank them for providing the extra touches which made your time at the resort truly special. Once again, thank you for your feedback. We are looking forward to your return. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Some one off problems but a good resort
review: We have experienced many top resorts and this one is among the best for many reasons.  The Room:  As you can note from many reviews, in low season, everyone is upgraded.  Not just one or two levels….to the top level available during your stay.  That is what service is all about.  Never have we experienced automatic upgrading to this extent.  We have stayed at some nice places, all during low season, where occupancy was low as well….perfect opportunity to give guests a treat, and insuring a repeat visit…..but this almost never occurs.  I loved that they did this for us (we moved up several levels to a Grand Villa) and was even happier to discover it seems to be protocol.  This is definitely something that sets them apart from some of the best resorts (Parrot Cay, Viceroy…

title: Amazing honeymoon
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share this comprehensive review about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort on TripAdvisor. We are happy to hear that we provided a top notch luxury experience for you and that you really appreciated the room upgrade. Like you said, we always go the extra mile to make every stay exceptional especially when you are celebrating not one, but two special occasions. I am sorry that your air conditioning unit did not work to you satisfaction. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. I trust that our engineering team was informed and did all they could to rectify the situation. It is unusual for problems to go unresolved for so many nights. On behalf of the entire team, thank you once again for your review. We hope to see you again soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazingly Beautiful!!
review: We stayed as a group of four in the two bedroom residence (there is currently only one operational - 108S). This was the first major one off problem.   We read reviews of ongoing construction in the residence area and emailed to ask about this. We were assured by Molly that although we would have to see the construction in passing it would not undermine the residence itself as only interior work remained to be done on the construction. This proved wildly incorrect.   Noise from circular saws cutting wood on a frequency of about once every 2 minutes, Monday through Friday, 8am to 5pm was audible not just outside on the deck but also inside the residence in bedrooms and the living area. Accordingly, until construction is complete I would advise anyone considering staying in a…

title: Amazing Honeymoon!
review: From the moment my wife and I arrived, we could tell this was a special place. We were not even brought to reception, but right to the room! There, we met the members of the butler service team for our group of rooms, Sherman, Gus, and Udel. These gentlemen made our experience incredibly exceptional and I will never forget this trip simply because of their attention to detail and how hard you could tell they work to make everyone's stay memorable. Not just them, but everyone who worked at the resort was friendly and just went above and beyond, like Denver who works in the Great Room restaurant and Michaela, at the Terrace restaurant. It has become very clear to my wife and myself that not every resort we have been to seems to treat its staff kindly, but that did not seem to be…

title: Gorgeous Property. Great Service.
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback following your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are always thrilled when our guests enjoy their time with us, but are especially pleased when they have chosen our resort as their honeymoon destination. Our dedicated team will be delighted to read your feedback and see that we exceeded your expectations across the board.  I will be sure to congratulate them for a job well done. We completely understand your comments about the topography and general isolation of the resort, but it’s the location that makes us so special. We hope the 24 hour shuttle service helps to rectify some of the concerns about moving around the property. Your comments about the cost of food have also been taken on board and are being discussed with our culinary team.   Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: great room and location
review: This really is a gem - it sits right in between the picture post card peaks of the Island, feels relaxed and special at the same time. It is not pretentious or showy in any way, the staff are friendly, cheerful at all times and very helpful without being over-familiar.  We took rooms in the Sugar Mill area which is closest to the facilities and everywhere is easily walkable. If you are up the hill and away from things then you really do need to wait for transportation - particularly in the rainy season.  However, like other reviewers who stayed in these rooms, whilst they are beautiful they have the older bathrooms and due to the closeness to some beautiful ponds - can suffer from a higher level of mosquito problem. The restaurants are perfectly pitched, the other facilities…

title: One of the nicest resorts in the world
review: Good Day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We could not agree with you more about our stunning location right between the Pitons—it is truly special. We are happy that we had the opportunity to share this experience with you and to provide services and amenities that were equal to the view.  I am sorry if the mosquitoes bothered you. We undertake extensive spraying around the villas and the villa decks in an attempt to keep these nuisance pests  at bay. Sadly, some of our guests are extremely attractive to them and get bitten despite our best efforts.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to see you back again soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Simply put...paradise.
review: This is a beautiful hotel...  we stayed in the beachfront bungalows and they are so clean and the decor is beautiful with a fourposter bed and a deep free standing bath. on your veranda you have a table and chairs and a hammock. When you book a bungalow you get a butler and he was so helpful, we needed nappies and we asked the shop and they didn't have any in so the butler drove in to town and bought us some.. he was so nice and couldn't do enough for you (not that we needed any help). We went to the restaurant a few times but overtime we went we was there for 3 hours every night. one night we was waiting 2 hour for our starter, when your travelling with a 1 year old its hard to get them to sit for an hour never mind 3. So we decided to get room service every other night... We…

title: Best Holiday ever
review: We were incredibly impressed by all the staff at this truely five star resort. The guys driving us from our suberb room (plunge pool, hammock, decking etc) were especially fun and gave us a lot of laughs.  Yes it's pricey but good value for money.  A couple of improvements have been pointed out by another reviewer we totally agree. I think more focus on the Great Room is in order especially varying the menus, however I'm pretty sure the management are on it based on conversations we had at the time.

title: Simply stunning.
review: Good day,  On behalf of the entire team I would like to express how elated we are that you enjoyed your stay with us, and to thank you for taking the time to share this review.  We are committed to providing a high level of service to all of our guests and it is truly satisfying that you enjoyed your overall experience. We are working hard on the menus at the Great Room to ensure that our guest’s expectations are exceeded in that area.  Again, we thank you for your comments and business.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: You are a bit limited in what you can do.
review: +ve  *there are few more beautiful places in the world. Right between 2 pitons – unspoilt beauty. Amazing. *the resort feels very freshly renovated. I’m not sure it is but it feels like everything has been done properly. Look at the pictures of the pool – it’s amazing. Look at the loungers round it – have you ever seen anything more comfortable?! *the food is very special – there are a wide selection of restaurants (4). It’s very expensive but you’ve got to put that out of your mind and just enjoy it. It’s a shame the AI prices weren’t better – you would have to food binge to make it worth the price. *We eat a lot and still came in at nearly half the AI price. *the butler service is great. They will bend over backwards for you. Great example…we were shown the when we first…

title: Luxurious Piece of Paradise
review: Good day,  We are pleased that you made Sugar Beach your chosen vacation destination.  We are committed to providing a high level of service to all of our guests and we are pleased we met and exceeded your expectations.  Our staff will be very happy with your comments.  We hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach in the not too distant future.  Once more please know your comments, recommendations and business have been greatly appreciated.  Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful beachfront resort in St. Lucia
review: If you like a decent walk along the beach, this is not for you. If you like walking or jogging, the sleepiness of the roads will keep you fit. If you do not mind being taken by airport taxi straight to a reassigned room, without going to reception, then you might start to love this Resort Hotel. When you get there, it is three mile trek to leave the resort, and St Lucia is not the most tourist friendly Island, because it is a big working island, but except for tourist hotels, it does not have many bars and restaurants to totally enjoy. In the resort it throws you that all the meals are the same cost, in all the different restaurants, but I guess that is because the hotel likes you to be on a meal plan. In fact, you could be on a cruise; enjoy the spectacular scenery; You won't…

title: The best honeymoon we could have imagined AND ALLERGY FRIENDLY!
review: My Husband and I went to Sugar Beach for our honeymoon June 20-June 27 and it was absolutely amazing!   This is the only place that I have ever been that was more beautiful in person than it is in the pictures. We decided on Sugar Beach because it looked beautiful in the pictures and they assured me that they could accommodate my food allergies. We initially were going to go to a less expensive resort but we decided that it was worth it to pay more to stay in a place that could guarantee that they could consistently accommodate my food allergy and boy are we glad that we made that decision! I spoke to some people at other resorts that claimed they had an allergy policy but people consistently became ill from their supposed allergy friendly food. I never once became ill and the…

title: Outstanding All Around
review: Good day, We appreciate you posting your glowing feedback about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted that we were able to accommodate your needs especially in the area of food and beverage and that you were satisfied with your overall experience.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business.  We are looking forward to your second visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Most wonderful vacation EVER!! Trip of a lifetime 😍
review: I recently visited Sugar Beach in St. Lucia on my honeymoon and was completely blown away by the resort in so many ways!  The resort itself was immaculate and architecturally astonishing. Every room and building reflected such a high quality of craftsmanship. I totally dug it!  Outside of completely loving the resort, I was most impressed by their level of service. Everyone on staff was completely attentive and willing to drop what they were doing to serve your needs, seriously! In the few times we ran in the general manager (Andres?), he even asked us if he could get us anything. Though we didn't require anything at that moment, I have no doubt he would have served us a cocktail if we had asked.   It's a rare thing to see the upper management of a resort being so attentive to…

title: Good... but not great
review: Good day, We are delighted that you made Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort your honeymoon destination and appreciate your glowing comments. We always try our best to ensure our guests are happy and satisfied with every aspect of their stay. I am glad that we exceeded your expectations and that your honeymoon will remain memorable for all the right reasons. Once again, thank you for your review. We hope to see you back again soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Excellent Family Vacation
review: I spent five glorious days and nights at Sugar beach resort in St Lucia. Arrived on the 24th of this month and sadly leaving today!! The beach is amazing, the hotel is amazing the butlers and staff outstanding! Food was delicious as well. Did the all inclusive to include drinks and was totally worth it. Took a water taxi with Desmond who is there/available all day. Was nice to go this route as I was able to have a more private tour. Went into the town of Soufriere where I saw the diamond waterfalls, sulfur springs, mud baths and botanical gardens. Enjoyed some local cuisine which was all the way out of this world. The atmosphere is relaxed in town and as a female traveller traveling solo I was not at all uneasy or uncomfortable given the positive, friendly and outgoing nature of…

title: Pure luxury
review: We had a fantastic honeymoon to Saint Lucia in May. We spent half of stay up in the North of the island and then the other half at the world class Sugar Beach. From the minute we checked-in, we were treated like royalty. We were driven to our Grand Luxury Villa with its own sun deck, swimming pool and butler serve. It was simply beautiful, fantastic decor and really the height of luxury. Our butler wasn't intrusive but incredibly helpful, nothing was too much trouble. The food was fantastic, particularly the dinner at The Great Room. Lots of options for dining, including sushi, sashimi and tempura at the funky rum Cane Bar, and tapas at the Bayside beach bar. I'd really recommend upgrading to All Inclusive as otherwise you may find yourself totalling up the cost of your food and…

title: Fantastic Holiday
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post your comments about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is always gratifying to read reviews such as yours, but even more so when we know you stayed with us for such a special occasion.  Please know that your feedback has been greatly appreciated.   On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future—perhaps for a first anniversary celebration.    Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Bliss!!
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach with our 2 children (11 and 7 years old) for 12 nights early July.  Arrival and check in were poor: our room (805) was at the back of the resort and not what we had expected.  We asked to move, but were left in the room for a couple of hours with bags unpacked bags.  But then Julian and Jacques arrived, moved room for us and we started what was a fantastic family holiday.  The food at Sugar Beach is very, very good.
