Our favourite was the Cane bar for Sushi - amazing sashimi, great rolls.  Food in the great room was excellent - approaching Michelin Star standard.  Food in the bayside restaurant also excellent.  Service at Sugar bech is outstanding led by Julian and Angelique.  They are a credit to Sugar Beach and Viceroy.  They made the difference that…

title: Beautiful
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry to hear that you were not pleased with your check in/arrival experience. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused.  Most people enjoy going straight to their villas after a long journey to the resort, but perhaps as you suggest, we should provide the option of check in at reception as well. I am glad to note that Julian and Angelique made your dining experience particularly pleasurable. I will be sure to share your comments with them and thank them for their exceptional service.  Once again, thank you for your comments, recommendations and business. We are looking forward to your return visit. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Life is sweet at Sugar Beach
review: Our short stay at this resort was absolute bliss! From our initial greeting from the doorman - quote: welcome to paradise and enjoy! unquote.  Through to our amazing private villa set back high up on the hillside with amazing views of the beach/bay and The Pitons flanked on either side. As travellers to many exotic locations, we believe there's nothing like it! The views throughout were stunning, the beach and its facilities were second to none.  Staff were very friendly and offered service and hospitality to a high standard.

title: Amazing property with unsurpassed customer service
review: Stayed at Sugar Beach for a week while vacationing in June 2015.  Great location from numerous perspectives....only a short drive to/from the airport....secluded beach situated between magnificent, picturesque pitons (world heritage UNESCO sites)....close to downtown Soufriere as well as various renowned restaurants and island activities (zip line, etc...).  Although the beachside restaurants at this resort had mediocre food, the Great Room (only open for dinner) had spectacular French cuisine and I would highly recommend the prix fixe choice with wine pairing each night as the Chef obviously puts his all into this menu; my wife and I enjoyed this 2 of the nights we dined at the Great Room and thoroughly enjoyed.  Also the restaurant with the sushi bar was also very good, with…

title: The best resort in Soufriere!
review: Good day, We truly appreciate you taking the time to post your comments. We are happy to hear that you had a fabulous stay with the exception of the food in the Bayside restaurant that you found mediocre.  We aim to create memorable experiences for each of our guests and to provide exceptional service. I trust we rose to the occasion in most areas. Once again, I would like to thank you for your comments and business. We hope to see you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Visiting for food made us feel quite unwelcome
review: I LOVE THIS RESORT!!! The views are spectacular!!! Pictures don't do any justice! It is worth it! here's why: - the villas are just magnificent! My husband and I booked the regular suite and since we are celebrating our wedding anniversary and it was low season, we were upgraded to the Grand Luxury Villa(506) - the private pool is just special that you never wanted to leave your villa! The bed was comfortable, the sheets were very luxurious, nespresso maker at your disposal, complimentary water, Piton beers, tonic and sodas every day. they are very good at replenishing the complimentary drinks. I never had to ask! Oh and did I mention the homemade yummy baked goods that are delivered every night?!? - service was superb! they are professional, friendly and never pushy. The staff…

title: Amazing stay! And at a very affordable price!
review: Good day,  Thank you for posting your comments on TripAdvisor.  We are pleased to hear that you appreciated the comfort of our accommodations and savored the amenities we offered at turn down. Our Chef and his team are doing their best to satisfy your palate and we are happy that you also tried some of the local restaurants away from the resort too.  I am sorry that the food prices here at the resort did not meet your expectations. This is an area we are constantly reviewing to ensure that our guests are satisfied and feel they are receiving value for money.  I would also like to thank you for sharing your comments about our butler team. We will be sure to let them know you enjoyed the special touches and attention to detail they contributed to your stay.  We are sorry to learn about the discomfort that your husband experienced during the Sunset Cruise. We trust that he is fully recovered.  Once again, thank you for your comments, recommendations, and business. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Dreamy
review: We were in the area and decided to come here for lunch. From the moment we arrived at the gates to when we left we felt that the staff did not really want us there. The person at the gate was very suspicious of us and we weren't sure we would be able to go in. At the beachside cafe the staff were very pretentious and ignored us, we had to go up to get their attention. We ordered the beef burger and chicken fillet sandwich. Both were nice, the beef burger especially. The chicken fillet sandwich was a bit bland. When I asked where the toilets were, the staff member looked me up and down a few times before directing me. We couldn't get their attention for the bill, and when we wanted to pay we had to ask a few staff and then the staff at the counter were difficult about us using a…

title: Obsessed with Sugar Beach!
review: Just returned from 6 days, 5 nights at Sugar Beach and we are already planning a return trip!  The natural beauty of St. Lucia is unparalleled and the resort is situated in between Gros Piton and Petit Piton, which translates into a stellar mountain view everywhere you look.  The pool and beach areas are gorgeous and the service is impeccable.  Breakfast is amazing as are the homemade evening goodies in the rooms (macarons, truffles, eclairs, etc!). The resort restaurants are wonderful as well although the prices are certainly high (appetizers are all $18+).  My only real complaint is that random people from cruises and other resorts come to use the public beach facility, which is kind of annoying and changes the element a bit.  The drive to and from the resort is extremely…

title: Beautiful Resort, and great beachfront room
review: Good day, I would to take this opportunity to thank you for posting this wonderful review of your Sugar Beach stay on TripAdvisor. We are happy you enjoyed the amenities we provided at turn down. Our pastry chefs are doing a really great job to ensure that these amenities are done to perfection. They will be pleased with your comments. I would like to congratulate you for attempting and succeeding the Gros Piton climb challenge as we know how much effort is required to reach the top. Well done! We are sorry that the influx of cruise ship visitors somewhat disturbed and annoyed you. Your stay coincided with a period where the inflow of cruise ship visitors was higher than normal. This is a situation where our hands are tied and there is very little that we can do in that regard. I would still like to apologize for the inconvenience. Once again, thank you for your review and for choosing Sugar Beach for your vacation. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: THE PERFECT VACATION!
review: My wife and I just returned from 6 nights on St. Lucia.  We stayed at Jade Mountain for three nights and then Viceroy Sugar Beach for three nights.  Review for Jade Mountain under that hotel.  We had an amazing time at Sugar Beach.  Highlights include our room, spa, pool and beach.  ROOM: We stayed in beachfront bungalow 16.  The room was amazing.  Very beautiful room with modern touches.  We had just come from Jade Mountain with a cliff view, so we wanted to be on the beach.  We loved it.  Had a nice seating area outside our room with a hammock.  We also had beach chairs right outside our room.  Incredible pillow and bed.  Great wifi in our room.  SERVICE: The service was also very good.  Our Butler was attentive to our needs and helped us with reservations for dinner and…

title: Amazing trip!!!
review: Good Day, Thank you for your feedback. We are proud that you enjoyed our topnotch accommodation, facilities, amenities, activities and services. We always go the extra mile to ensure the best experiences for our guests. We are glad that you had the opportunity to pamper yourself at our Rainforest Spa and that the service you received was beyond your expectations. I am sorry to hear of your disappointment with the influx of cruise ship arrivals on the day in question. Unfortunately, we have little control over this but do try to manage these groups by providing complimentary sun lounges at the far end of the beach and away from the facilities for our resident guests.  I am also sorry that the prices of our dishes did not match your expectations. This is an area we pay careful attention to and will continue to monitor. My apologies for the inconvenience caused. Once again, I would like to thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your next visit at Sugar Beach. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Fantastic
review: If you have any hesitations about spending your time or money at Sugar Beach - throw caution to the wind and book this resort now! I have 10 reasons why it is amazing! (no particular order)  1. Cold lavender towels delivered to you at the pool 2. Personal butler that goes above and beyond and feels like family 3. Rainforest spa - got a 30 min facial, 30 min body scrub and hour massage for $180! 4. The service is outstanding! Think "chick fil a courtesy" around the clock! 5. Gorgeous and clean pool with plenty of comfortable lounge chairs (that are more like beds!) 6. Chocolates and cold water bottles left by your bedside each night 7. White sand beaches with a view of the pitons is breathtaking 8.  Villas are huge, we had two bathrooms, huge clawfoot tub, most comfortable bed…

title: Gorgeous resort at a high price
review: This place is completely gorgeous and kid-friendly, which is rare in St. Lucia, especially among high end places.  The setting is beautiful, the beach and pool are wonderful and the staff is very friendly.  It is incredibly expensive - like $1200/night or something during high season.  We just went for the day and used the beach.  We ate lunch at the outdoor beachside restaurant and then we could hang out all day.  We weren't allowed to use the pool but the beach was great.  There is a nice snorkeling spot and you can rent snorkels and kayaks, etc.

title: Absolute paradise
review: Good day Thank you for taking the time to visit Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our surroundings and high level of service offered. Although we do have rooms that run in the US$1200 per night bracket, we also have charming Sugar Mill Rooms that are a lot less at just US$405 per night. Regular specials and packages bring this rate down even further. It is always worth checking out our website or having a chat with our reservations team.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to serving you again, perhaps as a resident guest next time. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfection
review: We just returned from a 6-night stay at Sugar Beach, and WOW - it is amazing! We got married there, and we couldn't have picked a more perfect place. They made everything so easy & stress-free, and so incredibly special (a big shout-out to our wedding planner, Anisha, who did a fabulous job!). The location of the resort is incredible, situated between the majestic pitons, with the most beautiful grounds, beach, and pool. The chairs by the pool and beach were the most comfortable chairs ever, and I loved that we never had to fight for a chair or worry about getting to the beach or pool early to get a chair - there were always plenty available, with plenty of fresh towels. One of my favorite things about Sugar Beach is how private and quiet it is, and we often felt like we had the…

title: Absolutely gorgeous hotel
review: Congratulations on your wedding and thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort to celebrate this incredibly important occasion.  It is always gratifying to read reviews such as yours, but even more so when you have placed such a special event in our hands.  I will ensure that Anisha sees your feedback and that she is commended for a job well done making sure every detail was handled to perfection on your wedding day.  Your comments about the quality and price of our food have been well received and will be discussed with our culinary team so to we can ensure there are high quality dishes on our menus at an affordable price point.  Once again, we are delighted to have shared your special day and our hope is that we will see you for many anniversary celebrations to come.  Regards, Andre Boersma

title: Great Place shame about departure
review: Amazing setting between the Pitons with a beautiful beach.  Got upgraded a private villa with pool which was simply amazing - humming birds in the garden with our morning coffee.  Large estate and tuk-tuk shuttles to take your where you need to go.  What really makes the place are the people - amazing service like nowhere else.  Definitely would recommend.  Restaurants are a little pricey and we explored our places during our stay to see more of the island. Beach bar and service to your lounger though can't be bettered!  We will return for sure

title: Simply amazing!
review: Just returned from a week at Sugar Beach and had a fantastic time. Resort is perfect,staff wonderful especially our butler who arranged everything for us! We went all inclusive and would highly recommend this as mealtimes would be extremely expensive otherwise. All in all a perfect holiday

title: Ideal Honeymoon Spot
review: Good Day,  On behalf of the entire team, we are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for posting your feedback about Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort on Trip Advisor.  We would love to welcome you back.  Regards, Andre Boersma

title: AWESOME
review: If you are at all hesitant about booking a reservation here - don't be. This place is absolutely amazing. My wife and I just returned from a 6 night honeymoon stay here and it was the most beautiful, nice, and peaceful place we've ever been and probably will go. I was nervous about my decision to book here because the pessimistic nature in me only wanted to read the very few negative reviews listed about Sugar Beach prior to going on our trip... but I am really frustrated I even read them because this place is so amazing. The main thing it seemed like people fussed about in negative reviews was the food price. But, you definitely get what you pay for... and what in the world do you expect with a 5 star resort ? 10 dollar entree's?   The food is amazing, and 5 star quality. Yes…

title: A Slice of Heaven
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write this extensive review of your honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted that our team provided the special touches and attention to detail to provide you with amazing memories to last a lifetime. I will be sure to share your positive comments with the gentlemen butlers in the 800 cluster.  I am sure other travelers will find your rationalization of our All-Inclusive meal plan really useful, in addition to the other tips included in your write-up.  I am sorry to hear that the service you experienced on the beach was not up to our usual very high standards. You should not have had to wait so long for service for towels and drinks, and certainly should not have had to go up to the bar yourself. These issues and concerns will be discussed with the food and beverage team to ensure service is prompt and efficient where ever you are on property.  Congratulations on making it to the top of Gros Piton. This is a very challenging hike but really terrific when you can lie back in your sun lounge back on the beach and say, “I climbed that!”  Once again, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach for your honeymoon and for your feedback.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Regards, Andre Boersma

title: Recent Sugar Beach visit
review: The food,service and our butler was great.I loved the pool and the location was great.. not to far from the airport..Would tell others to stay here.Where we stayed it had two bathrooms a dressing room, and a bedroom...Outside it had a small pool and two chairs by the pool and then a table with four chairs....The view of the petons was beautiful

title: WOW!!!!!.....For a Price
review: Returned last Sunday from a phenomenal 9 days at Sugar Beach.  Traveled with my wife and 2 children (11 and 15). This was quite a place and worthy of the Viceroy Brand.  From check-in to check-out we were impressed.  But, as with any 5 star property, that came with a healthy price tag.  For someone who works hard, that price was well worth it.  I am going to try to be concise.  After a very winding ride from UVF (my wife required Dramamine for the ride back), we were driven to the entrance of our room.  Check-in was all done in the room.  We were greeted by our butler, Fabian (who, by the way deserves commendation as he was fabulous!!). We had booked a superior luxury villa and to our surprise were upgraded to room 904 (a grand luxury villa) with a view to die for.  The room was…

title: Absolutely Amazing!
review: Good day, I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are pleased to hear that you had  a wonderful time and that the individuals mentioned, especially Fabian, made a lasting positive impression on your stay. They will be commended for a job well done.  I am sorry that the prices of food did not match your expectations. We are continually reviewing our menus and prices to ensure that our prices are affordable and that there is plenty to choose from for all of our guests.   Once again, thank you for your comments recommendations and business. We would be delighted to welcome you back.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Best holiday ever
review: My wife and I have just returned from Sugar Beach.  We went for her birthday and stayed in Sugar Mill 6 for 7 nights and had an absolutely amazing time.  I cannot speak highly enough about this resort, the location, the staff, the food...everything is simply top notch.  We would return again in a heartbeat.  Thank you for your fantastic hospitality!

title: Incredible visit!
review: Good day,  Thank you for your positive comments about Sugar Beach, A Viceory Resort. We are glad that you had the opportunity to experience our topnotch resort and that you took the time to share your experience and high level of satisfaction on TripAdvisor. Once again, we thank you and would welcome the opportunity to serve you again. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Can't Wait to Return
review: i m writing this from the beach; we re here for another week but it is so good we had to write something straightaway. In short, it is simply a 5 star hotel and location above and beyond all expectations. We are already thinking s out coming back in September.  Just book and then enjoy!  Mark and Esther

title: Incredible Visit
review: What an incredible resort! Beautifully situated between the two Pitons. Excellent snorkeling. The spa is amazing! The treatment rooms are situated in the Rainforest and are actually little tree house units. We are definitely planning a return visit.

title: Honeymoon Heaven- Exactly What We Had Hoped For
review: Good day, We truly appreciate you taking the time to post your comments on TripAdvisor. We are pleased that you had an amazing experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and that you are already planning to come back—thank you so much for this endorsement of our services. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. See you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Can't decide? Here's why you should go
review: We came here on our honeymoon and we didn't want to leave. A++ honeymoon experience. If you are looking for a wild party resort, this is not the place. But if you are looking for a quiet, private,luxurious resort with delicious food, great drinks, and friendly staff, well then this is the place for you! We definitely will be back as soon as we can  Appearance: Sugar Beach is unbelievably beautiful. The grounds and location (situated between two large mountains) are absolutely breathtaking. Our Sugar Mill room was gorgeous, with a huge terrace, spacious bedroom and bathroom, and mini pool. The resort was very luxurious, but earthy (in a good way) at the same time. The beach isn't very large here, but it is very nice, with plenty of chairs and umbrellas. I liked how we didn't have…

title: Perfect location, BUT.......
review: Good day,  We appreciate you posting your glowing feedback about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted that we were able to accommodate your needs especially in the area of food and beverage and that you were satisfied with your overall experience.  We are also happy to read that you are already planning a return visit (maybe for your anniversary?).  The staff will be very happy to know that you appreciated the high level of service that they offered. They will be applauded for their efforts in making this important trip even more special for you. Once again, thank you for your comments and business.  We are looking forward to your second visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfection !
review: I searched around for a month trying to find the best place to go for my Honeymoon.  Some nights I would get lost in a endless chain of reviews for different resorts, so I know how hard it can be to make a decision on where to go.  I am going to try and pack as much info into this review without making it too long.  Overall this is a great resort.  All the staff are friendly and helpful.  The resort itself is beautiful and the rooms/villas are great.  You probably know all of that and would expect nothing less if you are considering laying down the cash for a place like this. So I will skip some of the obvious stuff and go to some of the details that would have helped me make my decision.  When I booked I explained how this was for my honeymoon and any kind of upgrade would be…

title: Spectacular place for our honeymoon!!
review: We just returned from our stay at Sugar Beach for our honeymoon and all I can say is WOW. I think we were more excited about the honeymoon than the wedding, so the expectations were high. We looked at many resorts on the island before booking and thought Sugar Beach would be the perfect blend of the beach along with amazing views of the Pitons - we were right. We stayed in villa 705, which had the perfect amount of space and privacy. The location between the Pitons is spectacular and you have a great view from the outdoor deck/plunge pool.  The service is beyond - you are assigned your own butler from the moment you get there and basically don't lift a finger after that. Gary helped us for most of the week and he was so lovely and kind. Nothing was a problem.The entire staff…

title: A caribbean paradise but not without some issues
review: Good day,  Thank you for sharing your comments about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort on TripAdvisor. We work hard to make every guest stay enjoyable. I am delighted that your stay was amazing and memorable for all the right reasons. Our staff will be very happy and appreciative of your comments and recognizing their efforts for ensuring a flawless stay. Once again, thank you for your comments and business.  We hope to see you back for an anniversary stay! Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing but isolated
review: If you have never been to St. Lucia, please take note.  The island is a series of lush mountains with paved and more often non paved or pot holed roads that wind up and down so much that you start to feel as if you hopped on a roller coaster.  And take heed to the warnings of not renting a car.  I'm an experienced driver and even I would be hard pressed to drive there.  The roads are narrow and locals go fast.  Not to mention that they drive on the left side.  Leave the driving to the island experts.  Most of the major towns are at least an hour apart and the cost of a taxi can be significant.  Unless you are staying by the airport.  Our trip in to Sugar Beach was $75 (one way). That said, the island is gorgeous.  Most of the towns are clustered by the ocean with breathtaking…

title: Spectacular
review: Good day, Based on your comments it appears that on balance you had a great Sugar Beach experience, with the exception of the price for food and the menu selections we offer. We are happy to hear that your butler anticipated your needs and added personal touches that made your stay particularly relaxing and enjoyable. Winnel will be commended for taking such great care of you and ensuring that you remained happy throughout your stay. Your comments, and the comments of others posting on this forum, have been discussed with the director of food and beverage and there will be tangible changes made to both the pricing and the availability of locally inspired menu options. So thank you for your candor in raising this issue. Once again, thank you for your feedback and business. We hope you will reconsider a return visit as we work to resolve the concerns you have raised.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Class and Elegance Aplenty
review: Looking for resorts to stay at was a difficult task as not all hotels will allow infant children. We came to sugar beach resort. We stayed in rooms 904/905. A combination two bedroom villa. It was an amazing stay even at the price.   We arrived to sugar beach and was dropped off at our room. Waiting for us was our own personal butlers during our stay. They are there to help with anything that you need. Our butlers moved our luggage into our rooms and Curtney was explaining everything about how the room was setup. He guided us out to the deck with sit in pool. And to our surprise the most amazing view you can imagine, right in front of us was Petit Piton. We can just sit in our pool and enjoy the sigh of Petit. sugar beach pretty much thought of all the small things and makes it…

title: when is all inclusive not all inclusive ???
review: OK, first things first, the guest facing hotel staff are exceptionally nice here, every one of them, they are just lovely and very friendly. We stayed in a grand luxury villa and the standard of the villa is amazing, lovely beds, plunge pool and very private. You have butler service, Udel & Sherman were our main butlers and they were nothing short of fantastic. The views over the sea are staggering especially at sunset. The food in each restaurant is of a high standard, fantastic food presentation, we loved the sushi in the cane bar and the high dining in the great room, Lillia, what a lovely girl, so friendly. Gardens are great and the pool is really nice, take a water taxi to the capital and have lunch at Marigo bay on the way back, great day (arrange it yourself on the beach…

title: NICE BUT SPOILT BY A NUMBER OF FACTORS
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments and for taking the time to post this review on TripAdvisor. It appears that you did not have a proper understanding of our resort and how things work before deciding to book with us. Regarding the all-inclusive meal plan, upon booking this package, it is thoroughly explained to allow guests the opportunity to make a decision based on what is not included.  I am sorry that you were not informed of the topography of the property and that you were not pleased with the idea of having to use a shuttle to take you from one point to the other. The shuttles generally pick up and drop guests in less than five minutes from the time the call is placed and has continuously proven to be very quick and efficient. The 10% service charge is mandatory government enforced fee that all hotels must charge, whereas leaving a tip or gratuity is discretionary and usually recommended as a reward for exemplary service that exceeded your expectations. The service charge is divided among all of the hotel line staff whereas gratuities are paid directly to the individual who delivered the service. Leaving a tip is not mandatory; we offer a genuine service to our guests. We have been, and continue to be, very transparent with our direct booking guests and with travel agents and tour operators about the continuing enhancement works at the resort.  We issue monthly updates informing them of all projects that are taking place at least six weeks in advance of the commencement of works. We rarely get guests sharing concerns about disturbance. We are continuously reviewing our service stands to ensure that our guests are always happy and satisfied with our offering. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Excellent resort!
review: Lots of pluses but more minuses most of which relate to isolation, inability to walk around resort and the expense of meals.  pros ……  Nice big cottage, kept immaculate by cleaning staff, we were up in the 80s so it was peaceful and private.  Staff friendly, some a little overly friendly.  Food in Cane Bar excellent.  Breakfasts plentiful and varied.  Spa treatments were excellent.  Fridge stocked with free beers, cokes, water, you are allowed two a day.  Free wi fi  Cons …….  Complete bedlam that ensued when security changed over at 9am and 7pm, dogs howling, barking, intrusive and a little unsettling.  The hotel is built on a very steep hill that eventually plateaus out near the beach. This makes walking a nightmare, we did walk down the incline to breakfast several times…

title: Absolutely spectacular
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It appears that you enjoyed your holiday to a certain extent however based on what you have described, we failed to meet your expectations in some areas. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. Because of the topography of the site, we offer our guests a 24 hour shuttle service to take them from one point to another on property. I note that you decided to walk to breakfast on some occasions but found the roads rather steep. I am sorry you weren’t able to walk around the property as you might have wished. Luckily, our shuttle service is fast and efficient. It usually takes less than five minutes from the time you called for the shuttle to the time you are picked up. Perhaps a property with fewer hills might have suited you better and allowed you to do much more walking without the big hills.All beaches in St. Lucia are open to the public. Because of this we do not have full control over who visits our beach and simply cannot stop other tourists from hitting the sand.  The level of noise you have highlighted in your review seems overly intrusive. This is not normally the case on our beach. Your visit may have coincided with a period where the influx of cruise ship visitors was higher than usual, or when we had a group in-house.   There are roughly 10 nearby restaurants all within 15 to 30 minutes drive from Sugar Beach that we would recommend to our guests.  As per our protocol, we do weekly maintenance checks on all our accommodations for concerns like the one you mentioned with the railings. The example that you shared could have been an oversight on our part, rest assured we do our checks, but I am sorry if the bad railings escaped our notice. I would like to apologize for the disappointments and lapses in service that you have highlighted. We always aim to deliver the best and most reliable service and continuously work hard towards improving in all areas of concern. Thank you once again for your review. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Unrivalled luxury
review: I had a two night stay in one of the ocean view villas -- the room was spectacular with excellent fit and finish. It is a bit of a hike to get around the resort with hills etc, but they offer an extensive and convenient shuttle service. Overall the service level was good but a tad inconsistent. It was about 50/50 between top level performers and the rest just doing their job. The food was the only true weak point in the resort. The menu selection was decent but the execution was not up to the standards of truly top notch resort.

title: Mediocre
review: Sugar Beach is pretty, and staffed by friendly and helpful people. However, after 5, the concierge leaves and there is no onsite manager, so any problems are a fire drill, with clumsy resolution. The beach is green, the sand trucked in, and the terrain so steep that all movement within the resort requires shuttles. Also, the "butlers" are eager to please, but sloppy, double check any and all reservations they make. There are many many better resorts than this in the Caribbean.

title: Really good hotel, great food, excellent location etc., but something missing?
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your Sugar Beach stay. It would appear from your comments that you did not receive the best and most reliable luxury service and for that, I am truly sorry. You may not have been made aware, but we have a duty manager scheduled every day who is on property until 11pm when our night auditor then takes over that role. I am sorry if there was a miscommunication and that the manager was not informed you wished to speak with them.  I am also disappointed that your expectations were not fully met in some areas. We are continuously reviewing our service standards to ensure that our guests are always satisfied with the services and amenities we offer.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again to share firsthand the improvements made in light of your concern. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect vacation at Sugar Beach!
review: As you will see from the other reviews, Sugar Beach is outstanding in many ways. The rooms are very spacious and have private decks and plunge pools.  There is a 24 hour butler service, and the hotel provides two mobile phones pre-programmed to call them with any requests from anywhere.    The location, between the Pitons, is picturesque and the beach a decent size with white sand and sheltered from waves.  There is a large pool and the beach/pool area as a whole was not overcrowded by any means.    We ate twice in the Great Room restaurant, the fine dining option, and the food was exquisite, genuinely international restaurant standard (while not being too "international" and formulaic.)  The resort is spread over a wide area uphill from the beach, and many rooms are too far to…

title: Return to Sugar Beach one year later-Can you really go home again?
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. As you have rightfully pointed out, our team members always mean well, but I am sorry that you felt they sometimes were being overly intrusive. It’s a difficult balance to find and we will be sure to review our standards in that area to avoid the feeling that you have described. I am shocked to hear that our team members were literally pointing fingers at the guests who did not leave a tip on their check. If this is what really happened, it is unacceptable. In the first place it is wrong to be pointing fingers at anyone.  It could have also been a case where something else was being discussed. Regardless, we will talk to our staff about this situation. Generally, we have encouraged our team members to deliver genuine service to our guests without the expectation of a tip. Apart from the concerns you have expressed, I am delighted that on balance you had a wonderful stay. We hope you will consider a return visit soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: I Now Know What Heaven Looks Like
review: my husband and i visited sugar beach to celebrate his 30th birthday.  prior to arriving, we booked a couples massage, obtained information about the meal plan option, and booked transportation two and from the airport.  concierge was very helpful.  upon arriving, we were taken right to our room and found out we were given a complimentary upgrade to a beachfront room!  the room was amazing and we had our own lounge chairs and hammock right on the beach.  i can't say enough about how peaceful it was to lay in a hammock right outside your room and hear the ocean.  this hotel is in a beautiful location and the property is excellently maintained.  every morning a team of gardeners were preparing the property.  the food is excellent.  i would highly recommend doing the meal plan.  we…

title: Stunning setting, service was OK.
review: We stayed here in Sept 2013 and had a nice time together.   It's a trek to get there and St. Lucia is VERY hilly. I am afraid of heights and at one point had to duck down in the rear of our taxi to the hotel because I was panicking. A few times the taxi skidded going up and down a very steep incline which put us both on edge.   The resort opened up to a magical setting though and I was pleased to be there after the journey!   We had a Beachfront Bungalow and it was large and very comfortable and pretty clean. It wasn't spotless, maybe because it was a a refurb instead of brand spanking new? Not sure.   Service was fine. We didn't experience anything amazing that stood out or anything bad per say.   We had dinner at the Beach Bar almost every night because on the few occasions we…

title: Perfectly pampered!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback about your stay two years ago.  We take time to go through and understand every guest comment. It is important for us to understand where we went wrong and what we could have done better. Some of the points that we have highlighted are beyond our control as a resort.  Unfortunately, we cannot be accountable for things that happen outside the resort or on the beach—all beaches are public in St Lucia.  On the other hand, we can fully control and correct the disappointments that you have highlighted in our immediate surroundings. All our beachfront bungalows were new-build structures two to three years ago, and not refurbished as you suggest. As part of general hotel maintenance, we constantly check all our accommodations and do touchups on them if necessary. We offer our guests 24 hour shuttle service from one point to the next on property. Our guests never have to walk anywhere on property, including the gym--although we have some people who choose to walk to the gym as part of their workout, it’s a great warm-up.. I would like to apologize for the unhygienic and poor presentation of the coconut man, not to mention the revolting behavior you witnessed two years ago and described. We have explained to him that this behavior is unacceptable and this has now stopped. As an aside, we do explain to our guests that it is not mandatory to accept his offerings. A polite “no thank you” usually works to send him on his way. The boat operators that we contract to offer their services to our guests know of the very high standards that we expect from them. We insist their standards are always in line with those of the resort. The behavior that you have described was improper and would not be tolerated from any of our approved suppliers. However, because you chose a boat captain who was not approved by the resort, our hands are tied when thing like you describe happen. Like you said, it is best to let us make these kinds of arrangements on your behalf to avoid what you went through. I am sorry that the Cane Bar was not as full as you expected it to be. Some days, it’s packed and on other days it’s just as you described. I can guarantee you that all of our guests are very well informed about this venue. The numbers usually fluctuate according to who is staying with us. It’s very popular when we have a large number of honeymooners in house. I would also like to apologize for the discomfort that you felt with the presence of the bugs and birds. This feedback is rare. We will start to monitor what you have described and take action if necessary. It’s a shame that the island, and Sugar Beach, failed to live up to your expectations. Perhaps after a two-year gap, it might be worth revisiting as there have been numerous changes here at the resort which would ensure a more enjoyable stay.  Thank you once again for your comments and your business. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing holiday in beautiful surroundings.
review: My husband and I celebrated our wedding anniversary with a 7 night stay at Sugar Beach. From the moment we arrived we felt completely pampered! Upon arrival, we were greeted by our butler with delicious drinks, refreshing cool towels and a bottle of chilled champagne. The villa was absolutely beautiful and very spacious. The outdoor lounge area and plunge pool had stunning views of the Piton and ocean. Absolutely breathtaking!  Overall, the food was very good. Breakfast was our favorite by far. The sushi at Cane Bar was very good and we wish we had eaten there earlier in our trip. The Bayside service at lunch and dinner was at times very slow but the food was generally good. Just a couple of meals that were a little "off". We found that eating lunch in our lounge chairs at the…

title: Memories that will last a lifetime!
review: Good day, Thank you for your positive feedback about your anniversary stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Based on what you have highlighted, your stay was close to perfect and you enjoyed all the special touches and attention to detail that we offered. Our Rainforest Spa is indeed special. We are glad that you enjoyed this most among all of the other activities you embarked on.  I would like to take this opportunity to apologize for the service issues that you experienced in the Bayside restaurant. I have shared your comments with our food and beverage director. Once again, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach to celebrate this special occasion. We hope to serve you again Soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: BEST ON THE ISLAND
review: From the moment you arrive and are greeted by your butler with a welcome drink, your stay at the hotel is magical. So magical in fact that we didn't leave the resort for a week.  High points are the staff who all without fail are keen that you are having a good time, the food in the restaurants, the golden sand on the beach (a rarity in St Lucia) and the beautiful scenery. Nestled between the two pitons, the views are amazing whichever direction you look. At first booking I was concerned that having to summon a cart every time you wanted to move between your room and the main area would be a nuisance, but in actual fact the carts do not take much longer to arrive than you would spend waiting for a lift in a large hotel. The rooms are exquisite and the plunge pool on each decking…

title: You have to stay here!
review: I must admit its actually been a couple of months since we stayed here but I had to make sure that I reviewed this place.  Me and my partner stayed here for 10 nights and I cannot honestly find one fault in the time that we spent here.  From the off your made to feel like royalty with an introduction to your personal butler for the duration of your stay. Our butler was Cordy and I can't speak highly of him.  No matter what we needed Cordy was there to help day or night.   The food was sublime and best of all the setting on the beach can only be described as paradise.   I remember my mother telling me when I was younger, in life you get what you pay for and that sums up Sugar Beach, worth every penny.

title: Must Visit Resort on St Lucia
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing comments and for taking the time to post them on TripAdvisor. Reading comments such as your gives us great satisfaction and a tremendous sense of achievement. We are elated that your experience was beyond perfect. Cordy is a gem. We are proud to have him on our team and we’ll be sure to share your comments with him. Once again, thank you for your feedback. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Absolutely stunning met all expectations
review: We have been to Sugar Beach before and when selecting a special place to celebrate a special event for my wife, Sugar Beach was a great choice. We stayed on the beachfront in a bungalow, 2-3 steps from the beach. What makes Sugar Beach a must/visit and stay resort apart from the great location between the Pitons, beach and facilities are the staff, who are very friendly, professional and understand how to deliver first rate customer service. For those concerned about the pricing, it is best to choose an all-in-inclusive option, that way you don’t look at the price of food/drinks and just enjoy what they have to offer.  I had organised a private dinner on our beachfront patio and everything from the set-up with candles, lights, food and our own waiter for the evening was spot on.…

title: Honeymoon 6 Nigh Stay - Fantastic Resort and Location
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Sugar Beach is indeed a first class resort; not only for its location but like you rightly said, the high level of service and professional staff makes our resort worthy of its reputation as one of the leading resorts in the Caribbean.  I am proud to work with such a well-rounded team. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay and all our offerings. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to your return visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Great service in a fabulous location
review: We stayed at the Sugar Beach with friends for one week following a visit to New York  Expectations were very high based on hotels own claims and the price!  On the whole we were not disappointed. Our accommodation was in the joined luxury bungalows which had their own plunge pool and some with roof terraces. Ours was within a short walk of the main building reception, bars and restaurant and also the pool and beach with its bar  and restaurant.Our rooms were beautifully furnished and maintained. At the time of our stay it was clearly still UK schools holidays but aside from one or two meltdowns the resort could accommodate all.   The food and ambiance of the main restaurant the Great Room was excellent as was the more relaxed bayside restaurant and bar.  The butler concept just…

title: Incredible Property! Memorable Stay!
review: This enormous property is nestled right between the petite and the gros piton mountains. So there is a breathtaking view from every vantage point! The hotel grounds extend from the beach all the way up a mountain with villas at every level. I have never seen such lush vegetation and beautiful scenery! We stayed on the 700 level and it was gorgeous. The one bedroom villa was huge, the porch & patio space alone was larger than some peoples homes and the interior was new, fresh, relaxing and included a very big bathroom, shower, tub, walk in closet (like my kids could sleep in there!) and a cool outdoor shower that my husband enjoyed. Zero complaints with the room whatsoever! I guess if I was being picky I would say that our particular villa couldn't see much of the ocean, but they…

title: As bigger hotels go, this one is excellent
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write this very useful review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am pleased to know that you enjoyed your visit and that the courtesies and services you experienced positively contributed to a relaxing vacation. Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated.  On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: My stay in the 301 suite
review: My husband and i tend to stay in small boutique hotels, but went with Sugar Beach having being recommended it by our travel agent. Given its size, it really was excellent - our room was upgraded to a superior sugar mill room - which was really lovely. White colonial decor, huge roof terrace with plunge pool and lovely 4 poster bed. We had a personal butler service which worked really well - Peter (who was excellent) - sorted out our spa reservations (the Rainforest Spa is UNBELIEVABLE, really unique in the rainforest in huts), a restaurant reservation off site for lunch one day (at Ladera), including a cab - he also sorted reservations at all of the on site restaurants. We tried the Cane Bar (sushi) which was very good, the Great Room (fine dining) which we were also very…

title: This Beach is Gorgeous!
review: Good day, We are happy that you chose Sugar Beach as the location for your destination holiday.  It is a real pleasure to learn you had a memorable stay for all the right reasons. I will be sure to pass on your glowing comments to the staff members who contributed to making your vacation remarkable.  It is gratifying to know that we are not only gaining a reputation for our beautiful location and villas, but also for the services we provide.   We look forward to seeing you again soon. Your comments and business are truly appreciated.  Best Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: a rare standard of excellence
review: I stayed in this suite with 3 of my friends.  We slept so comfortably and had extra space for people.  We realized we could have had at least 3 more people staying with us easily.  The view from the gallery is spectacular and I loved the entire experience.  I was so amazed with the location because it is right on the ocean! I had an amazing time and my friends and I were able to use the kitchen to make most of our meals.  The place itself is beautiful and very spacious.  We had no problems at all and had one of the best vacations ever.  I highly recommend this place to stay.

title: True paradise
review: The beach-side setting, beneath the mighty Pitons, is truly jaw dropping; a view I will never tire of. The main house set in beautiful gardens has a good choice of restaurants, and there is a great restaurant on the beach too. Rooms are well appointed, ours was a sugar mill room with an enormous private terrace, plunge pool and bar area. The pool is magnificent and was completely empty every day during my morning swim which was brilliant as it gets a little hectic during the day with children; a separate kids pool would be a great bonus but at least there is a kids club with lots of activities.  Beach fantastic with lots of beds and attentive service.   Service in general was good, staff friendly and genuine. Didn't really use the Butler service as that's not really my thing.…

title: Amazing location, great rooms but not so great service.
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am very pleased to note that you had a fabulous stay and enjoyed all our offerings. The team will be very happy with your comments. Once again, thank you for your feedback, recommendations and business.  We hope to welcome you back soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: 5 times and counting!
review: Very kid friendly hotel with a great kids club and kids menus in all restaurants (the kids buffet at lunch was also a plus). The nature and the beach are beautiful. The various f&b outlets are very well designed and offer good menus but are way over-priced. The butler service is not functioning at all, we would have had a better experience without any butler, if we arranged things on our own (which we did).

title: Sugar beach resort
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments. On balance, it appears that you had a relaxing stay with the exception of the disappointments that you have highlighted. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. It would be useful to learn more about your experience with our butler service. I would appreciate if you would kindly email my Guest Relations Manager, Ms. Lisa Jones at lisa.jones@viceroyhotelsandresorts so we can gain a better understanding of your concerns in that area. This kind of feedback helps us to better focus our training efforts. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to see you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: WOW
review: From 2009 to 2013, I have visited the Sugar Beach (although when I first visited was known as the Jalousie Plantation) for 5 years in a row. A truly amazing experience, I found the villa structure and layout across the hillside unique, and have struggled to find something similar in other tropical countries.  Having stayed in rooms 904, 109 (unfortunately destroyed by landslides a few years back) 707, 808 and 904 again, I can honestly say that whichever room you stay in it will be clean, with a lovely personal plunge pool (perfect for younger children and adults alike), and with great access to all the amenities. Granted, with higher rooms such as the 7 and 800s, the shuttle buses take a while to get up there, but, again, I found these buses a unique experience and even the…

title: Wonderful return to Sugar Beach
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach last year and loved it so much we decided to return. We enjoyed this visit even more than the first. We had a superior suite in the 300s section, with the most wonderful view of the bay and so much space outside. The plunge pool was infinity style and very beautiful. The most stunning thing about the hotel thought is its setting. You just can't get much more of a beautiful view than between the Pitons. It is lush and dramatic and the beach is perfectly positioned, along with a great pool area. The staff made a huge effort with our four year old son, who loved every minute. In particular the tuk tuk drivers who always made him feel special. The food is also great although perhaps one more option would be nice for daytime lunches. It would be nice if the…

title: Cover up for the plunge pool?
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your second stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Your feedback is very important to us. As a returning guest, we are happy to read that you enjoyed this visit even more than the first. I am delighted that we were able to make your family vacation memorable for all the right reasons. Once again, thank you for your comments, recommendations and business. We hope to see you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Simply stupendous setting
review: I would give this resort 5 star except for the fact that the food was good but definitely extremely overpriced. I stayed with my family in a superior luxury villa. The view of the Gros and Petit Pitons was awesome. It was picture perfect. Check in was quite flawless as the butler was able to check us in at the villa. Service was very good in general.   However, the car the concierge booked to pick us up from the airport was rather small. I had indicated that we were a family of 3. Lucky for us, we only had two big pieces of luggage. Otherwise, the car would never have been able to fit all of us and all the bags. The wifi was ok but at times spotty. The beach was ok. The sand was white but if you swim in the water, it was a bit rocky. Nothing like the beaches at Turks and Caicos.…

title: Stunning location - fabulous resort
review: Good day We appreciate you posting your comments following your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  On balance it appears that you enjoyed your time at the resort with the exception of the disappointments that you have highlighted.   I am sorry to hear of the behavior that you have described regarding our pool attendants. I can assure you this is the first time this kind of incident has been reported and we will ensure that it will be the last. I am truly sorry about the concern this must have caused you and relieved that your computer and phone were not damaged.  I understand your point regarding wearing a cover-up over your bathing suit when dining in the Bayside restaurant. We encourage this to ensure the comfort of everyone dining in the Bayside restaurant. I am sorry for any embarrassment or inconvenience caused. Once again, thank you for your comments and business.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Great week in paradise
review: Must go back to this place sometime. It is just SO beautiful. Combine the setting with the service which is first class, excellent food and luxurious accommodation, and really Sugar Beach has it all. What more can I say? Go there and see for yourself ..

title: Unbelievable!!!!
review: Stayed here on our anniversary trip. We have stayed at some fantastic places but this beat them all. So glad we chose this over Jade Mountain which we did dine at. We loved having our private pool and deck with view. The staff goes way overboard to arrange anything. The butlers are always helpful but never obtrusive. You are on the famed sugar beach which boats do come in daily to snorkel but they cannot enter the hotels portion of the beach. Also people staying at Hotel Chocolat  and Ladera came to our beach but had no chairs to lie on or rent so just used towels.  This is the place to stay I have no idea why you would go all the way to St Lucia to stay at the developed end of the island here you are looking at Gros Piton and have the culture and agriculture. Simply put if you…

title: Sugar Beach Resort and the Beautiful Staff Who Make It So Special......Read On
review: Good day, Thank you for posting your positive comments about your anniversary stay. We are so happy that you had a great time and enjoyed everything we had to offer. I will be sure to share you feedback with the rest of the Sugar Beach team. Once again, thank you for your glowing review. We hope to serve you again. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: The Best
review: My sincere apologies to the wonderful staff for this long overdue review of Sugar Beach Resort.    We vistied this idyllic spot in St Lucia during our recent holiday and spent the most perfect time relaxing on the beach and eating in the restaurants.  Even though we were not hotel guests, this did not affect how much care, attention, warmth and excllence from the wonderful staff who strive so hard to make the resort such a stunning destination.  Be warned once you visit you will not want to leave.    We will definitely return to stay at the hotel on our next visit and look forward to being reunited with the beautiful team of magical people who work so hard to make this resort so special.  I cannot recommend the Sugar Beach Resort enough, here in simple terms are the reasons to…

title: Perfection
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to comment on your recent visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. The landscape and surroundings of Sugar Beach are truly stunning and we are delighted that our staff contributed in making your experience a fun-filled and pleasant one. Richiana is indeed a great asset to us and she will be thrilled to know that her friendly demeanor and warm welcome enhanced your visit. I will certainly share your comments with her and commend her for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your extensive review.  We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again as a resident guest.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Stunning Hotel Let Down by TERRIBLE Food
review: I went to Sugar Beach with my now husband to get married. Everything about the experience was perfect, and we couldn't have asked for more. The staff were so attentive and friendly, nothing was too much trouble.  The food in all of the restaurants was great, and with three restaurants of different styles there was plenty of choice so we didn't get bored.  The setting was just perfect. It was like paradise. We stayed in a Luxury Villa and I was blown away by the view from our terrace when I first arrived. The Villa itself was also perfect; lovely and clean and light.  To be honest, I could rave about Sugar Beach for ever. It was the perfect setting for our wedding and we will definitely be coming back

title: Excellent Tropical Getaway
review: We visited Sugar Beach on our honeymoon and would highly recommend it. Our trip was so relaxing. The resort feels very private and exclusive, located between the two Pitons.  The private cove is beautiful and has some great snorkeling. The staff went above and beyond to make us feel at home for our 10-day visit.  Great food and drinks. Caroline and CJ at the pool/beach were so friendly and welcoming.  We loved it and would definitely go back!

title: Great resort, stunning location.
review: Good day, Thank you for your wonderful feedback. I am delighted you enjoyed your Sugar Beach experience.  The individuals mentioned will all be commended for a job well done. Once again, your comments and business are greatly appreciated. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Attractive setting, pleasant hotel - captive to their costs.
review: The vast majority of reviewers have said how wonderful this resort is. I can only endorse these views. I would add one thing and that is the behaviour of the staff. Not only were they efficient, they were kind, friendly and made our stay. And we encountered none of the "problems" that some reviewers appeared to face. We look forward to another visit.

title: Beautiful
review: Good day Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post this review about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is always great to know that the courtesies and services we extended positively contributed to a relaxing stay. On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Great days at the Beach and a great meal at the Great Room!
review: At the end of a long, narrow, mountainous, winding road, full of potholes, one finally arrives at this relatively isolated hotel on the beach. The small beach area is attractive with powdery white sand, large sun umbrellas with beds and mattresses and staff to service it all - and alongside a large attractive pool, dining and drinking facilities.  The rooms are mainly free standing villas perched high on a steep hillside.  Each villa is white, spacious and quite well planned.  We had a small jacuzzi pool with leaves in it just outside the door with a large sun umbrella and deckchairs for sun bathing. Lots of mosquitos. Small cars circulate the long winding roads to take guests to the beach, for breakfast, to the Reception, back to one’s room ...  There were always  staff on duty…

title: Not what I expected
review: I am used to real luxury resorts (Maldives etc) this place might have been good before.. But it needs to shape up. Keep in mind they are building new houses on the resort, noise . Fishermen are right outside early in the mornings so it is hard to sleep late.  The restaurants don't have so much local fish, which is a diseappointment. The kids club is very good with dedicated people.

title: THIS IS A PUBLIC BEACH
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry to hear of the disappointments that you have highlighted. We pride ourselves on providing the best service and amenities for our guests. Based on what you have described, it is obvious that we fell short of your expectations.   I would like to apologize for the noise created by the fishermen casting their nets offshore near your accommodations. I understand they were quite noisy very early in the morning. I can assure you that this is not the norm and our security team did ask them to respect the needs of our guests and keep the noise to a minimum.  I also understand your concerns about the lack of local fish on our menus. There is strong demand island-wide for local fish and the fishermen do not always catch enough to supply our restaurants. We are working closely with fishermen on the island in an effort to offer our guests local fish on a daily basis. We are continuing to review our service standards in the areas that you have highlighted to ensure that our guests are always satisfied with our offerings and services. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope you will consider a return visit to Sugar Beach at some point in the future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Doesn't get better than this!
review: Anse des Pitons (or Sugar Beach, as rebranded by the Viceroy) is a beautiful beach with crystal clear water and great snorkeling. Unfortunately, Viceroy management has implemented an extremely aggressive approach toward visitors not staying at the resort but visiting the PUBLIC beach that the Viceroy is situated near.  Over the course of several days, we watched guests of other expensive hotels (Ladera, Boucan by Hotel Chocolat, Stonefield - all which shuttle their guests to this beach) be harassed by security guards for being "outsiders."  DO NOT TOLERATE THIS BEHAVIOR.   The Viceroy would like guests and non-guests alike to believe there is a public portion (near the snorkeling area) and a private, Sugar Beach portion, where their chairs and palapas are located. This simply is…

title: Ehh, consider something else
review: Good day, As you quite rightly point out, beaches on the island are public and can be used by individuals as long as they remain within the area designated as the Queen’s Chain.  Further, legislation in St Lucia  stipulates that any structures built on the Queen’s Chain by Queen’s Chain lease holders, as we are, are deemed private property. This means that the resort is within its rights to deny access to areas surrounding our facilities. Non-resident beach going guests are not allowed to infringe upon what is private property without express consent, nor are they permitted to use any facilities or amenities designated for the sole use of the resident guests at Sugar Beach. Our team members on the beach are there to ensure the wellbeing of our resident guests and to advise non-resident guests of what facilities are open to their patronage.  Our security staff will also guide non-resident guests to areas that are open to them should they venture onto the resort’s private grounds or into areas where they feel the exclusivity of our resident guests might be compromised. For that, we make no apology. Your comments will be discussed with our security team and they will be reminded to extend a warm and courteous welcome to all of our guests, resident and non-resident alike.  Thank you for your comments and your business. We trust that you might reconsider visiting us again, perhaps as a resident guest next time. Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: A fascinating place, ALMOST LIKE IN HEAVEN
review: Sugar Beach is hands down one of the most beautiful resorts there is!!! We stayed half of our honeymoon at Sugar Beach and the other half at Jade Mountain. While Jade was beautiful, there truly is no comparison. The staff and attention to detail is what makes your stay incredible at Sugar Beach. We had two butlers that took care of everything for us! Reservations, excursions, boating trips, you name it. They are always one step ahead of you. (In a good way!) They knew our plans for everyday and helped guide us to some of the most enjoyable experiences. The pool is quiet and nice; the beach is secluded and beautiful. All of their restaurants were amazing and they plan events for their guests every night. If you didn't want to venture off the resort, you didn't have to! I cannot…

title: World class hotel
review: Sugar beach is bringing the island on the map of super luxury travel. It's perfectly run by very professional team. They service of the resort is impeccable. They location is world class. You are between two pitons mountains, in a magnific tropical surroundings... Amazing sea, endless snorkelling right from the hotel beach...  Thanks to all the welcoming staff, seeps particularly to kids club girls and Michaella waitress.

title: Paradise between the Pitons
review: Good day,  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us, and would like to thank you for providing your feedback.  We are committed to providing our guests with the highest level of service and it is satisfying to know that you enjoyed our hotel facilities and accommodations. I will be sure to pass on your glowing comments to everyone and commend them for a job well done.  Thank you once again for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the near future.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful location and great service!
review: A little late for this review, but my husband and I stayed for 10 nights at  Sugar Beach early last September for our 30th Wedding Anniversary. From the moment we arrived by taxi (driven straight to our villa) to the moment we stepped into our luxurious accommodation having been greeted by our own Butler, we were transported into a stunning, beautiful and peaceful location. Our villa was nestled higher up the hillside (Villa 311) and travel to and from the beach and restaurants was by TukTuk (colourful little buggies).  Our Superior Luxury Villa was wonderful and overlooked the bay.Our Butler familiarised us with our room ameneties and we even had an Ipad to make restaurant/spa bookings etc  We were also provided with little phones so that we could either contact our Butler,…

title: Beautiful relaxing resort set in paradise location with the best staff you can imagine
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write this very useful review about your recent 30th anniversary stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are happy you had a wonderful time and that you plan to return when you can. We certainly agree with you that our location is world class and that we offer all the amenities and services needed for a relaxing and memorable stay. Thank you once again for your review. We look forward to your return visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Stunning Beach
review: No complaints from me on this hotel. My wife and I celebrated our 10 year anniversary in July 2014 at this resort. The grounds and staff are amazing and the location between the Pitons is breathtaking. We opted for the all inclusive plan and was not disappointed. My wife is a picky eater and was always able to find options she liked. Honestly cannot think of one bad meal we had, as all of the food was great. Kudos to Monty, our butler for the week. He took care of all dinner reservations, excursion booking and room service needs. The only issue we had all week was a small leak in our suite during a heavy rainstorm.   I would recommend this hotel to any couple wanting a romantic getaway.

title: This place is just sick it's so beautiful!!!
review: I can't begin to tell you how beautiful a place this is......the bungalows are so much fun and so special .....I do not remember a resort that had this unique a residence.....to walk out of your back door to your beautiful sandy lil oasis with a hammock and 2 lounges overlooking the shoreline and it is lit so you can enjoy it at night.."the service here is top notch!   The food is incredible....the spa was excellent.....the beach setting is gorgeous and your view is breathtaking.....look it up to see for yourself......I can't wait to return for my next visit here!   I have one nite left......I wish I was related to the owner!

title: Disappointed by attitude of staff on day visit
review: Good day,  We appreciate your feedback and thank you for taking the time to write this review on TripAdvisor.   We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed all of our offerings and that you had a wonderful time at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: AWESOME VACATION !
review: Having read the reviews and having heard about this hotel from a friend we decided to spend a day here.  Unfortunately we did not have a good experience and wished we'd stayed at  our own hotel - Ti Kaye.  After a long walk down to the beach we ordered drinks and I asked if we could rent a sun lounger.  We were told it would cost £100 for 2 loungers and a sun umbrella.  This is more expensive than anywhere we have ever visited and we are well travelled.  Needless to say we refused and wandered over to the very small stretch of public beach with tatty broken sun loungers.  The contrast between this and the public beach available at Anse Cochon was immense.    Nobody told us to save our receipts so we could get a lift up to the car park so with trepidation we began the long walk. …

title: outstanding service and setting
review: Good day, Thank you for your feedback about your day visit to Sugar Beach. I am sorry that you found our prices too high and that your expectations were not met when it came to the provision of complimentary services to non-resident guests.   I would like to apologize if you were not correctly informed about the shuttle service and what the process is for non-resident guests visiting the resort. We will continue to review our service standards in that area to ensure that correct protocol is always followed. Once again, I am disappointed about the experience you have described. We hope that you might consider a return visit at some point in the future, perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect Honeymoon
review: From the moment we landed in St.Lucia and was greeted by our driver with a "welcome to paradise" sign I knew my husband and I had picked the perfect spot for our long awaited vacation. Being greeted by one of our butlers with a cold drink in hand to our tour of our magnificent villa could have not made the day more perfect. Sugar Beach is  heaven on earth. The staff is attentive from the tuk-tuk drivers to the beach attendants. Nothing is overlooked. Maria at the spa was exceptional! Schwamed your the man! The experience at the Great Room for dinner was magical. Friday night barbecue under the stars with a large bonfire on the beach and live music topped off a perfect vacation. The management should be congratulated on their staff and their degree of professionalism! Every one…

title: One of the Most Amazing Hotels in the World!
review: I only spent one night at the resort on this trip but I have been here before when it was under another flag (Hilton).  The owners have done a phenomenal job upgrading the entire resort including all of the common areas and restaurants.  The Viceroy management team does an incredible job and service is consistent with a five star hotel/resort in the Caribbean.  I stayed in a 4 bedroom home overlooking the resort and the Pitons.  If you are traveling with more than 2 or 3 people, it is well worth the upgrade to rent one of the villas.  You will have a full size private pool, fully operational kitchen and a full time butler (who knew how much you would actually use them!).  If you are considering where to stay on St. Lucia or you want a one of a kind unique Caribbean experience,…

title: Water taxi to snorkel here
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your short stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate your return visit and positive feedback and are glad that you enjoyed the time spent with us. Once again, thank you for taking the time to share your positive comments. We hope to welcome you back soon, hopefully for a longer stay next time Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Outstanding hotel, spectacular location and wonderful staff!
review: We took a water taxi to Sugar beach from Souferie. It is easy to get one, just talk to one of the guys hanging around the dock. If he doesn't have a boat, he will know someone who does...Lucians are very friendly and will happily help you. Water taxi cost about $90 US for the both of us. I think it should have been closer to $60 US return. We arranged a pick up time and he returned right on time. We paid after we got back to Souferie  Anyway, the beach is beautiful. You can snorkel off the beach-there is an area roped off with buoys, so the boats won't hit snorkelers. Lots of different kinds of fish and coral to see. Take your time, and just float-you will see a lot more this way.  We had lunch and a few drinks at the beach bar. Good drinks, and we loved the Johnny cakes- like…

title: Would stay again!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to visit Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort during your recent visit to St Lucia. We are pleased that you had a wonderful experience and that you particularly enjoyed snorkeling and the mouthwatering snack menu at the Bayside Bar. We like to make sure both our resident and non-resident guests have a memorable time with us for all the right reasons. Once again, thank you for your comments and visit. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again, perhaps as a resident guest next time. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: It Doesn't Get Much Sweeter Than Sugar Beach
review: My husband and I had a wonderful week in January at this outstanding hotel with stunning views.  It is the best location on the island. I have been travelling to the Caribbean for holidays since 1998 and Sugar Beach Viceroy ranks one of, if not the highest, in terms of customer service.  Everyone we came into contact with was friendly and helpful, from the gardeners who do such a magnificent job on keeping the grounds looking so immaculate, to the beach side staff and the guys who transported us on the shuttle service around the resort several times a day.  I wish I could remember everyone’s name to thank, but here are just a few of the people who stood out – Sean, Manaste, Sherman, Michaela and Terry.  Our villa was heavenly….Very spacious, beautifully furnished and the…

title: Thankyou!
review: Just getting to the end of a another fabulous day here at Sugar Beach. Just walked into our room and found the most lovely Birthday decoration of our bed and wanted to say a heartfelt thankyou to our Butlers Gregg, Erane, Maneste and Swamed for making the end of what had already been a wonderful day so special.

title: Long walk to the beach
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are so happy to hear that you are enjoying your time with us and all the special touches and wonderful memories that our extraordinary butlers have created for you.
