They will be commended for a job well done. Once again, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope you continue to enjoy your stay. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: This is paradise!
review: Easy drive from Soufriere to get to the resort. Once at the resort you parking (for free) in visitor parking. From there it is a 10 minute walk down to the beach. I heard they offered shuttles, but no one ever mentioned it to us and the shuttle I saw never stopped for us. The beach was a beautiful white sand beach… I think the sand is imported. It is really fine sand, almost powdery. The snorkeling there was ok, I saw some cool stuff but the water got deep somewhat quick so the visibility for me wasn’t that great. When you’re ready to leave be prepared for the 10-15 minute walk UP to your car.

title: Amazing!
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry to hear that you were not informed of the shuttle service and how this process works for non-resident guests. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. We do allow non-resident guests to use our shuttles as long as they patronize the bar or the restaurant on the beach.  I am sorry this was not conveyed to you at the time of your visit. We are glad that you had the opportunity to experience our resort just the same. We hope to welcome you back, perhaps as a resident guest next time. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Great dive crew
review: Just returned from Sugar Beach with my fiancee and had the most excellent time!  I planned this trip for almost a year so I'll try to cover all the questions I had before we went.  I made reservations with the resort and airline directly.  Sugar Beach staff sent out several comprehensive packets with tours & activity information and pricing.  They also contacted me several times via e-mail to see if I had any specific needs, was celebrating a special occasion, needed ground transportation, spa treatments, tours etc.  This resort is all about catering to your needs and that starts right when you make your reservation.   The plane ride was a smooth, 4.5 hours from Boston direct to Hewanorra airport.  Once arriving, the driver was waiting with a sign for us.  Travel from Hewanorra…

title: Breathtaking place.
review: Sugar Beach is one of our favorite memories. This beach is a must, it looks straight out of a magazine and doesn’t get very crowded. I’d avoid the free chair area, that corner does get crowded, you can spread your towels out in the middle, you have to pay for the chairs. I highly recommend scuba diving here. And grabbing a Piton Lager.

title: Beyond Words, a True Oasis, Heaven on Earth Exists!
review: Good day, We are pleased to hear that you had the opportunity to visit Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and that this memory will remain with you for all the right reasons.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future as a resident guest. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Pure paradise
review: Honestly I consider myself extremely picky when it comes to hotels and vacations. I've never written a review before, but after my trip at Sugar beach I felt compelled to put this out there. This hotel's service was absolutely impeccable. Even the most difficult person would find it impossible to find anything wrong with this resort. I don't even think the word "hotel" applies here, as it is so much more than that. The staff goes above and beyond for each person, you are truly treated like royalty here. Every time you leave your room there is someone escorting you out, showing up to your door with an open umbrella if it's drizzling, and at your disposal 24/7 with a firefly calling device you're given for the duration of your stay. In particular, Mosiah helped us tremendously…

title: Beautiful location and property but overpriced
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is wonderful to read reviews like yours. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. Great customer service is our priority and we are delighted that we were able to provide a remarkable experience that you will always remember. We were happy to have you here and look forward to serving you again. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Fantastic and amazing!
review: We have just returned from a one week stay at Sugar Beach. It was pure paradise, the best holiday we've ever had. The most beautiful location, outstanding accommodation, the friendliest staff we've ever come across and great food and drinks. Go for the all inclusive option if you like your beach cocktails and foo and wine. Butler service is a pure luxury - feels so wrong, but is oh so right! The beach is beautifully kept, the water is lovely and warm and the snorkelling is great. Within an hour of arriving, the stresses and strains of a London work life vanished. We'll be going back, no doubt about it!

title: Nice hotel
review: We have just spent two and a half weeks here and enjoyed ourselves. The food is good and the rooms, we has a beach side bungalow was lovely. Don't expect lovely blue waters as this is a volcanic island although you will have a nice sandy beach which I understand was imported. It is difficult to get there and to give you an example we flew out to Barbados last week from the airport at the North of the island which is 20 miles away and it took 2hours. The roads a dangerous and I believe a van went over the edge of a cliff three weeks ago killing all 9 people on board. I was told that but not checked for accuracy . This week , half term 86children are arriving ,35% of the occupancy so there could be a lot of noise.

title: Just there for the day but staff was very welcoming.
review: Good day, Thank you for your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort I am happy to hear that you enjoyed most of our facilities—especially the food we serve and your accommodation. It is true that the sand on our beach was imported. The decision to change the color of the sand from grey volcanic sand to sugar white was taken many years ago. Most of our guests appreciate the beach area but I’m sorry if the beach was not as you expected.   The roads on St Lucia, similar to most other islands in the Caribbean, are windy and steep in some places. We always remind our guests and their drivers to exercise caution. As far as we are aware, there hasn’t been a major accident such as the one you have described for many years here and we hope this will remain the case. We do know of one major car accident on the neighbouring island of St Vincent just a short time ago. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfectly posed between the Pitons.
review: We visited Sugar Beach by rental car, driving down from Castries, a nearly 2 hr. scenic AND harrowing drive.  A more or so past Soufriere a small sign points the way down to the hotel. Down, up and down again to the main gate. There's a fenced visitor lot, and you can either walk, or take the shuttle, down to the beach.  If you do elect to walk down, you will take note that you will NOT want to be walking back up. Make sure you have a few bucks to buy a drink at the bar at the beach, your receipt is your ticket back up the hill.  The shuttles are pretty Tuk-Tuks, making for a spirited open ride. Fun. The beach is decent (imported) golden sand, there is a drop off several yards out, where the sand is more pebbles than sand, but the water is the clearest I've ever seen.  It was…

title: Beautiful resort but expensive meals
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to visit Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort during your stay on St Lucia. I am sorry to hear that driving from Castries was not a great experience for you.  The roads can be windy and steep but at least the views encourage you to take your time.  I am pleased that once you arrived at the resort, you immediately started to relax and enjoy our scenic setting and Bayside Bar. We are also very happy that we had the opportunity to share this experience with you. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back again soon, perhaps as a resident guest next time. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Even better second time around in Paradise!
review: (visited May 2013) A beautiful picture postcard location. Everything you dream of for a honeymoon setting.  I'll be honest, you come off the main road on to a bumpy dirt track road on the approach, winding your way down a steep terrain, not to sure what to expect at this point, remembering the photos you'd seen on the website and thinking, does this exist at the end of the road. It does. And wow! Checkin with security, Immediately driven to your accommodation where your butler is waiting.  We were in one of the Cottages. Beyond my expectations. Just as you see in the images online, so much better in person. Our deck view was incredible, high up in the hill overlooking the beach and cove. The sunsets were incredible. Our private deck and lounging around the resort pool were my…

title: Excellent service, immaculate property but...
review: We have just returned from our first trip to St Lucia staying at Sugar Beach. The hotel is in a superb location, between the Pitons, the grounds are attractive and well maintained and the staff are friendly, courteous and provide service with a smile. I have never swum in such an excellent pool. However, every guest conversation that we heard expressed disatisfaction with the menus on offer (unless you wanted fish at every meal) and the high cost of anything you purchased. We were there all inclusive but availability on that price plan was a bit limited.  Only about 3 of the cheapest red and white wines plus 1 sparkling white were included and there were no quality cuts of meat on the menu with the exception of  rib eye steak (with supplementary charge) Bayside Restaurant…

title: The single most beautiful location on the island directly between the Pitons
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am disappointment to learn of your dissatisfaction with our food and beverage offerings. I am sorry that we failed to exceed your expectations in this area. Your comments have been shared with our Director of Food and Beverage to ensure that all our guests are always happy especially in this area.  If we had been aware of how you felt, we would have tried our best to change that experience around. Once again, I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. I trust that apart from this disappointment, the rest of your stay was great. We would be happy to welcome you back to share the improvements put in place in light of the concerns you have shared. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: First visit and left wanting to return
review: The villas are amazing. There is a bit of a walk either up to the fitness center or down to the pool and beach but you can always call for a cart to take you. EXCELLENT service and wonderful wonderful staff!

title: Even better second time around
review: Good day,  Thank you for your glowing comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are pleased that you loved your accommodation and appreciated the wonderful staff and great service. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Regards,   Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Our first time but not our last!
review: Just back from a dream holiday here at Sugar Beach.  The resort is nestled between the pitons and set on a beach with sunsets to fill your memory cards!  Our butler Linus could not do enough and made the experience all the more enjoyable.  I visited the Spa which was wonderful and a really gorgeous experience.  I also visited the hair salon which started off iffy but ended well.  Bought some make up from the vast range they supply in the make up studio - the girls were very knowledgeable and friendly.  Also got a bag and purse in the new beach shop.  The girls in there were very knowledgable if not a little aloof (English).  Food was exceptionally good but there was a distinct lack of options for veggies which I found rather strange.  Coconut man on the beach every day so you…

title: So good, went back for second helpings.
review: this was the first hotel that I had gone on holiday to in the Caribbean, and it far exceeded my expectations. Having previously had beach holidays in the Maldives and Mauritius, I didn't think Sugar Beach could rival those hotels, but I was wrong. This is the epitome of a luxury Caribbean hideaway. Beautiful villa with a plunge pool and view to die for. The understated furnishings are perfect. The setting between the Pitons is perfect. The Plantation House is perfect. The sushi restaurant is divine. The White bar is fun and funky, if lacking atmosphere at times. The beach is stunning. Sailing and kayaking around the bay is great fun. The staff are generally helpful and friendly, but could be improved, when compared to the best 5 star hotels. A glorious holiday.

title: St. Lucia - Great Island, Great People, Great Resort
review: Good day, Thank you for your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Over the years, we have done our utmost to raise our standards to rival the best resorts in the world and are continuing our efforts towards even greater success in all our service areas. We are pleased that your stay was memorable for all the right reasons. Once again thank you for recognizing our continuous efforts. Your comments and business are greatly appreciated. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise Found!
review: First the island was more than we expected.  Gorgeous!!  With great views, beautiful water and 2 big Pitons.  Second, the people.  Everyone we met were happy, gracious and welcoming to their island.  Third, the Resort.  Sugar Beach.  We stayed on the beach.  Bungalow # 17.  The view was breathtaking.  On the beach with the Pitons on either side, nestled between them like a little bit of paradise.  There were water craft avail on the beach as well as a very good snorkeling area.  The food and the service was very good.  We went off property to Hotel de Chocolate, Jade Mountain, and Ladera for dinner.  I recommend all 3.  Romantic, Quiet, Beautiful.  Hard to ask for more.

title: Wow, just wow...
review: Good day, Thank you for your supportive and encouraging comments about Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We aspire to create magical experiences for all of our guests.   I am pleased that you found the nearby restaurants you visited very warm and welcoming too. Once again, thank you for your review. We hope to see you back in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Hands down the best facility in St. Lucia
review: After looking at many other resorts and reading numerous reviews of available options in St. Lucia, we settled upon Sugar Beach.  Wanting a quiet romantic luxury resort on the beach with amazing views from both the resort and our room with the addition of fantastic service was key for us.  We had definitely made the right selection because Sugar Beach offered all of the above!  Our room was beyond gorgeous!  It had an outdoor shower with views of the Pitons and a fantastic patio and pool overlooking the sea.  Inside it was decorated tastefully with fine amenities.  The butler service is a wonderful touch and definitely makes you feel as if you are somewhere special that is dedicated to ensuring your happiness while on vacation.  Food was very good at all of the restaurants; we…

title: Gorgeous, amazing, luxurious and super relaxing.
review: Viceroy is a dream. The service is amazing, the views are great. The place is super clean. We loved the beach, the amazing spa, the restaurant The Great Room is super good. We charter the sail boat, which was amazing. The views from the boat are awesome. The snorkeling was ok from the shore. It was better in other parts of the island.

title: 5 nights is too few!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Judging by your comments, we can tell that you had a great stay and that you were satisfied with our services especially in the areas that you have highlighted. We are delighted that we fulfilled your expectations. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: A Tropical Paradise!!
review: My husband and I came for a winter escape from our two kiddies, and it couldn't have been more perfect.  - Pre-arranged easy airport transfers - Warm welcome from personal butler Gus, and cool delicious cocktails on arrival - Idyllic location (how did they arrange the sunset so perfectly between the Pitons, with perfect view from their private beach?) - Friendly staff everywhere you look- Terry, Sherman, Nathaniel, etc... Remembered our names after 1st introduction - Professional spa with great personal advice and top class products - Fully equipped gym to make you feel a little less lazy for spending ALL day, EVERY day, lying on the beach- that's all you need to do. We didn't set foot outside the resort in 5 days as they had it all there... - Delicious restaurants; fine dining,…

title: Paradise on Earth !
review: Good day, Thank you for posting your review about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased to hear that our resort and the experience that we provided exceeded your expectations. We try our best to ensure that our guests are happy throughout their stay and to provide exceptional and reliable service. The individuals mentioned are all Sugar Beach stars. They will be commended for a job well done. Your comment about the gym is well received. We will have a closer look at this area to see if we need to add more equipment. I am sorry that you did not get enough time to enjoy the reggae band. In the past we have asked them to play an extra hour when we knew guests were keen to dance after dinner. I’m sure we could have arranged this during your stay too. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you and your family again.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Complete Luxury!
review: My family and I recently spent 9 days at Sugar Beach in St. Lucia.  It was WONDERFUL!  The resort is beautiful!  It is a tropical hilly rain forest environment.  It is made up of individual bungalows rather than being a large hotel style resort.  Our rooms on the beach were lovely and very well appointed. We had 2 rooms with a small enclosed patio and plunge pool in between.  The 24/7 butler service assigned to our rooms was superb, attending to any request or need we had.  The beach is situated in a cove between the Piton mountains; very private and quiet.  The food is good with several restaurants on property from which to choose.  My daughter and I also availed ourselves of some of the spa services which was heavenly.  Services were rendered in individual "huts" in the rain…

title: Shh!  Don't let the secret out--this place is amazing!
review: Had the best trip here in May 2014.  We had a villa in the 700s with the most private balcony, fabulous views and a most relaxing and lovely stay.  The staff is wonderfully kind, helpful and cheerful--they are all St Lucians and we fell in love with this beautiful island.  What an amazing location--it was bliss.  We'll be back!

title: Amazing!!!
review: Good day,  We would be delighted to welcome you back for a second stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort so that we might be able to thank you personally for posting your review.  On behalf of the entire team, we deeply appreciate your comments and see them as further motivation to keep providing the attention to detail that helps to make each guest stay special.  We all look forward to your return visit.  Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Fabulous location and wonderful service
review: Not enough good things can be said about this resort! From the amazing scenery top the outstanding service and facilities, I couldn't recommend a holiday destination more highly.  I was lucky enough to stay in one of the private bungalows with a butler and let me tell you, it was worth EVERY penny! The view, the atmosphere, the food, the people and THE SPA, wow! I would go back in a heartbeat and definitely stay longer than the 4 days I was there. Stunning!!  Honestly, I have been fortunate enough to travel the world and stay in all types of accommodation and this is one of the best.

title: Simply Perfect
review: Good day,  Thank you for posting your glowing comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is always a good feeling to know we not only met, but exceeded expectations.  We couldn’t agree more about the Luxury Beachfront Bungalows when it comes to location. There is something special about being able to put your toes in the sand just outside your door and enjoy uninterrupted views of the Caribbean.  We hope you will consider a return visit soon—and for a longer stay!  Thank you once again for your comments and business.  Regards Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Friendly staff always smiling
review: We just went for drinks and snacks. The service was superb.  If this is not one of the very best views on this most scenic of islands where fantastic views abound... I will eat my hatThe accras the very best. The view is world class. We will return...... Soon.

title: Nothing is to much trouble even when there are few issues , keep smiling
review: Sugar beach   First impressions count , we arrived in the dark and were driven up and away from the beach to block 8 up a mountain and a very steep road . The room was a villa , spacious , all white and well furnished , the hotel reserved a table night one at the beach side restaurant , we took a ride down the twisty road to the beach  This is where it's starts to go wrong , we are seated looking at a post , in very uncomfortable seats , one menu to share , they had run out , no wine menu ,   When I asked about could we have 2 menus and a drinks list , I was stunned by the reaction of the waitress , rude and defensive , I asked if we could start again and lose the attitude , but this was red rag to a bull ,   I had a feeling we were in for a bad food experience, and chose 2…

title: Family Vacation
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Comments such as yours help us to continually improve the services and amenities we offer our guests.  I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the lapses in service you have described and for the less than ideal first impression at the Bayside.  It is gratifying to note that our team managed to turn your experience around by paying closer attention to the details that were important to you. I am pleased that overall, you enjoyed your stay and appreciated the fact that our staff is more than willing to go the extra mile to ensure the comfort and relaxation of our guests.  Thank you once again for your review. We hope to see you back at Sugar Beach soon. Regards  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Best STAFF ever!
review: We had a family reunion at Sugar Beach. The setting is unbelievable, I felt I had walked into a scene of the Pirates of the Caribbean. The white sand and the 2 Pitons on either side made this one of the most beautiful places I have been. The rooms were spectacular and every night a different gift was left in your room. We were lucky to be in a beach front room so we woke up every morning to a relaxing view. The food was okay not outstanding. The service was as they call Caribbean (slow). We joked if you want something order it an hour before you need it. On the whole everyone was really nice, however there were a couple of ladies that would not bend or help. For example we had 5 in our family but would not let us sit at a table of 5 for breakfast if we were not all there at the…

title: Amazing Experience
review: Good Day, We truly appreciate you posting your feedback about your recent family reunion at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Comments such as yours help us to fine tune our service so that real improvements can be made.  I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the slow service and inconsistencies you encountered during your stay. Rest assured, your comments will be discussed with the relevant departments to ensure measures are put in place to prevent a repeat of some of the experiences you have described.  I do hope that on balance you enjoyed your stay and that you and your family will consider returning to Sugar Beach at some point in the future. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again and at our best.  Regards, Andre Boersma General Manager

title: The Bayside Bar on the Sugar Beach
review: Sugar Beach Resort is one of the most luxurious, beautiful and most welcoming resort we have been to. Most 5 star resorts can claim fame to beautiful beaches, terrific food and numerous ammenties/spa. But not every 5 star hotel can claim the greatest staff. Sugar Beach has it all. The staff is what sets this resort apart from every other resort we have ever been to. Beginning with the most friendly lobby host ever- Sherman to Wynel, Mosiah the ultimate butlers and the smiling housekeeper Clare -each and every staff member at the resort exuded a real happy deposition and this during their peak time Xmas-New Years. The word "certainly" was always the answer to most any request. From the drivers of the shuttles, to the landscapers you sense that everyone knows just how special…

title: Best Honeymoon Ever!
review: From the time we stepped off of the plane until we stepped back on the plane, the staff and service was superb!  The Butlers we had were Macrina, Shawn, and Kurt.  They went above and beyond to make sure our stay was exactly how we wanted it! I honestly could not imagine a more perfect Honeymoon.  Steve and I have decided that we will be making St. Lucia an every year to year and half trip.  We had to make ourselves leave the resort.  We did enjoy a couples massage and then sat in the warm soaking tub they have that is fed from the volcano springs.  We road on the Big Lucy Float that was pulled by one of the boats and laughed until we almost cried!  We hired one  of Sugar Beaches drivers to take us on a private tour to the Volcano, waterfalls and Botanical Gardens.  We drove…

title: Very Unique and Beautiful Beach
review: Good day, It is always really gratifying to read reviews such as yours and to learn that we helped to make such a special occasion even more so by providing top notch service and every possible amenity. We are delighted that you have now decided to celebrate with us each year and we look forward to not only meeting but exceeding your expectations on each return visit. Thanks also for recognising the service you received from the individuals you have singled out for praise. We will be sure to share your feedback with them Thank you once again for your review. We look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Regards, Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Sugar Beach - A Nice(roy) Resort
review: This review is of Sugar Beach only, and not the resort.   Sugar Beach is beautifully set in between the two Piton mountains, which makes this beach very unique. It reminded me of something out of Jurassic Park - a serene gorgeous beach enclosed by giant tropical cliff faces.   The beach was a little crowded, probably because there were both resorts guests and tourist there. I also heard that cruise ship guests get dropped off here for about 45 minutes on a catamaran cruise. I hardly noticed the people because I was so in awe of the scenery.   I didn't go snorkeling but saw at least 20 people out in water snorkeling, so there must be some nice areas out there under the water! There was a very nice man selling an assortment of fresh fruits from his kayak. The water was crystal…

title: Found My Heart in St. Lucia :)
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are so pleased to know that the setting and amenities you experienced at Sugar Beach inspired you in many ways.  Our snorkelling site is one of the best on the island; I am not surprised that this area was busy. Once again, thank you for your comments and taking the time to visit our property. We hope to welcome you back as a resident guest soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise Is An Understatement!
review: This is a great hotel with almost all positives to say about it, though there are one or two things to be aware of if you intend to visit.  In summary though, the location of hotel is excellent – very scenic and relaxing in between the Pitons - so much so that the area is visited every day by other holidaymakers - which makes you realise how lucky you are to have it on your doorstep. The level of service from all those that work there was second to none - from senior management to the butlers and waiters, the people at the hotel are truly great - some of the best hotel staff we have ever had - so much so, it would be really unfair and very difficult to single out individuals.  The room we had (Luxury villa level seven) was fantastic, spacious and with excellent views - a 5…

title: A little piece of paradise
review: Having visited the north of the island a couple of years ago, I was excited to be visiting the south west with my in-laws to their favourite holiday destination, Sugar Beach. I was certainly not disappointed.   My husband & I stayed in the 300's cluster, which could not be faulted. As we walked up the steps we were met by a huge plunge pool, sunbed area which looked out onto the sea for the gorgeous sunsets and a covered seating area which was a perfect location to enjoy the rainy times, yes, we had a bit but it didn't dampen out spirits! The door led straight into our bedroom with its high ceiling & white wooden furniture. A further walk through room contained our 'teas maid' which was far from basic. It included a full sized complimentary stocked fridge as well as a nespresso…

title: Grand Room Dining Experience
review: Good day, Thank you for your positive comments and for deciding to travel south for a stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is always gratifying when we receive reviews such as yours. After such a glowing recommendation from your in-laws, I am happy that we were able to not only meet, but exceed your expectations and to ensure you also had a wonderful stay. Thank you for your comments about the food we serve at the resort. Our culinary team works tirelessly to ensure perfection in this area and I know they will appreciate your feedback. Once again, thank you for your review and business. We hope to welcome you back soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Heavenly
review: This is one of the most gorgeous restaurants we have ever experienced.  The view is simply fantastic.  The Grand Room overlooks the beach, lights sparkling, the ceiling high, and the dining space clean and extremely well managed.  Even though we were not staying at the resort, we had no difficulty making a reservation. The staff was extremely professional.  As an actual dining experience, however, it was disappointing.  On the positive side, the wine and cocktail list is very impressive.  I had the grapefruit gin and tonic, and I am confident it did not come from a large jug behind the counter.  It was fresh!  Our Cakebread chardonnay was wonderful, perfectly chilled, and well presented.  The fish was not fresh.  How is that possible in this place at this price?  Before it was…

title: The butler did it
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your dining experience at the Great Room. Feedback such as yours helps us to improve both our service and the quality of items on our menus. I am sorry to hear that your main course did not meet your expectations and I am also disappointed that the situation was not rectified to your satisfaction.  I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. We continually review our service standards to ensure that all of our guests, resident or otherwise, are always rendered with the best possible service. Once again, thank you for visiting Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again so you can enjoy the Great Room at its best. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Awesome Place
review: One of the most beautiful places I've ever stayed in 14 years of frequent travelling.  We stayed in a Superior Luxury Villa set slightly up the very steep hill where the resort is located, between the two imposing Pitons.  Rather than being taken to reception and having to wait while the usual formalities are carried out, we were taken directly to our villa where Suarmey our butler was waiting to greet us with a welcome cocktail.  He gave us a very thorough tour of our amazing villa and even offered to unpack our clothes.  The villa was simply gorgeous; large and well appointed with a lovely terrace and infinity pool outside looking down towards the beach and sea.  The shower was bigger than some rooms I've stayed in!    The Great House forms the centre point of the resort,…

title: A Haven in Paradise
review: As a travel agent, I have stayed in many hotels around the world. Sugar Beach is truly exceptional. It has a dramatic location: right between the two picturesque cone-shaped extinct volcanoes, the Pitons. Several of the other resorts in this part of St. Lucia have rooms with no fourth wall; they are open to their views--and to mosquitoes. We preferred the rooms at Sugar beach: four walls and A/C.  Our one-bedroom villa was gorgeous, all decorated in white, with a huge master bath, a huge shower, a walk-in closet and dressing room, and two large verandas. We had a private plunge pool and even private butlers (assigned to our cluster of villas)!   But best of all was our view--far below us was the beach and the pool. And facing us, right up close--the beautiful Petit Piton (which…

title: Wonderful resort
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing review. We are happy that as a travel agent you had the opportunity to stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and experience the quality service and amenities that we offer. Your comments speak volumes bearing in mind the type of work you do. I am sure that your feedback will assist travel agents like yourself when making decisions on behalf of their guests.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit in the not too distant future and would welcome the opportunity to serve your clients as well. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful beach!  Terrible restaurant service.
review: I loved this resort. We stayed in a one bedroom villa on the hillside (if you can stay in one of the bungalows on the beach then do so) which was well served by free taxis to the beach.  The bungalow was big and very tastefully decorated. You get a butler that looks after any need that you may have. The service was surprisingly very good as I don't think that this is normal for the Carribean. The only downside is the cost of the food and drinks and The excursions organised by the hotel are very expensive. Worth going to hotel chocolat for dinner!

title: Heaven on earth
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Based on what you have described, it is evident that you enjoyed the time that you spent with us with the exception of the disappointment that you have highlighted about the price of food. This is an area we constantly review to ensure our prices are in keeping with the quality and variety of food on offer. Once again, thank you for posting this review. We hope to see you back again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing Anniversary
review: We visited sugar beach as a day trip from our villa. We planned on just spending the day at the beach. We assumed we could rent beach chairs but were informed that the hotel was booked and none were available. Strange being only 1/3 were being used. I'm not picky so it was fine and we found a shady place to sit on a blanket on the beach. After a couple hours we decided to grab lunch at the restaurant. Here's where the day went down hill. It took over 20 mins for a server to greet us. We ordered the 3 tapas at the cost of $50 US dollars.  When our food arrived we informed the server that two of the items were not what we ordered. We were told yes it was?  About the same time a lady at the next table (who had been waiting 45 mins for her food) heard us talking and realized we had…

title: Best Spa Experience ever
review: My girlfriend and I have been to St. Lucia multiple times.  We often do a couples massage when there. The former Jalouise Estates, but now newly renovated called Sugar Beach is unbelievable. I called from another hotel in Soufriere to schedule the couples message...was blinded by the sticker price of almost 500.00 US/per person. I negotiated down to under 300.00 US/per person and have to say....it was the best couples spa experience EVER!!! The entire experience from pre massage to sitting in the natural warm mineral water running under your spa hut...then getting in after with your spouse relaxing privately....it was the most naturally wonderful spa experience you could have....worth the money....

title: Amazing Anniversay at Sugar!!!!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your spa experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are so pleased that you had the opportunity to utilize our Rainforest Spa and happy that it turned out to be the best spa experience you have ever had. Once again, thank you for your comments and business.  We are looking forward to your return visit perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Third time a charm
review: My wife and I just returned home from a week at Sugar Beach and it was absolutely amazing. The property is gorgeous and the setting is to die for. We stayed in a Luxury Villa in the 300's with our own plunge pool, a stunning view of the ocean and the Pitons. I have stayed at several 5 star Caribbean resorts and I think this one just might take the cake.  I will say that the food is expensive but we dinned out two nights at Boucan and at Ladera and they were also pretty pricey. We saved some money by not going All Inclusive as we new we wanted to explore other local places on the island. In addition to the #2 place I just mentioned we also had dinner at the Humming Bird and a great lunch at La Petit Peak in town. My wife and I didn't eat breakfast everyday but did have breakfast…

title: Missing St Lucia
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your positive comments on TripAdvisor. It is always nice to receive such glowing feedback and to know that we were able to exceed your expectation. I will be sure to share your comments with the butlers who took such exceptional care of you. I know they will be thrilled with your feedback. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Charming Location, Charming People, Risible Logistics
review: Our third visit to this lovely resort.  We had a great holiday, which was mostly due to the fabulous staff who happily welcomed us back.  In particular, Caroline from the Beach, Bronny from the Bayside and Lucita from the Spa could not have done more for us - really lovely ladies and very good at their jobs.  Our room, Sugar Mill 5 was lovely.  The very private upstairs terrace spanned across the top of 2 other sugar mill rooms and was huge - we spent a lot of time there in the plunge pool - highly recommended.  We enjoy the Sugar Mill rooms as you can walk everywhere. Having stayed in one of the beachfront bungalows we still prefer the Sugar Mill rooms as they are very private with their little gardens.  As usual, the grounds were immaculate, and we also very much enjoyed the…

title: Perfect Honeymoon
review: Amazing property, beautiful grounds and the most wonderful staff around. We could not have been happier with our honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach. The service was unbelievable. Our butler, Swamed, went above and beyond. From greeting at us with the most delicious welcome drinks, to meeting us at our door with an umbrella to walk us to the shuttle for dinner in the rain, to calling all around the island to try and find us an ATV tour because the one though the hotel was cancelled, he provided the highest level of service. We are already saving our pennies in hopes to make it back some day!  Keep up the good work, Sugar Beach!

title: The best belated birthday
review: Good day, Thank you for making Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort your honeymoon destination and we are truly happy that you had the most amazing time. We are known for the very high level of service that we offer to our guests and I am glad that we were able to share this experience with you. Swamed will be commended for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Best Vacation of my Life!
review: We visited the hotel as a belated birthday treat for me-and what a treat it was!  From the time we stepped out of the car and were met outside our villa until the reverse procedure when we left we were treated like pampered members of the family of Sugar beach. The butler service was outstanding-nothing was too much trouble, from booking meals to fixing my wife's I-pad-all done with unfailing patience, charm and good humour. This standard of service was shown all over the hotel-the beach, restaurants, the shuttle drivers, all made us feel appreciated and welcome. Our villa was superb-a large lounge area inside with tv & dvd, and a huge terrace outside with plunge pool, loungers and day beds, and a balcony with wonderful views across the bay-and perfect for the sunsets. The…

title: Sugar Beach -- Best Vacation Ever
review: Good day,  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to say how happy we are that you enjoyed your stay at Sugar Beach and thank you for your feedback.  We are delighted that you enjoyed every aspect of your stay with the exception of the long wait to be served afternoon tea and your disappointment once it arrived. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. This is not up to our usually high standard especially for an experience that usually rates highly with our guests.  I will certainly pass on your praise to the team and let them know that you were pleased with the very high level of service they offered.   Thank you once again for your review and we hope you will consider a return visit to Sugar Beach at some point in the future.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Return to Paradise
review: I opened a trip advisor account just so I could write a review about this incredible resort. My husband and I went for 7 nights, 8 days from 11/10-11/17 for our honeymoon. When we arrived we were driven straight to our villa and welcomed by our butlers with drinks and a tour of our villa. The villa is huge and gorgeous! I never wanted to come back to Chicago. The service from the butlers the entire time was beyond five-star! Anything we needed, we got right away. Greg had a candle-light bath drawn for us as a surprise, and Dwight got us a bunch of bananas before hiking the Gros Piton. They always answered our calls and were able to accommodate us!   The resort itself is absolutely beautiful. The location is PERFECT! It is ON the beach, unlike the other luxury resorts! The beach…

title: A very romantic resort situated in unique position
review: My wife and I were celebrating a special wedding anniversary and our research indicated St Lucia and Sugar Beach would provide a romantic destination. Overall the holiday lived up to all our expectations. The villas are set on the side of a steep hill overlooking the ocean. They all have plunge pools and as far as we could see a great deal of privacy. Ours was all we expected and a little more it had a full size lounge large bedroom with 4 poster bed, two toilets, a huge walk in shower plus another shower and a free standing Victorian style bath. The butler and housekeeping kept the villa immaculate. As far as food is concerned you either like or dislike Caribbean food there is no in between. The resort has beachside casual restaurant and the Great Room which is more formal.…

title: High Expectations..low delivery
review: Good day, Firstly, we would like to thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort to celebrate your wedding anniversary.  We are very happy that you remained pleased and satisfied with your decision. We know how important it is to offer our guests high end amenities for both comfort and relaxation. Your comments bring us great satisfaction, knowing that your expectations were exceeded in all areas. I am also happy to read that our staff played a special role in ensuring that every aspect of your stay was faultless. They will be commended for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your wonderful comments. We hope to welcome you back for a future anniversary stay. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise Revisited
review: My fiancé and I just spent a week long vacation at Sugar Beach, a Viceroy resort located in between the beautiful Pitons of St. Lucia. As we sit here at the airport waiting for our flight back to NYC, we decided to write a review to share our experiences with fellow travelers.  As avid trip advisor users, we read many (if not all) of the reviews of Sugar Beach before deciding to vacation here.  We will start with the positives, the amazing experiences that we loved while staying at Sugar Beach.  First and foremost, the setting, view, ambiance is spectacular.  Sugar beach sits in the heart of the Pitons and the views are stunning – other reviewers did not exaggerate with how stunning the vistas are.    We spent our first full day in St. Lucia taking advantage of the Rainforest…

title: Beautiful location, incredible room.
review: Good day, I would like to thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It appears that you experienced a catalogue of disappointments and service inconsistencies especially in the area of food and beverage. I would like to apologize for less than satisfactory experiences that you have shared.  Although many of the things you have highlighted should not have happened in the first place, we would have greatly appreciated your feedback while you were still at the resort. I am confident that we would have been able to turn your experience around. We have been operating at very high occupancy and I am not certain why it was communicated to you that we were almost empty, this is very far from the truth. With that being said, we encourage our guests to put in a request for whatever preferences that they may have. We always communicate that there are no guarantees for ocean view rooms.  There are a number of contributing factors that impact the allocation of an ocean view room including stay patterns, room types booked and of course occupancy. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. I am sure we would have allocated a room with a better view had one been available. We are very surprised to hear that you were ill during your stay. There are a number of other non-food related factors that could have caused this illness such as a virus or too much sun. We certainly have not had any other reports of guests feeling ill during the period you stayed. Again, we are sorry that you fell sick and hope that you are now fully recovered.   We are continuing to review our service standards in the areas that you have highlighted to ensure that all our guests are receiving a very high level of service and implementing additional training where required.  Again, I am sorry for the experiences that you have described. Your stay  appears to have fallen short of the usual high level of service that we offer. We hope to welcome you back in the near future to share firsthand the improvements made in light of your concerns. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: 8 Days in Heaven
review: This was our third trip back to Sugar Beach where we were welcomed as family.  The staff all remembered us.  We stayed again in 812, a magnificent villa at the top of the hill with our own full swimming pool.  We had special meals prepared at our request, as we sunned by our crystal clear pool in the midst of a tropical jungle paradise.  We canceled a trip to Tahiti to come back to Sugar Beach, that's how beautiful and enchanting the place is for us.  The staff is warm and caring, everything is so clean, and the food is excellent.  We stayed two weeks so I would suggest a weekly change of the menus as it got a bit repetitive.  Viceroy has increased the pricing from 2012 when we were there, so do not go a la carte.  All inclusive is the way to go. Floating in the azure waters,…

title: Fantastic location, poor food, poor staff attitude
review: As per my title the location and bungalows are outstanding. The bungalows are located right on the beach with fantastic views of the pitons and you can see the sea from your bed. The bungalows are decorated all white with a very pure feel. All accessories and decor are all white also, you have a private small pool/ jacuzzi with outdoor space and outdoor shower. The rooms are very modern and spacious with big bath tubs. The resort has lots of hills I.e if you want to go up to the small shop or the great room, but don't worry I am unfit and they put everyone on a little buggy to wizz you around should you ever want to go up there.   The beach has plenty sun loungers and umbrellas with outstanding views. The pool is very very big with plenty seats also. The staff on the beach are…

title: Most amazing week of our lives
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share this expansive review and to comment on the areas that concerned you as well as the areas that you were satisfied with. I am  shocked to hear of your experience with the server at breakfast. This is  unacceptable and not the kind of service that we offer to our guests. I am sorry that you did not get to experience our usual high standards of service in that area. We have addressed this issue with the server in question and the supervisory team. We take these concerns very seriously and will do what we can to ensure there is not a repeat of what you have described. I am sorry that you felt that the quality of our food and beverage offering did not merit the prices charged. I am confident that our executive chef would have prepared dishes to your satisfaction if he had been aware of your expectations in this area. Once again, I would like to apologize for the lapses in service that you encountered. Your comments and business have been greatly appreciated. I hope you will consider a return visit so that we might be able to share an improved Sugar Beach experience.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Tropical Oasis
review: Where do I even start? We felt like royalty at Sugar Beach. Simply stated, this resort is pure luxury. We stayed 7 nights for our honeymoon in October 2014. We stayed in a Sugar Mill room, which I feel is inappropriately named as the rooms are more like townhouses with your own private terrace and plunge pool. We never saw or heard our neighbors once. We were hoping to be magically upgraded to a villa until we got there and realized that the villas required shuttle to get down to the beach and restaurants. In the Mill rooms, we were a 20 second walk to everything. Ah, the scenery is so beautiful. Everything is so clean. The pool is incredible, there were times that we had it to ourselves. The snorkeling is amongst the best I've seen. The water is rocky, but crystal clear and we…

title: Simply Amazing
review: Good day Thank you for taking the time to comment on your honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted to hear that your honeymoon was perfect. We will share your feedback with our team members and commend them for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your business and comments. We are looking forward to your next stay…perhaps for a first anniversary celebration.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Location, location, location….isn't everything!
review: We were only able to visit Sugar Beach for a few hours during one of our excursions. However, this stop was the highlight of our day! Our catamaran pulled up into the cove & we were greeted with the view of the clear waters, pristine white beach & towering Pitons.   The water in this area was so clear it provided us with fantastic snorkeling...we saw eels, crab, puffer fish, sea snake, coral & lots of other colorful fish. The beach was filled with bright white sand & kept very clean. There was a restaurant available but we didn't stop in.   During our visit, local vendors paddled up to our catamaran. They were not pushy but were very friendly & amusing. They displayed handicrafts & local tropical fruits for sale. Bring cash if you are interested in sampling fresh coconut, mango,…

title: surpassed our expectations
review: The drive from the airport was interesting but so many bends and mountains that we were all a bit motion sick. We were really grateful to reach the resort and first impressions were very good. We didn't have to check in - just filled our form in in our bungalow. That was a great idea.  We had the beach front bungalow and it is just beautiful. Enormous "rooms" with stand alone bath, fabulous bed and so comfortable, outdoor jacuzzi in our own patio, steps from the water. Our butler Mackenzie was efficient and interested in making sure we had a great stay and we found all the staff really pleasant.  The swimming pool is large, super clean and the service at the pool was excellent.  The critters made a heck of a noise at night but I found it added to the charm. If you are worried -…

title: Friendly paradise
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy your expectations were exceeded in all areas with the exception of the concerns that you have highlighted with our food quality and pricing. This is an area that we are continuously aiming to improve to ensure that our guests are always satisfied and feel they are getting value for money.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay in spite of the concerns highlighted. Once again, thank you for your comments and business.  We are looking forward to your return visit. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: We are living on beans on toast now but it was worth every penny!
review: This was my seventh visit to what is now sugar beach and the improvements and investment over the years have really paid off. This is quiet and relaxing and not the place to go if you like night life. It is the most beautiful location on st lucia and the proximity of the pool and bayside restaurant to the beach make this compact and suitable for all ages - i visited this time with teenage children and mother in her 80's with limited mobility. The staff though are exceptional and again the service from the Butler team has stepped up greatly, mums mobility probs meant that our Butler always ordered a tuk tuk to come direct to our villa to pick us up and as i was ill during my visit not only our Butler but drivers and pool and restaurant teams couldnt do enough to help my mum. Greg…

title: Speachless.
review: Good day, As a seventh time staying guest at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort your feedback is very important to us. Thank you for recognizing and appreciating our efforts and commitments in continuing to improve the service and amenities that we offer, and that hopefully encourage people like yourselves to return time and time again. Your comments and loyalty speak volumes. I would also like to thank you for sharing your thoughts on the areas that concerned you. We will share your observations and concerns with the Food & beverage team and renew our training efforts in the Bayside if required. I am happy to hear of the high level of service that our team members, especially Greg, rendered to you and your family. They will all be commended for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Incredible Ambiance, Disappointing Food/Service
review: We got married there and it was complete luxury from the moment we arrived with warm and very efficient staff. Anisha and Shantal couldn't have been more helpful with organising our wedding, the photographer was excellent and we had a romantic meal on the beach afterwards. I totally recommend it as a wedding location and the wedding itself was incredibly reasonable price wise. We were offered a few locations but chose the Sunset Deck overlooking magnificent views of the Pitons. During the ceremony it rained slightly (lovely warm rain not freezing drizzle like at home!) and we got a double rainbow! Our 3 lovely butlers made really sweet touches throughout the stay, such as decorating our room after the wedding. Nothing was too much trouble for them, we needed a couple of things…

title: Between the Pitons
review: My family and I have just returned from the Sugar Beach Resort having had a wonderful time enjoying the superb cuisine, excellent service and beautiful surroundings that this small resort has to offer.

title: An all-inclusive paradise
review: Good day, Thank you for posting your positive feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach. It is gratifying to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay and everything that we offered. Once again, thank you for taking the time to post your comments on TripAdvisor. We hope to welcome you and your family back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Snorkeling adventure spot
review: My wife and I stayed for a four night honeymoon and we couldn't be happier (except for leaving!).  We went the last week of October and the weather was mid-80s with only a few drizzles.  We did all-inclusive and stayed in the 300s level of villas.  We had a personal plunge pool and could see the Caribbean from the patio.  We were driven directly to our villa "neighborhood" where we met one of our three butlers, who were as nice and accommodating as can be.  Both Erone and Souamed (spelling) were fantastic.  Our villa was as private as possible with a white clean room that was turned over and turned down daily.  The butler cell phones took some getting used to, but the butlers were very receptive and wanted to know why we hadn't asked for more exotic or unique requests.  It was…

title: Fantastic.
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted that on balance you were happy with your decision to vacation with us and that your expectations were exceeded in most areas.  Thank you for your comments about the inconsistent service on the beach. We will be sharing your feedback with the manager in that area to ensure our guests are always served in a timely manner. I am sorry that you found things a bit slow on occasion. Once again thank you for your comments and we look forward to your return visit. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Stay somewhere else!
review: We visited Sugar Beach to enjoy their beach side restaurant and to spend the day snorkeling in the awesome area they have roped off from where the boats come in to dock.  The food was very awesome, but yes a bit pricey, good drinks ;-) The snorkeling area was the best we found.  There are some coral reefs there and lots of different fish.  There was also 4 squids and a water snake.   My family really liked this beach, we enjoyed the local fruit sold to us from the boat of a local and we found bunches of crabs and had an awesome crab race.

title: Perfect Honeymoon Destination
review: My wife and I spent 7 nights at Sugar Beach for our honeymoon, and it was a dream vacation.  The location between the two pitons was magnificent.  We were welcomed by our butler with welcome drinks and a tutorial on our room and its features.  We stayed the first half of our honeymoon in a Luxury Sugar Mill Room, and then for the 2nd half of our honeymoon the resort upgraded us to a beach bungalow.  When we arrived we had hoped for an upgrade to a room up on the hill with a view of the water, but we soon came to realize how wonderful the convenience of the Sugar Mill rooms are.  It's nice to be able to get back and forth to your room on foot rather than having to wait for a ride back and forth, especially if you are at the beach or pool and you forget something in your room. …

title: Picture perfect wedding and more...
review: Good Day, On behalf of the entire team I would like say how happy we are that you enjoyed your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort, and thank you for providing us with your feedback. We are committed to providing our guests with the highest level of service and it is satisfying to know that you enjoyed our hotel facilities accommodations and amenities. We will pass on your compliments to the staff and let them know that their extra care and attention really enhanced your overall vacation experience. I am also glad that you engaged in activities that you enjoyed. Thank you once again for your review and we hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach at some point in the future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: What a beautiful beach!
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach in September for 7 nights and can genuinely say that every aspect of the resort exceeded our expectations.   The accommodation, a grand luxury villa, was quite simply, stunning!  The staff tended to your every need and nothing was too much trouble for them.  Nestled between the Piton mountains the location was perfect.  You couldn't help but be in awe of your surrounding. Amazing!   We held our wedding ceremony and reception at Sugar Beach. Shantal Solomon and her team could not do enough for us. We had 30 guests and each of them agreed it was one of their most memorable experiences. Shantal and her team accommodated all of our requests and made it a stress free day, allowing us to enjoy our special day. The food was superb, our DJ Benton was fantastic,…

title: Wow and wow
review: Good day, We are happy you chose Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort as the location for your destination wedding. We are delighted you had a memorable stay and that our wedding coordinator Shantal her team ensured all the small details and requirements were covered to make your special day one to remember for all the right reasons. I will be sure to pass on your glowing comments to Shantal and to all of the other staff members who contributed to making your wedding all that you dreamed it would be. We look forward to seeing you all again soon… perhaps even for a first anniversary celebration. Your comments and business have been truly appreciated. Best Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: A Majestic Honeymoon Experience
review: Fond Doux and Le Chocolat Boucan have made arrangements with the hotel so that their guests can use this beach.  (We also stopped here with the Mystic Man Sunset Cruise.) It is just lovely!  Quiet and serene.  There's a very nice bar and they were serving patrons under the trees.  There are fancy chairs (for the guests) and on a corner of the beach lesser chairs (I assume for the guests from other hotels.)  There's even a little shop were they sold souvenirs and T shirts.  A wonderful stop.  Might even consider checking out the hotel for a future trip.

title: Gorgeous resort, but isolated.
review: My husband and I stayed at Sugar Beach Resort in January, 2014, as part of a 35th anniversary trip that involved a lot of planning and saving.  We were upgraded from a Sugar Mill Room to a villa on the 500 level which was highly appreciated.    Everything that has been previously said about this resort is true--- gorgeous location, superb staff, fantastic accommodations!  The location between the Pitons is spectacular.  It imparts a feeling of the South Pacific--- Bali Hai is calling!  The staff, especially the most wonderful Peter, our butler, provided topnotch service.  We are privileged to call him a friend.  The view and amenities in the villa were amazing!  The Rainforest Spa provides an unparalleled experience. The beach was hauntingly beautiful; not a wide expanse of…

title: Heaven on Earth.
review: Good day, We would like to thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort to celebrate your 35th wedding anniversary. Your comments and observations are well received. We strive to ensure that we create a versatile environment that all of our guests can enjoy regardless of their age. Having said that, I understand and sympathize with your comments.  I am happy to know that you enjoyed the time spent with us. We would be delighted to serve you again.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: An Amazing Vacation WOW!!
review: My husband and I spent our honeymoon at Sugar Beach in early September. If you're searching for a secluded, romantic getaway, look no further than this oasis between the Pitons.  From start to finish, we were well accommodated for thanks to the caring and friendly staff in each facet of the resort.   Our butlers were ready to help at a moment's notice. Swammid should be given a medal because he went above and beyond the calling and helped me quickly rid of a little sinus congestion I had. When my husband stepped on a sea urchin, Gregg and Dwight both assisted us with making sure he was properly taken care of to ease the pain in his foot.   We stayed in a 300 level villa that was perfectly situated with a view of the Pitons. We also had the most breathtaking experience watching…

title: Paradise
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am excited to read that your experience was truly memorable. Our determined and caring staff always goes the extra mile to ensure that our guests are treated in the best possible way. I am delighted that the experience we created for you will be cherished and remembered for all the right reasons.  All the staff mentioned will be commended for their positive contribution towards your stay. I would like to apologize for the discomfort caused by the mosquitoes. We try our utmost to keep these pests away by constantly spraying inside the room and fogging our surroundings. We also encourage our guests to wear strong insect repellent to avoid bites. Like you rightfully said, insect repellents do not effectively work for everyone and sometimes our hands are tied in this situation. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise
review: Having just got back from the Sugar Beach resort, I have to say WOW! Best resort we have ever stayed. If you can afford it, you would be mad not to go!  We flew Upper Class with Virgin thanks to my air miles, which was a great experience from Gatwick VIP lounge to arriving in beautiful sunshine and the warmth we expected for our holiday.  We had booked our transfer to the resort in advance through Janus Gyan, Phone: +1 758 486 1561 http://stluciaairportshuttle.com/ We had read a recommendation on trip advisor and his service lived up to the reviews. A driver collected us in a nice air-conditioned Lexus and his first stop was for 2 cold Piton Beers, which was just the thing to get us in the right mood. Janus is also cheaper than the resort booked cars!  The journey took 45…

title: What to say
review: There are many very detailed reviews of Sugar Beach here that you can read.  I will keep it short and sweet. The grounds are beautiful, the location is the best on the island, the staff and management are excellent. We were there on our honeymoon (as are about half of the guests, lol), and we could not be happier with our choice. I would definitely return, which pretty much says it all.

title: One of the most beautiful resorts in the world!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your positive comments on TripAdvisor. I am delighted that your honeymoon experience is etched in your mind for all the right reasons and that you would consider a return visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are looking forward to serving you again, perhaps for your next wedding anniversary. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Sugar Beach Viceroy: A Sweet Experience
review: Everything you could ever wish for, great villas, attentive valet services, wonderful restaurants on grounds and a fabulous spa.  Not to mention the views, the gorgeous pool, and beautiful sunsets. If you love being spoiled, this is the place for you.

title: Wonderful 5 Year Wedding Anniversary
review: Good day, Thank you for your kind and encouraging comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We try our best to do everything we can to make our guests happy, satisfied and always wanting to relive their holiday experience. Once again, thank you for taking the time to share your comments on TripAdvisor. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise:  plain and simple.
review: For our week long trip to St. Lucia, my husband and I chose to stay at three out of the four resorts that made it onto Conde Nast's Gold List (Sugar Beach Viceroy, Anse Chastenet, and Jade Mountain).  We started the trip with Sugar Beach Viceroy. We stayed in the Grand Luxury Villa and were quite happy with the awesome view of Sugar Beach and the lovely decor of the villa.  I was a little concerned with the bug/mosquito problem that several reviewers shared however we felt the housekeepers did a fabulous job of keeping those critters out of our villa (we are in a rainforest afterall).  We didn't get bitten at this resort at all (whereas at Anse Chastenet my husband ended up with over 30 mosquito bites!!)  After staying at all three resorts, I would have to share that what sets…

title: A little piece of paradise
review: My partner, teenage daughter and I spent 2 weeks here in August/September and all agree it was one of our best holidays ever.  Our grand luxury villa with its own infinity pool was stylish and spotlessly clean.  The staff from shuttle drivers to senior managers were all charming and helpful. Food also very good and varied in all the property's restaurants

title: Fantastic hotel (ignoring the restaurants)
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We feel honored to know that we provided the best holiday experience for your family. Your comments speak volumes. We would welcome the opportunity to serve your family again. Hope to see you back again soon! Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Honeymoon experience
review: We had a week here in September. Our package included breakfast but no other meals.   The hotel is really, really good. Service is excellent throughout - we didn't use the butler service much, but the service in the restaurants and elsewhere really is fantastic. The staff, to a man, are brilliant.  The quality of the rooms and communal spaces is really very good too - very clean and new. I'm not sure if it was quiet when we were there (the hotel is seemingly used by couples on their honeymoon), but there seems to be lots of space and there are no concerns about finding a lounger by the pool or whatever. Each room has its own ipod with internet access, hotel details etc. And the entire resort - beach included - has free wifi. Fantastic.  Breakfast - which was included in our room…

title: Best resort in St. Lucia -- with a few caveats
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate your feedback about both the areas that you were satisfied with, as well as the areas that were of concern for you. Our culinary team works tirelessly to ensure that they provide offerings that are appealing and affordable to every guest. It appears that we failed you in that area. If we had been aware of your concerns, I am confident that our executive chef would have contacted you and ensured that meals were prepared to your satisfaction.  I would like to apologize for the dissatisfaction that you have highlighted. We are pleased hear that apart from this disappointment, you enjoyed everything else that we offered. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back to share and improved sugar Beach experience. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful Scenery and Great Atmosphere
review: Paradise in a nut-shell. I've travelled throughout the caribbean within the past 7 years and the Sugar Beach resort is by far my greatest experience. Gorgeous mountainous views and unforgettable sunsets isolated my vacation into a timeless capsule filled with beauty and bliss. The hospitality offer by the butler's added with the luxury of my villa made my stay very comfortable and relaxing. Being newlyweds, my wife and I felt the true love of beauty as we were given a candle light dinner on the beach. Chef Sydney Prescott personalize our dinner menu with his love, passion and attentiveness to our request. He made ever phone call and arrangements possible to get us red snapper and flying fish (hard to get on the island), something breathe-taking to witness. We felt like…

title: Simply the Best
review: The resort exceeded all my exceptions, our villa was wonderful, however, the staff made the stay one of the best I have ever had.  The service level was unbelievable.  I am Pepsi person, my wife made special request, and although the resort was a Coke place, the Butlers on their own made a special trip across the island to ensure I had Pepsi, and I found out, they would not accept a tip, simply telling me it's your vacation and I should not want for anything.  They really made me feel welcome, and waited on my wife and hand and foot.  It was a very romantic place, and 5 star experience.  I recommend this resort to all.

title: The Perfect Honeymoon.. but it comes at a price.
review: Good Day,  Thank you for writing and posting this review of your recent vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  In behalf of the entire team, I would like to say how delighted we are that you enjoyed your stay and that you felt welcome and pampered at every turn.  We hope that you will consider a return visit soon. Thank you once again for your comments and your business.  Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: If You Are Ready For A True 5 Star Experience
review: My husband put a lot of time and effort into picking the perfect place for our honeymoon, and it paid off. This resort was unlike anything I have ever experienced. Upon arrival we were greeted by the most friendly butlers who always took care of us. It was the perfect combination of romance and fun. We wanted a place that was private, but not lonely. The plunge pool on the villa is amazing! The room as a whole is simple, but so elegant, clean, comfortable, and modern - and the views, wow! The housekeeping was wonderful, never in our way, but always took great care of us and made the villa special. The resort has different events each night for the guests, which are really fun! We thought the sushi restaurant was awesome - and breakfast at the terrace is really a great way to…

title: Simply Breathtaking
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback about your honeymoon trip to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Comments such as yours help us to continually improve what we offer to our guests.  I am happy to read that you had a memorable time for all the right reasons and that your butlers and our housekeeping team went the extra mile to ensure you were comfortable without being intrusive.  Your concerns about the cost of the all-inclusive meal plan have been taken on board and I am sorry that you found it expensive. Sadly, the cost of importing certain foods, wine and other beverages to the island is expensive and this is even before the hotel has to cover import duties. We continually review our costs and try to ensure there are always affordable options on the menu.  While you say this was a once in a lifetime visit, we hope you might consider a return trip at some point, perhaps for an anniversary. We would welcome your return.  Regards  Andre Boersma

title: Paradise
review: Then this is the place.  Let me begin with, if you are on a limited vacation budget or get sticker shock easily, this is not the place for you.  But, if you are ready for a GENUINE  get away from it all experience, this is the place.  If you are ready to be treated not only like the only guest on the property,  but a friend, this is the place. We stayed in one of the grand luxury villas. Fantastic. And for the Ladies,  there was enough closets, shelves, nooks, and drawers to accommodate all of my clothes, shoes, makeup, etc ( I am a serious over packer.) without invading my husbands space. The villa was spacious, decorated in a low key island chic. Soothing to the senses. Ebony floors, white furniture, high ceilings with fans, feather pillows, romantic bedroom. Plunge pool,…

title: Simply the best family holiday of your life
review: I've just got back from a 15 day holiday at the above property.  I have never, ever had such a relaxing break.  I unwound after approximately a day and melted into a world where I read, swam, ate, slept  - and did nothing else.  London seems like a bizarre place now I'm back.  The staff are the unrivalled stars of this place, getting to know individual guests and anticipating their needs.  But the villas themselves exude relaxed Caribbean style, the restaurants are so varied that I never got bored, and never wanted to go anywhere else.  It all starts when your transfer service picks you up from the airport.  Local beers are on tap as you travel and you're taken straight to your villa without ever having to check in.  Your team of butlers meets you and introduce themselves and…

title: St lucia
review: Good Day,  It is always gratifying to read reviews such as yours and to hear you had a wonderful and relaxing family holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am confident that other readers of this forum will find your comments useful and your list of must-experience resort attractions a great guide for future stays.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you and your family back in the not too distant future.  Regards, Andre Boersma General Manager

title: Beachfront Heaven
