review: Most beautiful place in the world sugar beach viceroy resort St lucia nice beach friendly staff good food it's a very unique place . excellent service best place to stay in St lucia if you thinking of taking  a vacation

title: Nice beach vacation
review: Good Day,  Thank you for posting your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We completely agree with you that our location is one of the most beautiful in the world. We try our best to ensure the services and facilities that we provide are equal to the views.  We hope to see you again soon and thank you for recommending us to the TripAdvisor community.  Regards,  Andre Boersma General Manager

title: idyllic bliss
review: My husband and I recently returned from Sugar Beach where we spent 1 week with our 14 month old. While many would think it was crazy to take him in the first place, it was ideal being in the beachfront bungalows. If you are taking kids, the beachfront bungalows are the best rooms. Rooms are spacious, outdoor courtyard with private jacuzzi/pool and out the window is a deck with two lounge chairs and a hammock. The beach is a great, and there is plenty of water activities just steps out the door. I wish there were more options for food, but the food that was served was good. Be prepared for high priced food and drinks! Overall a great place and we would certainly return again soon (without the baby!).

title: Angelique
review: Our family spent 4 nights in August in a Grand Luxury Villa up on the mountain. The location is stunning.  To be clear, my family had many dietary restrictions and the effort made to accommodate was palpable throughout our stay. That said, for the price, the food is mediocre. And while we encountered initial challenges regarding room location and the quality of the initial housekeeping standards we found, and while the cots for the kids were less than comfortable, we were approached right away by Angelique in the hotel's management who remained extremely concerned and made every effort that our stay be as pleasant as possible.   From continual personal service to real care throughout our stay, Angelique made us feel that the whole establishment really cared about our experience.…

title: Beautiful, lush site
review: Good Day,  We truly appreciate you taking the time to provide your feedback about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am sorry that you encountered some initial challenges but happy that we were able to overcome the shaky start and ensure you had a pleasurable vacation, thanks in no small part to the efforts of Angelique.  I will be sure to share your comments with her and to thank her for taking extra special care of you with regards to your dietary requirements and your overall comfort.  We do genuinely care about each and every one of our guests and I am happy this shone through during your stay.  Once again, thank you for your review. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma

title: Absolutely exceeded all expectations!!! Out of this world….
review: If I could give a 4.5 star, I would.  This place is almost perfect.  We stayed here for a week in late August and had an incredible relaxing vacation, even bringing our 6 year old daughter. From the airport to the hotel, the winding and up and downs of the road can make you nauseous, so be prepared.   Arrival was easy and we checked into our "villa" #503 pretty much immediately.  We met our butler, but it wasn't until the next day that he gave us our phones in order to reach him.  Our villa was beyond nice, large, and clean.  The view was "the best in the whole complex". The bed in the sofa in the living room was a bit pokey/wired for me but my daughter, who slept on it, said it was comfortable.  Bidet in the master bathroom along with a two headed shower, separate tub with…

title: The best vacation and the friendliest people
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post this extensive review of your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am positive other visitors to the TripAdvisor site will find it extremely useful.  We are delighted that you had an excellent vacation and that you found service to be both attentive and swift in all areas, in particular at the beach.  It is a rather nice bonus to be able to order lunch right at your sun lounge and to enjoy a range of other dining options at the resort.   We have taken on board your comment about an additional dining venue and will be giving this serious consideration in the months ahead. You may wish to be aware that we have launched a tapas style menu at the Bayside Bar which is proving really popular. In addition to the Great Room and Bayside for dinner, we have also expanded our Asian themed menu at the Cane Bar to add to the variety of experiences on offer.  Once again, thank you for your positive feedback and recommendations. Your review and your business have been truly appreciated.  Best Regards,  Andre Boersma

title: A beautiful place and very good service
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach for 8 nights, and our vacation was absolutely amazing!  I took my boyfriend to St. Lucia as a surprise for his milestone birthday and neither of us had been to this magnificent island before.  I booked a luxury cottage, and was upgraded to a superior luxury villa, which was absolutely dreamlike with a goregous plunge pool (Room #311 ROCKS!)!!  Our view was simply out of this world!  In fact, we spent the first 3 days at the resort because we found it hard to leave our room, which I've never experienced before.  Our room felt like an elegant beach home, and not a hotel.  Don't miss out on the rum welcome drinks, which we enjoyed several times over after our arrival!  I've read many other reviews, and we never waited long for shuttles.  After gorging…

title: Fabulous location for a tropical holiday
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach for six days (five nights) in mid-August.  We arrived at 2:15pm, a little before check in time, and did our paperwork, stored our bags with the concierge, and proceeded down to the Bayside Grill for a quick lunch.    After lunch, we were greeted by our butler McHaille who showed us to our room.  It was so much more than a room.. it was a Grand Luxury Villa (#814).  Absolutely stunning!  Over 1000 s.f., with a sitting room and 1/2 bath, bedroom with four-poster king bed, full size walk-in closet, and a bathroom suite that was easily the size of most hotel rooms.  The deck, complete with plunge pool, overlooked the property and allowed us a view of both the pitons and the ocean.  McHaille offered to unpack our bags, and we took him up on the offer. We then…

title: Beautiful honeymoon destination
review: Good Day,  On behalf of the entire team, I would like say how happy we are that you enjoyed your stay with us, and thank you for providing us with your detailed feedback.  We are committed to providing our guests with the highest level of service and it is satisfying to know that you enjoyed everything that we offered.  Our staff works hard to create exceptional experiences so we are particularly pleased that you enjoyed the very high level of service you received. I will be sure to pass on your glowing comments to the team, especially the individuals mentioned.  With reference to the mosquitoes, the island’s tropical climate means that we have the perfect habitat for these pests. We do undertake property-wide fogging, however some guests prove particularly attractive to these creatures and we always advise guests to carry repellent with them to prevent bites. I would like to apologize for the discomfort caused.  Thank you once again for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back to, Sugar Beach in the near future.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Heaven on earth!
review: We went to Sugar Beach for our honeymoon in July 2014, and had a lovely stay. The setting was very peaceful and romantic, and the rooms were beautiful. The pool area was very clean and quiet and there were attentive staff who were always on hand to help. The buggies were really useful for getting back to our room as we were near the top of the hill, and the door staff in particular Sherman, were very welcoming. The food was delicious, I never had a bad meal and we never felt pestered by the staff who were all extremely polite. We had a butler, Gus, who was always cheerful and helpful. As you are in the rainforest you will need extra strong mosquito repellent - the bites are very sore and itchy, and this was the only downfall which couldn't really be helped. We had a fantastic…

title: Wonderful Holiday & Place to Get Engaged
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are really happy to hear that your honeymoon was perfect and you were delighted with the high quality of service that you received in all areas. I would like to apologize for the discomfort caused by the mosquitoes. We do our best to control these pests with regular, property-wide fogging and in-room spraying. I am sorry these nuisance creatures found you particularly attractive. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to see you again soon.   Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Great lunch
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach for 4 nights during our week in St Lucia and being there really makes you feel like the rest of the world doesn't exist.  It is the height of luxury with 3 butlers to see to our every need, gorgeous villa accommodation and a stunning white sand beach with cabanas to lounge and food and drink only a flag away. The pool was also very lovely and the service on the beach impeccable. Everyone on the staff was so happy and upbeat. Food was good but very expensive to match the accommodation price. The night we arrived was a BBQ buffet which they had already booked us for at nearly US$100 per person. I must say that the blueberry French toast I had for breakfast was the best breakfast I've ever had. Overall, it was an amazing stay and if we could afford it, we…

title: Amazing location and gorgeous resort
review: St Lucia has several amazing resorts and Sugar Beach is one of the very best. Nestled in between the twin Piton mountains, the resort has amazing views and top tier services.   Our family decided to take the vacation of a lifetime and rented one of the luxury villas for a week.  With an infinity pool overlooking the ocean, a butler and plenty of room for each of my two boys, it was a near-perfect week. We rented island buggies and toured the island. We went on an ATV tour through a nearby fruit plantation. We went zip-lining, enjoyed spa massages and visited volcanic mud baths. But our favorite adventures were learning to SCUBA dive with the resort's PADI-certified instructors and renting the incredible Manatee sailboat for a day of sailing and snorkeling up the coast.  We loved…

title: Honeymoon
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write this very useful review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am pleased that you enjoyed your visit and that the courtesies and services you experienced positively contributed to a relaxing vacation. Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated.  On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.   Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Where we got married
review: Not a 5 star. Unfortunately we was a little disappointed. We came down from the Rendevouz (which is what you call a 5 star hotel). Let me get the good bits out the way. Beautiful scenery - the best  Lovely beach  Food is great  Wifi everywhere  Hotel rooms are nice  Bad bits On Arrival they give you telephones to ring the butler if you need anything. It's a gimmick, you can reserve dinner meals by calling reception - is pretty handy but don't let it fool you Overpriced - if you are not all inclusive be prepared to spend all your wages and more, it's more expensive then London prices and anywhere I've been in the world (and I've been to a lot of countries). The service I'm afraid is shambolic, by the time you wait for you your dinner, lunch or breakfast your not hungry in the…

title: Honeymoon in heaven
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry to hear about the experiences that you have described, especially in relation to service in our restaurants. We are continually looking for ways to improve in this area and to ensure the best possible service is rendered to our guests at all times. Again, I am sorry that you did not receive our usual high level of service. . You may wish to be aware that we automatically offer a turndown service to all our guests every evening. This is standard procedure. I am sorry that the room attendant came across as a nuisance. If we had been aware that you did not want this service, we would not have sent an attendant to your villa. We trust that apart from the concerns highlighted, you enjoyed the time spent at Sugar Beach. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope you will consider a return visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: A lovely resort
review: We got married here in November 2013 and it was absolutely fabulous. From the moment we booked any questions we had or anything we wanted was answered and accommodated! We were treated so well with everyone knowing our names, chatting to us and being genuinely interested in us. Winne, our butler was so amazing and thoughtful he had our room decorated with romantic music playing when we returned to our room on our wedding day. The food, cocktails are amazing and the coffee alone is worth going for! The generosity did not end there, I have been contacting Lisa jones there currently to organise a surprise first year anniversary gift and she has gone above and beyond any duty to help me!  It's so unfortunate that St. Lucia is so far away otherwise we would be paying rent in Sugar…

title: Amazing resort: Fabulous vacation
review: We recently went to Sugar Beach in July. We were a little afraid to go during the "rainy" season but soon learned it didn't really rain much more during the rainy season than the "dry" season.. Needless to say the weather was great- a few morning sprinkles and then sunny most of the day. When we arrived at the resort, they led us into the reception area and gave us a "welcome" punch that was the most tasty drink we'd had in years. The staff is so willing to please, they invited us back to the reception area for a free drink whenever we wanted during our stay. We gladly accepted. We had intended to visit lots of attractions around St. Lucia but were so impressed with the property and its facilities; the beach, snorkeling on the reef RIGHT on the beach and other water sports that…

title: Nothing but praise
review: Good day, Thank you for posting your glowing review about your July vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Our location is spectacular and it is clear you made the most of the facilities available right here at the resort including the National Marine Reserve just steps off the beach and the wide range of watersports available.  It is always good to read that our team members provided those added touches to make your stay extra special.  Once again, thank you for your feedback. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Regards, Andre Boersma

title: Vacation at St. Lucia
review: We just completed a week stay in a Villa (304, to be exact), and have nothing but the highest compliments to pay to this resort and the staff.  I read a lot of reviews prior to our arrival, so I was on the lookout for some of the touch points from other folks, but we just didn't have anything bad to say.  The trip from Vieux Fort (via private car) was interesting, if a bit quease-inducing.  The driver delivered us directly to our room.  In fact, it was about day three before we even knew where the front desk was.  Our butlers had already made us a dinner reservation for the first night at the more casual Bayside restaurant and had arranged for the shuttle.  Having to not make any decisions after a long day of travel was a huge relief.  I've seen a lot of complaints about the…

title: Offensively overpriced
review: Good day, Your feedback and comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort are deeply appreciated.  I am delighted that you had a flawless and relaxing stay and that the special courtesies extended to you contributed to a positive experience.  Thank you especially for your comments about Nathalie from our beach team. This is just the kind of intuitive service we encourage from our team members and I will be sure to praise her and the rest of the beach team for a job well done.  Once again, thank you for posting this very useful review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Regards, Andre Boersma

title: Saved by its wonderful location!
review: We have been visiting some friends in St. Lucia and had the privilege of staying 2 days at Sugar Beach... A small paradise. The staff is great, smiling, ready to offer any help you need, and yet very discreet too. The food is spectacular, mixing French and Island cultures and fresh products. The cabanon are made for lovers!! The scuba and snuda team are great. Thank you all at Sugar Beach

title: Not quite worthy of 5 stars
review: We got married at Sugar Beach recently and spent a total of 7 nights there.   The environment is heavenly, and the amenities are second to none. The service is mostly very good to excellent, and often above and beyond.   So why not 5 stars? We had a few issues which on their own seem like very pedantic things to take note of however at a resort like this - a truly luxury world class resort - when you get not just one but several recurring problems then it puts a slight dampener on an otherwise amazing experience. Also I need to mention that I did meet with a manager during our stay, a fantastic, attentive lady called Molly who did her absolute best to resolve the issues and compensate us. I'll get the bad stuff out of the way first!  The butler service at times was patchy and…

title: Total Relaxation
review: Good day, Thank you for providing your valuable feedback about your recent destination wedding and honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is good to know that on balance you had a wonderful stay and that your wedding day was all you hoped it would be.  However, I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the lapses in service that you have described. As you quite rightly point out, although there were no major issues when looked at individually, the catalogue of little disappointments added up to create a less than perfect stay and for that I am truly sorry.  We pride ourselves on paying close attention to the finer details and we seem to have dropped the ball where you are concerned.  I am happy that Molly was able to help iron out some of your concerns and that you were adequately compensated for the slips in service.  Your review has been discussed at length with the relevant department heads and measures have been taken to ensure these issues do not crop up again.  I am pleased that the issues you encountered have not left an indelible mark and that you are already considering a return visit.  We hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards  Andre Boersma

title: Perfect Family Vacation
review: This place was amazing.  Only a 45 minute drive over from the airport (I think Rodney Bay is up to 2 hours).  The location is absolutely the best on the island nestled right between the two pitons, right in the middle of the lush rainforest.  The entire place smells like a botanical garden and the landscaping is impeccable.  Because of its ideal location between the Pitons, the beach is tucked back in a cove and the water is completely still -- making it incredibly easy to swim and float around in without having to fight the waves.  I also think this is one of the only true white sandy beaches on the island.  Given the island is volcanic in nature, most beaches on the island are more rocky or black sand.  During the recent renovation, the sand was imported from Ghana so it feels…

title: Paradise in the Caribbean with exceptional service
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write this informative review about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are delighted that you enjoyed our stunning location and that your accommodation was all you hoped it would be.  We are also delighted that you are considering a return visit at some point in the future. Once again, thank you for your comments and feedback.  Best Regards, Andre Boersma

title: Fantastic
review: I stayed at Sugar Beach last April and have been meaning to write this review.  This resort is perfect!  I visited for one week with my husband and two children (6 months and 2 years old at the time) and I can't say enough wonderful things about this resort.  The one bedroom suite was large, clean and comfortable for our family.  Our room had a small pool, friendly butler service and amazing views.  The beach and pool area are beyond words with plenty of chairs and space so I never felt overwhelmed by people (and the resort was at full capacity during our trip).  The staff was so helpful and kind and helped arrange a few trips outside of the resort. I definitely recommend having a meal at Ladera and Jade Mountain (although no kids allowed at Jade Mountain) since both resorts are…

title: Great Vacation Experience Without Ever Leaving the Resort
review: My wife and I spend a four-day getaway at Sugar Beach in early July 2014, our second time in St. Lucia and the first at this hotel (but hopefully not the last one).  Looking for as relaxing a break as possible, we never left the property: with its many venues to lounge around, an attractive beach and pool, plenty of activities and diversity of food and beverages offerings, we did not experience a single dull moment.  I would consider the high-quality resort experience and the variety of experiences it offers the key attributes of Sugar Beach – at an overall reasonable price for resorts of this level. RESORT LAYOUT: the resort occupies the beachfront at the foot of the Petit Piton and stretches into the tropical forest behind.  The thick vegetation and the staggered slopeside…

title: First Class on all Fronts
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team I would like to express how pleased we are that you enjoyed everything that we offered during your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Thank you for taking the time to share this detailed review.  We are committed to providing a high level of service to all of our guests and it is satisfying to know you enjoyed your overall experience. Again, we would like to thank you for your comments and business.  We hope to welcome you back soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Tremendous Place to do Nothing
review: Having been to St. Lucia previously, we decided to forego the Sandals cliché this time and focused on the southern end of the island.  What a difference.  Our first week we stayed Antse Chastene (reviewed elsewhere although somewhat disappointing) but then upgraded for our second week at Sugar Beach. The difference was stunning. Stepping back in time to this former sugar plantation was a breath of fresh air. The grounds were spotless. The entire complex (in the shadow of the Pitons) harkens to the plantation days: lush landscape, sugar white beach (no pun intended) Colonial/plantation architecture, and spread out just enough to not feel over crowded. The rooms are draped in white, 4 poster beds, large patios, etc.   Several dining choices from feet in the sand "beachy" fare to…

title: Great resort and facilities let down by very inconsistent service
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your Sugar Beach experience on TripAdvisor. We are happy to know that the high level of service that you experienced exceeded your expectations in all areas. We are delighted that we created happy memories that will last a lifetime for all the right reasons. Our staff will be very pleased with your comments. We will certainly commend them for a job well done. We look forward to your return visit. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing
review: The resort has a lot of reviews and I don't want to repeat - so we will just add that unlike some other reviews, we found the manager very available and responsive.  There is no question that some of the servers were going through the motions, but they were the exception and not at all the rule during our stay (and they were mostly the breakfast team).  Our butlers were great and actually did go above and beyond - one actually went in to town after his shift to get a SIM card for us and brought it by the next day.  Transportation was never a problem - either the tuk tuk to the beach (we stayed in the 300s) or the taxis to/from restaurants (we chose to go off site to dinner most nights just for a change of scenery - you must try Orlando's in town!).  From observing one other…

title: Stay Here
review: I was here attending a wedding and the service was outstanding and the personalized butler service  was unique, I almost thought I was rich for a minute.  The rooms were immaculate and air-conditioned everything was refreshing.  Our bathroom was very large and spacious the whole place was beautiful inside and out and the private beach is only a few steps away. Snorkeling was fantastic as well as learning to sail the Hobbie boats which is all part of the resort.  The food was absolutely perfect after a long day in the sun, we really enjoyed the service and the food although the service is not United States fast but who cares when you're on vacation.  Just meant we had more time to talk face to face.  Sorry, no texting here.  We also went zip lining which is just a few miles away.…

title: Dream Honeymoon in Paradise
review: Good day, Thank you for your positive feedback after your stay as a wedding guest at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It brings us great satisfaction to know that you were blown away by the high level of service and quality accommodation that we provide. Your review serves as proof that we provide top notch services that goes hand in hand with our stunning setting. We are happy that we made your time with us memorable for all the right reasons. We are looking forward to your return visit soon hope to see you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: THE SCOTTISH GLOBETROTTERS
review: A 9-day honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach Resort was the perfect way to unwind after the excitement and stresses of planning for our special day.  The resort is nestled between the Pitons with spectacular views of Saint Lucia's defining landscape and the Caribbean Sea. The grounds are sprawling from beachfront to luxurious villas that dot the mountainous setting of the resort. The service at Sugar Beach is impeccable and unlike anything we have ever experienced. Kind, attentive, and always aiming to please - we were wowed by the personal attention and friendly nature of the many locals that are employed at the resort. People like Shawn (butler), Michael and Terry (resort shuttle drivers), Linus (wait staff), and Michelle (spa) greeted us with smiles and superior service in…

title: Lovely Winter stay
review: Good day,  Thank you for your wonderful comments about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are committed to providing a high level of service to all of our guests and it is truly satisfying that  your honeymoon was all you hoped it would be. Again, we thank you for your comments and business.  We hope to see you back for anniversary celebrations to come. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Sugar Beach Resort (by Viceroy) is the best in St. Lucia
review: We have just returned from this resort after a 10 day stay  and wish we were back there. Everything about the resort was first class. The location, service, food, and accommodation. The hotel is about a 1 hour drive from the airport by private transfer. When we arrived we were taken straight to our villa by our butler who dealt with all the paperwork of registration, as well as giving us a tour of the villa we had been upgraded to. We had a total of 3 butlers looking after us on 8 hour shifts. They were all superb, MONTY, DWIGHT and KURT. We were given a mobile phone to contact them at anytime day or night. VERY HANDY !  The resort is spread out over an area between the 2 Pitons called Sugar Beach. It is quite hilly but an on demand shuttle is available to take you to any part…

title: Summer Family Vacation
review: Our family of four, including 2 boys ages 7 and 9, just returned from a week long stay at Sugar Beach.  Beautiful resort and a memorable experience we won't ever forget.  Great personalized service from folks who really enjoy what they do. Can't imagine a nicer view anywhere than the one we had in villa 504...ocean, pitons, rainforest.  Also recommend hiking the Gros Piton...great workout and view from the top.  Spa experience and location is very unique.  We enjoyed local restaurants not too far from the resort....Ladera, Mango Tree & Boucan.  Kids had a great time with the watersports and snuba diving.  Highly recommend!

title: simply amazing
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your family vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are very happy that we provided a memorable and fun filled holiday for you and your family. Our team members will be pleased with your comments and will be praised for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: We had a wonderful time!
review: This hotel was breathtaking. Service with private butler cannot be beat. Very romantic, and beautiful. We loved staying in sugar mill section. We were right near pool, beach, restaurants, and had great views of the pitons. The food in every restaurant was deliciously fresh and so elegant. We also loved the carribean bbq night, and the black and white party. There was plenty to do and see in the town. Hiking the pitons, going to the waterfalls, drive in volcano etc. Such a beatiful pristine resort, in the most gorgeous natural surroundings. Will surely return

title: Hip hip hooray
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to post your comments on TripAdvisor about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted to hear that your time with us was amazing in every way. Your comments will be communicated to the staff and we will commend them for a job well done. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: The best ever!
review: This trip served as our honeymoon. The resort is located in what I think may be the prettiest location on the island.   Getting To The Resort: We easily found a taxi from the airport. The hotel website said the taxi should cost $75, but we when got out he charged us $85. The ride does take about 45 min. It is pretty scenic, but it appears that most of the island looks like unsafe poverty towns.  Room: We stayed in the 700s. We had a great view of both pitons. We were able to view the 800s, 900s and 400s. From what I observed, it looks like all villas have great views. Our butler Anisha was beyond excellent. She anticipated our every need and was always very helpful if we had questions. The room was clean and comfortable. We had free Piton beer and sodas. Make sure to close your…

title: Had a great holiday but some negatives
review: We have just returned from a week's stay at the Sugar Beach. We are a family of four with two teenage daughters. The location of the resort is stunning and we couldn't fault it. Sugar Beach's position right on the beach was what led us to choose it over places such as Ladera and Boucan and at the end of the week we felt we had made the right decision. We ate at both other hotels and found them lovely but the lack of beach was very noticeable. We thoroughly enjoyed making the most of Sugar Beach's position on the beach, with sunbathing, swimming, snorkeling and a big variety of watersports, of which we used the catamaran sailing and the waterskiing.  The rooms we stayed in, the luxury sugar mill rooms, were beautiful and spacious with lovely beds. The bathrooms are also great…

title: Honeymoon at Sugar Beach 7/2-7/10
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your views about the standards and quality of service provided during your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. On behalf of the entire team I would like to say how delighted we are that we met and exceeded your high expectations in almost all areas with the exception of the experiences that you have highlighted at the Terrace and Bayside restaurants.  I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused and the inconsistencies in service you have described. Your comments have been shared with the director of food and beverage to ensure that our team members deliver the best possible service at all times. To perhaps explain about what you have described as high prices for some items, when we import items such as branded mineral water from overseas we are forced to factor in the cost of shipping to St Lucia and the taxes and duties levied by the government of St Lucia before we even bring them to the hotel.  Guests have a choice to have imported, branded mineral water or to enjoy our natural spring house water which we do not charge for. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again, and to share firsthand the improvements made in light of your concerns. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Family Vacay at Sugar Beach
review: Let me start by saying this was the trip of a lifetime and I can't possibly understand how some reviewers found things to complain about in regards to Sugar Beach.  We stayed from 7/2-7/10 in room 801 (luxury villa) and from the min we got there to the min we left we were treated like royalty.  I am going to break the review into several parts and provide as much information as possible because I like many I am sure spent months reading the reviews in anticipation of my visit.    Arrival/Check In:  We were picked up at the airport by a private car which was set up through my travel agent and I highly recommend going this route.  I was anticipating the drive from hell after reading some reviews, but I was pleasantly surprised how mild it actually was.  The car and driver…

title: Amazing rooms, amazing property, amazing island!!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to write this extensive review about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am really pleased that you had a wonderful time and everything was perfect and to your satisfaction. We are happy that we created wonderful memories for you that will last a lifetime. Our staff will be delighted to read your comments, especially those individuals highlighted. I am sorry of hear of the experience you had at breakfast. This is an area that we are working hard to improve. Once again, thank you for your feedback and business, and for recommending our resort to family and friends. We are looking forward to your return visit soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: EXCEPTIONAL
review: My family traveled to St Lucia July 1 - July 8, 2014 and stayed at Sugar Beach in two lovely luxury villas (303 & 305).  We were fortunate to have beautiful weather for the majority of our stay.  Sugar Beach is a lush property nestled in the rainforest and tucked between the iconic Pitons.  Remotely located I should add.  The vegetation on property enhanced the tropical feel.  Flowering plants, ferns, fruit and nut trees were bountiful. It was a feel that was missing from our last Caribbean vacation to St Maarten.  The Villas   Our 300 section villas had wonderful views of the Pitons and the sea.  In fact, our 305 unit was located at the base of a Piton and it was if you could reach out and touch it.  Each villa had a spacious Patio with plunge pool and lounge furniture.  Our…

title: Amazing and Beautiful Experience
review: This Resort is not for the budget conscious traveller and probably best saved for honey moons and extremely special occasions. My trip with my whole close family (6 of use) was for my parent’s 25th wedding anniversary and renewal of their vows (so pretty special). We rented one of the residences at the hotel, which comprises of:  3 large bedrooms with large en-suit bathrooms with showers and the master bedroom has a bath tub, Large kitchen with granite service large fridge a large cooker,  Large lounge area with surround sound and free music streaming system.  Good sized private pool and hot tub, sun beads and outside eating area. The location is beautiful situated between the two Pitons (large oddly pointy hills) in a private bay with a large beach. Plenty of activities can be…

title: Sets the Bar in the Caribbean
review: Good day, Thank you for your positive comments about your family vacation ay Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased to hear that you were very happy with our offerings and that you had a perfect stay.  I trust that your family members had an equally amazing time and that your parents in particular had a memorable 25th wedding anniversary. Once again, thank you for your wonderful comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Wow!
review: Sugar Beach Resort has been meticulously planned, sited, and built and is incomparable in accommodations, service, amenities, and cuisine. Check-in occurs with your butler in the most beautifully decorated accommodations. I highly recommend the villas hillside set in lush foliage with private plunge pool, outdoor shower, and incredible view of the Pitons and Caribbean. The bathrooms are pure luxury with multi-head showers big enough for 4 and separate soaking tubs. The etheral white decor provides for ultimate relaxation. Viceroy has anticipated meeting any need by providing guests with iPads for Internet access, restaurant menus, spa services, activity options, etc., and firefly phones for direct communication with butlers and other guests. The stunning white sand beach…

title: Honeymoon in Paradise
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am very happy to read that your stay was memorable for all the right reasons. We take pride in the top notch services that we offer to our guests and we feel happy that this was appreciated by you. Our Rainforest Spa speaks for itself. The staff will be pleased with your comments. Once again, thank you for your feedback and business. We hope to welcome you back soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Obsessed with Sugar Beach!
review: We were exceedingly impressed by this enormously romantic and stunning place! We came here for our honeymoon and had sky high expectations. But we must say - we were not disappointed!  The accommodation:  We stayed at the Sugar Mill Luxury Room, which is the cheapest they offer (but really not cheap!). Calling it a room would be a complete misrepresentation as it was large with several separate areas including sun terrace on the roof and garden with plunge pool.  Eye candy:   Everything from our room to the restaurants along with the garden and the beach was stunningly made up with white lining and dark wood. The white sandy beach was framed by two large pitons with rainforest. Beautiful sunbeds and amazing lounge areas. Everything was just stunning.  Service:  The service was…

title: Food and service around the pool area could be better.
review: This is a beautiful hotel! The small cottages and big house are comfortable and have great taste. Our butler Eugene is super polite and attentive. The shuttle service to and from the beach is fast and charming. The pool and beach area are great and pretty and the aquatic sports area is neat and complete. Everything would be perfect if it wasn't for the food. Extremely expensive without delivering as much; specially for the barbecue offered on Saturdays, a 90 dollar per person spree that could be greatly improved.

title: Our perfect beach wedding!
review: Good day, Thank you for your posting your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We continuously strive to ensure that we provide the best possible experience for our guests. I am sorry that you found the service by the pool lacking, and that you felt the food could have been better too. Your feedback on our barbeque offering is well received. This is an area that we are continuously looking for ways to improve. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back in the not too distant future and to share firsthand the positive changes we hope to achieve in addressing your concerns. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Everything we wanted!
review: My fiancé and I booked Sugar Beach to get married as we had visited in 2012 and fallen in love with the place. Everything was perfect from our arrival to departure. The villas are simply beautiful and the privacy of your own pool is just perfect for couples. The food was excellent in the Bayside & The Great Room, we also enjoyed lunch in the sand. The wine is good and as we were on the all inclusive package we were able to enjoy everything. Our wedding was all arranged for us with no stress, the ceremony and private meal were all well arranged and we loved every minute of it. We were looked after well & hope to return to celebrate an anniversary in the future. Particular mentions to Gus our butler who sorted everything for us, Shantal & Lisa who arranged our wedding, Linus who…

title: World traveler, but this was the best!!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your wedding at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are happy to hear that your special day was everything that you dreamed it would be and that the individuals mentioned made it extra special by ensuring everything was perfect for you. They will be applauded for a job well done.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We would be honored to serve you a third time, perhaps for a first anniversary celebration. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise!
review: Such a great week at Sugar Beach made it very hard to come back to reality!  We had a hillside villa which was very quiet and private.  Very spacious room, bath and patio to go with our own small plunge pool.  Fantastic view of Petit Piton.  We were on the hillside of our little avenue of villas so didn't have the beach/bay view.  Kudos to the entire staff who are exceedingly friendly and helpful - especially our team of butlers in the 900s were fantastic!  Thank you to McGomery, Curtley, and Erane.  We are generally very active when we travel, but spent most of our time here perfectly content sitting on the beach enjoying Piton beers and banana daiquiris while admiring the Pitons on either side of the beach.  The resort has plenty of water sports available and nice snorkeling…

title: Breathtaking Honeyoon!
review: This place is worth the hype.  We did many google searches when it cam to decide where we wanted to go on our honeymoon and Sugar Beach was high on every list.  We decided to splurge and book our trip to St. Lucia hoping to have the time of our lives just 3 days after tying the knot.  Let me tell you first hand this did not disappoint.  Instead we had the best 7 days of our lives and could not be more happy with our choice.  The drive to the resort is beautiful scenery.  Very slow and windy roads and takes about an hour from the airport.  Ask your driver a lot of questions he will love it the St. Lucian are very friendly and want to share their knowledge of their country.  When you finally arrive at the resort your butlers are waiting to greet you with a fresh cold drink and…

title: Beautiful place
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to post this review of your honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are pleased that you chose our resort to celebrate such a special occasion and even happier that you feel that you made the best and right decision.  As you have described, the level of service that we strive to provide to our guests is second to none. We believe in making every experience the best it can be even if it is means going above and beyond our duties in certain cases.  We are truly happy that our team helped to create memories to last a lifetime for all the right reasons.  We will be sure to commend our staff for a job well done.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back, perhaps for a first wedding anniversary celebration.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: The perfect honeymoon
review: We stayed here for 7 nights at the beginning of May celebrating our 20th wedding anniversary. The hotel is in a spectacular setting, and we had a villa up in the rain forest which was luxurious, and peaceful. The rooms in the five hundreds seem to benefit from good sea and beach views and the mountains as well.  The staff here are without exception quite outstanding. They learn your names very quickly and service is always good in our experience.  The only slight drawback is the that you have to call for transport to go anywhere on the resort if you are staying in the hills. However a call to your butler brings a tuk tuk to your door in no time. (They do have other buggies that are not as good, but it all seems to work efficiently)   The beach side restaurant is beautifully set…

title: Stunning!!!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your Sugar Beach, experience on TripAdvisor. We are pleased that you made Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort the destination to celebrate your 20th wedding anniversary. I understand your comment about having to call the shuttle to get from one point to the other. Like you rightfully said, the shuttles are very quick and efficient and guests usually do not wait any more than five minutes for a ride. We are glad that you enjoyed all our services and facilities. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome be back in the not too distant future. André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing Hotel
review: This was our first trip to St. Lucia and we are already planning for a return stay at Sugar Beach in a few years! Everything about this resort was perfect, but just a few highlights:  -Most people seem to get upgraded to a large villa. We stayed for 10 nights in the 800's area. The bed, large bathroom, living room, outdoor space- all were large and beyond our needs.   -The location is the best on the entire island- smack between the pitons and lots of great fine dining nearby.  -We were glad we did not do all inclusive. The food on property is a bit expensive, but so are nearby resort restaurants. All were delicious and worth it- and we love good food. There is a lot of delicious seafood, but also pasta, sushi, steaks. Whatever you want! They staff are all friendly and…

title: The best hotel in the area.
review: This is the best hotel in the area.  It has a lovely beach and as close as possible to the Pitons.  Visited Jade Mountain which was lovely too but not much of a beach and Ladera which has a rustic look.  These two other hotels were further away from the Pitons although with nice views of the Pitons.  Guests in Ladera have access to Sugar beach resorts beach.

title: almost perfect.
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy to know that we are highly favoured by you when compared to the other resorts and hotels in the area. We try our utmost to ensure that we offer the best service and products to our guests. Once again, thank you for your feedback and business. We are looking forward to your return visit in the near future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: It is not a Resort...It is a Heavenly Experience!
review: we recently returned from our honeymoon at sugar beach. we had an amazing time! we definitely would return, but with that said, here's my pro/con list:  pro: -the villa was absolutely stunning. we stayed in a luxury villa, and it was beautiful. the plunge pool was a great size, and we did use it! the shower was INCREDIBLE, and it felt like we were in a mini house. really, really nice. we came back to a spotless villa everyday. the housekeeping did a really good job!  -the food: everything we ate was really, really good. we tried every possible location at the resort, and i was never disappointed. for breakfast, the eggs benny and chorizo, for lunch, the fish sandwich, roti, and shrimp bisque! and for dinner, we really liked the sushi cakes at the cane bar, bbq night at the…

title: The perfect holiday.
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Your feedback is very important to us.  We are pleased to hear that your stay was almost perfect with the exception of the disappointments that you have highlighted in the areas that concerned you. I have shared your comments with the relevant department heads to ensure that our guests always receive the best possible service. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again, and to share firsthand the improvements made in light of your concerns. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: So beautiful, simply perfect!
review: I need to begin by stating that I travel extensively for my career. Of course I often go to Trip Advisor to get an idea of what the trends are for the resort I may be visiting....I read some interesting reviews about what I consider to be little things like, the "expensive" food (Are there those of us that book this kind of place and not think that things may be a little pricey?)  This is hands down a fantastic experience!  And that is what I think of the place---in total it is quite the Experience!  There is a uniqueness to this resort that is awe inspiring.  The journey of getting to the hotel is a story all its own :)   If you are looking for privacy-its here, If you are looking for nature-its , If you are looking for "spa-ing"- its here, You want the beach-its here, You want…

title: Perfect holiday in the sun
review: We had a wonderful stay at Sugar Beach in April.  Various photos attached. The spa was a particular highlight.  All of the staff were very friendly. We loved the luxury villa and the amazing views of the Pitons.

title: Amazing Anniversary Celebration
review: Good day,  Thank you for your glowing comments and taking the time to share these beautiful photos of Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort on TripAdvisor.  We are so pleased that we exceeded your expectations in all areas.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: An experience unlike any other
review: We celebrated 25 years of marriage and decided to visit St. Lucia.  We flew in to the airport, rented a car, and drove the 45 minute trip to the resort.  Susan checked us in and offered us a delicious adult beverage.  She was warm and personable and EVERY time she saw us, she remembered our names--pretty impressive!  During our stay, we had several butlers--Curtley, Dwight, and Monty.  They were all wonderful, but Monty was a true professional.  Sugar Beach provides you and your partner with cell phones to stay in touch with each other and to call your butler for anything.       The restaurants on property were all good.  Service was terrific.  The Great Room is fantastic for a special dinner---we ate there twice and enjoyed everything.  Breakfast was included in our rate.  The…

title: Paradise
review: Good day Thank you for taking the time to comment on your 25th Anniversary stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that our staff made your stay memorable for all the right reasons and your expectations were exceeded in almost every area. They will be acknowledged for a job well done. I am sorry that the birds pestered you at breakfast. This has not been a major concern in the past, but we have seen a few more comments than normal coming up on TripAdvisor. As explained to a previous reviewer, we have strung transparent fishing line across the front of the restaurant in a bid to deter them. We believe the blackbirds  are nesting in the area at the moment and are searching for easy pickings to feed their young. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. We are continuing to look for ways of keeping them away from The Terrace without harming them or the delicate World Heritage environment in which we sit. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to see you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful rooms, great food but poor table service ps expensive
review: From the minute we landed in St. Lucia, we knew we were in for a treat, as even the airport staff were as friendly and welcoming as I have ever encountered. We had booked a Superior Luxury Villa at Sugar Beach, and when we arrived after a scenic 45 minute ride from our very friendly and knowledgeable driver Francois, our butler Gus met us right at our villa with coconut refreshments, having already taken care of the check-in for us, and gave us a tour of our accommodations. We were in villa 801 and it couldn't have been more perfect. We were high up on the hill but facing the water, which was just visible through the lush rain forest foliage. We felt secluded, and yet could see both Pitons and the ocean from our private plunge pool.   Everyone from the shuttle drivers (a special…

title: The best honeymoon ever!!!!
review: The staff was so helpful and so kind . The location was perfect. We haven't been treated so nicely , we dare to say that the staff spoiled us. Also because we were honeymooners the hotel upgraded our villa , to one had view to the piton and the sea!!!  The only thing ,that nearly disappointed us,  was that because a big group of New York's corporate arrived, the hotel canceled some of the regular events such as the friday's beach barbecue .. But when we expressed our disappointment , they did their best... It was our best holiday experience  !!!!!!!

title: Fabulous
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing comments about your honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I would like to apologize for the disappointment that you have highlighted with the rescheduling of the Friday night barbeque dinner. We are pleased to hear that apart from the disappointment highlighted, you have a wonderful stay. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise Found
review: We chose Sugar Beach for our 25th anniversary and were not disappointed. We looked at all the room possibilities and decided we would rather be closer to all the restaurants, pool and beach than have to rely on the tuk tuks for transport. Again, we felt we had chosen well, the Superior Luxury Sugar Mill Room had a very comfortable four poster white bed, dressing room with huge closet, bathroom with a pedestal bath and large shower room, gated courtyard garden with jacuzzi plunge pool as well as a shady roof area with loungers, sofa, table and chairs, planes and ceiling fan and lights. The fridge was well-stocked with complimentary free soft drinks and beers (two per day) and the butler brought a bucket of ice each evening. We got into a routine of spending a day out - at the…

title: Iconic location with sub-par service
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your 25th anniversary stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I would like to apologize for the confusion that you experienced with your various tour arrangements. Our butlers are usually on point with making all guest arrangements. It is unfortunate that you did not get to experience our usual high level of service in that area. We are continuing to review our service standards in this area to ensure that there is not a repeat of what you have described. We are pleased to note that apart from the disappointment you highlighted, your anniversary stay was memorable for all the right reasons. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Simply stunning
review: Just returned from this property where we enjoyed several days of breathtaking views, a relaxing and quiet beach, outstanding pool area and accommodations many levels above my wildest expectations.   Customer service here is no doubt 5 stars . . . very welcoming, wonderful people.  Meals, though expensive, were delicious and extremely flavorful.  This is one of those places you have to see to appreciate all of its' beauty.  It is well worth the travel and expense.

title: You will fall in love with the island, especially the wonderful St lucians.
review: I had a fantastic stay at Sugar Beach, staying in the 300's beautiful views, my own pool to cool off or a short 4 min walk to the beach. The staff at sugar beach made my stay here, many laughs had, always smiling made me feel so welcome. Not usually one for naming names but a special thanks to Super C, Lawrencia & Kershama. Only downside for me was not enough Local food on the menu's.

title: A great day at the beach.
review: Good day,  Thank you for your glowing comments and valuable feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are happy to know that you enjoyed our facilities and everything that we offered. The individuals mentioned will be praised for a job well done.  Thank you also for your comments about the lack of local options on the menus. I will be sure to share your feedback with our culinary team.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Incredible!
review: We had a real good day there, the only bad thing was the $100 per sun bed they wanted to charge us, and we settled for the $20 ones, the lunch was really good and the atmosphere was elegant, we really enjoyed our experience there.

title: A Perfect Spot
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that you had the opportunity to use our facilities and that you enjoyed everything and had a wonderful time. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back as a resident guest in the near future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing stay in Saint Lucia
review: This resort is absolutely amazing! I knew it was nested between the pitons before we arrived, but it’s hard to really grasp what that means until you see it in person. It’s incredible. Both the location and the resort scream romance.  We had such a great stay here. We stayed in a Luxury Sugar Mill room and it was amazing! Loved the simple all-white décor. Both the room (room seems like the wrong term here) and lanai were huge and so beautiful. We enjoyed the nightly turndown service.  Food: -We had breakfast in the mornings at the Terrace. It was simple and tasty. Eating out on the deck was overlooking the property was a great way to start the day. -The BBQ at Bayside was excellent. Our favorite part was the ceviche bar. You can customize exactly what you want in yours! So good!…

title: Paradise
review: This was our second trip to Sugar Beach.  We visited 3 years ago when it was named Jalousie Plantation.  It is certainly a five-star resort situated in the most beautiful setting.  There has certainly been more villas added since our first visit-including the beach villas, and the addition of tuk-tuks over van transportion was a nice change.  The resort also added personal I-pads, which was a nice amenity to have considering we do not travel with them.  Our first stay in the 500s had a lovely view of the water from the infinity pool and both pitons.  The property is immaculately kept.  This stay, we were in the 900s.  We only had a view of the petit piton, but it was by-far a more private location and we enjoyed having an added outdoor shower in this room.  Our butler, Monti,…

title: Stunning!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to provide this extensive review of your second stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort formerly The Jalousie Plantation. We are  pleased with your feedback about all of the enhancement work we have done on the resort since you last stayed with us. Most importantly, I am happy that you felt inspired and that we exceeded your expectations in all area. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing
review: My wife and I had a superb holiday here and can highly recommend. The views are breath taking with both Pitons at either end of the bay, white sand, blue & turquoise sea. The pool is very large and superbly fitted out with relaxing sun beds and next to the beach so moving between the two is not a problem. The service throughout was first class and although a little busy because of school holidays, standards did not drop.

title: Sugar Beach Anse or Jade - and on a budget (ish)
review: Good day, Thank you for your wonderful comments and for taking the time to post this review. We are very pleased to know that you had a perfect holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and that our setting and everything that we offered was first class in every way. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit. Regard,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Return to the former Jalouise Plantation
review: AMAZING, AMAZING, AMAZING! If you are thinking of booking this hotel just do it! The hotel's setting is breathtaking and needs to be seen to be appreciated. The Villa was incredible. Private pool, outdoor shower, indoor shower, free standing bath, four poster bed, living area, sun deck, a butler....... the stuff that dreams are made of! We ate at Bayside every morning for breakfast and some lunches and dinners, the food here was very good and the staff are so friendly. Fresh mango juice every morning while looking out at the Bay! Paradise. We also ate in the great room. The food here is perfection, the presentation was immaculate! This hotel has the little touches down to a fine art and we will, and cant wait to return! Heaven on Earth.

title: Yup...it's worth the price
review: Here's my abridged version: spectacular resort with incredible service and a lot to do...if you choose. Here's my unabridged version: Scenery - as even the most critical guest will acknowledge, it really doesn't get much better than having a resort nested between the Pitons....absolutely breathtaking. The views from our villa (311) were awesome. 5 star Food - as we didn't have the AI plan and ate off property for lunch and dinner, I don't feel as qualified as some to answer this. We had good breakfasts there and the thin crust pizza we tried was top notch; however, we only ate dinner there one time (good but not spectacular). 4 star Accommodations - we were upgraded from a luxury cottage to a superior villa....nice touch on their part, as it was both my and my wife's birthday…

title: Relaxing in Paradise
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post this extensive review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am delighted that your stay was near perfect with the exception of the mixed food and beverage service that you have highlighted. We have discussed your food and beverage experience with the director of the department to ensure that our guests are getting the same high level of service in all areas. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused.  Thank you once again for your excellent feedback and comments. We are looking forward to your return visit to serve you again to share firsthand the improvements made in light of your concerns.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful Honeymoon and Resort!
review: St. Lucia is an amazing place. Nestled between between the pitons, Sugar Beach is pure paradise. Our family spent time here after a week in a northern St. Lucia resort. Sugar Beach was well appointed and offered many activities for our family of four. It was efficient and all of our needs were met.   However, I only give this five star resort a four star rating. Why? Because it lacked island character. The high end menu offered minimal local food options. I found it rather disturbing that I could eat Scottish salmon but not a local fish option. Having a sushi bar also seemed rather out of place. The staff was very efficient but never went the extra mile. Unlike the resort I stayed in in northern St. Lucia, I never really felt I got an island "experience." This resort could have…

title: Getting there in style
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry to hear that our food and beverage offerings did not exceed your expectations in the sense that you felt our menus lacked Caribbean-inspired dishes. Had you made our executive chef aware of how you felt, rest assured he would have prepared some more local dishes to your satisfaction. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. I am also sorry that the sofa bed proved uncomfortable for one of your teens. We would have been happy to have brought up a second, more comfortable rollaway bed, had we been aware of the issue so both of your children could have slept in comfort.  Apart from the concerns highlighted above, I am pleased that on balance you had a wonderful and relaxing stay. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach really soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Stunning location, flawless genuine St Lucia staff
review: We just got back from our honeymoon at Sugar Beach May 3-11, 2014.  We could not have picked a better resort to go to. We were picked up via a private car and taken straight to our villa. We didn't even have to go check in at the reception office, our butler took care of everything before we arrived! We stayed in Villa 801 with three butlers (Gus, McKale, and Jose).  They were great and helped setup everything we wanted to do during the week.  When we first arrived in the villa they had plantain chips, fruit from the island and special made drinks for us. We thought this was really nice!  Our room was spectacular, bright,clean and simple and the bathrooms are amazing! The views no matter where you stay are just breathtaking. Please keep in mind though, these villas are in a rain…

title: Avoid - not worth it - go to Hotel Boucan instead
review: Poor. Small resort and a corporate event involving 90 people was running. No advanced warning. The group completely dominated the time we were there. All our restaurant reservations were cancelled. Expensive, a wee bit tired, poor and often uninterested service (butlers and drivers excepted) left me a little cold. Asked to feedback to GM but told he was "off island" - saw him 10 minutes later in the restaurant. BE WARNED - this is a small resort and they have big groups so you can feel like a minority at times being told you only have one place to eat. We moved to the Hotel Boucan and it is cheaper and in a different league.

title: Disappointing
review: Good day, Thank you for your feedback about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I would like to apologize for the experience that you have described and for the disruption you encountered due to a group event at the hotel. I am truly sorry you felt you were treated poorly. I would also like to take the opportunity to let you know that I was indeed away from the island attending a business event in London at  the time  you requested to speak with me. You may have mistaken the Resident Manager or our Food & Beverage Director for me. As the General Manager of this resort, my guests are priority and I make every effort to listen to their concerns. I am sorry that I did not get the opportunity to meet with you during your stay. I know that you had the opportunity to relate your experience to our Guest Relations Manager who shared your concerns with the management team, including myself. There was only on one occasion, May 19th, that two dining options were available—Bayside Restaurant and Room Service—with the Great Room and Cane Bar booked for the group.  Apart from that date, all dining options were available to our guests. I am sorry if your dining plans were disrupted on the evening in question and would like to sincerely apologise for the inconvenience this caused. Once again, thank you for your business and feedback. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again and ensure a flawless Sugar Beach stay.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Thank You Sugar Beach
review: My husband and i just returned from a week long stay and overall, taking into consideration the $, i would rate this hotel very average and i would not recommend friends or family to stay. Firstly the positives, the location of this hotel between the pitons is fantastic and the view from the beach and pool area is magnificent. We also has 3 wonderful butlers who worked tirelessly to make our stay a great one. However, if i was to summarise my complaint with the rest of the hotel it would be that considering the $, the service (with the exception of the butlers) is poor,  the food is average and overpriced, the villas are comfortable but not amazing. Regarding the service, i actually found it to not only be poor but also unwelcoming and we were grateful for the opportunity to…

title: Unbeatable location, great service, luxury accommodation.
review: Good day, Thank you for your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry to hear of the experience and disappointments that you have described. We continually strive to create great experiences for our guests and memorable moment that they will cherish for all the right reasons. In your cause, it is clear that we failed to meet your expectations and for that I am truly sorry. Your feedback has been discussed with the relevant department heads and we are reviewing our service standards to ensure a consistent luxury experience for all of our guests.  Training initiatives will be introduced where required to refresh these standard with our team members. I trust that the issues you experienced have not left an indelible mark and that you will consider a return visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort at some point in the near future. We would welcome the opportunity to share firsthand the improvements made in light of your concerns. Once again your comments and your business are greatly appreciated.   Best Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise Found
review: My wife and I just returned from a wonderful week at Sugar Beach and are already making plans to return. The week before we stayed in Antigua@ Galley Bay, which was outstanding, but Sugar Beach was epic. When we arrived, we were informed that our room had been upgraded as it was our anniversary. This property is incredible. The staff is outstanding and the food options are good. We chose not to do the all inclusive, not really knowing that dining options outside the resort are not easily accessable. I see complaints about the imported white sand, and wonder what the heck. The sand is fine. The beach itself is free of the usual peddlers, which frankly, I enjoy, but know that others don't. The pitons rising up on either side of the beach make this setting one of the most…

title: Best Resort in St Lucia
review: We have known this resort when it was a Hilton many years ago and have visited many times since whenever we travel to St Lucia. We have stayed at the resort or just visited for lunch/dinner etc. Like many other reviewers being an experienced traveller in Asia, Middle-East, Europe etc, I am fortunate to have stayed at some world-class resorts with exceptional service and facilities etc. Roger Myers and the team at Sugar Beach have turned the resort into a special destination. Using the backdrop of the Pitons and having wonderful facilities is very good, but what makes Sugar Beach stand-out are the staff at the resort. All of the staff from the wait staff, grounds workers are etc are a wonderful ambassadors for the resort.  If planning to visit, we would recommend a boat transfer…

title: Great escape
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are very pleased to hear that your expectations were exceeded in all areas. We continuously try our utmost to ensure that we deliver a service and product that remains memorable in the hearts of our guests. We appreciate that you recognize our endeavors . Once again, thank you for your positive and encouraging comments. We are looking forward to your return visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: One Word: Amazing
review: Let me start by saying I am an experienced traveler having stayed in hotels, resorts & motels throughout the world. I've seen amazing properties & not so much, all with their pros & cons.   This place is GORGEOUS, almost jungle like, very tropical, peaceful & 100% relaxing.   The Staff is ALL outstanding. Everyone goes out of their way to help make your stay memorable. Even though a staff member might not know the exact answer, they will direct you to someone who knows.  Food: Excellent, flavorful & plentiful. It's not cheap but that's the Caribbean. If you want good food in this region of the world, most things are imported & thus the higher costs.   Rooms: Tastefully done with every amenity you could ask for, including my wife's favorite, a Nesspresso Coffee machine. If you…

title: Return trip
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write such an extensive and glowing review of your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are committed to providing our guests with the levels of service that match out incredible surroundings and it is pleasing to know that you were satisfied and enjoyed everything that we offered. I will communicate your feedback to the entire team and commend them on a job well done. Once again, thank you for your valuable feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Honeymoon in Paradise
review: My wife and I stayed at Sugar Beach for our honeymoon, 9/2/13-9/9/13.  Sugar Beach can be described in one word, amazing.  When we travel, we like to pay a little more and know we are going to get our moneys worth, and at Sugar Beach we got all of that and then some.   From the start, at the airport we got to see all of the other honeymooning couples get herded in packed vans and shuttles, however, we were greeted by our professional driver and an SUV. From there we knew it was going to be special. He gave us a tour of the Island as we made our way along to the resort.  Upon our arrival, our butler for the week, Peter, who was awesome, greeted us with cold towels and even colder drinks.  From then on, the week only got better   We did take a gamble and visited during the peak of…

title: "Five star at its best"
review: My husband and i have just returned after a weeks stay at Sugar Beach and have to say it's one of the best holidays we've had.We were upgraded to a villa and greeted by our friendly butler Willan,with complimentary coconut punch,which was my favourite drink all week! A separate kitchen provided us with complimentary water,beer and soft drinks, all of which were replaced when needed.There was also a coffee machine and kettle and a variety of teas.Little touches like that are appreciated.Breakfast was excellent and so much choice.Lunch on the beach was great and so were the hard working staff there.Everything was "no problem" to them to provide you with the best ever service.Sandi at the Bayside Restaurant and Natasha at the Great Room were wonderful,happy characters who always…

title: Mixed feelings
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are so happy to hear that Sugar Beach provided one of the best holidays that you have ever experienced and that you appreciated the room upgrade and everything else we offered. We are delighted that we have created special memories of Sugar Beach to last a lifetime . We would also like to thank you for recommending our resort and considering a return visit.  Your comments and business are greatly appreciated. We are looking forward to your return visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Absolutely beautiful, amazing service!
review: My wife and I stayed for 8 nights. There are many positive things to say about Sugar Beach - location, quality of the food, butler service, friendly staff.  We stayed in a Sugar Mill villa which meant we had easy access to the restaurants and beach area.  I would certainly recommend this, or a beach villa, rather than having to rely on the shuttle service to get anywhere.  It was a wonderful place to stay in many ways but one thing that Sugar Beach is not, is tranquil (as stated on their web-site). We were perhaps unlucky to time our stay with a wedding party. They were raucous, playing loud music by the pool, playing American football on the beach and in the pool and generally paying no heed to other guests. This is not what we were expecting! Sadly no staff appeared to try and…

title: Terrible place
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I would like to apologize for the concerns that you have highlighted. I want to reassure you that what you have described is extremely rare at our resort.  With that being said, I am disappointed that we did not realize the group in house during your stay was causing such disruption and failed to take control of the situation and put an immediate stop to it. Once the issue was brought to our attention our team members acted quickly to bring the matter under control and restore peace.  Apart from this one concern, we trust that everything else was to your satisfaction and that you enjoyed your stay. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again and ensure a more tranquil Sugar Beach experience. Your comments and business are greatly appreciated. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Family Friendly
review: This resort is spectacular! My husband and I enjoyed our private villa with a small pool. The villa amenities were spectacular and our butlers (Gregg, Swamed and Mosiah) were absolutely amazing! Their service and assistance was extremely exceptional!
