The resort is located uniquely inbetween the two beautiful pitons. Waking up every morning to these and watching every sunset with them was truly a memory I'll never forget. The activities (ziplining, hiking gros piton, sulphur springs, waterfalls, etc.) were so enjoyable! The resort offers so much activities for you to do. The rainforest spa was remarkable. All around the people were so nice, welcoming, always remember you and your name - service was outstanding!  Food was delicious everywhere and BBQ was really a must!  This…

title: Caribbean Utopia Found...
review: This resort is by far one of, if not THE most beautiful in the Caribbean!  Beautiful, fresh and exceptionally clean villas with indoor and outdoor living rooms and private pools are scattered down the mountainside to the beach in between the famous Pitons; candy coloured Tuk Tuks imported from Thailand shuttle guests from their villas to resort amenities; Extraordinary spa services amidst the rain forest in elevated huts; most remarkable though was the outstanding service throughout the resort.  Look no further, this really is paradise.    What makes this resort truly magical is "the experience" one has here.  It goes beyond the beautifully manicured grounds, interesting architecture, charming paths, abundance of amenities (gym, tennis courts, gazebos, pools, beach, exquisite…

title: Beautiful location
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing and encouraging comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is always gratifying to read reviews such as yours and I know the whole team will be delighted by your comments. We are always happy to hear that we did everything right and that the exceptional service we rendered to you has created  a lifetime of Sugar Beach memories for you. The individuals mentioned will be commended for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Breathtaking scenery, but not exactly 5 star
review: The hotel has been renovated really well. The place is beautiful, and the setting is stunning. We had 2 beachfront bungalows, which were perfect, and the beds are very comfortable. Many of the staff are friendly and helpful, but at times the service was excruciatingly slow. Breakfast time was somewhat shambolic! They need a different system, and queuing for breakfast to get a table was irritating. We were on an all inclusive package, and this was an expensive holiday. We were annoyed that many things were asterisked as not included/ subject to a supplement, and at each meal you have to sign a cheque with a "tip" section on it. Everything is already subject to a 10% service charge, but you feel a bit under pressure to put tips on. In fact I had a spa treatment and added a tip in…

title: Spectacular Setting
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased that you recognized and appreciated the positive enhancements that we have done at the resort over the last three years. I am sorry  to hear about  the overall experience that you have described.  At the time of booking your stay and buying the all inclusive meal plan, our reservations agents should have clearly explained the details of this package. I am sorry if there was a communication breakdown somewhere along the way. Very few items on the menu carry supplemental charges, however, items such as expensive cuts of steak, cold water lobster or other imported fish and seafood, and premium drinks do carry additional charges. The 10% service charge you noted on your checks is a mandatory government enforced fee that all hotels must charge.  Leaving a tip or gratuity, however, is discretionary and usually recommended as a reward for exemplary service that exceeded your expectations. The service charge collected  is divided among all of the hotel line staff, whereas gratuities are paid directly to the individual who delivered the service. Tipping is certainly not mandatory as our team members strive to deliver a genuine service to our guests without the expectation of receiving a tip. I understand your concern with signing the bill, even if you are on the All Inclusive meal plan.  The main reasons for having guests sign is because not all of our guests are on a meal plan, and there are items that may have been consumed that are not included in your package.  I am sorry that your choices of wine were not always available. We are continuously reviewing our wine offerings to ensure that we provide a balance list that accommodates every budget. There are no guarantees for late checkout. The only way to guarantee this service, especially when you are operating at high  occupancy, is to pay for an additional night (something that many of our guests flying to the UK opt to do) or to pay the late check fee to secure the room, again, subject to availability.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope that the issues you have described have not left an indelible mark and that you will consider a return visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the not to distant future.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Sugar Beach is Awesome!
review: How to begin?  I just returned from a stay at Sugar Beach.  The staff was incredibly kind and generous.  The butlers worked very hard to insure our needs were met, always with a smile on their faces.  However, we were there while the resort was full and sometimes things were a bit of a pain.  This resort is extremely difficult to get around at.  Shuttles are required for everything, unless you stay in one of the few beach villas.  Even getting to breakfast requires a wait for the shuttle, even if you call ahead.  This is probably not always the issue, we were just there during a very busy time.  This seems to be a family resort, lots of children.  Getting the dinner time we wanted was not always easy either, and we could never get a tennis court despite the fact that when we…

title: Sugar Beach is breathtaking....
review: Swimming in the pool your panoramic view takes in rainforest vegetation nestling between the Pitons towering into the bluest sky with fluffy little white clouds, the Caribbean Sea lapping softly onto the white sand.....just beautiful. The weather in March was like the best British Summer day, when it’s hot enough to tan but it leaves you with enough energy to sightsee.  We took a water taxi along the coast;  listened to John telling us about local nature on the Tet Paul trail where stunning views reward 45 minutes of gentle walking;  we wallowed in mud baths at the sulphur springs, washed off in a waterfall; and we photographed exotic plants in the Botanic Gardens. The immaculately-tended, luxuriant grounds of Sugar Beach itself are a reminder of its plantation past. Tuktuk…

title: Beautiful place
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write this very useful review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am pleased to know that you enjoyed your visit and that the courtesies and services you experienced positively contributed to a relaxing vacation. Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated.  On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.    Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Gorgeous place... Menu a little limited
review: We had an amazing stay at this resort. The expectations were high as I read so many positive things about it and this place was recommended by friends to us as well. We booked to stay at the Superior Luxury Villa and were kindly upgraded to the Grand Luxury Villa. The resort itself couldn't be faulted, it is just so beautiful and the pictures don't do it justice. I find with many resorts, the pictures only tell half a story. You really have to have been there and experienced it because each resort has a certain 'feel' about it and the feel in this resort, is very special, very difficult to convey in pictures. It's cosy, yet it's very spacious, it's luxurious without being stiff. It feels just right and very unique. You don't want to leave. The service is impeccable (I don't…

title: Had dinner here and wished we were booked in.
review: Good day, Thank you for your valuable comments about your recent stay. We are delighted to know that your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resorts exceeded your expectations and that you felt special in our environment. Our team will be delighted with your feedback. title: Trip to Paradise
review: To start the place I cannot fault it. The staff always greeted us with a smile and were very welcoming. We were greeted with drinks and shown to our villa. It was very clean and modern. The bed was very comfy and the view was lovely! The private pool was not heated and we were shaded so it wasn't ever used! But still lovely. We very rarely spent much time in the villa with the beach being so nice and quiet so it wasn't much of an issue. The beach is very clean and the sea is so warm. The snorkels are free and highly recommended, the bay is stunning to snorkel (bring an underwater camera)... And the waiter service was exceptional. The only con was a) it cost us a little over £7k but it was worth all inclusive if you are not leaving the resort b) the food menu is the same every…

title: Wonderful resort
review: We spent five days at this wonderful resort. Our room was gorgeous and very spacious, and our butler Gus was very helpful and attentive. The food at the restaurants was delicious and offered a lot of variety. The only drawback of this resort is that you cannot walk to the beach, the pool, and the restaurants from most of the rooms. With that said, the shuttle service is very efficient. Would definitely recommend this resort to others.

title: Just book it!
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write this very useful review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   I am pleased to know that you enjoyed your visit and that the courtesies and services you experienced positively contributed to a relaxing vacation.  Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated.   On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful but pricey...
review: Stop reading all the picky reviews and just book it! We read every review and went back and forth over where to spend our 15th anniversary. Sugar Beach is amazing!!!!!!  We stayed Sep 2013 for 7 days. Well worth every penny. Quiet, private, lovely, and breathtaking. We stayed in a villa with gorgeous views, private pool, outdoor shower. Our butler was so kind, thoughtful and met our every need. Actually, every person who served us at the resort was exceptional. I thought I would not like the shuttles driving us up and down the mountain but it really was not an issue. The spa is one of the best I have ever visited (and I have been to many all over). The sauna is an experience. Comfortable beds, great food, thoughtful fruit basket, note and champagne on our anniversary. We were…

title: THREE CARD MONTY
review: Good day,  We are happy you chose Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort as the destination for your vacation.  It is a real pleasure to learn you had a memorable stay for all the right reasons.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Honeymoon Perfection
review: What a beautiful resort!  Nestled in the hillside overlooking beautiful blue waters with the majestic Pitons on either side.  The rooms are gorgeous and each come with it's own private pool and your own personal butler.  We had Monty and he was awesome!   The grounds are immaculate and lush.  If you really like exercise you can walk the hills to and from your room, but be warned they are steep.   The ever present motorized rickshaws are a good way to get around if walking isn't an option - like when you're dressed up and wearing heels.  The beach is pristine and we never had a problem getting chairs under the thatched umbrellas.  The one thing you will hear from the minute you arrive on the island though is "now you're on island time".  This means things move at a much slower…

title: Everything one could want on a Caribbean vacation
review: Sugar Beach will not disappoint. From the moment you arrive, and are greeted by your butler with drinks, you will know that you will be cared for and spoiled. The rooms are lovely, the beds amazingly comfortable, and the grounds are lush with greenery and the air fragrant with flowers. The pool is the most beautiful we have ever seen. At Sugar Beach, you never feel crowded. There are guests here and there, but always plenty of chairs on the beach, tables in the restaurants so that you can be as private as you wish.  Snorkeling, kayaking, diving and sailing right from the beach, along with tubing and water skiing. You really do not need to leave the property to do everything you wish.

title: Honeymoon
review: Good day, Thank you for your positive and encouraging comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Reviews such as yours bring us great satisfaction in knowing that we provided you with exceptional service and  that helped to make your stay memorable. Once again, thank you for your encouraging feedback. We look forward to your return visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: BEST Vacation Ever!!
review: The wife and I were deciding where to spend our honeymoon and at the recommendation of a few friends we decided Sugar Beach was the spot.    From the second you step on the resort you're surrounded by the Piton mountains and lush green vegetation (helps hide your villa and private pool from other guests) and lots of flowers that the staff uses to help decorate your room.  We stayed in the 800 rooms which is a bit up the mountain yet offers a great view and is only a two minute ride in a tuk-tuk down to the beach.   The staff is very nice, helpful, attentive and all speak English well (a plus when considering vacationing in Mexico or other popular spots).  The Butler service is great and they will do anything from book a afternoon adventure to dinner reservations etc.. They also…

title: Nice Property
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team, I would like say how happy we are that you enjoyed your honeymoon stay with us, and thank you for providing us with your feedback. We are committed to providing our guests with the highest level of service and it is satisfying to know that you enjoyed everything that we offered. Thank you once again for your review and we hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the near future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful beach, great amenities
review: My husband and I spent our honeymoon here in November 2013. It was hands down the best vacation either of us has ever taken and we plan on coming back often!! We spent 5 nights over Thanksgiving and wished we stayed longer.  It truly is a dream being at this resort... we knew we made the right decision as soon as we stepped off the plane and saw our fellow passengers being herded onto shuttles for the other more touristy resorts and saw the mercedes waiting for us.  The only thing I will say is that it is outrageously expensive (worth it though!!) so plan accordingly.  We had the European plan which included breakfast and I 100% recommend that.  We would have a 3 course breakfast around 9 or 10am and then have a little snack in the afternoon and be good until dinner.  We only…

title: Very disappointed with location
review: You cannot walk around this resort!  You have to depend on the shuttles to take you from the villas to the beach and restaurants because of the mountain it is built on.  The beach is short.  You can walk the length of the beach in 5 minutes and you can't go any further without a boat.  The resort is isolated so you have to eat on the resort where the food choices are limited.  Some of the few restaurants there are insist on long pants to eat there!  We were on vacation on a caribbean island and only brought shorts so weren't allowed in!  If you wanted a simple burger or chicken sandwich after 5pm you have to order room service as the restaurants only served expensive food after that.  Limited tours (tours to the towns are only on Saturdays so if you arrive and leave on Saturday…

title: Wonderful Staff
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry that you felt isolated and that you were not informed of the layout of the resort before making your final decision to visit. I would like to apologize for the disappointments that you have highlighted.  I am also sorry that you were not aware of the dress code for the Great Room restaurant prior to arrival and that you were denied entry. That information is generally communicated to our guests during the time of booking their stay. It appears that there was a communication breakdown somewhere along the way. I am very concerned with your comments about the tour and excursions only being available on a Saturday. All tours and excursions are offered as a private or as a group adventure. Majority of the tours go out daily unless the supplier of the tour/excursion foresees challenges that will negatively impact the guest experience. Majority of the pools in our accommodations are exposed to the sunlight. It could have been a situation where your villa was in a shaded area. If we were aware that this was a concern for you, we would have moved you to another room where the pool is exposed to more sunlight and therefore a little warmer. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful
review: Our visit here was spoilt because my wife had a nasty fall on the day we arrived to stay a week. This meant that we were unable to enjoy the amenities but we could not have been treated better anywhere in the world. We had a Sugar Mill room with a short walk to the pool and beach but as it contained stairs and my wife could not walk we were moved to a Villa up the hill where we were looked after superbly by our 2 butlers. My wife spent one night in the Hospital, a converted Athletics Stadium, which was 45 miles away in Vieux Fort on very difficult roads and 3 visits were made there after my wife was diagnosed with a fractured wrist and cracked pelvis. The Head Butler, Efe, accompanied us on all our hospital trips and even came with us when we went to the airport for our return…

title: Great vacation, beautiful resort
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are so sorry about your wife’s fall and the fact you could not fully relax and enjoy your time in St Lucia. At the same time, I am delighted that our team members, and Efe in particular, ensured that you were well in what were challenging circumstances.  We wish your wife a speedy recovery and hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Great Beach Restaurant
review: THE most amazing place to stay. From the minute you check in (which is basically one of your 3 butlers meeting you at your room) you know you're in for a good time. We stayed in a standard room but there's nothing standard about it. It was THE most comfortable bed I've ever slept in. I actually wanted to wake up to go the loo so I could get back into it again!! Everything about this place is gorgeous, the views, the restaurants, the pool and beach areas. Thoroughly enjoyed it and couldn't recommend it enough.

title: Best Dining Experience in Souffriere
review: We sampled six restaurants in Souffriere during our nine days on St. Lucia. The Bayside Restaurant at Sugar Beach offered the only dining experience that could have become addictive. Although we were not staying at Sugar Beach, the staff was welcoming and friendly and treated us like long-time guests. The open-air bar and restaurant, which are idyllically located at the edge of the beach tucked between the Pitons. Both are spacious, yet cozy. The bartender's prowess, the sophisticated, but not over-the-top menu, and the comprehensive wine list (which included four very good roses (sic) that paired especially well with the salade nicoise) makes it very easy to let one's guard down...no balls were dropped! For dinner, my wife and I shared the sea bass for two which was perfectly…

title: A great honeymoon!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your dining experience at the Bayside restaurant at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are always happy to read comments like yours especially from non-resident guests. We are elated that we created a perfect dining experience for you and that the staff delivered exceptional service. Our culinary team will be very pleased with your comments about the quality of food and service that they offered. They will be commended for leaving you with a memorable dining experience for all the right reasons. Once again, thank you for your positive feedback and business. We hope to welcome you back in the  not too distant future as a resident guest. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Stop Looking, Get Booking!
review: After weeks of looking for the perfect honeymoon spot, we decided to visit St. Lucia and stay at Sugar Beach.We booked a grand luxury villa and I added the Sugar Beach honeymoon package to surprise my Wife with a few excursions and champagne. Before arriving, Theresa with the Concierge was very helpful to plan our airport transfers and the activities I wanted to add to our stay.    Room:  We stayed in room 505. This room is very private and has a great view! Upon arrival, our Butler for the day Shawn (he was filling in for Wynel who was our butler for the remainder of the stay) greeted us with coconut punches. As part of the honeymoon package I booked, we also had champagne on arrival and there was a flower decoration congratulating us on the bench in front of the bed. The room…

title: Beautiful resort but they are rude to visitors
review: Good day, Thank you for your extensive feedback about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort I am sure other couples will find it both useful and informative. We are delighted that your honeymoon was almost perfect with the exception of the glitches that you highlighted. It is a shame that we missed out on providing turndown service on your last night. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience and disappointment caused. We are continuing to review our service standards to ensure that we always deliver on our promises. I would also like to apologise for the error on your bill. This was an oversight that should have been rectified without you having to draw it to our attention. I am happy everything was eventually sorted out. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to see you again in the not too distant future. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: A Tad bit Disappointed
review: Sugar Beach Resort, St Lucia – how often can you say you had a perfect holiday? Not often, but we did.  From the moment we arrived at the gate and were handed a Welcome Cocktail, to the moment we left with hugs from Swamed, one of our 3 butlers, it was amazing. I was unsure about the butler thing, too intrusive maybe? Well, trust me, it’s not. If what you want you want to know isn’t on the iPad that each villa has which is packed with Sugar Beach information, your butler will know. They are your key to finding your way around for the first few days, often anticipating our requests before we made them. We were charmed by the hot pink, lime green or bright blue Tut Tuts which take you around the resort.  Our villa was no. 314 (for 2 people) and was so well furnished, immaculate…

title: Honeymoon at Sugar Beach
review: This place was flawless top to bottom.  It is VERY difficult to find something to complain about here.  I have never experienced such wonderful people in my entire life in all of my travels.  We booked a sugar mill room and it was gorgeous and had a great walking location to beach, beach bar and all dining.  It was the lowest level of the rooms but was still phenomenal.  We looked to get upgraded but the hotel was at full capacity.  Some of the wonderful people who made our experience wonderful were: Migel (Cane bar), Lawrencia (Beach bar), Melanie (great room), Anetta (beach bar, not sure of the spelling), and Cordy (butler).. This is just to name a few who went ABOVE AND BEYOND.  Everyone else was extremely pleasant and attentive.  Spa was fantastic.  For the reviewers who…

title: Utter perfection
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased to hear that we created special memories for you and that the individuals mentioned really enhanced your honeymoon experience. We will acknowledge them for a job well done. We are continuously seeking ways to improve on our culinary offerings to ensure that we create a balanced menu in all of the restaurants to improve guest satisfaction. As you have quite rightly noted, we pride ourselves on utilizing the freshest ingredients possible in every dish and this sometimes means curtailing the number of options available—something we are working on with our suppliers. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope you will consider a return visit, perhaps even for a first anniversary stay. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: This Property Strives to be Great, but NOT there yet.
review: This is simply the most incredible place to have a holiday.  The location is unbelievable, the staff are fantastic, there is loads to do or just relax on the beach or in the villa - the only disappointment was that we were only there for a week.  Our villa was huge, with a large private infinity pool overlooking the sea and both Pitons - only a few minutes stroll down to the beach (or ride in a shuttle if we were feeling lazy, which were always quick to arrive even when the resort was full).  The kids were never short of things to do, from incredible snorkelling off the beach (especially good in early morning before anyone else was there), sea kayaking, thrill rides behind the speedboat, or just swimming in one of the pools or the sea.  Service and food were very good - we were…

title: Paradise vacation
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am glad that your overall experience was enjoyable and satisfying. Our aim is to make every guest experience pleasant and fulfilling by providing the highest level of service. I am also happy that you had the opportunity to engage in many activities, which you and your family enjoyed. Thank you for the special mention you have given to a number of our team members. I will share your comments with them and commend them for a job very well done. Once again, thank you for your feedback and business. We look forward to your return. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Top notch in every way
review: I just returned from this property last night after a five night stay (March 4th_9th, 2014). Each year about 18 or 20 associates take an annual trip during the cold of winter to escape to the Caribbean. Among other places, we've visited Hawaii, Jamaica, Turks & Caicos (twice), Caymans, St. John (twice), Anguilla, St. Maarten, St. Thomas & Mexico (more times than I can remember). Anyway, we begin planning our trip about 10 months away from booking. After considerable heavy lifting to find a time that suited everyone's schedule, we considered several properties before choosing Sugar Beach in St. Lucia. Sugar Beach is located near Soufriere, on the Southwest side of the island. I tell you all this so you'll know that we are experienced travelers who try to go "first class", I SO…

title: Stunning
review: Words cannot truly describe this place - it needs to be experienced in 3D. Many others have commented on the views so I cannot add anything (except to say that the view looking down from our 900 level "luxury villa" is permanently etched in our minds, especially the sunsets). The first half of our trip we stayed at Sandals in the north. Sugar Beach was a much quieter experience (we liked both experiences). Our villa was truly amazing in size and layout. The staff, especially the butlers, were amazing (my wife texted one of our friends back in Canada - "We have a butler - what do we do with him?"). The butlers (especially Monty and Dwight) happily made all our dinner and activity bookings, and then changed them according to our whim. We snorkelled every day - right beside the…

title: Wow- total luxury
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your Sugar Beach experience on TripAdvisor. We are delighted that we created a memorable experience for you and that you enjoyed everything that we offered, especially your accommodations and the services offered by our butlers. Once again, thank you for your wonderful comments. We look forward to your return visit in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing wedding destination
review: I stayed at Sugar Beach for 5 days during my honeymoon. I've never been to St.Lucia before and boy did we pick the most beautiful place to enjoy it. Despite some minor complaints this was one of the most luxurious and beautiful resorts I've ever been to.  The rooms: We were upgraded to a villa (707) which was amazing! It was huge, secluded and we had our own outdoor patio, small pool and lounge chairs. There were 2 bathrooms and even an outdoor shower, walk in closet, tv, living room, etc. Plenty of space- we spent most of it outside though.   The beach: Situated between 2 pitons, the beach is beautiful, the water is clear and warm and the chairs are comfy! You even have a reg flag to put up if you want drinks, food, etc. We didn't use the pool (we preferred the beach) but it…

title: Picture Perfect Vacation
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team, I would like say how happy we are that you enjoyed your honeymoon stay with us. We are committed to providing our guests with the highest level of service and it is satisfying to know that you appreciated the room upgrade and enjoyed our hotel facilities and accommodations. We have noted your comments about our food prices. I am sorry that our prices seemed high to you and that you thought the dishes served were poor value when compared with the price charged. These comments have already been shared with our Executive Chef to ensure that our guests feel satisfied and they are getting value for money in our restaurants  Thank you once again for sharing your review and we hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Sugar Beach - a great family holiday to escape the cold
review: As soon as I saw the website for what was then known as the Jalousie Plantation I knew it was going to be the venue for our wedding. We then scheduled a visit to St Lucia to view what was becoming the new Sugar Beach Resort in October 2012 - we were absolutely blown away. The attention to detail and more importantly to guests is amazing, there was no hard sell from the Lisa who showed us around - the resort spoke for itself.  October 2013 we arrived 5 days before our wedding and again the attention to detail blew us away, our every need was catered for by Wynel our butler, Shantal and Marcus the wedding planners and Julian the restaurant director.  We were upgraded from our superior room to a superior one bedroom villa 707 which was truly amazing. It was so spacious, clean and…

title: Magnificent
review: We came for our 70th birthdays, with a surprise visit from our kids.  St. Lucia is a beautiful island, easily one of the more attractive Caribbean destinations, a combination of lush forests and lots of mountains.  Sugar Beach sits on perhaps the most beautiful spot on the island, a sandy beach between the Gros and Petit Pitons backed by forested hills.  The facilities are both recently refinished and well-maintained, the restaurants are well above the normal 4star resort fare, the staff uniformly friendly and helpful.  The only reason we ate off the resort was that things get boring for 9 days, but the resort had the best food.  Snorkeling right in front of the hotel is excellent, a rarity.  The only two things to consider are 1) that the rooms vary considerably in location and…

title: Nothing short of amazing
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment about your birthday stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are glad that your children choose Sugar Beach as the spot to celebrate your 70th birthdays and that we managed to secure our position as your top Caribbean destination. It is always gratifying when we can meet and exceed the expectations of our guests and provide first class experiences that create great memories to take home.  Once again, thank you for your comments. We hope to see you all again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: My Best of the World
review: Decided on Sugar Beach for our honeymoon last spring and was ecstatic we did.  We spent our time in a private villa with plunge pool...300 block.  The room was exquisite and loved all of our butlers! They made sure our fridge was stocked with cold beverages and all of our reservations taken care of which was one less thing to worry about.  Definitely spend the money to visit the Rainforest Spa...the couples massage relaxed every one of my muscles and the chocolate body scrub had my skin incredibly soft.  We also really enjoyed our private dinner on the beach where we had the opportunity to meet with the chef in the AM to pick out a personalized menu-the food was incredible.  Some reviewers complained about the transportation around the resort-it did not bother us one bit as they…

title: Even better than before when it was Jalousie
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed everything that we offered especially our Rainforest Spa and your private dining experience. We are happy that your Sugar Beach experience was memorable for all the right reasons. Once again, thank you for your positive comments. We look forward to your next visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect - Felt like a "home coming"
review: As of right now this is my favorite Hotel in the whole world. I was here when it was called Jalousie, it was great then. But as a Viceroy it is simply spectacular. This trip to St. Lucia I stayed a couple weeks, 2 or 3 days up north the rest at Sugar Beach. I had one room fro 4 days and the other for 7. Both rooms were just amazing in their lay outs, both had plunge pools, great bathrooms, comfortable beds, so quite and private with beautiful views of the bay. But what makes Sugar Beach is the people, the service is top notch. Each room comes with a Butler, you share with maybe 2 other suites. They make sure your stay and your comfort is always like being home. All the restaurants are first class, all the bars first class. The spa in the rain forest, just has to be seen and…

title: Better than I ever could have expected
review: My wife and I celebrated our honeymoon here in June of 2012.  I was responsible for picking the destination and the hotel, and I definitely looked like a hero after this trip.  I booked a Superior Luxury Villa for 6 nights.  We were greeted by one of our butlers, Anisha, who walked us through our room, explained some of the amenities, had already arranged for our dinner reservations and told us she would be available should there be anything else we needed.  Our room was immaculate, with a beautiful "Welcome, Congratulations" made from leaves decorating the bench in front of the 4 poster bed.  We walked outside to our patio, complete with private plunge pool, and were in awe of our surroundings.  Situated on a slope, between the landmark Pitons, I can't imagine a more beautiful…

title: The Bell Hop said 'welcome to paradise'!
review: Good day, Thank you for commenting on your honeymoon experience at what was then the Jalousie Plantation—a few months shy of our transition to become Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Our continued aim is to spoil our guests with the highest quality service especially when they are celebrating such an important and special occasion. It is a shame you were not able to fully enjoy the main swimming pool which was undergoing an impressive redesign at the time of your stay. It’s now a beautiful focal point on the beachfront and well worth a return visit to see. We try our utmost to accommodate guests with all kinds of eating preferences and allergies. It’s wonderful to hear that our culinary team was able to cater for your wife’s gluten intolerance in a way that not only met, but exceeded your expectations. It will give me great pleasure to share your glowing feedback with members of the butler team and to let them know the special touches they provided truly enhanced your stay. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort perhaps for an anniversary celebration. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: So relaxing, secluded and fabulous
review: Well it was close. The resort is in an unrivalled position on a white sand beach between the World famous pitons. We stayed in a Beach Bungalow right on the beach in a spacious and very comfortable suite. The best thing about the place was the people...charming happy staff genuinely pleased to serve you. A special mention of the food, served at four outlets from the grand Great Room in the old Plantation House to a great beach bar. We particularly liked the sushi served in the evenings. Don't all go, we will be back.

title: UNQUESTIONABLY THE BEST RESORT IN THE CARIB
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to comment about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate comments such as yours. I am happy that you enjoyed everything that we offered, especially in our food and beverage outlets. Our culinary team will be very delighted with your feedback. Once again, thank you for your review and business. We are looking forward to welcoming you back soon. André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing stay at Sugar Beach
review: We returned from a five day, four night stay there this past week and had a truly relaxing vacation.  It's rare in our day and age to really unplug but at Sugar Beach it's easy.  Sure there IS internet if you must check in, but the physical surrounding of two gigantic pitons on either side of you and the stunning beach in front of you make you essentially surrounded in your own private paradise and you quickly forget why you would bother to check your email.  We stayed in a Sugar Mill Room, #701 and, while we travel a lot at mostly 4 an 5 star hotels this was one of the nicest we've ever been at.  The rooms are gigantic, and the patio with the pool and view are just amazing.  We often ordered room service for breakfast just because it was so beautiful to sit there in the…

title: Beautiful Resort
review: Perfect setting, wonderful surroundings and exceptional service. Wonderful accommodation, cleaned daily with excellent air conditioning. Lots of activities; fantastic beach, lovely pool and great snorkelling site all in the resort. One of the most memorable trips yet.

title: Excellent stay in St Lucia
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. As you indicated, we try our best to create remarkable experiences for our guests.  It is such a pleasure to know that our resort provided you with the highest level of service and that our team  provided all the special touches to give you memories to cherish. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to your return visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Dream Honeymoon
review: We started our week in St Lucia with a 3 night stay here in a Sugar Mill room.  Our 1st impression was the rooms were so much larger than depicted.  We did not use the bathtub and so would have preferred a sofa or something else useable---given that it had a quite nice outside heated plunge pool.  Pools and beach were all first class though we were a little disappointed in the menu at the BaySide restaurant.  Also we did not think all rooms had the Butler service--but they do.  We really did not need them so it made us a little awkward to have available etc.  If we were only staying at the beach this would be quite nice...but if you want to see the island then the extreme travel up and down the hills is quite tiresome.  It was so much more relaxed driving  on the north side near…

title: Not as good as it should have been
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments following your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased to hear that your expectations were exceeded in almost every area. All our accommodations are up to luxury standards and include a plunge pool and butler service. The two major differences are the size and locations of the accommodations. Thank you for highlighting how impressed you were with the space provided by the Luxury Sugar Mill Rooms. Had you made us aware of your preference for a sofa, our housekeeping team would have gladly placed a small sofa, or easy chair, in your room. I have to agree with you that it is easier to drive on the Northern tip of the island compared to the South where it is hilly with many curves. We offer our guests the option of taking either a water or land taxi for most of their journeys. The water taxi is more convenient and takes much less time to your location—and you get to avoid the twists and turns of the road. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Best taxi service
review: Breathtaking views, amazing service (thank you Swamen, Alex and Mosiah) and wonderful accommodations. Fantastic snorkeling in the marine reserve just off the beach. Our room was beautiful, I slept like a baby in our unbelievably comfortable bed. Don't miss dinner in the Great Room- so delicious. We cannot wait to go back!

title: Best holiday ever
review: My husband and I visited Sugar beach and had the best time of our 15 years togeather. When we arrived we were greeted by our butler Fabian with fresh drinks and cold towels. Our beach bungalow was amazing with a pool that can be heated.   The resort is beautiful with white sand beach and lovely restaurants to an amazing rainforest spa. Our butlers fabian and markenzie made our stay one we will never forget they made everything possible with a smile. On the night of my wife's birthday they had our room decorated with flowers and champagne (thank you again fabian and markenzie.)  We will most certainly return to this resort.

title: Excellent
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate your positive comments highlighting the high quality service that you received from our friendly and professional team members, especially your butlers Fabian and Mackenzie. They will be delighted with your feedback. We aim to offer amenities and services that are captivating and inspiring to our guests and to ensure that their needs are not only met but exceeded. I am happy to hear that Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort provided a first-class experience for you. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to your return visit in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Sugar Beach is the ideal place for a breathtaking wedding
review: overall a very good destination - you cant go wrong. I personally preferred the overall experience to Jade Mountain. Food was great and I really liked /the Ipad use in the rooms. Great site for snorkelling but mind the visitors from other hotels.

title: Wonderful Holiday family vacation
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We’re happy to know that you enjoyed every aspect of your stay. We are particularly pleased that you appreciated our culinary offerings and the personal touch of technology in your accommodation. I would like to apologize for the crowd that you were faced with at our snorkeling site. We had an unusual influx of cruise ship visitors during the period that you stayed with us. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to your return visit in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Excellent Value  for Luxury
review: I don't believe our wedding would have been half as beautiful or as flawless if it weren't for our incredible wedding coordinator, Marcus Joseph. Everything was arranged perfectly and Marcus worked within our budget to design the perfect wedding. I hope this review reaches him since my husband and I are so thankful for his work in making our wedding better than we even imagined it could be.  Last year, my then fiancé and I visited St Lucia and stayed in a neighboring resort. We visited Jalousie beach for a day of snorkeling and met Marcus while we were walking around Sugar Beach. He took us to all the wedding locations and we fell in love with the gorgeous views from the Sunset Deck, but we thought it would be outside of our price range. After emailing with Marcus later, we…

title: Fantastic location
review: We loved Sugar Beach - our luxury villa was in a cluster up on the hillside away from the heart of the resort, so we had relative peace and tranquility (apart from the construction vehicles heading to the latest development taking place!) with our own oversized plunge pool.  The rooms and bathrooms are beautifully styled and furnished.  Top of our list are the butlers: charming, well informed and very helpful, and the oh-so-welcoming "meet and greet" guys at the main hotel reception. The terrain is very extreme - hence the provision of tuk-tuks to ferry guests around.  The drivers were all very engaging and friendly.  The pool was impressive - very large and well situated.  The sunbeds on the beach were rather block like, but I am guessing this is to stop them blowing over as…

title: Perfect Experience!
review: Good day, Thank you for your positive comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are glad that we were able to provide you with a generally great experience.  Thank you in particular for your comments about the staff at the Bayside and Terrace Restaurants.  We are continuing to review our service standards in these areas to ensure that the same high level of service is provided in all of our restaurants.  We are also pleased to hear that you had the opportunity to experience our top-notch Rainforest Spa. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to your return visit to share firsthand the changes made in light of your concerns. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Best resort ever!
review: From the friendliest, most attentive staff I've ever encountered to the unbelievable vistas, this was the vacation of a lifetime. We stayed in a villa and it was perfect.  A very comfortable bed, private pool, bath, shower, AND outdoor shower will make it hard to leave your room! Seriously, you can shower while looking at a rainbow passing through a mountain!!  But once you do venture out, you can enjoy kayaks, paddle boats, snorkeling, a quick water taxi to Castries, delicious meals, relaxing massage, a complimentary steam room visit, and the beautiful ocean between the Pitons. I couldn't recommend this place highly enough. Special shout-out to Sherman for your friendliness and Adrian for safely driving us to different events and making sure we were taken care of. The staff…

title: Regretfully, only my 3rd visit.
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team, I would like to say how delighted we are that we met and exceeded your high expectations in all areas during your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A viceroy Resort. We are committed to making your holiday experience fulfilling and memorable by providing first class services and amenities, and it is always gratifying to receive reviews such as yours. I will communicate your feedback to the entire team and commend them for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your very valuable feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Excellent Honeymoon/Babymoon
review: Stop thinking about it, and just book it!  You WILL NOT be disappointed.  My wife and I had the best time at Sugar Beach.  There's a ton of things to do, the staff is unbelievably friendly, and the food is excellent.  I can't say enough.    If you have the option, ask to be put in a villa with either Gus or McHaile as your butlers (yes, you read that correctly)!  These two guys made our trip (along with the rest of the staff) truly priceless.  We would go back tomorrow.

title: almost paradise
review: fantastic location between the pitons.great room with amazing view.facilities excellent and clean.diving could be better organised but quite reasonable.great butler who really looked after us.food good but not brilliant.star doorman in the ever cheerful Sherman.we would return

title: Unforgettable honeymoon!
review: Good day,  Thank you for your encouraging comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. On behalf of the entire team, I would like to say how delighted we are that we met and exceeded your expectations in all areas.  We are committed to making your holiday experience fulfilling and memorable by providing first class services and amenities. I am glad that this was the case for you.  Thank you for your glowing comments about Sherman. He  is indeed a valuable member of our team and a clear favorite with guests. Once again, thank you for your valuable feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future Best regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Just lovely!
review: Our stay at Sugar Beach exceeded our expectations!!   Upon our arrival we were taken to our beachfront bungalow which was an upgrade that we very much appreciated! We had booked a luxury villa and were so pleased with our upgrade, it is by far the best spot on the resort!  We were greeted with drinks and champagne by our butlers, Mackenzie and Fabian who were absolutely fantastic!!!    Our bungalow was breathtaking, the room and the view were like nothing we have ever experienced. Paradise! We had our own private front terrace with a plunge pool and a patio on the beach with lounge chairs and a hammock facing the pitons and ocean.  The breathtaking view could be seen from our bed as well as from the whole room. The layout was so well thought out as was everything about the…

title: Visited beach only
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to express your satisfaction about your honeymoon experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted to hear that you were pleased with every aspect of your stay. We strive to serve our guests with the best and highest quality amenities, accommodations, and facilities to ensure a great stay. We will congratulate our team members for adding the special touches to make your honeymoon memorable for all the right reasons.  . Once again, thank you for your glowing comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit in the not too distant future, perhaps even for a first anniversary celebration. Best regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing!
review: We have just come back from a week at Sugar Beach and we loved it. We had a luxury villa which was huge and very comfortable.  There is a choice of two restaurants and several bars and the service was great in them all.  The Bayside restaurant is more relaxed and casual whereas the Great Room is quite formal but the food in both was really good.  The overall quality of the resort is excellent, very well designed and well maintained throughout.  The beach is beautiful.  When we first arrived we were a bit worried about being reliant on the shuttle service but  actually we never waited longer than about a minute so it was fine.  We also walked up the very steep hill to our villa and it only took around 10-15 minutes so if you want exercise that is a perfectly feasible option as…

title: Amazing !!!
review: My husband and I were there for our honeymoon and we can not wait to go back !! We had NO negatives about our experience. Our room was so romantic !! Dark hard wood. White furnishings. Private plunge pool. Private dining area in deck. Huge bathroom with white claw tub. A shower that could fit 10 people. A spacious changing and closet area. Sooo clean !!!  The spa hands down the pretty spa I have ever been to. Each treatment room was hidden in the trees - literally 😊 and the staff working at the spa were fantastic ! As were the staff everywhere in the resort ❤ they were ALL so helpful, respectful, gracious and seemed to really enjoy working at the resort. I truly can not say enough to relay just how incredible the staff were!! Always, always attentive !!!! The fitness area was…

title: Very Impressive
review: Good day, Thank you for your overwhelmingly positive feedback about your honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted that you chose our resort for this special celebration and that we exceeded your expectations in all areas. We take particular pleasure in knowing our team members provided those extra touches that made your stay memorable for all the right reasons. I will be sure to share your comments with our colleagues and tell them to keep up the good work. Once again, thank you for posting your review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Love the beach bar restaurant - coming from our boat anchoring in the bay
review: I am not really a person who generally enjoys vacationing in the Caribbean.  However, Sugar Beach may make me a convert.  Photos are accurate.  Food surprisingly good.  Service very helpful (but I would not expect perfect on an island).  Would go again.

title: Very Nice
review: Good day, Thank you for commenting on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am pleased to hear that we helped to change your perceptions about vacationing in the Caribbean. We set very high standards at Sugar Beach and fully understand the demands of discerning travelers and aim to provide services and amenities to meet their very high expectation.  Once again, thank you for your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Sugar Beach is the definition of paradise and an amazing place for a dream wedding and honeymoon!
review: The setting is a dream! Great ambience to watch the sun set have a nice cocktail and enjoy an informal dinner on the beach! service was a bit slow, but hey, it's vacation time! You can dinghy to the dock. The bay itself is a great spot in between the two pitons! The winds overnight coming down are strong making it not the most comfortable place, but the mooring held :)

title: Paradise!
review: We stayed here for the first half of our honeymoon.  Sugar Beach (used to be Jalousie) is nestled between the two Pitons.  It's gorgeous!  The service is impeccable, with everyone wanting to make sure you're happy.  My favorite spot was by the pool, with the view of the Pitons and the ocean.  Yes, it was expensive, but very much worth it for feeling pampered like that.  We prepaid for breakfast and dinner.  The breakfasts were fantastic.  The dinners were good, but would probably get old if you stayed more than a couple of days.  Also, drinks (even water) were not included with our prepaid meals.  Overall, though I would highly recommend this resort!

title: Words cannot do it justice - "paradise" as close as it gets
review: Good day,  Thank you for commenting on your honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Customer satisfaction is our first priority. We provide quality accommodations, facilities amenities and service to ensure the highest level of satisfaction. Your encouraging comments are greatly appreciated. Once again, thank you for your comments and business and for recommending Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We hope to see you again soon.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: An Idyllic Spot for Our 39th Anniversary
review: Pros: Amazing beach next to the Pitons, excellent food in restaurant, stunning paradise Cons: Pricey, having to leave?  My oh my, some places on this planet are just incredible. Sugar Beach is a beautiful secluded resort that I was invited to visit for part of a day for lunch.  White sands, clear waters, multiple pools, great service, the list goes on and on. It's a temporary paradise. There's nothing bad I could say about this place... except, probably, for the huge price tag that comes with it. But that's the price of luxury.  The food in the restaurant was incredible, certainly the best I ate in St Lucia for the whole week. Local red snapper fillet that was cooked to perfection; melt in the mouth flesh accompanied by pickled slaw and a side of hot sauce. Worked a treat.  This…

title: Didn't stay but visited to go to sugar beach
review: Good day,  Thank you for commenting on your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Knowing that our non-resident guests enjoy our resort and everything that we offer is gratifying. We are pleased that you had the opportunity to experience our facilities and that we exceeded your expectations in every way.  Once again, your positive comments are greatly appreciated. We look forward to your return visit, perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect Resort Holiday
review: We just got back from a 6 day stay at Sugar Beach in Soufriere, St Lucia.  We have traveled around the world and stayed at many beautiful hotels (including but not limited to several Oberois in India and the Banyan Tree in Phuket). We found Sugar Beach to be right up there in terms of location (spectacular), rooms (spacious and beautiful--we had a luxury one bedroom--the view was to die for), food (excellent with nice variety), spa (extraordinary), and service (absolutely first rate).  We were treated like royalty for our entire stay and our anniversary was duly noted.  You get what you pay for and we certainly feel like that was the case.  A special shout out to the entire staff and especially the GM Andre.  We were there during a damaging tropical storm on Christmas Eve.…

title: Stunning
review: The setting of this resort was the most spectacular at the base of the Pitons.  The beach cove was pretty with any water activity available to you.  The pool was lovely and peaceful with great views.  The rooms were pretty but golf shuttle service was annoying.  As anywhere, there was a wide range of service among staff.  Some excellent and friendly, and others fair with no social skills.  Would temper a reference here based on isolated setting.

title: very disappointing, not a five star hotel
review: Good day, Thank you for your generally positive comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay and that the courtesies and services you experienced positively contributed to a relaxing vacation. Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated.  On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Honeymoon Perfection!
review: we were looking forward to a nice break before christmas, having visited st lucia four times before. The hotel was rated as a five star, but was not of 5 start standard. the room we had was a beach bungalow and situation in a lovely location, was very spacious but very poorly maintained. the bath had large chunks out of the sides which caused me to cut myself. the sinked blocked several times and maintenance called, and we had to run the water for 15 to 20 mins before we could get it warm. all this was brought to the attention of the staff, who seemed rather disinterested. the butler(who chained daily) failed to book the restaurants and spas which led to us turning up for bookings never made. we eventually booked everything directly . the free foot spa was not booked by his and…

title: Amazing Sense of Place
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I would like to apologize for the experience that you have described. We have shared your concerns with all the relevant department heads to ensure that the best possible service is always provided to our guests. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to your return visit to share first had the changes made in light of your concerns. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Stunning
review: My wife and I have just returned from our honeymoon at Sugar Beach.  I can say with certainty it was the most beautiful piece of property I’ve ever seen, and it was the perfect place to spend our honeymoon. I spent a considerable amount of time researching honeymoon destinations in the Caribbean.  St. Lucia appealed to me because my wife and I are very active people, and the mountainous terrain would allow us to hike and zip-line.  In determining the specific resort in St. Lucia, I was attracted to Sothern part of the island as that was where most attractions are, like the volcano and the Pitons.  From my research I found that Jade Mountain and Sugar Beach would be our best options, as they both had direct beach access (some resorts do not) and they seemed to cater specifically…

title: Honeymoon
review: What a wonderful honeymoon! Everything was beautiful. The staff was friendly, the views were breathtaking, the food--amazing, the rooms- romantic. A fabulous place. We are excited to go back to Sugar Beach for our Anniversary.

title: Picture Postcard “Paradise” on Earth
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are very pleased that you truly enjoyed everything that we offered and that you would consider a return visit to the resort. Once again thank you for your comments and business. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: If this isn't paradise...
review: Service: Very Good (Best we have found in the Caribbean)  Facilities: Excellent  Feel of Luxury: Excellent (Superior for Caribbean)  Relaxation Factor: Excellent   Food: Well prepared/presented, good variety, very tasty. Buffet with Al a Cart Breakfast very nice!  Location: Picture Postcard “Paradise” on Earth  Beach & Pools: Breathtakingly beautiful location. The pool is right on the beach, calm sea waters and brilliant fast bar service with “EMERGENCY” red flags you can wave should your rum & coke run dry!!   We visited Sugar Beach for 12 nights at the end of November 2013. The resort is very very chilled, even during full occupancy as it was when we travelled, the hotel never at any point, on the beach at the pool in the restaurants or in the gym felt crowded in any way,…

title: Stunning setting
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to write this positive and encouraging review regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We pride our self on delivering the highest level of customer service in every aspect and are delighted when we read reviews such as yours. Your comments about our afternoon tea are well received. We are in the process of reviewing the service provided in that area and bringing the quality of the items served up to our usually high Sugar Beach standards. Once again, thank you for your comments, recommendations and business. We look forward to your return visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Elegant Peace
review: My wife and I had been planning this trip for quite some time as it had been 3 years since our last vacation and it was well overdue, so we needed everything to be perfect.  The first thing I will say is that after asking several local taxi drivers they all seemed to agree that this is the best resort on the island which is unbiased information.  Sugar Beach is about an hour's drive from the airport, if you go by taxi ask the driver to stop at a local shop so that you can have your first local beer "piton". The resort is just beautiful, set in a real calm bay that is between both pitons, rain forest, white sandy beach, clean warm sea water, amazing sunset as it looks to the west...breath taking.  We had the most basic room which was plenty big as it had its own gigantic terrace…

title: Amazing Resort
review: We just returned from a wonderful visit to Sugar Beach.  We were there to attend a wedding.  The resort is beautiful.  It's a truly stunning property.  Our luxury villa was awesome and very, very spacious.  By far the best room I have had the pleasure of staying in on a resort.  The property is very lush and tropical.  The beach was nice.  It's not the nicest beach I've been to (e.g. Aruba, Turks & Caicos, Negril, etc.).  But, the water is crystal clear and we had a great time relaxing on the beach.  The service at the resort was top notch.  Everyone is super friendly and helpful.  They go out of their way to ensure that you are having a good time....everyone from the butlers to the servers at the restaurants and on the beach.  We had Swedish massages at the spa.  It was…

title: Honeymoon
review: Good day,  Thank you commenting on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is satisfying to know that we exceeded your expectations in every way, with the exception of our food and beverage offerings. You may wish to be aware that our Executive Chef Jacques Chretien is in the process of changing the menus across the property and accessing new suppliers to ensure the quality of the produce is always excellent.  We are happy to note that the dinner you had at the wedding reception was exceptional. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Superb hotel , deserving of a ranking as the ultimate resort in st lucia
review: My husband and I stayed here in August of 2012 (not 2013), when it was called Jalousie Plantation, for our honeymoon and it was SPECTACULAR! I have never had such an romantic experience where everyone was so happy to help us in any way. Our personal Butler was the best. He made reservations, recommended day trips and brought soymilk to my room everyday for my coffee! We met Malcolm on the beach and he took us all over the island on his watertaxi. I have never experienced such 10 star service.   My only wish was that when we booked through our travel agent the resort was offering a special for all inclusive food that we decided to pass on (DOH). when we got the the resort, the food and drinks were really expensive. When we talked to the management they would not honor the…

title: Honeymoon in Heaven
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at what was then The Jalousie Plantation. We are happy to hear that you had a spectacular honeymoon and that you appreciated our butler service and everything else that we offered. I am sorry that you felt our food and drinks were expensive. Even now as Sugar Beach, we try to accommodate every budget and to provide options to suit a wide range of guests. We strongly advise our guests to make sure the package they choose meets all of their needs prior to purchasing it.  Sadly, items not included in the package booked will be charged at full price.  Again, I am sorry if that information was not conveyed in a clear manner at the time you booked. While our name has changed, rest assured we still offer the same high level of service and fabulous amenities.  Would like to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the not too distant future to share with you firsthand the improvements that we have made. I am sure you will appreciate these enhancements. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Relaxing holiday in beautiful location with local visits & wildlife
review: This hotel is absolutely superb. Well done to Georg and the rest of the viceroy team for getting so much so right. Location, rooms , service , food , treatments ... It's got it all  and then some more. Okay service can sometimes be slower , but you are on holiday , you do not need to rush, you need to relax , which is exactly what sugar beach is about.  I can honestly say after 25 years of luxury travel this place is in my top 5. The luxury villa blew our minds , view , facilities , size and most of all a beautifully personal butler service , No gimmicks just someone who really wants to make your experience very special .I said I loved reggae , day 2 I get a personally made cd from a driver who is also a DJ , I say I prefer a certain wine , next day it is available for me , I…

title: Great Location and Amazing Views
review: As others have said, the location and views really make Sugar Beach stand out from all of the other resorts. Both the villas and bungalows offer spectacular views and are quite luxurious. The staff was very professional and accommodating. There are plenty of things to do at the resort, but it is also a great place to just get away from everything and enjoy reading a good book with a glass of wine. You can't go wrong staying at this magnificent resort, which offers something for everyone.

title: Pure Paradise
review: Good day,  Thank you for your glowing comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are pleased that we were able to share a wonderful experience with you and that you  enjoyed a relaxing stay. Our team will be delighted with your praise.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to your return visit in the not too distant future.  Regards,   André Boersma	 General Manager

title: Saved the day
review: I have been to many of the islands in the Caribbean and have never been more impressed than when we arrived at Sugar Beach. We were there for 6 days for Honeymoon the first week of November. My husband and I were so amazed we literally started planning a trip back only a few hours after our arrival. There is something surreal about being nestled in the rainforest with views of mountains on either side of you and a cotton candy sunset in front of you.  The service- the people are friendly and genuinely love their island. Everyone from the butlers, the bartenders, the buggie drivers, the spa hosts were so gracious and informative. It seemed like everyone actually enjoyed their jobs and was always smiling.   The food- I might be obsessed with the goat cheese and fruit here.…

title: stunning setting
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased that your expectations were exceeded in all areas and that you had a wonderful time. We will share your glowing comments with the staff to let them know how much you enjoyed everything that we offered as well as the courtesies that were extended. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We would be delighted to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon. Regards,   André Boersma	 General Manager

title: stunning views
review: When our plane was 3 hours late and we were unable to find our accomodations in the dark, the staff at Sugar Beach helped us find suitable accomodations for the night.  While we couldn't stay at Sugar Beach they were able to find us a room at La Haut and got us a good night sleep and a better start to our vacation the next morning.  Thanks to the staff for being so friendly.

title: Must Be Top 10 In The World!
review: Everything about this resort is World Class. It is sandwiched between the UNESCO Vale De Pitons, surrounded by rainforest and has a top notch beach to complete the picture. It takes your breath away every time you step outside your room.   Food and drink is pricey but they throw in lots for your money including tennis, gym, watersports, a butler service, Ipad and free Wifi and best of all friendly staff to cater to your every need.  Book a Sugar Mill room for maximum value and proximity to the best bits of the resort. I promise you will not be disappointed.

title: Stunning scenery and outstanding service
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to write this wonderful review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are so pleased that you truly enjoyed your stay and everything that we offered. The  top-notch services, facilities, amenities, accommodations and quality dining experiences that we offer to our guests definitely put us in a very high position in this industry.  Once again, thank you for your comments and we are looking forward to your return visit.  Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: beautiful wedding
review: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Sugar Beach resort. We were looking for a luxurious, relaxing stay in beautiful surroundings and that is exactly what we got!  The location was stunning - a long white sandy beach nestled between the two breathtaking peaks of the Piton mountains against a backdrop of lush private gardens. The little touches, such as lanterns hanging from the trees, driftwood railings, hammocks and real flame torches/beacons lighting your path down to dinner, made it all the more atmospheric.   We have never been so impressed with the service at a resort. The staff were exceptional and nothing was too much trouble. They managed to balance professionalism and friendliness perfectly and everyone was so lovely to our 20-month old daughter. For example, they gave…

title: Our Honeymoon at Sugar Beach
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are elated to hear that your holiday was near perfect and that the courtesies and services extended by our staff helped to enhance your stay. We are pleased to know that you appreciated the room upgrade.  I would like to apologize for the discomfort caused by the mosquitoes. We do undertake extensive property-wide fogging in an effort to control these pests, but unfortunately, our tropical climate and rainforest surroundings make it difficult to eradicate them completely.  Thank you for your recommendations about the electrical buggies. We have tested these vehicles on our roads, but sadly, they are simply not powerful enough to navigate our mountainous terrain. With that being said, we are continuing to look for ways to enhance our transportation system.  Once again, thank you for your comments, business and recommendations. We are looking forward to your return visit.  Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: Almost paradise
review: We got married at Sugar Beach in July and it was a magical week.  The landscape and views of this resort cannot be matched.  We were welcomed immediately in the reception area.  I think our room wasn't quite ready for us, so we sat down and had a complimentary drink while we waited.  The butlers were everywhere and ready to help you with any request.  We are pretty low maintenance people and keep to ourselves, but the minute we needed something, they were on it.  The food is delicious in every restaurant.  We ate a giant breakfast every morning and didn't even need lunch.  Once we splurged and got lunch on the beach, they bring it right to your lounge chair.  Shantal was our wedding coordinator and she was fabulous and extremely professional.  I didn't want to do any planning or…

title: Stunning!
review: We have just returned from this truly remarkable hotel, on a truly remarkable Island. We spent 5 days at Sugar Beach (previously Jalousie, whose name I love!). Maybe I have not travelled enough or been privileged enough in some peoples experience but Sugar Beach has got to commandeer one of the most outstanding locations for a holiday destination. It is located right between the two Pitons (towering just under 800 m), which are recognised as part of a World Heritage Site in a stunning bay. This is a large resort but you would not know it. It is made up of bungalows and villas set in amongst the lush vegetation, beach front bungalows and accommodation in the Sugar Mill building. We stayed in a room the top floor of the Sugar Mill. Whilst I can imagine the bungalows and villas are…

title: Dream Honeymoon
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to write such an extensive review following your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are very pleased to know that you had a fantastic holiday at our resort and that you enjoyed everything that we offered. Thank you especially for your comments about the menu and your recommendations on how we might improve in this area. Our Executive Chef has taken your comments onboard moving forward and future guests will certainly see more locally inspired dishes and produce featured.  Once again, thank you for your comments and recommendations. We hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the not too distant future.   Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: This place is paradise!!!
review: My husband and I stayed at Sugar Beach for 8 nights to celebrate our honeymoon.  We enjoyed every aspect of this hotel and ever moment of our trip.  The villa's are gorgeous and appointed with everything you would need to bask in luxury.  Our butlers Stephen and Shawn were available for any need we had, from reservations for dinner, to spa appointments.  The people at Sugar Beach make it so special.  We met Lawrencia at the Bayside Bar on our first night on the property. She immediately made us feel at home, and took such great care of us the entire stay.  Staff members like Lawrencia are the reason people will come back time and time again.   We will look forward to our return to Sugar Beach, for years to come.  It is one of the most gorgeous locations in the world, and the…

title: Lovely 10 days
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased to hear that you were satisfied and enjoyed everything that we offered. Our staff will be happy to hear your comments, particularly the individuals mentioned. Once again, thank you for your encouraging review and we are looking forward to your return visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Magical Honeymoon in Paradise!!
review: We just got back from sugar beach and had a wonderful time!  We went to celebrate our 22nd wedding Anniversay and I'm so glad we chose sugar beach.
