We were considering staying at jade mountain but after having gone there for dinner we know we made the right choice.  The staff made us feel so special, especially our butlers Wynel and Anisha!   Don't hesitate to go it's heaven on earth!  Also they upgraded us to a villa that had beautiful views of the sea and the pitons (villa 701).

title: Wonderful holiday: great hotel
review: First the not-so-good points; prices for extra (we had half board) food and drinks were exorbitantly high.  One expects the drinks etc to be a bit pricey, but these prices were eye-wateringlyy high.    But, as you can see from my ratings, it didn't spoil our holiday.  The staff were great, the rooms lovely (fourposter bed and very comfy), butler service a nice touch, the spa very good (very Swiss Family Robinson) and the food was very good.  However, although the food was of a high quality and well presented, the menu might have been improved if there was a bit more choice.  But the 3 restaurants were lovely, as were all the public rooms.  Snorkelling was fab.  We took a boat one day to go snorkelling which was certainly worth the (not so high) price,  Other than that, we stayed…

title: Detailed Review: Sugar Beach a Private Paradise
review: Good day,  Thank you for posting your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is truly satisfying to know that you enjoyed your overall experience at the resort with the exception of the concerns you highlighted about the prices for meals that fell outside the package you opted for. Based on what you have said, it appears that the all-inclusive package might have been a better option for you.  Again, we thank you for your comments and business.  We hope to welcome you back to, Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the not too distant future.  Best Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Wedding in paradise
review: Trip Advisor is the primary resource I use when deciding on a vacation spot, and so in turn I always write very detailed reviews after a vacation to give others the most information possible. Please feel free to send me a private message with any questions, and if you're interested in my previous reviews, they are Excellence Rivera Cancun, Galley Bay Resort - Antigua and Sandals Grande - St. Lucia.  My fiancee and I previously chose to stay at Sandals Grande in St. Lucia because we had a negative stereotype when it comes to family resorts (screaming kids in restaurants, at the beach, etc.), and so the best available adults-only resorts were Sandals Grande and Jade Mountain, and we passed on the latter because we weren't feeling an open-air room for a whole week. But until we met…

title: Left the resort fully chilled.
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write this very useful and extensive review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am pleased to know that you enjoyed your visit and that the courtesies and services you experienced positively contributed to a relaxing vacation. Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated.  On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.  As a repeat guest, we might just be able to help with the rate too!  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Escape to St. Lucia
review: We visited this hotel for my daughter's wedding last week and I have to say it was absolutely stunning. Everything is manicured from the gardens to the dining areas and the rooms were luxurious. The setting at the foot of the Pitons was a perfect romantic backdrop for the wedding photos. I know my daughter and her husband were delighted with the excellent way they were looked after from the moment they arrived as were the wedding guests too. Perfect for honeymooners or couples wishing to be spoiled.

title: Absolutely breathtaking!
review: We booked a week at the Sugar Beach on the advice of a friend!   We stayed in Villa 507!  The villa was beautiful and the sights from our private Infinity pool was unbelievable.  The staff went out of their way to take care of anything we needed and on the second day, all staff was calling us by name.  We had two butlers both were great but Marica was fantastic! When we left at the end of the week  everyone gave us hugs and wished us a safe trip home and said they hoped we will come back soon.  The spa treatments were very relaxing and the dip in the sulphur springs was something else....very hot!  You will not regret a trip to the most beautiful place on earth...St. Lucia. Thank you staff for making our stay, one to remember forever.

title: Lovely views but Disappointing and Overpriced
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to share your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our aim is to provide the best possible service to our guests, with top-notch amenities, facilities, accommodations, great butlers and first class spa treatments,  and it appears that you enjoyed all of these and more during your stay. Our team members will be delighted to hear your feedback. Once again, thank you for your comments. We hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful place
review: Booked this for our honeymoon last month.  We tend to have at least one truly 5 star holiday every year so we are used to visiting top-end hotels around the world.  I will start with the pros: The villa we had was lovely (grand deluxe villa) and nice to have a little plunge pool outside. Nice furnishings inside the villas and no real complaints on that score Staff were friendly and some of them a real credit to the resort. In particular, the buggy drivers, beach bar staff, the French male and female restaurant/bar managers (sorry forgot the names) and reception staff. Stunning views across the sea/pitons and probably the most beautiful views we have had on holiday.  Cons:  I think they are too used to having around 50% of the guests being on honeymoon. I always expected to feel…

title: Snorkel fun
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment about your honeymoon experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We would like to apologize for the disappointments that you have mentioned. I am surprised to hear of the condition of the taxi that collected you from the airport. Clearly it was not the SUV that you had requested and the condition you have described falls well short of the standard we expect from the taxi service we utilize. We do not allow damaged vehicles to transport our guest, and have taken great pains to educate the taxi association about appropriate standards of care.  We will certainly be taking this up with our suppliers and investigating what went wrong on this occasion. Regarding your request for a late checkout, I’m afraid we are not always able to offer a late checkout. Our ability to do so depends on availability of rooms. It can only be guaranteed if guests pay for additional night/day use, so that you can keep the room as long as you wish before departure. If we have room available, we gladly accommodate requests. I am sorry that our culinary offering did not match your expectations and that you thought the food was not special enough. I am certain that our Executive Chef would have worked hard to turn your experience around had you made him aware of how you felt. You may also wish to be aware that  our Executive Chef, Jacques Chretien and his team started implementing new menus in all the restaurants last week, including the Cane Bar where a new Japanese/Asian menu has been introduced. Our guests have been giving us great feedback regarding the changes. Once again, I would like to apologize for the disappointments that you mentioned. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again, and to share firsthand the improvements made in light of your concerns. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Relaxing Paradise
review: We had an excellent stay at Sugar Beach for our honeymoon.  Our one bedroom villa with plunge pool was beautiful with amazing views of the Pitons.  The service was very friendly and helpful.  Food was amazing.  Bed was super comfortable.  The beach was the best and one of the most beautiful settings we found on the island.   The free mango and coconut icees on the beach every morning didn't hurt. The one thing that could be improved was the housekeeping; for a resort this nice, we expected our room to be pristine.  Also, if you drive yourself, the road down to the resort is very steep.  Definitely rent a jeep if you stay here.

title: We are going again next February
review: This resort is incredible.  The kids love the play center, the beach and especially the jeeps that will take you around the resort.  The setting is beautiful.  The beach is a peaceful delight.  The staff are beyond friendly and helpful.  We loved the massages at the spa.  This resort truly is a place to indulge.  You can choose your style of eating, and we have not had one bad meal.  You can spend the day doing nothing or be active and any variety of ways.  We can't wait for our next visit.

title: Amazing getaway in the rainforest
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post this very positive review about your recent family vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It sounds as though your entire family thoroughly enjoyed their time with us and made the most of facilities such as the gorgeous Rainforest Spa and the Sugar Club for children.  We are all thrilled that you plan to come back again next February. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Once again, thank you for your review. Your comments and your business are important to us.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Fantastic resort in a gorgeous paradise
review: Just got back from a stay at Sugar Beach. All around first class from atmosphere to service. Grand luxury villa is an amazing accomodation, love the private plunge pool and the view of the Caribbean sea. The whole staff were extremely hospitable, friendly and wen tthe extra mile for any request. Will definitely return!

title: Beautiful, private, pricey
review: Good Day  Thank you for posting your glowing comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   We are delighted that you enjoyed your Grand Luxury Villa and all of the services and amenities we offer.  Hope to see you again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Excellent Honeymoon Destination
review: We stayed one week at Sugar Beach in July, and now we mark time by how long it's been since we were there! It was our first extended vacation without our young kids!! I'm not sure you could find a more beautiful setting--every view is amazing. The cottages and common buildings are built to the quality of luxury homes and do not obstruct the natural beauty of the rain forest, mountains, and Caribbean. The staff was outstanding. Everyone was so friendly and helpful. Our cottage was in the 300's, and had the perfect view of everything--I sat by my private pool overlooking the Caribbean and the Petit Piton in the midst of a tropical rain forest on a mountain. The cottage was duplex style but we never saw or heard our neighbors. Our patio/pool was semi-private--in view of other…

title: A hidden gem that I can't wait to see again!
review: We stayed in 902 August 9-14 and and were greeted with a special surprise from our butler, McGomery ("Monty"). We quickly learned that Monty was available for any of our needs ranging from making a dinner reservation to packing us a backpack for our Gros Piton hike, which-by the way-is no joke, but is worth the sense of accomplishment you feel if you complete it.    Our room was an upgrade from the Sugar Mill room that we had booked and we were very pleased with it. Every  room has a plunge pool but the 900s cottages seem to get a little more privacy and have beautiful views of the Petit Piton (and the ocean if you stand in the right spot.) Upon arrival, we dipped right into our plunge pool and enjoyed a bottle of champagne and banana chips and took warm showers outside before…

title: Beautiful Location and Rooms - But very pricey resort
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to write this extensive review of your holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am confident that other travelers will find it particularly useful when planning their own visit.  We are delighted that you enjoyed everything the resort had to offer and that you made the most of the location by visiting nearby attractions and restaurants. Certainly, the climb up Gros Piton is a serious challenge but great that you made it to the top!  I am also pleased that Montgomery helped to make your stay extra special. I will be sure to commend him for his exceptional service.  Once again, thank you for this review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Only place to stay in St Lucia
review: I chose this as I love hotels that reflect the local feel and character. This plantation style hotel was wonderful in this regard. The villa was beautiful, tasteful and just what I wanted. High ceilings, wonderfully comfortable four poster bed, private pool outside - I was delighted with it. I loved the main plantation house with its polished wooden floors and beautiful veranda among the tropical gardens. The setting was spectacular. The pitons and the beach are divine. Breakfasts were by the sea and the staff were lovely, gracious and extremely friendly. If your breakfast is included in your rate they will present you with a zero bill, with the sole purpose of leaving a tip which is more reflective of US values than British ones. I did think that the prices for a local rum…

title: Fantastic Honeymoon at Sugar Beach!
review: Good Day,  Thank you for posting your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that you enjoyed your accommodations and our stunning location—both are indeed very special.  Thank you also for your comments about our food and beverage offerings. I am sorry that this was the only aspect of your holiday where we fell short. You may wish to be aware that our Executive chef, Jacques Chretien, is in the process of reviewing all of our menus to improve upon the quality and the variety of dishes on offer. He plans to include more locally inspired option and will be looking closely at price point to ensure we are offering value for money to our guests.   Once again, we appreciate your review. We hope to see you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Second stay - would it be as good as we remembered?
review: First of all, booked through Whatahotel.com for a great rate and customer service. The hotel is unbeleivable, the location incredible, staff super pleasant which extended to everyone outside of the island we met. We were upgraded to a sugar mill superior room which was very adequate for our 5yr old son. Private pool. well stocked and refreshed mini bar. Read comments on the shuttle service. Our experience was pleasant, wait times did not exceed 5 minutes and I've never stayed anywhere where my walk to and from the room was less than that. Drivers were uber nice. Restaurants were very good but pricey. Would suggest to mgmt that if they revised their price points modestly and had more creole items at dinner it would be well received. Bottle of wine was min $70,apps $15 each. Food…

title: Blown away by Sugar Beach
review: I’m not 100% sure what is was that made this an outstanding stay - it could have been the breath taking setting or the exquisite service, or the fantastic food.  Thinking about it, it was all of the above – combined with great facilities, smile after smile from the staff and a villa nestled in the hillside that met our every expectation of a colonial style Caribbean retreat.  Ahead of arriving we were slightly concerned that the hotel was more designed for adults than children but our kids (both under 10) had a fantastic time.  There were enough other kids for them not to be self conscious and for us not to worry that it was our kids who were ruining the ambiance for couples seeking a quieter time.  The fact that the hotel site is so large and the sun loungers both at the beach…

title: Luxury in St. Lucia
review: Good Day,  We would like to thank you for taking the time and making the effort to provide your feedback about your family holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.   I am delighted that you and your children enjoyed your stay with us and that the location, service and activities on offer exceeded your expectations. All of us who work here know what a special place Val des Pitons is and it is always heartening when we meet guests who share the same view.  Once again, thank you for your comments. We welcome the opportunity to serve you again in the not too distant future.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Unique location, great service!
review: Sugar Beach was hands down the nicest resort/hotel/accommodations I've ever experienced. My husband and I both agree that the service was the best thing about the place. That and the absolutely gorgeous land that the resort is set on.   Sugar Beach is actually not a very big beach; it's a bay that is totally secluded from any other resort or civilization. We didn't mind the small beach because of the privacy and the feeling that we were the only ones on the island. The Pitons are literally feet from Sugar Beach and are breathtaking from every spot on the resort.  The pool is fabulous, the food is great (especially breakfast!), the spa was amazing, the luxury is definitely there. The only thing we wished had been different was the expense, but you definitely pay for what you get!…

title: Amazing resort with the best view in St Lucia
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time to post this glowing review on Trip Advisor.   I am delighted that you enjoyed your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and that our superb location and attentive service won you over.  Your comments and your business are greatly appreciated.  We hope to welcome you back soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Relaxing holiday
review: As a little girl, I grew up at Sugar Beach when it was the then 'Jalousie plantation'  in the 1980s (a working plantation). I went to the estate often with my parents and grand parents who were plantation workers there at the time; cleaning the estate and making copra from dried coconuts! I admired being so close to these majestic peaks rising from the deep blue Caribbean waters. Today, visitors can enjoy this great Treasure by staying at the Sugar Beach Resort. The cottages were built between the lush vegetation making it an awesome location for nature lovers. The newly rebuilt cottages look great and although not so close to one another, shuttle bus services are provided at anytime. There are lots of activities for guests to enjoy; including excursions, fitness centre, night…

title: Wow! It really was paradise!
review: We recently had our wedding/elopement at the Sugar Beach resort and were thrilled with the property!  The staff are all so genuinely nice, the remodel they did is gorgeous, and this location was the most beautiful I've ever seen!!!  Don't hesitate - this is where you want to stay, especially if planning a wedding! Marcus arranged our wedding and he absolutely took care of everything, including keeping a nervous, controlling bride calm :).  Planning from afar can be nerve-wracking, but Marcus was so organized, calm, and on top of everything, that I wasn't worried about a thing!  He is definitely doing a job he was made for; he is a romantic, kind, and wise soul! The gym was fantastic, with yoga/pilates on a beautiful deck with the best view on the property - they have free…

title: Excellent vacation spot
review: Good Day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write this glowing review about your wedding celebration and honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  It is always a pleasure to receive reviews such as yours and to hear our team members contributed in such a positive way to ensure your special day was just that.  I certainly share your views about our wedding coordinator Marcus. He was truly born to do the job he is doing and genuinely cares about all of the couples he works with. He will be delighted with your comments.  I will also be sure to commend your butler Anisha for a job well done.  Once again, thank you for your review. We hope to see you again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect Vacation Experience
review: My wife and I stayed at Sugar Beach for our honeymoon in July/August '13.  The staff was very helpful and helped out whenever we needed.  The beach was outstanding, and the beach staff were absolutely great to us and the other couples that we met while there.  I would highly recommend this resort to anyone looking for a great, relaxing vacation spot.

title: Honeymooners a-hoy on the island
review: Good day, Thank you for your wonderful comments. We are pleased to hear that your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort was amazing. We are also glad that you enjoyed our beautiful beach and everything else that we offered. Once again, thank you for staying at our resort and recommending us to your friends and family. We hope to welcome you back in the not too distant future.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Sweet dreams at sugar beach
review: We recently had the pleasure of spending five nights at Sugar Beach for our honeymoon.  We were incredibly impressed by the staff -- this is an excellent team of people who go above and beyond to make your experience as memorable and comfortable as possible.  The service is absolutely perfect and the people are warm and genuine.  The property is stunning -- incredibly maintained and beautiful while still managing to be comfortable and unpretentious.  This could be the best beach in St. Lucia! We had a luxury villa room, which included a plunge pool (I would highly recommend for those hot days).  The room was very private and well-appointed.  I would highly recommend Sugar Beach to anyone who is looking for a relaxing and romantic vacation destination!  We are dying to go back!

title: Great resort on arguably the best location in St. Lucia
review: After careful research, we chose Sugar Beach for our honeymoon.  We stayed for a week in early August 2013.  A key point for us was to have a more boutique and exotic resort instead of a larger, run-of-the-mill type of resort.  Sugar Beach's accomodations were amazing as we stayed in one of their luxury cottages (709) which had lots of space between the sitting area and bedroom.  The outdoor deck was very large and had a private plunge pool and outdoor shower which I preferred to use over the indoor ones due to much stronger water pressure!  This particular cottage had excellent views of both Pitons as well as the ocean, which is not the case for every cottage.  The high points for us was the superb beach area and abundance of lounge chairs/sofas and thatched roofed huts.  Some…

title: Superb property - but a few rough edges
review: Good day,  We are glad that you chose Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort to celebrate your honeymoon. Our aim is to provide our guests with the best possible experience. We are very pleased that you had a great holiday and enjoyed everything that we had to offer. We are delighted that your butlers provided exceptional service and will be sure to commend them for a job well done. In addition to the two main restaurants (the Great Room and the Bayside), we have a number of other dining options on property which you may not have been aware of. We serve lighter fare such as sushi and club sandwiches in the Cane Bar, in-room dining, a private dining experiences including the  Kabe Prive. It is disappointing that you were not informed about the other options available to you. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to your return visit.  Best Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: A superb family holiday will never forget....
review: We stayed for 10 days in August in a very spacious 1 bedroom villa and had an excellent stay overall. Would certainly look at going back. The villa was excellent - v large terrace with pool. Good views. Clean. Lots of space for 2 adults and 2 kids - sofa bed etc. The resport is on the side of a mountain so you need to use shuttle buses / buggies to get to the beach / pool or resturants etc. This sounds like a pain but its v efficient. You normally get a shuttle within 2 minutes of calling and only once or twice did we need to wait for perhaps 5 minutes. Out of circa 50 trips. Its not an issue. The beach is excellent - a little rocky by the sea so a little tricky getting into the water. But overall excellent. Imported white sand rather than local black volcanic sand. Makes it…

title: There is no better place for a destination wedding!
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to comment about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am pleased that on balance, you enjoyed your time with us and that Alex contributed positively to your vacation experience.  I am sorry that our speedboat was unavailable during the time you stayed with us. Although this may be cold comfort to you now, you may be pleased to know that the speedboat has been fixed and is back in operation.   I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the less than ideal experience you have described at the Bayside Bar. Rest assured we will address this concern to ensure that our guest are always treated in the right manner and greeted with a smile and genuine warmth.  I’m afraid we are not always able to offer a late checkout. Our ability to do so depends on availability of rooms. It can only be guaranteed if guests pay for additional night/day use, so that you can keep the room as long as you wish before departure. If we have room available, we gladly accommodate requests. Once again, thank you for your review. Your feedback is important to us. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: our wedding place
review: The location is breathtakingly beautiful and we never tired from the view of the Pitons and the uninterrupted sea view.  Our family of 2 adults and 2 children stayed in a very comfortable 3 bedroom residence which was spacious and had everything you could need.  The outside space, garden, infinity pool and Jacuzzi was well used by us and immaculate.   Linus was our Butler and a fantastic star, nothing was too much trouble, his thoughtfulness and treats he facilitated made us all feel exceptionally spoilt, we very much appreciate the effort he made to ensure our holiday was a good as it possibly could be.  I enjoyed every meal and found the variety, balance and quality of the food very good. The children enjoyed the kids menu and developed their favourite dishes which were…

title: Paradise!!
review: What an amazing place.  My wife and I have traveled many different places in the Caribbean and around the world and have never experienced a place like Sugar Beach.  It was very romantic and the staff was very friendly.  We appreciated Nylah's, at the front desk, willingness to help set up our excursions and make that whole process easier.  Super David was our cab driver and he was amazing.  We requested him several times and we appreciated all his help in making our vacation special.  He was very honest and helpful with suggestions on where we should go and what we should do while we were there.  I would suggest requesting him anytime you need a cab.  Overall the views and service was amazing.  Thank you for making our 15 year anniversary special!!

title: "Top Shelf" Accomodations
review: Good day,  Thank you for your positive comments about your special occasion at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are pleased to hear that your 15th Anniversary was all that you dreamed it would be and that the additional touches added helped to make it memorable for all the right reasons.  I will be sure to pass on your glowing comments to Nylah, who will be praised for her efforts in helping you sort out excursion bookings. We will also thank Super Dave for providing exceptional service to you. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Must be one of the best resorts in the world
review: Surely one of the poshest resorts we have visited.  No detail was over looked.  A personal butler handled every need that could have arisen and we each were given a small pager that was operational over the entire island!  No cell phone was ever necessary. Our bungalow was very spacious, well-appointed, clean and air-conditioned!  The grounds are just spectacular and the view from our private patio/pool area was of BOTH Pitons.  Not to mentioned the ever-enchanting Caribbean Ocean. The Spa is top notch, the food at the resort is probably THE best cuisine we've encountered in all of our many travels.  Again, no detail was over looked.  The dive/snorkel center was first class and the actual diving was excellent.  Probably my favorite of favorites were the plants and bird, of all…

title: Outstanding location a bit let down by a couple of things
review: Good day, Thank you for your valuable comments about your recent stay. We are delighted to know that your vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resorts exceeded your expectations and that our culinary offerings were the best you ever had. Our chefs will be delighted with your feedback. We will commend them for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your glowing review. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful views, stunning location, but not 5*
review: We got married on the beach , everything was fantastic, the staff were great , the food was good (not great and expensive ) but still good.  The rest could not be better , we loved it and I am very happy to recomended it to anybody !

title: Near perfect
review: We went to sugar beach for our honeymoon and had a wonderful time. The resort kept surprising us as we discovered more and more of it. Make sure you book a treatment/massage at the spa (men too!). It isn't just a spa but an entire experience.  My pet hate were the mosquitoes (day and night), although this is obviously not the hotel's fault and just due to the location, I thought maybe the resort could have done a little more to deter them.   The other negative are the golf carts, I realise they are necessary as there is quite a distance between the villas and beach/restaurants but the noise and smell of them, really put me off. I absolutely hate the smell of petrol and the noise they make just ruins the world heritage beauty you are in.

title: Almost perfect
review: Good day,   Thank you for taking the time to share comments about your honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are pleased with your positive comments and thankful for the feedback about the areas that concerned you.  With reference to the mosquitoes, the island’s tropical climate means that we have the perfect habitat for these pests. Sugar Beach does have a very comprehensive pest control program in place, which involves thrice weekly, property-wide fogging and daily spraying of guest accommodations. Unfortunately, some people prove particularly attractive to these creatures and we always advise guests to carry repellant with them to prevent bites.  You may be happy to know that we are currently working with the manufacturers of our shuttles on modifications that will greatly reduce the engine noise these vehicles emit. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused. Thank you once again for your valuable feedback. We are looking forward to your return visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Simply Amazing
review: DISCLAIMER: Don’t be a dummy like me and not arrange for transportation to the hotel. The hotel is about 45-50 minutes away from the airport, and my mother and I had to pay $70 for the ride. Be forewarned.  ROOMS: Wonderful! I recommend a beach-front bungalow as they include a free-standing soaking tub, vanity area, personal outdoor Jacuzzi, large closet, two beach chairs and a hammock. The bed was super comfy. A personal touch that I haven’t seen before was an iPad instead of a hotel information book to book spa appointments, learn about the hotel, plan activities, etc. Just great.   FOOD: The food was disappointing. There are three restaurants and an afternoon tea service. One of them is situated on the beach, which offers lunch and dinner in a casual environment. Breakfast is…

title: Only visited for the day to give us an idea for future stays in St Lucia
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted to know that you had a great stay and you enjoyed everything that we offered with the exception of your disappointments with our food and beverage offerings. Your comments have been communicated to the Director of Food and Beverage/Executive Chef to ensure that our guests are always pleased with our culinary offering. I have also noted your comments about billing in the spa. All services at the hotel, including spa services, carry a compulsory, government implemented 10% service charge, which is divided among all line staff at the hotel. There is an additional line for gratuity where guests can reward their therapist, or other server, for exemplary service. I am sorry this was not explained to you at the time. On behalf of the entire team, thank you once again for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the not too distant future. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Excellent
review: This place is as good as it gets. You know how most places never really quite live up to the expectations that you have before you go? Sugar Beach met and far exceeded all of our expectations. My wife and I had our honeymoon here late last summer, and it was the best week of our lives. The food is excellent, the drinks are excellent, the staff is so friendly and welcoming. We stayed in a luxury villa, and our jaws dropped when we walked in. Our room also came with butler service which was second to none. On our last night, while we were out having dinner, our butler Moses left us quite a surprise. When we returned to the room, the entire villa was decorated in flower petals, and a bottle of champagne was left chilling on ice. This place is simply amazing, and we wouldn't have…

title: A little slice of heaven!
review: Wonderful holiday in a truly stunning destination. We travelled with our two boys age 9 & 11 and chose a superior luxury villa. The journey from the airport was very easy -  only 45 mins and we were driven directly to our villa. We visited the hotel 14 years ago when it was the Jalousie and were delighted to see the improvements, the new villas are really stunning and very comfortable but the lounge area with pull out sofa is very small for two children, so we had a roll away bed put up in the bathroom - which is huge.   The setting is really stunning, lush rainforest and lots of tropical flowers with aqua warm calm seas.  The boys had one of the best holidays ever as they made lots of friends and the kids club staff were incredible. The kids club has a wonderful array of new…

title: Breathtaking and blissful
review: Good day,   Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your recent visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are so happy that you decided to come back after a 14 year absence from what was the Jalousie Plantation.   We are happy that you enjoyed all of the new facilities, amenities and activities we have introduced as part of the transformation of the property. We agree that our luxury villas are truly special and offer very spacious accommodations for families.  Your comments about our restaurant menus are well-received. Our new executive chef, Jacques Chretien and his team are working hard to get new menus and concepts in place that we are confident will delight our guests and certainly help to improve the variety of dishes on offer.  I will be sure to communicate your feedback to the entire team and let them know how much you enjoyed your stay.  Once again, your comments and business have been greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome you back for a third visit.  Best Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Relaxing day at a beautiful beach
review: My husband and I spent some of our honeymoon here in Jul 13 and were completely blown away by this resort. We never wanted to leave.  On arrival we were met at the reception and presented with an ice-cold hand towel and a coconut and rice punch before being taken in one of the many resort shuttles up the steep, steep slopes to our luxury villa (room 902). Here we were met by Peter, one of our 3 butlers who checked us into our room, explained the dining options, the iPad (used instead of a room directory to directly book restaurants, spa treatments or browse the internet) and the resort amenities.  Our room was stunning. All in white (apart from the darkwood floor) with a romantic four poster bed with voile net, a plunge pool, an outdoor shower overlooked only by hummingbirds and…

title: Perfect for seclusion!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are very pleased to hear that you had a great experience and you enjoyed everything that we offered. The staff will be delighted to hear your positive comments.  We will commend them for providing exceptional service. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: HEAVEN ON EARTH
review: So we didn't stay at Sugar Beach but we did visit the beach and dined at the restaurant. Sugar Beach was GORGEOUS! The hotel surprised us so much! We didn't know that you could have such a nice hotel right by the Pitons! The beach was also beautiful! It's secluded so only hotel guest can use it. (if you're from a cruise ship and would like to use a beach, it cost $20 for sun chairs at Sugar beach) You have an amazing view to the Pitons and the water has a really nice temperature! We also had some lunch at the restaurant. The food was alright though it took SO LONG to prepare! But If you'd like to have an afternoon of piece and quiet, go to the Sugar Beach and enjoy the Pitons

title: Perfect paradise except for food
review: We couldn't have been happier with the accommodations and staff at Sugar Beach.  Amazing rooms.  We had a Beach Bungalow and it was phenomenal.  The views were postcard perfect, the butler was very attentive and the way they were prepared for our 7 month old baby was above and beyond.    The biggest disappointment and only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars was the mediocre food.  Selection, quality and taste were all lacking.  Service was great though, other than poolside which was slow and slightly rude.  Also, be very careful about the spa billing.  The spa and staff were one of the best I've ever experienced, however, I was charged for a more expensive massage than the one I was actually given.  I was told it would be fixed and they would call me with a update but they never…

title: Wonderful vacation
review: Good day,  Thank you for your feedback about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am happy to know that we exceeded your expectations in almost all areas and that on balance you had a wonderful time during your stay.  We at Sugar Beach are very passionate and concerned about our guest experiences and therefore strive to ensure that the highest level of service is always provided. It is disappointing to know that you did not enjoy the food. Our food and beverage team works tirelessly to ensure that our guests are satisfied. Had you made us aware of your concerns, I am confident they would have turned your experience around.  I would like to apologize for the discrepancy with the spa billing. We will continue to review our service standards in that area to ensure that bills are always accurately done and promised follow-up is also forthcoming. Your business and your feedback are important to us and we look forward to serving you again in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: A Perfect Holiday at Sugar Beach
review: Just got back from a week at Sugar Beach. Beautiful setting, super-friendly service, great food, lovely, spacious room. Snorkeling is fantastic and free at this UNESCO heritage site. We also loved the fitness center and staff. My only minor complaints: (1) food is fantastic, but menus are limited,so after a week, ceviche-fatigue sets in; (2)summer crowd is lots of families with young kids and younger couples, many honeymooners, so if that is not you, know what to expect; (3) rooms in the same class vary, in terms of view and configuration, so try to make sure you investigate when you book---we changed our room when we got there. We ate at the top restaurant once and thought the menu was not as good as the one at the more casual restaurant by the beach. Only peeve about the beach…

title: An amazing resort and even better villa
review: Good Day, Thank you for your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am pleased   that despite the few concerns you mentioned, you did enjoy your holiday, the stunning villas and food.  I am sorry that the menu seems repetitive. We are currently working on the implementation of new menus for our restaurants. Had you made us aware of how you felt, I am sure our executive chef would have gladly prepared a variety of dishes to your satisfaction.  I am also sorry that the BBQ buffer did not meet your expectations. Thank you once again for your review and we hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in light of your concerns.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: The two weeks we spent at Sugar Beach have been among the most relaxing ones in my life
review: From the complimentary cocktails upon arrival to the unbeatable views of the Pitons, staying at Sugar Beach Resort was simply incredible. The resort, which has the bay all to itself, is one of a kind with a coral reef which you could swim to right off the beach. We loved the fact that in the day the children could go snorkelling or play volleyball on their own whenever they wanted while we could just lie by the beach or pool under the idyllic palm trees. The staff are extremely friendly and kind, particularly in the resort's 'Great Room' restaurant where the food was brilliant. And what was great was that at no point did the resort feel busy even though we were told nearly every room was taken; you could do as much - or as little - as you wanted without ever having to worry. …

title: Stunning location, not incredibly convenient layout
review: For the second half of our honeymoon we traveled to Sugar Beach -- it was our splurge hotel. Everything about the room was stunning. To call it a room, though, it really false advertising, as it was 2000 square feet and free-standing house of its own, complete with walk-in kitchen area, enormous bathroom, full-size swimming pool and two patios. I couldn't hear my husband when he was across the room. It was a little unnecessary and the opposite of cozy, though every inch of the place screamed luxury, which was sort of what we wanted at those prices.  Pros of the room: Decoration was superb. Bathtub was amazing. Bed was incredibly comfortable. View out the window was of BOTH the Pitons. Air conditioning was great.  Cons: It wasn't private. On the deck, you could see many other…

title: A Piece of Paradise
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased to hear that on balance you enjoyed the time you spent with us, with the exception of the few disappointments that you have highlighted.  I am sorry that your accommodation did not afford you the privacy that you were hoping to have. Had you mentioned your concerns to us, we would have done our utmost to find you a villa that better suited your needs and desires.  We are sorry for the inconvenience caused. Delivering a high level of customer service is our main aim. Based on your comments, it appears that you received varying levels of service especially from our front desk agents and butler team. We have shared your concerns with the teams mentioned and will be reviewing our service standards to ensure that we always deliver the best possible service. We understand your comments about the topography of our resort.  This is one of the reasons we have 24-hour shuttle service, transporting guest from one point to another. The shuttles are very fast and convenient. . Pick-ups are usually done within 5 minutes of our drivers receiving a call. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Our best vacation ever
review: My wife and I returned last week from Sugar Beach (she located the property).  I do not usually write reviews but I must say this property ranks among the best we have visited in our world travels!  The beauty of the location, nestled between the landmarks of the country, called "Pitons" (Gros and Petit), or peaks, is breathtaking.  There is much flora and fauna...and mosquitoes---so bring your repellent and an over-the-counter item to squelch the itch should you get one or more bites (and you will).  We were prepared, and actually did not have many.  The waters of the shoreline are crystal clear, warm and calm, though take your beach shoes to wear; there are stones and pebbles at water's edge which cannot be avoided.  But besides the natural beauty, the accommodations ( we…

title: Amazing holiday/Wedding/ Homeymoon
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your 43rd Anniversary stay at sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy that you had a wonderful holiday with the exception of the disappointment that you have highlighted. I am sorry about the slip-up on the corkage fee but happy it was quickly rectified when we realized our mistake. I will be sure to share your glowing comments with Tyson and the rest of the team. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect Honeymoon
review: My wife and I had been to Sugar Beach St. Lucia 15 years ago when it was the Hilton Jalousie Plantation. This has been the vacation of a lifetime, and one that all others failed to compare to. In July 2013, my wife and I went back to the Viceroy Sugar Beach with our 23 year old, and our 15 year old sons.   Let me tell you, the Viceroy Sugar Beach is 5 times better than it used to be, and sets an unbeleivable standard for any future vacations to come!  You won't find a more genuine and good natured people than the St. Lucian's, and they are so warm and friendly to tourists... I have traveled the world and it is not always that way. My whole family felt as though we were staying with close family members.  The Sugar Beach property has been far elevated from what it once was and it…

title: Amazing end to our Honeymoon
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach for 7 nights on the second half of our Honeymoon, after a hectic week in the States.  What an amazing place! We were collected from the airport by private transfer and our driver filled us in on the highlights of the island and pointed out the various sights that we were driving past. When we arrived at the resort the staff greeted us warmly and we were whisked inside to check in (with cocktails!) before being driven down to our beachfront bungalow.  As we approached the Pitons came into view...wow! The bungalow was incredible and right on the beach.  It had both indoor and outdoor showers, a private patio with hot tub and french doors from the bedroom looking right onto the beacn, complete with our own hammock and sun loungers and a little table and…

title: Great honeymoon location!
review: Good day, Thank you for your wonderful comments following your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted that the high quality and level of service that you received from arrival to departure exceeded your expectations in all areas. The beachfront bungalows are stunning accommodations in an amazing location right on the white sand of Sugar Beach. They are also extremely convenient for those who want to be closer to the main facilities and walking distance to the restaurants and spa. We are very glad that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you in particular for your comments about our food and beverage offerings. The culinary team will really appreciate your positive feedback. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We are looking forward to your return visit in the not too distant future, perhaps for your first anniversary. Regards,    André Boersma General Manager

title: A Perfect End to our Honeymoon.
review: We loved everything about Sugar Beach. We were taken directly to our room by  cab from the airport where we were met by our butler and his assistant with two rum drinks for us. Talk about a nice touch!  The staff was exceptional, from the butlers and maids to the waiters and waitresses to the shuttle drivers. All were friendly, helpful and very capable. They clearly had received excellent training. A special word about Titus, the tennis pro, at Sugar Beach. My wife and I hadn't played tennis in over 3 years but at the end of the week, we could definitely hold our own on the courts. Titus has a great personality, yet was serious about improving our games.  The Spa at Sugar Beach is magnificent and maybe the nicest we have ever seen. You feel like you are in the middle of the rain…

title: A lovely relaxing stay
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment about your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted to hear that the time you spent at our resort was amazing and that you enjoyed everything we offered.  I would like to apologize for the inconsistencies that you experience with the internet connection in your villa. We are working closely with the service provider in an effort to make this important amenity more reliable for our guests wherever they log on.  In addition, I am sorry that you found the menus in our restaurants repetitive during your longer stay.    If we had been aware of your concerns during your stay, I am confident that our executive chef would have prepared other dishes to your satisfaction. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: On the brink of being exceptional in every way!
review: My husband and I stayed at Sugar Beach for two nights at the end of our seven night honeymoon. We stayed in a luxury cottage for both nights.  We originally booked Crystals in Soufriere (a local bed and breakfast) for seven nights. After 5 nights, we decided to try and move to a more luxurious place with a nice beach. Crystals has some issues with noise and construction. To say the least, we wanted to be pampered.  After eating dinner in the area, we made our way down to Sugar Beach in our rental car on a whim. We were hoping that they would have a last minute cancellation and...THEY DID! We got a last minute deal on a luxury cottage and went back to our B&B so excited to spend 2 nights at Sugar Beach.  From the moment we checked in our experience was absolutely amazing. We were…

title: Amazing
review: this is truly an amazing hotel, we stayed here in June 2011 so it was a while back but still it was incredible and the best location in St Lucia, since then i have visited the WindJammer Landings and there is no doubt this hotel is better.

title: Amazing
review: Good day,  Thank you for your positive comments about your stay at what was then The Jalousie Plantation. As you can imagine, a lot has changed since 2011 and we would welcome the opportunity to share an even better Sugar Beach experience with you.   Of course, the stellar location right between the Pitons is one thing that hasn’t changed and continues to impress returning visitors and first time guests.  Once again, thank you for your positive comments. We look forward to your return visit to see firsthand all of the new accommodations and amenities we offer.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: No words fit for how great this Resort is!
review: We just returned from our honeymoon at Sugar Beach and we are still talking about all the wonderful people we met.  Our butler's Montgomery (Monte) and Dwight, the shuttle drivers (Terry and John) and one of the restaurant managers (Ernie).  The fact I knew and remembered these names is a testament to the level of service we experienced during our stay. We loved our room (900's) and the whole property is just gorgeous. The only wish is that they played some music at the pool and/or beach.  We wanted it to be peaceful and quiet but having some light Reggae or Calypso would have been a really nice touch without going overboard.  I would highly recommend that you book your stay at Sugar Beach. Also ask for Miles Taxi Service. 758-717-1820 germs_3@hotmail.com.  Miles was an amazing…

title: Perfection
review: Good day, On behalf of the entire team, I would like say how happy we are that you enjoyed your honeymoon with us, and thank you for providing us with your feedback. We are gratified that the individuals mentioned made your honeymoon stay extra special and that you were pleased with the services they provided. We will praise them for a job well done. Thank you for your comments, recommendations and business. We hope to see you again soon.  André Boersma General Manager

title: Simply wonderful
review: Its taken my wife and I to write this review. We were married in February, and honeymooned here. From the moment we checked in our stay was off the charts. We were upgraded bc of construction and could not believe the house! Every morning i woke to local fishermen casting out their nets. Each day was better and better. Service was unbelievable, the sights spoke for themselves. I think the most enjoyable thing for my wife and I was, we took a water taxi to the capital. We were treated as friends and not tourists. Everyday after the taxi right, the boat drivers came and talked with us on the beach. Felt like we had been friends for years! We are planning to return in 2014, We could only hope that Linus would be there. He answered every call, and the smallest demand was met. If the…

title: Stunning location...5 star service.
review: This resort has an amazing location.  Situated on a beach between the Twin Pitons, it is one of the most beautiful places my partner and I have ever been.  The visuals are stunning from every angle, and the gorgeous, immaculate landscaping only enhances the effect.  The ocean, the mountains and the rain forest truly create a surreal environment.  We stayed in a Luxury Cottage (305) and loved it.  The view of the sea and the Piton was breathtaking.  The beds were uber comfortable, bathrooms luxurious, products top notch, and the AC excellent.  The Nepresso machine was appreciated.  There is complimentary water and Piton beer (loved it).  And the plunge pool was so refreshing.    The pool was where we spent most days, and I'm still there in my dreams.  Pitons, palm trees and rum…

title: Too expensive for average food
review: Good day,  Thank you for your positive comments and feedback.  We are pleased that you enjoyed everything that we offered at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our aim is to provide our guests with top-notch amenities, accommodation, facilities and service to ensure a comfortable and memorable stay.  Our staff will be delighted with your comments, especially those you have highlighted. I will be sure to thank them for providing the extra care and attention that helped to enhance your time at the resort.    We know how important it is to provide our guests with great food and a variety of dining options. Our culinary team will be very happy to hear that you enjoyed their offerings in all of our restaurants.  Once again, thank you for your wonderful comments. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful Resort and Lovely Stay
review: We travel to exotic beaches often. Sugar Beach is serene and beautiful. The floor of our bungalow was concrete, not patterned concrete, very bizarre for a luxury property.  You are quite locked in at this location. Very small beach.  The food was only mediocre. And, this property is in a rain forest so there are mosquitoes. Very over priced.

title: Fabulous Resort!
review: Good day,  Thank you for your comments following your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am sorry that it appears you had a less than perfect stay with us and that the design of our luxury beachfront bungalows did not meet your expectations.  We chose to have poured concrete floors in the bungalows, as opposed to the hardwood floors we have in the villas, as we wanted a robust surface that would not be damaged by tracked in sand, especially as these accommodations are literally just steps from the water’s edge.  Our culinary team works hard to present our guests with a range of satisfying menu options. I am sorry that also failed to meet your expectations in this area. Had you shared your concerns with our executive chef, I am confident he would have prepared dishes to your satisfaction.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope that you might consider a return visit despite your concerns.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Third trip and hopefully fourth to follow
review: We spent four nights at Sugar Beach recently and loved every second of the stay.  This is a fantastic resort in one of the most beautiful settings we've encountered.    Our General Observations:   This resort is huge.  It's built into the side of a hill, but this isn't any ordinary hill.  It's parked right smack dab in between the Pitons.  It is beautiful.  Back to the size, you will probably need to call for a ride to get around the resort.  An exception to this might be if you stay in one of the beach front bungalows.  All that said we found the shuttle service to be pretty convenient, we never had to wait more than a few minutes.    There is something for everybody.  I saw a fancy restaurant and a casual one.  I saw a casual bar and a fancy bar.  There are pool tables, and a…

title: wonderful holiday
review: We just returned from a 6 day stay and found Sugar Beach a fantastic resort. Check in was easy and the butlers had drinks awaiting us on arrival. We had a party of 6 with two villas (one a 2 bead room) both with plunge pools and great views. The service was impeccable with anything you wanted a phone call away. My daughter and her boyfriend were with us and we had a very pleasant surprise on day 2. A proposal so a very special addition to our trip. The drinks and the food were all top notch. We split dinners between the Grand Hall and Beaches and both were excellent. All of the staff we engaged with were very polite, professional and always greeted us with a smile and warm welcome. The carts to and from the villas and pool/beach and dinner were very timely with no excessive…

title: Bayside Restaurant @ A Viceroy Resort
review: Good day,  Thank you for your feedback and comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our management team and staff are committed to ensuring that every holiday is perfect. We are glad that your experience was seamless and that you and your family found Sugar Beach to be among the very best properties you have visited around the world.   We are delighted for your daughter and her fiancé. What a wonderful surprise for all of you, and one which we are thrilled to have been a part of.  Perhaps with such fond memories of Sugar Beach, the happy couple might consider a destination wedding or honeymoon between the Pitons. We would certainly welcome the chance to be part of their special celebration.   Once again, thank you for comments and business. We look forward to serving you and your family again Soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beyond Our Expectations
review: We were wanted to drive to Soufriere to make sure we could get around. We had a tour the next day and didn’t want to get lost. We sorta just landed here and we were hungry. We went to the gate of this resort and asked security if we could go to the restaurant. It felt awkward and they sort of side eyed us.  So they told us to go down the road and park in the visitor parking. Then a shuttle would take us down the restaurant. The restaurant and location itself was beautiful and right off Sugar beach and some nice jazz playing. We had to wait until 6:30 when the restaurant officially opened. So we just walked around the property but then it started to rain so we had to find some cover quickly. When it finally opened up we were asked if we had a reservation…um no…but the restaurant…

title: Superb
review: Good day,  Thank you for your comments about your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am disappointed to hear that your husband felt uncomfortable during his time on the property.  We try our utmost to put all of our guests at ease and I know our team members will be concerned about your comments.  Perhaps we need to refresh our training so that our security, while still present and alert, is not obtrusive and uncomfortable. I will certainly be raising the issue with the management team.  I hope that you will accept our apology and consider a return visit, perhaps as a resident guest next time. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you at our best. .  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Fantastic 4th holiday at Sugar Beach (formerly Jalousie)
review: I could write a typical review by covering the usual topics.  I could talk about all of the amenities of our Luxury Villa number 901 but all of that can be found on their website.  Do I really need to tell you about the free WIFI, fully-stocked mini bar, private plunge pool and butler service?  I could mention all of the spectacular views of the Pitons, the ocean or the white sandy beach but that would just be redundant.  If you are reading this review then it is most likely you already know all of the excellent amenities that Sugar Beach has to offer.  Instead, I will talk about what made Sugar Beach unique for us.  One such feature was the Rainforest Spa and Walk.  It was one of my favorite places on the resort.  I can visit thousands of resorts all over the world with beach…

title: Great location and superb resort
review: Just finished 10 day stay . Check in was direct in villa. Luxury villa was spacious with fabulous views and private pool. We have stayed in some nice places ( Sandy Lane , Carlisle Bay etc) but the villas here are exceptional. You do take pot luck on views but we were lucky. Two children 8 and 6 slept on sofa bed in living room.   Food was very good although a bit more variety would have been nice. All staff very friendly and most efficient by Caribbean standards.   The kids loved the buggies that transport you around the resort but what made the holiday was the kids club( over fours). The two ladies ( Alcee, Sherifa) and Thomas were fantastic. Yes the kids were lucky to make good friends of the same age but even so all three were lovely.  Those staying are either families or…

title: An Incredibly Relaxing, Decadent, and Private Beach Vacation in a Beautiful Location
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment about your recent family vacation at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is gratifying to learn that your overall expectations were exceeded. We are very enthusiastic and passionate about ensuring the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so it is always pleasing when we receive a positive review such as yours.  Our culinary team serves some of the very best food on the island. Had we known of your preferences, would have prepared more dishes to your satisfaction. Our Kids Club team is well trained and highly professional. We are genuinely interested and care about our younger guests and the experiences that are created for them. I am delighted to read that your children made friends and enjoyed the activities organized for them. Thank you once again for your review and we hope to welcome you back soon. Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: Great vacation except the construction
review: My girlfriend and I recently spent a week at the Sugar Beach Resort.  The setting is simply stunning - situated in a secluded rain jungle rising from the beach, between two massive 2,500 peaks (Gros Piton and Petit Piton).  The service was absolutely first class and we loved spending quiet days next to the private pool outside our room, on the large sandy private beach.  The rooms are beautifully appointed and appear to have been recently renovated.  We stayed in room 501, one of the luxury villa rooms with a private plunge pool.  The veranda was spacious, with plenty of outdoor deck space both under a large porch as well as a large open deck.  The villa pools/decks have varying levels of privacy - some can be seen easily from the access roads, and others (like 501) are…

title: Honeymoon Crashers Paradise
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to comment on your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased to hear that we exceeded your expectations and that you particularly enjoyed your Grand Luxury Villa in addition to the services and amenities the resort offers. Once again, thank you for your words of encouragement and we hope to welcome you back in the near future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Unbelievable wedding and vacation!
review: When we arrived at the property, we were given a villa in the 300's.  They were working on villa next door - just painting when we arrived so no big deal.  By the 4h day there we had 20 or more construction workers next door.  At this point, I complained and mgmt did respond and try to make amends.  This is the only reason I am not giving the resort a 5 since we should never have been put in this villa.  Regarding the remainder of the visit, we found the staff very efficient at the bayside, great room, and cane room.  Several comments have been made on trip advisor regarding the food & service - our only complaint would be service at breakfast could be a hit or miss.  We truly enjoyed our meals at Bayside & Great Room.  Our butler, Alex was outstanding - thanks for everything!…

title: Second week of Honeymoon
review: My husband and I just spent 5/19-5/24 at Sugar Beach as part of our honeymoon. We absolutely loved it there. The atmosphere, the room, the beach, pool, Cane Bar, billiards room, and the food were outstanding. Opt for the all inclusive package, its well worth it. If you have a hat, bring it. There are small black birds between the beach and pool that come down and claw at your head (not joking). It doesn't hurt, its just startling. I did not have a hat so I walked around with my hands and/or my beach bag on my head. If you are looking for pampering, rest and relaxation this is the place to go!

title: Amazing resort
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your recent honeymoon Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort With such a stunning location, we are constantly striving to ensure our services, dining experiences and accommodations are just as impressive as the view.  It is pleasing to read that your dining experiences, luxury villa and the services you enjoyed helped to enhance your honeymoon celebration. I am sorry about your close encounter with the birdlife by the pool. May is nesting season and while we try to encourage the birds to nest elsewhere, there are still a few that slip through the net. Luckily, they are only around for a couple of weeks. You may be pleased to know, they have gone already.  Once again, thank you for your very valuable review and we look forward to welcoming you back soon- perhaps even for your next anniversary celebration.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Fabulous way to spend...
review: Just came back from a wonderful stay at the Viceroy.The service was impecable. The grounds are spectacular, the food was very good and the views are breathtaking. Exceeded all expecations. Service in the Caribean can be inconsistent and we found the staff really friendly and well trained. We accidentally left our passports in the safe as we moved to another part of the isaland. Paolo of guest relations personally retrieved them and had a taxi deliver them to us. Really pleased with our stay and will definitely return.

title: Perfect end to vacation
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about the standards and quality of service provided at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. On behalf of the entire team, I would like to say how delighted we are that we met and exceeded your high expectations in all areas. I will communicate your feedback to the entire team, especially Polo, for ensuring that you received your passport safe and on time. I will commend them for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your very valuable feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Anniversary Paradise with a few minor issues
review: our second week on the island of St. Lucia in honour of our 25th May 11th through to the 18th.  The PERFECT place to spend our final week on the island.  OMG!!!  This place was everything I'd hoped it would be and then some!!!    Our Villa # 807 had an amazing view of one of the Pitons and peek a boo views of the ocean "waaaaay down there" It had a lovely plunge pool... which was fairly private and used daily!  No need to heat it as it was refreshingly cool!  We enjoyed our private deck every day for morning coffee (surprisingly good little coffee machine and coffee supply) and afternoons for refreshing cocktails.  We were surprised with a lovely bottle of champagne in honour of our anniversary which was a wonderful gesture.  A fresh fruit platter and plantain chips and dip upon…

title: Excellent stay -- unfortunate close to trip
review: My family stayed at Sugar Beach for a week from 5/12-5/19. The location of Sugar Beach is truly unbelievable set right between the Dos Piton mountains. We were 4 so we stayed in the two bedroom villas in the 700s. The taxi (which you have to arrange on your own) takes you straight to your room which was a pretty neat check-in where you meet your butler you'll have throughout your stay. The two bedroom villas are massive and very comfortably fit a family of four. They are well furnished and have wonderfully comfortable Egyptian cotton sheets. You do need to take a shuttle everywhere (beach, restaurants, bars etc) but they are quite responsive. You CAN walk it and I did from the 700s but its a hike.   We ate at the Bayside restaurant the first night. Its more casual than the great…

title: A honeymoon to remember!
review: Good day, Thank you for your feedback about your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am happy that all of your expectations were exceeded and you had a wonderful time. I am pleased you enjoyed our amenities and accommodations as well as the relaxing and comfortable atmosphere. I am shocked by your report that cash went missing from your villa. This is a rare situation and one which is regarded extremely seriously by the resort. I would like to apologize and reassure you that this matter will be fully investigated and appropriate action taken where required. I would appreciate if you would kindly get in touch with our Guest Relations Manager/Lisa Jones so that she can gather more inform from you to facilitate this investigation  lisa.jones@viceroyhotelsandresorts.com. Once again, we apologize for the inconvenience caused and look forward to hearing from you about this issue Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Michael went over and beyond
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach for our honeymoon for a week in May 2013.  The place is without doubt the most luxurious in which we’ve ever stayed so it was a fitting setting.  So much thought has been put into the landscaping and the look of the place – there’s scarcely anything which doesn’t suggest “paradise”.    We were welcomed by our butler to our cottage with a complimentary bottle of Prosecco, and also a small bottle of rum, some plantain chips and a floral arrangement by the bed.  He explained how everything worked at the resort, and in particular what was covered by our all-inclusive meal plan.  This was very welcome as we’d spent a fair bit extra on this, and we worried about encountering other charges.  All the menus have options marked that aren’t included, although…

title: Everything you need!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your recent honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are committed to making every holiday experience fulfilling and memorable by providing first class services and amenities and I am delighted that we matched and exceeded your expectations in all areas with the exception of the niggles you have pointed out. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused, particularly with the inaccuracies on your bill. We are continuing to review our service standards in that area to ensure that there isn’t a repeat of what you have described. Once again, thank you for your comments, recommendations and business. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: wedding & honeymoon
review: My wife and I are locals (living on the island). We recently got married and wanted to have a ceremony for our family as our original wedding was very quiet. We decided we wanted to do a site inspection at the Sugar Beach, however it was Saturday and no one from the weddings department was available to see us. After pleading over the phone that we only wanted to pick up a few wedding collateral, we were finally instructed to come over for a short visit.  On arrival we were introduced to a Bell Man named Michael. I must say he went over and beyond to ensure that we choose Sugar Beach. He gave us a tour of the property even if we were not interested in purchasing rooms. He contacted other departments to inform them that we were coming over. He drove us thru out the property and…

title: A first class resort
review: My wife and I recently joined a party of friends spending a week at Sugar Beach. The location between the Pitons is extraordinarily beautiful, one of the most spectacular in the Caribbean. We stayed in one of the new Residences, number 112, which has four bedrooms, each of which has its own bathroom and outdoor shower. The house was wonderfully spacious and beautifully decorated with artworks. There’s a big indoor sitting room, well-equipped kitchen, an outdoor sitting room on the pool deck surrounded by flowerbeds,  also a full-size pool, jacuzzi, covered dining area, and barbecue. And loungers by the pool. At the back of the house there’s a garden, with flowers the hummingbirds like, and another covered dining area for breakfast or for shade in the late afternoon. We spent…

title: Private Villas - Not really
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are committed to providing our guests with the highest level of service and it is satisfying to know that you enjoyed our hotel facilities and accommodations. .We agree with you that the new Residences are particularly lovely and your detailed description of the four bedroom property is sure to prove very useful to visitors to this site—especially those with larger families or who like to travel, as you did, with friends.  It is also good to know that you enjoyed balancing a full day of activity with relaxing poolside back at your room. There is certainly plenty to do to keep guests busy and entertained. Thank you once again for your review. We are looking forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the not too distant future.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect Honeymoon Destination
review: I am writing this review as someone who for the last 15 years has only ever stayed in Villa hotels all over the world but mainly the Far East. I booked direct with the Hotel in January and wanted a Superior Villa. I was told I couldn't as there were none available for the period I wanted - 10 days in May so we had a standard villa. I was sent an arrival form to fill in which asked for "other comments and requests" so I put the following  "On Booking I put in a request for as private a room as possible and certainly one that is not overlooked by adjacent rooms." I think that this request is quite clear and not one that could be misinterpreted. I was wrong. On arrival we were shown to room 507. Now all the Villas are in clusters. Those in the cluster higher up the hillside have…

title: Beautiful Location
review: Good day,  Thank you for your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Based on your review, you did not fully enjoy your time at Sugar Beach which is disappointing for both myself and my team members. I can understand your raised eyebrow when you were told at the time of booking a superior luxury villa was not available only to find it then became available at the time of your stay. When it comes to bookings, accommodation availability changes on a daily basis and sometimes changes multiple times on one day. I am happy that your preferred category became available at the time of your stay. We certainly would not deny our guests the room category of their choice if it is available at the time of booking. I am sorry that your first villa did not afford you the privacy you wanted, but delighted we were able to change that experience around.  I am also confused about the information you received concerning our occupancy levels at the time of your stay. We operate at very high occupancies year round—definitely well in excess of the 60% quoted to you. I am sorry you received misleading information.  Your comments about our food and beverage offerings are also disappointing. Our culinary team puts a lot of effort into ensuring that every meal served is to the guest’s satisfaction. You have clearly expressed that this wasn’t the case for you and that the chef removed charges from your bill for food that fell short of your expectations. Apart from the disappointments you have described, I am pleased that on balance you enjoyed your time at the resort and appreciated the warm and caring service you received from our staff.
