Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again so that we can share firsthand the improvements made in light of your concerns.  Best Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Fantastic Time in Paradise!
review: After searching for months, my husband and I picked Sugar Beach as our honeymoon destination.  We have traveled many places, but we both have agreed that Sugar Beach is our new favorite.  We stayed for eight nights, 3 nights in a hillside villa, 5 nights in a beachfront bungalow.  Both locations were magical.  The hillside feels very private and secluded.  We spent all three nights out by the plunge pool taking in the sounds of the rainforest.  The lanterns hung here and there from the trees are a very nice touch.  Very enchanting.  We were so in love with the hillside villa that we called to see if we could stay there for the remainder of our trip.  Unfortunately the villa had already been booked, and we were  promised that we would love our beachfront room.  We did!  We had…

title: Spectacular Family Vacation / Wedding
review: Absolutely fabulous resort - right up there with Four Seasons, Waldorf, etc. In some ways, even nicer. Stayed in May 2013 with my wife and two daughters. We did our best to try everything the resort has to offer - and were pleased the entire time.             Here are some Sugar Beach highlights vis a vis the other properties in the area. 1)  Air conditioning, 2) with AC in the room, no bugs, critters or noise because you can shut the windows and doors as you please, 3) cable TV, property-wide Intranet with no silly access codes, reliable cell signals throughout the property, 4) on-site spa, 5) three restaurants and three bars, 6) awesome beach with a reef right off the beach for snorkeling, 7) complimentary 3 hobie cat Waves, a couple of windsurfers, kayaks, paddle boards and…

title: Amazing
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your views about the standards and quality of service provided at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. On behalf of the entire team, I would like to say how delighted we are that we met and exceeded your expectations in all areas. We are committed to making your holiday experience fulfilling and memorable by providing first class services and amenities. I am especially delighted that your brother’s wedding reception was flawless and you all enjoyed the special touches provided for his special day.  I will communicate your feedback to the entire team and commend them for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your very valuable feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Must be one of the classiest places on the planet
review: This one of the most amazing places I have ever been. Great food drinks and service. The rooms are absolutely amazing and from the minute I arrived I felt like a princes.  You have your own butler as soon as you arrive. My boyfriend and I have very different tastes and we both loved it in every way

title: Hated to leave
review: Good day, Thank you for your wonderful comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.. We are pleased that you had a wonderful time and that you felt welcome from the minute you arrived. I am glad that although you and your boyfriend have different tastes, both of you thoroughly enjoyed everything that we offered. Once again, thank you for your wonderful comments and business. We look forward to your return visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: paradise!!
review: My wife and I returned to Sugar Beach in April to celebrate our first wedding anniversary as we had married there last year. It is simply one of the most stunning places you will ever wish to see. The resort was even better than last year with some subtle changes having been made such as the lobby area and the uniforms the reception and security staff now wear which are very quaint and inkeeping with the heritage of the place, oh and the tuc tucs, they are absolutely awesome to get around in. We were in a luxury villa high up in the hills which was amazing, the villa was spacious, secluded and the view was amazing. Be warned though that the mosquitos will eat you alive! I had 63 bites on one count but then again it is set within lush tropical grounds. Upon our arrival we were…

title: Stunning Resort & Wedding!
review: Loved the Sugar Beach Viceroy!  I was there recently to photograph a destination wedding. It is a breathtaking resort.  The staff did a wonderful job coordinating the wedding day, from the ceremony location to the last dance.  It was a fabulous event and the way the sunset peeks around from the Piton (on the beach at sunset) makes for spectacular photos!  Our villa was also beautiful and our Butler, Montgomery was lovely. Easy property to get-around and Justice Solomon was right at the airport on time to pick us up. Super-nice, too. St. Lucia is a beautiful Island and we can't wait to go back to Sugar Beach.

title: Perfect location. Amazing villas. Awful shambles at breakfast!
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing comments about your time at Sugar Beach, A viceroy Resort.  We are particularly pleased with your observations about how well we coordinated the wedding you were photographing. I trust that the bride and groom and the rest of the wedding party were as satisfied and pleased as you were. We are delighted to know that you had a wonderful time and that the services and activities that you engaged in exceeded your expectations. We will be sure to pass on your feedback to our team and Justice Solomon; they will be pleased with your comments. Once again, thank you for your encouraging comments and we look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A viceroy Resort in the not too distant future. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Has really upped its game
review: We stayed at Sugar Beach at the end of a 10 day holiday in St. Lucia over Easter. Having come from Calabash Cove in the north of the island where we'd had a lovely, relaxing week, we were really looking forward to staying at Sugar Beach for our final 3 nights.  Our expectations were very high (I've been keen to stay here for a few years) as we knew it was in a magical position, perched between the Pitons. In many ways, we were not disappointed. Its overall location and the standard of the villas were incredible. However, I would not rate this hotel as excellent for a number of reasons..  Firstly, while the overall quality of the food was excellent, breakfast was not the relaxing start to the day we had hoped for! During peak times, The Terrace restaurant is far too small to cope…

title: Almost perfect
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your feedback about your recent holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sorry that we did not live up to your expectations and that you had a less than ideal end to your St Lucia vacation—especially as you had been looking forward to staying with us for the first time.   As you point out, the location of the resort is magical and our accommodations are lovely, but we should not let our guests down with less than acceptable, inattentive service. We have been working hard to raise our game particularly in the area of food and beverage service, and especially at The Terrace breakfast restaurant and The Bayside. Obviously, we still have work to do and will continue our training efforts and strive for continuous improvement. Once again, thank you for your review. We hope that you will consider a return visit so that we might have the opportunity to serve you at our best.. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing resort!
review: With most of the revamp of this hotel done it is really starting to sparkle.  We visited for lunch and had a great day.  The food was good, though the wine is still very expensive.  The staff were very friendly and helpful, which again was an improvement over some previous visits. The whole resort look great and you feel it lives up to its location.  Even if you are not staying here, treat yourself to a lunch or at least a cocktail!

title: Sophisticated Caribbean
review: Enjoyed our stay here, room was lovely and pool is georgeous. This is a family resort and we were prepared for this but I do wish parents deterred their children from treating restaurants as a playground, running between tables. We had a very good meal in the main restaurant but the highly priced beach barbeque is to be avoided. My piece of kingfish was precooked and reheated on the barbeque so was cold and overcooked, the terrines of beans, fish stews and veg were uninspiring. Another word of caution, we were told the hotel trip to Castries was unavailable for just two people so we were offered a water taxi ( we suspect this was a dodgy arrangement). We were soaked through in the rain and on reflection I doubt whether the boat had any safety gear on board like radio, flares or…

title: Family paradise in St Lucia
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback following your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are sorry for the less than ideal experiences that you have described.  We always try our best to deliver the best possible service to our guests and guide them when making decisions about tours and island transport to avoid disappointments. We do not operate a water taxi service ourselves, but do have a rota of boat operators on standby who can provide this service with no profit to the hotel. You may wish to be aware that we only licensed and registered water taxi drivers are included on this rota. All of their craft are equipped with the required safety equipment including lifejackets and flares.  Once again, thank you for your business and comments. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again so you can experience firsthand the improvements made in light of your concerns. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Family friendly
review: We have just spent a lovely week at the new Sugar Beach resort in St Lucia.  Our high expectations were exceeded at every turn.  It took us 40 mins from the airport to get there, and the loveliest parts of this wonderful island were on our doorstep.  The staff (Linus especially) could not have been more friendly or efficient.  The new pool by the beach is great for the kids and the meals in the Great house and down on the beach were first class.  We had the advantage of being alongside a very superior hotel, whilst having the privacy and space that comes from having your own house and pool to relax in.          Residence 112 has four bedrooms, finished to the highest quality, two doubles and two queens (or singles) so really flexible for a large family or two families.  The…

title: St Lucia Luxury
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach. We aspire to provide our guests with unsurpassed service and it brings me great delight to know that your high expectations were exceeded.  We are glad that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay and everything that we offered. The new Residences are a wonderful addition to our inventory and we trust that larger families or friends travelling together will find them just as spacious, comfortable and inviting as you did.  Our team will be very pleased with your feedback, especially Linus. We will congratulate them for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your comments. We would be delighted to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort soon.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Between the pitons...
review: Very baby friendly - have all the gear and very helpful in advance to ensure everything was there when we arrived.  Beautiful location and the beach is the best in St Lucia.  Rooms are really nice - big and well decorated.  Food was generally good to v good.  However service was patchy - some people were lovely and very helpful. But others bordered on hostile which given the price left a bad taste in the mouth.

title: Great hotel, potentially excellent.
review: This is a fabulous hotel, superb location, stunning facilities, friendly staff.  The only area needing attention is the occasional lapse in service though this could so easily be remedied.  The drivers ferrying guests up and down the hill to their villas are unfailingly cheerful, patient and polite. Waiting staff in restaurants were also mostly efficient, courteous and accommodating of special requests, though food and drink at the resort is expensive (breakfast a great treat). The flaws mainly appear in the service offered by the butler service, which was sometimes slow and lacksadaisical, so much so that on occasions, we resorted to dealing directly with the reception/concierge.  Villas are beautifully designed though pressure and temperature of showers tend to be…

title: Awesome Resort!
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate your positive feedback as well as your comments about the areas that caused some concern for you.  I am disappointed that the butlers did not deliver exceptional service. We are continuing our  training efforts  to improve service standards in that area to ensure that the best possible service is delivered to our guests at all times. We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We are delighted that on balance you enjoyed your time at the resort in spite of the glitches that you encountered. Once again, thank you for your business and comments and we look forwards to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Lap of luxury!
review: We had a wonderful vacation to Sugar Beach Resort for Spring Vacation with teenagers.  The resort is breathtaking between the Pitons!  We had beautiful beach bungalow's-fabulous rooms overlooking the beach with hammocks and sun loungers.  We also had a private courtyard with outdoor shower and jacuzzi overlooking the beach.  Our butler, Markenzie, made our trip great with help getting reservations, boat trip and lots of things throughout our stay. He went out of his way to make our trip fantastic.  The beach is great with lots of water sports to keep you occupied.  Our teens enjoyed all of the activities offered and the great snorkeling right off the beach.  The pool is big and beautiful. The spa is out of this word-a rainforest with palapa's.    The dining venues are very…

title: The Most Perfect Honeymoon Ever!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are always pleased to hear positive comments from our guests.  Our aim is to deliver the best possible service and we are glad that you fully enjoyed your time with us. The staff will be delighted with your feedback, especially Mackenzie. We create activities programs that we know families will enjoy and I am pleased that your teenagers really enjoyed the activities that we offered.  Once again, thank you for your comments and  business, and for recommending our resort to other travelers. We hope to welcome you back soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: FABULOUS, beach is awesome, service a little on the slow side
review: We stayed here last September, and although the review is a little late I really wanted to write about our wonderful stay at this resort. From the time of booking onwards, nothing seemed too much trouble. The resort helped us to arrange our transfer and from arrival onwards, everything was hassle-free, as a holiday should be! The location is stunning, between the famous twin peaks of St Lucia, with a beautiful beach. We had originally booked the luxury guest rooms, but due to work on the swimming pool (which is located near to these rooms) we were upgraded to a villa, and my goodness it was beautiful! We had a decking and a small pool on our own terrace, and the room was immaculate, with scattered petals on the bed to welcome us. Incredibly spacious accommodation, a fabulously…

title: Outstanding Service and Great Location
review: Airport Arrival:  Long line for customs/immigration but went fast.  15 minutes because we were one of the first to get off the plane (seating tip – get a seat towards the front of the plane if you want to get through customs/immigration quickly).   We exchanged some USD for the Eastern Caribbean dollar (just past customs/immigration to the right).  Exchange rate was $1 to EC 2.67.  Wished I would have got more 5’s and 10’s for tipping (on the beach, for odds and ends here and there).  Transfer:  Had a private car from St. Lucia Reps.  Lenny (a subcontractor) was great. We also used him for other trips during our stay.  Here is his number (758) 719-3639.  We stopped at a grocery in Vieux Fort for a couple bottles of wine, some rum, beer and a few snacks.  Glad we did.  The beer…

title: Beautiful Resort
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write this very useful and extensive review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am pleased to know that you enjoyed your visit and that the courtesies and services you experienced positively contributed to a relaxing vacation. The team will be pleased with your comments. We will congratulate them for a job well done. I would like to apologize for the billing error; however glad that is was quickly resolved when you raised the concern. Once again, we truly appreciate your feedback and thank you for considering a return visit in February 2014. We will be delighted to see you again. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: The Caribbean at it's very best! Please read on as some very useful tips to make your stay more fabulous!
review: My husband and I spent 5 nights at Sugar Beach in March.  We decided on Sugar Beach because we wanted an upscale resort with direct access to the beach in Soufriere.  The location of the hotel is absolutely stunning and the beach definitely lives up to its reputation.    The drive to the resort took about 45 minutes from the airport and was a very scenic ride.  We had originally reserved a Sugar Mill Room because being close to the beach and the restaurants were our top priorities. However, upon arrival, we were taken immediately to Villa 703. We were never actually informed of the room type change and it was not until I inquired with our butler that we learned that we had received an “upgrade.” While most people would probably have been thrilled with the extra space, larger…

title: Service in a Snails pace
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to write this review about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy to hear that on balance you were pleased with our offerings with the exception of  the mishaps you encountered and the dissatisfaction with the room upgrade. I am glad that we were able to accommodate you in the original room category that you booked. Our culinary team work hard to ensure that they create the best dishes. I am glad that you enjoyed breakfast, however disappointed to learn that you did not enjoy your last dinner in the Great Room. Had you made us aware of how you felt, we would have rectified this concern to your satisfaction. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. I would also like to apologize for the poor follow-up from your butler regarding your dinner reservation at Jade Mountain.  We are continuing to review our service standards in the areas that concerned you to ensure that the highest level of service is always delivered to our guests. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Luxury trip worth the money
review: Initially the location: ST LUCIA - a beautiful place, with the happiest, friendliest people I have ever met in the Caribbean, the destination is just magnificent, & the people match it with their genuine warmth. The resort choice: SUGAR BEACH - well it certainly has the WOW factor, amazing villas on a hillside, with the bonus of a magnificent sea view, dotted amongst a lush rainforest - we just loved it!  Your villa & what to expect: our VILLA was incredible; impeccably decorated in cool white with great pictures and flowers everywhere; delicious huge, comfortable bed, surrounded by delicate mosquito netting that made it look so romantic, and if required an enormous television, hidden in a huge white cabinet in the corner of the room, a comfortable chair and footstool beside the…

title: Beautiful place
review: This hotel is truely beautiful and in my opinion the nicest in St Lucia. The service and the manager were very welcoming, however there were a few downsides which we didn't mind too much but others may find annoying.  1. The buggy service to taxi you between room and other facilities is very slow but they did say that they were investing in new vechiles at the time. 2. The food is limited if staying for more than 5 nights and can work expensive. Again they were in process of building a third restaurant. 3. Come night time the place is covered with little frogs which mean that you can't fully enjoy being outside at night time and the sound can prove to be a little annoying. Maybe it was the time of year we went but worth askign about when booking.  This place is ideal for couples…

title: Sensational St. Lucia and Sweet Sugar Beach
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to post your review about Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your holiday with the exception of the concerns that you have highlighted. It is disappointing to learn that you had to wait long for the shuttles.  This is very unusual and a rare concern from our guest. We now have a fleet of brightly coloured tuk-tuks, Polaris jeeps and a few mini-buses ensuring our guests are safely transported around the property. I am surprised to hear that you think that our food options are limited. Our lunch and dinner menus change every two days. We also provide lunch and dinner specials that change daily and incorporate what is fresh in the market that morning.  In addition, a different menu is served at the Cane Bar, in the Bayside Bar and on the beach. Regarding the tiny tree frogs and their noisy nocturnal “singing", the island’s tropical climate makes it  the perfect habitat for these little amphibians. They are not harmful and only stay outside in the bushes. We do keep a supply of earplugs for our more noise sensitive guests, but most people enjoy the night chorus from the rainforest. Thank you once again for your review and we hope to welcome you back to Sugar Beach in the not too distant future. Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: Can't say enough wonderful things!!!
review: We just returned from a week at Sugar Beach.  St. Lucia is breathtaking and Sugar Beach is beautiful. We stayed in Villa 709 we had amazing views and great sunsets.  Anisha was our main Butler and did a fantastic job unpacking for us and making sure we had dinner reservations.  We traveled with our teenage son and daughter.  They loved the snorkeling off the beach at the hotel, sailing, snuba, kayaking and tubing.  Every other day we left the hotel in the am so we could have the afternoon at the beach or our pool villa.  We hiked the Gros Piton with our guide Barney.  It was an amazing hike, but even for fit athlete's it's challenging due to the rocks on the hike and steepness of the 2619 Ft Piton.  Be sure to have a backpack with water.  We also went to La Soufriere Volcano. …

title: A review of two halves
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your vacation experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are passionate about the services that we deliver to our guests and work hard to  ensure that we render the best possible service all the time. The amenities, accommodations, facilities, and experiences that we create for our guests are top-notch and we are glad that you share the same sentiments. We are particularly pleased that you enjoyed our food and beverage offerings. Our beach server Caroline and the culinary team will be delighted with your comments. I will be sure to share your review with them and commend them for a job well done Thank you once again for your comments and business. We hope to you and your family will consider a return visit soon.  Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: Great location , amazing villas
review: I stayed at Sugar Beach on my Honeymoon in June 2012.  My husband and I stayed at Ladera for a few days and then moved down to Sugar beach for a few days as well.  We did a ton of research in St. Lucia before our Honeymoon and had a very difficult time deciding on where to stay.  Let's just say we knew we made the right decision when we showed up to Sugar Beach!  This hotel is absolutely amazing!!  I've described it to friends as it's like living in a pottery barn magazine while your there.  Everything is white and tan and so chic.  The staff is so friendly!  At the beach, you literally just raise a flag and the staff come to you and bring whatever you need.  This beach is really one of the nicest in St. Lucia and it's easy to get to other areas of the island.   This is the…

title: Nothing special
review: Sugar Beach is a generic Caribbean resort with lots of attitude and nothing special to offer. We found the staff to be condescending and unhelpful, especially the maitress d' at the restaurant, who treated paying customers with disdain. Service is exceedingly slow, with more than a half hour passing between order and the arrival of food. The beach area is busy and chaotic. I saw one mom and her child go out on a kayak and struggle badly to return in the wind. To my astonishment, no one at the beach area seemed to notice or care, and they flailed in the waves offshore for a half hour before finally struggling back. The two-star experience here doesn't match the five-star attitude.

title: Stunning property fantastic location and good food
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments. Reviews such as yours help us to improve our service standards and better focus our training efforts in areas where we are falling short. Having said then, it is highly unusual for us to receive reviews such as yours. Our team members are usually very eager to help and fulfill our guests’ needs and requests. I am sorry that they appeared to be condescending and unhelpful. Our water sports team always keeps an eye out for our guests that are on the water having fun. We have a small speedboat on standby for when guests get into challenges swimming too far from shore, or with kayaks or hobiecats. We have had no such reports about guests struggling to get back to shore with no assistance and I am confident that if the guests concerned had been in trouble, they would have expressed their own dissatisfaction with our team. Your comments about our restaurant staff and food and beverage service are well-taken and will be discussed with the relevant department heads with a view to improving standards where required. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. I am sorry that you did not enjoy your time with us. I do hope that you might consider a return visit so that we can share first hand improvements made in the light of your concerns. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Cannot believe how friendly everybody is here!
review: We did the split 5 days at Jade and 5 here - the properties are very different and glad we went to both. One thing to note is that after the 1st week of Feb kids vacations start, and there are a fair amount of young children at the resort. There is plenty for them to do, they do take some of the ambiance away at times. This is nothing to the resort just something to note.  The food is excellent, we had great meals at the Great room and did a beach dinner one night too. Service is also good(though the butlers here have no clue compared to Jade). The facilities are top notch and even though the beach sand is imported we liked it. The spa is a real treasure - do not miss it!  My one complaint and why I gave it 4 vs 5 stars, was that we were moved in the middle of our stay - 1st we…

title: paradise where you can never order the same dish twice
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to comment about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A viceroy Resort. We truly appreciate your glowing feedback about our beautiful location and quality of food in the Great Room restaurant.  We are also glad that on the whole you had a wonderful time with the exception of having to move room half way through your stay. I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the inconvenience caused. Regarding our butler service, this is an area where we are investing more time and effort into training. We understand this is a very important part of our service and we are working hard to ensure our butlers enhance the stays for our guests and that the best possible service is delivered at all times. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope to welcome you back again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Our Perfect Wedding in Paradise
review: We came for a week of rest in what must be one of the world's most beautifully spectacular places. The views on the Piton mountain, the extreme (and genuine) friendliness of all the staff, the spa, the impeccably clean beach as well as all the grills and restaurants made it impossible for us ever to leave the resort and visit the island!  In the end we forced ourselves to get out and visit the area.  We will be back without a doubt!

title: Sugar Beach
review: This is a lovely resort and the service is second to none, nothing is too much trouble for the staff.  The spa is situated in the rainforest and has a delightful ambience. The restaurants are very good, again excellent service.  The private beach is ideal for relaxing and unwinding. Would highly recommend Sugar Beach and would holiday there again..

title: The Best
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share these wonderful comments with us. We are happy to hear that you received the best possible service from our resort and that you were pleased with our facilities, especially the Rainforest Spa. Once again, thank you for your comments. We look forward to welcoming you back. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Sweet Sugar Beach
review: Spent our October honeymoon here. It was unlike any other other vacation in all aspects.  The people and service were amazing. The food was delicious, the natural and decorative views were spectacular.  Although the main pool was under construction while our stay, we really spent most of the time on the beach or in our own plunge pool anyway. The cottage was like a small home and it truly was depressing to leave.  All the little touches made us feel very special and we would spend any extra dime all over again (spa time was irreplaceable).  Going to be hard to go on other vacations after this.  Special thank you to our butler Linus and all of the staff!

title: Sensational Resort
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post your valuable feedback. I am happy that we exceeded your expectations in all areas and you had a wonderful time during your honeymoon. You may wish to be aware that the pool and many other new facilities, such as The Terrace breakfast restaurant, have been opened since your stay in October last year and are getting great reviews from our guests. At Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort we are passionate and concerned about our guest experiences and therefore strive to ensure the highest level of service is always provided. We will pass on your comments to the team and commend them for a job well done. Your business and your feedback are important to us and we look forward to serving you again in the not too distant future—perhaps for an anniversary celebration. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing
review: The refurbishment of this hotel has been done exceptionally well without losing the charm of the old La Jalousie.  Stayed in a cottage which has been kitted out with great flair and taste; loved the amazing bathroom with double showers!  Great to have your own - albeit small - pool.  The food is really very good especially in the Great Room.  Only quibbles are that the service in the breakfast buffet is erratic; this is one area where with the volume of people being serviced they should allocate waiting staff to specific tables, rather than letting it be a free for all.  It means that you might have to ask 2 or 3 staff for something before it is delivered.  I felt that the self service buffet was a little limited and the coffee was terrible!  The beach staff could also do with…

title: A fantastic hotel - only downside too many kids
review: Great resort, , villas beautiful, clean , well maintained. Visitors need to be aware there is a butler service , you contact them to arrange everything, I found this a little intimidating but ours did a very good job and I got used to it. The other thing to be aware of is the shuttle service, it is very convenient, run by beautifully friendly people , who are an asset to the resort, but unless you are in the garden rooms or the beach bungalows, you need to travel in a shuttle to get everywhere, this does make things less spontaneous. We are big walkers but to get to some of the villas ,it is not only a long , very steep walk, but quite dangerous so we didn't do it. The hotel is situated in a beautiful venue  between the pitons, the dive centre is fab, really relaxed but very…

title: Best Vacation Ever
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your comments following your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Comments such as yours allow us to fine-tune the services we offer and to continually improve our guest experiences. I am sorry that you appear to have had challenges booking your desired dining time at the Great Room restaurant. Your comments are highly unusual and it is extremely rare that we are unable to accommodate our guests at the times they request.   I would also like to apologize for the inconsistencies that you experienced with the beach service. We are continuing our training efforts to ensure that there is not a repeat of what you have described and that we can see tenable improvements on the beach and in our restaurants as well. It so happens that your stay coincided with spring break which means we had a larger number of children than usual at the resort. I would like to apologize if this negatively impacted your stay in any way. I am surprised and sorry to hear that you were not made aware of the early evening gathering spots on resort.  The Palm Court Lounge is open from 3pm until 11pm and is the perfect place for afternoon tea or early cocktails. The Bayside bar is open from 7am until 11pm and is a great place to watch the sunset, especially on a Monday when we have our sundown social event.  There is also the Cane Bar, but we find most of our guests prefer the open air ambience of the other venues before dinner and then usually visit the Cane Bar for an after dinner drink. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, a Viceroy Resort in the not too distant future.. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Worth every penny
review: This resort is worth every penny.  The service is impeccable, the food is the best I have ever had, and you cannot beat the scenery nestled in between the Pitons.   We were lucky enough to be upgraded to the Butler Suites, since they were remodeling the pool area when we went.  Our room had an infinity pool, the comfiest bed I have ever spent in , and a claw foot tub.  It was very upscale.

title: An Excellent Hotel
review: Good day, Thank you for posting your overwhelmingly positive comments on TripAdvisor. We are always happy to hear when our guests are pleased with our high level of service and quality offerings in all areas.  We are also pleased to know that you appreciated the room upgrade and that you really enjoyed our amenities. The team will be delighted with your comments. Once again, thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise
review: I cant fault anything. We stayed a Sugar Mill Room which was very good. Made some use of the butler service. In fact we never went to reception until our last day. I took the advice of a previous reviewer and went for the all inclusive option, and am glad I did. The house wines were very good, there were no exclusions on any of the menus. The food was excellent on every occasion. There is a little bit of building work going to build more villas which you can hear on the beach. We stayed for 7 nights and were sorry to leave. The location is brilliant. We didnt use the spa, so cant rate it

title: Dreamy Place to be ...
review: Just returned from a week staying in a Beachfront Bungalow (No 15). This place is paradise, white sandy beach, clear warm sea, deep blue sky, happy birds, beautiful flowers - it's actually intoxicating. Our room was literally right on the beach, with it's own hammock and sunbeds and a wooden terrace with a table and chairs. The room itself was spacious, very white (!) and perfect for this kind of holiday. Housekeeping was efficient and thorough. We lunched on the beach each day and the service was good as was the food - usual beach menu - pizzas, burgers etc. There are two main restaurants, the Bayside and the slightly more formal Great Room. Both offered very good (not quite Michelin Star) food and service. Beware though that wine is fearsomely expensive. There is just one…

title: Spectacular
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to share your comments following your recent stay Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are known for the world-class accommodation, facilities and top-flight service that we deliver to our guests. We are thankful that we had the opportunity to share this experience with you. I am sorry about the minor dissatisfaction that you highlighted. As we have highlighted in other recent reviews, in general, wine prices on the island tend to be higher than those enjoyed by our guests in their home countries. Government imposed import duties and shipping costs for wine add to their overall cost and thus the prices on our wine lists. Regarding service at the Terrace restaurant, we are continuing to review our service standards in that area to ensure that the service provided at breakfast matches the high service standards in our other outlets. Your advice about insect repellent is well received. The island’s tropical climate means that we have the perfect habitat for these pests. Sugar Beach does have a comprehensive pest control program in place which involves fogging the entire property twice a week, and spraying guest accommodations every evening.  Sadly, some guests prove particularly attractive to these creatures and we always advise guests to carry repellant with them to prevent bites.  Thank you once again for your review. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing
review: Everything about this trip for us was perfect. Let's start with the natural beauty of the setting. It's spectacular. Nothing matches this location. A soft white beach nestled between dramatic mountains. The little things that separate this resort from others include its natural beauty, intimate size, calm water, lack of crowds, and lush surroundings. The thatched umbrellas were easy to acquire in the morning. When you turn your back to the Sea, you aren't facing a multi-level hotel building. This really gives the resort a feeling of unique seclusion. This resort is meticulously clean. It is the culmination of little details like no garbage cans in sight that adds to the  wonderful experience. The attendants were terrific. The food was outstanding. The accommodations couldn't be…

title: Beautiful setting!
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing comments about your recent stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I will be sure to share your review with the rest of the team and congratulate them for a job well done—especially Montgomery who clearly provided those extra special touches that enhanced your stay for all the right reasons.  Once again, thank you for taking the time to write this review. We look forward to seeing you again at  Sugar Beach. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: fantastic hotel
review: Just returned from 9 days at this hotel.  Its a fantastic resort with very good service as a whole we stayed in a Grand Luxury Villa in the 800's which is the highest part of the resort.  The butler service was exceptional we didnt take advantage of the unpacking service but every other request we made they met from dinner reservations to arranging a small group of us to go horse riding via water taxi and much more inbetween!  The room itself is fantastic and you have a LOT of space for 2 people the cleaning and turndown service are also exceptional.  All the staff are very friendly and engage in conversations its a very happy place!  Food wise breakfast was quite good but I'd say this was the only time service slipped slightly compared to the other restaurants at the hotel - If…

title: Poor service
review: Don't even bother visiting as a day or evening guest.  This hotel does nor understand hospitality.  Came from hotel Chocolat for the day and landed with a bump!!  Willing to pay 50 dollars each for a sun bed and dine in restaurant but were moved on like second class citizens.

title: Fabulous
review: Good day, I am disappointed to learn of the experience that you have described. This is not the manner in which we treat non-resident guests visiting the resort. We always try to give non-resident guests the same experience as our resident guests but it appears this was not the case on this occasion.  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused to you and the fact you were made to feel unwelcome. We are continuing to review our service standards to ensure what you have described does not happen again.  We would welcome the opportunity to serve you once again to so you can see firsthand the improvements made in light of your concerns.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing in every way
review: We have just returned from Sugar Beach in Feb 2013 and found it fabulous. Wonderful setting, lovely pool and gardens, fantastic beach, great, safe swimming and snorkelling. We stayed in a Sugar Mill villa which was ideal and handy for all restaurants and beach on foot. I would not have wanted a villa where I had to get a buggy all the time. I am shocked with reviews regarding poor service. We found it extremely good in all the restaurants with a very high staff to guest ratio. All the staff were cheerful, smiling and efficient. Very friendly especially if you took an interest in them.  The rainforest spa was very good in a brilliant setting and a superb couples massage finished off with a soak  in an outside thermal pool. There were very few children when we were there and the…

title: Under-managed, under-delivers...
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our aim is to ensure that our guests have the best possible experience and we are pleased to learn that you were satisfied with our services, amenities, activities and everything else that we offered. Our highly trained and professional staff knows how to deliver exceptional service and I am happy to know that you share the same sentiments. Once again, thank you for your comments and thank you for considering a return visit to Sugar Beach. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Falls just a bit short of expectations .
review: I need to address the review by PBH37611.  To even suggest, in such a derogatory tone, that this place compares to a Disney kid resort is reckless at best.  Contrary to the image of a noisy Disney resort overrun with snotty, whining kids, our experience has been dicidedly relaxing in one of the most beautiful natural places on Earth. There is a nice balance between couples and families, and the families have made our stay all the more enjoyable.  The many families we observed on our stay here displayed nothing but the best of human bonding and priceless memories being made.  Everything about the resort was spectacular...the natural surrounds, the accommodations, the food, and most of all the supremely pleasant and friendly staff.  The only place that comes close to comparing to…

title: Awesome beachfront bungalows
review: Just stayed 6 nights in beachfront bungalow #19. Modern room, amenities, and service. The resort is beautiful, the snorkeling lovely, and the water and beach are great.  The food is truly outstanding- especially the local creole dishes- and far out passes typical resort cuisine. Ate in the Great Room twice- and it was wonderful- but the Bayside is just as good. There was not a single dish that wasn't perfectly prepared and seasoned. The local fish selection is so good- whether sushi, curry, ceviche, or grilled- you can't go wrong. The rooms are modern, clean and white. The bungalows on this end are quiet and have a great view (the lower numbers are behind beach palapas and lounge furniture, so the view is obstructed). You have a huge closet, fridge, Nepresso coffee maker and…

title: Better management required!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is clear that your truly enjoyed your beachfront accommodation and the convenience that the location of your bungalow afforded you. Your comments about privacy are well taken and, as you pointed out, we do have plants growing between the bungalows which should afford greater privacy once they have grown up.  We know how important it is for travelers to be able select a meal plan that suits  their needs and therefore provide a number of meal plan options including breakfast  only, Modified American Plan (breakfast and dinner) and All Inclusive. Room service is available with all meal plans, but due to the nature of the property, we do charge a delivery fee. Our staff members  are aware of the importance of delivering outstanding customer service and try their best to ensure their efforts enhance the vacation experience for our guests. I am sorry that your first visit to the spa was not up to our usual high standards. I and happy to note that you were offered another opportunity to experience the spa and that it lived up to and exceeded your expectations. Once again, thank you for your comments, recommendations and business. We are looking forward to your return visit in the not too distant future. Best Regards,  Andre Boersma, General Manager

title: Fabulous hotel
review: We selected this resort because we have a 4 month old baby and we wanted a nice room with a warm plunge pool so the baby could swim with us.  The resort is between the Pitons on the side of a very seep hill, indeed without the shuttles it would be intolerable.  There are a lot of villas in the rain forest well separated by vegetation, in fact too much, so that you miss out on a sea view from most.  This is a shame as that is a joy of holidaying to take in a blue sea! The villa was very nice with a good sized living room, bathroom and walk in shower, the bedroom also good with appropriate TV's etc.  The butler service was good even on West Indian time! This resort is not pushchair friendly, lots of steps, but you can get round most. I was disappointed that the plunge pool was…

title: Almost perfection
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your feedback about your holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We appreciate your positive comments as well as your constructive criticism regarding the areas you felt need improvement.  Unfortunately, not all of our plunge pools have a heater therefore; it is subject to availability and important that this amenity be requested at the time of booking. I understand this was not the case for you. . With that being said, even when requests are not made in advance, we try wherever possible to provide the services and amenities that will enhance guest satisfaction. At the time of your stay, we were operating at full occupancy, which meant we did not have another villa to move you to... Had one been available, we would have been more than happy to honour your request.  I also understand that a senior manager did contact you regarding this issue to let you know that we simply did not have any other accommodations available and to sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused.. I am sorry that our hands were tied on this occasion and the lack of a pool heater prevented you from fully enjoying your villa pool with your baby.  I am also sorry that our food offerings did not meet your expectations. Our executive chef would have been delighted to prepare dishes to your satisfaction had he been aware of the problem. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We hope that you will consider a return visit to Sugar Beach so that we can share firsthand the improvements made in light of your concerns. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Great location, service could be better though.
review: All I can say is that this hotel will always remain in my favorites ! Stunning location ,amazing accommodation and food is lovely . The hotel is absolutely stunning. We stayed in one of the villas and had an amazing time. The beds are amazing and so are the dressing gowns. We will definitely try and go back !

title: A bad start saved by a great staff and great service
review: My family and I recently stayed at one of the private residences at Sugar Beach.  These are privately owned homes built by Sugar Beach whose owners have the resort rent/manage them when they are not in residence.    This is how the stay started badly.     The developer/owner of the resort is actively selling the private residences (there’s a sales office that you will undoubtedly pass in your wanderings around Sugar Beach).  However, rather than build the residences all at once, the developer will only begin construction once they have sold a home.  The upshot of that is for the foreseeable the private residences will be surrounded by ongoing construction.  Something that is not advertised in any way when you make a booking.    Now to be clear, this is not an issue for the…

title: Honeymoon Destination
review: Good day, Thank you for your providing us with your comments regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We would like to apologize for the lapses in service that you experienced. It should not have happened in the first place, however I am delighted to know that the individuals mentioned stepped in and turned your experience around. They will be delighted to hear that you were pleased with their collective efforts and hard work.  We are continuing to review our service standards in all the areas that you have mentioned to ensure that the best possible service is always rendered to our guests. I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for the disruption caused by work being carried out in the area surrounding the Residence that you were staying in. This work was not scheduled and as such, we were unable to discuss the possibilities of disruption prior to your arrival on property and for that I am truly sorry. We continue to work closely with the projects team so that we can be better informed of works that might impact guests in this area. Once again, thank you for your business and your extensive review. We appreciate your feedback as a valuable tool in our efforts towards maintaining the high standards we pride ourselves on. We look forward to your return visit and having the opportunity to welcome you into our villa accommodations next time around. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect!
review: My wife and I returned from our week long stay at Sugar Beach. We absolutely loved this place! I bought the all-inclusive package so our 3 meals and most drinks were "no charge" when we got the bill.  We had a private transport from the airport to the hotel that was setup through barefoot holidays and our driver was very knowledgable about the island and we even had a cooler with a variety of drinks for the trip! Upon arrival, we were greeted by two of the four butlers that were responsible for the 800 level villas. Their names were Jose and Dwight and they greeted us with pina coladas. Awesome first impression if you ask me. Jose showed us around our villa which was amazing! All white everything with dark wood floors really made the villa look like an inviting and surreal…

title: Perfect Honeymoon Spot
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to write and post this very extensive review of  your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted you had a wonderful stay and that you were highly satisfied with our services and everything else you experienced. I am glad that the individuals mentioned positively contributed to your stay. I will be sure to compliment our team members on a job well done. Our spa is truly amazing and I am happy you had the opportunity to enjoy a couple’s massage and the warm mineral watsu pool. I will let your therapist, Danielle, know what a great job she did. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to welcoming you back soon, perhaps for your first anniversary. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise
review: This review was originally posted after our trip in May 2012. It was deleted, along with all the old reviews when the property changed its name in late 2012. Strange to get rid of all the old reviews as it is the same hotel with the same staff and management!  We have just returned from 2 amazing weeks at the Jalousie Plantation.  Although we had booked a Superior Luxury Sugar Mill room we were upgraded to a Luxury Villa in the 500s. We had booked the Sugar Mill Room because we wanted to be close to the pool and beach and not to have to rely on the shuttles. However it took us only minutes to realise how awesome the location of the villa was and after one shuttle ride we realised that there would be no problem with the shuttles, we never waited more than a couple of minutes for…

title: Paradise
review: This was a trip of a life time for my wife and I's 25th wedding anniversary. We researched in great detail throughout the Internet and especially on TripAdvisor of a carribean island to come to and then where to stay.  Soufriere, St. Lucia was perfect for us with access to many activities since we did not want to just sit on the beach for 6 days.  Sugar Beach in Soufriere was perfect for us.  Situated on a white sand beach going back up the hills between the Gros and Petit Piton mountains.  Our villa (300's)  was incredible, with a fantastic view of the ocean and the Petit Piton. We entered a front covered porch with small table and chairs and a couple of lounge chairs with end tables.  Then there was a wonderful stone deck with umbrella and longe chairs with your own wading…

title: Perfect Honeymoon at Sugar Beach!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful comments about Sugar Beach, A  Viceroy Resort. We are glad that you thoroughly enjoyed your 25th wedding anniversary  and happy that you felt you made the right decision in choosing our resort as the destination to celebrate this special occasion. We are known for our quality service, accommodations, facilities and activities. We are pleased that you enjoyed everything that you experienced. Solomon Water Taxi will be delighted with your comments. We will be sure to pass on the feedback. Once again, thank you for your business and review. We look forward to your return visit soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Got married here on 1.11.11
review: We just returned from our 7 night honeymoon at Sugar Beach and were absolutely blown away by the island of St. Lucia, the people, and especially this BEAUTIFUL resort!!! There were a few minor bumps but altogether it was the most perfect honeymoon spot we ever could have imagined.  BEST of this resort: The Jalousie/Sugar beach is the BEST beach on the entire island and the view from the resort is INCREDIBLE...second only to the view from the top of Jade Mountain. The white sand beach here coupled with the blue/green caribbean water is heavenly; all other beaches have the dark volcanic sand, which is cool, but just not as beautiful.   The location is simply amazing; not only are you in between the 2 magnificent pitons, you are also super close to other awesome hotels/resorts…

title: Trompe oeil effect
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your comments and feedback about your honeymoon experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am sure other Trip Advisor readers will find your extensive review useful and informative. We are happy to note that your positive comments far out-weighted the negative and that you had a wonderful stay with us. Our location it indeed world class and we are working hard to ensure the accommodations, service and food and beverage offerings are equal to the view.   I am happy you had the opportunity to experience our stunning Rainforest Spa for yourself. We have some of the very best treatments available delivered by highly qualified and professional therapists.   I would like to apologize for the lapse in service that you experience regarding your dinner reservations at Jade Mountain and having to place the same smoothie order twice. We obviously have some additional training to do in these areas to ensure such lapses do not happen again. Thank you once again for your great comments and business. We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Review of the beach and restaurant by a resident of a nearby hotel
review: Marcus ( our great wedding  planner ) from Sugar beach, in 2011 it was known as the Jalousy Plantation, made all the arrangements for our wedding which was just what we wanted: very private (no guests), very intimate. I do not think commenting on the hotel would add value to it, you have got to go there and see it with your own eyes. Words do falter at times when confronted by the beauty of nature.  Butlers not always at hand. Overall staff professional. Food was dull with little change in menu.

title: Not for Everyone
review: We just returned from a 5 night stay at Sugar Beach.  The resort is nestled between the Pitons in St. Lucia and is about an hours’ drive from the airport.  This resort is for those who want to relax as there is nothing outside of the resort.  The beach is fair but the pool is very attractive and inviting.  Our villa was at the highest point in the resort and having to be shuttled up and down the mountain was a pain.  The villa itself was beautiful with spectacular views of the Pitons and the rainforest.  We had a very clean room and our own private pool. A butler is provided, and he is useless.  I think I saw him twice during our stay - once when we first arrived and another time to refill our coffee.  We had a wonderful young man by the name of Gideon who made us feel welcome -…

title: Construction Alert
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay at Sugar Beach, A viceroy Resort. We are particularly glad that you enjoyed your accommodation and the beautiful setting of the resort.   I am disappointed that your butler failed to enhance your stay and that the best possible level of service was not provided from this particular team. We are continuing to review our service standards with our butlers to ensure that they provide our guests with the best possible service at all times. On a positive note, it is great to hear that Gideon stepped up and provided the special touches that made you feel welcome and appreciated. I will certainly commend him for a job well done. Regarding your comments about the food, I am sorry that our dishes did not suit your palate. If you, had you made us aware of how you felt, I am sure our executive chef would have been more than happy to prepare dishes to your satisfaction. We hope the issues you experienced have not left an indelible mark and that you will consider a return visit at some point in the future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Fabulous resort in a beautiful setting
review: My family and I are currently staying in one of the private residences at Sugar Beach that is managed by the resort.  While I'll write a more detailed review at the end on our trip, I did want to flag anybody thinking of staying at a private residence to be aware that you will be in the midst of a construction zone.  They are building a lot of additional private residences, and they do not alert you to that fact when you are booking.  So as I type this, there is some very loud construction going on literally 50 odd feet from our patio as an excavator is moving large bolders around.  While the view is idyllic, the construction noise totally ruins it.

title: Beautiful location, very relaxing
review: Good day,  We see that you have posted a second review about your stay praising our team for turning around your vacation experience. I know members of the management and butler teams met with you while you were on property so that we could ensure the remainder of your stay was as comfortable and peaceful as possible. From your subsequent review, it seems we were very successful in this regard. My response to your later review covers the points raised in this review. Once again, thank you for your comments and I am happy that you will be returning to stay with us again soon...next time in one of our Grand Luxury Villas. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Beautiful setting and great food
review: We have just spent 9 days at Sugar Beach and we had a fantastic time.  When we arrived we were driven by our (pre-booked private) taxi directly to our room where staff were waiting for us with a cocktail.  This was strange - I have never been able to avoid that queuing up at reception to check in before but it was amazing.  However if, like us, you arrive in the afternoon, I would encourage you to don swimming things and go straight down to the beach.  We crashed out and didn't see the resort in the light until the following morning!  By the end of the holiday every day seems more precious! From one window in our large multi-roomed accommodation we had a view of the Petit Piton and from our balcony (with plunge pool) we could see the sea.   The restaurants were good, although as…

title: Stunning location for lunch
review: We ate here at the Bayside restaurant which is on the sea.  The hotel has several restaurants and bars set in a beautiful location between the Pitons on St Lucia. Take the road south from Soufriere and after passing the Stonefield estate turning take the next turning on the right  signposted Viceroy resort. The road climbs and dips, keep going and eventually comes to a security gate where you need to tell them you are going for lunch. At the next security gate (don't be put off, it truly is worth it) you will park and board a buggy to take you down the last part to the beach.  The restaurant is beautiful, open to the elements so you can see the view. Delicious food, reasonably priced in US dollars, for such a stunning resort  and setting and the service was excellent.  Take your…

title: Wonderful escape from British snow
review: Good day, Thank you for visiting Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are glad that you had the chance to experience our resort and that you enjoyed lunch at the Bayside Restaurant. Our culinary team works hard to ensure that the dishes they prepare are of the highest quality. Once again, thank you for spending the day with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon, perhaps as a resident guest next time around. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Jurassic Park meets Paradise
review: We left the UK as the snow started to fall and arrived in a hot sunny St Lucia. This was our third visit to the Caribbean and definitely the best island and resort we have visited. On arrival we were taken straight to our villa (upgraded from a luxury cottage to a luxury villa) so check in was swift and our Butler gave us a few pointers about the resort. Being active types we immediately set off  to explore the resort "on foot". Whilst the hillside location makes for spectacular views it is very steep so we generally made use of the shuttle after our initial exploration.  Pluses: Well equipped villa Very comfy sun loungers on both the beach and by the pool Great pool with plenty of room to swim Dinner in the Great Room. The menu evolves each day which together with the…

title: Beachside resturant is very good
review: Good day, Thank you for visiting Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are glad that you had the chance to experience our resort and that you enjoyed lunch at the Bayside Restaurant. Our culinary team works hard to ensure that the dishes they prepare are of the highest quality. Once again, thank you for spending the day with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon, perhaps as a resident guest next time around. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise is Found!
review: I stayed at the Sugar Beach right in the middle of its conversion from being the Jalousie Plantation. Unhesitatingly one of the most beautiful accomodations I've ever stayed in.   I originally booked a Sugar Mill room, but they upgraded me to a villa - which was about 2x the size of my apartment! From the gorgeous four-poster bed, to the clawfoot tub, the shower as big as my bathroom, the private and gorgeous deck area with dipping pool, the side room that you could open up to the outdoors - I didn't know what to do with so much space!  Needless to say, the accommodations are outstanding. I have absolutely zero complaints. Everything was impeccable.  The breakfast was also absolutely wonderful, and included in my stay - everything freshly made, everything seemed to be made with…

title: Perfect Wedding, Honeymoon & Holiday.....
review: We spent sometime looking for the right resort in which to get married and we feel very lucky that we chose Sugar Beach.  The location is magical, nestled between the Pitons, and from the moment we arrived we knew that this was the right place for us.  We stayed for 9 nights over Christmas and New Year in one of the Grand Luxury villas in the 500's.  The pullout sofa-bed in the living area and second bathroom was ideal for our 15 year-old daughter - it felt like she had her own suite. On our first morning we were shown around the resort by our wedding planner, Marcus Joseph.  He was amazing throughout our stay!  We must have spent 2-3 hours looking around before choosing the spot where we would hold our wedding a few days later.  Marcus made us feel very special, we never felt…

title: A long overdue review!
review: Good day,  Congratulations on your marriage and thank you for choosing Sugar Beach as the location for exchanging your vows.  We are passionate about delivering the best possible service to our guests and happy to hear that you had no regrets that you had chosen our resort for your special day.  Marcus is truly amazing at what he does and will be delighted to hear your comments.  Weddings are such special occasions and it is always gratifying when we fully meet the high expectations of our wedding couples and help to create memories to last a lifetime.  Once again, thank you for your glowing comments and we look forward to your return visit, perhaps for your first wedding anniversary. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Gorgeous views and friendly people!
review: My husband and I traveled to Sugar Beach in August 2012 to celebrate our 19th anniversary.   We have traveled all over the world & found this resort to be our favorite & the best.  We booked a luxury villa for our stay & Molly Mallone the Marketing Director was kind & generous enough to surprise us with an upgrade to a Grand Luxury Villa for our stay.  Our selected room (in the 900s) was located right in between both Pitons with a private pool & breathtaking view.   I was so taken aback by the beauty & luxury that it actually made me cry--much to my husband's embarrassment!  Jason was our primary butler & was so kind & accommodating.  Nothing was ever too small or large & he & everyone at the resort paid attention to the small details.   We booked a boat trip to shop in Castries…

title: Breathtaking Setting
review: Good day,  Thank you for celebrating your 19th Anniversary at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased that you had a wonderful experience and that you were happy with the high level of service, facilities and accommodation that we provided. I will pass on your glowing comments to the team and congratulate them for making your anniversary celebration a memorable one for all the right reasons. On behalf of the entire team, we are very thankful for your comments and business and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: A beautiful luxurious resort with a gorgeous location. Service is spotty, but everything else is magical.
review: My husband and I visited sugar beach sept 2012 for our honeymoon. I am just getting around to writing this but have wanted to for some time now. The memories are still fresh! Upon arriving down the twisty turning road, we were greeted with a rum punch in the office area. We were brought to our gorgeous villa by the golf cart type vehicle. Which you must take up and down the windy roads on the resort. The cars come right away once you call them on your little walkie talkie device. Overall we had the most fabulous honeymoon and would love to go back sometime which we rarely say. here are some major points about our stay:  Room -  We were pleasantly surprised to be upgraded to a private villa with a plunge pool. We had an amazing view of the petite piton and the sunset. We swam…

title: Simply the best
review: Arriving at 8pm after a very long day travelling from BVI, we were delighted to be warmly greeted at our luxury villa (on the hillside in the 500's) by our butler with a much needed drink. It was great to be able to check in there and then in the villa, where we were shown all the facilities it had to offer (fabulous 4 poster bed, huge bathroom with a double shower, twin sinks & bathtub, dressing area & 'utility' area with coffee machine & fridge, patio with daybed & plunge pool...) before the butler offered to unpack for us! We had dinner in the beachside restaurant before an extremely restful night's sleep.  True, the hillside villas are a distance uphill from the rest of the resort but we rather liked the peace this offered and the views, which were revealed in all their…

title: Beautiful spot... rude water sports staff
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am delighted that you had a wonderful time and that you were pleased with our amenities, accommodations, facilities and amenities. I am sorry you found the price of the Friday night barbeque expensive. We try to provide a wide range of high quality dishes and usually our guests find this themed night good value for money.  Thank you also for your comments about the price of wine. We try to provide wine selections to suit every palate and budget but also have to factor in the cost of shipping these wines to St Lucia, in addition to the taxes and duties we have to pay to bring them to the hotel. We continually review our list to ensure there is a broad and affordable selection. Sadly, we don’t enjoy the same low prices consumers see in the US and UK, simply because of the importation charges and the cost of shipping. I am glad that you were able to engage in activities outside of the resort that positively impacted your stay.  Our concierge and butler teams work hard to identify reputable and fun tour providers and drivers so that we always know our guests are well looked after. Once again, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort as your holiday destination and we look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Will Eagerly Return
review: I have been visiting st Lucia and the pitons for 12 years, normally by boat. This year as with last year we visited the the old jalousie plantation now called 'Sugar Beach (viceroy resort)' for our holiday spa experience. We anchored off the beach in the charted anchorage only to be met by the very rude and aggressive watersports staff member from the resort.  Myself friends and family felt scared so moved away and did not visit the spa. This has always been a beautiful area with friendly locals. I hope this is not the way the Island is changing!. We will not be coming back!!!.  I urge people thinking of going to this area to be careful as this was not a pleasant experience. It seems the local staff here rule the park rangers???.

title: This could be one of the most beautiful hotels in the world if only the service and food were better
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your recent visit to Sugar Beach. I would like to take the opportunity to apologize for the experience that you have described, as this is not our usual standard, especially coming from the water sports team. We have discussed this concern with our water sports team to ensure that non-resident guests are always treated in the best possible manner.  Once again, we apologize for the inconvenience caused and look forward to welcoming you back so that we can share the improvements we have made in light of your concerns. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: One of the most special places in the world, but service could be better
review: We stayed for 9 days at the Jalousie. now Sugar Beach, in late March 2009. At that time, JaLousie was just beginning rennovations for transition to Sugar Beach. My husband and I were amazed at the beauty of the location. The staff were tremendous. I loved the outdoor workout area - I was there every morning, watching local fishermen catch what would be on the menu that night. We found the food to be utterly exquisite. In fact, so pleased were we that when we complimented the chef, he came to meet us. His name was Victor, and he was trained in Guatemala. For the remaining 8 nights, Victor greeted us and would prepare anything that wasn't on the menu. I asked him for mango Mahi-mahi and he created an amazing meal. Seven courses of excellence in the plantation room.  We did an…

title: What a wonderful place, world class
review: My wife and i, spent our delayed (2nd) Honeymoon at whta was then called the Jalouise plantation in November 2012. They were rebranding to Sugar beach whilst we were there. It was world class. We stayed in a beach bungalow which was out of this world. The location was one of the best we have ever stayed and we couldnt have been more relaxed. We looked at otyher resorts in St Lucia and having been there and seen the alternatives, we definatly chose the right place. We ate at the resort every day and the choice of food and variety was amazing. we went alone without our children, but it was very child friendly without being noisy. Tyson was the most amazing butler we have ever experienced, nothing was too much. he was at our beck and call all day long. Georg th eresident manager…

title: Will be excellent when it is finished....
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your honeymoon experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Our guests have made universally positive comments about the décor and setting of our Luxury Beachfront Bungalows. We are happy to hear that you really enjoyed this room category.  Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort caters for all kinds of travelers, especially as our accommodations and  facilities are spread over more than one hundred acres. We know that you travelled without your children this time, but rest assured that should you decide to bring them with you on a future trip, they would thoroughly enjoy our kids club and all of the activities on offer for them. Thank you for your comments about Tyson. He is indeed one of our star team members and is excellent at what he does. Our guests love the manner in which he works. He will be happy to know that you were pleased with the services that he provided. Once again, thank you for your comments and we look forward to sharing the new Sugar Beach experience with you. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Wonderful in every way
review: The hotel is in a fantastic location set on a beautiful bay.  The villas are perched on the hillside behind the bay.  We stayed at the resort in late October / early November and unfortunately the hotel renovations were not finished.  The pool was closed and there was a lot of construction work going on which seriously impacted our enjoyment.  We were upgraded and compensated but all the same we would not have gone if we had been made aware of the extent of the works at the time of booking, or for that matter how intrusive they would be.  There were lorries passing through the resort all day long, noisy works just about everywhere - and this was simply not what we wanted.  We could have lived without the pool but it was at the heart of the resort so having it cordoned off and…

title: Local Experience
review: Good day, Thank you for providing us with your feedback regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. Based on what you have described, I would like to apologize for not providing you with the best possible experience. I am disappointed to hear that at the time you were not informed of the extent of the enhancement work that was taking place on the resort and this impacted your stay. We are truly happy that all of the enhancement works are now complete and have been very well received by our guests. I would welcome the opportunity to share the new Sugar Beach experience with you so you can experience firsthand all of the improvements made.  Regarding your comments about our transportation, we are already working on a plan to ensure that this isn’t an issue anymore. We will be using a different type of transport to move our guests from one point to the other (tuk-tuk style vehicles to be precise) I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused. I am sorry that you did not enjoy the services provided by our butler team and that you found them to be intrusive. They should be on hand to  assist our guests with dinner reservations, spa bookings, tours and excursions, and needs that they may have in the room. We are continuing to review our service standards with the butler team to ensure they are providing the intuitive service required by our guests and not intruding at times which are not appropriate. Once again, thank you for your comments and we look forward to your return visit so that we might have the opportunity to serve you at our best.. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Best resort in St Lucia
