review: This is the second time we have stayed at Sugar Beach.  The first time it was The Jalousie Plantation and the improvements that have occured in the year since our first visit, are vast and Andre (General Manager) and his team should feel very proud of themselves.  The new pool is amazing and really makes the resort.  The rooms as usual, were perfect and the finishing touches were well noted.  We stayed in room 702 and the view was to die for - literally nothing in front but the view of the sea, with the piton mountains 'cuddling' the resort.    The spa was its usual high standards and the treatments of a premuim quality.  The new relaxation area added from last year, was a great improvement and there is nothing better in this world relaxing listening in the waterfall and noises…

title: Completely brilliant hotel and holiday
review: A genuinely great hotel. From the location and the rooms, through the staff and service to the food and the views this is a brilliant place to unwind. We went there with our seven month old baby and a bit worried about how very small kids would be received - but the staff couldn't have been more accommodating. We loved the place and hope to go back before long. The owners should be very proud of what they have created.

title: Bad attitude
review: Good day,  Thank you for your wonderful comments regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  Our aim is to provide the best possible service to all our guests. Our top-notch amenities, facilities and accommodation are all designed to enhance our guest experience. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Once again, thank you for your wonderful comments and we look forward to serving you in the not too distant future.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Fantastic Resort
review: We are guests of the Ladera Resort sitting above the Sugar Beach. We were told that we had some guest privileges at the sugar beach. When we got to the beach we were treated like 2nd class citizens. The sugar beach staff were rude and not helpful.  We later tried to dine at the Great Room at sugar beach. The staff at Ladera tried very hard to get us a reservation and had a lot of trouble.  They finally got a reservation and when we arrived, the staff told us our reservation was at the more casual restaurant. We persisted and had to wait. Once we were seated, they rushed our meal.  We thought that since these hotels are so close to each other that there would be some mutual respect to each other's guests.  We found that Sugar Beach was not a place that we would ever stay at and…

title: Heaven on earth
review: Good day, Thank you for providing us with feedback regarding your visit to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am very disturbed to read your review, as we rarely receive comments that outline the situations you have described. We have a long-standing relationship with Ladera resort and do all we can to make their guests feel welcome and looked after them when they visit our beach and food and beverage outlets. It appears that you did not receive the warm welcome and assistance we are generally known for, and for that I am truly sorry. We will continue to review our service standards with the parties involved to ensure that all guests on our resort, resident or otherwise, enjoy the best service experience possible. Once again, thank you for your comments and we would welcome the opportunity to serve you again so that you could see firsthand that changes made in light of your concerns. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Gorgeous
review: Our recent stay exceeded all of our expectations. The staff was  great and went above and beyond. The beach was the perfect place to relax, catch some rays and enjoy the amazing scenery.  Our villa was very clean and spacious; its deck was the perfect place to watch the sunset each night. We were most impressed with our Butlers who made all of our special requests happen with ease.  This was one of the nicest resorts we've been to and the perfect place for our engagement. We highly recommend Sugar Beach; you will not be disappointed.

title: BEAUTIFUL
review: My husband and I were married here, the resort is fantastic. the staff was spectatular.  The beach was one of the best we saw, while traveling up the coast via water taxi.  snorkeling was supurb.   The one draw back is that the resort is so isolated, and there jsut didnt seem to be a lot to do.  There was a small insident with a charge at the spa, which took some time and quite a bit of frustration to get resolved.  Disappointed on buffet night - was not worth the  $75 for the meal.

title: Beyond my expectations
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments about your wedding stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am glad that you enjoyed our facilities, especially the beach area.  It is puzzling that you think there is not much to do on the resort. We have a number of fitness classes, tours and excursions, motorized and non-motorized water sport activities for our guests to participate in. I am sorry that you felt otherwise. Since your visit in February 2012, we have made major improvements in the selections offered at our Friday BBQ buffet.  We would welcome the opportunity to share these improvements first hand should you decide to make a return visit to the resort, perhaps even for your up-coming first anniversary.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. Best wishes for your up-coming anniversary. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Great hotel with excellent service and high quality food
review: In our opinion the best location in the WEST INDIES,best scenery ever ,gin clear sea excellent for snorkelling and diving,superb accommodation and food.Great staff in particular Bronny in the beach side restaurant.   Mary,T.D

title: Stunning location
review: Good day,  Thank you for your wonderful feedback and compliments.  We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful holiday at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.. I will be sure to share your glowing comments with Bronny. She will be very happy to know she helped to make your stay with us memorable for all the right reasons.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward welcoming you back soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Jalousie!
review: My Wife and I recently managed an eight day holiday at the Jalousie Plantation / Sugar Beach Resort.  We have holidayed many times in the Caribbean over the years, visiting St Lucia (Anse Chastanet the last time), Barbados (Cobblers Cove the last time) and Antigua.   This was the best of the properties we have visited in the Caribbean. We were upgraded to a beach bungalow with plunge pool that was right on the beach and also near the facilities and restaurants. The quality and space in our room was excellent.  The restaurants all served very good food - the Great Room was very busy around peak times so booking a time well in advance is a good idea if you want to eat there. In particular, the seafood served in the restaurants was of very high quality. The only area that really…

title: Incredible Honeymoon
review: Jalousie Plantation (Sugar Beach), is by far the best resort we have ever been to.  We were there December 1-8 and were blown away by everything this place has to offer.  First the scenery is breathtaking, pictures do not do it justice.  Sitting at the pool or beach looking at the beatiful ocean in the middle of the pitons must be seen in person to appreciate.  We stayed in the superior luxury sugar mill in #2 and absolutely loved it.  This room was perfect for us as we had a garden, plunge pool, and huge balcony overlooking the pool and ocean.  The villas are very cool but require a shuttle to and from, the sugar mill rooms offer luxury and a little more convenience.  If there was a 6th star for service this place would get it, from the butlers to bartenders the service is…

title: Paradise found!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your honeymoon at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are delighted you had a wonderful stay with us and that you were highly satisfied with our services and everything else you experienced, with the exception of the minor disappointment you noted. I will be sure to compliment our team for the ensuring you had a great stay. Our spa is truly amazing and I am happy you had the opportunity to enjoy a couple’s massage and the warm mineral watsu pool. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to welcoming you back soon, perhaps for your first anniversary. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: A honeymoon dream...
review: Jalousie...now sugar Beach is simply fantastic. We had a wonderful honeymoon, everything was perfect. We were waited on hand and foot, service is delightful. But the most important thing about this place is the LOCATION. Absolutely stunning surroundings. It has it all. Mountains, rainforest, gorgeous beach, turquoise sea, beautiful gardens and architecture. If you are looking for escapism, luxury, isolation, tranquillity, natural beauty....this is it.   From the moment we arrived we were blown away. Upgraded to a gorgeous grand luxury villa in the 700s looking straight out to the sea with the pitons on either side - we loved our rainforest hideout!   The villa itself was simply stunning - so spacious, beautifully decorated, luxurious, amazingly comfortable bed....but the outside…

title: Best vacation ever.
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your comments about your honeymoon stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are happy to know that you thoroughly enjoyed our resort and everything that we have to offer.  I am confident that other visitors to TripAdvisor will find your review both thorough and useful. You certainly managed to make the most of your stay with climbing the Piton and enjoying a fishing trip too…not to mention the wonderful Rainforest Spa, Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to your return visit to celebrate a future anniversary. Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Tropical paradise
review: We visited in June 2012 on our honeymoon, when this was still the Jalousie Plantation.  Despite being the 'low season', the weather was perfect everyday.  Blue skies, and only one shower - funnily enough, on the day that we were leaving.  We had a hillside villa with plunge pool.  We never saw another person from our villa, it was very peaceful, with views of the jungle and pitons.  The rooms were beautifully decorated.    We would retire to our plunge pool for cocktails at sunset each day, before getting ready for dinner.  If this sounds like your kind of thing, then bring a bottle of spirits with you from duty free, and then use the mixers in the fridge.  We did a few excursions from the hotel:    We hiked up the Gros Piton, which is hard work!  I am a hockey player, my…

title: Absolutely GORGEOUS Resort
review: First off I must say, this resort is the most beautiful place I have ever been in my life. Its very much like a rain forest, which attracts a lot of beautiful creatures and plants that I have never seen. The pictures on the resort website are truely what it looks like. It looks unreal. Our room was VERY clean. Its very bright and white, and is very graceful. The balcony has a plunge pool that is heated and is very nice to go in in the evening, looking over at the plethora of trees and the ocean. The island itself is nice, but having been to Aruba and st Kitts, its a bit outdated and dirty. Much preferred Aruba. There was some construction, which was a bit annoying but didn't bother me much. The surrounding pitons were very beautiful and the resorts location is spot on. Wasn't…

title: great place
review: Good day, Thank you for providing feedback following your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am pleased you enjoyed your visit and that the courtesies and services extended to you positively contributed to a relaxing vacation. I am also pleased that you were satisfied with everything that we offered. Please know that your comments and your business have been greatly appreciated.  On behalf of the entire team, we all look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Wedding day
review: we really enjoyed our time at jalousie. the staff are excellent.the drivers always remembered our names especially michael. during our stay Our Concierge  arranged a Solomon water taxi for a day\'s tour up thewestcoast of St. Lucia to Castries for shopping, Marigot Bayfor lunch, and snorkeling at a lovely smaller bay. The boat\'s driver, Darvin, and his mate Ifus, made this outing thebest of our stay on the island. Darvin gave us explanation of the history of st lucia, and insights into its culture. He is charming and conversant, knowlegdeable, and accomodating. Ifus is a willing assistant, and both young men  were such good company! Ask for Darvin and Ifus when you book a Solomon water taxi.  thanks to everyone. we will definetely be back next year

title: Absolutely fabulous
review: Good day, Thank you for your glowing praise following your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am delighted that your holiday was enjoyable and that you made the most of what this beautiful island has to offer by visiting Castries and some of the other bays that dot the west coast. It sounds like you had a wonderful, fun filled day. I am also pleased that the water taxi driver provided exceptional service that you would recommend to others. I will pass on your compliments to the team and the water taxi operators that you have mentioned and commend them for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your return visit. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Complete Indulgence
review: After reading the many good reports from others who have got married at the Jalousie resort, now named the sugar mill resort we decided to go ahead with our wedding plans at the resort starting last August 2011. On the odd occasion there where times when we had to wait for replys to certain questions we had from the wedding co-ordinators Marcus and Shantal, we decided to go ahead with the wedding for two package leaving the resort to organise the photographer. We arrived at the resort on the Monday ready for our much awaited wedding day, it was an area of complete paradise everything we had hoped for, we decided to meet up with Shantal the following day to discuss the wedding plans so we could relax for the rest of the week and take in the lovely scenery the resort offered. The…

title: Simply superb
review: We thought that the Jalousie was absolutely stunning. The setting was unbelievable! The food service and rooms were immaculate and you couldnt have asked for more. If there is a better hotel for couples anywhere, I would love to hear about it. It isnt cheap, but I guess you get what you pay for, and I wouldnt recommend it for families with teenagers.

title: Great Resort... Great Service.
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your experience with us.  We are glad to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort and that you were amazed with our stunning location and other offerings.  Once again, thank you for your wonderful comments and we look forward to see you again in the not too distant future.  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Visit to Jalousie Beach
review: Our taxi took us on the long windy road from the airport directly to our Villa, where our Butler, Anisha was waiting with a warm smile and chilled drinks.  The tour around our Villa lasted sometime, taking in a walk in wardrobe, refreshment area (teas, coffees, complimentary Rum, fruit etc) a bathroom equal in size to the bedroom, and vast walk-in shower, - as well as outdoor shower - and of course our patio complete with plunge pool. She also gave us a mini-mobile phone allowing us to contact her from wherever we were on the Island to get things organised.  We didn't use them so I have no idea to what extent things could be organised but for all I know I could have had clouds repositioned, or bird song volume lowered. Everything - and I mean everything, was made easy for us.…

title: Best Hotel on Island
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your stay at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased to hear that you had a wonderful experience and that you were satisfied with everything that we had to offer, particularly the accommodations and setting.. Our team members genuinely care about our guests’ experiences and therefore always try to ensure that they deliver the best possible service. I am happy that you found this to be the case during your stay. Once again, thank you for your praise and we look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: A piece of heaven on earth
review: We were a group of 8 mature, well-travelled, adults visiting from a cruise ship and wanted to spend some time on the "public" beach here.   We planned to use several of the amenities of this hotel.   Previous comments which I had noted pre-trip on Trip Advisor indicated that there were beach facilities (restaurant, snorkel gear for rent, beach loungers for rent) available to anyone visiting.   There is a steep hill, with a wide path, around the hotel down to the beach.   You really have no idea, as a visitor, how far down the hill the beach may be but it is about a 10 minute walk. We found the hill path would be easily navigable down by most  people, but... on a hot day (as ours was), the climb walking back up may be difficult for some.  The hotel has motorized carts for guest…

title: Perfect Location
review: We stayed at Jalousie Plantation/Sugar Beach in a Superior Villa for a week in November.  The grounds are large and set at the foot of the Petit Piton. The upper slopes are rain forest but lower down they give way to more formal gardens, beautifully planted.  It is a perfect setting with views over the Pitons.  The beach is quite small and not completely private but secluded enough to deter all but the most determined outsiders. There are some men selling boat trips and a coconut seller but they are inoffensive and pretty friendly. No hard sell.  The rooms are as good as they look on the website. No trick photography or wide angle lenses making the rooms look bigger. They are really very good. We had a large bedroom, a smaller sitting room, a large bathroom with a separate…

title: Honeymoon in Paradise
review: Good Day,   We are pleased that you made Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort your chosen vacation destination. It is always gratifying when we exceed guest expectations with our high standards, facilities, amenities and accommodations. I am also happy to know that you liked the menu selections in our restaurants, despite what you felt were high prices for wines. We try to provide wine selections to suit every palate and budget but unfortunately we have to factor in the cost of shipping these wines to St Lucia and the extremely high  taxes and duties we have to pay to bring them to the hotel—all this, despite being so close to South America and California which do produce some wonderful wines. We continually review our list to ensure there is a broad and affordable selection and to lobby government to lower duties. Once again, thank you for choosing Sugar Beach and we look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: One of the most stunning settings on Earth
review: My husband and I spent a week at the Jalousie Plantation in early November and it was everything we hoped it would be, and more.  We wanted a resort that would stand out from any other place we had been and this was it.    Our private car airport transfer drove us directly to our villa in the 800's, where our butler welcomed us with rum punch. We checked in from the villa and our butler had already made our dinner reservation for that evening at the Bayside restaurant.  This was a wonderful start to a week of relaxation and luxury.    The villa was amazing.  Very clean and spacious.  It had two full bathrooms, a huge walk in closet, a divine king size bed and the bedroom had doors leading out to the patio.  Outside there was a few lounge chairs, a table and chairs and a plunge…

title: Superb!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your  honeymoon experience at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased to hear that you had a wonderful holiday and that you were content with everything that we had to offer. Our staff will be delighted that you thoroughly enjoyed the time you spent with us, especially Richard. We have worked hard to create an environment where our guests can relax and enjoy the best quality service, accommodation, facilities and amenities. Our Rainforest Spa is unique and provides top-notch services in an amazing location. It is great that you found this was a highlight of your stay. Our culinary team also goes the extra mile to ensure that our guests are gratified with the presentation and quality of the food they prepare. I will be sure to share your feedback with them. Once again, thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to seeing you again at Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Honeymoon, beautiful resort!
review: Nestled in between the Pitons on a white, sandy beach, this is one of the most stunning locations on Earth. We arrived yesterday and were taken to a delightful villa in the 900s overlooking the Pitons. An amazing outdoor shower and private plungepool were in the garden. A lovely bath with a Victorian claw bath, limestone tiling and wetroom. Our butler, Montgomery is fabulous and nothing is too much trouble. The food is delicious and is made to order, which I much prefer to a buffet option. Service is very good.  The resort is huge and travel is via a shuttle service everywhere. This is very efficient and you are provided with Walkie Talkies to order anything from anywhere in the resort.  An excellent resort. Highly recommended.

title: Lovely but noisy
review: We returned from Jalousie last week after staying from 4-15 Nov.  This was our second visit to the resort, having been there in Nov 2011.  We enjoyed our holiday very much and cannot understand the comments posted a few days ago regarding poor service - we encountered nothing but excellent service throughout the resort - the staff are extremely polite, refer to you by name and are totally professional.  We arrived at the resort and were taken directly to Sugar Mill 2, a beautiful room with a fabulous balcony looking straight down to the sea.  We were delighted with the room until the following morning when we heard lots of construction noise from both the new restaurant area being created underneath the Great Room and around the pool.  After a couple of days we spoke with Lisa…

title: Lovely place let down by really poor service
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback about you second visit to The Jalousie Plantation (soon to become Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort). We are particularly pleased that you had a wonderful time and that you were well taken care of by our staff and management team. I am sorry that at the time of your stay there was still work being carried out by the pool and on the ground floor of the Great House. These projects are now finished and I am very pleased that we were able to move you to quieter accommodations so you could continue to enjoy your vacation. I will pass on your glowing comments to the team and commend them for positively impacting your stay. Thank you for your comments and business. We look forward to your return visit in the not too distant future. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect Honeymoon
review: I don't usually write reviews whilst on the location but having spent 4 days already I don't think it's going to be much different by Saturday when we leave.  Looking after a winter sun holiday we went for this resort after we saw some really good offer with BA sales. We arrived on Saturday afternoon and where we met our taxi we preordered to take us there for $75. I guess you can find cheaper option if looking around.  Once there we were driven straight to our room (sugar mill). Be aware these rooms have nothing to do with villas you may read in other reviews. They're nice, good size and close to the beach however the view is not amazing and there is an odd bath stuck in a room which would be better arranged as a living room.  There are still some building work but mostly…

title: Should really be 4 - 1/2 stars
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your comments and concerns with us. I would like to apologize for the experiences that you have described. Our Luxury Sugar Mill Rooms feature the same décor and bathroom fixtures and fittings as our villas and are extremely popular with guests due to their proximity to the beach. We are always very transparent with our direct booking guests, travel agents and tour operators about the location and views from all of our accommodations so that guests have all of the information they need to make a decision about the very best room category for them. I truly apologize if you were given misleading information and were not clear about the location or the garden views that are typical for a booking in what is our lead-in room category.. I would like to apologize for the inconsistencies in service standards that you have described. We continually review service delivery and embark on regular staff training to ensure the service our guests enjoy not only meets, but exceeds their expectations. Certainly, your comments about the service are not generally shared by previous reviewers who have posted on this site. Although, we are sorry you felt you had cause for complaint, I am pleased that our guest relations manager was able to meet with you prior to your departure to discuss the issues you have raised. I understand that a satisfactory solution was found and that we were able to remedy your concerns to a certain extent.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business and we look forward to welcoming you back at some point in the future so that we can share firsthand the improvements made in light of your concerns. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Disappointed!
review: We just returned from a five night stay for our honeymoon.  The resort is amazing.  We were upgraded to a grand luxury villa and were greeted with a bottle of champagne and a fruit plate. Our butlers-Jason, Montgomery, and Sean couldn't have been more helpful and friendly. The sunset cruise is a must-do! We ate at the Bayside for breakfast, lunch and dinner most days and the food and service was wonderful! We hope to come back!

title: A MUST DO FOR ANYONE SEEKING PERFECTION
review: My girlfriend and I were on a cruise and decided to spend the money and time to do a day at this resort along with a couple massage, all I can say is WOW. We will be going back, the SPA was out of this world, it was in a rainforest, in tree houses, so fabulous.  This place is like something out of a fiction book....I would highly recomend it...we went snorkeling, did lunch here, and hung out on the fabulous beach.  It isnt cheap, but its one of a kind.

title: Stunning location, but poor service & construction ruined the experience
review: Good day, Thank you for visiting our resort and making the time to provide feedback regarding your experience. I am particularly glad that you had the opportunity to experience our beautiful Rainforest Spa and that you were pleased and satisfied with the services provided to you. Once again, thank you for your wonderful comments and we look forward to welcoming you back soon, perhaps as a resident guest next time.  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: Perfect Honeymoon
review: Spent 4 nights at Jalousie (Nov 6-10) and were sadly disappointed. We had spent 4 night at Ti Kaye, which is a very different type of resort but we had a more pleasant stay there and found it to have better and more friendly service.  My expectation had been Ti Kaye would be remote and rustic and Jalousie would be elegant, luxurious and stunning.  It met the stunning expectation.  First the positives:  - It is a truly stunning location at the base of Petite Piton, with an amazing view of Gros Piton.   - There is good snorkeling right off the beach, in a roped off area protected from boats.   - The food is high quality, including good bread & pastries at breakfast (something we didn’t find elsewhere in St Lucia).   - The rooms have high end details and appointments, including…

title: Wonderful Honeymoon, with a few contructive comments...
review: Good day,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback following your recent stay at The Jalousie Plantation, Sugar Beach. Based on what you have described, it appears that you did not have the best possible experience at the resort and for that, I am truly sorry.  In reference to the work-taking place at the resort, you may be pleased to know that the work you describe is now finished. The main pool has been in use for a couple of weeks and the new path from the Great House to the beach is now finished as well. It appears that your stay coincided with a period where the level of noise was higher than usual as we were re-doing the paths and putting final touches to the pool project. I would like to take the opportunity to apologise for any inconvenience this caused. I am also sorry about the confusion with settling the time for your dinner reservation. We are continuing to review our service standards in that area to ensure that there isn’t a repeat of what you have described. Some of the issues you describe as “regimented” are actually put in place for the safety of our guests. As you can imagine, our beach is very popular and at times, there can be a great deal of boat traffic. We have marked off an area for snorkeling (actually the boundaries of the National Marine Reserve) to prevent boats from entering the very best location for this activity and to keep our guests safe.  Once again, thank you for your comments and business and we look forward to serving you again so we can share firsthand the changes and improvements that have taken place in light of your concerns. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Best vacation ever
review: My husband and I did a lot of research before deciding on a destination and hotel for our honeymoon. Let's just say, this was the best decision we have ever made! This resort is amazing, from the views, the food and the staff. You feel so well taken care of here and it is a great place to relax and have some adventures! We highly recommend Sugar Beach as we will be returning for an anniversary in the future!   :)

title: Nearly perfect.
review: My wife and I have just returned from an 8 day stay in 904 (the  villa currently featured on the web site).  Absolutely stunning is an understatement. We have stayed in many similar hotels all over the world and (construction aside) the Jalouise is very, very good indeed. The many other posts which rave about location, accommodation, staff, and food are quite correct so we will simply support their views.   The overall experience was somewhat undermined by the on going construction work and we did have a specific issue which was comprehensively addressed by Lisa the Customer Relations Manager. However for a top notch venue like this you do not expect to have issues in the first place.  We will most likely return – not something we generally do - when construction has finished…

title: Amazing honeymoon!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback following your recent stay at The Jalousie Plantation, Sugar Beach. We are glad to hear that you had a wonderful stay with the exception of the issue you mention. Although there should not have been an issue in the first place, I am delighted that our guest relations manager professionally handled your concerns. I would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused as a result of the enhancement work that was taking place during the period that you stayed with us. All of the work that was taking place during your stay is now finished with the exception of landscaping around the pool that will soon be completed returning the resort to its tranquil best. Once again, thank you for your comments and business and we look forward to welcoming you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort in the near future..  Regards, André Boersma General Manager

title: WOW!!! Absolute Paradise!!
review: My husband and I stayed in a villa here in May for a week-long honeymoon.  We LOVED it!  With our timing being just past peak time, we were lucky to feel like we had the resort to ourselves.  I think this was not actually the case, but the excellent design of the resort that there was great privacy for the villas and plenty of space on the beaches and in the restaurants so that we never had a problem dining or getting a lounge chair at whatever time we felt like.  The food was divine.  We lucked out with a special running while we were booking our honeymoon to have breakfast and lunch included with our room.  This allowed us to try out both restaurants, appetizer, entree, and dessert every night.  Nothing we ate disappointed.  I think the location of this resort really cannot be…

title: Unbelieveable
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to share your feedback about your honeymoon experience with us. I am delighted to know that you enjoyed everything that we had to offer—from the accommodations and service, to the food and beverages we serve in our outlets. Our culinary team dedicates a lot of time and creativity into creating the dishes they serve. We are happy that you enjoyed their offerings. Thank you for your comments and for recommending our resort to your friends and family.  We hope to see you back soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Best in the Caribbean!
review: My husband and I spent our Anniversary at the Jalousie November 2012.   The Jalousie is absolutely is top notch!!!  Truely paradise!! BEST location in St Lucia!!  The views are magnificent!  We were surprisingly upgrated to an incredible bungalow right on the beach!!  I almost cried that's how spectacular it was!!  From the moment we arrived on the property we were treated like royalty!! Butler service was incredible!!  Bungalow was perfectly clean and so very romantic!! Bed and pillows were super comfortable!   The beach is amazing and the freshly redone pool was incredible!!  Restaurant staff was top notch....the food was out of this world!!!  We have really high expectations when traveling and the Jalousie will not disappoint!!!!!  Overall service was incredible!  Just can't…

title: Wonderful honeymoon stay
review: My wife and I spent 7 days at The Jalousie Plantation at the end of October 2012 for our honeymoon.  We arrived early on our check-in day and had lunch at the Bayside while waiting.  Once our 'room' was ready, a shuttle began taking us up the hillside and I soon realized that we would not be staying in the Sugar Mill room that we had booked.  We arrived and Linus took us into our Superior Luxury Villa (#803).  As he walked us through, neither of us could stop smiling.  It was above and beyond what we expected.  From the canopy bed, to the clawfoot tub and dual-stall shower, to the complimentary champagne, rum, fruiit, and fried plantains for our honeymoon, it was quite a welcome, indeed.  We felt pampered and well-looked after during our entire stay.  The beach, while short…

title: Perfect!
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your honeymoon experience with us. We are always pleased to hear great comments and to know that you were really pleased with the high level of service that we provided. We provide top-notch amenities, facilities and accommodation that we know will enhance our guests’ overall experience. I am particularly pleased that you valued the upgrade that was offered to you. Regarding the food, I am glad that you enjoyed the food offerings with the exception of the dessert that you mentioned. Had you made us aware, I am confident that our executive chef would have prepared something to your satisfaction.. Once again, thank you for your comments and we would be delighted to welcome you back to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort for a future anniversary celebration. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Amazing Honeymoon…The Jalousie Plantation
review: I had an amazing week-long stay in October.  This resort is nestled in the perfect location between the pitons. The service is top notch from the Butlers, to the shuttle drivers and of course the restaurant staff.  My only regret is that I didn't stay longer....

title: Irritating but still a 5
review: Good day, Thank you for providing us with your feedback regarding your stay at The Jalousie Plantation, Sugar Beach soon to rebrand as Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. I am delighted to know that our location, services and staff positively impacted your vacation. I will pass on your glowing feedback to the team. Once again, thank you for sharing your wonderful comments with us. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: This Place Is Amazing
review: My husband and I spent 9 days at The Jalousie Plantation for our honeymoon in mid October 2012.  We had spent a lot of time researching the perfect place for our special trip.  Our options were limitless, but we know that we wanted a relaxing honeymoon where we did not have to do daily tours like in Europe, or change too many time zones and be fatigued like Hawaii or Asia.  We wanted to relax, read a good book, enjoy fine food, and be treated very special, as we shared our first weeks together as husband and wife.  This is what the Jalousie Plantation did!  The setting is breathtaking and romantic nestled between the volcanic pitons.  From the beautiful sunsets to chirping of the jungle and crystal Caribbean Sea, the resort is set in paradise.  We had the most wonderful…

title: Construction Site
review: Beautiful location, but the hotel is currently a construction site. Pool is closed to guests as there are 20+ men working on it. Same for other areas of hotel....Restaurant, spa, etc. construction everywhere. But I suppose it will be beautiful at some point. For now, it is very noisy and not so relaxing.  Think twice before booking. Otherwise, it's a beautiful spot.

title: Incredible!
review: Good day, Thank you for your comments following your recent stay at The Jalousie Plantation, Sugar Beach. I am happy to note that you enjoyed our stunning World Heritage-listed location and see that we are trying to ensure that we have the amenities and accommodations to match such a world-class location. Unfortunately, you vacationed with us at a time when our swimming pool was closed for remodeling and therefore not available for guest use. I truly apologize for the inconvenience caused. The work on the pool is now completed and it has been open and in use for a few days now drastically reducing the number of workmen in that area.  In fact, the only work being done in the pool area is soft landscaping which does not produce any kind of disturbance to our guests and which will be finished in the coming days. Our restaurants have and continue to operate as normal. We are putting the finishing touches to our new breakfast restaurant at the ground floor of the Great House and this new venue should be completed by the end of this month. The bulk of the work is now interior work and should have little or no impact on our guests.  In addition, the manicure and pedicure station is nearing completion and it is only soft work remaining to be completed in that section as well.  To give you a fresh perspective, we have uploaded some new photographs on the photo gallery, which were taken of the pool just a few days ago. Our guests are thoroughly enjoying its new design and contemporary feel. Once again, I would like to thank you for your comments and we look forward to serving you again to share firsthand the improvements made in light of your concerns. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Picture perfect honeymoon
review: My wife and I spent our honeymoon at the Jalouise (now Sugar Beach) this past August and we couldn't have made a better choice. The place was absolutely incredible, service superior and unbelievable views. We rented villa number 319 which overlooked the bay and gave us some beautiful sunsets. The food at the restaurants was delicious, although a bit pricey. We typically like to visit local restaurants for our meals but in this case, we ended up spending almost all our time at the resort. A suggestion would be to buy the meal plan, which will certainly save money in the long run.  The staff was extremely friendly, always smiling and going out of their way to make sure the guests were completely satisfied.   We can't wait to return!

title: Had to Get Back As Fast As We Could!
review: Good Day, On behalf of the entire team, I would like say how happy we are that you enjoyed your honeymoon with us, and thank you for providing us with your feedback. We are committed to making the holiday experience of our guests satisfying and outstanding by providing first class services and amenities. We are glad that you were pleased with all our services and offerings. I will communicate your feedback to the entire team and commend them for a job well done. Once again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Living in a postcard is awesome!
review: We got from Jalousie Plantation for our honeymoon in August, and we couldn’t have picked a better resort. It was absolutely amazing from the staff, food, beach, service and accommodations to the breathtaking views.  We had an amazing view of the Pitons in room #505 which provided amazing sunsets on our back porch.  We spent most days at the beach under a Tiki Hut; we never had trouble finding one. It’s a very intimate resort which is perfect for a honeymoon. There are not too many people and we never had trouble finding a place on the beach. Most days we skipped lunch at the Bayside restaurant (This is where lunch is served on the resort) and ordered off the beach menu. The beach food was amazing and our favorite items we ordered were calamari, basil salad and pizzas.  The…

title: The Jalousie Plantation, St Lucia   7th - 17th October 2012
review: When we arrived at the Jalousie Plantation we were hypnotized by its location - An azure sea of silk cushioning crystals and diamonds as they sparkled underneath the Caribbean sun and sky of powder blue- a lovely curved white beach between two breathtaking cone shaped volcanic pitons of black and green framing the picture. They call it paradise and IT IS!   We had a most excellent time, in fact the holiday was probably one of the best we have had due to the Islands beauty and the warmth and the friendliness of the St. Lucian locals as well as the company of other guests.  Our villa was lovely with amazing views looking out onto this stunning landscape. Each morning was a delight waking up to the views, and even when it rained, the Plantation had that very special quality of…

title: Beautiful resort and scenery to match
review: Good day, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your recent holiday at The Jalousie Plantation, Sugar Beach We are committed to making every holiday experience fulfilling and memorable by providing first class services and amenities. I am delighted that we matched and surpassed your expectations in most areas. I am also glad that our team positively contributed to a great holiday experience and that they added special touches that you enjoyed. I am happy that you enjoyed our food and beverage offerings. Regarding more options for Creole food, had you made us aware of your feelings,  I am confident our executive chef would have  been more than happy to create these dishes for you. We are always getting rave reviews about the quality of our transportation system and the interaction of our friendly and professional shuttle drivers.  I am delighted that you share the same opinion. The spa and Cane Bare are truly amazing and word-class and I am pleased that you had the opportunity to experience it.   The resort will change name from the Jalousie Plantation to Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort on November 30, 2012. While other guests share your views about the loss of the Jalousie name, the reason for the change is to clearly signal the completion of the resort’s multi-million dollar enhancement project. Sadly, the resort has enjoyed mixed success under the Jalousie name in the past and the resort ownership was anxious to indicate that after so much work, this is essentially a new resort. At the same time, all of us who work at Sugar Beach and live on the island will continue to keep the history alive and ensure Sugar Beach retains all of the very best elements of the Jalousie Plantation. The main pool is now redesigned and opened a few days ago. Unfortunately, the pool was closed for this remodeling project at the time of your stay.  I am glad that the upgrade that we gave you helped to some extent to compensate for the inconvenience caused. I am disappointed that the hot water issue in your villa was not rectified in a timely manner. We are continuing to review our service standards in that area to ensure that there is not a repeat of what you have described. I would also like to clarify your point about the all-inclusive package. Sugar Beach will continue to offer a range of meal plan options to guests from room only to all-inclusive. We have no intention of changing this very popular option for our guests. Once again, thank you for your business and feedback and we look forward to serving you again in the not too distant future.   Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise!
review: Returned about 2 weeks ago from Jalousie Plantation. We were greeted by our lovely butler Jose with rum punch and cold lavendar towels on arrival, we Had been upgraded to a luxury villa from the sugar mill rooms due to the pool renovations which were happening the week we were staying. Our villa 901 had a piton view and we were blown away with the room, it was beautiful. From the chandelier in the huge bathroom, to the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in, to the outdoor shower around the back of the villa. My husband loved sitting outside and taking dips in the private pool. We were on the MAP for dining, so breakfast and dinner was included. The breakfasts were amazing!! I loved the blueberry French toast with caramelised banana and my husband had an English breakfast most…

title: Paradise
review: Good day, Thank you for your valuable feedback following your wedding and honeymoon experience at The Jalousie Plantation, Sugar Beach.  I am happy to know that we exceeded your expectations in all areas and you had a wonderful time during your stay. We provide amenities that we know our guests will enjoy and I am glad that you were satisfied with our accommodations, amenities and facilities.  At The Jalousie Plantation, Sugar Beach we are very passionate and concerned about our guest experiences and therefore strive to ensure that the highest level of service is always provided. Our culinary offerings and are well considered to create exceptional dining experiences for our guests. I am delighted that you enjoyed the dishes prepared for you. We will pass on your comments to the team and let them know that their extra care and attention really enhanced your overall wedding and honeymoon experience.  Regarding the mosquitoes, we always advise our guests to use repellant to protect them from these pests especially when they are susceptible to bites. In addition, we spray the rooms on a daily basis and fog the entire property twice a week to help eliminate these nuisance insects. Once again, thank you for your valuable feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Heaven on Earth
review: I cannot say enough good things about Sugar Beach.  My husband and I stayed there on our honeymoon and it was beyond perfect...the staff, the rooms, the beach, the food, the spa...everything was better than we could imagine.  I have been fortunate to stay in several luxury hotels in my life, and Sugar Beach met or exceeded the standards I've seen elsewhere.  My husband and I are already planning a return trip, and we wouldn't dare stay anywhere else in St. Lucia other than Sugar Beach.  It was just perfect, and I can't imagine any place better for a romantic, luxurious, indulgent island getaway.

title: Best in the Caribbean
review: This was our second trip to Jalousie and was our 25th wedding anniversary. We were there in early August. The staff was fantastic! They made us green mango salads, brought in a ton of local fruit and was so attentive to everything we needed. Our room was decorated with Anniversay flowers, balloons, etc.  The food was very good. It was quiet, romantic and absolutely beautiful. We were in 709 and the butlers for that room were the best. There is repair going on from the 2010 hurricane but it did not detract at all.

title: It will be very good when work is completed
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about the standards and quality of service you experienced at The Jalousie Plantation, Sugar Beach soon to rebrand as Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort during your second stay with us and congratulations on your 25th anniversary!  I am happy that we were able to meet and exceed your expectations the second time around, and for such an important occasion too.  It is always a pleasure to read comments about how our team members went the extra mile to add those special touches that help to create special memories for our guests.  I will be sure to share your comments with the rest of the team… particularly our butlers in the 700 cluster and commend them for a job well done.  Once again, thank you for your valuable feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: A most dreamy, relaxing and pampered honeymoon
review: We have just returned from a weeks vacation at the resort. Pro's: stunning setting, villas are very nice with great views ( tea and coffee making facilities, uk and US plug sockets, good wi fi, top end bathrooms, spacious) The Great Room food and service very good, gym has lots of equipment, big variety of water sports, kids club. The revamped bits are high end including bar and main house.  Con's: There is a great deal of work in progress, pool is closed, lots of work men in evidence in and around beach area and pool side restaurant area. Need to Wear repellent at all times ( we did not use our villa pool at 20 mins outside on the first day resulted in around 10 bites on husband) Evening dining by beach restaurant was OK at best. Gym does not open till 9.00 am even though on…

title: Amazing!
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your recent stay at The Jalousie Plantation, Sugar Beach soon to rebrand as Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  I am pleased that on balance you enjoyed your stay and that the entire team contributed positively to your vacation experience.  We have been, and continue to be, very transparent with our direct booking guests and with travel agents and tour operators about the continuing enhancement works at the resort. The main pool will be completed at the end of October 2012. I am sorry if you found the on-going renovation work intrusive and that you feel you should have waited to visit the resort. We will shortly be seeing an end to the works going on in the public areas of the property, including the pool, which should re-open in the coming days. We certainly can’t wait for this to happen.  It is surprising to hear your comments about the gym. Guests can access the gym whatever time they want using their room key.  I would like to apologize if that information was not communicated to you during check-in.   I would also like to apologise for the inconsistencies you describe with our shuttle service.  We are continuing to review our service standards in that area to ensure that our guests are not left waiting for long periods for the buggies to transport them from one point to the next. We do have a fleet of vehicles that we use and we try to place them strategically around the property so they are readily on hand when guests call.  I trust that you will not let the less favorable experiences deter you from returning. We would be happy to share an improved Sugar Beach experience with you at some point in the future.  Best Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: A great September get-away
review: We just returned from one amazing week (Oct 7 to 14, 2012) honeymooning at the Jalousie Plantation, now re-branded as Sugar Beach, and it was by far the best resort vacation we have ever experienced.  We try to take a trip to the Caribbean every year in the winter and have been to quite a few excellent resorts but Sugar Beach far exceeded our expectations and have set the bar high for future travels. We could not be happier with our choice to go with Sugar Beach as our honeymoon spot - and trust me, we did TONS of research beforehand to land on this resort.  Instead of recounting our trip in detail, here are some things that made this experience stand out to us as one of the best vacations and some useful tidbits we learned along the way from other guests.  Hopefully, this…

title: Amazing Honeymoon, 10 stars!!!
review: Where do I begin? My husband and I researched for months on where we should go on our Honeymoon. We landed at the Jalousie because of all the rave reviews, which they were all true! A couple months before our Honeymoon, I read a review that the pool was being renovated at the time we were going to be there. I contacted the guest relations dept. And spoke with Lisa Jones. She was amazing to work with, and upgraded our room to a luxury villa from the sugar mill because I was a little upset that the pool would not be finished.  We had a taxi pick us up from the airport and take us to the resort ($75 each way), and he dropped us off right at our doorstep. We were greeted by our butler with cold drinks, and firefly phones. Our villa was AMAZING!! The bed was very very comfortable,…

title: Nearly excellent
review: Good day, Thank you for sharing your feedback following your honeymoon at The Jalousie Plantation,  soon to rebrand as Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. We are pleased you felt  you made the right decision choosing our resort as your honeymoon destination and that the reviews your read on TripAdvisor assisted you in booking with us. We are delighted that our highly trained and professional team created a remarkable experience for you and your new spouse; I will commend them for a job well done. Thank you for your glowing comments about The Rainforest Spa. We definitely agree that this is a truly unique one of a kind place that is made even more special because of the friendly and qualified therapists who deliver extraordinary service. I am delighted that you had the opportunity to indulge in a relaxing massage during your stay. In reference to your comments about the two cats that frequent the Bayside, we try our utmost to discourage them from entering the restaurant and actually feed them in an area well away from guest facilities. Unfortunately, not all guests share your abhorrence for these creatures and continue to feed them at the tables in the restaurant despite our repeated requests for them not to do so. We continue to work closely with the St Lucia Animal Protection Society to control the cat population on the plantation. We undertake regular spaying and neutering and seek to find new homes for the friendlier felines in an effort to keep the population to a minimum. One of the two cats you mentioned has already been spayed and is due to be found a new home shortly. The second has proven to be wilier, but we are continuing our efforts with her. I am sorry they made you feel uncomfortable.   Once again, thank you for your generally wonderful comments. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Best Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Dream wedding at an amazing resort!
review: My partner and i travelled to st lucia in september 2012. We were greeted at the airport by a private taxi. Took about 45 minutes to get to jalouise. On arriving we were taken to reception and told our room wasnt ready. Within 2 minutes we were told we had been upgraded to a luxury villa which was a nice surprise. The villa was huge and had amazing views of the pitons just heavenly. Our butler informed us that he had made a reservation for us at the bayside restaurant but could change the time if it didnt suit us. The food and service in the bayside restaurant was very good indeed. Our only complaint was the bbq on the friday night. We felt there wasnt enough meat on offer. A steak or sausages would have been nice. Food as always hot and well presented. Ok now for some negative…

title: Waking up in a cloud!
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback following your recent stay at The Jalousie Plantation, Sugar Beach, soon to rebrand as Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort. It is always nice when we receive such positive comments about our staff I am happy our team members, especially those mentioned, positively impacted your holiday. Thank you for your great comments regarding our service levels and for the constructive criticism in the areas that felt needed improvement. We are particularly happy that you enjoyed our food offerings and ambience at the Bayside restaurant with the exception of the Friday night barbeque where you felt the selection of meats on offer was limited. Had you made us aware of your feelings and let us know that you preferred different meats,  I am confident that our chefs would have gladly prepared others dishes more suited to your palate. I am disappointed that you were not informed about the closure of the pool prior to your arrival on property. We have been, and continue to be, very transparent with our direct booking guests and with travel agents and tour operators about the continuing enhancement works at the resort.  We issue monthly updates informing them of all projects that are taking place at least six weeks in advance of the commencement of works. In the case of the pool, the first notifications were issued as far back as May 2012. I would like to apologize for the communication breakdown and inconvenience caused. The pool is scheduled for completion by the end of this month bringing us one step closer to our rebrand and re-launch as Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort on November 30.  In respect of your comments about the all-inclusive package and the mini bar, we would have happily included all the sodas and beers as part of this package for you had you made us aware of how you felt. You may wish to be aware that as of 2013, soft drinks and locally bottle beer and water from the mini bar will be included as a standard in-room amenity for all of our guests, whether or not they are on a meal plan. We will also be including room service as part of our meal plans with a delivery and service charge attached. Once again, thank you for your comments and your business.  We look forward to serving you again in the not too distant future. Best Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Paradise found!!!
review: We got married on the 14th of September while spending the week at Jalousie, not only was the resort AMAZING but our wedding was perfect!  From arrival at the Jalousie Plantation all the staff were amazing, friendly and always incredibly helpful.  Our villa was fantastic and totally blew our minds, the pictures did not do it justice. We met with Shantal on our first full day to organise the details for the wedding.  Again she was very knowledgeable and incredibly helpful.  All of the paperwork was organised within and hour and then we were taken on a tour of the resort to pick the ceremony and reception location. We were very relaxed with everything as we knew it was all in good hands. Our photographer Ashley was fantastic and we have all the pictures we could have hoped for. I…

title: Amazing Honeymoon
review: The Jalousie Plantation is THE place to go if St. Lucia is your destination and/or you are seeking the best all-around service during your vacation. My wife and I spent 7 days here and hardly left the resort. We were extremely impressed with the staff and their commitment to our having a fun, relaxing, and enjoyable trip. We did not feel the need to do any snorkel adventures because the beach at the resort was so convenient and full of sea-life! We did the Zip-lining which was just up the hill and across the street from the resort entrance. We also hiked the Gros Piton, which was more difficult than I had hoped and expected (not an ideal honeymoon adventure). We did the Sunset Cruise which was beautiful, relaxing, fun, and exciting (we saw Flying Fish and had lots to drink…

title: Short week in paradise!
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about the standards and quality of service you experienced at The Jalousie Plantation—soon to be rebranded as Sugar Beach, A Viceroy Resort.  We are pleased to know that you had a great honeymoon and that the staff extended courtesies that positively impacted your stay with us.  Jalousie is not only known for its stunning location but also the amenities and accommodations that we offer to our guests. We are glad that you enjoyed all of our services especially of food and beverage offerings. We are also glad that you were able to participate in activities that you enjoyed—including the Piton climb, we know it’s tough!  Although the problem was resolved to your satisfaction, I would like to apologize for the bug issue in your room. The island’s tropical climate means that it is the perfect habitat for these pests. We do have a very comprehensive pest control system in place and regularly spray all of our rooms, however we always advise guests to carry repellant with them to prevent bites.   Thank you once again for your review and considering a return visit.   Regards,   André Boersma General Manager

title: Beyond Expectations - Honeymoon vacation
review: Just returned from our second visit to Jalousie. We needed a quick recovery week and Jalousie was the perfect place. The lovely management gave us villa 505 which was where we were last time (in Nov 2011) with its stunning view of sea, beach (over the near vertical drop the other side of the terrace!) and both Pitons. We were welcomed with cold rum punch by our butler, and it was plain sailing from then on - lazy mornings taking the shuttle to breakfast, lazy afternoons reading and admiring the view and lazy evenings eating lovely meals in the great room. We had a wonderful time and look forward to a third visit when the building work is finally finished!   Thanks Jalousie team!

title: Absolute paradise!
review: Good day,  Thank you for taking the time and making the effort to post your review about your second visit to The Jalousie Plantation, Sugar Beach.  On behalf of the entire team, I would like to say how delighted we are that we met and exceeded your high expectations in all areas.  We are committed to making your holiday experience fulfilling and memorable by providing first class services and amenities, and it is gratifying that we managed to deliver once again.  I will communicate your feedback to the entire team and commend them for a job well done.  Your feedback and your business are very important to us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future  Regards,  André Boersma General Manager

title: Fantastic Location
review: We are so happy with our choice!  This resort has set the bar pretty high for our future trips.  We are already excited about returning for an anniversary in the future.    After an all-nighter (we got married the day before in Toronto), a 5 and a ½ hour flight and a 45 minute transfer (which was all very smooth) it was extremely nice to be dropped off at our Grand Luxury Villa (thanks for the upgrade!) with Jason our butler waiting for us with rum punches and cold towels.  After a quick tour of our villa and check in done right there, we enjoyed the plantain chips and dip, fresh fruit, champagne and bottle of rum that was left in our room for us.  Jason had even made us dinner reservations for that night – the whole process was so easy and got our vacation started on the right…
